tika-s0105t0:133_1: Tatthāpi ca vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyīsaññitaṃ ekameva sandhāya “dvaṭṭhantarakappā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:133_2: Na hi so assutasāsanadhammo itare jānāti bāhirakānamavisayattā, ajānanto evamāhāti attho.
tika-s0105t0:134_0: Urabbhe hananti, hantvā vā jīvitaṃ kappentīti orabbhikā. Esa nayo sākuṇikādīsupi.
tika-s0105t0:134_1: Luddāti vuttāvasesakā ye keci cātuppadajīvikā nesādā. Māgavikapadasmiñhi rohitādimigajātiyeva
tika-s0105t0:134_2: gahitā. Bandhanāgāre niyojentīti bandhanāgārikā. Kurūrakammantāti dāruṇakammantā.
tika-s0105t0:134_3: Ayaṃ sabbopi kaṇhakammapasutatāya kaṇhābhijātīti vadati kaṇhassa dhammassa abhijāti
tika-s0105t0:134_4: abbhuppatti yassāti katvā. Bhikkhūti buddhasāsane bhikkhū. Kaṇṭaketi chandarāge.
tika-s0105t0:134_5: Saññogavasena tesaṃ pakkhipanaṃ. Kaṇṭakasadisachandarāgena saññuttā bhuñjantīti hi
tika-s0105t0:134_6: adhippāyena “kaṇṭake pakkhipitvā”ti vuttaṃ. Kasmāti ce? Yasmā “te paṇītapaṇīte paccaye
tika-s0105t0:134_7: paṭisevantī”ti tassa micchāgāho, tasmā ñāyaladdhepi paccaye bhuñjamānā ājīvakasamayassa
tika-s0105t0:134_8: vilomagāhitāya paccayesu kaṇṭake pakkhipitvā khādanti nāmāti vadati kaṇṭakavuttikāti
tika-s0105t0:134_9: kaṇṭakena yathāvuttena saha jīvikā. Ayañhissa pāḷiyevāti ayaṃ makkhalissa vādadīpanā
tika-s0105t0:134_10: attanā racitā pāḷiyevāti yathāvuttamatthaṃ samattheti. Kaṇṭakavuttikā eva nāma eke
tika-s0105t0:134_11: apare pabbajitā bāhirakā santi, te nīlābhijātīti vadatīti attho. Te hi savisesaṃ
tika-s0105t0:134_12: attakilamathānuyogamanuyuttā. Tathā hi te kaṇṭake vattantā viya bhavantīti kaṇṭakavuttikāti
tika-s0105t0:134_13: vuttā. Nīlassa dhammassa abhijāti yassāti nīlābhijāti. Evamitaresupi.
tika-s0105t0:135_0: Amhākaṃ saññojanagaṇṭho natthīti vādino bāhirakapabbajitā nigaṇṭhā. Ekameva sāṭakaṃ
tika-s0105t0:135_1: paridahantā ekasāṭakā. Kaṇhato parisuddho nīlo, tato pana lohitotiādinā yathākkamaṃ
tika-s0105t0:135_2: tassa parisuddhaṃ vādaṃ dassetuṃ “ime kirā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Paṇḍaratarāti bhuñjananahānapaṭikkhepādivatasamāyogena
tika-s0105t0:135_3: parisuddhatarā kaṇhanīlamupādāya lohitassāpi parisuddhabhāvena vattabbato. Odātavasanāti
tika-s0105t0:135_4: odātavatthaparidahanā. Acelakasāvakāti ājīvakasāvakabhūtā. Te kira ājīvakaladdhiyā
tika-s0105t0:135_5: visuddhacittatāya nigaṇṭhehipi paṇḍaratarā haliddābhānampi purime upādāya parisuddhabhāvappattito.
tika-s0105t0:135_6: “Eva”ntiādinā tassa chandāgamanaṃ dasseti. Nandādīnaṃ sāvakabhūtā pabbajitā ājīvakā.
tika-s0105t0:135_7: Tathā ājīvakiniyo. Nandādayo kira tathārūpaṃ ājīvakapaṭipattiṃ ukkaṃsaṃ pāpetvā ṭhitā,
tika-s0105t0:135_8: tasmā nigaṇṭhehi ājīvakasāvakehi pabbajitehi paṇḍaratarā vuttā paramasukkābhijātīti ayaṃ tassa laddhi.
tika-s0105t0:136_0: Purisabhūmiyoti padhānaniddeso. Itthīnampi hetā bhūmiyo esa icchateva. Satta divaseti
tika-s0105t0:136_1: accantasaññogavacanaṃ, ettakampi mandā momūhāti. Sambādhaṭṭhānatoti mātukucchiṃ sandhāyāha.
tika-s0105t0:136_2: Rodanti ceva viravanti ca tamanussaritvā. Khedanaṃ, kīḷanañca khiḍḍāsaddeneva saṅgahetvā
tika-s0105t0:136_3: khiḍḍābhūmi vuttā. Padassa nikkhipanaṃ padanikkhipanaṃ. Yadā tathā padaṃ nikkhipituṃ
tika-s0105t0:136_4: samattho, tadā padavīmaṃsabhūmi nāmāti bhāvo. Vatāvatassa jānanakāle. Bhikkhu ca
tika-s0105t0:136_5: pannakotiādipi tesaṃ bāhirakānaṃ pāḷiyeva. Tattha pannakoti bhikkhāya vicaraṇako,
tika-s0105t0:136_6: tesaṃ vā paṭipattiyā paṭipannako. Jinoti jiṇṇo jarāvasena hīnadhātuko, attano vā
tika-s0105t0:136_7: paṭipattiyā paṭipakkhaṃ jinitvā ṭhito. So kira tathābhūto dhammampi kassaci na kathesi.
tika-s0105t0:136_8: Tenāha “na kiñci āhā”ti. Oṭṭhavadanādivippakāre katepi khamanavasena na kiñci kathetītipi
tika-s0105t0:136_9: vadanti. Alābhinti “so na kumbhimukhā paṭiggaṇhātī”tiādinā nayena mahāsīhanādasutte
tika-s0105t0:137_3: Paramāṇuādi rajo. Pasuggahaṇena eḷakajāti gahitā. Migaggahaṇena rurugavayādi migajāti.
tika-s0105t0:137_4: Gaṇṭhimhīti phaḷumhi, pabbeti attho. Cātumahārājikādibrahmakāyikādivasena, tesañca
tika-s0105t0:137_5: antarabhedavasena bahū devā. Tattha cātumahārājikānaṃ ekaccaantarabhedo mahāsamayasuttena
tika-s0105t0:137_6: dīpetabbo. “So panā”tiādinā ajānanto panesa bahū devepi satta eva vadatīti tassa
tika-s0105t0:137_7: appamāṇataṃ dasseti. Manussāpi anantāti dīpadesakulavaṃsājīvādivibhāgavasena. Pisācā
tika-s0105t0:137_8: eva pesācā, te aparapetādivasena mahantamahantā, bahutarāti attho. Bāhirakasamaye
tika-s0105t0:138_0: Gaṇṭhikāti pabbagaṇṭhikā. Pabbagaṇṭhimhi hi pavuṭasaddo. Mahāpapātāti mahātaṭā. Pārisesanayena
tika-s0105t0:138_2: veditabbaṃ. Saddato panesa ajānanto evaṃ vadatīti na vicāraṇakkhamaṃ. Tathā “cullāsīti
tika-s0105t0:138_3: satasahassānī”ti idampi. So hi “caturāsīti satasahassānī”ti vattumasakkonto evaṃ
tika-s0105t0:138_4: vadati. Saddaracakā pana “caturāsītiyā tulopo, cassa cu, rassa lo, dvittañcā”ti vadanti.
tika-s0105t0:138_5: Ettakā mahāsarāti etappamāṇavatā mahāsarato, sattamahāsaratoti vuttaṃ hoti. Kirāti
tika-s0105t0:138_6: tassa vādānussavane nipāto. Paṇḍitopi…pe… na gacchati, kasmā? Sattānaṃ saṃsaraṇakālassa niyatabhāvato.
tika-s0105t0:139_0: “Acelakavatena vā aññena vā yena kenacī”ti vuttamatidisati “tādisenevā”ti iminā.
tika-s0105t0:139_1: Tapokammenāti tapakaraṇena. Etthāpi “tādisenevā”ti adhikāro. Yo…pe… visujjhati, so
tika-s0105t0:139_2: aparipakkaṃ kammaṃ paripāceti nāmāti yojanā. Antarāti caturāsītimahākappasatasahassānamabbhantare.
tika-s0105t0:139_3: Phussa phussāti patvā patvā. Vuttaparimāṇaṃ kālanti caturāsītimahākappasatasahassapamāṇaṃ
tika-s0105t0:139_4: kālaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – aparipakkaṃ saṃsaraṇanimittaṃ kammaṃ sīlādinā sīghaṃyeva
tika-s0105t0:139_5: visuddhappattiyā paripāceti nāma. Paripakkaṃ kammaṃ phussa phussa kālena paripakkabhāvānāpādanena
tika-s0105t0:139_6: byantiṃ vigamanaṃ karoti nāmāti. Doṇenāti pariminanadoṇatumbena. Rūpakavasenattho
tika-s0105t0:139_7: labbhatīti vuttaṃ “mitaṃ viyā”ti. Na hāpanavaḍḍhanaṃ paṇḍitabālavasenāti dasseti
tika-s0105t0:140_0: Katasuttaguḷeti katasuttavaṭṭiyaṃ. Paletīti pareti yathā “abhisamparāyo”ti, ra-kārassa
tika-s0105t0:140_1: pana la-kāraṃ katvā evaṃ vuttaṃ yathā “palibuddho”ti. So ca curādigaṇavasena gatiyanti
tika-s0105t0:140_2: vuttaṃ “gacchatī”ti. Imāya upamāya cesa sattānaṃ saṃsāro anukkamena khīyateva, na
tika-s0105t0:140_3: vaḍḍhati paricchinnarūpattāti imamatthaṃ vibhāvetīti āha “sutte khīṇe”tiādi. Tatthevāti khīyanaṭṭhāneyeva.
tika-s0105t0:142_0: 171. Dinnanti deyyadhammasīsena dānacetanāyeva vuttā. Taṃmukhena ca phalanti dasseti
tika-s0105t0:142_1: “dinnassa phalābhāva”nti iminā. Dinnañhi mukhyato annādivatthu, taṃ kathamesa paṭikkhipissati.
tika-s0105t0:142_2: Esa nayo yiṭṭhaṃ hutanti etthāpi. Sabbasādhāraṇaṃ mahādānaṃ mahāyāgo. Pāhunabhāvena
tika-s0105t0:142_3: kattabbasakkāro pāhunakasakkāro. Phalanti ānisaṃsaphalaṃ, nissandaphalañca. Vipākoti
tika-s0105t0:142_4: sadisaphalaṃ. Caturaṅgasamannāgate dāne ṭhānantarādipatti viya hi ānisaṃso, saṅkhabrāhmaṇassa
tika-s0105t0:142_5: dāne tāṇalābhamattaṃ viya nissando, paṭisandhisaṅkhātaṃ sadisaphalaṃ vipāko. Ayaṃ
tika-s0105t0:142_6: loko, paralokoti ca kammunā laddhabbo vutto phalābhāvameva sandhāya paṭikkhipanato.
tika-s0105t0:142_7: Paccakkhadiṭṭho hi loko kathaṃ tena paṭikkhitto siyā. “Sabbe tattha tattheva ucchijjantī”ti
tika-s0105t0:142_8: iminā kāraṇamāha, yattha yattha bhavayoniādīsu ṭhitā ime sattā, tattha tattheva ucchijjanti,
tika-s0105t0:142_9: nirudayavināsavasena vinassantīti attho. Tesūti mātāpitūsu. Phalābhāvavaseneva vadati,
tika-s0105t0:142_10: na mātāpitūnaṃ, nāpi tesu idāni kariyamānasakkārāsakkārānamabhāvavasena tesaṃ loke
tika-s0105t0:142_11: paccakkhattā. Pubbuḷassa viya imesaṃ sattānaṃ uppādo nāma kevalo, na cavitvā āgamanapubbako
tika-s0105t0:142_12: atthīti dassanatthaṃ “natthi sattā opapātikā”ti vuttanti āha “cavitvā upapajjanakā
tika-s0105t0:142_13: sattā nāma natthī”ti. Samaṇena nāma yāthāvato jānantena kassaci akathetvā saññatena
tika-s0105t0:142_14: bhavitabbaṃ, aññathā ahopurisikā nāma siyā. Kiñhi paro parassa karissati, tathā ca
tika-s0105t0:142_15: attano sampādanassa kassaci avassayo eva na siyā tattha tattheva ucchijjanatoti imamatthaṃ
tika-s0105t0:142_16: sandhāya “ye imañca…pe… pavedentī”ti āha. Ayaṃ aṭṭhakathāvasesako attho.
tika-s0105t0:143_0: Catūsu mahābhūtesu niyutto cātumahābhūtiko, atthamattato pana dassetuṃ “catumahābhūtamayo”ti
tika-s0105t0:143_1: vuttaṃ. Yathā hi mattikāya nibbattaṃ bhājanaṃ mattikāmayaṃ, evamayampi catūhi mahābhūtehi
tika-s0105t0:143_2: nibbatto catumahābhūtamayoti vuccati. Ajjhattikapathavīdhātūti sattasantānagatā pathavīdhātu.
tika-s0105t0:143_3: Bāhirapathavīdhātunti bahiddhā mahāpathaviṃ, tena pathavīyeva kāyoti dasseti. Anugacchatīti
tika-s0105t0:143_4: anubandhati. Ubhayenāpīti padadvayenapi. Upeti upagacchatīti bāhirapathavikāyato
tika-s0105t0:143_5: tadekadesabhūtā pathavī āgantvā ajjhattikabhāvappatti hutvā sattabhāvena saṇṭhitā,
tika-s0105t0:143_6: sā ca mahāpathavī ghaṭādigatapathavī viya idāni tameva bāhiraṃ pathavikāyaṃ samudāyabhūtaṃ
tika-s0105t0:143_7: puna upeti upagacchati, sabbaso tena bāhirapathavikāyena nibbisesataṃ ekībhāvameva
tika-s0105t0:143_8: gacchatīti attho. Āpādīsupi eseva nayoti ettha pajjunnena mahāsamuddato gahitaāpo
tika-s0105t0:143_9: viya vassodakabhāvena punapi mahāsamuddaṃ, sūriyaraṃsito gahitaindaggisaṅkhātatejo
tika-s0105t0:143_10: viya punapi sūriyaraṃsiṃ, mahāvāyukkhandhato niggatamahāvāto viya punapi mahāvāyukkhandhaṃ
tika-s0105t0:144_0: Manacchaṭṭhāni indriyānīti manameva chaṭṭhaṃ yesaṃ cakkhusotaghānajivhākāyānaṃ, tāni
tika-s0105t0:144_1: indriyāni. Ākāsaṃ pakkhandanti tesaṃ visayabhāvāti vadanti. Visayīgahaṇena hi visayāpi
tika-s0105t0:144_2: gahitā eva honti. Kathaṃ gaṇitā mañcapañcamāti āha “mañco ceva…pe… attho”ti. Āḷāhanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:144_3: susānanti atthato ekaṃ. Guṇāguṇapadānīti guṇadosakoṭṭhāsāni. Sarīrameva vā padāni
tika-s0105t0:144_4: taṃtaṃkiriyāya pajjitabbato. Pārāvatapakkhivaṇṇānīti pārāvatassa nāma pakkhino vaṇṇāni.
tika-s0105t0:144_7: huta”nti vuttappakāraṃ dānaṃ sabbampi gahitanti dasseti “pāhunakasakkārādibhedaṃ
tika-s0105t0:144_8: dinnadāna”nti iminā, virūpekasesaniddeso vā esa. Atthoti adhippāyato attho saddato
tika-s0105t0:144_9: tassa anadhigamitattā. Evamīdisesu. Dabbanti muyhantīti dattū, bālapuggalā, tehi
tika-s0105t0:144_10: dattūhi. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hotīti āha “bālā dentī”tiādi. Pāḷiyaṃ “loko atthī”ti mati yesaṃ
tika-s0105t0:144_11: te atthikā, “atthī”ti cedaṃ nepātikapadaṃ, tesaṃ vādo atthikavādo, taṃ atthikavādaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:145_0: Tatthāti tesu yathāvuttesu tīsu micchāvādīsu. Kammaṃ paṭibāhati akiriyavādibhāvato.
tika-s0105t0:145_1: Vipākaṃ paṭibāhati sabbena sabbaṃ āyatiṃ upapattiyā paṭikkhipanato. Vipākanti ca
tika-s0105t0:145_2: ānisaṃsanissandasadisaphalavasena tividhampi vipākaṃ. Ubhayaṃ paṭibāhati sabbaso
tika-s0105t0:145_3: hetupaṭisedhaneneva phalassāpi paṭisedhitattā. Ubhayanti ca kammaṃ vipākampi. So
tika-s0105t0:145_4: hi “ahetū appaccayā sattā saṃkilissanti, visujjhanti cā”ti vadanto kammassa viya
tika-s0105t0:145_5: vipākassāpi saṃkilesavisuddhīnaṃ paccayattābhāvajotanato tadubhayaṃ paṭibāhati nāma.
tika-s0105t0:145_6: Vipāko paṭibāhito hoti asati kammasmiṃ vipākābhāvato. Kammaṃ paṭibāhitaṃ hoti asati
tika-s0105t0:145_7: vipāke kammassa niratthakatāpattito. Itīti vuttatthanidassanaṃ. Atthatoti sarūpato,
tika-s0105t0:145_8: visuṃ visuṃ taṃtaṃdiṭṭhidīpakabhāvena pāḷiyaṃ āgatāpi tadubhayapaṭibāhakāvāti attho.
tika-s0105t0:145_9: Paccekaṃ tividhadiṭṭhikā eva te ubhayapaṭibāhakattā. “Ubhayappaṭibāhakā”ti hi hetuvacanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:145_10: hetugabbhattā tassa visesanassa. Ahetukavādā cevātiādi paṭiññāvacanaṃ tapphalabhāvena
tika-s0105t0:145_11: nicchitattā. Tasmā vipākapaṭibāhakattā natthikavādā, kammapaṭibāhakattā akiriyavādā,
tika-s0105t0:145_13: Yo hi vipākapaṭibāhanena natthikadiṭṭhiko ucchedavādī, so atthato kammapaṭibāhanena
tika-s0105t0:145_14: akiriyadiṭṭhiko, ubhayapaṭibāhanena ahetukadiṭṭhiko ca hoti. Sesadvayepi eseva nayo.
tika-s0105t0:146_0: “Ye vā panā”tiādinā tesamanudiṭṭhikānaṃ niyāmokkantivinicchayo vutto. Tattha tesanti
tika-s0105t0:146_1: pūraṇādīnaṃ. Sajjhāyantīti taṃ diṭṭhidīpakaṃ ganthaṃ yathā tathā tehi kataṃ uggahetvā
tika-s0105t0:146_2: paṭhanti. Vīmaṃsantīti tassa atthaṃ vicārenti. “Tesa”ntiādi vīmaṃsanākāradassanaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:146_3: “Karoto…pe… ucchijjatī”ti evaṃ vīmaṃsantānaṃ tesanti sambandho. Tasmiṃ ārammaṇeti
tika-s0105t0:146_4: yathāparikappite kammaphalābhāvādike “karoto na karīyati pāpa”ntiādi nayappavattāya
tika-s0105t0:146_5: micchādassanasaṅkhātāya laddhiyā ārammaṇe. Micchāsati santiṭṭhatīti micchāsatisaṅkhātā
tika-s0105t0:146_6: laddhisahagatā taṇhā santiṭṭhati. “Karoto na karīyati pāpa”ntiādivasena hi anussavūpaladdhe
tika-s0105t0:146_7: atthe tadākāraparivitakkanehi saviggahe viya sarūpato cittassa paccupaṭṭhite cirakālaparicayena
tika-s0105t0:146_8: “evameta”nti nijjhānakkhamabhāvūpagamane, nijjhānakkhantiyā ca tathā tathā gahite
tika-s0105t0:146_9: punappunaṃ tatheva āsevantassa bahulīkarontassa micchāvitakkena samānīyamānā micchāvāyāmupatthambhitā
tika-s0105t0:146_10: ataṃsabhāvampi “taṃsabhāva”nti gaṇhantī micchāladdhisahagatā taṇhā musā vitathaṃ
tika-s0105t0:146_11: saraṇato pavattanato micchāsatīti vuccati. Caturaṅguttaraṭīkāyampi cesa attho vuttoyeva.
tika-s0105t0:146_12: Micchāsaṅkappādayo viya hi micchāsati nāma pāṭiyekko koci dhammo natthi, taṇhāsīsena
tika-s0105t0:147_0: Cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hotīti yathāsakaṃ vitakkādipaccayalābhena tasmiṃ ārammaṇe avaṭṭhitatāya
tika-s0105t0:147_1: anekaggataṃ pahāya ekaggaṃ appitaṃ viya hoti, cittasīsena cettha micchāsamādhi eva
tika-s0105t0:147_2: vutto. So hi paccayavisesehi laddhabhāvanābalo īdise ṭhāne samādhānapatirūpakakiccakaroyeva
tika-s0105t0:147_3: hoti vālavijjhanādīsu viyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Javanāni javantīti anekakkhattuṃ tenākārena
tika-s0105t0:147_4: pubbabhāgiyesu javanavāresu pavattesu sanniṭṭhānabhūte sabbapacchime javanavāre satta
tika-s0105t0:147_5: javanāni javanti. “Paṭhamajavane satekicchā honti, tathā dutiyādīsū”ti idaṃ dhammasabhāvadassanameva,
tika-s0105t0:147_6: na pana tasmiṃ khaṇe tesaṃ tikicchā kenaci sakkā kātunti dassanaṃ tesveva ṭhatvā
tika-s0105t0:147_7: sattamajavanassa avassamuppajjamānassa nivattituṃ asakkuṇeyyattā, evaṃ lahuparivatte
tika-s0105t0:147_8: ca cittavāre ovādānusāsana vasena tikicchāya asambhavato. Tenāha “buddhānampi atekicchā
tika-s0105t0:147_10: atekicchā anivattino micchādiṭṭhigatikāyeva jātāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t0:148_0: Tatthāti tesu tīsu micchādassanesu. Koci ekaṃ dassanaṃ okkamatīti yassa ekasmiṃyeva
tika-s0105t0:148_1: abhiniveso, āsevanā ca pavattā, so ekameva dassanaṃ okkamati. Koci dve, koci tīṇipīti
tika-s0105t0:148_2: yassa dvīsu, tīsupi vā abhiniveso, āsevanā ca pavattā, so dve, tīṇipi okkamati, etena
tika-s0105t0:148_3: pana vacanena yā pubbe “iti sabbepete atthato ubhayappaṭibāhakā”tiādinā ubhayappaṭibāhakatāmukhena
tika-s0105t0:148_4: dīpitā atthato siddhā sabbadiṭṭhikatā, sā pubbabhāgiyā. Yā pana micchattaniyāmokkantibhūtā,
tika-s0105t0:148_5: sā yathāsakaṃ paccayasamudāgamasiddhito bhinnārammaṇānaṃ viya visesādhigamānaṃ ekajjhaṃ
tika-s0105t0:148_6: anuppattiyā aññamaññaṃ abbokiṇṇā evāti dasseti. “Ekasmiṃ okkantepī”tiādinā tissannampi
tika-s0105t0:148_7: diṭṭhīnaṃ samānasāmatthiyataṃ, samānaphalatañca vibhāveti. Saggāvaraṇādinā hetā samānasāmatthiyā
tika-s0105t0:148_8: ceva samānaphalā ca, tasmā tissopi cetā ekassa uppannāpi abbokiṇṇā eva, ekāya vipāke
tika-s0105t0:148_9: dinne itarā tassā anubalappadāyikāyoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Patto saggamaggāvaraṇañcevā”tiādiṃ
tika-s0105t0:148_11: ariyamaggassa nivāraṇaṃ. Pagevāti paṭikkhepatthe nipāto, mokkhasaṅkhātaṃ pana nibbānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:148_12: gantuṃ kā nāma kathāti attho. Apica pagevāti pā eva, paṭhamatarameva mokkhaṃ gantumabhabbo,
tika-s0105t0:148_13: mokkhagamanatopi dūrataramevāti vuttaṃ hoti. Evamaññatthāpi yathārahaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:149_0: “Vaṭṭakhāṇu nāmesa satto”ti idaṃ vacanaṃ neyyatthameva, na nītatthaṃ. Tathā hi vuttaṃ
tika-s0105t0:149_1: papañcasūdaniyaṃ nāma majjhimāgamaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “kiṃ panesa ekasmiṃyeva attabhāve
tika-s0105t0:149_2: niyato hoti, udāhu aññasmimpīti? Ekasmiṃyeva niyato, āsevanavasena pana bhavantarepi
tika-s0105t0:149_3: taṃ taṃ diṭṭhiṃ rocetiyevā”ti. Akusalañhi nāmetaṃ abalaṃ dubbalaṃ, na kusalaṃ viya
tika-s0105t0:149_4: sabalaṃ mahābalaṃ, tasmā “ekasmiṃyeva attabhāve niyato”ti tattha vuttaṃ. Aññathā
tika-s0105t0:149_5: sammattaniyāmo viya micchattaniyāmopi accantiko siyā, na ca accantiko. Yadevaṃ vaṭṭakhāṇujotanā
tika-s0105t0:149_6: kathaṃ yujjeyyāti āha “āsevanavasenā”tiādi, tasmā yathā sattaṅguttarapāḷiyaṃ “sakiṃ
tika-s0105t0:149_7: nimuggopi nimuggo eva bālo”ti [a. ni. 7.15 (atthato samānaṃ)] vuttaṃ, evaṃ vaṭṭakhāṇujotanāpi
tika-s0105t0:149_8: vuttā. Yādise hi paccaye paṭicca ayaṃ taṃ taṃ dassanaṃ okkanto, puna kadāci tappaṭipakkhe
tika-s0105t0:149_9: paccaye paṭicca tato sīsukkhipanamassa na hotīti na vattabbaṃ. Tasmā tattha, idha
tika-s0105t0:149_10: ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “evarūpassa hi yebhuyyena bhavato vuṭṭhānaṃ nāma natthī”ti yebhuyyaggahaṇaṃ
tika-s0105t0:149_11: kataṃ, iti āsevanavasena bhavantarepi taṃtaṃdiṭṭhiyā rocanato yebhuyyenassa bhavato
tika-s0105t0:149_12: vuṭṭhānaṃ natthīti katvā vaṭṭakhāṇuko nāmesa jāto, na pana micchattaniyāmassa accantikatāyāti
tika-s0105t0:149_13: nīharitvā ñātabbatthatāya neyyatthamidaṃ, na nītatthanti veditabbaṃ. Yaṃ sandhāya
tika-s0105t0:149_14: abhidhammepi “arahā, ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti, te rūpakkhandhañca
tika-s0105t0:149_15: na parijānanti, vedanākkhandhañca na parijānissantī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Pathavigopakoti
tika-s0105t0:150_1: Tattha tasmāti yasmā evaṃ saṃsārakhāṇubhāvassāpi paccayo apaṇṇakajāto, tasmā parivajjeyyāti
tika-s0105t0:150_2: sambandho. Akalyāṇajananti kalyāṇadhammavirahitajanaṃ asādhujanaṃ. Āsīvisanti āsumāgatahalāhalaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:150_3: Bhūtikāmoti diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthānaṃ vasena attano guṇehi vuḍḍhikāmo.
tika-s0105t0:150_4: Vicakkhaṇoti paññācakkhunā vividhatthassa passako, dhīroti attho.
tika-s0105t0:152_0: 174. “Akaṭā”ti ettha ta-kārassa ṭa-kārādesoti āha “akatā”ti, samena, visamena vā
tika-s0105t0:152_1: kenacipi hetunā akatā, na vihitāti attho. Tathā akaṭavidhāti etthāpi. Natthi katavidho
tika-s0105t0:152_2: karaṇavidhi etesanti akaṭavidhā. Padadvayenāpi loke kenaci hetupaccayena nesaṃ anibbattabhāvaṃ
tika-s0105t0:152_3: dasseti. Tenāha “evaṃ karohī”tiādi. Iddhiyāpi na nimmitāti kassaci iddhimato cetovasippattassa
tika-s0105t0:152_4: puggalassa, devassa, issarādino ca iddhiyāpi na nimmitā. Animmāpitāti kassaci animmāpitā.
tika-s0105t0:152_5: Kāmaṃ saddato yuttaṃ, atthato ca purimena samānaṃ, tathāpi pāḷiyamaṭṭhakathāyañca
tika-s0105t0:152_6: anāgatameva agahetabbabhāve kāraṇanti dasseti “taṃ neva pāḷiya”ntiādinā.
tika-s0105t0:153_0: Brahmajālasuttasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttatthameva. Idamettha yojanāmattaṃ – vañjhāti hi
tika-s0105t0:153_1: vañjhapasuvañjhatālādayo viya aphalā kassaci ajanakā, tena pathavikāyādīnaṃ rūpādijanakabhāvaṃ
tika-s0105t0:153_2: paṭikkhipati. Rūpasaddādayo hi pathavikāyādīhi appaṭibaddhavuttikāti tassa laddhi.
tika-s0105t0:153_3: Pabbatassa kūṭamiva ṭhitāti kūṭaṭṭhā, yathā pabbatakūṭaṃ kenaci anibbattitaṃ kassaci
tika-s0105t0:153_4: ca anibbattakaṃ, evametepi sattakāyāti adhippāyo. Yamidaṃ “bījato aṅkurādi jāyatī”ti
tika-s0105t0:153_5: vuccati, taṃ vijjamānameva tato nikkhamati, na avijjamānaṃ, itarathā aññatopi aññassa
tika-s0105t0:153_6: upaladdhi siyā, evametepi sattakāyā, tasmā esikaṭṭhāyiṭṭhitāti. Ṭhitattāti nibbikārabhāvena
tika-s0105t0:153_7: suppatiṭṭhitattā. Na calantīti na vikāramāpajjanti. Vikārābhāvato hi tesaṃ sattannaṃ
tika-s0105t0:153_8: kāyānaṃ esikaṭṭhāyiṭṭhitatā, aniñjanañca attano pakatiyā avaṭṭhānameva. Tenāha “na
tika-s0105t0:153_9: vipariṇamantī”ti. Pakatinti sabhāvaṃ. Avipariṇāmadhammattā eva na aññamaññaṃ upahananti.
tika-s0105t0:153_10: Sati hi vikāramāpādetabbabhāve upaghātakatā siyā, tathā anuggahetabbabhāve sati anuggāhakatāpīti
tika-s0105t0:153_11: tadabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ pāḷiyaṃ “nāla”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Pathavīyeva kāyekadesattā pathavikāyo
tika-s0105t0:153_12: yathā “samuddo diṭṭho”ti, pathavisamūho vā kāyasaddassa samūhavācakattā yathā “hatthikāyo”ti.
tika-s0105t0:153_13: Jīvasattamānaṃ kāyānaṃ niccatāya nibbikārabhāvato na hantabbatā, na ghātetabbatā
tika-s0105t0:153_14: ca, tasmā neva koci hantā, ghātetā vā atthīti dassetuṃ pāḷiyaṃ “sattannaṃ tveva kāyāna”ntiādi
tika-s0105t0:153_15: vuttaṃ. Yadi koci hantā natthi, kathaṃ tesaṃ satthappahāroti tattha codanāyāha “yathā”tiādi.
tika-s0105t0:153_16: Tattha sattannaṃ tvevāti sattannameva. Itisaddo hettha nipātamattaṃ. Pahatanti paharitaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:153_17: Ekatodhārādikaṃ satthaṃ. Antareneva pavisati, na tesu. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – kevalaṃ
tika-s0105t0:153_18: “ahaṃ imaṃ jīvitā voropemī”ti tesaṃ tathā saññāmattameva, hananaghātanādi pana paramatthato
tika-s0105t0:155_0: 177. Cattāro yāmā bhāgā catuyāmaṃ, catuyāmaṃ eva cātuyāmaṃ. Bhāgattho hi idha yāma-saddo
tika-s0105t0:155_1: yathā “rattiyā paṭhamo yāmo”ti. So panettha bhāgo saṃvaralakkhitoti āha “catukoṭṭhāsena
tika-s0105t0:155_2: saṃvarena saṃvuto”ti, saṃyamattho vā yāmasaddo yamanaṃ saññamanaṃ yāmoti katvā. “Yatatto”tiādīsu
tika-s0105t0:155_3: viya hi anupasaggopi saupasaggo viya saññamatthavācako, so pana catūhi ākārehīti
tika-s0105t0:155_4: āha “catukoṭṭhāsena saṃvarenā”ti. Ākāro koṭṭhāsoti hi atthato ekaṃ. Vārito sabbavāri
tika-s0105t0:155_6: cettha vāriparibhogo vutto yathā “rattūparato”ti. Paṭikkhitto sabbasītodako tapparibhogo
tika-s0105t0:155_7: yassāti tathā. Tanti sītodakaṃ. Sabbavāriyuttoti saṃvaralakkhaṇamattaṃ kathitaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:155_9: dassento “sabbenā”tiādimāha, sabbena pāpavāraṇena yuttoti hi sabbappakārena saṃvaralakkhaṇena
tika-s0105t0:155_10: pāpavāraṇena samannāgato. Dhutapāpoti sabbena nijjaralakkhaṇena pāpavāraṇena vidhutapāpo.
tika-s0105t0:155_11: Phuṭṭhoti aṭṭhannampi kammānaṃ khepanena mokkhappattiyā kammakkhayalakkhaṇena sabbena
tika-s0105t0:155_12: pāpavāraṇena phuṭṭho, taṃ patvā ṭhitoti attho. “Dveyeva gatiyo bhavanti, anaññā”tiādīsu
tika-s0105t0:155_13: viya gamusaddo niṭṭhānatthoti vuttaṃ “koṭippattacitto”ti, mokkhādhigamena uttamamariyādappattacittoti
tika-s0105t0:155_14: attho. Kāyādīsu indriyesu saṃyametabbassa abhāvato saṃyatacitto. Atīte hettha ta-saddo.
tika-s0105t0:155_15: Saṃyametabbassa avasesassa abhāvato suppatiṭṭhitacitto. Kiñci sāsanānulomanti pāpavāraṇaṃ
tika-s0105t0:155_16: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Asuddhaladdhitāyāti “atthi jīvo, so ca siyā nicco, siyā anicco”ti.
tika-s0105t0:157: 179-181. Amarāvikkhepe vuttanayo evāti brahmajāle amarāvikkhepavādavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayo eva. Kasmā? Vikkhepabyākaraṇabhāvato, tatheva ca tattha vikkhepavādassa āgatattā.
tika-s0105t0:159_0: 182. Pīḷetvāti telayantena uppīḷetvā, iminā rañño ābhogamāha. Vadato hi ābhogavasena
tika-s0105t0:159_1: sabbattha atthanicchayo. Aṭṭhakathācariyā ca tadābhogaññū, paramparābhatatthassāvirodhino
tika-s0105t0:159_2: ca, tasmā sabbattha yathā tathā vacanokāsaladdhabhāvamattena attho na vutto, atha
tika-s0105t0:159_3: kho tesaṃ vattumicchitavasenāti gahetabbaṃ, evañca katvā tattha tattha atthuddhārādivasena
tika-s0105t0:160_0: 183. Yathā te rucceyyāti idāni mayā pucchiyamāno attho yathā tava citte rucceyya,
tika-s0105t0:160_1: tayā citte ruccethāti attho. Kammatthe hetaṃ kiriyāpadaṃ. Mayā vā dāni pucchiyamānamatthaṃ
tika-s0105t0:160_2: tava sampadānabhūtassa roceyyātipi vaṭṭati. Gharadāsiyā kucchismiṃ jāto antojāto.
tika-s0105t0:160_3: Dhanena kīto dhanakkīto. Bandhaggāhagahito karamarānīto. Sāmameva yena kenaci hetunā
tika-s0105t0:160_4: dāsabhāvamupagato sāmaṃdāsabyopagato. Sāmanti hi sayameva. Dāsabyanti dāsabhāvaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:160_5: Koci dāsopi samāno alaso kammaṃ akaronto “kammakāro”ti na vuccati, so pana na tathābhūtoti
tika-s0105t0:160_6: visesanametanti āha “analaso”tiādi. Dūratoti dūradesato āgataṃ. Paṭhamamevāti attano
tika-s0105t0:160_7: āsannataraṭṭhānupasaṅkamanato pageva puretarameva. Uṭṭhahatīti gāravavasena uṭṭhahitvā
tika-s0105t0:160_8: tiṭṭhati, paccuṭṭhātīti vā attho. Pacchāti sāmikassa nipajjāya pacchā. Sayanato avuṭṭhiteti
tika-s0105t0:160_9: rattiyā vibhāyanavelāya seyyato avuṭṭhite. Paccūsakālatoti atītarattiyā paccūsakālato.
tika-s0105t0:160_10: Yāva sāmino rattiṃ niddokkamananti aparāya bhāviniyā rattiyā padosavelāyaṃ yāva niddokkamanaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:160_11: Yā atītarattiyā paccūsavelā, bhāviniyā ca padosavelā, etthantare sabbakiccaṃ katvā
tika-s0105t0:160_12: pacchā nipatatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Kiṃ kāramevāti kiṃ karaṇīyameva kinti pucchāya kātabbato,
tika-s0105t0:160_13: pucchitvā kātabbaveyyāvaccanti attho. Paṭissaveneva samīpacāritā vuttāti āha “paṭisuṇanto
tika-s0105t0:160_14: vicaratī”ti. Paṭikuddhaṃ mukhaṃ oloketuṃ na visahatītipi dasseti “tuṭṭhapahaṭṭha”nti iminā.
tika-s0105t0:161_0: Devo viyāti ādhipaccaparivārādisamannāgato padhānadevo viya, tena maññe-saddo idha
tika-s0105t0:161_1: upamatthoti ñāpeti yathā “akkhāhataṃ maññe aṭṭhāsi rañño mahāsudassanassa antepuraṃ
tika-s0105t0:161_2: upasobhayamāna”nti. So vatassāhanti ettha so vata assaṃ ahanti padacchedo, so rājā
tika-s0105t0:161_3: viya ahampi bhaveyyaṃ. Kenāti ce? Yadi puññāni kareyyaṃ, tenāti atthoti āha “so vata
tika-s0105t0:161_4: aha”ntiādi. Vatasaddo upamāyaṃ. Tenāha “evarūpo”ti. Puññānīti uḷārataraṃ puññaṃ sandhāya
tika-s0105t0:161_5: vuttaṃ aññadā katapuññato uḷārāya pabbajjāya adhippetattā. “So vatassāya”ntipi pāṭhe
tika-s0105t0:161_6: so rājā viya ayaṃ ahampi assaṃ. Kathaṃ? “Yadi puññāni kareyya”nti atthasambhavato
tika-s0105t0:161_7: “ayamevattho”ti vuttaṃ. Assanti hi uttamapurisayoge ahaṃ-saddo appayuttopi ayaṃ-saddena
tika-s0105t0:161_8: parāmasanato payutto viya hoti. So ahaṃ evarūpo assaṃ vata, yadi puññāni kareyyanti
tika-s0105t0:161_9: paṭhamapāṭhassa atthamicchanti keci. Evaṃ sati dutiyapāṭhe “ayamevattho”ti avattabbo
tika-s0105t0:161_10: siyā tattha ayaṃ-saddena ahaṃ-saddassa parāmasanato, “so”ti ca parāmasitabbassa aññassa
tika-s0105t0:161_11: sambhavato. Yanti dānaṃ. Satabhāgampīti satabhūtaṃ bhāgampi, raññā dinnadānaṃ satadhā
tika-s0105t0:161_12: katvā tattha ekabhāgampīti vuttaṃ hoti. Yāvajīvaṃ na sakkhissāmi dātunti yāvajīvaṃ
tika-s0105t0:161_13: dānatthāya ussāhaṃ karontopi satabhāgamattampi dātuṃ na sakkhissāmi, tasmā pabbajissāmīti
tika-s0105t0:161_14: pabbajjāyaṃ ussāhaṃ katvāti attho. “Yaṃnūnā”ti nipāto parivitakkanattheti vuttaṃ
tika-s0105t0:162_0: Kāyena pihitoti kāyena saṃvaritabbassa kāyadvārena pavattanakassa pāpadhammassa saṃvaraṇavasena
tika-s0105t0:162_1: pidahito. Ussukkavacanavasena panattho vihareyya-padena sambajjhitabbattāti āha “akusalapavesanadvāraṃ
tika-s0105t0:162_2: thaketvā”ti. Hutvāti hi seso. Akusalapavesanadvāranti ca kāyakammabhūtānamakusalānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:162_3: pavesanabhūtaṃ kāyaviññattisaṅkhātaṃ dvāraṃ. Sesapadadvayepīti “vācāya saṃvuto, manasā
tika-s0105t0:162_4: saṃvuto”ti padadvayepi. Ghāsacchādanena paramatāyāti ghāsacchādanapariyesane sallekhavasena
tika-s0105t0:162_5: paramatāya, ukkaṭṭhabhāve vā saṇṭhito ghāsacchādanamattameva paramaṃ pamāṇaṃ koṭi
tika-s0105t0:162_6: etassa, na tato paraṃ kiñci āmisajātaṃ pariyesati, paccāsisati cāti ghāsacchādanaparamo,
tika-s0105t0:162_7: tassa bhāvo ghāsacchādanaparamatātipi aṭṭhakathāmuttako nayo. Ghasitabbo asitabboti
tika-s0105t0:162_8: ghāso, āhāro, ābhuso chādeti paridahati etenāti acchādanaṃ, nivāsanaṃ, apica ghasanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:162_9: ghāso, ābhuso chādīyate acchādanantipi yujjati. Etadatthampīti ghāsacchādanatthāyāpi.
tika-s0105t0:163_0: Vivekaṭṭhakāyānanti gaṇasaṅgaṇikato pavivitte ṭhitakāyānaṃ, sambandhībhūtānaṃ kāyavivekoti
tika-s0105t0:163_1: sambandho. Nekkhammābhiratānanti jhānābhiratānaṃ. Paramavodānappattānanti tāya eva
tika-s0105t0:163_2: jhānābhiratiyā paramaṃ uttamaṃ vodānaṃ cittavisuddhiṃ pattānaṃ. Nirupadhīnanti kilesūpadhiabhisaṅkhārūpadhīhi
tika-s0105t0:163_3: accantavigatānaṃ. Visaṅkhāraṃ vuccati nibbānaṃ, tadadhigamanetā visaṅkhāragatā, arahanto,
tika-s0105t0:163_4: tesaṃ. “Evaṃ vutte”ti iminā mahāniddese āgatabhāvaṃ dasseti. Ettha ca paṭhamo viveko
tika-s0105t0:163_5: itarehi dvīhi vivekehi sahāpi vattabbo itaresu siddhesu tassāpi sijjhanato, vinā
tika-s0105t0:163_6: ca tasmiṃ siddhepi itare samasijjhanato. Tathā dutiyopi. Tatiyo pana itarehi saheva
tika-s0105t0:163_7: vattabbo. Na vinā itaresu siddhesuyeva tassa sijjhanatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Gaṇasaṅgaṇikaṃ
tika-s0105t0:163_8: pahāyā”tiādi tadadhippāyavibhāvanaṃ. Tattha gaṇe janasamāgame sannipatanaṃ gaṇasaṅgaṇikā,
tika-s0105t0:163_9: taṃ pahāya. Kāyena eko viharati vicarati puggalavasena asahāyattā. Citte kilesānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:163_10: sannipatanaṃ cittakilesasaṅgaṇikā, taṃ pahāya. Eko viharati kilesavasena asahāyattā.
tika-s0105t0:163_11: Maggassa ekacittakkhaṇikattā, gotrabhuādīnañca ārammaṇakaraṇamattattā na tesaṃ vasena
tika-s0105t0:163_13: āha “phalasamāpattiṃ vā nirodhasamāpattiṃ vā”ti. Phalapariyosāno hi nirodho. Pavisitvāti
tika-s0105t0:163_14: samāpajjanavasena antokatvā. Nibbānaṃ patvāti ettha ussukkavacanametaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇena,
tika-s0105t0:163_15: cittacetasikānaṃ nirodhena ca nibbutipajjanassa adhippetattā. Codanattheti jānāpetuṃ ussāhakaraṇatthe.
tika-s0105t0:164_0: 184. Abhiharitvāti abhimukhabhāvena netvā. Nanti tathā pabbajjāya viharantaṃ. Abhihāroti
tika-s0105t0:164_1: nimantanavasena abhiharaṇaṃ. “Cīvarādīhi payojanaṃ sādhessāmī”ti vacanasesena yojanā.
tika-s0105t0:164_2: Tathā “yenattho, taṃ vadeyyāthā”ti. Cīvarādivekallanti cīvarādīnaṃ lūkhatāya vikalabhāvaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:164_3: Tadubhayampīti tadeva abhihāradvayampi. Sappāyanti sabbagelaññāpaharaṇavasena upakārāvahaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:164_4: Bhāvino anatthassa ajananavasena paripālanaṃ rakkhāgutti. Paccuppannassa pana anatthassa
tika-s0105t0:164_5: nisedhavasena paripālanaṃ āvaraṇagutti. Kimatthiyaṃ “dhammika’nti visesananti āha
tika-s0105t0:165_0: 185. Kevalo yadi-evaṃ-saddo pubbe vuttatthāpekkhakoti vuttaṃ “yadi tava dāso”tiādi.
tika-s0105t0:165_1: Evaṃ santeti evaṃ labbhamāne sati. Dutiyaṃ upādāya paṭhamabhāvo, tasmā “paṭhama”nti
tika-s0105t0:165_2: bhaṇanto aññassāpi atthitaṃ dīpeti. Tadeva ca kāraṇaṃ katvā rājāpi evamāhāti dassetuṃ
tika-s0105t0:165_3: “paṭhamanti bhaṇanto”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tenevāti paṭhamasaddena aññassāpi atthitādīpaneneva.
tika-s0105t0:167_0: 186. Kasatīti vilekhati kasiṃ karoti. Gahapatikoti ettha ka-saddo appatthoti vuttaṃ
tika-s0105t0:167_1: “ekagehamatte jeṭṭhako”ti. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – gahassa pati gahapati, khuddako gahapati
tika-s0105t0:167_2: gahapatiko ekasmiññeva gehamatte jeṭṭhakattāti, khuddakabhāvo panassa gehavasenevāti
tika-s0105t0:167_3: katvā “ekagehamatte”ti vuttaṃ. Tena hi anekakulajeṭṭhakabhāvaṃ paṭikkhipati, gahaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:167_4: gehanti ca atthato samānameva. Karasaddo balimhīti vuttaṃ “balisaṅkhāta”nti. Karotīti
tika-s0105t0:167_5: abhinipphādeti sampādeti. Vaḍḍhetīti uparūpari uppādanena mahantaṃ sannicayaṃ karoti.
tika-s0105t0:168_0: Kasmā tadubhayampi vuttanti āha “yathā hī”tiādi. Appampi pahāya pabbajituṃ dukkaranti
tika-s0105t0:168_1: dassanañca pageva mahantanti viññāpanatthaṃ. Esā hi kathikānaṃ pakati, yadidaṃ yena
tika-s0105t0:168_2: kenaci pakārena atthantaraviññāpananti. Appampi pahāya pabbajituṃ dukkarabhāvo pana
tika-s0105t0:168_3: majjhimanikāye majjhimapaṇṇāsake laṭukikopamasuttena dīpetabbo. Vuttañhi tattha “seyyathāpi
tika-s0105t0:168_4: udāyi puriso daliddo assako anāḷhiyo, tassa’ssa ekaṃ agārakaṃ oluggaviluggaṃ kākātidāyiṃ
tika-s0105t0:168_5: naparamarūpaṃ, ekā khaṭopikā oluggaviluggā naparamarūpā”ti vitthāro. Yadi appampi
tika-s0105t0:168_6: bhogaṃ pahāya pabbajituṃ dukkaraṃ, kasmā dāsavārepi bhogaggahaṇaṃ na katanti āha
tika-s0105t0:168_7: “dāsavāre panā”tiādi. Attanopi anissaroti attānampi sayamanissaro. Yathā ca dāsassa
tika-s0105t0:168_8: bhogāpi abhogāyeva parāyattabhāvato, evaṃ ñātayopīti dāsavāre ñātiparivaṭṭaggahaṇampi
tika-s0105t0:168_9: na katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Parivaṭṭati paramparabhāvena samantato āvaṭṭatīti parivaṭṭo,
tika-s0105t0:170_0: 189. Tanti yathā dāsavāre “evamevā”ti vuttaṃ, na tathā idha kassakavāre, tadavacanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:170_1: kasmāti anuyuñjeyya ceti attho. Evamevāti vuccamāneti yathā paṭhamadutiyāni sāmaññaphalāni
tika-s0105t0:170_2: paññattāni, tathāyeva paññapetuṃ sakkā nu khoti vutte. Evarūpāhīti yathāvuttadāsakassakūpamāsadisāhi
tika-s0105t0:170_3: upamāhi. Sāmaññaphalaṃ dīpetuṃ pahoti anantapaṭibhānatāya vicittanayadesanabhāvato.
tika-s0105t0:170_4: Tatthāti evaṃ dīpane. Pariyantaṃ nāma natthi anantanayadesanabhāvato, savane vā asantosanena
tika-s0105t0:170_5: bhiyyo bhiyyo sotukāmatājananato sotukāmatāya pariyantaṃ nāma natthīti attho. Tathāpīti
tika-s0105t0:170_7: evaṃ apariyantabhāvetipi yujjati. Anumānañāṇena cintetvā. Upari visesanti taṃ ṭhapetvā
tika-s0105t0:170_8: tadupari visesameva sāmaññaphalaṃ pucchanto. Kasmāti āha “savane”tiādi. Etena imamatthaṃ
tika-s0105t0:170_9: dīpeti – anekatthā samānāpi saddā vatticchānupubbikāyeva taṃtadatthadīpakāti.
tika-s0105t0:171_0: Sādhukaṃ sādhūti ekatthametaṃ sādhusaddasseva ka-kārena vaḍḍhetvā vuttattā. Teneva
tika-s0105t0:171_1: hi sādhukasaddassatthaṃ vadantena sādhusaddo atthuddhāravasena udāhaṭo. Tena ca nanu
tika-s0105t0:171_2: sādhukasaddasseva atthuddhāro vattabbo, na sādhusaddassāti codanā nisedhitā. Āyācaneti
tika-s0105t0:171_3: abhimukhaṃ yācane, abhipatthanāyanti attho. Sampaṭicchaneti paṭiggahaṇe. Sampahaṃsaneti
tika-s0105t0:172_0: Sādhu dhammarucīti gāthā ummādantījātake. Tatthāyamaṭṭhakathāvinicchayapaveṇī – sucaritadhamme
tika-s0105t0:172_1: rocetīti dhammaruci, dhammaratoti attho. Tādiso hi jīvitaṃ jahantopi akattabbaṃ na
tika-s0105t0:172_2: karoti. Paññāṇavāti paññavā ñāṇasampanno. Mittānamaddubbhoti mittānaṃ adussanabhāvo.
tika-s0105t0:172_3: “Adūsako anupaghātako”ti ācariyena vuttaṃ. “Adrubbho”tipi pāṭho da-kārassa dra-kāraṃ katvā.
tika-s0105t0:173_0: Daḷhīkammeti sātaccakiriyāyaṃ. Āṇattiyanti āṇāpane. Idhāpīti sāmaññaphalepi. Assāti
tika-s0105t0:173_1: sādhukasaddassa. “Suṇohi sādhukaṃ manasi karohī”ti hi sādhukasaddena savanamanasikārānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:173_2: sātaccakiriyāpi tadāṇāpanampi jotitaṃ hoti. Āyācaneneva ca uyyojanasāmaññato āṇatti
tika-s0105t0:173_3: saṅgahitāti na sā visuṃ atthuddhāre vuttā. Āṇārahassa hi āṇatti, tadanarahassa āyācananti
tika-s0105t0:173_4: viseso. Sundarepīti sundaratthepi. Idāni yathāvuttena sādhukasaddassa atthattayena
tika-s0105t0:173_5: pakāsitaṃ visesaṃ dassetuṃ, tassa vā atthattayassa idha yogyataṃ vibhāvetuṃ “daḷhīkammatthena
tika-s0105t0:173_6: hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Suggahitaṃ gaṇhantoti suggahitaṃ katvā gaṇhanto. Sundaranti bhāvanapuṃsakaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:173_7: Bhaddakanti pasatthaṃ, “dhamma”nti iminā sambandho. Sundaraṃ bhaddakanti vā savanānuggahaṇe pariyāyavacanaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:174_0: Manasi karohīti ettha na ārammaṇapaṭipādanalakkhaṇo manasikāro, atha kho vīthipaṭipādanajavanapaṭipādanamanasikārapubbake
tika-s0105t0:174_1: citte ṭhapanalakkhaṇoti dassento “āvajja, samannāharā”ti āha. Avikkhittacittoti yathāvuttamanasikāradvayapubbakāya
tika-s0105t0:174_2: cittapaṭipāṭiyā ekārammaṇe ṭhapanavasena anuddhatacitto hutvā. Nisāmehīti suṇāhi,
tika-s0105t0:174_3: anaggharatanamiva vā suvaṇṇamañjusāya dullabhadhammaratanaṃ citte paṭisāmehītipi
tika-s0105t0:174_4: attho. Tena vuttaṃ “citte karohī”ti. Evaṃ padadvayassa paccekaṃ yojanāvasena atthaṃ
tika-s0105t0:174_5: dassetvā idāni paṭiyogīvasena dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha sotindriyavikkhepavāraṇaṃ
tika-s0105t0:174_6: savane niyojanavasena kiriyantarapaṭisedhanato, tena sotaṃ odahāti atthaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0105t0:174_8: Byañjanavipallāsaggāhavāraṇaṃ “sādhuka”nti visesetvā vuttattā. Atthavipallāsaggāhavāraṇepi esa nayo.
tika-s0105t0:175_0: Dhāraṇūpaparikkhādīsūti ettha ādi-saddena tulanatīraṇādike, diṭṭhiyā suppaṭivedhe
tika-s0105t0:175_1: ca saṅgaṇhāti. Yathādhippetamatthaṃ byañjeti pakāseti, sayametenāti vā byañjanaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:175_2: sabhāvanirutti, saha byañjanenāti sabyañjano, byañjanasampannoti attho. Sahappavatti
tika-s0105t0:175_3: hi “sampannatā samavāyatā vijjamānatā”tiādinā anekavidhā, idha pana sampannatāyeva
tika-s0105t0:175_4: tadaññassa asambhavato, tasmā “saha byañjanenā”ti nibbacanaṃ katvāpi “byañjanasampanno”ti
tika-s0105t0:175_5: attho ācariyena vuttoti daṭṭhabbaṃ, yathā taṃ “na kusalā akusalā, kusalapaṭipakkhā”ti
tika-s0105t0:175_6: araṇīyato upagantabbato anudhātabbato attho, catupārisuddhisīlādi, saha atthenāti
tika-s0105t0:175_7: sāttho, vuttanayena atthasampannoti attho. Sādhukapadaṃ ekameva samānaṃ āvuttinayādivasena
tika-s0105t0:175_8: ubhayattha yojetabbaṃ. Kathanti āha “yasmā”tiādi. Dhammo nāma tanti. Desanā nāma
tika-s0105t0:175_9: tassā manasā vavatthāpitāya tantiyā desanā. Attho nāma tantiyā attho. Paṭivedho nāma
tika-s0105t0:175_10: tantiyā, tantiatthassa ca yathābhūtāvabodho. Yasmā cete dhammadesanātthapaṭivedhā
tika-s0105t0:175_11: sasādīhi viya mahāsamuddo mandabuddhīhi dukkhogāhā, alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭhā ca, tasmā
tika-s0105t0:175_12: gambhīrā. Tena vuttaṃ “yasmā…pe… manasi karohī”ti. Ettha ca paṭivedhassa dukkarabhāvato
tika-s0105t0:175_13: dhammatthānaṃ dukkhogāhatā, desanāñāṇassa dukkarabhāvato desanāya, uppādetumasakkuṇeyyatāya,
tika-s0105t0:175_14: tabbisayañāṇuppattiyā ca dukkarabhāvato paṭivedhassa dukkhogāhatā veditabbā. Yamettha
tika-s0105t0:176_0: “Suṇāhi sādhuka”nti “sādhukaṃ manasi karohī”ti vadanto na kevalaṃ atthakkamato eva
tika-s0105t0:176_1: ayaṃ yojanā, atha kho saddakkamatopi ubhayattha sambandhattāti dasseti. “Sakkā mahārājā”ti
tika-s0105t0:176_2: idhāpi “aññampi diṭṭheva dhamme sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ…pe… paṇītatarañcā”ti idamanuvattatīti
tika-s0105t0:176_3: āha “evaṃ paṭiññātaṃ sāmaññaphaladesana”nti. Vitthārato bhāsananti atthameva daḷhaṃ
tika-s0105t0:176_4: karoti “desessāmīti saṃkhittadīpana”ntiādinā. Hi-saddo cettha luttaniddiṭṭho. Idaṃ
tika-s0105t0:176_5: vuttaṃ hoti – desanaṃ nāma uddisanaṃ. Bhāsanaṃ nāma niddisanaṃ paribyattakathanaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:176_6: Tenāyamattho sambhavatīti yathāvuttamatthaṃ sagāthāvaggasaṃyutte vaṅgīsasutte gāthāpadena
tika-s0105t0:177_0: Sāḷikāyiva nigghosoti sāḷikāya nigghoso viya, yathā sāḷikāya ālāpo madhuro kaṇṇasukho
tika-s0105t0:177_1: pemanīyo, evanti attho. Paṭibhānanti cetassa visesanaṃ liṅgabhedassapi visesanassa
tika-s0105t0:177_2: dissanato yathā “guṇo pamāṇa”nti. Paṭibhānanti ca saddo vuccati paṭibhāti taṃtadākārena
tika-s0105t0:177_3: dissatīti katvā. Udīrayīti uccārayi, vuccati vā, kammagabbhañcetaṃ kiriyāpadaṃ. Iminā
tika-s0105t0:177_4: cetaṃ dīpeti – āyasmantaṃ dhammasenāpatiṃ thometukāmena desanābhāsanānaṃ visesaṃ
tika-s0105t0:178_0: Evaṃ vutteti “bhāsissāmī”ti vutte. “Na kira bhagavā saṅkhepeneva desessati, atha
tika-s0105t0:178_1: kho vitthārenapi bhāsissatī”ti hi taṃ padaṃ sutvāva ussāhajāto sañjātussāho, haṭṭhatuṭṭhoti
tika-s0105t0:178_2: attho. Ayamācariyassa adhippāyo. Apica “tena hi mahārāja suṇohi sādhukaṃ manasi karohi,
tika-s0105t0:178_3: bhāsissāmī”ti vuttaṃ sabbampi uyyojanapaṭiññākaraṇappakāraṃ ussāhajananakāraṇaṃ sabbeneva
tika-s0105t0:178_4: ussāhasambhavato, tasmā evaṃ vutteti “suṇohi, sādhukaṃ manasi karohi, bhāsissāmī”ti
tika-s0105t0:178_5: vutte sabbeheva tīhipi padehi ussāhajātoti attho daṭṭhabbo. Paccassosīti pati assosi
tika-s0105t0:178_6: bhagavato vacanasamanantarameva pacchā assosi, “sakkā pana bhante”tiādinā vā pucchitvā
tika-s0105t0:178_7: puna “evaṃ bhante”ti assosīti attho. Taṃ pana patissavanaṃ atthato sampaṭicchanamevāti
tika-s0105t0:178_8: āha “sampaṭicchi, paṭiggahesī”ti. Teneva hi “iti attho”ti avatvā “iti vuttaṃ hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:179_1: padaṃ vibhajitvā atthaṃ dassento “idānī”tiādimāha. “Idhā”ti iminā vuccamānaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ
tika-s0105t0:179_3: iminā. Desassa upadisanaṃ desopadeso, tasmiṃ. Yadi sabbattha desopadese, athāyamattho
tika-s0105t0:179_4: na vattabbo avuttepi labbhamānattāti codanāyāha “svāya”ntiādi. Sāmaññabhūtaṃ idhasaddaṃ
tika-s0105t0:179_5: gaṇhitvā “svāya”nti vuttaṃ, na tu yathāvisesitabbaṃ. Tathā hi vakkhati “katthaci
tika-s0105t0:179_6: padapūraṇamattamevā”ti. Lokaṃ upādāya vuccati lokasaddena samānādhikaraṇabhāvato.
tika-s0105t0:179_7: Idha loketi ca jātikkhettaṃ, tatthāpi ayaṃ cakkavāḷo adhippeto. Sāsanamupādāya vuccati
tika-s0105t0:179_8: “samaṇo”ti saddantarasannidhānato. Ayañhi catukaṅguttarapāḷi. Tattha paṭhamo samaṇoti
tika-s0105t0:179_9: sotāpanno. Dutiyo samaṇoti sakadāgāmī. Vuttañhetaṃ tattheva –
tika-s0105t0:180_0: “Katamo ca bhikkhave paṭhamo samaṇo? Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā
tika-s0105t0:180_1: sotāpanno hotī”ti, “katamo ca bhikkhave dutiyo samaṇo? Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu tiṇṇaṃ
tika-s0105t0:180_2: saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā rāgadosamohānaṃ tanuttā sakadāgāmī hotī”ti ca ādi.
tika-s0105t0:182_0: Idheva tiṭṭhamānassāti imissaṃyeva indasālaguhāyaṃ patiṭṭhamānassa, devabhūtassa
tika-s0105t0:182_1: me satoti devabhāvena, devo hutvā vā bhūtassa samānassa. Meti anādarayoge sāmivacanaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:182_2: Puna meti kattutthe. Idañhi sakkapañhato udāhaṭaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:183_0: Padapūraṇamattameva okāsāpadisanassāpi asambhavena atthantarassa abodhanato. Pubbe
tika-s0105t0:183_1: vuttaṃ tathāgatassa uppattiṭṭhānabhūtameva sandhāya “loka”nti vuttaṃ. Purimaṃ uyyojanapaṭiññākaraṇavisaye
tika-s0105t0:183_2: ālapananti puna “mahārājā”ti ālapati. “Araha”nti ādayo saddā vitthāritāti yojanā.
tika-s0105t0:183_3: Atthato hi vitthāraṇaṃ saddamukheneva hotīti ubhayattha saddaggahaṇaṃ kataṃ. Yasmā
tika-s0105t0:183_4: pana “aparehipi aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi bhagavā tathāgato”tiādinā tathāgata-saddo udānaṭṭhakathādīsu,
tika-s0105t0:183_5: “araha”nti ādayo ca visuddhimaggaṭīkāyaṃ aparehipi pakārehi vitthāritā ācariyena,
tika-s0105t0:183_6: tasmā tesu vuttanayenapi tesamattho veditabbo. Tathāgatassa sattanikāyantogadhatāya
tika-s0105t0:183_7: “idha pana sattaloko adhippeto”ti vatvā tatthāyaṃ yasmiṃ sattanikāye, yasmiñca okāse
tika-s0105t0:183_8: uppajjati, taṃ dassetuṃ “sattaloke uppajjamānopi cā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Na devaloke, na
tika-s0105t0:183_9: brahmaloketi ettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ parato āgamissati.
tika-s0105t0:184_0: Tassāparenāti tassa nigamassa aparena, tato bahīti vuttaṃ hoti. Tatoti mahāsālato.
tika-s0105t0:184_1: Orato majjheti abbhantaraṃ majjhimapadeso. Evaṃ paricchinneti pañcanimittabaddhā
tika-s0105t0:184_2: sīmā viya pañcahi yathāvuttanimittehi paricchinne. Aḍḍhateyyayojanasateti paṇṇāsayojanehi
tika-s0105t0:184_3: ūnatiyojanasate. Ayañhi majjhimajanapado mudiṅgasaṇṭhāno, na samaparivaṭṭo, na ca
tika-s0105t0:184_4: samacaturasso, ujukena katthaci asītiyojano hoti, katthaci yojanasatiko, tathāpi
tika-s0105t0:184_5: cesa kuṭilaparicchedena miniyamāno pariyanta parikkhepato navayojanasatiko hoti.
tika-s0105t0:184_6: Tena vuttaṃ “navayojanasate”ti. Asītimahātherāti yebhuyyavasena vuttaṃ sunāparantakassa
tika-s0105t0:184_7: puṇṇattherassāpi mahāsāvakesu pariyāpannattā. Sunāparantajanapado hi paccantavisayo.
tika-s0105t0:184_8: Tathā hi “candanamaṇḍalamāḷapaṭiggahaṇe bhagavā na tattha aruṇaṃ uṭṭhapetī”ti majjhimāgama-
tika-s0105t0:185_0: Tatthāti majjhimapadese, tasmiṃyeva “uppajjatī”ti vacane vā. Sujātāyāti evaṃnāmikāya
tika-s0105t0:185_1: paṭhamaṃ saraṇagamanikāya yasattheramātuyā. Catūsu panetesu vikappesu paṭhamo buddhabhāvāya
tika-s0105t0:185_2: āsannatarapaṭipattidassanavasena vutto. Āsannatarāya hi paṭipattiyā ṭhitopi “uppajjatī”ti
tika-s0105t0:185_3: vuccati uppādassa ekantikattā, pageva paṭipattiyā matthake ṭhito. Dutiyo buddhabhāvāvahapabbajjato
tika-s0105t0:185_5: buddhabhāvāya paṭipattidassanavasena. Na hi mahāsattānaṃ antimabhavūpapattito paṭṭhāya
tika-s0105t0:185_6: bodhisambhārasambharaṇaṃ nāma atthi buddhatthāya kālamāgamayamāneneva tattha patiṭṭhanato.
tika-s0105t0:185_8: Bodhiyā hi niyatabhāvappattito pabhuti “buddho uppajjatī”ti viññūhi vattuṃ sakkā
tika-s0105t0:185_9: uppādassa ekantikattā. Yathā pana “sandanti nadiyo”ti sandanakiriyāya avicchedamupādāya
tika-s0105t0:185_10: vattamānappayogo, evaṃ uppādatthāya paṭipajjanakiriyāya avicchedamupādāya catūsupi
tika-s0105t0:188_0: Yasmā pana buddhānaṃ sāvakānaṃ viya na paṭipāṭiyā iddhividhañāṇādīni uppajjanti,
tika-s0105t0:188_1: saheva pana arahattamaggena sakalopi sabbaññutaññāṇādiguṇarāsi āgato nāma hoti, tasmā
tika-s0105t0:188_2: tesaṃ nipphattasabbakiccattā arahattaphalakkhaṇe uppanno nāmāti ekaṅguttaravaṇṇanāyaṃ
tika-s0105t0:188_3: vuttaṃ. Asati hi nipphattasabbakiccatte na tāvatā “uppanno”ti vattumarahati. Sabbapaṭhamaṃ
tika-s0105t0:188_4: uppannabhāvanti catūsu vikappesu sabbapaṭhamaṃ “tathāgato sujātāya…pe… uppajjati
tika-s0105t0:188_5: nāmā”ti vuttaṃ tathāgatassa uppannatāsaṅkhātaṃ atthibhāvaṃ. Tadeva sandhāya uppajjatīti
tika-s0105t0:188_6: vuttaṃ buddhabhāvāya āsannatarapaṭipattiyaṃ ṭhitasseva adhippetattā. Ayameva hi attho
tika-s0105t0:189_0: Ettha ca “uppanno”ti vutte atītakālavasena koci atthaṃ gaṇheyyāti tannivattanatthaṃ
tika-s0105t0:189_1: “uppanno hotī”ti vuttaṃ. “Uppannā dhammā”tiādīsu viya hi idha uppannasaddo paccuppannakāliko.
tika-s0105t0:189_2: Nanu ca arahattaphalasamaṅgīsaṅkhāto uppannoyeva tathāgato pavedanadesanādīni sādheti,
tika-s0105t0:189_3: atha kasmā yathāvutto arahattamaggapariyosāno uppajjamānoyeva tathāgato adhippeto.
tika-s0105t0:189_4: Na hi so pavedanadesanādīni sādheti madhupāyāsabhojanato yāva arahattamaggo, tāva
tika-s0105t0:189_5: tesaṃ kiccānamasādhanatoti? Na hevaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, buddhabhāvāya āsannatarapaṭipattiyaṃ
tika-s0105t0:189_6: ṭhitassa uppajjamānassa gahaṇeneva arahattaphalasamaṅgīsaṅkhātassa uppannassāpi gahitattā.
tika-s0105t0:189_7: Kāraṇaggahaṇeneva hi phalampi gahitaṃ tadavinābhāvittā. Iti pavedanadesanādisādhakassa
tika-s0105t0:189_9: daṭṭhabbanti. Tathā hi aṅguttaraṭṭhakathāyaṃ uppajjamāno, uppajjati, uppannoti tīhi
tika-s0105t0:189_10: kālehi atthavibhajane “dīpaṅkarapādamūle laddhabyākaraṇato yāva anāgāmiphalā uppajjamāno
tika-s0105t0:189_11: nāma, arahattamaggakkhaṇe pana uppajjati nāma, arahattaphalakkhaṇe uppanno nāmā”ti
tika-s0105t0:189_12: vuttaṃ. Ayamettha ācariyadhammapālattherassa mati. Yasmā pana ekaṅguttaraṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-s0105t0:189_14: sutte arahattaphalakkhaṇaṃyeva sandhāya uppajjatī”ti vuttaṃ, “uppanno hotīti ayañhettha
tika-s0105t0:189_15: attho”ti āgataṃ, tasmā idhāpi arahattaphalakkhaṇameva sandhāya uppajjatīti vuttanti
tika-s0105t0:189_16: dasseti “sabbapaṭhamaṃ uppannabhāvaṃ sandhāyā”ti iminā. Tenāha “uppanno hotīti ayañhettha
tika-s0105t0:189_17: attho”ti. Sabbapaṭhamaṃ uppannabhāvanti ca sabbaveneyyānaṃ paṭhamataraṃ arahattaphalavasena
tika-s0105t0:189_18: uppannabhāvanti attho. “Uppanno hotī”ti ca iminā arahattaphalakkhaṇavasena atītakālaṃ
tika-s0105t0:189_19: dassetīti. Ayameva ca nayo aṅguttaraṭīkākārena ācariyasāriputtattherena adhippetoti.
tika-s0105t0:190_0: So bhagavāti yo so tathāgato “araha”ntiādinā pakittitaguṇo, so bhagavā. Idāni vattabbaṃ
tika-s0105t0:190_1: imasaddena nidasseti vuccamānatthassa parāmasanato. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – nayidaṃ mahājanassa
tika-s0105t0:190_2: sammukhamattaṃ sandhāya “imaṃ loka”nti vuttaṃ, atha kho “sadevaka”ntiādinā vakkhamānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:190_3: anavasesapariyādānaṃ sandhāyāti. “Saha devehi sadevaka”ntiādinā yathāvākyaṃ padanibbacanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:190_4: vuttaṃ, yathāpadaṃ pana “sadevako”tiādinā vattabbaṃ, ime ca tagguṇasaṃviññāṇabāhiratthasamāsā.
tika-s0105t0:190_5: Ettha hi avayavena viggaho, samudāyo samāsattho hoti lokāvayavena kataviggahena lokasamudāyassa
tika-s0105t0:190_6: yathārahaṃ labbhamānattā. Samavāyajotakasahasaddayoge hi ayameva samāso viññāyati.
tika-s0105t0:190_7: Devehīti ca pañcakāmāvacaradevehi, arūpāvacaradevehi vā. Brahmunāti rūpāvacarārūpāvacarabrahmunā,
tika-s0105t0:190_8: rūpāvacarabrahmunā eva vā, bahukattukādīnamiva nesaṃ siddhi. Pajātattāti yathāsakaṃ
tika-s0105t0:191_0: Evaṃ vacanatthato atthaṃ dassetvā vacanīyatthato dassetuṃ “tatthā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Pañcakāmāvacaradevaggahaṇaṃ
tika-s0105t0:191_1: pārisesañāyena itaresaṃ padantarehi visuṃ gahitattā. Chaṭṭhakāmāvacaradevaggahaṇaṃ
tika-s0105t0:191_2: paccāsattiñāyena. Tattha hi māro jāto, tannivāsī ca. Yasmā cesa dāmarikarājaputto
tika-s0105t0:191_3: viya tattha vasitattā pākaṭo, tasmā santesupi aññesu vasavattimahārājādīsu pākaṭatarena
tika-s0105t0:191_4: teneva visesetvā vuttoti, ayañca nayo majjhimāgamaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pakāsitova. Māraggahaṇena
tika-s0105t0:191_5: cettha taṃsambandhino devāpi gahitā okāsalokena saddhiṃ sattalokassa gahaṇato. Evañhi
tika-s0105t0:191_8: samaṇabrāhmaṇā, tesaṃ gahaṇaṃ tathā, tena bāhirakasamaṇabrāhmaṇaggahaṇaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:191_11: vaseneva sattavisayopi lokasaddo viññāyati samavāyatthavasena tulyayogavisayattā
tika-s0105t0:191_12: tesaṃ, “salomako sapakkhako”tiādīsu pana vijjamānatthavasena atulyayogavisayepi ayaṃ
tika-s0105t0:191_13: samāso labbhatīti byabhicāradassanato abyabhicārenatthañāpakaṃ pajāgahaṇanti āha
tika-s0105t0:191_14: “pajāvacanena sattalokaggahaṇa”nti, na pana lokasaddena sattalokassa aggahitattā
tika-s0105t0:191_15: evaṃ vuttaṃ. Tenāha “tīhi padehi okāsalokena saddhiṃ sattaloko”ti. Sadevakādivacanena
tika-s0105t0:191_17: manussaggahaṇa”nti. Tattha sammutidevā rājāno. Avasesamanussaggahaṇanti sammutidevehi,
tika-s0105t0:191_18: samaṇabrāhmaṇehi ca avasiṭṭhamanussānaṃ gahaṇaṃ. Etthāti etesu padesu. Tīhi padehīti
tika-s0105t0:191_20: sattalokassapi vuttanayena gahitattā “okāsalokena saddhiṃ sattaloko”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:192_0: “Aparo nayo”tiādinā aparampi vacanīyatthamāha. Arūpinopi sattā attano āneñjavihārena
tika-s0105t0:192_1: viharanto “dibbantīti devā”ti idaṃ nibbacanaṃ laddhumarahantīti āha “sadevakaggahaṇena
tika-s0105t0:192_3: devānaṃ sahabyata”ntiādi, arūpāvacarabhūto okāsaloko, sattaloko ca gahitoti attho.
tika-s0105t0:192_4: Evaṃ chakāmāvacaradevaloko, rūpī brahmalokoti etthāpi. Chakāmāvacaradevalokassa savisesaṃ
tika-s0105t0:192_5: māravase pavattanato vuttaṃ “samārakaggahaṇena chakāmāvacaradevaloko”ti. So hi tassa
tika-s0105t0:192_6: dāmarikassa viya vasapavattanokāso. Rūpī brahmaloko gahito pārisesañāyena arūpībrahmalokassa
tika-s0105t0:192_8: aṭṭhasu parisāsu khattiyādicatuparisavaseneva tadaññāsaṃ sadevakādiggahaṇena gahitattā.
tika-s0105t0:192_9: Kathaṃ panettha catuparisavasena manussaloko gahitoti? “Sassamaṇabrāhmaṇi”nti iminā
tika-s0105t0:192_10: samaṇaparisā, brāhmaṇaparisā ca gahitā, “sadevamanussa”nti iminā khattiyaparisā,
tika-s0105t0:192_11: gahapatiparisā cāti. “Paja”nti iminā pana imāyeva catasso parisā vuttā. Catuparisasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-s0105t0:193_0: Aññathā gahetabbamāha “sammutidevehi vā saha manussaloko”ti. Kathaṃ pana gahitoti?
tika-s0105t0:193_2: khattiyā, gahapatisuddasaṅkhātā ca avasesamanussāti. Ito pana aññesaṃ manussasattānamabhāvato
tika-s0105t0:193_3: “paja”nti iminā eteyeva catūhi pakārehi ṭhitā manussasattā vuttā. Catukulappabhedaṃ
tika-s0105t0:193_4: pajanti hi idha attho. Evaṃ vikappadvayepi pajāgahaṇena catuparisādivasena manussānaññeva
tika-s0105t0:193_5: gahitattā idāni avasesasattepi saṅgahetvā dassetuṃ “avasesasabbasattaloko vā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:193_6: Etthāpi catuparisavasena gahitena manussalokena saha avasesasabbasattaloko gahito,
tika-s0105t0:193_7: sammutidevehi vā saha avasesasabbasattalokoti yojetabbaṃ. Nāgagaruḷādivasena ca avasesasabbasattaloko.
tika-s0105t0:194_0: Ettāvatā bhāgaso lokaṃ gahetvā yojanaṃ dassetvā idāni tena tena visesena abhāgaso
tika-s0105t0:194_1: lokaṃ gahetvā yojanaṃ dassetuṃ “apicetthā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ukkaṭṭhaparicchedatoti
tika-s0105t0:194_2: ukkaṃsagatiparicchedato, tabbijānanenāti vuttaṃ hoti. Paṭhamanayena hi pañcasu gatīsu
tika-s0105t0:194_4: seṭṭhā. Dutiyanayena pana arūpino dūrasamugghāṭitakilesadukkhatāya, santapaṇītaāneñjavihārasamaṅgitāya,
tika-s0105t0:194_5: ativiya dīghāyukatāyāti evamādīhi visesehi ativiya ukkaṭṭhā. Ācariyehi pana dutiyanayameva
tika-s0105t0:194_6: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Evaṃ paṭhamapadeneva padhānanayena sabbalokassa sacchikatabhāve
tika-s0105t0:194_7: siddhepi iminā kāraṇavisesena sesapadāni vuttānīti dasseti “tato yesa”ntiādinā. Tatoti
tika-s0105t0:194_8: paṭhamapadato paraṃ āhāti sambandho. “Chakāmāvacarissaro” tiyeva vutte sakkādīnampi
tika-s0105t0:194_9: tassa ādhipaccaṃ siyāti āsaṅkānivattanatthaṃ “vasavattī”ti vuttaṃ, tena sāhasikakaraṇena
tika-s0105t0:194_10: vasavattāpanameva tassādhipaccanti dasseti. So hi chaṭṭhadevalokepi anissaro tattha
tika-s0105t0:194_11: vasavattidevarājasseva issarattā. Tenāha bhagavā aṅguttarāgamavare aṭṭhanipāte dānānisaṃsasutte
tika-s0105t0:194_12: “tatra bhikkhave vasavattī devaputto dānamayaṃ puññakiriyavatthuṃ atirekaṃ karitvā…pe…
tika-s0105t0:194_13: paranimmitavasavattī deve dasahi ṭhānehi adhigaṇhātī”ti vitthāro. Majjhimāgamaṭṭhakathāyampi
tika-s0105t0:194_14: vuttaṃ “tatra hi vasavattirājā rajjaṃ kāreti, māro pana ekasmiṃ padese attano parisāya
tika-s0105t0:194_15: issariyaṃ pavattento rajjapaccante dāmarikarājaputto viya vasatī”ti “brahmā mahānubhāvo”tiādi
tika-s0105t0:194_16: dasasahassiyaṃ mahābrahmuno vasena vadati. “Ukkaṭṭhaparicchedato”ti hi heṭṭhā vuttameva.
tika-s0105t0:194_18: Puthūti bahukā, visuṃ bhūtā vā. Ukkaṭṭhaṭṭhānānanti ukkaṃsagatikānaṃ. Bhāvānukkamoti
tika-s0105t0:194_20: anusandhikkamo vā bhāvānukkamo, atthānañceva padānañca anusandhānapaṭipāṭīti attho,
tika-s0105t0:194_21: ayameva vā pāṭho tathāyeva samantapāsādikāyaṃ diṭṭhattā, ācariyasāriputtattherena
tika-s0105t0:194_22: ca vaṇṇitattā. “Vibhāvanānukkamo”tipi pāṭho dissati, so pana tesu adiṭṭhattā na sundaro.
tika-s0105t0:195_0: Idāni porāṇakānaṃ saṃvaṇṇanānayaṃ dassetuṃ “porāṇā panāhū”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha aññapadena
tika-s0105t0:195_1: niravasesasattalokassa gahitattā sabbattha avasesalokanti anavasesapariyādānaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:195_2: Tenāha “tibhavūpage satte”ti, tedhātukasaṅkhāte tayo bhave upagatasatteti attho.
tika-s0105t0:195_3: Tīhākārehīti devamārabrahmasahitatāsaṅkhātehi tīhi ākārehi. Tīsu padesūti “sadevaka”ntiādīsu
tika-s0105t0:195_4: tīsu padesu. Pakkhipitvāti atthavasena saṅgahetvā. Teyeva tibhavūpage satte “sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiṃ,
tika-s0105t0:195_5: sadevamanussa”nti padadvaye pakkhipatīti ñāpetuṃ “punā”ti vuttaṃ. Tena tenākārenāti
tika-s0105t0:195_6: sadevakattādinā, sassamaṇabrāhmaṇībhāvādinā ca tena tena pakārena. “Tibhavūpage satte”ti
tika-s0105t0:195_7: vatvā “tedhātukamevā”ti vadantā okāsalokena saddhiṃ sattaloko gahitoti dassenti.
tika-s0105t0:196_0: Sāmanti attanā. Aññatthāpohanena, antogadhāvadhāraṇena vā tappaṭisedhanamāha “aparaneyyo
tika-s0105t0:196_1: hutvā”ti, aparehi anabhijānāpetabbo hutvāti attho. Abhiññāti ya-kāralopaniddeso yathā
tika-s0105t0:196_2: “paṭisaṅkhā yoniso”ti vuttaṃ “abhiññāyā”ti. Abhisaddena na visesanamattaṃ jotitaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:196_3: atha kho visesanamukhena karaṇampīti dasseti “adhikena ñāṇenā”ti iminā. Anumānādipaṭikkhepoti
tika-s0105t0:196_5: kāraṇalesamattena pavedanaṃ saṅgaṇhāti ekappamāṇattā. Sabbattha appaṭihatañāṇacāratāya
tika-s0105t0:196_6: hi sabbadhammapaccakkhā buddhā bhagavanto. Bodheti viññāpetīti saddato atthavacanaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:197_0: Anuttaraṃ vivekasukhanti phalasamāpattisukhaṃ. Hitvāpīti pi-saddaggahaṇaṃ phalasamāpattiyā
tika-s0105t0:197_1: antarā ṭhitikāpi kadāci bhagavato desanā hotīti katvā kataṃ. Bhagavā hi dhammaṃ desento
tika-s0105t0:197_2: yasmiṃ khaṇe parisā sādhukāraṃ vā deti, yathāsutaṃ vā dhammaṃ paccavekkhati, taṃ
tika-s0105t0:197_3: khaṇampi pubbābhogena paricchinditvā phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjati, yathāparicchedañca
tika-s0105t0:197_4: samāpattito vuṭṭhāya pubbe ṭhitaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya dhammaṃ desetīti aṭṭhakathāsu vuttovāyamattho.
tika-s0105t0:197_5: Appaṃ vā bahuṃ vā desentoti ugghaṭitaññussa vasena appaṃ vā vipañcitaññussa, neyyassa
tika-s0105t0:197_6: ca vasena bahuṃ vā desento. Kathaṃ desetīti āha “ādimhipī”tiādi. Dhammassa kalyāṇatā
tika-s0105t0:197_7: niyyānikatāya, niyyānikatā ca sabbaso anavajjabhāvenevāti vuttaṃ “anavajjameva katvā”ti.
tika-s0105t0:197_8: Desanāyāti pariyattidhammassa desakāyattena hi āṇādividhinā atisajjanaṃ pabodhanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:197_9: desanāti pariyattidhammo vuccati. Kiñcāpi avayavavinimutto samudāyo nāma paramatthato
tika-s0105t0:197_10: koci natthi, yesu pana avayavesu samudāyarūpena avekkhitesu gāthādisamaññā, taṃ tato
tika-s0105t0:197_11: bhinnaṃ viya katvā saṃsāmivohāramāropetvā dassento “atthi desanāya ādimajjhapariyosāna”nti
tika-s0105t0:197_12: āha. Sāsanassāti paṭipattidhammassa. Sāsitabbapuggalagatena hi yathāparādhādinā sāsitabbabhāvena
tika-s0105t0:197_13: anusāsanaṃ, tadaṅgavinayādivasena vinayananti katvā paṭipattidhammo “sāsana”nti vuccati.
tika-s0105t0:197_14: Atthi sāsanassa ādimajjhapariyosānanti sambandho. Catuppadikāyapīti ettha pi-saddo
tika-s0105t0:197_15: sambhāvane, tena evaṃ appakatarāyapi ādimajjhapariyosānesu kalyāṇatā, pageva bahutarāyāti
tika-s0105t0:197_16: sambhāveti. Padañcettha gāthāya catutthaṃso, yaṃ “pādo”tipi vuccati, eteneva tipādikachapādikāsupi
tika-s0105t0:197_17: yathāsambhavaṃ vibhāgaṃ dasseti. Evaṃ suttāvayave kalyāṇattayaṃ dassetvā sakalepi
tika-s0105t0:197_18: sutte dassetuṃ “ekānusandhikassā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha nātibahuvibhāgaṃ yathānusandhinā
tika-s0105t0:197_19: ekānusandhikaṃ sandhāya “ekānusandhikassā”ti āha. Itarasmiṃ pana teneva dhammavibhāgena
tika-s0105t0:197_22: upalakkhaṇameva “iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ, idametaṃ paṭicca vutta”nti nigamanassapi gahetabbato.
tika-s0105t0:197_23: Saṅgītikārakehi ṭhapitānipi hi nidānanigamanāni satthu desanāya anuvidhānato tadantogadhānevāti
tika-s0105t0:198: “Sīlasamādhivipassanā”tiādinā sāsanassa idha paṭipattidhammataṃ vibhāveti. Vinayaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “sāsanadhammo”ti vuttattā –
tika-s0105t0:201_0: Evaṃ vuttassa satthusāsanassa pakāsako pariyattidhammo eva sīlādiatthavasena kalyāṇattayavibhāvane
tika-s0105t0:201_1: vutto. Idha pana paṭipattiyeva. Tena vakkhati “idha desanāya ādimajjhapariyosānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:201_2: adhippeta”nti. Sīlasamādhivipassanā ādi nāma sāsanasampattibhūtānaṃ uttarimanussadhammānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:201_3: mūlabhāvato. Kusalānaṃ dhammānanti anavajjadhammānaṃ. Diṭṭhīti vipassanā, avinābhāvato
tika-s0105t0:201_4: panettha samādhiggahaṇaṃ. Mahāvaggasaṃyutte bāhiyasuttapadamidaṃ. Kāmaṃ sutte ariyamaggassa
tika-s0105t0:201_5: antadvayavigamena tesaṃ majjhimapaṭipadābhāvo vutto, majjhimabhāvasāmaññato pana
tika-s0105t0:201_6: sammāpaṭipattiyā ārambhanipphattīnaṃ majjhimabhāvassāpi sādhakabhāve yuttanti āha
tika-s0105t0:201_7: “atthi bhikkhave, majjhimā paṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhāti evaṃ vutto ariyamaggo
tika-s0105t0:201_9: nipphattīnaṃ vemajjhabhāvato ariyamaggo majjhaṃ nāmāti adhippāyo. Saupādisesanibbānadhātuvasena
tika-s0105t0:201_10: phalaṃ pariyosānaṃ nāma, anupādisesanibbānadhātuvasena pana nibbānaṃ. Sāsanapariyosānā
tika-s0105t0:201_11: hi nibbānadhātu. Maggassa nipphatti phalavasena, nibbānasacchikiriyāya ca hoti tato
tika-s0105t0:201_12: paraṃ kattabbābhāvatoti vā evaṃ vuttaṃ. Idāni tesaṃ dvinnampi sāsanassa pariyosānataṃ
tika-s0105t0:201_13: āgamena sādhetuṃ “etadatthaṃ ida”ntiādimāha. Etadeva phalaṃ attho yassāti etadatthaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:201_14: Brāhmaṇāti piṅgalakocchabrāhmaṇaṃ bhagavā ālapati. Idañhi majjhimāgame mūlapaṇṇāsake
tika-s0105t0:201_15: cūḷasāropamasutta padaṃ. Etadeva phalaṃ sāraṃ yassāti etaṃsāraṃ niggahitāgamena.
tika-s0105t0:201_16: Tathā etaṃpariyosānaṃ. Nibbānogadhanti nibbānantogadhaṃ. Āvuso visākhāti dhammadinnāya
tika-s0105t0:202_0: Evaṃ saddapabandhavasena desanāya kalyāṇattayavibhāgaṃ dassetvā tadatthavasenapi
tika-s0105t0:202_1: dassento “bhagavā hī”tiādimāha. Atthatopi hi tassādhippetabhāvaṃ hi-saddena samattheti.
tika-s0105t0:202_2: Tathā samatthanamukhena ca atthavasena kalyāṇattayavibhāgaṃ dassetīti. Atthato panetaṃ
tika-s0105t0:202_3: dassento yo tasmiṃ tasmiṃ atthe katavidhi saddapabandho gāthāsuttavasena vavatthito
tika-s0105t0:202_4: pariyattidhammoyeva idha desanāti vutto, tassa cattho visesato sīlādi evāti āha “ādimhi
tika-s0105t0:202_5: sīla”ntiādi. Visesakathanañhetaṃ. Sāmaññato pana sīlaggahaṇena sasambhārasīlaṃ gahitaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:202_6: tathā maggaggahaṇena sasambhāramaggoti atthattayavasena anavasesato pariyattiatthaṃ
tika-s0105t0:202_7: pariyādāya tiṭṭhati. Itarathā hi kalyāṇattayavibhāgo asabbasādhāraṇo siyā. Ettha
tika-s0105t0:202_8: ca sīlamūlakattā sāsanassa sīlena ādikalyāṇatā vuttā, sāsanasampattiyā vemajjhabhāvato
tika-s0105t0:202_9: maggena majjhekalyāṇatā. Nibbānādhigamato uttari karaṇīyābhāvato nibbānena pariyosānakalyāṇatā.
tika-s0105t0:202_10: Tenāti sīlādidassanena. Atthavasena hi idha desanāya ādikalyāṇādibhāvo vutto. “Tasmā”tiādi
tika-s0105t0:203: Esāti yathāvuttākārena kathanā. Kathikasaṇṭhitīti dhammakathikassa saṇṭhānaṃ kathanavasena samavaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:204_0: Vaṇṇanā atthavivaraṇā, pasaṃsanā vā. Na so sātthaṃ deseti niyyānatthavirahato tassā
tika-s0105t0:204_2: dasasu byañjanesu ekappakāreneva, dvippakāreneva vā byañjanena yuttā damiḷabhāsā
tika-s0105t0:204_3: viya. Sabbaniroṭṭhabyañjanāti vivaṭakaraṇatāya oṭṭhe aphusāpetvā uccāretabbato sabbathā
tika-s0105t0:204_5: vissajjanīyayuttatāya sabbathā vissaggabyañjanā savarabhāsā viya. Sabbaniggahitabyañjanāti
tika-s0105t0:204_6: sabbasseva sānusāratāya sabbathā bindusahitabyañjanā pārasikādimilakkhubhāsā viya.
tika-s0105t0:204_7: Evaṃ “damiḷakirātasavaramilakkhūnaṃ bhāsā viyā”ti idaṃ paccekaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Milakkhūti
tika-s0105t0:204_8: ca pārasikādayo. Sabbāpesā byañjanekadesavaseneva pavattiyā aparipuṇṇabyañjanāti
tika-s0105t0:205_0: Ṭhānakaraṇāni sithilāni katvā uccāretabbamakkharaṃ pañcasu vaggesu paṭhamatatiyaṃ
tika-s0105t0:205_1: sithilaṃ. Tāni asithilāni katvā uccāretabbamakkharaṃ tesveva dutiyacatutthaṃ dhanitaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:208_0: Saññogaparaṃ, dīghañca garukaṃ. Asaṃyogaparaṃ rassaṃ lahukaṃ. Ṭhānakaraṇāni niggahetvā
tika-s0105t0:208_1: avivaṭena mukhena uccāretabbaṃ niggahitaṃ. Parapadena sambajjhitvā uccāretabbaṃ sambandhaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:208_2: Tathā asambajjhitabbaṃ vavatthitaṃ. Ṭhānakaraṇāni vissaṭṭhāni katvā vivaṭena mukhena
tika-s0105t0:208_3: uccāretabbaṃ vimuttaṃ. Dasadhātiādīsu evaṃ sithilādivasena byañjanabuddhisaṅkhātassa
tika-s0105t0:208_4: akkharuppādakacittassa dasahi pakārehi byañjanānaṃ pabhedoti attho. Sabbāni hi akkharāni
tika-s0105t0:208_5: cittasamuṭṭhānāni, yathādhippetatthassa ca byañjanato pakāsanato byañjanānīti, byañjanabuddhiyā
tika-s0105t0:208_6: vā karaṇabhūtāya byañjanānaṃ dasadhā pabhedotipi yujjati.
tika-s0105t0:209_0: Amakkhetvāti amilecchetvā avināsetvā, ahāpetvāti attho. Tadatthamāha “paripuṇṇabyañjanameva
tika-s0105t0:209_1: katvā”ti, yamatthaṃ bhagavā ñāpetuṃ ekagāthaṃ, ekavākyampi deseti, tamatthaṃ parimaṇḍalapadabyañjanāya
tika-s0105t0:209_2: eva desanāya desetīti vuttaṃ hoti. Tasmāti paripuṇṇabyañjanadhammadesanato. Kevalasaddo
tika-s0105t0:209_3: idha anavasesavācako. Na avomissatādivācakoti āha “sakalādhivacana”nti. Paripuṇṇanti
tika-s0105t0:209_4: sabbaso puṇṇaṃ. Taṃ panatthato ūnādhikanisedhananti vuttaṃ “anūnādhikavacana”nti.
tika-s0105t0:209_5: Tattha yadatthaṃ desito, tassa sādhakattā anūnatā veditabbā, tabbidhurassa pana asādhakattā
tika-s0105t0:209_6: anadhikatā. Upanetabbassa vā vodānatthassa avuttassa abhāvato anūnatā, apanetabbassa
tika-s0105t0:209_7: saṃkilesatthassa vuttassa abhāvato anadhikatā. Sakalanti sabbabhāgavantaṃ. Paripuṇṇanti
tika-s0105t0:209_8: sabbaso puṇṇameva. Tenāha “ekadesenāpi aparipuṇṇā natthī”ti. Aparisuddhā desanā hoti
tika-s0105t0:209_9: taṇhāya saṃkiliṭṭhattā. Lokehi taṇhāya āmasitabbato lokāmisā, cīvarādayo paccayā,
tika-s0105t0:209_10: tesu agadhitacittatāya lokāmisanirapekkho. Hitapharaṇenāti hitato pharaṇena hitūpasaṃhārena
tika-s0105t0:209_12: sakalasaṃkilesato, vaṭṭadukkhato ca uddharaṇākārasaṇṭhitena, kāruññādhippāyenāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t0:210_0: “Ito paṭṭhāya dassāmi, evañca dassāmī”ti samādātabbaṭṭhena dānaṃ vataṃ. Paṇḍitapaññattatāya
tika-s0105t0:210_1: seṭṭhaṭṭhena brahmaṃ, brahmānaṃ vā seṭṭhānaṃ cariyanti dānameva brahmacariyaṃ. Macchariyalobhādiniggahaṇena
tika-s0105t0:210_2: samāciṇṇattā dānameva suciṇṇaṃ. Iddhīti deviddhi. Jutīti pabhā, ānubhāvo vā. Balavīriyūpapattīti
tika-s0105t0:210_3: mahatā balena, vīriyena ca samannāgamo. Nāgāti varuṇanāgarājānaṃ vidhurapaṇḍitassa ālapanaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:213: Madhussavoti madhurasasandanaṃ. Puññanti puññaphalaṃ, kāraṇavohārena vuttaṃ. Brahmaṃ, brahmānaṃ vā cariyanti brahmacariyaṃ, veyyāvaccaṃ. Esa nayo sesesupi.
tika-s0105t0:215: Aññatra tāhīti paradārabhūtāhi vajjetvā. Amhanti amhākaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:216_0: Tapassī, lūkho, jegucchī, pavivittoti catubbidhassa dukkarassa katattā caturaṅgasamannāgataṃ.
tika-s0105t0:216_1: Sudanti nipātamattaṃ. Lomahaṃsanasuttaṃ majjhimāgame mūlapaṇṇāsake, “mahāsīhanādasutta”ntipi taṃ vadanti.
tika-s0105t0:217_0: Iddhanti samiddhaṃ. Phītanti phullitaṃ. Vitthārikanti vitthārabhūtaṃ. Bāhujaññanti
tika-s0105t0:217_1: bahūhi janehi niyyānikabhāvena ñātaṃ. Puthubhūtanti bahubhūtaṃ. Yāva devamanussehīti
tika-s0105t0:217_2: ettha devalokato yāva manussalokā supakāsitanti adhippāyavasena pāsādikasuttaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-s0105t0:217_3: vuttaṃ, yāva devā ca manussā cāti attho. Tasmāti yasmā sikkhattayasaṅgahaṃ sakalasāsanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:217_5: sabbapadāni yojetvā atthaṃ dassento “so dhammaṃ desetī”tiādimāha. “Evaṃ desento cā”ti
tika-s0105t0:217_6: hi iminā brahmacariyasaddena dhammasaddādīnaṃ samānatthataṃ dasseti, “dhammaṃ desetī”ti
tika-s0105t0:217_7: vatvāpi “brahmacariyaṃ pakāsetī”ti vacanaṃ sarūpato atthappakāsanatthanti ca vibhāveti.
tika-s0105t0:218_1: sāsane sammāpaṭipatti sambhavati, na mānajātikassāti vuttaṃ “nihatamānattā”ti. Ussannattāti
tika-s0105t0:218_2: bahulabhāvato. Bhogarūpādivatthukā madā suppaheyyā honti nimittassa anavaṭṭhānato,
tika-s0105t0:218_3: na tathā kulavijjādimadā nimittassa samavaṭṭhānato. Tasmā khattiyabrāhmaṇakulīnānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:218_4: pabbajitānampi jātivijjaṃ nissāya mānajappanaṃ duppajahanti āha “yebhuyyena…pe… mānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:218_5: karontī”ti. Vijātitāyāti viparītajātitāya, hīnajātitāyāti attho. Yebhuyyena upanissayasampannā
tika-s0105t0:218_6: sujātikā eva, na dujjātikāti evaṃ vuttaṃ. Patiṭṭhātuṃ na sakkontīti sīle patiṭṭhahituṃ
tika-s0105t0:218_7: na ussahanti, suvisuddhaṃ katvā sīlaṃ rakkhituṃ na sakkontīti vuttaṃ hoti. Sīlameva
tika-s0105t0:218_8: hi sāsane patiṭṭhā, patiṭṭhātunti vā saccapaṭivedhena lokuttarāya patiṭṭhāya patiṭṭhātuṃ.
tika-s0105t0:218_9: Sā hi nippariyāyato sāsane patiṭṭhā nāma.
tika-s0105t0:219_0: Evaṃ byatirekato atthaṃ vatvā anvayatopi vadati “gahapatidārakā panā”tiādinā. Kacchehi
tika-s0105t0:219_1: sedaṃ muñcantehīti itthambhūtalakkhaṇe karaṇavacanaṃ. Tathā piṭṭhiyā loṇaṃ pupphamānāyāti,
tika-s0105t0:219_2: sedaṃ muñcantakacchā loṇaṃ pupphamānapiṭṭhikā hutvā, tehi vā pakārehi lakkhitāti
tika-s0105t0:219_3: attho. Bhūmiṃ kasitvāti bhūmiyā kassanato, khettūpajīvanatoti vuttaṃ hoti. Tādisassāti
tika-s0105t0:219_4: jātimantūpanissayassa. Dubbalaṃ mānaṃ. Balavaṃ dappaṃ. Kammanti parikammaṃ. “Itarehī”tiādinā
tika-s0105t0:219_6: itisaddo vā nidassane, evaṃ yathāvuttanayenāti attho. Esa nayo īdisesu.
tika-s0105t0:220_0: Paccājātoti ettha ākāro upasaggamattanti āha “patijāto”ti. Parisuddhanti rāgādīnaṃ
tika-s0105t0:220_1: accantameva pahānadīpanato nirupakkilesatāya sabbathā suddhaṃ. Dhammassa sāmī taduppādakaṭṭhena,
tika-s0105t0:220_2: dhammena vā sadevakassa lokassa sāmīti dhammassāmī. Saddhanti pothujjanikasaddhāvasena
tika-s0105t0:220_3: saddahanaṃ. Viññūjātikānañhi dhammasampattigahaṇapubbikā saddhāsiddhi catūsu puggalesu
tika-s0105t0:220_5: vata so bhagavā”ti saddhaṃ paṭilabhati. Yojanasatantarepi vā padese. Jāyampatikāti
tika-s0105t0:220_7: gahaṇaṃ viññāyati, yassa pana purisassa anekā pajāpatiyo, tassa vattabbameva natthi.
tika-s0105t0:220_8: Ekāyapi tāva saṃvāso sambādhoyevāti dassanatthaṃ “dve”ti vuttaṃ. Rāgādinā kiñcanaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:220_9: khettavatthādinā palibodhanaṃ, tadubhayena saha vattatīti sakiñcanapalibodhano, soyevattho
tika-s0105t0:220_10: tathā. Rāgo eva rajo, tadādikā dosamoharajā. Vuttañhi “rāgo rajo na ca pana reṇu
tika-s0105t0:220_11: vuccatī”tiādi āgamanapathatāpi uṭṭhānaṭṭhānatā evāti dvepi saṃvaṇṇanā ekatthā, byañjanameva
tika-s0105t0:220_12: nānaṃ. Alagganaṭṭhenāti asajjanaṭṭhena appaṭibandhasabhāvena. Rūpakavasena, taddhitavasena
tika-s0105t0:220_13: vā abbhokāsoti dassetuṃ viya-saddaggahaṇaṃ. Evaṃ akusalakusalappavattīnaṃ ṭhānāṭhānabhāvena
tika-s0105t0:220_14: gharāvāsapabbajjānaṃ sambādhabbhokāsataṃ dassetvā idāni kusalappavattiyā eva aṭṭhānaṭṭhānabhāvena
tika-s0105t0:220_15: tesaṃ tabbhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Rajānaṃ sannipātaṭṭhānaṃ viyāti sambandho.
tika-s0105t0:221_0: Visuṃ visuṃ paduddhāramakatvā samāsato atthavaṇṇanā saṅkhepakathā. Ekampi divasanti
tika-s0105t0:221_1: ekadivasamattampi. Akhaṇḍaṃ katvāti dukkaṭamattassāpi anāpajjanena achiddaṃ katvā.
tika-s0105t0:221_2: Carimakacittanti cuticittaṃ. Kilesamalenāti taṇhāsaṃkilesādimalena. Amalīnanti asaṃkiliṭṭhaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:221_3: Pariyodātaṭṭhena nimmalabhāvena saṅkhaṃ viya likhitaṃ dhotanti saṅkhalikhitaṃ. Atthamattaṃ
tika-s0105t0:221_5: vivaraṇaṃ. Apica likhitaṃ saṅkhaṃ saṅkhalikhitaṃ yathā “agyāhito”ti, tassadisattā
tika-s0105t0:221_6: pana idaṃ saṅkhalikhitantipi dasseti, bhāvanapuṃsakañcetaṃ. Ajjhāvasatāti ettha adhi-saddena
tika-s0105t0:221_7: kammappavacanīyena yogato “agāra”nti etaṃ bhummatthe upayogavacananti āha “agāramajjhe”ti.
tika-s0105t0:221_8: Yaṃ nūna yadi pana pabbajeyyaṃ, sādhu vatāti sambandho. Kasāyena rattāni kāsāyānīti
tika-s0105t0:221_9: dasseti “kasāyarasapītatāyā”ti iminā. Kasmā cetāni gahitānīti āha “brahmacariyaṃ
tika-s0105t0:221_10: carantānaṃ anucchavikānī”ti. Acchādetvāti vohāravacanamattaṃ, paridahitvāti attho,
tika-s0105t0:221_11: tañca kho nivāsanapārupanavasena. Agāravāso agāraṃ uttarapadalopena, tassa hitaṃ
tika-s0105t0:221_12: vuḍḍhiāvahaṃ kasivāṇijjādikammaṃ. Taṃ anagāriyanti tasmiṃ anagāriye.
tika-s0105t0:222_1: nattā panattā”tiādinā pemavasena paricchedaṃ katvā bandhanaṭṭhena, etena ābandhanattho
tika-s0105t0:222_2: parivaṭṭa-saddoti dasseti. Atha vā pitāmahapituputtādivasena parivattanaṭṭhena parivaṭṭotipi
tika-s0105t0:223_0: 193. Pātimokkhasaṃvarena pihitakāyavacīdvāro samāno tena saṃvarena upeto nāmāti katvā
tika-s0105t0:223_5: appamattakatā. Bhayadassīti bhayadassanasīlo. Sammāti aviparītaṃ, sundaraṃ vā, tabbhāvo
tika-s0105t0:223_6: ca sakkaccaṃ yāvajīvaṃ avītikkamavasena. “Sikkhāpadesū”ti vutteyeva tadavayavabhūtaṃ
tika-s0105t0:223_7: “sikkhāpadaṃ samādāya sikkhatī”ti atthassa gamyamānattā kammapadaṃ na vuttanti āha
tika-s0105t0:223_8: “taṃ taṃ sikkhāpada”nti, taṃ taṃ sikkhākoṭṭhāsaṃ, sikkhāya vā adhigamupāyaṃ, tassā
tika-s0105t0:224_1: vacaneneva. Tenāha “kusale kāyakammavacīkamme gahitepī”ti. Na hi ācāragocarasaddamattena
tika-s0105t0:224_2: kusalakāyavacīkammaggahaṇaṃ sambhavati, iminā punaruttitāya codanālesaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0105t0:224_4: dvārassa kammāpadesena dassanatthaṃ, etena yathāvuttacodanāya sodhanaṃ dasseti. Idaṃ
tika-s0105t0:224_5: vuttaṃ hoti – siddhepi sati punārambho niyamāya vā hoti, atthantarabodhanāya vā,
tika-s0105t0:224_6: idha pana atthantaraṃ bodheti, tasmā uppattidvāradassanatthaṃ vuttanti. Kusalenāti
tika-s0105t0:224_7: ca sabbaso anesanapahānato anavajjena. Kathaṃ tena uppattidvāradassananti āha “yasmā
tika-s0105t0:224_8: panā”tiādi. Kāyavacīdvāresu uppannena anavajjena kāyakammavacīkammena samannāgatattā
tika-s0105t0:224_9: parisuddhājīvoti adhippāyo. Tadubhayameva hi ājīvahetukaṃ ājīvapārisuddhisīlaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:225_0: Idāni suttantarena saṃsandituṃ “muṇḍikaputtasuttantavasena vā evaṃ vutta”nti āha.
tika-s0105t0:225_3: Tattha thapatīti pañcakaṅgaṃ nāma vaḍḍhakiṃ bhagavā ālapati. Thapati-saddo hi vaḍḍhakipariyāyo.
tika-s0105t0:225_4: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yasmā “katame ca thapati kusalā sīlā? Kusalaṃ kāyakammaṃ kusalaṃ
tika-s0105t0:225_6: kho ahaṃ thapati sīlasmiṃ vadāmī”ti evaṃ pavattāya muṇḍikaputtasuttadesanāya “kāyakammavacīkammena
tika-s0105t0:225_8: evaṃ pavattā ayaṃ sāmaññaphalasuttadesanā ekasaṅgahā aññadatthu saṃsandati sameti
tika-s0105t0:225_9: yathā taṃ gaṅgodakena yamunodakaṃ, tasmā īdisīpi bhagavato desanāvibhūti atthevāti.
tika-s0105t0:225_10: Sīlasmiṃ vadāmīti sīlanti vadāmi, sīlasmiṃ vā ādhārabhūte antogadhaṃ pariyāpannaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:226_1: gahaṇaṃ nivatteti. Upari niddese vakkhamānesu sattasu ṭhānesu. Tividhenāti catūsu
tika-s0105t0:228_0: 194-211. Evanti “so evaṃ pabbajito samāno pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto viharatī”tiādinā
tika-s0105t0:228_1: nayena. “Sīlasmi”nti idaṃ niddhāraṇe bhummaṃ tato ekassa niddhāraṇīyattāti āha “ekaṃ
tika-s0105t0:228_2: sīla”nti. Apica iminā ādhāre bhummaṃ dasseti samudāyassa avayavādhiṭṭhānattā yathā
tika-s0105t0:228_4: katvatthe pavattanato yathā “vanappagumbe yatha phusitagge”ti dasseti “paccattavacanatthe
tika-s0105t0:228_5: vā etaṃ bhumma”nti iminā. Ayamevatthoti paccattavacanattho eva. Brahmajāleti brahmajālasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:228_6: brahmajālasuttapade vā. Saṃvaṇṇanāvasena vuttanayenāti attho. “Idamassa hoti sīlasmi”nti
tika-s0105t0:228_7: ettha mahāsīlapariyosānena niddhāriyamānassa abhāvato paccattavacanatthoyeva sambhavatīti
tika-s0105t0:228_8: āha “idaṃ assa sīlaṃ hotīti attho”ti, tatoyeva ca pāḷiyaṃ apiggahaṇamakatanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:229_1: sīlassa asaṃvaraṇato, sīlasaṃvarābhāvatoti attho”ti ācariyena vuttaṃ, “yadidaṃ sīlasaṃvarato”ti
tika-s0105t0:229_2: pana padassa “yaṃ idaṃ bhayaṃ sīlasaṃvarato bhaveyyā”ti atthavacanato, “sīlasaṃvarahetu
tika-s0105t0:229_3: bhayaṃ na samanupassatī”ti ca atthassa upapattito sīlasaṃvarato sīlasaṃvarahetūti
tika-s0105t0:229_4: atthoyeva sambhavati. “Yaṃ idaṃ bhayaṃ sīlasaṃvarato bhaveyyā”ti hi pāṭhopi dissati.
tika-s0105t0:229_6: hetuṃ vadati. Yathāvidhānavihitenāti yathāvidhānaṃ sampāditena. Khattiyābhisekenāti
tika-s0105t0:229_7: khattiyabhāvāvahena abhisekena. Muddhani avasittoti matthakeyeva abhisitto. Ettha
tika-s0105t0:229_10: iminā muddhaniyeva abhisiñcitabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ. Iti tivaṅgasamannāgato khattiyābhiseko
tika-s0105t0:229_11: vutto hoti. Yena abhisittarājūnaṃ rājānubhāvo samijjhati. Kena panāyamattho viññāyatīti?
tika-s0105t0:229_13: “te panassa khettasāmino tīhi saṅkhehi abhisekampi akaṃsū”ti majjhimāgamaṭṭhakathāyañca
tika-s0105t0:229_16: tāva abhisekaṃ gaṇhantānaṃ rājūnaṃ suvaṇṇamayādīni tīṇi saṅkhāni ca gaṅgodakañca
tika-s0105t0:230_0: Ayaṃ pana tatthāgatanayena abhisekavidhānavinicchayo – abhisekamaṅgalatthañhi alaṅkatapaṭiyattassa
tika-s0105t0:230_1: maṇḍapassa antokatassa udumbarasākhamaṇḍapassa majjhe suppatiṭṭhite udumbarabhaddapīṭhamhi
tika-s0105t0:230_2: abhisekārahaṃ abhijaccaṃ khattiyaṃ nisīdāpetvā paṭhamaṃ tāva maṅgalābharaṇabhūsitā
tika-s0105t0:230_4: ubhohi hatthehi sakkaccaṃ gahetvā sīsopari ussāpetvā tena tassa muddhani abhisekodakaṃ
tika-s0105t0:230_5: abhisiñcati, evañca vadeti “deva taṃ sabbepi khattiyagaṇā attānamārakkhatthaṃ iminā
tika-s0105t0:230_6: abhisekena abhisekikaṃ mahārājaṃ karonti, tvaṃ rājadhammesu ṭhito dhammena samena
tika-s0105t0:230_7: rajjaṃ kārehi, etesu khattiyagaṇesu tvaṃ puttasinehānukampāya sahitacitto, hitasamamettacitto
tika-s0105t0:230_8: ca bhava, rakkhāvaraṇaguttiyā tesaṃ rakkhito ca bhavāhī”ti. Tato puna purohitopi
tika-s0105t0:230_10: ubhohi hatthehi sakkaccaṃ gahetvā tassa sīsopari ussāpetvā tena tassa muddhani abhisekodakaṃ
tika-s0105t0:230_11: abhisiñcati, evañca vadeti “deva taṃ sabbepi brāhmaṇagaṇā attānamārakkhatthaṃ iminā
tika-s0105t0:230_12: abhisekena abhisekikaṃ mahārājaṃ karonti, tvaṃ rājadhammesu ṭhito dhammena samena
tika-s0105t0:230_13: rajjaṃ kārehi, etesu brāhmaṇagaṇesu tvaṃ puttasinehānukampāya sahitacitto, hitasamamettacitto
tika-s0105t0:230_14: ca bhava, rakkhāvaraṇaguttiyā tesaṃ rakkhito ca bhavāhī”ti. Tato puna seṭṭhipi seṭṭhiṭṭhānabhūsanabhūsito
tika-s0105t0:230_15: gaṅgodakapuṇṇaṃ ratanamayaṃ saṅkhaṃ ubhohi hatthehi sakkaccaṃ gahetvā tassa sīsopari
tika-s0105t0:230_16: ussāpetvā tena tassa muddhani abhisekodakaṃ abhisiñcati, evañca vadeti “deva taṃ
tika-s0105t0:230_17: sabbepi gahapatigaṇā attānamārakkhatthaṃ iminā abhisekena abhisekikaṃ mahārājaṃ karonti,
tika-s0105t0:230_18: tvaṃ rājadhammesu ṭhito dhammena samena rajjaṃ kārehi, etesu gahapatigaṇesu tvaṃ
tika-s0105t0:230_19: puttasinehānukampāya sahitacitto, hitasamamettacitto ca bhava, rakkhāvaraṇaguttiyā
tika-s0105t0:230_20: tesaṃ rakkhito ca bhavāhī”ti. Te pana tassa evaṃ vadantā “sace tvaṃ amhākaṃ vacanānurūpaṃ
tika-s0105t0:230_21: rajjaṃ karissasi, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ. No ce karissasi, tava muddhā sattadhā phalatū”ti
tika-s0105t0:230_22: evaṃ rañño abhisapanti viyāti daṭṭhabbanti. Vaḍḍhakīsūkarajātakādīhi cāyamattho vibhāvetabbo,
tika-s0105t0:231_0: Yasmā nihatapaccāmitto, tasmā na samanupassatīti sambandho. Anavajjatā kusalabhāvenāti
tika-s0105t0:231_1: āha “kusalaṃ sīlapadaṭṭhānehī”tiādi. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – kusalasīlapadaṭṭhānā avippaṭisārapāmojjapītipassaddhidhammā,
tika-s0105t0:233_0: 213. Sāmaññassa visesāpekkhatāya idhādhippetopi viseso tena apariccatto eva hotīti
tika-s0105t0:233_1: āha “cakkhusaddo katthaci buddhacakkhumhi vattatī”tiādi. Vijjamānameva hi abhidheyyabhāvena
tika-s0105t0:233_2: visesatthaṃ visesantaranivattanena visesasaddo vibhāveti, na avijjamānaṃ. Sesapadesupi
tika-s0105t0:233_3: eseva nayo. Aññehi asādhāraṇaṃ buddhānameva cakkhu dassananti buddhacakkhu, āsayānusayañāṇaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:233_4: indriyaparopariyattañāṇañca. Samantato sabbaso dassanaṭṭhena cakkhūti samantacakkhu,
tika-s0105t0:233_5: sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ. Tathūpamanti pabbatamuddhūpamaṃ, dhammamayaṃ pāsādanti sambandho.
tika-s0105t0:233_6: Sumedha samantacakkhu tvaṃ janatamavekkhassūti attho. Ariyamaggattayapaññāti heṭṭhimāriyamaggattayapaññā.
tika-s0105t0:233_7: “Dhammacakkhu nāma heṭṭhimā tayo maggā, tīṇi ca phalānī”ti saḷāyatanavaggaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-s0105t0:233_8: vuttaṃ, idha pana maggeheva phalāni saṅgahetvā dasseti. Catusaccasaṅkhāte dhamme
tika-s0105t0:233_9: cakkhūti hi dhammacakkhu. Paññāyeva dassanaṭṭhena cakkhūti paññācakkhu, pubbenivāsāsavakkhayañāṇaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:233_10: Dibbacakkhumhīti dutiyavijjāya. Idhāti “cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā”ti imasmiṃ pāṭhe. Ayanti
tika-s0105t0:233_11: cakkhusaddo. “Pasādacakkhuvohārenā”ti iminā idha cakkhusaddo cakkhupasādeyeva nippariyāyato
tika-s0105t0:233_12: vattati, pariyāyato pana nissayavohārena nissitassa vattabbato cakkhuviññāṇepi yathā
tika-s0105t0:233_13: “mañcā ukkuṭṭhiṃ karontī”ti dasseti. Idhāpi sasambhārakathā avasiṭṭhāti katvā sesapadesupīti
tika-s0105t0:233_14: pi-saddaggahaṇaṃ, “na nimittaggāhī”tiādipadesupīti attho. Vividhaṃ asanaṃ khedanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:233_15: byāseko, kileso eva byāseko, tena virahito tathā, virahitatā ca asammissatā, asammissabhāvo
tika-s0105t0:233_16: ca sampayogābhāvato parisuddhatāti āha “asammissaṃ parisuddha”nti, kilesadukkhena
tika-s0105t0:233_17: avomissaṃ, tato ca suvisuddhanti attho. Sati ca suvisuddhe indriyasaṃvare nīvaraṇesu
tika-s0105t0:233_18: padhānabhūtapāpadhammavigamena adhicittānuyogo hatthagato eva hoti, tasmā adhicittasukhameva
tika-s0105t0:235_0: 214. Samantato pakārehi, pakaṭṭhaṃ vā savisesaṃ jānātīti sampajāno, tassa bhāvo sampajaññaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:235_1: tathāpavattañāṇaṃ, tassa vibhajanaṃ sampajaññabhājanīyaṃ, tasmiṃ sampajaññabhājanīyamhi.
tika-s0105t0:235_2: “Gamana”nti iminā abhikkamanaṃ abhikkantanti bhāvasādhanamāha. Tathā paṭikkamanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:235_3: paṭikkantanti vuttaṃ “nivattana”nti. Gamanañcettha nivattetvā, anivattetvā ca gamanaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:235_4: nivattanaṃ pana nivattimattameva, aññamaññamupādānakiriyāmattañcetaṃ dvayaṃ. Kathaṃ
tika-s0105t0:235_5: labbhatīti āha “gamane”tiādi. Abhiharantoti gamanavasena kāyaṃ upanento. Paṭinivattentoti
tika-s0105t0:235_6: tato puna nivattento. Apanāmentoti apakkamanavasena pariṇāmento. Āsanassāti pīṭhakādiāsanassa.
tika-s0105t0:235_9: nipannasseva abhimukhaṃ saṃsappanapaṭiāsappanāni dasseti. Ṭhānanisajjāsayanesu hi
tika-s0105t0:235_10: yo gamanavidhuro kāyassa purato abhihāro, so abhikkamo. Pacchato apahāro paṭikkamoti lakkhaṇaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:236_0: Sampajānanaṃ sampajānaṃ, tena attanā kattabbakiccassa karaṇasīlo sampajānakārīti
tika-s0105t0:236_1: āha “sampajaññena sabbakiccakārī”ti. “Sampajaññameva vā kārī”ti iminā sampajānassa
tika-s0105t0:236_2: karaṇasīlo sampajānakārīti dasseti. “So hī”tiādi dutiyavikappassa samatthanaṃ. “Sampajañña”nti
tika-s0105t0:236_3: ca iminā sampajāna-saddassa sampajaññapariyāyatā vuttā. Tathā hi ācariyānandattherena
tika-s0105t0:236_4: vuttaṃ “samantato, sammā, samaṃ vā pajānanaṃ sampajānaṃ, tadeva sampajañña”nti ayaṃ
tika-s0105t0:236_5: aṭṭhakathāto aparo nayo – yathā atikkantādīsu asammohaṃ uppādeti, tathā sampajānassa
tika-s0105t0:236_6: kāro karaṇaṃ sampajānakāro, so etassa atthīti sampajānakārīti.
tika-s0105t0:237_0: Dhammato vaḍḍhisaṅkhātena atthena saha vattatīti sātthakaṃ, abhikkantādi, sātthakassa
tika-s0105t0:237_1: sampajānanaṃ sātthakasampajaññaṃ. Sappāyassa attano patirūpassa sampajānanaṃ sappāyasampajaññaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:237_2: Abhikkamādīsu bhikkhācāragocare, aññattha ca pavattesu avijahitakammaṭṭhānasaṅkhāte
tika-s0105t0:237_3: gocare sampajānanaṃ gocarasampajaññaṃ. Sāmaññaniddesena, hi ekasesanayena vā gocarasaddo
tika-s0105t0:237_4: tadatthadvayepi pavattati. Atikkamādīsu asammuyhanasaṅkhātaṃ asammohameva sampajaññaṃ
