tika-s0105t0:237_5: asammohasampajaññaṃ. Cittavasenevāti cittassa vaseneva, cittavasamanugatenevāti attho.
tika-s0105t0:237_6: Pariggahetvāti tulayitvā tīretvā, paṭisaṅkhāyāti attho. Saṅghadassaneneva uposathapavāraṇādiatthāya
tika-s0105t0:237_7: gamanaṃ saṅgahitaṃ. Ādisaddena kasiṇaparikammādīnaṃ saṅgaho. Saṅkhepato vuttaṃ tadatthameva
tika-s0105t0:237_8: vivarituṃ “cetiyaṃ vā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Arahattaṃ pāpuṇātīti ukkaṭṭhaniddeso esa. Samathavipassanuppādanampi
tika-s0105t0:237_9: hi bhikkhuno vaḍḍhiyeva. Tatthāti asubhārammaṇe. Kecīti abhayagirivāsino. Āmisatoti
tika-s0105t0:238_0: Tasminti sātthakasampajaññavasena pariggahitaatthe. Yasmā pana dhammato vaḍḍhiyeva
tika-s0105t0:238_1: attho nāma, tasmā yaṃ “sātthaka”nti adhippetaṃ gamanaṃ, taṃ sabbampi sappāyamevāti
tika-s0105t0:238_2: siyā avisesena kassaci āsaṅkāti tannivattanatthaṃ “cetiyadassanaṃ tāvā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:238_3: Mahāpūjāyāti mahatiyā pūjāya, bahūnaṃ pūjādivaseti vuttaṃ hoti. Cittakammarūpakānī
tika-s0105t0:238_4: viyāti cittakammakatapaṭimāyo viya, yantapayogena vā nānappakāravicittakiriyā paṭimāyo
tika-s0105t0:238_5: viya. Tatrāti tāsu parisāsu. Assāti bhikkhuno. Asamapekkhanaṃ nāma gehassitaaññāṇupekkhāvasena
tika-s0105t0:238_6: ārammaṇassa ayoniso gahaṇaṃ. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā uppajjati
tika-s0105t0:238_7: upekkhā bālassa mūḷhassa puthujjanassā”tiādi mātugāmasamphassavasena kāyasaṃsaggāpatti.
tika-s0105t0:239_1: Pabbajitadivasato paṭṭhāya paṭivacanadānavasena bhikkhūnaṃ anuvattanakathā āciṇṇā,
tika-s0105t0:239_2: tasmā paṭivacanassa adānavasena ananuvattanakathā tassa dutiyā nāma hotīti āha “dve
tika-s0105t0:239_3: kathā nāma na kathitapubbā”ti. Dve kathāti hi vacanakaraṇākaraṇakathā. Tattha vacanakaraṇakathāyeva
tika-s0105t0:239_4: kathitapubbā, dutiyā na kathitapubbā. Tasmā subbacattā paṭivacanamadāsīti attho.
tika-s0105t0:240_0: Evanti iminā. “Sace pana cetiyassa mahāpūjāyā”tiādikaṃ sabbampi vuttappakāraṃ paccāmasati,
tika-s0105t0:240_1: na “purisassa mātugāmāsubha”ntiādikameva. Pariggahitaṃ sātthakaṃ, sappāyañca yena
tika-s0105t0:240_2: so pariggahitasātthakasappāyo, tassa, tena yathānupubbikaṃ sampajaññapariggahaṇaṃ
tika-s0105t0:240_3: dasseti. Vuccamānayogakammassa pavattiṭṭhānatāya bhāvanāya ārammaṇaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:240_4: tadeva bhāvanāya visayabhāvato gocaranti āha “kammaṭṭhānasaṅkhātaṃ gocara”nti. Uggahetvāti
tika-s0105t0:240_5: yathā uggahanimittaṃ uppajjati, evaṃ uggahakosallassa sampādanavasena uggahaṇaṃ katvā.
tika-s0105t0:240_6: Bhikkhācāragocareti bhikkhācārasaṅkhāte gocare, anena kammaṭṭhāne, bhikkhācāre ca
tika-s0105t0:241_0: Idhāti sāsane. Haratīti kammaṭṭhānaṃ pavattanavasena neti, yāva piṇḍapātapaṭikkamā
tika-s0105t0:241_1: anuyuñjatīti attho. Na paccāharatīti āhārūpayogato yāva divāṭhānupasaṅkamanā kammaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:241_2: na paṭineti. Tatthāti tesu catūsu bhikkhūsu. Āvaraṇīyehīti nīvaraṇehi. Pagevāti pātoyeva.
tika-s0105t0:241_3: Sarīraparikammanti mukhadhovanādisarīrapaṭijagganaṃ. Dve tayo pallaṅketi dve tayo
tika-s0105t0:241_4: nisajjāvāre. Ūrubaddhāsanañhettha pallaṅko. Usumanti dve tīṇi uṇhāpanāni sandhāya
tika-s0105t0:241_5: vuttaṃ. Kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuñjitvāti tadahe mūlabhūtaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuñjitvā. Kammaṭṭhānasīsenevāti
tika-s0105t0:241_6: kammaṭṭhānamukheneva, kammaṭṭhānamavijahanto evāti vuttaṃ hoti, tena “patopi acetano”tiādinā
tika-s0105t0:241_7: vakkhamānaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ, yathāparihariyamānaṃ vā avijahitvāti dasseti.
tika-s0105t0:242_0: Gantvāti pāpuṇitvā. Buddhānussatikammaṭṭhānaṃ ce, tadeva nipaccakārasādhanaṃ. Aññañce,
tika-s0105t0:242_1: anipaccakārakaraṇamiva hotīti dassetuṃ “sace”tiādi vuttaṃ. Atabbisayena taṃ ṭhapetvā.
tika-s0105t0:242_3: Aññena pana tathāpi aññathāpi vanditabbameva. Tathevāti tikkhattumeva. Paribhogacetiyato
tika-s0105t0:242_4: sārīrikacetiyaṃ garutaranti katvā “cetiyaṃ vanditvā”ti pubbakālakiriyāvasena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:242_5: Yathāha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “cetiyaṃ bādhayamānā bodhisākhā haritabbā”ti, ayaṃ ācariyassa
tika-s0105t0:242_6: mati, “bodhiyaṅgaṇaṃ pattenāpī”ti pana vacanato yadi cetiyaṅgaṇato gate bhikkhācāramagge
tika-s0105t0:242_7: bodhiyaṅgaṇaṃ bhaveyya, sāpi vanditabbāti maggānukkameneva “cetiyaṃ vanditvā”ti pubbakālakiriyāvacanaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:242_8: na tu garukātabbatānukkamena. Evañhi sati bodhiyaṅgaṇaṃ paṭhamaṃ pattenāpi bodhiṃ
tika-s0105t0:242_9: vanditvā cetiyaṃ vanditabbaṃ, ekameva pattenāpi tadeva vanditabbaṃ, tadubhayampi
tika-s0105t0:242_10: appattena na vanditabbanti ayamattho suviññāto hoti. Bhikkhācāragatamaggena hi pattaṭṭhāne
tika-s0105t0:242_11: kattabbaantarāvattadassanametaṃ, na pana dhuvavattadassanaṃ. Pubbe hesa katavattoyeva.
tika-s0105t0:242_14: sammukhā viya nipaccakāraṃ dassetvā”ti iminā. Paṭisāmitaṭṭhānanti sopānamūlabhāvasāmaññena
tika-s0105t0:243_0: Gāmasamīpeti gāmūpacāre. Tāva pañhaṃ vā pucchanti, dhammaṃ vā sotukāmā hontīti sambandho.
tika-s0105t0:243_1: Janasaṅgahatthanti “mayi akathente etesaṃ ko kathessatī”ti dhammānuggahena mahājanassa
tika-s0105t0:243_2: saṅgahaṇatthaṃ. Aṭṭhakathācariyānaṃ vacanaṃ samatthetuṃ “dhammakathā hi kammaṭṭhānavinimuttā
tika-s0105t0:243_3: nāma natthī”ti vuttaṃ. Tasmāti yasmā “dhammakathā nāma kātabbāyevā”ti aṭṭhakathācariyā
tika-s0105t0:243_4: vadanti, yasmā vā dhammakathā kammaṭṭhānavinimuttā nāma natthi, tasmā dhammakathaṃ
tika-s0105t0:243_6: vadantī”ti etena sambandho vutto. Kammaṭṭhānasīsenevāti attanā parihariyamānaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:243_7: avijahanavasena, tadanuguṇaṃyeva dhammakathaṃ kathetvāti attho, dutiyapadepi eseva
tika-s0105t0:243_8: nayo. Anumodanaṃ katvāti etthāpi “kammaṭṭhānasīsenevā”ti adhikāro. Tatthāti gāmato
tika-s0105t0:244_2: eva, samāgamamattenevāti attho. Ānubhāvenāti anuggahabalena. Bhayeti paracakkādibhaye.
tika-s0105t0:245_1: karamānasseva, anādare cetaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. Kammajatejoti gahaṇiṃ sandhāyāha. Pajjalatīti
tika-s0105t0:245_2: uṇhabhāvaṃ janeti. Tatoyeva upādinnakaṃ gaṇhāti, sedā muccanti. Kammaṭṭhānaṃ vīthiṃ
tika-s0105t0:245_3: nārohati khudāparissamena kilantakāyassa samādhānābhāvato. Anupādinnaṃ odanādivatthu.
tika-s0105t0:245_4: Upādinnaṃ udarapaṭalaṃ. Antokucchiyañhi odanādivatthusmiṃ asati kammajatejo uṭṭhahitvā
tika-s0105t0:245_5: udarapaṭalaṃ gaṇhāti, “chātosmi, āhāraṃ me dethā”ti vadāpeti, bhuttakāle udarapaṭalaṃ
tika-s0105t0:245_6: muñcitvā vatthuṃ gaṇhāti, atha satto ekaggo hoti, yato “chāyārakkhaso viya kammajatejo”ti
tika-s0105t0:245_7: aṭṭhakathāsu vutto. So pagevāti ettha “tasmā”ti seso. Gorūpānanti gunnaṃ, gosamūhānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:245_8: vā, vajato gocaratthāya nikkhamanavelāyamevāti attho. Vuttaviparītanayena upādinnakaṃ
tika-s0105t0:245_9: muñcitvā anupādinnakaṃ gaṇhāti. Antarābhatteti bhattassa antare, yāva bhattaṃ na
tika-s0105t0:245_10: bhuñjati, tāvāti attho. Tenāha “kammaṭṭhānasīsena āhārañca paribhuñjitvā”ti. Avasesaṭṭhāneti
tika-s0105t0:245_11: yāguyā aggahitaṭṭhāne. Tatoti bhuñjanato. Poṅkhānupoṅkhanti kammaṭṭhānānupaṭṭhānassa
tika-s0105t0:245_12: anavacchedadassanametaṃ, uttaruttarinti attho, yathā poṅkhānupoṅkhaṃ pavattāya sarapaṭipāṭiyā
tika-s0105t0:245_13: anavacchedo, evametassāpi kammaṭṭhānupaṭṭhānassāti vuttaṃ hoti. “Edisā cā”tiādinā
tika-s0105t0:245_14: tathā kammaṭṭhānamanasikārassāpi sātthakabhāvaṃ dasseti. Āsananti nisajjāsanaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:246_2: cetokhīlena, vinibandhena ca sampayuttacitto. Vuttañhi majjhimāgame cetokhīlasutte –
tika-s0105t0:247: “Katamassa pañca cetokhīlā appahīnā honti? Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu satthari kaṅkhati, dhamme kaṅkhati, saṅghe kaṅkhati, sikkhāya kaṅkhati, sabrahmacārīsu kupito hotī”ti,
tika-s0105t0:248_0: “Katamassa pañca cetaso vinibandhā asamucchinnā honti? Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu kāme
tika-s0105t0:248_1: avītarāgo hoti, kāye avītarāgo hoti, rūpe avītarāgo hoti, yāvadatthaṃ udarāvadehakaṃ
tika-s0105t0:248_2: bhuñjitvā seyyasukhaṃ passasukhaṃ middhasukhaṃ anuyutto viharati, aññataraṃ devanikāyaṃ
tika-s0105t0:249_1: dassito. Cittassa kacavarakhāṇukabhāvo hi cetokhīlo, cittaṃ bandhitvā muṭṭhiyaṃ viya
tika-s0105t0:249_2: katvā gaṇhanabhāvo cetaso vinibandho. Paṭhamo cettha vicikicchādosavasena, dutiyo
tika-s0105t0:249_3: lobhavasenāti ayametesaṃ viseso. Caritvāti vicaritvā. Kammaṭṭhānavirahavasena tuccho.
tika-s0105t0:250_0: Bhāvanāsahitameva bhikkhāya gataṃ, paccāgatañca yassāti gatapaccāgatikaṃ, tadeva
tika-s0105t0:250_1: vattaṃ, tassa vasena. Attakāmāti attano hitasukhamicchantā, dhammacchandavantoti
tika-s0105t0:250_2: attho. Dhammo hi hitaṃ, sukhañca tannimittakanti. Atha vā viññūnaṃ attato nibbisesattā,
tika-s0105t0:250_3: attabhāvapariyāpannattā ca dhammo attā nāma, taṃ kāmenti icchantīti attakāmā. Adhunā
tika-s0105t0:250_4: pana atthakāmāti hitavācakena atthasaddena pāṭho dissati, dhammasaññuttaṃ hitamicchantā,
tika-s0105t0:250_5: hitabhūtaṃ vā dhammamicchantāti tassattho. Iṇaṭṭāti iṇena pīḷitā. Tathā sesapadadvayepi. Etthāti sāsane.
tika-s0105t0:251_0: Usabhaṃ nāma vīsati yaṭṭhiyo, gāvutaṃ nāma asīti usabhā. Tāya saññāyāti tādisāya
tika-s0105t0:251_3: tiṭṭhati, pacchāgato pana ṭhitimanatikkamitukāmato. Soti uppannakileso bhikkhu. Ayanti
tika-s0105t0:251_4: pacchāgato. Etanti parassa jānanaṃ. Tatthevāti patiṭṭhitaṭṭhāneyeva. Soyeva nayoti
tika-s0105t0:251_5: “ayaṃ bhikkhū”tiādikā yo patiṭṭhāne vutto, so eva nisajjāyapi nayo. Pacchato āgacchantānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:251_6: chinnabhattabhāvabhayenāpi yonisomanasikāraṃ paribrūhetīti idampi parassa jānaneneva
tika-s0105t0:251_7: saṅgahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Purimapādeyevāti paṭhamaṃ kammaṭṭhānavippayuttacittena uddharitapādavaḷañjeyeva.
tika-s0105t0:251_8: Etīti gacchati. “Ālindakavāsī mahāphussadevatthero viyā”tiādinā aṭṭhāneyevetaṃ kathitaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:252_0: Maddantāti dhaññakaraṇaṭṭhāne sālisīsādīni maddantā. Assāti therassa, ubhayāpekkhavacanametaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:252_1: Assa arahattappattadivase caṅkamanakoṭiyanti ca. Adhigamappicchatāya vikkhepaṃ katvā,
tika-s0105t0:253_0: Paṭhamaṃ tāvāti padasobhanatthaṃ pariyāyavacanaṃ. Mahāpadhānanti bhagavato dukkaracariyaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:253_1: amhākaṃ atthāya lokanāthena chabbassāni kataṃ dukkaracariyaṃ “evāhaṃ yathābalaṃ pūjessāmī”ti
tika-s0105t0:253_2: attho. Paṭipattipūjāyeva hi pasatthatarā satthupūjā, na tathā āmisapūjā. Ṭhānacaṅkamamevāti
tika-s0105t0:253_3: adhiṭṭhātabbairiyāpathavasena vuttaṃ, na bhojanakālādīsu avassaṃ kattabbanisajjāya
tika-s0105t0:253_4: paṭikkhepavasena. Evasaddena hi itarāya nisajjāya, sayanassa ca nivattanaṃ karoti.
tika-s0105t0:253_5: Vippayuttena uddhaṭe paṭinivattentoti sampayuttena uddharitapādeyeva puna ṭhapanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:253_6: sandhāyāha. “Gāmasamīpaṃ gantvā”ti vatvā tadatthaṃ vivarati “gāvī nū”tiādinā. Kacchakantaratoti
tika-s0105t0:253_7: upakacchantarato, upakacche laggitakamaṇḍalutoti vuttaṃ hoti. Udakagaṇḍūsanti udakāvagaṇḍakārakaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:253_8: Katinaṃ tithīnaṃ pūraṇī katimī, “pañcamī nu kho pakkhassa, aṭṭhamī”tiādinā divasaṃ
tika-s0105t0:253_9: vā pucchitoti attho. Anārocanassa akattabbattā āroceti. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “anujānāmi
tika-s0105t0:254_0: “Udakaṃ gilitvā ārocetī”ti vuttanayena. Tatthāti gāmadvāre. Niṭṭhubhananti udakaniṭṭhubhanaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:254_1: Tesūti manussesu. Ñāṇacakkhusampannattā cakkhumā. Īdisoti susammaṭṭhacetiyaṅgaṇādiko.
tika-s0105t0:255_0: Vīthiṃ otaritvā ito cito ca anoloketvā paṭhamameva vīthiyo sallakkhetabbāti āha “vīthiyo
tika-s0105t0:255_1: sallakkhetvā”ti. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “pāsādikena abhikkantena paṭikkantenā”tiādi.
tika-s0105t0:255_2: Taṃ gamanaṃ dassetuṃ “tattha cā”tiādimāha. “Na hi javena piṇḍapātiyadhutaṅgaṃ nāma
tika-s0105t0:255_3: kiñci atthī”ti iminā javena gamane loluppacāritā viya asāruppataṃ dasseti. Udakasakaṭanti
tika-s0105t0:255_4: udakasārasakaṭaṃ. Tañhi visamabhūmibhāgappattaṃ niccalameva kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Tadanurūpanti
tika-s0105t0:255_5: bhikkhādānānurūpaṃ. “Āhāre paṭikūlasaññaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā”tiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ
tika-s0105t0:255_6: parato āgamissati. Rathassa akkhānaṃ telena abbhañjanaṃ, vaṇassa lepanaṃ, puttamaṃsassa
tika-s0105t0:255_7: khādanañca tidhā upamā yassa āharaṇassāti tathā. Aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgatanti “yāvadeva
tika-s0105t0:255_8: imassa kāyassa ṭhitiyā, yāpanāyā”tiādinā vuttehi aṭṭhahi aṅgehi samannāgataṃ katvā.
tika-s0105t0:255_10: uppannakilamathaṃ. Purebhattādi divāvasena vuttaṃ. Purimayāmādi rattivasena.
tika-s0105t0:256_0: Gatapaccāgatesu kammaṭṭhānassa haraṇaṃ vattanti atthaṃ dassento “haraṇapaccāharaṇasaṅkhāta”nti
tika-s0105t0:256_1: āha. “Yadi upanissayasampanno hotī”ti idaṃ “devaputto hutvā”tiādīsupi sabbattha sambajjhitabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:256_2: Tattha paccekabodhiyā upanissayasampadā kappānaṃ dve asaṅkhyeyyāni, satasahassañca
tika-s0105t0:256_4: kappasatasahassañca, mahāsāvakānaṃ kappasatasahassameva, itaresaṃ pana atītāsu jātīsu
tika-s0105t0:256_6: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhānantare etadaggaṭṭhapitānaṃ therānaṃ sakkhidassanaṃ. Tattha thero
tika-s0105t0:256_7: bāhiyo dārucīriyoti bāhiyavisaye sañjātasaṃvaḍḍhatāya bāhiyo, dārucīrapariharaṇato
tika-s0105t0:256_8: dārucīriyoti ca samaññito thero. So hāyasmā –
tika-s0105t0:257_0: “Tasmā tiha te bāhiya evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ ‘diṭṭhe diṭṭhamattaṃ bhavissati, sute, mute,
tika-s0105t0:257_1: viññāte viññātamattaṃ bhavissatī’ti, evañhi te bāhiya sikkhitabbaṃ. Yato kho te bāhiya
tika-s0105t0:257_2: diṭṭhe diṭṭhamattaṃ bhavissati, sute, mute, viññāte viññātamattaṃ bhavissati, tato
tika-s0105t0:257_3: tvaṃ bāhiya na tena. Yato tvaṃ bāhiya na tena, tato bāhiya na tattha. Yato tvaṃ bāhiya
tika-s0105t0:257_4: na tattha, tato tvaṃ bāhiya nevidha na huraṃ na ubhayamantarena, esevanto dukkhassā’ti”.
tika-s0105t0:258_0: Ettakāya desanāya arahattaṃ sacchākāsi. Evaṃ sāriputtattherādīnampi mahāpaññatādidīpanāni
tika-s0105t0:258_1: suttapadāni vitthārato vattabbāni. Visesato pana aṅguttarāgame etadaggasuttapadāni
tika-s0105t0:259_0: Tanti asammuyhanaṃ. Evanti idāni vuccamānākārena veditabbaṃ. “Attā abhikkamatī”ti
tika-s0105t0:259_1: iminā diṭṭhigāhavasena, “ahaṃ abhikkamāmī”ti iminā mānagāhavasena, tadubhayassa pana
tika-s0105t0:259_2: vinā taṇhāya appavattanato taṇhāgāhavasenāti tīhipi maññanāhi andhabālaputhujjanassa
tika-s0105t0:259_3: abhikkame sammuyhanaṃ dasseti. “Tathā asammuyhanto”ti vatvā tadeva asammuyhanaṃ yena
tika-s0105t0:259_5: teneva abhikkamanacittena samuṭṭhānā, taṃcittasamuṭṭhānikā vā vāyodhātu. Viññattinti
tika-s0105t0:259_6: kāyaviññattiṃ. Janayamānā uppajjati tassā vikārabhāvato. Itīti tasmā uppajjanato.
tika-s0105t0:259_8: Tassāti aṭṭhisaṅghāṭassa. Abhikkamatoti abhikkamantassa. Omattāti avamattā lāmakappamāṇā.
tika-s0105t0:260_0: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yasmā cettha vāyodhātuyā anugatā tejodhātu uddharaṇassa paccayo.
tika-s0105t0:260_1: Uddharaṇagatikā hi tejodhātu, tena tassā uddharaṇe vāyodhātuyā anugatabhāvo hoti,
tika-s0105t0:260_2: tasmā imāsaṃ dvinnamettha sāmatthiyato adhimattatā, tathā abhāvato pana itarāsaṃ
tika-s0105t0:260_3: omattatāti. Yasmā pana tejodhātuyā anugatā vāyodhātu atiharaṇavītiharaṇānaṃ paccayo.
tika-s0105t0:260_4: Kiriyagatikāya hi vāyodhātuyā atiharaṇavītiharaṇesu sātisayo byāpāro, tena tassā
tika-s0105t0:260_5: tattha tejodhātuyā anugatabhāvo hoti, tasmā imāsaṃ dvinnamettha sāmatthiyato adhimattatā,
tika-s0105t0:260_6: itarāsañca tadabhāvato omattatāti dasseti “tathā atiharaṇavītiharaṇesū”ti iminā.
tika-s0105t0:260_8: tathāsaddaggahaṇaṃ kataṃ. Paṭhame hi naye tejodhātuyā anugamakatā, vāyodhātuyā anugantabbatā,
tika-s0105t0:260_9: dutiye pana vāyodhātuyā anugamakatā, tejodhātuyā anugantabbatāti. Tattha akkantaṭṭhānato
tika-s0105t0:260_10: pādassa ukkhipanaṃ uddharaṇaṃ, ṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ atikkamitvā purato haraṇaṃ atiharaṇaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:260_12: vītiharaṇaṃ, yāva patiṭṭhitapādo, tāva haraṇaṃ atiharaṇaṃ, tato paraṃ haraṇaṃ vītiharaṇanti
tika-s0105t0:261_0: Yasmā pathavīdhātuyā anugatā āpodhātu vossajjane paccayo. Garutarasabhāvā hi āpodhātu,
tika-s0105t0:261_1: tena tassā vossajjane pathavīdhātuyā anugatabhāvo hoti, tasmā tāsaṃ dvinnamettha
tika-s0105t0:261_2: sāmatthiyato adhimattatā, itarāsañca tadabhāvato omattatāti dassento āha “vossajjane…pe…
tika-s0105t0:261_3: balavatiyo”ti. Yasmā pana āpodhātuyā anugatā pathavīdhātu sannikkhepanassa paccayo.
tika-s0105t0:261_4: Patiṭṭhābhāve viya patiṭṭhāpanepi tassā sātisayakiccattā āpodhātuyā tassā anugatabhāvo
tika-s0105t0:261_5: hoti, tathā ghaṭṭanakiriyāya pathavīdhātuyā vasena sannirujjhanassa sijjhanato tassā
tika-s0105t0:261_6: sannirujjhanepi āpodhātuyā anugatabhāvo hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ “tathā sannikkhepanasannirujjhanesū”ti.
tika-s0105t0:262_1: kataṃ. Paṭhame hi naye pathavīdhātuyā anugamakatā, āpodhātuyā anugantabbatā, dutiye
tika-s0105t0:262_2: pana āpodhātuyā anugamakatā, pathavīdhātuyā anugantabbatāti. Vossajjanañcettha pādassa
tika-s0105t0:262_3: onāmanavasena vossaggo, tato paraṃ bhūmiādīsu patiṭṭhāpanaṃ sannikkhepanaṃ, patiṭṭhāpetvā
tika-s0105t0:263_0: Tatthāti tasmiṃ atikkamane, tesu vā yathāvuttesu uddharaṇātiharaṇavītiharaṇavossajjanasannikkhepanasannirujjhanasaṅkhātesu
tika-s0105t0:263_1: chasu koṭṭhāsesu. Uddharaṇeti uddharaṇakkhaṇe. Rūpārūpadhammāti uddharaṇākārena pavattā
tika-s0105t0:263_2: rūpadhammā, taṃsamuṭṭhāpakā ca arūpadhammā. Atiharaṇaṃ na pāpuṇanti khaṇamattāvaṭṭhānato.
tika-s0105t0:263_3: Sabbattha esa nayo. Tattha tatthevāti yattha yattha uddharaṇādike uppannā, tattha
tika-s0105t0:263_4: tattheva. Na hi dhammānaṃ desantarasaṅkamanaṃ atthi lahuparivattanato. Pabbaṃ pabbanti
tika-s0105t0:263_5: paricchedaṃ paricchedaṃ. Sandhi sandhīti gaṇṭhi gaṇṭhi. Odhi odhīti bhāgaṃ bhāgaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:263_6: Sabbañcetaṃ uddharaṇādikoṭṭhāse sandhāya sabhāgasantativasena vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:263_7: Itaro eva hi rūpadhammānampi pavattikkhaṇo gamanayogagamanassādānaṃ devaputtānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:263_8: heṭṭhupariyena paṭimukhaṃ dhāvantānaṃ sirasi, pāde ca bandhakhuradhārāsamāgamatopi
tika-s0105t0:263_9: sīghataro, yathā tilānaṃ bhijjayamānānaṃ paṭapaṭāyanena bhedo lakkhīyati, evaṃ saṅkhatadhammānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:263_10: uppādenāti dassanatthaṃ “paṭapaṭāyantā”ti vuttaṃ, uppādavasena paṭapaṭa-saddaṃ akarontāpi
tika-s0105t0:263_11: karontā viyāti attho. Tilabhedalakkhaṇaṃ paṭapaṭāyanaṃ viya hi saṅkhatabhedalakkhaṇaṃ
tika-s0105t0:263_12: uppādo uppannānamekantato bhinnattā. Tatthāti abhikkamane. Ko eko abhikkamati nābhikkamatiyeva.
tika-s0105t0:263_13: Kassa vā ekassa abhikkamanaṃ siyā, na siyā eva. Kasmā? Paramatthato hi…pe… dhātūnaṃ
tika-s0105t0:263_14: sayanaṃ, tasmāti attho. Andhabālaputhujjanasammūḷhassa attano abhikkamananivattanañhetaṃ
tika-s0105t0:263_15: vacanaṃ. Atha vā “ko eko…pe… abhikkamana”nti codanāya “paramatthato hī”tiādinā sodhanā vuttā.
tika-s0105t0:264_0: Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ koṭṭhāseti yathāvutte chabbidhepi koṭṭhāse gamanādikassa apaccāmaṭṭhattā.
tika-s0105t0:264_1: “Saddhiṃ rūpena uppajjate, nirujjhatī”ti ca silokapadena saha sambandho. Tattha paṭhamapadasambandhe
tika-s0105t0:264_2: rūpenāti yena kenaci sahuppajjanakena rūpena. Dutiyapadasambandhe pana “rūpenā”ti
tika-s0105t0:264_3: idaṃ yaṃ tato nirujjhamānacittato upari sattarasamacittassa uppādakkhaṇe uppannaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:264_4: tadeva tassa nirujjhamānacittassa nirodhena saddhiṃ nirujjhanakaṃ sattarasacittakkhaṇāyukaṃ
tika-s0105t0:264_5: rūpaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, aññathā rūpārūpadhammā samānāyukā siyuṃ. Yadi ca siyuṃ, atha
tika-s0105t0:264_7: ekadhammampi samanupassāmi, yaṃ evaṃ lahuparivattaṃ, yathayidaṃ citta”nti evamādipāḷivacanehi
tika-s0105t0:264_8: ca virodho siyā. Cittacetasikā hi sārammaṇasabhāvā yathābalaṃ attano ārammaṇapaccayabhūtamatthaṃ
tika-s0105t0:264_9: vibhāvento eva uppajjanti, tasmā tesaṃ taṃsabhāvanipphattianantaraṃ nirodho, rūpadhammā
tika-s0105t0:264_10: pana anārammaṇā pakāsetabbā, evaṃ tesaṃ pakāsetabbabhāvanipphatti soḷasahi cittehi
tika-s0105t0:264_11: hoti, tasmā ekacittakkhaṇātītena saha sattarasacittakkhaṇāyukatā rūpadhammānamicchitāti.
tika-s0105t0:264_13: ca viññāṇassa lahuparivattitā, dandhamahābhūtapaccayatāya rūpassa garuparivattitā.
tika-s0105t0:264_14: Yathābhūtaṃ nānādhātuñāṇaṃ kho pana tathāgatasseva, tena ca purejātapaccayo rūpadhammova
tika-s0105t0:264_15: vutto, pacchājātapaccayo ca tathevāti rūpārūpadhammānaṃ samānakkhaṇatā na yujjateva,
tika-s0105t0:264_16: tasmā vuttanayenevettha attho veditabboti ācariyena vuttaṃ, tadetaṃ cittānuparivattiyā
tika-s0105t0:264_17: viññattiyā ekanirodhabhāvassa suviññeyyattā evaṃ vuttaṃ. Tato saviññattikena puretaraṃ
tika-s0105t0:264_18: sattarasamacittassa uppādakkhaṇe uppannena rūpena saddhiṃ aññaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhatīti
tika-s0105t0:264_19: attho veditabbo. Aññaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhati, aññaṃ uppajjate cittanti yojetabbaṃ. Añño
tika-s0105t0:264_20: hi saddakkamo, añño atthakkamoti. Yañhi purimuppannaṃ cittaṃ, taṃ nirujjhantaṃ aññassa
tika-s0105t0:264_21: pacchā uppajjamānassa anantarādipaccayabhāveneva nirujjhati, tathā laddhapaccayameva
tika-s0105t0:264_22: aññampi uppajjate cittaṃ, avatthāvisesato cettha aññathā. Yadi evaṃ tesamubhinnaṃ
tika-s0105t0:264_23: antaro labbheyyāti codanaṃ “no”ti apanetumāha “avīci manusambandho”ti, yathā vīci
tika-s0105t0:264_24: antaro na labbhati, tadevedanti avisesaṃ vidū maññanti, evaṃ anu anu sambandho cittasantāno,
tika-s0105t0:264_25: rūpasantāno ca nadīsotova nadiyaṃ udakappavāho viya vattatīti attho. Avīcīti hi nirantaratāvasena
tika-s0105t0:265_0: Abhimukhaṃ lokitaṃ ālokitanti āha “puratopekkhana”nti. Yaṃdisābhimukho gacchati,
tika-s0105t0:265_1: tiṭṭhati, nisīdati, sayati vā, tadabhimukhaṃ pekkhananti vuttaṃ hoti. Yasmā ca tādisamālokitaṃ
tika-s0105t0:265_2: nāma hoti, tasmā tadanugatadisālokanaṃ vilokitanti āha “anudisāpekkhana”nti, abhimukhadisānurūpagatesu
tika-s0105t0:265_3: vāmadakkhiṇapassesu vividhā pekkhananti vuttaṃ hoti. Heṭṭhāuparipacchāpekkhanañhi
tika-s0105t0:265_7: ca siyā sambhavoti āha “iminā vā”tiādi, etena upalakkhaṇamattañcetanti dasseti.
tika-s0105t0:266_0: Kāyasakkhinti kāyena sacchikataṃ paccakkhakārinaṃ, sādhakanti attho. So hi āyasmā
tika-s0105t0:266_1: vipassanākāle “yamevāhaṃ indriyesu aguttadvārataṃ nissāya sāsane anabhiratiādivippakāraṃ
tika-s0105t0:266_2: patto, tameva suṭṭhu niggahessāmī”ti ussāhajāto balavahirottappo, tattha ca katādhikārattā
tika-s0105t0:266_3: indriyasaṃvare ukkaṃsapāramippatto, teneva naṃ satthā “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:266_4: bhikkhūnaṃ indriyesu guttadvārānaṃ, yadidaṃ nando”ti etadagge ṭhapesi. Nandassāti
tika-s0105t0:267_0: Sātthakatā ca sappāyatā ca veditabbā ālokitavilokitassāti ajjhāharitvā sambandho.
tika-s0105t0:267_3: kātabbaṃ, na añño upāyo gavesitabboti adhippāyo. Kammaṭṭhānasīsenevāti vakkhamānakammaṭṭhānamukheneva.
tika-s0105t0:267_4: Yasmā pana ālokitādi nāma dhammamattasseva pavattiviseso, tasmā tassa yāthāvato jānanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:267_5: asammohasampajaññanti dassetuṃ “abbhantare”tiādi vuttaṃ. Āloketāti ālokento. Tathā
tika-s0105t0:267_6: viloketā. Viññattinti kāyaviññattiṃ. Itīti tasmā uppajjanato. Cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāravasenāti
tika-s0105t0:267_8: akkhipaṭalaṃ. Adho sīdatīti osīdantaṃ viya heṭṭhā gacchati. Uddhaṃ laṅghetīti laṅghentaṃ
tika-s0105t0:267_9: viya upari gacchati. Yantakenāti akkhidalesu yojitarajjuyo gahetvā paribbhamanakacakkena.
tika-s0105t0:267_11: mūlapariññā. Āgantukassa abbhāgatassa, tāvakālikassa ca taṅkhaṇamattapavattakassa
tika-s0105t0:268_0: Tatthāti tesu gāthāya dassitesu sattasu cittesu. Aṅgakiccaṃ sādhayamānanti padhānabhūtaaṅgakiccaṃ
tika-s0105t0:268_1: nipphādentaṃ, sarīraṃ hutvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Bhavaṅgañhi paṭisandhisadisattā padhānamaṅgaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:268_2: padhānañca “sarīra”nti vuccati, avicchedappavattihetubhāvena vā kāraṇakiccaṃ sādhayamānanti
tika-s0105t0:268_3: attho. Taṃ āvaṭṭetvāti bhavaṅgasāmaññavasena vuttaṃ, pavattākāravisesavasena pana
tika-s0105t0:268_4: atītādinā tibbidhaṃ, tattha ca bhavaṅgupacchedasseva āvaṭṭanaṃ. Tannirodhāti tassa
tika-s0105t0:268_6: idaṃ pañcadvārikavīthiyaṃ “ayaṃ itthī, ayaṃ puriso”ti rajjanadussanamuyhanānamabhāvaṃ
tika-s0105t0:268_7: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tattha hi āvajjanavoṭṭhabbanānaṃ puretaraṃ pavattāyonisomanasikāravasena
tika-s0105t0:268_8: ayoniso āvajjanavoṭṭhabbanākārena pavattanato iṭṭhe itthirūpādimhi lobhasahagatamattaṃ
tika-s0105t0:268_9: javanaṃ uppajjati, aniṭṭhe ca dosasahagatamattaṃ, na panekantarajjanadussanādi, manodvāre
tika-s0105t0:268_10: eva ekantarajjanadussanādi hoti, tassa pana manodvārikassa rajjanadussanādino pañcadvārikajavanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:268_11: mūlaṃ, yathāvuttaṃ vā sabbampi bhavaṅgādi, evaṃ manodvārikajavanassa mūlakāraṇavasena
tika-s0105t0:268_12: mūlapariññā vuttā, āgantukatāvakālikatā pana pañcadvārika javanasseva apubbabhāvavasena,
tika-s0105t0:268_13: ittaratāvasena ca. Yuddhamaṇḍaleti saṅgāmappadese. Heṭṭhupariyavasenāti heṭṭhā ca
tika-s0105t0:268_14: upari ca parivattamānavasena, aparāparaṃ bhavaṅguppattivasenāti attho. Tathā bhavaṅguppādavasena
tika-s0105t0:268_15: hi tesaṃ bhijjitvā patanaṃ, iminā pana heṭṭhimassa, uparimassa ca bhavaṅgassa aparāparuppattivasena
tika-s0105t0:268_16: pañcadvārikajavanato visadisassa manodvārikajavanassa uppādaṃ dasseti tassa vaseneva
tika-s0105t0:269_1: Tanti javanaṃ. Cakkhudvāre rūpassa āpāthagamanena āvajjanādīnaṃ pavattanato pavattikāraṇavaseneva
tika-s0105t0:269_2: “gehabhūte”ti vuttaṃ, na nissayavasena. Āgantukapuriso viyāti abbhāgatapuriso viya.
tika-s0105t0:269_3: Duvidhā hi āgantukā atithiabbhāgatavasena. Tattha kataparicayo “atithī”ti vuccati,
tika-s0105t0:269_5: javanassa rajjanadussanamuyhanaṃ ayuttanti sambandho. Āsinesūti nisinnesu. Āṇākaraṇanti attano vasakaraṇaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:270_0: Saddhiṃ sampayuttadhammehi phassādīhi. Tattha tattheva sakakiccanipphādanaṭṭhāne
tika-s0105t0:270_1: bhijjanti. Itīti tasmā āvajjanādivoṭṭhabbanapariyosānānaṃ bhijjanato. Ittarānīti
tika-s0105t0:270_2: aciraṭṭhitikāni. Tatthāti tasmiṃ vacane ayaṃ upamāti attho. Udayabbayaparicchinno
tika-s0105t0:270_3: tāva tattako kālo etesanti tāvakālikāni, tassa bhāvo, taṃvasena.
tika-s0105t0:271: Etanti asammohasampajaññaṃ. Etthāti etasmiṃ yathāvuttadhammasamudāye. Dassanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ, tassa vaseneva ālokanavilokanapaññāyanato āvajjanādīnamaggahaṇaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:272_0: Samavāyeti sāmaggiyaṃ. Tatthāti pañcakkhandhavasena ālokanavilokana paññāyamāne.
tika-s0105t0:272_1: Nimittatthe cetaṃ bhummaṃ, tabbinimuttako ko eko āloketi na tveva āloketi. Ko ca
tika-s0105t0:273_0: “Tathā”tiādi āyatanavasena, dhātuvasena ca dassanaṃ. Cakkhurūpāni yathārahaṃ dassanassa
tika-s0105t0:273_1: nissayārammaṇapaccayo, tathā āvajjanā anantarādipaccayo, āloko upanissayapaccayoti
tika-s0105t0:273_2: dassanassa suttantanayena pariyāyato paccayatā vuttā. Sahajātapaccayopi dassanasseva,
tika-s0105t0:274_0: Idāni yathāpāṭhaṃ samiñjanapasāraṇesu sampajānaṃ vibhāvento “samiñjite pasārite”tiādimāha.
tika-s0105t0:274_1: Tattha pabbānanti pabbabhūtānaṃ. Taṃsamiñjanapasāraṇeneva hi sabbesaṃ hatthapādānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:274_2: samiñjanapasāraṇaṃ hoti, pabbametesanti vā pabbā yathā “saddho”ti, pabbavantānanti
tika-s0105t0:274_3: attho. Cittavasenevāti cittaruciyā eva, cittasāmatthiyā vā. Yaṃ yaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati
tika-s0105t0:274_4: sātthepi anatthepi samiñjituṃ, pasārituṃ vā, taṃtaṃcittānugateneva samiñjanapasāraṇamakatvāti
tika-s0105t0:274_5: vuttaṃ hoti. Tatthāti samiñjanapasāraṇesu atthānatthapariggaṇhanaṃ veditabbanti sambandho.
tika-s0105t0:274_6: Khaṇe khaṇeti tathā ṭhitakkhaṇassa byāpanicchāvacanaṃ. Vedanāti santhambhanādīhi
tika-s0105t0:274_7: rujjanā. “Vedanā uppajjatī”tiādinā paramparapayojanaṃ dasseti. Tathā “tā vedanā nuppajjantī”tiādināpi.
tika-s0105t0:274_8: Purimaṃ purimañhi pacchimassa pacchimassa kāraṇavacanaṃ. Kāleti samiñjituṃ, pasārituṃ
tika-s0105t0:274_9: vā yuttakāle. Phātinti vuddhiṃ. Jhānādi pana viseso.
tika-s0105t0:275_0: Tatrāyaṃ nayoti sappāyāsappāyaapariggaṇhane vatthusandassanasaṃṅkhāto nayo. Tadapariggahaṇe
tika-s0105t0:275_1: ādīnavadassaneneva pariggahaṇepi ānisaṃso vibhāvitoti tesamidha udāharaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:275_2: Mahācetiyaṅgaṇeti duṭṭhagāmaṇiraññā katassa hemamālīnāmakassa mahācetiyassa aṅgaṇe. Vuttañhi –
tika-s0105t0:277: Evaṃ kirāha nattā te, duṭṭhagāmaṇi bhūpati.
tika-s0105t0:280_0: Bhūmippadeso cettha aṅgaṇaṃ “udaṅgaṇe tattha papaṃ avindu”ntiādisu viya, tasmā upacārabhūte
tika-s0105t0:280_1: susaṅkhate bhūmippadeseti attho. Teneva kāraṇena gihī jātoti kāyasaṃsaggasamāpajjanahetunā
tika-s0105t0:280_2: ukkaṇṭhito hutvā hīnāyāvatto. Jhāyīti jhāyanaṃ ḍayhanamāpajji. Mahācetiyaṅgaṇepi
tika-s0105t0:280_3: cīvarakuṭiṃ katvā tattha sajjhāyaṃ gaṇhantīti vuttaṃ “cīvarakuṭidaṇḍake”ti, cīvarakuṭiyā
tika-s0105t0:280_4: cīvarachadanatthāya katadaṇḍaketi attho. “Maṇisappo nāma sīhaḷadīpe vijjamānā ekā
tika-s0105t0:280_5: sappajātīti vadantī”ti ācariyānandattherena, ācariyadhammapālattherena ca vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:280_6: “Keci, apare, aññe”ti vā avatvā “vadanti”cceva vacanañca sārato gahetabbatāviññāpanatthaṃ
tika-s0105t0:280_7: aññathā gahetabbassa avacanato, tasmā na nīlasappādi idha “maṇisappo”ti veditabbo.
tika-s0105t0:281_0: Mahātheravatthunāti evaṃnāmakassa therassa vatthunā. Antevāsikehīti tattha nisinnesu
tika-s0105t0:281_1: bahūsu antevāsikesu ekena antevāsikena. Tenāha “taṃ antevāsikā pucchiṃsū”ti. Kammaṭṭhānanti
tika-s0105t0:281_3: hi attho viññāyatīti. Tattha ṭhitānaṃ pucchantānaṃ saṅgahaṇavasena “tumhehī”ti puna
tika-s0105t0:281_4: puthuvacanakaraṇaṃ. Evaṃ rūpaṃ sabhāvo yassāti evarūpo niggahitalopavasena tena,
tika-s0105t0:281_5: kammaṭṭhānamanasikārasabhāvenāti attho. Evametthāpīti api-saddena heṭṭhā vuttaṃ ālokitavilokitapakkhamapekkhanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:282_0: Suttākaḍḍhanavasenāti yante yojitasuttānaṃ āviñchanavasena. Dāruyantassāti dārunā
tika-s0105t0:282_1: katayantarūpassa. Taṃ taṃ kiriyaṃ yāti pāpuṇāti, hatthapādādīhi vā taṃ taṃ ākāraṃ
tika-s0105t0:282_2: kurumānaṃ yāti gacchatīti yantaṃ, naṭakādipañcālikārūpaṃ, dārunā kataṃ yantaṃ tathā,
tika-s0105t0:282_3: nidassanamattañcetaṃ. Tathā hi naṃ potthena vatthena alaṅkariyattā potthalikā, pañca
tika-s0105t0:282_4: aṅgāni yassā sajīvassevāti pañcālikāti ca voharanti. Hatthapādalaḷananti hatthapādānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:284_1: Ghananti appitaṃ. Dupaṭṭanti nidassanamattaṃ. “Utuddhaṭānaṃ dussānaṃ catugguṇaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ,
tika-s0105t0:284_2: diguṇaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ, diguṇaṃ antaravāsakaṃ, paṃsukūle yāvadattha”nti hi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:284_3: Viparītanti tadubhayato viparītaṃ, tesaṃ tiṇṇampi asappāyaṃ. Kasmāti āha “aggaḷādidānenā”tiādi.
tika-s0105t0:284_4: Uddharitvā allīyāpanakhaṇḍaṃ aggaḷaṃ. Ādisaddena tunnakammādīni saṅgaṇhāti. Tathā-saddo
tika-s0105t0:284_5: anukaḍḍhanattho, asappāyamevāti. Paṭṭuṇṇadese pāṇakehi sañjātavatthaṃ paṭṭuṇṇaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:284_6: Vākavisesamayaṃ setavaṇṇaṃ dukūlaṃ. Ādisaddena koseyyakambalādikaṃ sānulomaṃ kappiyacīvaraṃ
tika-s0105t0:284_7: saṅgaṇhāti. Kasmāti vuttaṃ “tādisañhī”tiādi. Araññe ekakassa nivāsantarāyakaranti
tika-s0105t0:284_8: brahmacariyantarāyekadesamāha. Corādisādhāraṇato ca tathā vuttaṃ. Nippariyāyena taṃ
tika-s0105t0:284_9: asappāyanti sambandho. Aneneva yathāvuttamasappāyaṃ anekantaṃ tathārūpapaccayena
tika-s0105t0:284_10: kassaci kadāci sappāyasambhavato. Idaṃ pana dvayaṃ ekantameva asappāyaṃ kassaci kadācipi
tika-s0105t0:284_11: sappāyābhāvatoti dasseti. Micchā ājīvanti etenāti micchājīvo, anesanavasena paccayapariyesanapayogo.
tika-s0105t0:284_12: Nimittakammādīhi pavatto micchājīvo tathā, etena ekavīsatividhaṃ anesanapayogamāha.
tika-s0105t0:285_0: “Yo imasmiṃ sāsane pabbajitvā attānaṃ na sammā payojeti, khaṇḍasīlo hoti, ekavīsatividhaṃ
tika-s0105t0:285_1: anesanaṃ nissāya jīvikaṃ kappeti. Seyyathidaṃ? Veḷudānaṃ, pattadānaṃ, puppha, phala,
tika-s0105t0:285_2: dantakaṭṭha, mukhodaka, sināna, cuṇṇa, mattikādānaṃ, cāṭukamyataṃ, muggasūpyataṃ,
tika-s0105t0:285_3: pāribhaṭutaṃ, jaṅghapesanikaṃ, vejjakammaṃ, dūtakammaṃ, pahiṇagamanaṃ, piṇḍapaṭipiṇḍaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:287_0: “Ekavīsati anesanā nāma vejjakammaṃ karoti, dūtakammaṃ karoti, pahiṇakammaṃ karoti,
tika-s0105t0:287_1: gaṇḍaṃ phāleti, arumakkhanaṃ deti, uddhaṃvirecanaṃ deti, adhovirecanaṃ deti, natthutelaṃ
tika-s0105t0:287_2: pacati, vaṇatelaṃ pacati, veḷudānaṃ deti, patta, puppha, phala, sināna, dantakaṭṭha,
tika-s0105t0:287_3: mukhodaka, cuṇṇa, mattikādānaṃ deti, cāṭukammaṃ karoti, muggasūpiyaṃ, pāribhaṭuṃ,
tika-s0105t0:287_4: jaṅghapesanikaṃ dvāvīsatimaṃ dūtakammena sadisaṃ, tasmā ekavīsatī”ti.
tika-s0105t0:288_0: Aṭṭhakathāvacanañcettha brahmajālādisuttantanayena vuttaṃ, ṭīkāvacanaṃ pana khuddakavatthuvibhaṅgādiabhidhammanayena,
tika-s0105t0:288_1: ato cettha kesañci visamatāti vadanti, vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbaṃ. Apica “nimittakammādī”ti
tika-s0105t0:288_2: iminā nimittobhāsaparikathāyo vuttā. “Micchājīvo”ti pana yathāvuttapayogo, tasmā
tika-s0105t0:288_3: nimittakammañca micchājīvo ca, tabbasena uppannaṃ asappāyaṃ sīlavināsanena anatthāvahattāti
tika-s0105t0:288_4: attho. Samāhāradvandepi hi katthaci pulliṅgapayogo dissati yathā “cittuppādo”ti.
tika-s0105t0:288_5: Atiruciye rāgādayo, atiaruciye ca dosādayoti āha “akusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhantī”ti.
tika-s0105t0:289_0: “Abbhantare attā nāmā”tiādinā saṅkhepato asammohasampajaññaṃ dassetvā “tattha cīvarampi
tika-s0105t0:289_1: acetana”ntiādinā cīvarassa viya “kāyopi acetano”ti kāyassa attasuññatāvibhāvanena
tika-s0105t0:289_2: tamatthaṃ paridīpento “tasmā neva sundaraṃ cīvaraṃ labhitvā”tiādinā vuttassa itarītarasantosassa
tika-s0105t0:289_3: kāraṇaṃ vibhāvetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Evañhi sambandho vattabbo – asammohasampajaññaṃ dassento
tika-s0105t0:290_0: Tattha abbhantareti attano santāne. Tatthāti tasmiṃ cīvarapārupane. Tesu vā pārupakattapārupitabbacīvaresu.
tika-s0105t0:290_1: Kāyopīti attapaññattimatto kāyopi. “Tasmā”ti ajjhāharitabbaṃ, acetanattāti attho.
tika-s0105t0:290_2: Ahanti kammabhūto kāyo. Dhātuyoti cīvarasaṅkhāto bāhirā dhātuyo. Dhātusamūhanti kāyasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-s0105t0:290_3: ajjhattikaṃ dhātusamūhaṃ. Potthakarūpapaṭicchādane dhātuyo dhātusamūhaṃ paṭicchādenti
tika-s0105t0:290_4: viyāti sambandho. Pusanaṃ snehasecanaṃ, pūraṇaṃ vā potthaṃ, lepanakhananakiriyā,
tika-s0105t0:290_5: tena katanti potthakaṃ, tameva rūpaṃ tathā, khananakammanibbattaṃ dārumattikādirūpamidhādhippetaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:291_0: Nāgānaṃ nivāso vammiko nāgavammiko. Cittīkaraṇaṭṭhānabhūto rukkho cetiyarukkho. Kehici
tika-s0105t0:291_1: sakkatassāpi kehici asakkatassa kāyassa upamānabhāvena yogyattā tesamidha kathanaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:291_2: Tehīti mālāgandhagūthamuttādīhi. Attasuññatāya nāgavammikacetiyarukkhādīhi viya kāyasaṅkhātena
tika-s0105t0:291_3: attanā somanassaṃ vā domanassaṃ vā na kātabbanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t0:292: “Labhissāmi vā, no vā”ti paccavekkhaṇapubbakena “labhissāmī”ti atthasampassaneneva gahetabbaṃ. Evañhi sātthakasampajaññaṃ bhavatīti āha “sahasāva aggahetvā”tiādi.
tika-s0105t0:293_0: Garupattoti atibhārabhūto patto. Cattāro vā pañca vā gaṇṭhikā catupañcagaṇṭhikā yathā
tika-s0105t0:293_1: “dvattipattā, chappañcavācā”ti aññapadabhūtassa hi vā-saddasseva attho idha padhāno
tika-s0105t0:293_2: catugaṇṭhikāhato vā pañcagaṇṭhikāhato vā patto dubbisodhanīyoti vikappanavasena atthassa
tika-s0105t0:293_3: gayhamānattā. Āhatā catupañcagaṇṭhikā yassāti catupañcagaṇṭhikāhato yathā “agyāhito”ti,
tika-s0105t0:293_4: catupañcagaṇṭhikāhi vā āhato tathā, dubbisodhanīyabhāvassa hetugabbhavacanañcetaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:293_6: vutto, dubbisodhanīyatāmattena pana palibodhakaraṇato idha asappāyoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:293_8: dhovantassevā”tiādi tadubhayassāpi asappāyabhāve kāraṇaṃ. “Maṇivaṇṇapatto pana lobhanīyo”ti
tika-s0105t0:293_9: iminā kiñcāpi so vinayapariyāyena kappiyo, suttantapariyāyena pana antarāyakaraṇato
tika-s0105t0:293_10: asappāyoti dasseti. “Pattaṃ bhamaṃ āropetvā majjitvā pacanti ‘maṇivaṇṇaṃ karissāmā’ti,
tika-s0105t0:293_11: na vaṭṭatī”ti hi vinayaṭṭhakathāsu pacanakiriyāmattameva paṭikkhittaṃ. Tathā hi vadanti
tika-s0105t0:293_12: “maṇivaṇṇaṃ pana pattaṃ aññena kataṃ labhitvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti “tādisañhi
tika-s0105t0:293_14: laddho pana ekantaakappiyo sīlavināsanena anatthāvahattā”tiādinā amhehi vuttanayopi
tika-s0105t0:293_15: yathārahaṃ netabbo. Sevamānassāti hetvanto gadhavacanaṃ abhivaḍḍhanaparihāyanassa.
tika-s0105t0:294_1: kammārānaṃ ayogahaṇavisesena. Aggivaṇṇapattaggahaṇeti agginā jhāpitattā aggivaṇṇabhūtapattassa
tika-s0105t0:294_2: gahaṇe. Rāgādipariḷāhajanakapattassa īdisameva upamānaṃ yuttanti evaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:295_1: anāthamanusseti sambandho. Nīlamakkhikā nāma āsāṭikakārikā. Gavādīnañhi vaṇesu nīlamakkhikāhi
tika-s0105t0:295_2: katā anayabyasanahetubhūtā aṇḍakā āsāṭikā nāma vuccati. Anāthasālāyanti anāthānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:295_3: nivāsasālāyaṃ. Dayālukāti karuṇābahulā. Vaṇamattacoḷakānīti vaṇappamāṇena paṭicchādanatthāya
tika-s0105t0:295_4: chinnacoḷakhaṇḍakāni. Kesañcīti bahūsu kesañci anāthamanussānaṃ. Thūlānīti thaddhāni.
tika-s0105t0:295_5: Tatthāti tasmiṃ pāpuṇane, bhāvalakkhaṇe, nimitte vā etaṃ bhummaṃ. Kasmāti vuttaṃ
tika-s0105t0:295_6: “vaṇapaṭicchādanamattenevā”tiādi. Coḷakena, kapālenāti ca atthayoge kammatthe tatiyā,
tika-s0105t0:295_7: karaṇatthe vā. Vaṇapaṭicchādanamatteneva bhesajjakaraṇamattenevāti pana visesanaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:295_8: na pana maṇḍanānubhavanādippakārena atthoti. Saṅkhāradukkhatādīhi niccāturassa kāyassa
tika-s0105t0:295_9: paribhogabhūtānaṃ pattacīvarānaṃ edisameva upamānamupapannanti tathā vacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:295_10: Sukhumattasallakkhaṇena uttamassa sampajānassa karaṇasīlattā, purimehi ca sampajānakārīhi
tika-s0105t0:296_1: viññāyatīti vuttaṃ “asiteti piṇḍapātabhojane”tiādi. Aṭṭhavidhopi atthoti aṭṭhappakāropi payojanaviseso.
tika-s0105t0:297_0: Tattha piṇḍapātabhojanādīsu attho nāma iminā mahāsivattheravādavasena “imassa kāyassa
tika-s0105t0:297_1: ṭhitiyā”tiādinā sutte vuttaṃ aṭṭhavidhampi payojanaṃ dasseti. Mahāsivatthero hi “heṭṭhā
tika-s0105t0:297_2: cattāri aṅgāni paṭikkhepo nāma, upari pana aṭṭhaṅgāni payojanavasena samodhānetabbānī”ti
tika-s0105t0:297_3: vadati. Tattha “yāvadeva imassa kāyassa ṭhitiyā”ti ekamaṅgaṃ, “yāpanāyā”ti ekaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:297_5: paṭihaṅkhāmī”ti ekaṃ, “navañca vedanaṃ na uppādessāmī”ti ekaṃ, “yātrā ca me bhavissatī”ti
tika-s0105t0:297_6: ekaṃ, “anavajjatā cā”ti ekaṃ, phāsuvihāro pana bhojanānisaṃsamattanti evaṃ aṭṭha
tika-s0105t0:297_7: aṅgāni payojanavasena samodhānetabbāni. Aññathā pana “neva davāyā”ti ekamaṅgaṃ, “na
tika-s0105t0:297_8: madāyā”ti ekaṃ, “na maṇḍanāyā”ti ekaṃ, “na vibhūsanāyā”ti ekaṃ, “yāvadeva imassa
tika-s0105t0:297_9: kāyassa ṭhitiyā yāpanāyā”ti ekaṃ, “vihiṃsūparatiyā brahmacariyānuggahāyā”ti ekaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:297_10: “iti purāṇañca vedanaṃ paṭihaṅkhāmi, navañca vedanaṃ na uppādessāmī”ti ekaṃ, “yātrā
tika-s0105t0:297_11: ca me bhavissatī”ti ekaṃ, “anavajjatā ca phāsuvihāro cā”ti pana bhojanānisaṃsamattanti
tika-s0105t0:297_12: vuttāni aṭṭhaṅgāni idhānadhippetāni. Kasmāti ce? Payojanānameva abhāvato, tesameva
tika-s0105t0:297_13: ca idha atthasaddena vuttattā. Nanu ca “nevadavāyātiādinā nayena vutto”ti mariyādavacanena
tika-s0105t0:297_14: dutiyanayasseva idhādhippetabhāvo viññāyatīti? Na, “neva davāyā”tiādinā paṭikkhepaṅgadassanamukhena
tika-s0105t0:297_16: Pāṭhakkameneva hi “neva davāyātiādinā nayenā”ti vuttaṃ, na atthakkamena, tena pana
tika-s0105t0:298_0: Tidhā dente dvidhā gāhaṃ sandhāya “paṭiggahaṇaṃ nāmā”ti vuttaṃ, bhojanādigahaṇatthāya
tika-s0105t0:298_2: vāyodhātuvaseneva vibhāvito. Vāyodhātuvipphārenevāti ettha eva-saddena nivattetabbaṃ
tika-s0105t0:298_3: dasseti “na kocī”tiādinā. Kuñcikā nāma avāpuraṇaṃ, yaṃ “tāḷo”tipi vadanti. Yantakenāti
tika-s0105t0:298_5: hi yantakaṃ. Sañcuṇṇakaraṇaṃ musalakiccaṃ. Antokatvā patiṭṭhāpanaṃ udukkhalakiccaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:298_6: Āloḷitaviloḷitavasena parivattanaṃ hatthakiccaṃ. Itīti evaṃ. Tatthāti hatthakiccasādhane,
tika-s0105t0:298_7: bhāvalakkhaṇe, nimitte vā bhummaṃ. Tanukakheḷoti pasannakheḷo. Bahalakheḷoti āvilakheḷo.
tika-s0105t0:298_8: Jivhāsaṅkhātena hatthena āloḷitaviloḷitavasena ito cito ca parivattakaṃ jivhāhatthaparivattakaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:298_9: Kaṭacchu, dabbīti katthaci pariyāyavacanaṃ. “Pume kaṭacchu dabbitthī”ti hi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:298_10: Idha pana yena bhojanādīni antokatvā gaṇhāti, so kaṭacchu, yāya pana tesamuddharaṇādīni
tika-s0105t0:298_11: karoti, sā dabbīti veditabbaṃ. Palālasanthāranti patiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ palālādisanthāraṃ.
tika-s0105t0:298_13: taṃsandhārakavāyunā viya paribhuttāhārassa vāyodhātunāva āmāsaye avaṭṭhānanti dasseti
tika-s0105t0:298_14: “vāyodhātuvaseneva tiṭṭhatī”ti iminā. Tathā paribhuttañhi āhāraṃ vāyodhātu heṭṭhā
tika-s0105t0:298_15: ca tiriyañca ghanaṃ parivaṭumaṃ katvā yāva pakkā sannirujjhanavasena āmāsaye patiṭṭhitaṃ
tika-s0105t0:298_16: karotīti. Uddhanaṃ nāma yattha ukkhaliyādīni patiṭṭhāpetvā pacanti, yā “cullī”tipi
tika-s0105t0:298_17: vuccati. Rassadaṇḍo daṇḍako. Patodo yaṭṭhi. Itīti vuttappakāramatidisati. Vuttappakārasseva
tika-s0105t0:298_18: hi dhātuvasena vibhāvanā. Tattha atiharatīti yāva mukhā abhiharati. Vītiharatīti
tika-s0105t0:298_19: tato kucchiyaṃ vimissaṃ karonto haratī”ti ācariyadhammapālatthero, ācariyānandatthero
tika-s0105t0:298_20: pana “tato yāva kucchi, tāva haratī”ti āha. Tadubhayampi atthato ekameva ubhayatthāpi
tika-s0105t0:299_0: Apica atiharatīti mukhadvāraṃ atikkāmento harati. Vītiharatīti kucchigataṃ passato
tika-s0105t0:299_1: harati. Dhāretīti āmāsaye patiṭṭhitaṃ karoti. Parivattetīti aparāparaṃ parivattanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:299_2: karoti. Sañcuṇṇetīti musalena viya sañcuṇṇanaṃ karoti. Visosetīti visosanaṃ nātisukkhaṃ
tika-s0105t0:299_3: karoti. Nīharatīti kucchito bahi niddhāreti. Pathavīdhātukiccesupi yathāvuttoyeva
tika-s0105t0:299_4: attho. Tāni pana āhārassa dhāraṇaparivattanasañcuṇṇanavisosanāni pathavīsahitā eva
tika-s0105t0:299_5: vāyodhātu kātuṃ sakkoti, na kevalā, tasmā tāni pathavīdhātuyāpi kiccabhāvena vuttāni.
tika-s0105t0:299_6: Sinehetīti temeti. Allattañca anupāletīti yathā vāyodhātuādīhi ativiya sosanaṃ na
tika-s0105t0:299_7: hoti, tathā allabhāvañca nātiallatākaraṇavasena anupāleti. Añjasoti āhārassa pavisanaparivattananikkhamanādīnaṃ
tika-s0105t0:299_9: Tattha tatthāti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ pariyesanajjhoharaṇādikicce. Taṃtaṃvijānanassa paccayabhūto
tika-s0105t0:299_10: taṃnipphādakoyeva payogo sammāpayogo nāma. Yena hi payogena pariyesanādi nipphajjati,.
tika-s0105t0:299_11: So tabbisayavijānanampi nipphādeti nāma tadavinābhāvato. Tamanvāya āgammāti attho.
tika-s0105t0:299_14: vijānanampettha gahitanti veditabbaṃ. Atha vā sammāpayogo nāma sammāpaṭipatti. Tamanvāya
tika-s0105t0:299_15: āgamma. “Abbhantare attā nāma koci bhuñjanako natthī”tiādinā ābhujati samannāharati,
tika-s0105t0:299_16: vijānātīti attho. Ābhogapubbako hi sabbo viññāṇabyāpāroti “ābhujati”cceva vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:300_0: Gamanatoti bhikkhācāravasena gocaragāmaṃ uddissa gamanato. Paccāgamanampi gamanasabhāvattā
tika-s0105t0:300_1: imināva saṅgahitaṃ. Pariyesanatoti gocaragāme bhikkhāya āhiṇḍanato. Pariyesanasabhāvattā
tika-s0105t0:300_4: suvānadoṇiyaṃ suvānavamathu viya paramajegucchaṃ āhāraṃ paribhuñjanato. Āsayatoti
tika-s0105t0:300_6: āmāsayassa upari patiṭṭhānakapittādicatubbidhāsayato. Āsayati ekajjhaṃ pavattamānopi
tika-s0105t0:300_7: kammabalavavatthito hutvā mariyādavasena aññamaññaṃ asaṅkarato tiṭṭhati pavattati
tika-s0105t0:300_8: etthāti hi āsayo, āmāsayassa upari patiṭṭhānako pittādi catubbidhāsayo. Mariyādattho
tika-s0105t0:300_9: hi ayamākāro. Nidhānatoti āmāsayato. Nidheti yathābhutto āhāro nicito hutvā tiṭṭhati
tika-s0105t0:300_10: etthāti hi āmāsayo “nidhāna”nti vuccati. Aparipakkatoti bhuttāhāraparipācanena gahaṇīsaṅkhātena
tika-s0105t0:300_11: kammajatejasā aparipākato. Paripakkatoti yathāvuttakammajatejasāva paripākato. Phalatoti
tika-s0105t0:300_12: nipphattito, sammāparipaccamānassa, asammāparipaccamānassa ca bhuttāhārassa yathākkamaṃ
tika-s0105t0:300_14: hi vuttaṃ. Nissandanatoti akkhikaṇṇādīsu anekadvāresu ito cito ca vissandanato. Vuttañhi –
tika-s0105t0:303_0: Sammakkhanatoti hatthaoṭṭhādiaṅgesu navasu dvāresu paribhogakāle, paribhuttakāle
tika-s0105t0:303_1: ca yathārahaṃ sabbaso makkhanato. Sabbattha āhāre paṭikkūlatā paccavekkhitabbāti
tika-s0105t0:303_3: anupubbī ṭhapitā. Sammakkhanaṃ pana paribhogādīsu labbhamānampi nissandavasena visesato
tika-s0105t0:304_0: Pattakāleti yuttakāle, yathāvuttena vā tejena paripaccanato uccārapassāvabhāvaṃ pattakāle.
tika-s0105t0:304_1: Vegasandhāraṇena uppannapariḷāhattā sakalasarīrato sedā muccanti. Tatoyeva akkhīni
tika-s0105t0:304_2: paribbhamanti, cittañca ekaggaṃ na hoti. Aññe ca sūlabhagandarādayo rogā uppajjanti.
tika-s0105t0:305_0: Aṭṭhāneti manussāmanussapariggahite khettadevāyatanādike ayuttaṭṭhāne. Tādise hi
tika-s0105t0:305_1: karontaṃ kuddhā manussā, amanussā vā jīvitakkhayampi pāpenti. Āpattīti pana bhikkhubhikkhunīnaṃ
tika-s0105t0:305_2: yathārahaṃ dukkaṭapācittiyā. Patirūpe ṭhāneti vuttaviparīte ṭhāne. Sabbaṃ tanti āpattiādikaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:306_0: Nikkhamāpetā attā nāma atthi, tassa kāmatāya nikkhamananti bālamaññanaṃ nivattetuṃ
tika-s0105t0:306_1: “akāmatāyā”ti vuttaṃ, attano anicchāya apayogena vāyodhātuvipphāreneva nikkhamatīti
tika-s0105t0:306_2: vuttaṃ hoti. Sannicitāti samuccayena ṭhitā. Vāyuvegasamuppīḷitāti vāyodhātuyā vegena
tika-s0105t0:306_3: samantato avapīḷitā, nikkhamanassa cetaṃ hetuvacanaṃ. “Sannicitā uccārapassāvā”ti
tika-s0105t0:306_4: vatvā “so panāyaṃ uccārapassāvo”ti puna vacanaṃ samāhāradvandepi pulliṅgapayogassa
tika-s0105t0:306_5: sambhavatādassanatthaṃ. Ekattameva hi tassa niyatalakkhaṇanti. Attanā nirapekkhaṃ
tika-s0105t0:306_6: nissaṭṭhattā neva attano atthāya santakaṃ vā hoti, kassacipi dīyanavasena anissajjitattā,
tika-s0105t0:306_7: jigucchanīyattā ca na parassapīti attho. Sarīranissandovāti sarīrato vissandanameva
tika-s0105t0:306_8: nikkhamanamattaṃ. Sarīre sati so hoti, nāsatīti sarīrassa ānisaṃsamattantipi vadanti.
tika-s0105t0:306_9: Tadayuttameva nidassanena visamabhāvato. Tattha hi “paṭijagganamattamevā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:306_10: paṭisodhanamattaṃ evāti cassa attho. Veḷunāḷiādiudakabhājanaṃ udakatumbo. Tanti chaḍḍitaudakaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:307_0: “Gateti gamane”ti pubbe abhikkamapaṭikkamagahaṇena gamanepi purato, pacchato ca kāyassa
tika-s0105t0:307_1: atiharaṇaṃ vuttanti idha gamanameva gahita”nti ācariyānandattherena vuttaṃ, taṃ kecivādo
tika-s0105t0:307_2: nāma ācariyadhammapālattherena kataṃ. Kasmāti ce? Gamane pavattassa purato, pacchato
tika-s0105t0:307_3: ca kāyātiharaṇassa tadavinābhāvato padavītihāraniyamitāya gamanakiriyāya eva saṅgahitattā,
tika-s0105t0:307_4: vibhaṅgaṭṭhakathādīhi ca virodhanato. Vuttañhi tattha gamanassa ubhayattha samavarodhattaṃ, bhedattañca –
tika-s0105t0:308_0: “Ettha ca eko iriyāpatho dvīsu ṭhānesu āgato. So heṭṭhā ‘abhikkante paṭikkante’ti
tika-s0105t0:308_1: ettha bhikkhācāragāmaṃ gacchato ca āgacchato ca addhānagamanavasena kathito. ‘Gate
tika-s0105t0:308_2: ṭhite nisinne’ti ettha vihāre cuṇṇikapāduddhārairiyāpathavasena kathitoti veditabbo”ti.
tika-s0105t0:309_0: “Gate”tiādīsu avatthābhedena kiriyābhedoyeva, na pana atthabhedoti dassetuṃ “gacchanto
tika-s0105t0:309_1: vā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tenāha “tasmā”tiādi. Tattha sutteti dīghanikāye, majjhimanikāye
tika-s0105t0:309_2: ca saṅgīte satipaṭṭhānasutte addhānairiyāpathāti cirapavattakā dīghakālikā iriyāpathā
tika-s0105t0:309_3: addhānasaddassa cirakālavacanato “addhaniyaṃ assa ciraṭṭhitika”ntiādīsu viya, addhānagamanapavattakā
tika-s0105t0:309_4: vā dīghamaggikā iriyāpathā. Addhānasaddo hi dīghamaggapariyāyo “addhānagamanasamayo”tiādīsu
tika-s0105t0:309_5: viya. Majjhimāti bhikkhācārādivasena pavattā nāticirakālikā, nātidīghamaggikā vā
tika-s0105t0:309_6: iriyāpathā. Cuṇṇiyairiyāpathāti vihāre, aññattha vā ito cito ca parivattanādivasena
tika-s0105t0:309_7: pavattā appamattakabhāvena cuṇṇavicuṇṇiyabhūtā iriyāpathā. Appamattakampi hi “cuṇṇavicuṇṇa”nti
tika-s0105t0:309_8: loke vadanti. “Khuddakacuṇṇikairiyāpathā”tipi pāṭho, khuddakā hutvā vuttanayena cuṇṇikā
tika-s0105t0:309_9: iriyāpathāti attho. Tasmāti evaṃ avatthābhedena iriyāpathabhedamattassa kathanato.
tika-s0105t0:310: Aparabhāgeti gamanairiyāpathato aparabhāge. Ṭhitoti ṭhitairiyāpathasampanno. Etthevāti caṅkamaneyeva. Evaṃ sabbattha yathārahaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:311: Gamanaṭhānanisajjānaṃ viya nisīdanasayanassa kamavacanamayuttaṃ yebhuyyena tathā kamābhāvatoti “uṭṭhāya” micceva vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:312_0: Jāgaritasaddasannidhānato cettha bhavaṅgotaraṇavasena niddokkamanameva sayanaṃ, na
tika-s0105t0:312_2: viya piṭṭhipasāraṇassāpi sayanairiyāpathabhāvena ekalakkhaṇattā etthāvarodhanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:312_3: Karaṇaṃ kiriyā, kāyādikiccaṃ, taṃ nibbattentīti kiriyāmayāni taddhitasaddānamanekatthavuttito.
tika-s0105t0:312_4: Atha vā āvajjanadvayakiccaṃ kiriyā, tāya pakatāni, nibbattāni vā kiriyāmayāni. Āvajjanavasena
tika-s0105t0:312_5: hi bhavaṅgupacchede sati vīthicittāni uppajjantīti. Aparāparuppattiyā nānappakārato
tika-s0105t0:312_6: vattanti parivattantīti pavattāni. Katthaci pana “cittāna”nti pāṭho, so abhidhammaṭṭhakathādīhi,
tika-s0105t0:312_7: taṭṭīkāhi ca viruddhattā na porāṇapāṭhoti veditabbo. Kiriyāmayāni eva pavattāni tathā,
tika-s0105t0:312_8: javanaṃ, sabbampi vā chadvārikavīthicittaṃ. Tenāha abhidhammaṭīkāyaṃ “kāyādikiriyāmayattā,
tika-s0105t0:312_9: āvajjanakiriyāsamuṭṭhitattā ca javanaṃ, sabbampi vā chadvārappavattaṃ kiriyāmayapavattaṃ
tika-s0105t0:312_10: nāmā”ti. Appavattanti niddokkamanakāle anuppajjanaṃ suttaṃ nāmāti attho gahetabbo.
tika-s0105t0:312_11: Neyyatthavacanañhi idaṃ, itarathā chadvārikacittānaṃ purecarānucaravasena uppajjantānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:312_12: sabbesampi dvāravimuttacittānaṃ pavattaṃ suttaṃ nāma siyā, evañca katvā niddokkamanakālato
tika-s0105t0:312_13: aññasmiṃ kāle uppajjantānaṃ dvāravimuttacittānampi pavattaṃ jāgarite saṅgayhatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:313_0: Cittassa payogakāraṇabhūte oṭṭhādike paṭicca yathāsakaṃ ṭhāne saddo jāyatīti āha
tika-s0105t0:313_1: “oṭṭhe ca paṭiccā”tiādi. Kiñcāpi saddo yathāṭhānaṃ jāyati, oṭṭhālanādinā pana payogeneva
tika-s0105t0:313_2: jāyati, na vinā tena payogenāti adhippāyo. Keci pana vadanti “oṭṭhe cātiādi sadduppattiṭṭhānanidassana”nti,
tika-s0105t0:313_3: tadayuttameva tathā avacanato. Na hi “oṭṭhe ca paṭiccā”tiādinā sasamuccayena kammavacanena
tika-s0105t0:313_4: ṭhānavacanaṃ sambhavatīti. Tadanurūpanti tassa saddassa anurūpaṃ. Bhāsanassa paṭisañcikkhanavirodhato
tika-s0105t0:313_5: tuṇhībhāvapakkhe “aparabhāge bhāsito iti paṭisañcikkhatī”ti na vuttaṃ, tena ca viññāyati
tika-s0105t0:314_0: Bhāsanatuṇhībhāvānaṃ sabhāvato bhede sati ayaṃ vibhāgo yutto siyā, nāsatīti anuyogenāha
tika-s0105t0:314_2: pavattanaṃ bhāsanaṃ, appavattanaṃ tuṇhīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t0:315_0: Yasmā pana mahāsivattheravāde anantare anantare iriyāpathe pavattarūpārūpadhammānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:315_1: tattha tattheva nirodhadassanavasena sampajānakāritā gahitā, tasmā taṃ mahāsatipaṭṭhānasutte
tika-s0105t0:315_3: ato tattheva tamadhippetaṃ, na idhāti dassento “tayida”ntiādimāha. Asammohasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-s0105t0:315_4: dhuraṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ yassa vacanassāti asammohadhuraṃ, mahāsatipaṭṭhānasutteyeva tassa
tika-s0105t0:315_5: vacanassa adhippetabhāvassa hetugabbhamidaṃ vacanaṃ. Yasmā panettha sabbampi catubbidhaṃ
tika-s0105t0:315_6: sampajaññaṃ labbhati yāvadeva sāmaññaphalavisesadassanapadhānattā imissā desanāya,
tika-s0105t0:315_7: tasmā taṃ idha adhippetanti dassetuṃ “imasmiṃ panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Vuttanayenevāti
tika-s0105t0:315_8: abhikkantādīsu vuttanayeneva. Nanu “satisampajaññena samannāgato”ti etassa uddesassāyaṃ
tika-s0105t0:315_9: niddeso, atha kasmā sampajaññavaseneva vitthāro katoti codanaṃ sodhento “sampajānakārīti
tika-s0105t0:315_10: cā”tiādimāha, satisampayuttasseva sampajānassa vasena atthassa viditabbattā evaṃ
tika-s0105t0:315_11: vitthāro katoti vuttaṃ hoti. “Satisampayuttassevā”ti ca iminā yathā sampajaññassa
tika-s0105t0:315_12: kiccato padhānatā gahitā, evaṃ satiyāpīti atthaṃ dasseti, na panetaṃ satiyā sampajaññena
tika-s0105t0:315_13: saha bhāvamattadassanaṃ. Na hi kadāci satirahitā ñāṇappavatti atthīti.
tika-s0105t0:316_0: Nanu ca sampajaññavasenevāyaṃ vitthāro, atha kasmā satisampayuttassa sampajaññassa
tika-s0105t0:316_1: vasena attho veditabboti codanampi sodheti “satisampajaññena samannāgatoti etassa
tika-s0105t0:316_2: hi padassa ayaṃ vitthāro”ti iminā. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – “satisampajaññena samannāgato”ti
tika-s0105t0:316_3: evaṃ ekato uddiṭṭhassa atthassa vitthārattā uddese viya niddesepi tadubhayaṃ samadhurabhāveneva
tika-s0105t0:316_4: gahitanti. Imināpi hi satiyā sampajaññena samadhurataṃyeva vibhāveti ekato uddiṭṭhassa
tika-s0105t0:316_5: atthassa vitthārabhāvadassanena tadatthassa siddhattā. Idāni vibhaṅganayenāpi tadatthaṃ
tika-s0105t0:316_6: samatthetuṃ “vibhaṅgappakaraṇe panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Imināpi hi sampajaññassa viya satiyāpettha
tika-s0105t0:316_7: padhānataṃyeva vibhāveti. Tattha etāni padānīti “abhikkante paṭikkante sampajānakārī
tika-s0105t0:316_8: hotī”tiādīni uddesapadāni. Vibhattānevāti satiyā sampajaññena sampayogamakatvā sabbaṭṭhānesu
tika-s0105t0:317_0: Majjhimabhāṇakā, pana ābhidhammikā ca evaṃ vadanti – eko bhikkhu gacchanto aññaṃ
tika-s0105t0:317_1: cintento aññaṃ vitakkento gacchati, eko kammaṭṭhānaṃ avissajjetvāva gacchati. Tathā
tika-s0105t0:317_2: eko tiṭṭhanto aññaṃ cintento aññaṃ vitakkento tiṭṭhati, eko kammaṭṭhānaṃ avissajjetvāva
tika-s0105t0:317_3: tiṭṭhati. Eko nisīdanto aññaṃ cintento aññaṃ vitakkento nisīdati, eko kammaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:317_4: avissajjetvāva nisīdati. Eko sayanto aññaṃ cintento aññaṃ vitakkento sayati, eko
tika-s0105t0:317_5: kammaṭṭhānaṃ avissajjetvāva sayati. Ettakena pana gocarasampajaññaṃ na pākaṭaṃ hotīti
tika-s0105t0:317_6: caṅkamanena dīpenti. Yo hi bhikkhu caṅkamaṃ otaritvā caṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ ṭhito pariggaṇhāti
tika-s0105t0:317_8: niruddhā, pacchimacaṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ pavattāpi pācīnacaṅkamanakoṭiṃ appatvā ettheva
tika-s0105t0:317_9: niruddhā, caṅkamanavemajjhe pavattā ubho koṭiyo appatvā ettheva niruddhā, caṅkamane
tika-s0105t0:317_10: pavattā rūpārūpadhammā ṭhānaṃ appatvā ettheva niruddhā, ṭhāne pavattā nisajjaṃ, nisajjāya
tika-s0105t0:317_11: pavattā sayanaṃ appatvā ettheva niruddhā”ti evaṃ pariggaṇhanto pariggaṇhantoyeva
tika-s0105t0:317_12: bhavaṅgaṃ otāreti, uṭṭhahanto kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvāva uṭṭhahati. Ayaṃ bhikkhu gatādīsu
tika-s0105t0:318_0: Evaṃ pana sutte kammaṭṭhānaṃ avibhūtaṃ hoti, kammaṭṭhānaṃ avibhūtaṃ na kātabbaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:318_1: tasmā yo bhikkhu yāva sakkoti, tāva caṅkamitvā ṭhatvā nisīditvā sayamāno evaṃ pariggahetvā
tika-s0105t0:318_2: sayati “kāyo acetano, mañco acetano, kāyo na jānāti ‘ahaṃ mañce sayito’ti, mañcopi
tika-s0105t0:318_3: na jānāti ‘mayi kāyo sayito’ti. Acetano kāyo acetane mañce sayito”ti. Evaṃ pariggaṇhanto
tika-s0105t0:318_4: pariggaṇhantoyeva cittaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ otāreti, pabujjhanto kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvāva pabujjhati,
tika-s0105t0:319_1: vā chadvārappavattaṃ kiriyāmayapavattaṃ nāma, tasmiṃ sati jāgaritaṃ nāma hotī”ti
tika-s0105t0:319_2: pariggaṇhanto bhikkhu jāgarite sampajānakārī nāma. Apica rattindivaṃ cha koṭṭhāse
tika-s0105t0:319_3: katvā pañca koṭṭhāse jaggantopi jāgarite sampajānakārī nāma hoti.
tika-s0105t0:320: Vimuttāyatanasīsena dhammaṃ desentopi, bāttiṃsa tiracchānakathā pahāya dasakathāvatthunissitaṃ sappāyakathaṃ kathentopi bhāsite sampajānakārī nāma.
tika-s0105t0:321_0: Aṭṭhatiṃsāya ārammaṇesu cittaruciyaṃ manasikāraṃ pavattentopi dutiyajjhānaṃ samāpannopi
tika-s0105t0:321_1: tuṇhībhāve sampajānakārī nāma. Dutiyañhi jhānaṃ vacīsaṅkhāravirahato visesato tuṇhībhāvo
tika-s0105t0:321_2: nāmāti. Ayampi nayo purimanayato visesanayattā idhāpi āharitvā vattabbo. Tathā hesa
tika-s0105t0:321_3: abhidhammaṭṭhakathādīsu “ayaṃ panettha aparopi nayo”ti ārabhitvā yathāvuttanayo vibhāvitoti.
tika-s0105t0:321_4: “Evaṃ kho mahārājā”tiādi yathāniddiṭṭhassa atthassa nigamanaṃ, tasmā tattha niddesānurūpaṃ
tika-s0105t0:321_5: atthaṃ dassento “eva”ntiādimāha. Satisampayuttassa sampajaññassāti hi niddesānurūpaṃ
tika-s0105t0:321_6: atthavacanaṃ. Tattha vinicchayo vuttoyeva. Evanti iminā vuttappakārena abhikkantapaṭikkantādīsu
tika-s0105t0:321_7: sattasu ṭhānesu paccekaṃ catubbidhena pakārenāti attho.
tika-s0105t0:323_0: 215. Atthadassanena padassapi viññāyamānattā padamanapekkhitvā santosassa attani
tika-s0105t0:323_1: atthitāya bhikkhu santuṭṭhoti pavuccatīti atthamattaṃ dassetuṃ “itarītarapaccayasantosena
tika-s0105t0:323_2: samannāgato”ti vuttaṃ. Santussati na luddho bhavatīti hi padanibbacanaṃ. Apica padanibbacanavasena
tika-s0105t0:323_3: atthe vutte yassa santosassa attani atthibhāvato santuṭṭho nāma, so apākaṭoti taṃ
tika-s0105t0:323_5: yattha katthaci kappiyapaccaye santosena samaṅgībhūtoti attho. Itara-saddo hi aniyamavacano
tika-s0105t0:323_6: dvikkhattuṃ vuccamāno yaṃ kiñci-saddena samānattho hoti. Tena vuttaṃ “yattha katthaci
tika-s0105t0:323_7: kappiyapaccaye”ti. Atha vā itaraṃ vuccati hīnaṃ paṇītato aññattā, tathā paṇītampi
tika-s0105t0:323_8: hīnato aññattā. Aññamaññāpekkhāsiddhā hi itaratā, tasmā hīnena vā paṇītena vā cīvarādikappiyapaccayena
tika-s0105t0:323_9: santosena samaṅgībhūtoti attho daṭṭhabbo. Santussati tena, santussanamattanti vā
tika-s0105t0:323_10: santoso, tathā pavatto alobho, alobhapadhānā vā cattāro khandhā. Labhanaṃ lābho,
tika-s0105t0:323_11: attano lābhassa anurūpaṃ santoso yathālābhasantoso. Balanti kāyabalaṃ, attano balassa
tika-s0105t0:323_12: anurūpaṃ santoso yathābalasantoso. Sāruppanti sappāyaṃ patirūpaṃ bhikkhuno anucchavikatā,
tika-s0105t0:324_0: Aparo nayo – labbhateti lābho, yo yo lābho yathālābhaṃ, itarītarapaccayo, yathālābhena
tika-s0105t0:324_1: santoso yathālābhasantoso. Balassa anurūpaṃ pavattatīti yathābalaṃ, attano balānucchavikapaccayo,
tika-s0105t0:324_2: yathā-saddo cettha sasādhanaṃ anurūpakiriyaṃ vadati, yathā taṃ “adhicitta”nti ettha
tika-s0105t0:324_3: adhi-saddo sasādhanaṃ adhikaraṇakiriyanti. Yathābalena santoso yathābalasantoso.
tika-s0105t0:324_4: Sāruppati patirūpaṃ bhavati, sobhanaṃ vā āropetīti sāruppaṃ, yaṃ yaṃ sāruppaṃ yathāsāruppaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:324_5: bhikkhuno sappāyapaccayo, yathāsāruppena santoso yathāsāruppasantoso. Yathāvuttaṃ
tika-s0105t0:325_0: Idhāti sāsane. Aññaṃ na patthetīti appattapatthanabhāvamāha, labhantopi na gaṇhātīti
tika-s0105t0:325_1: pattapatthanābhāvaṃ. Paṭhamena appattapatthanābhāveyeva vutte yathāladdhato aññassa
tika-s0105t0:325_2: apatthanā nāma appicchatāyapi siyā pavattiākāroti appicchatāpasaṅgabhāvato tatopi
tika-s0105t0:325_3: nivattameva santosassa sarūpaṃ dassetuṃ dutiyena pattapatthanābhāvo vuttoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:325_4: Evamuparipi. Pakatidubbaloti ābādhādivirahepi sabhāvadubbalo. Samāno sīlādibhāgo
tika-s0105t0:325_5: yassāti sabhāgo, saha vā sīlādīhi guṇabhāgehi vattatīti sabhāgo, lajjīpesalo bhikkhu,
tika-s0105t0:325_6: tena. Taṃ parivattetvāti pakatidubbalādīnaṃ garucīvaraṃ na phāsubhāvāvahaṃ, sarīrakhedāvahañca
tika-s0105t0:325_7: hotīti payojanavasena parivattanaṃ vuttaṃ, na atricchatādivasena. Atricchatādippakārena
tika-s0105t0:325_8: hi parivattetvā lahukacīvaraparibhogo santosavirodhī hoti, tassa pana tadabhāvato
tika-s0105t0:325_10: āha “lahukena yāpentopi santuṭṭhova hotī”ti. Payojanavasena parivattetvā lahukacīvaraparibhogopi
tika-s0105t0:325_11: na tāva santosavirodhī, pageva tathā aparivattetvā paribhogeti sambhāvitassa atthassa
tika-s0105t0:325_14: “Therako ayamāyasmā mallako”tiādīsu theravohārassa paññattimattepi pavattito dasavassato
tika-s0105t0:325_16: vuttaṃ, therānanti vā saṅghattheraṃ vadati. Cirapabbajitānanti pana tadavasese vuḍḍhabhikkhū.
tika-s0105t0:325_17: Saṅkārakūṭāditoti kacavararāsiādito. Anantakānīti nantakāni pilotikāni. “A-kāro cettha
tika-s0105t0:325_18: nipātamatta”nti vimānaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Tathā cāhu “nantakaṃ kappaṭo jiṇṇavasanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:325_19: tu paṭaccara”nti natthi dasāsaṅkhāto anto koṭi yesanti hi nantakāni, na-saddassa
tika-s0105t0:325_20: tu anādese anantakānītipi yujjati. Saṅketakovidānaṃ pana ācariyānaṃ tathā avuttattā
tika-s0105t0:325_21: vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbaṃ. “Sanantakānī”tipi pāṭho, nantakena saha saṃsibbitāni paṃsukūlāni
tika-s0105t0:325_22: cīvarānīti attho. Saṅghāṭinti tiṇṇaṃ cīvarānaṃ aññataraṃ cīvaraṃ. Tīṇipi hi cīvarāni
tika-s0105t0:325_23: saṅghaṭitattā “saṅghāṭī”ti vuccanti. Mahagghaṃ cīvaraṃ, bahūni vā cīvarāni labhitvā
tika-s0105t0:325_24: tāni vissajjetvā tadaññassa gahaṇampi mahicchatādinaye aṭṭhatvā yathāsāruppanaye
tika-s0105t0:325_25: eva ṭhitattā na santosavirodhīti āha “tesaṃ…pe… dhārentopi santuṭṭhova hotī”ti. Yathāsāruppanayena
tika-s0105t0:325_26: yathāladdhaṃ vissajjetvā tadaññagahaṇampi na tāva santosavirodhī, pageva anaññagahaṇena
tika-s0105t0:325_27: yathāladdhasseva yathāsāruppaṃ paribhogeti sambhāvitassa atthassa dassanatthañhettha
tika-s0105t0:326_1: paribhuñjanañca visesato yuttataranti atthantaraṃ viññāpetuṃ “yāpentopī”ti avatvā
tika-s0105t0:327_0: Aññampi senāsane yathāsāruppasantosaṃ dassento āha “yo hī”tiādi. Paṭhame hi naye
tika-s0105t0:327_1: yathāladdhassa vissajjanena, dutiye pana yathāpattassa asampaṭicchanena yathāsāruppasantoso
tika-s0105t0:327_2: vuttoti ayametesaṃ viseso. Hi-saddo cettha pakkhantarajotako. Majjhimāgamaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-s0105t0:327_3: pana pi-saddo dissati. “Uttamasenāsanaṃ nāma pamādaṭṭhāna”nti vatvā tabbhāvameva
tika-s0105t0:327_6: attho. Paṭibujjhatoti tathārūpena ārammaṇantarena paṭibujjhantassa paṭibujjhanahetu
tika-s0105t0:327_7: kāmavitakkā pātubhavantīti vuttaṃ hoti. “Paṭibujjhanato”tipi hi katthaci pāṭho dissati.
tika-s0105t0:328_0: Tesaṃ ābhatenāti tehi therādīhi ābhatena, tesaṃ vā yena kenaci santakenāti ajjhāharitvā
tika-s0105t0:328_1: sambandho. Muttaharītakanti gomuttaparibhāvitaṃ, pūtibhāvena vā mocitaṃ chaḍḍitaṃ
tika-s0105t0:328_2: harītakaṃ, idāni pana potthakesu “gomuttaharītaka”nti pāṭho, so na porāṇapāṭho tabbaṇṇanāya
tika-s0105t0:328_3: viruddhattā. Catumadhuranti majjhimāgamavare mahādhammasamādānasutte vuttaṃ dadhimadhusappiphāṇitasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-s0105t0:328_4: catumadhuraṃ, ekasmiñca bhājane catumadhuraṃ ṭhapetvā tesu yadicchasi, taṃ gaṇhāhi
tika-s0105t0:328_5: bhanteti attho. “Sacassā”tiādinā tadubhayassa rogavūpasamanabhāvaṃ dasseti. Buddhādīhi
tika-s0105t0:328_7: Appicchatāvisiṭṭhāya santuṭṭhiyā niyojanato paramena ukkaṃsagatena santosena santussatīti paramasantuṭṭho.
tika-s0105t0:329_0: Kāmañca santosappabhedā yathāvuttatopi adhikatarā cīvare vīsati santosā, piṇḍapāte
tika-s0105t0:329_1: pannarasa, senāsane ca pannarasa, gilānapaccaye vīsatīti, idha pana saṅkhepena dvādasavidhoyeva
tika-s0105t0:329_2: santoso vutto. Tadadhikatarappabhedo pana caturaṅguttare mahāariyavaṃsasuttaṭṭhakathāya
tika-s0105t0:329_3: gahetabbo. Tenāha “iminā panā”tiādi. Evaṃ “idha mahārāja bhikkhu santuṭṭho hotī”ti
tika-s0105t0:329_4: ettha puggalādhiṭṭhānaniddiṭṭhena santuṭṭhapadeneva santosappabhedaṃ dassetvā idāni
tika-s0105t0:329_6: santosena santuṭṭhassa anucchavikaṃ paccayappabhedaṃ, tassa ca kāyakucchiparihāriyabhāvaṃ
tika-s0105t0:329_7: vibhāvento evamāhāti ayamettha sambandho. Kāmañcassa cīvarapiṇḍapāteheva yathākkamaṃ
tika-s0105t0:329_8: kāyakucchiparihāriyehi santuṭṭhatā pāḷiyaṃ vuttā, tathāpi sesaparikkhāracatukkena
tika-s0105t0:329_9: ca vinā vicaraṇamayuttaṃ, sabbattha ca kāyakucchiparihāriyatā laddhabbāti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-s0105t0:329_10: ayaṃ vinicchayo vuttoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Dantakaṭṭhacchedanavāsīti lakkhaṇamattaṃ tadaññakiccassāpi
tika-s0105t0:329_12: cā”tiādi. Vuttampi cetaṃ porāṇaṭṭhakathāsu “na hetaṃ katthacipi pāḷiyamāgata”nti.
tika-s0105t0:330: Bandhananti kāyabandhanaṃ. Parissāvanena parissāvanañca, tena sahāti vā attho. Yutto kammaṭṭhānabhāvanāsaṅkhāto yogo yassa, tasmiṃ vā yogo yuttoti yuttayogo, tassa.
tika-s0105t0:331_0: Kāyaṃ pariharanti posenti, kāyassa vā parihāro posanamattaṃ payojanametehīti kāyaparihāriyā
tika-s0105t0:331_1: ka-kārassa ya-kāraṃ katvā. Posanañcettha vaḍḍhanaṃ, bharaṇaṃ vā, tathā kucchiparihāriyāpi
tika-s0105t0:331_2: veditabbā. Bahiddhāva kāyassa upakārakabhāvena kāyaparihāriyatā, ajjhoharaṇavasena
tika-s0105t0:331_3: sarīraṭṭhitiyā upakārakabhāvena kucchiparihāriyatāti ayametesaṃ viseso. Tenāha “ticīvaraṃ
tika-s0105t0:331_4: tāvā”tiādi. “Pariharatī”ti etassa posetīti atthavacanaṃ. Itīti nidassane nipāto,
tika-s0105t0:331_5: evaṃ vuttanayena kāyaparihāriyaṃ hotīti kāraṇajotane vā, tasmā posanato kāyaparihāriyaṃ
tika-s0105t0:333: Aṅgaṃ nāma mañcapīṭhānaṃ pādūpari ṭhapito padhānasambhāraviseso. Yattha padarasañcinanapiṭṭhiapassayanādīni karonti, yo “aṭanī”tipi vuccati.
tika-s0105t0:334_0: Madhuddumapupphaṃ madhukaṃ nāma, makkhikāmadhūhi katapūvaṃ vā. Parikkhāramattā parikkhārapamāṇaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:334_1: Seyyaṃ pavisantassāti paccattharaṇakuñcikānaṃ tādise kāle paribhuttabhāvaṃ sandhāya
tika-s0105t0:334_2: vuttaṃ. Tenāha “tatraṭṭhakaṃ paccattharaṇa”nti. Attano santakabhāvena paccattharaṇādhiṭṭhānena
tika-s0105t0:334_3: adhiṭṭhahitvā tattheva senāsane tiṭṭhanakañhi “tatraṭṭhaka”nti vuccati. Vikappanavacanato
tika-s0105t0:334_4: pana tesamaññatarassa navamatā, yathāvuttapaṭipāṭiyā cettha navamabhāvo, na tu tesaṃ
tika-s0105t0:334_5: tathāpatiniyatabhāvena. Kasmāti ce? Tathāyeva tesamadhāraṇato. Esa nayo dasamādīsupi.
tika-s0105t0:334_6: Telaṃ paṭisāmetvā haritā veḷunāḷiādikā telanāḷi. Nanu santuṭṭhapuggaladassane santuṭṭhova
tika-s0105t0:334_7: aṭṭhaparikkhāriko dassetabboti anuyoge yathārahaṃ tesampi santuṭṭhabhāvaṃ dassento
tika-s0105t0:334_8: “etesu cā”tiādimāha. Mahanto parikkhārasaṅkhāto bhāro etesanti mahābhārā, ayaṃ adhunā
tika-s0105t0:334_10: mahāgajā viyāti mahāgajā”ti vuttaṃ, na te ettakehi parikkhārehi “mahicchā, asantuṭṭhā,
tika-s0105t0:334_11: dubbharā, bāhullavuttino”ti ca vattabbāti adhippāyo. Yadi itarepi santuṭṭhā appicchatādisabhāvā,
tika-s0105t0:334_12: kimetesampi vasena ayaṃ desanā icchitāti codanaṃ sodhetuṃ “bhagavā panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:334_13: Aṭṭhaparikkhārikassa vasena imissā desanāya icchitabhāvo kathaṃ viññāyatīti anuyogampi
tika-s0105t0:334_14: apaneti “so hī”tiādinā, tasseva tathā pakkantabhāvena “kāyaparihārikena cīvarenā”tiādi
tika-s0105t0:334_15: pāḷiyā yogyato tassa vasena icchitabhāvo viññāyatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Vacanīyassa hetubhāvadassanena
tika-s0105t0:334_16: hi vācakassāpi hetubhāvo dassitoti. Evañca katvā “iti imassā”tiādi laddhaguṇavacanampi
tika-s0105t0:334_17: upapannaṃ hoti. Sallahukā vutti jīvikā yassāti sallahukavutti, tassa bhāvo sallahukavuttitā,
tika-s0105t0:334_18: taṃ. Kāyapārihāriyenāti bhāvappadhānaniddeso, bhāvalopaniddeso vāti dasseti “kāyaṃ
tika-s0105t0:334_19: pariharaṇamattakenā”ti iminā, kāyaposanappamāṇenāti attho. Tathā kucchiparihāriyenāti
tika-s0105t0:334_20: etthāpi. Vuttanayena cettha dvidhā vacanattho, ṭīkāyaṃ pana paṭhamassa vacanatthassa
tika-s0105t0:334_21: heṭṭhā vuttattā dutiyova idha vuttoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Mamāyanataṇhāya āsaṅgo. Pariggahataṇhāya
tika-s0105t0:334_22: bandho. Jiyāmuttoti dhanujiyāya mutto. Yūthāti hatthigaṇato. Tidhā pabhinnamado madahatthī.
tika-s0105t0:335_0: Catūsu disāsu sukhavihāritāya sukhavihāraṭṭhānabhūtā, “ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā”tiādinā
tika-s0105t0:335_1: vā nayena brahmavihārabhāvanāpharaṇaṭṭhānabhūtā catasso disā etassāti catuddiso,
tika-s0105t0:335_2: so eva cātuddiso, catasso vā disā catuddisaṃ, vuttanayena tamassāti cātuddiso yathā
tika-s0105t0:335_3: “saddho”ti. Tāsveva disāsu katthacipi satte vā saṅkhāre vā bhayena na paṭihanati,
tika-s0105t0:335_4: sayaṃ vā tehi na paṭihaññateti appaṭigho. Santussamānoti sakena, santena vā, samameva
tika-s0105t0:335_5: vā tussanako. Itarītarenāti yena kenaci paccayena, uccāvacena vā. Paricca sayanti
tika-s0105t0:335_6: pavattanti kāyacittāni, tāni vā parisayanti abhibhavantīti parissayā, sīhabyagghādayo
tika-s0105t0:335_7: bāhirā, kāmacchandādayo ca ajjhattikā kāyacittupaddavā, upayogatthe cetaṃ sāmivacanaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:335_8: Sahitāti adhivāsanakhantiyā, vīriyādidhammehi ca yathārahaṃ khantā, gahantā cāti
tika-s0105t0:335_9: attho. Thaddhabhāvakarabhayābhāvena achambhī. Eko careti asahāyo ekākī hutvā carituṃ
tika-s0105t0:335_10: viharituṃ sakkuṇeyya. Samatthane hi eyya-saddo yathā “ko imaṃ vijaṭaye jaṭa”nti khaggavisāṇakappatāya
tika-s0105t0:335_11: ekavihārīti dasseti “khaggavisāṇakappo”ti iminā. Saṇṭhānena khaggasadisaṃ ekameva
tika-s0105t0:335_12: matthake uṭṭhitaṃ visāṇaṃ yassāti khaggo; khaggasaddena taṃsadisavisāṇassa gahitattā,
tika-s0105t0:335_13: mahiṃsappamāṇo migaviseso, yo loke “palāsādo, gaṇṭhako”ti ca vuccati, tassa visāṇena
tika-s0105t0:335_14: ekībhāvena sadisoti attho. Apica ekavihāritāya khaggavisāṇakappoti dassetumpi evaṃ
tika-s0105t0:335_15: vuttaṃ. Vitthāro panassā attho khaggavisāṇasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ, cūḷaniddese ca vuttanayena veditabbo.
tika-s0105t0:336_0: Evaṃ vaṇṇitanti khaggavisāṇasutte bhagavatā tathā desanāya vivaritaṃ, thomitaṃ vā.
tika-s0105t0:336_1: Khaggassa nāma migassa visāṇena kappo sadiso tathā. Kappa-saddo hettha “satthukappena
tika-s0105t0:336_2: vata bho kira sāvakena saddhiṃ mantayamānā”tiādīsu viya paṭibhāge vattati, tassa
tika-s0105t0:336_3: bhāvo khaggavisāṇakappatā, taṃ so āpajjatīti sambandho.
tika-s0105t0:337_0: Vātābhighātādīhi siyā sakuṇo chinnapakkho, asañjātapakkho vā, idha pana ḍetuṃ samattho
tika-s0105t0:337_1: sapakkhikova adhippetoti visesadassanatthaṃ pāḷiyaṃ “pakkhī sakuṇo”ti vuttaṃ, na
tika-s0105t0:337_2: tu “ākāse antalikkhe caṅkamatī”tiādīsu viya pariyāyamattadassanatthanti āha “pakkhayutto
tika-s0105t0:337_3: sakuṇo”ti. Uppatatīti uddhaṃ patati gacchati, pakkhandatīti attho. Vidhunantāti vibhindantā,
tika-s0105t0:337_4: vicālentā vā. Ajjatanāyāti ajjabhāvatthāya. Tathā svātanāyāti etthāpi. Attano pattaṃ
tika-s0105t0:337_5: eva bhāro yassāti sapattabhāro. Mamāyanataṇhābhāvena nissaṅgo. Pariggahataṇhābhāvena
tika-s0105t0:337_6: nirapekkho. Yena kāmanti yattha attano ruci, tattha. Bhāvanapuṃsakaṃ vā etaṃ. Yena
tika-s0105t0:337_7: yathā pavatto kāmoti hi yenakāmo, taṃ, yathākāmanti attho.
tika-s0105t0:339_0: 216. Pubbe vuttasseva atthacatukkassa puna sampiṇḍetvā kathanaṃ kimatthanti adhippāyena
tika-s0105t0:339_1: anuyogaṃ uddharitvā sodheti “so…pe… kiṃ dassetī”tiādinā. Paccayasampattinti sambhārapāripūriṃ.
tika-s0105t0:339_2: Ime cattāroti sīlasaṃvaro indriyasaṃvaro sampajaññaṃ santosoti pubbe vuttā cattāro
tika-s0105t0:339_3: āraññikassa sambhārā. Na ijjhatīti na sampajjati na saphalo bhavati. Na kevalaṃ anijjhanamattaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:339_4: atha kho ayampi dosoti dasseti “tiracchānagatehi vā”tiādinā. Vattabbataṃ āpajjatīti
tika-s0105t0:339_5: “asukassa bhikkhuno araññe tiracchānagatānaṃ viya, vanacarakānaṃ viya ca nivāsanamattameva,
tika-s0105t0:339_6: na pana araññavāsānucchavikā kāci sammāpaṭipatti atthī”ti apavādavasena vacanīyabhāvamāpajjati,
tika-s0105t0:339_7: imassatthassa pana dassanena virujjhanato saddhiṃ-saddo na porāṇoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Atha
tika-s0105t0:339_8: vā āraññakehi tiracchānagatehi, vanacaravisabhāgajanehi vā saddhiṃ vippaṭipattivasena
tika-s0105t0:339_9: vasanīyabhāvaṃ āpajjati. “Na bhikkhave paṇidhāya araññe vatthabbaṃ, yo vaseyya, āpatti
tika-s0105t0:339_10: dukkaṭassā”tiādīsu viya hi vatthabba-saddo vasitabbapariyāyo. Tathā hi vibhaṅgaṭṭhakathāyampi
tika-s0105t0:339_12: hotī”ti adhivatthāti adhivasantā. Paṭhamaṃ bheravasaddaṃ sāventi. Tāvatā apalāyantassa
tika-s0105t0:339_13: hatthehipi sīsaṃ paharitvā palāpanākāraṃ karontīti ācariyasāriputtattherena kathitaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:339_14: Evaṃ byatirekato paccayasampattiyā dassitabhāvaṃ pakāsetvā idāni anvayatopi pakāsetuṃ
tika-s0105t0:339_15: “yassa panete”tiādi vuttaṃ. Kathaṃ ijjhatīti āha “so hī”tiādi. Kāḷako tilakoti vaṇṇavikārāpanarogavasena
tika-s0105t0:342_0: Tilasaṇṭhānaṃ viya jāyatīti hi tilako, kāḷo hutvā jāyatīti kāḷako. Idha pana paṇṇattivītikkamasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-s0105t0:342_1: thullavajjaṃ kāḷakasadisattā kāḷakaṃ, micchāvītikkamasaṅkhātaṃ aṇumattavajjaṃ tilakasadisattā
tika-s0105t0:342_2: tilakanti ayaṃ viseso. Tanti tathā uppāditaṃ pītiṃ. Vigatabhāvena upaṭṭhānato khayavayavasena
tika-s0105t0:342_3: sammasanaṃ. Khīyanaṭṭhena hi khayova vigato, viparīto vā hutvā ayanaṭṭhena vayotipi
tika-s0105t0:342_4: vuccati. Ariyabhūmi nāma lokuttarabhūmi. Itīti ariyabhūmiokkamanato, devatānaṃ vaṇṇabhaṇanato
tika-s0105t0:342_5: vā, tattha tattha devatānaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā tassa yaso patthaṭoti vuttaṃ hoti, evañca
tika-s0105t0:342_6: katvā heṭṭhā vuttaṃ ayasapattharaṇampi devatānamārocanavasenāti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:343_0: Vivitta-saddo janaviveketi āha “suñña”nti. Taṃ pana janasaddanigghosābhāvena veditabbaṃ
tika-s0105t0:343_1: saddakaṇṭakattā jhānassāti dassetuṃ “appasaddaṃ appanigghosanti attho”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:343_2: Janakaggahaṇeneva hi idha jaññaṃ gahitaṃ. Tathā hi vuttaṃ vibhaṅge “yadeva taṃ appanigghosaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:343_3: tadeva taṃ vijanavāta”nti. Appasaddanti ca pakatisaddābhāvamāha. Appanigghosanti
tika-s0105t0:343_4: nagaranigghosādisaddābhāvaṃ. Īdisesu hi byañjanaṃ sāvasesaṃ viya, attho pana niravasesoti
tika-s0105t0:343_6: evamāha “appasaddassa parittapariyāyaṃ manasi katvā vuttaṃ ‘byañjanaṃ sāvasesaṃ siyā’ti.
tika-s0105t0:343_7: Tenāha ‘na hi tassā’tiādi. Appasaddo panettha abhāvatthotipi sakkā viññātuṃ ‘appābādhatañca
tika-s0105t0:343_9: Etadevāti ca mayā saṃvaṇṇiyamānaṃ nissaddataṃ evāti attho. Santikepīti gāmādīnaṃ
tika-s0105t0:343_10: samīpepi edisaṃ vivittaṃ nāma, pageva dūreti attho. Anākiṇṇanti asaṅkiṇṇaṃ asambādhaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:343_11: Yassa senāsanassa samantā gāvutampi aḍḍhayojanampi pabbatagahanaṃ vanagahanaṃ nadīgahanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:343_12: hoti, na koci avelāya upasaṅkamituṃ sakkoti, idaṃ santikepi anākiṇṇaṃ nāma. Setīti
tika-s0105t0:343_13: sayati. Āsatīti nisīdati. “Etthā”ti iminā sena-saddassa, āsana-saddassa ca adhikaraṇatthabhāvaṃ
tika-s0105t0:343_14: dasseti, ca-saddena ca tadubhayapadassa catthasamāsabhāvaṃ. “Tenāhā”tiādinā vibhaṅgapāḷimeva āharati.
tika-s0105t0:344_1: Vibhaṅgapāḷiyaṃ nidassananayena sarūpato dassitasenāsanasseva hi ayaṃ vibhāgo. Tattha
tika-s0105t0:344_2: vihāro pākāraparicchinno sakalo āvāso. Aḍḍhayogo dīghapāsādo, “garuḷasaṇṭhānapāsādo”tipi
tika-s0105t0:344_3: vadanti. Pāsādo caturassapāsādo. Hammiyaṃ muṇḍacchadanapāsādo. Aṭṭo paṭirājūnaṃ paṭibāhanayoggo
tika-s0105t0:344_4: catupañcabhūmako patissayaviseso. Māḷo ekakūṭasaṅgahito anekakoṇavanto patissayaviseso.
tika-s0105t0:344_5: Aparo nayo – vihāro dīghamukhapāsādo. Aḍḍhayogo ekapassachadanakagehaṃ. Tassa kira
tika-s0105t0:344_6: ekapasse bhitti uccatarā hoti, itarapasse nīcā, tena taṃ ekachadanakaṃ hoti. Pāsādo
tika-s0105t0:344_7: āyatacaturassapāsādo. Hammiyaṃ muṇḍacchadanakaṃ candikaṅgaṇayuttaṃ. Guhā kevalā pabbataguhā.
tika-s0105t0:344_8: Leṇaṃ dvārabandhaṃ pabbhāraṃ. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva. “Maṇḍapoti sākhāmaṇḍapo”ti evaṃ
tika-s0105t0:345_0: Vibhaṅgaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana vihāroti samantā parihārapathaṃ, antoyeva ca rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānāni
tika-s0105t0:345_1: dassetvā katasenāsanaṃ. Aḍḍhayogoti supaṇṇavaṅkagehaṃ. Pāsādoti dve kaṇṇikāni gahetvā
tika-s0105t0:345_2: kato dīghapāsādo. Aṭṭoti paṭirājādipaṭibāhanatthaṃ iṭṭhakāhi kato bahalabhittiko
tika-s0105t0:345_3: catupañcabhūmako patissayaviseso. Māḷoti bhojanasālāsadiso maṇḍalamāḷo. Vinayaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-s0105t0:345_4: pana “ekakūṭasaṅgahito caturassapāsādo”ti vuttaṃ. Leṇanti pabbataṃ khaṇitvā vā pabbhārassa
tika-s0105t0:345_5: appahonakaṭṭhāne kuṭṭaṃ uṭṭhāpetvā vā katasenāsanaṃ. Guhāti bhūmidari vā yattha rattindivaṃ
tika-s0105t0:345_6: dīpaṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭati, pabbataguhā vā bhūmiguhā vāti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:346_0: Taṃ āvasathabhūtaṃ patissayasenāsanaṃ viharitabbaṭṭhena, vihāraṭṭhānaṭṭhena ca vihārasenāsanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:346_1: nāma. Masārakādicatubbidho mañco. Tathā pīṭhaṃ. Uṇṇabhisiādipañcavidhā bhisi. Sīsappamāṇaṃ
tika-s0105t0:346_2: bimbohanaṃ. Vitthārato vidatthicaturaṅgulatā, dīghato mañcavitthārappamāṇatā cettha
tika-s0105t0:346_5: ekasesena vā “mañcapīṭhasenāsana”nti vuccati. Ācariyasāriputtattheropi evameva vadati.
tika-s0105t0:346_7: vuttaṃ. Cimilikā nāma sudhāparikammakatāya bhūmiyā vaṇṇānurakkhaṇatthaṃ paṭakhaṇḍādīhi
tika-s0105t0:346_8: sibbetvā katā. Cammakhaṇḍo nāma sīhabyagghadīpitaracchacammādīsupi yaṃ kiñci cammaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:346_9: Aṭṭhakathāsu hi senāsanaparibhoge paṭikkhittacammaṃ na dissati. Tiṇasanthāroti yesaṃ
tika-s0105t0:346_10: kesañci tiṇānaṃ santhāro. Eseva nayo paṇṇasanthārepi. Cimilikādi bhūmiyaṃ santharitabbatāya
tika-s0105t0:346_11: santhatasenāsanaṃ. Yattha vā pana bhikkhū paṭikkamantīti ṭhapetvā vā etāni mañcādīni
tika-s0105t0:346_12: yattha bhikkhū sannipatanti, sabbametaṃ senāsanaṃ nāmāti evaṃ vuttaṃ avasesaṃ rukkhamūlādipaṭikkamitabbaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:346_13: abhisaṅkharaṇābhāvato kevalaṃ sayanassa, nissajjāya ca okāsabhūtattā okāsasenāsanaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:346_15: vā ādānena, vacanena vā gahitameva sāmaññajotanāya visese avaṭṭhānato, visesatthinā
tika-s0105t0:347_0: Yadevaṃ kasmā “arañña”ntiādi puna vuttanti anuyogena “idha panassā”tiādimāha. Evaṃ
tika-s0105t0:347_1: gahitesupi senāsanesu yathāvuttassa bhikkhuno anucchavikameva senāsanaṃ dassetukāmattā
tika-s0105t0:347_2: puna evaṃ vuttanti adhippāyo. “Bhikkhunīnaṃ vasena āgata”nti idaṃ vinaye āgatameva
tika-s0105t0:347_3: sandhāya vuttaṃ, na abhidhamme. Vinaye hi gaṇamhāohīyanasikkhāpade bhikkhunīnaṃ āraññakadhutaṅgassa
tika-s0105t0:347_4: paṭikkhittattā idampi ca tāsaṃ araññaṃ nāma, na pana pañcadhanusatikaṃ pacchimaṃ
tika-s0105t0:347_5: araññameva senāsanaṃ, idampi ca tāsaṃ gaṇamhāohīyanāpattikaraṃ, na tu pañcadhanusatikādimeva
tika-s0105t0:348: “Ekā vā gaṇamhā ohīyeyyāti agāmake araññe dutiyikāya bhikkhuniyā dassanūpacāraṃ vā savanūpacāraṃ vā vijahantiyā āpatti thullaccayassa, vijahite āpatti saṅghādisesassā”ti.
tika-s0105t0:349_0: Vinayaṭṭhakathāsupi hi tathāva attho vuttoti. Abhidhamme pana “araññanti nikkhamitvā
tika-s0105t0:349_1: bahi indakhīlā sabbametaṃ arañña”nti āgataṃ. Vinayasuttantā hi ubhopi pariyāyadesanā
tika-s0105t0:349_2: nāma, abhidhammo pana nippariyāyadesanā, tasmā yaṃ na gāmapadesantogadhaṃ, taṃ araññanti
tika-s0105t0:349_3: nippariyāyena dassetuṃ tathā vuttaṃ. Indakhīlā bahi nikkhamitvā yaṃ ṭhānaṃ pavattaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:349_4: sabbametaṃ araññaṃ nāmāti cettha attho. Āraññakaṃ nāma…pe… pacchimanti idaṃ pana
tika-s0105t0:349_5: suttantanayena āraññakasikkhāpade āraññikaṃ bhikkhuṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ imassa bhikkhuno
tika-s0105t0:349_6: anurūpaṃ, tasmā visuddhimagge dhutaṅganiddese yaṃ tassa lakkhaṇaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ yuttameva,
tika-s0105t0:350_0: Sandacchāyanti sītacchāyaṃ. Tenāha “tattha hī”tiādi. Rukkhamūlanti rukkhasamīpaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:350_1: Vuttañhetaṃ “yāvatā majjhanhike kāle samantā chāyā pharati, nivāte paṇṇāni nipatanti,
tika-s0105t0:350_3: pabbato adhippeto, na silāmayo eva. Sela-saddo pana avisesato pabbatapariyāyoti katvā
tika-s0105t0:350_4: evaṃ vuttaṃ. “Tattha hī”tiādinā tadubhayassa anurūpataṃ dasseti. Disāsu khāyamānāsūti
tika-s0105t0:350_5: dasasu disāsu abhimukhībhāvena dissamānāsu. Tathārūpenapi kāraṇena siyā cittassa
tika-s0105t0:350_6: ekaggatāti etaṃ vuttaṃ, sabbadisāhi āgatena vātena bījiyamānabhāvahetudassanatthanti
tika-s0105t0:350_7: keci. Kaṃ vuccati udakaṃ pipāsavinodanassa kārakattā. “Yaṃ nadītumbantipi nadīkuñjantipi
tika-s0105t0:350_8: vadanti, taṃ kandaranti apabbatapadesepi vidugganadīnivattanapadesaṃ kandaranti dassetī”ti
tika-s0105t0:350_10: Nadīnivattanapadeso ca nāma nadiyā nikkhamanaudakena puna nivattitvā gato viduggapadeso.
tika-s0105t0:350_11: “Apabbatapadesepī”ti vadanto pana aṭṭhakathāyaṃ nidassanamattena paṭhamaṃ pabbatapadesanti
tika-s0105t0:350_12: vuttaṃ, yathāvutto pana nadīpadesopi kandaro evāti dasseti.
tika-s0105t0:351_1: katvā. “Dvinnaṃ pabbatānampi āsannatare ṭhitānaṃ ovarakādisadisaṃ vivaraṃ hoti, ekasmiṃyeva
tika-s0105t0:351_2: pana pabbate umaṅgasadisa”nti vadanti ācariyā. Ekasmiṃyeva hi umaṅgasadisaṃ antoleṇaṃ
tika-s0105t0:351_3: hoti upari paṭicchannattā, na dvīsu tathā appaṭicchannattā, tasmā “umaṅgasadisa”nti
tika-s0105t0:351_4: idaṃ “ekasmiṃ yevā”ti iminā sambandhanīyaṃ. “Mahāvivara”nti idaṃ pana ubhayehipi.
tika-s0105t0:351_5: Umaṅgasadisanti ca “suduṅgāsadisa”nti ācariyena vuttaṃ. Suduṅgāti hi bhūmigharassetaṃ
tika-s0105t0:351_6: adhivacanaṃ, “taṃ gahetvā suduṅgāya ravantaṃ yakkhinī khipī”tiādīsu viya. Manussānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:351_7: anupacāraṭṭhānanti pakatisañcāravasena manussehi na sañcaritabbaṭṭhānaṃ. Kassanavappanādivasena
tika-s0105t0:351_8: hi pakatisañcārapaṭikkhepo idhādhippeto. Tenāha “yattha na kasanti na vapantī”ti.
tika-s0105t0:351_9: Ādisaddena pana “vanapatthanti vanasaṇṭhānametaṃ senāsanānaṃ adhivacanaṃ, vanapatthanti
tika-s0105t0:351_11: vanapatthanti na manussūpacārānametaṃ senāsanānaṃ adhivacana”nti imaṃ vibhaṅgapāḷisesaṃ
tika-s0105t0:351_12: saṅgaṇhāti. Patthoti hi pabbatassa samānabhūmi, yo “sānū”tipi vuccati, tassadisattā
tika-s0105t0:351_13: pana manussānamasañcaraṇabhūtaṃ vanaṃ, tasmā patthasadisaṃ vanaṃ vanapatthoti visesanaparanipāto
tika-s0105t0:351_14: daṭṭhabbo. Sabbesaṃ sabbāsu disāsu abhimukho okāso abbhokāsoti āha “acchanna”nti,
tika-s0105t0:351_15: kenaci chadanena antamaso rukkhasākhāyapi na chāditanti attho. Daṇḍakānaṃ upari cīvaraṃ
tika-s0105t0:351_16: chādetvā katā cīvarakuṭi. Nikkaḍḍhitvāti nīharitvā. Antopabbhāraleṇasadiso palālarāsiyeva
tika-s0105t0:351_17: adhippeto, itarathā tiṇapaṇṇasanthārasaṅgopi siyāti vuttaṃ “pabbhāraleṇasadise ālaye”ti,
