tika-s0105t0:351_18: pabbhārasadise, leṇasadise vāti attho. Gacchagumbādīnampīti pi-saddena purimanayaṃ sampiṇḍeti.
tika-s0105t0:352_0: Piṇḍapātassa pariyesanaṃ piṇḍapāto uttarapadalopena, tato paṭikkanto piṇḍapātapaṭikkantoti
tika-s0105t0:352_2: etasmiṃ atthe, tasmā parisamantato aṅkanaṃ āsanaṃ pallaṅko ra-kārassa la-kāraṃ, dvibhāvañca
tika-s0105t0:352_3: katvā yathā “palibuddho”ti, samantabhāvo ca vāmoruṃ, dakkhiṇoruñca samaṃ ṭhapetvā
tika-s0105t0:352_5: Ūrūnaṃ bandhanavasena nisajjāva idha pallaṅko, na āharimehi vāḷehi katoti vuttaṃ
tika-s0105t0:352_6: hoti. Ābhujitvāti ca yathā pallaṅkavasena nisajjā hoti, tathā ubho pāde ābhugge samiñjite
tika-s0105t0:352_7: katvā, taṃ pana ubhinnaṃ pādānaṃ tathābandhatākaraṇamevāti āha “bandhitvā”ti. Ujuṃ
tika-s0105t0:352_8: kāyanti ettha kāya-saddo uparimakāyavisayo heṭṭhimakāyassa anujukaṃ ṭhapanassa nisajjāvacaneneva
tika-s0105t0:352_9: viññāpitattāti vuttaṃ “uparimaṃ sarīraṃ ujuṃ ṭhapetvā”ti. Taṃ pana uparimakāyassa
tika-s0105t0:352_10: ujukaṃ ṭhapanaṃ sarūpato dasseti “aṭṭhārasā”tiādinā, aṭṭhārasannaṃ piṭṭhikaṇṭakaṭṭhikānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:352_11: koṭiyā koṭiṃ paṭipādanameva tathā ṭhapananti adhippāyo.
tika-s0105t0:353_0: Idāni tathā ṭhapanassa payojanaṃ dassento “evañhī”tiādimāha. Tattha evanti tathā
tika-s0105t0:353_1: ṭhapane sati, iminā vā tathāṭhapanahetunā. Na paṇamantīti na onamanti. “Athassā”tiādi
tika-s0105t0:353_2: pana paramparapayojanadassanaṃ. Athāti evaṃ anonamane. Vedanāti piṭṭhigilānādivedanā.
tika-s0105t0:353_3: Na paripatatīti na vigacchati vīthiṃ na vilaṅgheti. Tato eva pubbenāparaṃ visesappattiyā
tika-s0105t0:353_4: kammaṭṭhānaṃ vuddhiṃ phātiṃ vepullaṃ upagacchati. Parisaddo cettha abhisaddapariyāyo
tika-s0105t0:353_6: kammaṭṭhānaṃyeva purakkhatvāti attho. Parisaddassa samīpatthataṃ dasseti “mukhasamīpe
tika-s0105t0:353_7: vā katvā”ti iminā, mukhassa samīpe viya citte nibaddhaṃ upaṭṭhāpanavasena katvāti
tika-s0105t0:353_8: vuttaṃ hoti. Parisaddassa samīpatthataṃ vibhaṅgapāḷiyā sādhetuṃ “tenevā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:353_9: Nāsikaggeti nāsapuṭagge. Mukhanimittaṃ nāma uttaroṭṭhassa vemajjhappadeso, yattha
tika-s0105t0:354_0: Ettha ca yathā “vivittaṃ senāsanaṃ bhajatī”tiādinā bhāvanānurūpaṃ senāsanaṃ dassitaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:354_1: evaṃ “nisīdatī”ti iminā alīnānuddhaccapakkhiko santo iriyāpatho dassito, “pallaṅkaṃ
tika-s0105t0:354_2: ābhujitvā”ti iminā nisajjāya daḷhabhāvo, “parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā”ti iminā
tika-s0105t0:354_4: niyyānaṭṭho “suññatavimokkhamukha”ntiādīsu viya. Paṭipakkhato nikkhamanameva hi niyyānaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:354_5: Asammosanabhāvo upaṭṭhānaṭṭho. Tatrāti paṭisambhidānaye. Pariggahitaniyyānanti sabbathā
tika-s0105t0:354_6: gahitāsammosatāya pariggahitaṃ, pariccattasammosapaṭipakkhatāya ca niyyānaṃ satiṃ
tika-s0105t0:354_7: katvā, paramaṃ satinepakkaṃ upaṭṭhapetvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Ayaṃ ācariyadhammapālattherassa,
tika-s0105t0:354_8: ācariyasāriputtattherassa ca mati. Atha vā “kāyādīsu suṭṭhupavattiyā pariggahitaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:354_9: tato eva ca niyyānabhāvayuttaṃ, kāyādipariggahaṇañāṇasampayuttatāya vā pariggahitaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:354_10: tatoyeva ca niyyānabhūtaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ katvāti attho”ti ayaṃ ācariyānandattherassa mati.
tika-s0105t0:355_0: 217. Abhijjhāyati gijjhati abhikaṅkhati etāyāti abhijjhā, kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ. Luccanaṭṭhenāti
tika-s0105t0:355_1: bhijjanaṭṭhena, khaṇe khaṇe bhijjanaṭṭhenāti atthoti ācariyadhammapālattherena, aṅguttaraṭīkākārena
tika-s0105t0:355_2: ca ācariyasāriputtattherena vuttaṃ. Suttesu ca dissati “luccatīti kho bhikkhu lokoti
tika-s0105t0:355_3: vuccati. Kiñca luccati? Cakkhu kho bhikkhu luccati, rūpā luccanti, cakkhuviññāṇaṃ
tika-s0105t0:355_4: luccatī”tiādi. abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyaṃ, pana idha ca adhunā potthake “luccanapaluccanaṭṭhenā”ti
tika-s0105t0:355_5: likhitaṃ. Tattha luccanameva paluccanapariyāyena visesetvā vuttaṃ. Lucasaddo hi apekkhanādiatthopi
tika-s0105t0:355_7: pana vuttaṃ “khaṇabhaṅgavasena luccanasabhāvato, cutibhaṅgavasena ca paluccanasabhāvato
tika-s0105t0:355_8: loko nāmā”ti (vaṃsatthapakāsiniyaṃ nāma mahāvaṃsaṭīkāyaṃ paṭhamaparicchede pañcamagāthā
tika-s0105t0:355_9: vaṇṇanāyaṃ) keci pana “bhijjanauppajjanaṭṭhenā”ti atthaṃ vadanti. Āhaccabhāsitavacanatthena
tika-s0105t0:355_10: virujjhanato, lucasaddassa ca anuppādavācakattā ayuttamevetaṃ. Apica ācariyehipi
tika-s0105t0:355_11: “luccanapaluccanaṭṭhenā”ti pāṭhameva ulliṅgetvā tathā attho vutto siyā, pacchā pana
tika-s0105t0:355_12: paramparābhatavasena pamādalekhattā tattha tattha na diṭṭhoti daṭṭhabbaṃ, na luccati
tika-s0105t0:355_13: na paluccatīti yo gahitopi tathā na hoti, sveva loko, aniccānupassanāya vā luccati
tika-s0105t0:355_14: bhijjati vinassatīti gahetabbova lokoti taṃgahaṇarahitānaṃ lokuttarānaṃ natthi lokatā,
tika-s0105t0:355_15: dukkhasaccaṃ vā lokoti vuttaṃ “pañcupādānakkhandhā loko”ti. Evaṃ tattha tattha vacanatopi
tika-s0105t0:356_0: Tasmāti pañcupādānakkhandhānameva lokabhāvato. Vikkhambhanavasenāti ettha vikkhambhanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:356_1: tadaṅgappahānavaseneva anuppādanaṃ appavattanaṃ, na pana vikkhambhanappahānavasena
tika-s0105t0:356_2: paṭipakkhānaṃ suṭṭhupahīnaṃ. “Pahīnattā”ti hi tathāpahīnasadisataṃ eva sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:356_3: Kasmāti ce? Jhānassa anadhigatattā. Evaṃ pana pubbabhāgabhāvanāya tathā pahānatoyevetaṃ
tika-s0105t0:356_4: cittaṃ vigatābhijjhaṃ nāma, na tu cakkhuviññāṇamiva sabhāvato abhijjhāvirahitattāti
tika-s0105t0:356_5: dassetuṃ “na cakkhuviññāṇasadisenā”ti vuttaṃ. Yathā tanti ettha tanti nipātamattaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:356_6: taṃ cittaṃ vā. Adhunā muñcanassa, anāgate ca puna anādānassa karaṇaṃ parisodhanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:356_7: nāmāti vuttaṃ hoti. Yathā ca imassa cittassa pubbabhāgabhāvanāya parisodhitattā vigatābhijjhatā,
tika-s0105t0:356_8: evaṃ abyāpannatā, vigatathinamiddhatā, anuddhatatā, nibbicikicchatā ca veditabbāti
tika-s0105t0:356_9: nidassento “byāpādapadosaṃ pahāyātiādīsupi eseva nayo”ti āha. Pūtikummāsādayoti ābhidosikayavakummāsādayo.
tika-s0105t0:356_10: Purimapakatinti parisuddhapaṇḍarasabhāvaṃ, iminā vikāramāpajjatīti atthaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0105t0:356_12: tulyatthasamāsabhāvamāha. “Yā tasmiṃ samaye cittassa akallatā”tiādinā thinassa, “yā
tika-s0105t0:356_13: tasmiṃ samaye kāyassa akallatā”tiādinā ca middhassa abhidhamme niddiṭṭhattā “thinaṃ
tika-s0105t0:356_14: cittagelaññaṃ, middhaṃ cetasikagelañña”nti vuttaṃ. Satipi hi thinamiddhassa aññamaññaṃ
tika-s0105t0:356_15: avippayoge cittakāyalahutādīnaṃ viya cittacetasikānaṃ yathākkamaṃ taṃtaṃvisesassa
tika-s0105t0:356_16: yā tesaṃ akallatādīnaṃ visesapaccayatā, ayametesaṃ sabhāvoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Diṭṭhāloko
tika-s0105t0:356_17: nāma passito rattiṃ candālokadīpālokaukkālokādi, divā ca sūriyālokādi. Rattimpi divāpi
tika-s0105t0:356_18: tassa sañjānanasamatthā saññā ālokasaññā, tassā ca vigatanīvaraṇāya parisuddhāya
tika-s0105t0:356_19: atthitā idha adhippetā. Atisayatthavisiṭṭhassa hi atthiatthassa avabodhako ayamīkāroti
tika-s0105t0:356_20: dassento “rattimpī”tiādimāha, vigatathinamiddhabhāvassa kāraṇattā cetaṃ vuttaṃ. Suttesu pākaṭovāyamattho.
tika-s0105t0:357_0: Saratīti sato, sampajānātīti sampajānoti evaṃ puggalaniddesoti dasseti “satiyā ca
tika-s0105t0:357_1: ñāṇena ca samannāgato”ti iminā. Santesupi aññesu vīriyasamādhiādīsu kasmā idameva
tika-s0105t0:357_2: ubhayaṃ vuttaṃ, vigatābhijjhādīsu vā idaṃ ubhayaṃ avatvā kasmā idheva vuttanti anuyogamapanetuṃ
tika-s0105t0:357_4: ubhayanti attho. Atikkamitvā ṭhitoti ta-saddassa atītatthataṃ āha, pubbabhāgabhāvanāya
tika-s0105t0:357_5: pajahanameva ca atikkamanaṃ. “Kathaṃ idaṃ kathaṃ ida”nti pavattatīti kathaṃkathā,
tika-s0105t0:357_6: vicikicchā, sā etassa atthīti kathaṃkathī, na kathaṃkathī akathaṃkathī, nibbicikicchoti
tika-s0105t0:357_7: vacanattho, atthamattaṃ pana dassetuṃ “kathaṃ idaṃ kathaṃ ida’nti evaṃ nappavattatīti
tika-s0105t0:357_8: akathaṃkathī”ti vuttaṃ. “Kusalesu dhammesū”ti idaṃ “akathaṃkathī”ti iminā sambajjhitabbanti
tika-s0105t0:357_9: āha “na vicikicchati, na kaṅkhatīti attho”ti. Vacanatthalakkhaṇādibhedatoti ettha
tika-s0105t0:357_10: ādisaddena paccayapahānapahāyakādīnampi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Tepi hi pabhedato vattabbāti.
tika-s0105t0:358_0: 218. Vaḍḍhiyā gahitaṃ dhanaṃ iṇaṃ nāmāti vuttaṃ “vaḍḍhiyā dhanaṃ gahetvā”ti. Vigato
tika-s0105t0:358_1: anto byanto, so yassāti byantī. Tenāha “vigatanta”nti, virahitadātabbaiṇapariyantaṃ
tika-s0105t0:358_2: kareyyāti cetassa attho. Tesanti vaḍḍhiyā gahitānaṃ iṇadhanānaṃ. Pariyanto nāma taduttari
tika-s0105t0:358_3: dātabbaiṇaseso. Natthi iṇamassāti aṇaṇo. Tassa bhāvo āṇaṇyaṃ. Tameva nidānaṃ āṇaṇyanidānaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:358_4: āṇaṇyahetu āṇaṇyakāraṇāti attho. Āṇaṇyameva hi nidānaṃ kāraṇamassāti vā āṇaṇyanidānaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:358_6: labhati. “Jīvikānimittampi me avasiṭṭhaṃ atthī”ti somanassaṃ adhigacchati.
tika-s0105t0:359_0: 219. Visabhāgavedanā nāma dukkhavedanā. Sā hi kusalavipākasantānassa virodhibhāvato
tika-s0105t0:359_1: sukhavedanāya visabhāgā, tassā uppattiyā karaṇabhūtāya. Kakacenevāti kakacena iva.
tika-s0105t0:359_2: Catuiriyāpathanti catubbidhampi iriyāpathaṃ. Byādhito hi yathā ṭhānagamanesu asamattho,
tika-s0105t0:359_3: evaṃ nisajjādīsupi. Ābādhetīti pīḷeti. Vātādīnaṃ vikārabhūtā visamāvatthāyeva “ābādho”ti
tika-s0105t0:359_4: vuccati. Tenāha “taṃsamuṭṭhānena dukkhena dukkhito”ti, ābādhasamuṭṭhānena dukkhavedanāsaṅkhātena
tika-s0105t0:359_5: dukkhena dukkhito dukkhasamannāgatoti attho. Dukkhavedanāya pana ābādhabhāvena ādimhi
tika-s0105t0:359_6: bādhatīti ābādhoti katvā ābādhasaṅkhātena mūlabyādhinā ābādhiko, aparāparaṃ sañjātadukkhasaṅkhātena
tika-s0105t0:359_7: anubandhabyādhinā dukkhitoti attho gahetabbo. Evañhi sati dukkhavedanāvasena vuttassa
tika-s0105t0:359_8: dukkhitapadassa ābādhikapadena visesitabbatā pākaṭā hotīti ayamettha ācariyadhammapālattherena
tika-s0105t0:359_9: vuttanayo. Adhikaṃ mattaṃ pamāṇaṃ adhimattaṃ, bāḷhaṃ, adhimattaṃ gilāno dhātusaṅkhayena
tika-s0105t0:359_11: Na rucceyyāti na ruccetha, kammatthapadañcetaṃ “bhattañcassā”ti ettha “assā”ti kattudassanato.
tika-s0105t0:359_12: Mattāsaddo anatthakoti vuttaṃ “balamattāti balamevā”ti, appamattakaṃ vā balaṃ balamattā.
tika-s0105t0:359_13: Tadubhayanti pāmojjaṃ, somanassañca. Labhetha pāmojjaṃ “rogato muttomhī”ti. Adhigaccheyya
tika-s0105t0:360: 220. Kākaṇikamattaṃ nāma “ekaguñjamatta”nti vadanti. “Diyaḍḍhavīhimatta”nti vinayaṭīkāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Apica kaṇa-saddo kuṇḍake –
tika-s0105t0:362: Tuṇḍikīre pacitvāna, tato bhuñjanti bhojana”nti. ādīsu viya;
tika-s0105t0:363_0: “Kaṇo tu kuṇḍako bhave”ti (abhidhāne bhakaṇḍe catubbaṇṇavagge 454 gāthā) hi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:363_1: Appako pana kaṇo kākaṇoti vuccati yathā “kālavaṇa”nti, tasmā kākaṇova pamāṇamassāti
tika-s0105t0:363_2: kākaṇikaṃ, kākaṇikameva kākaṇikamattaṃ, khuddakakuṇḍakappamāṇamevāti attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0105t0:363_3: Evañhi sati “rājadāyo nāma kākaṇikamattaṃ na vaṭṭati, aḍḍhamāsagghanikaṃ maṃsaṃ detī”ti
tika-s0105t0:363_4: vuttena umaṅgajātakavacanena ca aviruddhaṃ hoti. Vayoti khayo bhaṅgo, tassa “bandhanā
tika-s0105t0:363_5: muttomhī”ti āvajjayato tadubhayaṃ hoti. Tena vuttaṃ “labhetha pāmojjaṃ, adhigaccheyya
tika-s0105t0:363_6: somanassa”nti. Vacanāvasesaṃ sandhāya “sesaṃ vuttanayenevā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Vuttanayenevāti
tika-s0105t0:363_7: ca paṭhamadutiyapadesu vuttanayeneva. Sabbapadesūti tatiyādīsu tīsu koṭṭhāsesu. Ekeko
tika-s0105t0:364_0: 221-222. Adhīnoti āyatto, na seribhāvayutto. Tenāha “attano ruciyā kiñci kātuṃ na
tika-s0105t0:364_1: labhatī”ti. Evamitarasmimpi. Yena gantukāmo, tena kāmaṃ gamo na hotīti sapāṭhasesayojanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:364_2: dassetuṃ “yenā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Kāmanti cetaṃ bhāvanapuṃsakavacanaṃ, kāmena vā icchāya
tika-s0105t0:364_3: gamo kāmaṃgamo niggahītāgamena. Dāsabyāti ettha bya-saddassa bhāvatthataṃ dasseti
tika-s0105t0:364_4: “dāsabhāvā”ti iminā. Aparādhīnatāya attano bhujo viya sakicce esitabbo pesitabboti
tika-s0105t0:364_5: bhujisso, sayaṃvasīti nibbacanaṃ. “Bhujo nāma attano yathāsukhaṃ viniyogo, so isso
tika-s0105t0:364_6: icchitabbo etthāti bhujisso, assāmiko”ti mūlapaṇṇāsakaṭīkāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Atthamattaṃ
tika-s0105t0:364_7: pana dassento “attano santako”ti āha, attāva attano santako, na parassāti vuttaṃ
tika-s0105t0:364_8: hoti. Anudakatāya kaṃ pānīyaṃ tārenti etthāti kantāro, addhānasaddo ca dīghapariyāyoti
tika-s0105t0:365_0: 223. Sesānīti byāpādādīni. Tatrāti dassane. Ayanti idāni vuccamānā sadisatā, yena
tika-s0105t0:365_1: iṇādīnaṃ upamābhāvo, kāmacchandādīnañca upameyyabhāvo hoti, so nesaṃ upamopameyyasambandho
tika-s0105t0:365_2: sadisatāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tehīti parehi iṇasāmikehi. Kiñci paṭibāhitunti pharusavacanādikaṃ
tika-s0105t0:365_3: kiñcipi paṭisedhetuṃ na sakkoti iṇaṃ dātumasakkuṇattā. Kasmāti vuttaṃ “titikkhākāraṇa”ntiādi,
tika-s0105t0:365_4: iṇassa titikkhākāraṇattāti attho. Yo yamhi kāmacchandena rajjatīti yo puggalo yamhi
tika-s0105t0:365_5: kāmacchandassa vatthubhūte puggale kāmacchandena rajjati. Taṇhāsahagatena taṃ vatthuṃ
tika-s0105t0:365_6: gaṇhātīti taṇhābhūtena kāmacchandena taṃ kāmacchandassa vatthubhūtaṃ puggalaṃ “mameta”nti
tika-s0105t0:365_7: gaṇhāti. Sahagatasaddo hettha tabbhāvamatto “yāyaṃ taṇhā ponobhavikā nandīrāgasahagatā”tiādīsu
tika-s0105t0:365_8: viya. Tenāti kāmacchandassa vatthubhūtena puggalena. Kasmāti āha “titikkhākāraṇa”ntiādi,
tika-s0105t0:365_9: kāmacchandassa titikkhākāraṇattāti attho. Titikkhāsadiso cettha rāgapadhāno akusalacittuppādo
tika-s0105t0:365_10: “titikkhā”ti vutto, na tu “khantī paramaṃ tapo titikkhā”tiādīsu viya tapabhūto adosapadhāno
tika-s0105t0:365_11: cittuppādo. Gharasāmikehīti gharassa sāmikabhūtehi sassusasurasāmikehi. Itthīnaṃ
tika-s0105t0:366_0: “Yathā panā”tiādinā sesānaṃ rogādisadisatā vuttā. Tattha pittadosakopanavasena pittarogāturo.
tika-s0105t0:366_1: Tassa pittakopanato sabbampi madhusakkarādikaṃ amadhurabhāvena sampajjatīti vuttaṃ
tika-s0105t0:366_2: “tittakaṃ tittakanti uggiratiyevā”ti. Tumhe upaddavethāti ṭīkāyaṃ uddhaṭapāṭho, “upaddavaṃ
tika-s0105t0:366_3: karothā”ti nāmadhātuvasena attho, idāni pana “tumhehi upaddutā”ti pāṭho dissati.
tika-s0105t0:366_4: Vibbhamatīti ito cito ca āhiṇḍati, hīnāya vā āvattati. Madhusakkarādīnaṃ rasaṃ na
tika-s0105t0:366_5: vindati nānubhavati na jānāti na labhati ca viyāti sambandho. Sāsanarasanti sāsanassa
tika-s0105t0:367: Nakkhattachaṇaṃ nakkhattaṃ. Tenāha “aho naccaṃ, aho gīta”nti. Muttoti bandhanato pamutto. Dhammassavanassāti sotabbadhammassa.
tika-s0105t0:368_0: Sīghaṃ pavattetabbakiccaṃ accāyikaṃ. Sīghattho hi atisaddo “pāṇātipāto”tiādīsu viya.
tika-s0105t0:368_1: Vinaye apakataññunāti vinayakkame akusalena. Pakataṃ niṭṭhānaṃ vinicchayaṃ jānātīti
tika-s0105t0:368_2: pakataññū, na pakataññū tathā. So hi kappiyākappiyaṃ yāthāvato na jānāti. Tenāha
tika-s0105t0:369_1: samantato saṅkito ca, ativiya saṅkitoti vuttaṃ hoti. Tadākāradassanaṃ “gacchatipī”tiādi.
tika-s0105t0:369_2: So hi thokaṃ gacchatipi. Gacchanto pana tāya ussaṅkitaparisaṅkitatāya tattha tattha
tika-s0105t0:369_3: tiṭṭhatipi. Īdise kantāre gate “ko jānāti, kiṃ bhavissatī”ti nivattatipi, tasmā ca
tika-s0105t0:369_4: gataṭṭhānato agataṭṭhānameva bahutaraṃ hoti, tato eva ca so kicchena kasirena khemantabhūmiṃ
tika-s0105t0:369_5: pāpuṇāti vā, na vā pāpuṇāti. Kicchena kasirenāti pariyāyavacanaṃ, kāyikadukkhena
tika-s0105t0:369_6: khedanaṃ vā kicchaṃ, cetasikadukkhena pīḷanaṃ kasiraṃ. Khemantabhūminti khemabhūtaṃ
tika-s0105t0:369_7: bhūmiṃ antasaddassa tabbhāvattā, bhayassa khīyanaṃ vā khemo, sova anto paricchedo
tika-s0105t0:369_8: yassā tathā, sā eva bhūmīti khemantabhūmi, taṃ nibbhayappadesanti attho. Aṭṭhasu
tika-s0105t0:369_9: ṭhānesūti “tattha katamā vicikicchā? Satthari kaṅkhati vicikicchati. Dhamme. Saṅghe.
tika-s0105t0:369_10: Sikkhāya. Pubbante. Aparante. Pubbantāparante. Idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu
tika-s0105t0:369_11: kaṅkhati vicikicchatī”ti vibhaṅge vuttesu aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu. Adhimuccitvāti vinicchinitvā,
tika-s0105t0:369_12: saddahitvā vā. Saddhāya gaṇhitunti saddheyyavatthuṃ “idameva”nti saddahanavasena
tika-s0105t0:369_13: gaṇhituṃ, saddahituṃ na sakkotīti attho. Itīti tasmā vuttanayena asakkuṇanato antarāyaṃ
tika-s0105t0:369_14: karotīti sambandho. “Atthi nu kho, natthi nu kho”ti araññaṃ paviṭṭhassa ādimhi eva
tika-s0105t0:369_15: sappanaṃ saṃsayo āsappanaṃ. Tato paraṃ samantato, uparūpari vā sappanaṃ parisappanaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:369_16: Ubhayenapi tattheva saṃsayavasena paribbhamanaṃ dasseti. Tenāha “apariyogāhana”nti,
tika-s0105t0:369_17: “evamida”nti samantato anogāhananti attho. Chambhitattanti araññasaññāya uppannaṃ
tika-s0105t0:369_18: chambhitabhāvaṃ hadayamaṃsacalanaṃ, utrāsanti vuttaṃ hoti. Upameyyapakkhepi yathārahamesamattho.
tika-s0105t0:370_0: 224. Tatrāyaṃ sadisatāti ettha pana appahīnapakkhe vuttanayānusārena sadisatā veditabbā.
tika-s0105t0:370_1: Yadaggena hi kāmacchandādayo iṇādisadisā, tadaggena ca tesaṃ pahānaṃ āṇaṇyādisadisatāti.
tika-s0105t0:370_2: Idaṃ pana anuttānapadatthamattaṃ – samiddhatanti aḍḍhataṃ. Pubbe paṇṇamāropitāya
tika-s0105t0:370_3: vaḍḍhiyā saha vattatīti savaḍḍhikaṃ. Paṇṇanti iṇadānaggahaṇe sallakkhaṇavasena likhitapaṇṇaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:370_4: Puna paṇṇanti iṇayācanavasena sāsanalikhitapaṇṇaṃ. Nillepatāyāti dhanasambandhābhāvena
tika-s0105t0:370_5: avilimpanatāya. Tathā alaggatāya. Pariyāyavacanañhetaṃ dvayaṃ. Atha vā nillepatāyāti
tika-s0105t0:370_6: vuttanayena avilimpanabhāvena visesanabhūtena alaggatāyāti attho. Cha dhammeti asubhanimittassa
tika-s0105t0:370_7: uggaho, asubhabhāvanānuyogo, indriyesu guttadvāratā, bhojane mattaññutā, kalyāṇamittatā,
tika-s0105t0:370_8: sappāyakathāti ime cha dhamme. Bhāvetvāti brūhetvā, attani vā uppādetvā. Anuppannaanuppādanauppannappahānādivibhāvanavasena
tika-s0105t0:370_10: vuttaṃ. “Mahāsatipaṭṭhāne”ti ca imasmiṃ dīghāgame saṅgītamāha, na majjhimāgame nikāyantarattā.
tika-s0105t0:370_11: Nikāyantarāgatopi hi attho ācariyehi aññattha yebhuyyena vuttoti vadanti. Esa nayo
tika-s0105t0:370_12: byāpādādippahānabhāgepi. Paravatthumhīti ārammaṇabhūte parasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ. Mamāyanābhāvena
tika-s0105t0:370_13: neva saṅgo. Pariggahābhāvena na baddho. Dibbānipi rūpāni passato kileso na samudācarati,
tika-s0105t0:371_0: Anatthakaroti attano, parassa ca ahitakaro. Cha dhammeti mettānimittassa uggaho,
tika-s0105t0:371_2: ime cha dhamme. Tatthevāti mahāsatipaṭṭhāneyeva. Cārittasīlameva uddissa paññattasikkhāpadaṃ
tika-s0105t0:372_0: Pavesitoti pavesāpito. Bandhanāgāraṃ pavesāpitattā aladdhanakkhattānubhavano puriso
tika-s0105t0:372_1: hi “nakkhattadivase bandhanāgāraṃ pavesito puriso”ti vutto, nakkhattadivase eva vā
tika-s0105t0:372_2: tadananubhavanatthaṃ tathā kato puriso evaṃ vuttotipi vaṭṭati. Aparasminti tato pacchime,
tika-s0105t0:372_3: aññasmiṃ vā nakkhattadivase. Okāsanti kammakāraṇākāraṇaṃ, kammakāraṇakkhaṇaṃ vā.
tika-s0105t0:372_4: Mahānatthakaranti diṭṭhadhammikādiatthahāpanamukhena mahato anatthassa kārakaṃ. Cha
tika-s0105t0:372_6: abbhokāsavāso, kalyāṇamittatā, sappāyakathāti ime cha dhamme, dhammanakkhattassāti
tika-s0105t0:372_7: yathāvuttasotabbadhammasaṅkhātassa mahassa. Sādhūnaṃ ratijananato hi dhammopi chaṇasadisaṭṭhena
tika-s0105t0:373_0: Uddhaccakukkucce mahānatthakaranti parāyattatāpādanena vuttanayena mahato anatthassa
tika-s0105t0:373_1: kārakaṃ. Cha dhammeti bahussutatā, paripucchakatā, vinaye pakataññutā, vuḍḍhasevitā,
tika-s0105t0:373_2: kalyāṇamittatā, sappāyakathāti ime cha dhamme. Balassa, balena vā attanā icchitassa
tika-s0105t0:373_3: karaṇaṃ balakkāro, tena. Nekkhammapaṭipadanti nīvaraṇato nikkhamanapaṭipadaṃ upacārabhāvanameva,
tika-s0105t0:374_0: Balavāti paccatthikavidhamanasamatthena balena balavā vantu-saddassa abhisayatthavisiṭṭhassa
tika-s0105t0:374_1: atthiyatthassa bodhanato. Hatthasāranti hatthagatadhanasāraṃ. Sajjāvudhoti sajjitadhanvādiāvudho,
tika-s0105t0:374_2: sannaddhapañcāvudhoti attho. Sūravīrasevakajanavasena saparivāro. Tanti yathāvuttaṃ
tika-s0105t0:374_3: purisaṃ. Balavantatāya, sajjāvudhatāya, saparivāratāya ca corā dūratova disvā palāyeyyuṃ.
tika-s0105t0:374_4: Anatthakārikāti sammāpaṭipattiyā vibandhakaraṇato vuttanayena ahitakārikā. Cha dhammeti
tika-s0105t0:374_5: bahussutatā, paripucchakatā, vinaye pakataññutā, adhimokkhabahulatā, kalyāṇamittatā,
tika-s0105t0:374_6: sappāyakathāti ime cha dhamme. Yathā bāhusaccādīni uddhaccakukkuccassa pahānāya saṃvattanti,
tika-s0105t0:374_7: evaṃ vicikicchāyapīti idhāpi bahussutatādayo tayopi dhammā gahitā, kalyāṇamittatā,
tika-s0105t0:374_8: pana sappāyakathā ca pañcannampi pahānāya saṃvattanti, tasmā tāsu tassa tassa nīvaraṇassa
tika-s0105t0:374_9: anucchavikasevanatā daṭṭhabbā. Tiṇaṃ viyāti tiṇaṃ bhayavasena na gaṇeti viya. Duccaritakantāraṃ
tika-s0105t0:374_11: kantāraṃ nittharitvā. Vicikicchā hi sammāpaṭipattiyā appaṭipajjananimittatāmukhena
tika-s0105t0:374_12: micchāpaṭipattimeva paribrūhetīti tassā appahānaṃ duccaritacaraṇūpāyo, pahānañca
tika-s0105t0:375_0: 225. “Tuṭṭhākāro”ti iminā pāmojjaṃ nāma taruṇapītiṃ dasseti. Sā hi taruṇatāya kathañcipi
tika-s0105t0:375_2: tassattho “okkantikabhāvappattāya pītiyā vasena tuṭṭhassā”ti ṭīkāyaṃ vutto, evaṃ
tika-s0105t0:375_3: sati pāmojjapadena okkantikā pītiyeva gahitā siyā. “Sakalasarīraṃ khobhayamānā pīti
tika-s0105t0:375_5: ca sakalasarīraṃ khobhayamānā pharaṇalakkhaṇā pīti jāyatī”ti vutto, evañca sati pītipadena
tika-s0105t0:375_6: pharaṇā pītiyeva gahitā siyā, kāraṇaṃ panettha gavesitabbaṃ. Idha, pana aññattha
tika-s0105t0:375_7: ca taruṇabalavatāmattasāmaññena padadvayassa atthadīpanato yā kāci taruṇā pīti pāmojjaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:375_8: balavatī pīti, pañcavidhāya vā pītiyā yathākkamaṃ taruṇabalavatāsambhavato purimā
tika-s0105t0:375_9: purimā pāmojjaṃ, pacchimā pacchimā pītītipi vadanti, ayamettha tadanucchaviko attho.
tika-s0105t0:375_10: Tuṭṭhassāti pāmojjasaṅkhātāya taruṇapītiyā vasena tuṭṭhassa. Ta-saddo hi atītattho,
tika-s0105t0:375_12: “Sakalasarīraṃ khobhayamānā”ti iminā pīti nāma ettha balavapītīti dasseti. Sā hi
tika-s0105t0:375_13: attano savipphārikatāya, attasamuṭṭhānapaṇītarūpuppattiyā ca sakalasarīraṃ saṅkhobhayamānā
tika-s0105t0:375_14: jāyati. Sakalasarīre pītivegassa pītivipphārassa uppādanañcettha saṅkhobhanaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:376_0: Pītisahitaṃ pīti uttarapadalopena. Kiṃ pana taṃ? Mano, pīti mano etassāti samāso.
tika-s0105t0:376_1: Pītiyā sampayuttaṃ mano yassātipi vaṭṭati, tassa. Atthamattaṃ pana dassetuṃ “pītisampayuttacittassa
tika-s0105t0:376_2: puggalassā”ti vuttaṃ. Kāyoti idha sabbopi arūpakalāpo adhippeto, na pana kāyalahutādīsu
tika-s0105t0:376_3: viya vedanādikkhandhattayameva, na ca kāyāyatanādīsu viya rūpakāyampīti dasseti “nāmakāyo”ti
tika-s0105t0:376_4: iminā. Passaddhidvayavaseneva hettha passambhanamadhippetaṃ, passambhanaṃ pana vigatakilesadarathatāti
tika-s0105t0:376_7: kāyikampi sukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedetīti vuttaṃ “kāyikampi cetasikampi sukhaṃ vedayatī”ti.
tika-s0105t0:376_8: Iminā nekkhammasukhenāti “sukhaṃ vedetī”ti evaṃ vuttena saṃkilesanīvaraṇapakkhato
tika-s0105t0:376_9: nikkhantattā, paṭhamajjhānapakkhikattā ca yathārahaṃ nekkhammasaṅkhātena upacārasukhena
tika-s0105t0:376_10: appanāsukhena ca. Samādhānampettha tadubhayenevāti vuttaṃ “upacāravasenāpi appanāvasenāpī”ti.
tika-s0105t0:377_0: Ettha panāyamadhippāyo – kāmacchandappahānato paṭṭhāya yāva passaddhakāyassa sukhapaṭisaṃvedanā,
tika-s0105t0:377_1: tāva yathā pubbe, tathā idhāpi pubbabhāgabhāvanāyeva vuttā, na appanā. Tathā hi kāmacchandappahāne
tika-s0105t0:377_3: appavattanaṃ, na paṭipakkhānaṃ suppahīnatā, pahīnattāti ca pahīnasadisataṃ sandhāya
tika-s0105t0:377_4: vuttaṃ jhānassa anadhigatattā”ti. Passaddhakāyassa sukhapaṭisaṃvedanāya ca vuttappakārāya
tika-s0105t0:377_6: kāyikampi sukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedetīti. Apica kā nāma kathā aññehi vattabbā aṭṭhakathāyameva
tika-s0105t0:377_7: “cha dhamme bhāvetvā”ti tattha tattha pubbabhāgabhāvanāya vuttattā. Sukhino cittasamādhāne
tika-s0105t0:377_8: pana sukhassa upacārabhāvanāya viya appanāyapi kāraṇattā, “so vivicceva kāmehī”tiādinā
tika-s0105t0:377_9: ca vakkhamānāya appanāya hetuphalavasena sambajjhanato pubbabhāgasamādhi, appanāsamādhi
tika-s0105t0:377_10: ca vutto, pubbabhāgasukhamiva vā appanāsukhampi appanāsamādhissa kāraṇamevāti tampi
tika-s0105t0:377_11: appanāsukhaṃ appanāsamādhino kāraṇabhāvena ācariyadhammapālattherena gahitanti imamatthamasallakkhentā
tika-s0105t0:377_12: nekkhammapadatthaṃ yathātathaṃ aggahetvā pāḷiyaṃ, aṭṭhakathāyampi saṃkiṇṇākulaṃ keci karontīti.
tika-s0105t0:379_0: 226. Yadevaṃ “sukhino cittaṃ samādhiyatī”ti eteneva upacāravasenapi appanāvasenapi
tika-s0105t0:379_1: cittassa samādhānaṃ kathitaṃ siyā, evaṃ sante “so vivicceva kāmehī”tiādikā desanā
tika-s0105t0:379_2: kimatthiyāti codanāya “so vivicceva…pe… vuttanti veditabba”nti vuttaṃ. Tattha “samāhite”ti
tika-s0105t0:379_3: padadvayaṃ “dassanatthaṃ vutta”nti imehi sambandhitvā samāhitattā tathā dassanatthaṃ
tika-s0105t0:379_4: vuttanti adhippāyo veditabbo. Uparivisesadassanatthanti upacārasamādhito, paṭhamajjhānādisamādhito
tika-s0105t0:379_5: ca upari pattabbassa paṭhamadutiyajjhānādivisesassa dassanatthaṃ. Upacārasamādhisamadhigameneva
tika-s0105t0:379_6: hi paṭhamajjhānādiviseso samadhigantuṃ sakkā, na pana tena vinā, dutiyajjhānādisamadhigamepi
tika-s0105t0:379_8: viyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Appanāsamādhināti paṭhamajjhānādiappanāsamādhinā. Tassa samādhinoti
tika-s0105t0:379_9: yo appanālakkhaṇo samādhi “sukhino cittaṃ samādhiyatī”ti sabbasādhāraṇavasena vutto,
tika-s0105t0:379_10: tassa samādhino. Pabhedadassanatthanti dutiyajjhānādivibhāgassa ceva paṭhamābhiññādivibhāgassa
tika-s0105t0:379_12: So hi gabbhāsaye karīyatīti katvā karasaṅkhātato pupphasambhavato jātattā karajoti
tika-s0105t0:379_13: vuccati. Karoti hi mātu soṇitasaṅkhātapupphassa, pitu sukkasaṅkhātasambhavassa ca
tika-s0105t0:379_14: nāmaṃ, tato jāto pana aṇḍajajalābujavasena gabbhaseyyakakāyova. Kāmaṃ opapātikādīnampi
tika-s0105t0:379_15: hetusampannānaṃ yathāvuttasamādhisamadhigamo sambhavati, tathāpi yebhuyyattā, pākaṭattā
tika-s0105t0:379_16: ca sveva kāyo vuttoti. Karoti putte nibbattetīti karo, sukkasoṇitaṃ, karena jāto karajotipi vadanti.
tika-s0105t0:380_0: Nanu ca nāmakāyopi vivekajena pītisukhena tathā laddhūpakārova siyā, atha kasmā yathāvutto
tika-s0105t0:380_2: hi rūpakāyo eva idha bhagavatā vuttoti adhigamīyati tasseva abhisandanādikiriyāyogyattāti.
tika-s0105t0:380_3: Abhisandetīti abhisandanaṃ karoti, so imameva kāyaṃ vivekajena pītisukhenāti hi bhedavasena,
tika-s0105t0:380_4: samudāyāvayavavasena ca parikappanāmattasiddhā hetukiriyā ettha labbhati, abhisandanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:380_5: panetaṃ jhānamayena pītisukhena karajakāyassa tintabhāvāpādanaṃ, sabbatthakameva
tika-s0105t0:380_6: ca lūkhabhāvassāpanayananti āha “temeti snehetī”ti, avassutabhāvaṃ, allabhāvañca
tika-s0105t0:380_7: karotīti attho. Atthato pana abhisandanaṃ nāma yathāvuttapītisukhasamuṭṭhānehi paṇītarūpehi
tika-s0105t0:380_8: kāyassa parippharaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tenevāha “sabbattha pavattapīti sukhaṃ karotī”ti.
tika-s0105t0:380_10: eseva nayo. Bhastaṃ nāma cammapasibbakaṃ. Parippharatīti suddhakiriyāpadaṃ. Tena
tika-s0105t0:380_11: vuttaṃ “samantato phusatī”ti, so imameva kāyaṃ vivekajena pītisukhena samantato phuṭṭho
tika-s0105t0:380_12: bhavatīti attho. Phusanakiriyāyevettha upapannā, na byāpanakiriyā bhikkhusseva suddhakattubhāvato.
tika-s0105t0:380_13: Sabbaṃ etassa atthīti sabbavā yathā “guṇavā”ti, tassa sabbavato, “avayavāvayavīsambandhe
tika-s0105t0:380_14: avayavini sāmivacana”nti saddalakkhaṇena panetassa “kiñcī”ti avayavena sambajjhanato
tika-s0105t0:380_18: aphuṭaṃ nāma na hotīti sambandho. Chavimaṃsalohitānugatanti chavimaṃsalohitādikammajarūpamanugataṃ.
tika-s0105t0:380_19: Yattha yattha kammajarūpaṃ, tattha tattha cittajarūpassāpi byāpanato tena tassa kāyassa
tika-s0105t0:380_20: phuṭabhāvaṃ sandhāya “aphuṭaṃ nāma na hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:381_0: 227. Chekoti kusalo, taṃ pana kosallaṃ “kaṃsathāle nhāniyacuṇṇāni ākiritvā”tiādisaddantarasannidhānato,
tika-s0105t0:381_1: pakaraṇato ca nhāniyacuṇṇānaṃ karaṇe, payojane, piṇḍane ca samatthatāvasena veditabbanti
tika-s0105t0:381_3: āgato, “kaṃso upahato yathā”tiādīsu kittimalohe, “upakaṃso nāma rājā mahākaṃsassa
tika-s0105t0:381_4: atrajo”tiādīsu [jā. aṭṭha. 4.10.164 (atthato samānaṃ)] paṇṇattimatte. Idha pana yattha
tika-s0105t0:381_5: katthaci loheti āha “yena kenaci lohena katabhājane”ti. Nanu upamākaraṇamattamevidaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:381_6: atha kasmā kaṃsathālakassa savisesassa gahaṇaṃ katanti anuyogaṃ pariharati “mattikābhājana”ntiādinā.
tika-s0105t0:381_7: “Sandentassā”ti parimaddetvā piṇḍaṃ karontasseva bhijjati, na pana sandanakkhamaṃ
tika-s0105t0:381_8: hoti, anādaralakkhaṇe cetaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. Kiriyantarassa pavattanakkhaṇeyeva kiriyantarassa
tika-s0105t0:381_10: dasseti “siñcitvā siñcitvā”ti iminā. Phusasaddo cettha parisiñcane yathā taṃ vātavuṭṭhisamaye
tika-s0105t0:381_11: “devo ca thokaṃ thokaṃ phusāyatī”ti, tasmā tato tato nhāniyacuṇṇato upari udakena
tika-s0105t0:381_12: byāpanakaraṇavasena parisiñcitvā parisiñcitvāti attho. Anupasaggopi hi saddo saupasaggo
tika-s0105t0:381_13: viya pakaraṇādhigatassa atthassa dīpako, “siñcitvā siñcitvā”ti pana vacanaṃ “paripphosakaṃ
tika-s0105t0:381_15: “Sandeyyā”ti ettha sanda-saddo piṇḍakaraṇeti vuttaṃ “piṇḍaṃ kareyyā”ti. Anugatāti
tika-s0105t0:381_16: anupavisanavasena gatā upagatā. Pariggahitāti parito gahitā samantato phuṭṭhā.
tika-s0105t0:382_0: Antaro ca bāhiro ca padeso, tehi saha pavattatīti santarabāhirā, nhāniyapiṇḍi, “samantarabāhirā”tipi
tika-s0105t0:382_1: pāṭho, ma-kāro padasandhivasena āgamo. Yathāvuttena pariggahitatākāraṇeneva santarabāhiro
tika-s0105t0:382_2: nhāniyapiṇḍi phuṭā udakasnehenāti āha “sabbatthakameva udakasinehena phuṭā”ti. Sabbattha
tika-s0105t0:382_3: pavattanaṃ sabbatthakaṃ, bhāvanapuṃsakañcetaṃ, sabbapadese hutvā eva phuṭāti attho.
tika-s0105t0:382_4: “Santarabāhirā phuṭā”ti ca iminā nhāniyapiṇḍiyā sabbaso udakena temitabhāvamāha,
tika-s0105t0:382_5: “na ca paggharaṇī”ti pana iminā tintāyapi tāya ghanathaddhabhāvaṃ. Tenāha “na ca
tika-s0105t0:382_6: binduṃ bindu”ntiādi. Udakassa phusitaṃ phusitaṃ, na ca paggharaṇī sūdanīti attho,
tika-s0105t0:382_7: “binduṃ udakaṃ” tipi katthaci pāṭho, udakasaṅkhātaṃ bindunti tassattho. Bindusaddo
tika-s0105t0:382_8: hi “byālambambudharabindū”tiādīsu viya dhārāvayave. Evaṃ pana apaggharaṇato hatthenapi
tika-s0105t0:382_9: dvīhipi tīhipi aṅgulehi gahetuṃ, ovaṭṭikāya vā kātuṃ sakkā. Yadi hi sā paggharaṇī
tika-s0105t0:382_10: assa, evaṃ sati snehavigamanena sukkhattā thaddhā hutvā tathā gahetuṃ, kātuṃ vā na
tika-s0105t0:382_11: sakkāti vuttaṃ hoti. Ovaṭṭikāyāti parivaṭṭulavasena, guḷikāvasena sā piṇḍi kātuṃ sakkāti attho.
tika-s0105t0:384_0: 229. Tāhi tāhi udakasirāhi ubbhijjati uddhaṃ nikkhamatīti ubbhidaṃ, tādisaṃ udakaṃ
tika-s0105t0:384_1: yassāti ubbhidodako, da-kārassa pana ta-kāre kate ubbhitodako, imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ
tika-s0105t0:384_2: “ubbhinnaudako”ti vuttaṃ, nadītīre khatakūpako viya ubbhijjanakaudakoti attho. Ubbhijjanakampi
tika-s0105t0:384_3: udakaṃ katthaci heṭṭhā ubbhijjitvā dhārāvasena uṭṭhahitvā bahi gacchati, na taṃ koci
tika-s0105t0:384_4: antoyeva patiṭṭhitaṃ kātuṃ sakkoti dhārāvasena uṭṭhahanato, idha pana vālikātaṭe
tika-s0105t0:384_5: viya udakarahadassa antoyeva ubbhijjitvā tattheva tiṭṭhati, na dhārāvasena uṭṭhahitvā
tika-s0105t0:384_6: bahi gacchatīti viññāyati akhobhakassa sannisinnasseva udakassa adhippetattāti imamatthaṃ
tika-s0105t0:384_7: sandhāyāha “na heṭṭhā”tiādi. Heṭṭhāti udakarahadassa heṭṭhā mahāudakasirā, lohitānugatā
tika-s0105t0:384_8: lohitasirā viya udakānugato pathavipadeso “udakasirā”ti vuccati. Uggacchanakaudakoti
tika-s0105t0:384_9: dhārāvasena uṭṭhahanakaudako. Antoyevāti udakarahadassa anto samatalapadese eva.
tika-s0105t0:384_10: Ubbhijjanakaudakoti ubbhijjitvā tattheva tiṭṭhanakaudako. Āgamanamaggoti bāhirato
tika-s0105t0:384_11: udakarahadābhimukhaṃ āgamanamaggo. Kālena kālanti ruḷhīpadaṃ “eko ekāyā”tiādi viyāti
tika-s0105t0:384_12: vuttaṃ “kāle kāle”ti. Anvaddhamāsanti ettha anusaddo byāpane. Vassānassa addhamāsaṃ
tika-s0105t0:384_13: addhamāsanti attho. Evaṃ anudasāhanti etthāpi. Vuṭṭhinti vassanaṃ. Anuppavaccheyyāti
tika-s0105t0:384_14: na upavaccheyya. Vassasaddato cassa siddhīti dasseti “na vasseyyā”ti iminā.
tika-s0105t0:385_1: dhārasaddassa dviliṅgikabhāvaviññāpanatthaṃ. Sītanti khobhanābhāvena sītalaṃ, purāṇapaṇṇatiṇakaṭṭhādisaṃkiṇṇābhāvena
tika-s0105t0:385_2: vā setaṃ parisuddhaṃ. Setaṃ sītanti hi pariyāyo. Kasmā panettha ubbhidodakoyeva rahado
tika-s0105t0:385_3: gahito, na itareti anuyogamapaneti “heṭṭhā uggacchanaudakañhī”tiādinā. Uggantvā uggantvā
tika-s0105t0:385_4: bhijjantanti uṭṭhahitvā uṭṭhahitvā dhārākiraṇavasena ubbhijjantaṃ, vinassantaṃ vā.
tika-s0105t0:385_5: Khobhetīti āloḷeti. Vuṭṭhīti vassanaṃ. Dhārānipātapubbuḷakehīti udakadhārānipātehi
tika-s0105t0:385_6: ca tatoyeva uṭṭhitaudakapubbuḷakasaṅkhātehi pheṇapaṭalehi ca. Evaṃ yathākkamaṃ tiṇṇampi
tika-s0105t0:385_8: Tattha sannisinnamevāti sammā, samaṃ vā nisinnameva, aparikkhobhatāya niccalameva,
tika-s0105t0:385_9: suppasannamevāti adhippāyo. Iddhinimmitamivāti iddhimatā iddhiyā tathā nimmitaṃ iva.
tika-s0105t0:387_0: 231. “Uppalinī”tiādi gacchassapi vanassapi adhivacanaṃ. Idha pana “yāva aggā, yāva
tika-s0105t0:387_1: ca mūlā”ti vacanayogena “appekaccānī”tiādinā uppalagacchādīnameva gahetabbatāya vanamevādhippetaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:387_2: tasmā “uppalānīti uppalagacchāni. Etthāti uppalavane”tiādinā attho veditabbo. Avayavena
tika-s0105t0:387_3: hi samudāyassa nibbacanaṃ kataṃ. Ekañhi uppalagacchādi uppalādiyeva, catupañcamattampi
tika-s0105t0:387_4: pana uppalādivananti voharīyati, sāratthadīpaniyaṃ pana jalāsayopi uppaliniādibhāvena
tika-s0105t0:387_5: vutto. Ettha cāti etasmiṃ padattaye, etesu vā tīsu uppalapadumapuṇḍarīkasaṅkhātesu
tika-s0105t0:387_7: attho. Yaṃ kiñci uppalaṃ uppalameva uppalasaddassa sāmaññanāmavasena tesu sabbesupi
tika-s0105t0:387_8: pavattanato. Satapattanti ettha satasaddo bahupariyāyo “satagghī sataraṃsi sūriyo”tiādīsu
tika-s0105t0:387_9: viya anekasaṅkhyābhāvato. Evañca katvā anekapattassāpi padumabhāve saṅgaho siddho
tika-s0105t0:387_10: hoti. Pattanti ca pupphadalamadhippetaṃ. Vaṇṇaniyamena setaṃ padumaṃ, rattaṃ puṇḍarīkanti
tika-s0105t0:387_11: sāsanavohāro, loke pana “rattaṃ padumaṃ, setaṃ puṇḍarīka”nti vadanti. Vuttañhi “puṇḍarīkaṃ
tika-s0105t0:387_12: sitaṃ rattaṃ, kokanadaṃ kokāsako”ti. Rattavaṇṇatāya hi kokanāmakānaṃ sunakhānaṃ nādayato
tika-s0105t0:387_13: saddāpayato, tehi ca asitabbato “kokanadaṃ, kokāsako”ti ca padumaṃ vuccati. Yathāha
tika-s0105t0:387_14: “padmaṃ yathā kokanadaṃ sugandha”nti. Ayaṃ panettha vacanattho udakaṃ pāti, udake
tika-s0105t0:387_15: vā plavatīti uppalaṃ. Paṅke davati gacchati, pakārena vā davati viruhatīti padumaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:387_16: Paṇḍaraṃ vaṇṇamassa, mahantatāya vā muḍitabbaṃkhaṇḍetabbanti puṇḍarīkaṃ ma-kārassa
tika-s0105t0:387_17: pa-kārādivasena. Muḍisaddañhi muḍarisaddaṃ vā khaṇḍanatthamicchanti saddavidū, saddasatthato
tika-s0105t0:387_18: cettha padasiddhi. Yāva aggā, yāva ca mūlā udakena abhisandanādibhāvadassanatthaṃ
tika-s0105t0:387_19: pāḷiyaṃ “udakānuggatānī”ti vacanaṃ, tasmā udakato na uggatānicceva attho, na tu udake
tika-s0105t0:387_20: anurūpagatānīti āha “udakā…pe… gatānī”ti. Idha pana uppalādīni viya karajakāyo, udakaṃ
tika-s0105t0:389_0: 233. Yasmā pana catutthajjhānacittameva “cetasā”ti vuttaṃ, tañca rāgādiupakkilesamalāpagamato
tika-s0105t0:389_1: nirupakkilesaṃ nimmalaṃ, tasmā upakkilesavigamanameva parisuddhabhāvoti āha “nirupakkilesaṭṭhena
tika-s0105t0:389_2: parisuddha”nti. Yasmā ca parisuddhasseva paccayavisesena pavattiviseso pariyodātatā
tika-s0105t0:389_3: suddhantasuvaṇṇassa nighaṃsanena pabhassaratā viya, tasmā pabhassaratāyeva pariyodātatāti
tika-s0105t0:389_4: āha “pabhassaraṭṭhena pariyodāta”nti. Vijju viya pabhāya ito cito ca niccharaṇaṃ
tika-s0105t0:389_5: pabhassaraṃ yathā “ābhassarā”ti. Odātena vatthenāti ettha “odātenā”ti guṇavacanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:389_6: sandhāya “odātena…pe… ida”nti vuttaṃ. Utupharaṇatthanti uṇhassa utuno pharaṇadassanatthaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:389_7: Kasmāti āha “kiliṭṭhavatthenā”tiādi. Utupharaṇaṃ na hotīti odātavatthena viya savisesaṃ
tika-s0105t0:389_8: utupharaṇaṃ na hoti, appakamattameva hotīti adhippāyo. Tenāha “taṅkhaṇa…pe… balavaṃ
tika-s0105t0:389_9: hotī”ti. “Taṅkhaṇadhotaparisuddhenā”ti ca etena odātasaddo ettha parisuddhavacano
tika-s0105t0:389_10: eva “gihī odātavatthavasano”tiādīsu viya, na setavacano yena kenaci taṅkhaṇadhotaparisuddheneva
tika-s0105t0:390_0: Nanu ca pāḷiyaṃ “nāssa kiñci sabbāvato kāyassa odātena vatthena aphuṭaṃ assā”ti kāyassa
tika-s0105t0:390_1: odātavatthapharaṇaṃ vuttaṃ, na pana vatthassa utupharaṇaṃ, atha kasmā utupharaṇaṃ
tika-s0105t0:390_2: idha vuttanti anuyogenāha “imissāya hī”tiādi. Yasmā vatthaṃ viya karajakāyo, utupharaṇaṃ
tika-s0105t0:390_3: viya catutthajjhānasukhaṃ, tasmā evamattho veditabboti vuttaṃ hoti, etena ca odātena
tika-s0105t0:390_4: vatthena sabbāvato kāyassa pharaṇāsambhavato, upameyyena ca ayuttattā kāyaggahaṇena
tika-s0105t0:390_5: tannissitavatthaṃ gahetabbaṃ, vatthaggahaṇena ca tappaccayaṃ utupharaṇanti dasseti.
tika-s0105t0:390_6: Neyyatthato hi ayaṃ upamā vuttā. Vicitradesanā hi buddhā bhagavantoti. Yogino hi
tika-s0105t0:390_7: karajakāyo vatthaṃ viya daṭṭhabbo utupharaṇasadisena catutthajjhānasukhena pharitabbattā,
tika-s0105t0:390_8: utupharaṇaṃ viya catutthajjhānasukhaṃ vatthassa viya tena karajakāyassa pharaṇato,
tika-s0105t0:390_9: purisassa sarīraṃ viya catutthajjhānaṃ utupharaṇaṭṭhāniyassa sukhassa nissayabhāvato.
tika-s0105t0:390_10: Tenāha “tasmā”tiādi. Idañhi yathāvuttavacanassa guṇadassanaṃ. Ettha ca pāḷiyaṃ “parisuddhena
tika-s0105t0:390_11: cetasā”ti cetogahaṇena catutthajjhānasukhaṃ bhagavatā vuttanti ñāpetuṃ “catutthajjhānasukhaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:390_12: catutthajjhānasukhenā”ti ca vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Nanu ca catutthajjhānasukhaṃ nāma
tika-s0105t0:390_13: sātalakkhaṇaṃ natthīti? Saccaṃ, santasabhāvattā panettha upekkhāyeva “sukha”nti adhippetā.
tika-s0105t0:390_14: Tena vuttaṃ sammohavinodaniyaṃ “upekkhā pana santattā, sukhamicceva bhāsitā”ti.
tika-s0105t0:391_1: tāvatā vacanakkamena. Labhanaṃ lābho, so etassāti lābhī, rūpajjhānānaṃ lābhī rūpajjhānalābhī
tika-s0105t0:391_3: vā lābhī. Kiṃ labhanasīlo? Rūpajjhānānītipi yujjati. Evamitarasmimpi. Na arūpajjhānalābhīti
tika-s0105t0:391_4: na veditabboti yojetabbaṃ. Kasmāti vuttaṃ “na hī”tiādi, aṭṭhannampi samāpattīnaṃ
tika-s0105t0:391_5: upari abhiññādhigame avinābhāvatoti vuttaṃ hoti. Cuddasahākārehīti “kasiṇānulomato,
tika-s0105t0:391_9: imehi cuddasahākārehi. Satipi jhānesu āvajjanādipañcavidhavasībhāve ayameva cuddasavidho
tika-s0105t0:391_10: vasībhāvo abhiññā nibbattane ekantena icchitabboti dassentena “cuddasahākārehi ciṇṇavasībhāva”nti
tika-s0105t0:391_11: vuttaṃ, iminā ca arūpasamāpattīsu ciṇṇavasībhāvaṃ vinā rūpasamāpattīsu eva ciṇṇavasībhāvena
tika-s0105t0:391_12: samāpatti na ijjhatīti tāsaṃ abhiññādhigame avinābhāvaṃ dassetīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:392_0: Nanu yathāpāṭhameva vinicchayo vattabboti codanaṃ sodheti “pāḷiyaṃ panā”tiādinā,
tika-s0105t0:392_1: sāvasesapāṭhabhāvato nīharitvā esa vinicchayo vattabboti vuttaṃ hoti. Yajjevaṃ arūpajjhānānipi
tika-s0105t0:392_2: pāḷiyaṃ gahetabbāni, atha kasmā tāni aggahetvā sāvasesapāṭho bhagavatā katoti? Sabbābhiññānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:392_3: visesato rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānapādakattā. Satipi hi tāsaṃ tathā avinābhāve visesato
tika-s0105t0:392_4: panetā rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānapādakā, tasmā tāsaṃ tappādakabhāvaviññāpanatthaṃ tattheva
tika-s0105t0:392_5: ṭhatvā desanā katā, na pana arūpāvacarajjhānānaṃ idha ananupayogato. Tenāha “arūpajjhānāni
tika-s0105t0:394_0: 234. “Puna caparaṃ mahārāja (pāḷiyaṃ natthi) bhikkhū”ti vatvāpi kimatthaṃ dassetuṃ
tika-s0105t0:394_1: “so”ti padaṃ puna vuttanti codanāyāha “so…pe… dassetī”ti, yathārutavasena, neyyatthavasena
tika-s0105t0:394_2: ca vuttāsu aṭṭhasu samāpattīsu ciṇṇavasitāvisiṭṭhaṃ bhikkhuṃ dassetuṃ evaṃ vuttanti
tika-s0105t0:394_3: adhippāyo. Sesanti “so”ti padatthato sesaṃ “evaṃ samāhite”tiādīsu vattabbaṃ sādhippāyamatthajātaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:394_4: Ñeyyaṃ jānātīti ñāṇaṃ, tadeva paccakkhaṃ katvā passatīti dassanaṃ, ñāṇameva dassanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:394_5: na cakkhādikanti ñāṇadassanaṃ, pañcavidhampi ñāṇaṃ, tayidaṃ pana ñāṇadassanapadaṃ
tika-s0105t0:394_6: sāsane yesu ñāṇavisesesu niruḷhaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ atthuddhāravasena dassento “ñāṇadassananti
tika-s0105t0:394_8: Phāsuvihāroti ariyavihārabhūto sukhavihāro. Bhagavatopīti na kevalaṃ devatārocanameva,
tika-s0105t0:394_9: atha kho tadā bhagavatopi ñāṇadassanaṃ udapādīti attho. Sattāhaṃ kālaṅkatassa assāti
tika-s0105t0:394_11: nāma arahattaphalasamāpatti. Yasmā vipassanāñāṇaṃ ñeyyasaṅkhāte tebhūmakasaṅkhāre
tika-s0105t0:394_12: aniccādito jānāti, bhaṅgānupassanato ca paṭṭhāya paccakkhato te passati, tasmā yathāvuttaṭṭhena
tika-s0105t0:395_0: Abhinīharatīti vipassanābhimukhaṃ cittaṃ tadaññakaraṇīyato nīharitvā haratīti ayaṃ
tika-s0105t0:395_1: saddato attho, adhippāyato pana taṃ dassetuṃ “vipassanāñāṇassā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tadabhimukhabhāvoyeva
tika-s0105t0:395_2: hissa tanninnatādikaraṇaṃ, taṃ pana vuttanayena aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgate tasmiṃ citte
tika-s0105t0:395_3: vipassanākkamena jāte vipassanābhimukhaṃ cittapesanamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tanninnanti
tika-s0105t0:395_4: tassaṃ vipassanāyaṃ ninnaṃ. Itaradvayaṃ tasseva vevacanaṃ. Tassaṃ poṇaṃ vaṅkaṃ pabbhāraṃ
tika-s0105t0:395_5: nīcanti attho. Brahmajāle vuttoyeva. Odanakummāsehi upacīyati vaḍḍhāpīyati, upacayati
tika-s0105t0:395_7: ettha “aniccadhammo”tiādinā dhammasaddo paccekaṃ yojetabbo. Tattha aniccadhammoti
tika-s0105t0:395_8: pabhaṅgutāya addhuvasabhāvo. Duggandhavighātatthāyāti sarīre duggandhassa vigamāya.
tika-s0105t0:395_9: Ucchādanadhammoti ucchādetabbatāsabhāvo, imassa pūtikāyassa duggandhabhāvato gandhodakādīhi
tika-s0105t0:395_10: ubbaṭṭanavilimpanajātikoti attho. Ucchādanena hi pūtikāye sedavātapittasemhādīhi
tika-s0105t0:395_12: hoti, aṅgapaccaṅgābādhavinodanatthaṃ pana khuddakasambāhanameva yuttanti āha “khuddakasambāhanenā”ti,
tika-s0105t0:396_0: Evaṃ aniyamitakālavasena atthaṃ vatvā idāni niyamitakālavasena atthaṃ vadati “daharakāle”tiādinā.
tika-s0105t0:396_1: Vā-saddo cettha atthadassanavaseneva atthantaravikappanassa viññāyamānattā na payutto,
tika-s0105t0:396_2: luttaniddiṭṭho vā. Daharakāleti aciravijātakāle. Sayāpetvā añchanapīḷanādivasena
tika-s0105t0:396_3: parimaddanadhammoti sambandho. Mitanti bhāvanapuṃsakaniddeso, tena yathāpamāṇaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:396_4: mandaṃ vā añchanapīḷanādīni dasseti. Añchanañcettha ākaḍḍhanaṃ. Pīḷanaṃ sambāhanaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:396_5: Ādisaddena samiñjanauggamanādīni saṅgaṇhāti. Evaṃ pariharitopīti ucchādanādinā sukhedhitopi.
tika-s0105t0:396_6: Bhijjati cevāti aniccatādivasena nassati ca. Vikirati cāti evaṃ bhindanto ca kiñci
tika-s0105t0:396_7: payojanaṃ asādhento vippakiṇṇova hoti. Evaṃ navahi padehi yathārahaṃ kāye samudayavayadhammānupassitā
tika-s0105t0:396_8: dassitāti imamatthaṃ vibhāvento “tatthā”tiādimāha. Tattha chahi padehīti “rūpī, cātumahābhūtiko,
tika-s0105t0:396_10: chahi padehi. Yuttaṃ tāva hotu majjhe tīhipi padehi kāyassa samudayakathanaṃ tesaṃ
tika-s0105t0:396_11: tadatthadīpanato, “rūpī, ucchādanadhammo, parimaddanadhammo”ti pana tīhi tpadehi
tika-s0105t0:396_12: kathaṃ tassa tathākathanaṃ yuttaṃ siyā tesaṃ tadatthassa adīpanatoti? Yuttameva tesampi
tika-s0105t0:396_13: tadatthassa dīpitattā. “Rūpī”ti hi idaṃ attano paccayabhūtena utuāhāralakkhaṇena
tika-s0105t0:396_14: rūpena rūpavāti atthassa dīpakaṃ. Paccayasaṅgamavisiṭṭhe hi tadassatthiatthe ayamīkāro.
tika-s0105t0:396_17: dvīhi padehi. Nissitañca kāyapariyāpanne hadayavatthumhi nissitattā vipassanācittassa.
tika-s0105t0:396_18: Tadā pavattañhi vipassanācittameva “idañca me viññāṇa”nti āsannapaccakkhavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:396_19: Paṭibaddhañca kāyena vinā appavattanato, kāyasaññitānañca rūpadhammānaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇato.
tika-s0105t0:397_0: 235. Suṭṭhu obhāsatīti subho, pabhāsampanno maṇi, tāya eva pabhāsampattiyā maṇino
tika-s0105t0:397_1: bhadratāti atthamattaṃ dassetuṃ “subhoti sundaro”ti vuttaṃ. Parisuddhākarasamuṭṭhānameva
tika-s0105t0:397_3: samuṭṭhitoti attho. Ākaraparivisuddhimūlako eva hi maṇino kuruvindajātiādijātivisesoti.
tika-s0105t0:397_4: Idhādhippetassa pana veḷuriyamaṇino viḷūra pabbatassa, viḷūra gāmassa ca avidūre
tika-s0105t0:397_5: parisuddhākaro. Yebhuyyena hi so tato samuṭṭhito. Tathā hesa viḷūranāmakassa pabbatassa,
tika-s0105t0:397_6: gāmassa ca avidūre samuṭṭhitattā veḷuriyoti paññāyittha, devaloke pavattassapi ca
tika-s0105t0:397_7: taṃsadisavaṇṇanibhatāya tadeva nāmaṃ jātaṃ yathā taṃ manussaloke laddhanāmavasena
tika-s0105t0:397_8: devaloke devatānaṃ, so pana mayūragīvāvaṇṇo vā hoti vāyasapattavaṇṇo vā siniddhaveṇupattavaṇṇo
tika-s0105t0:397_9: vāti ācariyadhammapālattherena paramatthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ. Vinayasaṃvaṇṇanāsu pana
tika-s0105t0:397_11: ca vutto, tatoyeva so idha padese mañjāramaṇīti pākaṭo hoti. Cakkavattiparibhogārahapaṇītataramaṇibhāvato
tika-s0105t0:397_12: pana tasseva pāḷiyaṃ vacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yathāha “puna caparaṃ ānanda rañño mahāsudassanassa
tika-s0105t0:397_13: maṇiratanaṃ pāturahosi, so ahosi maṇi veḷuriyo subho jātimā aṭṭhaṃso”tiādi. Pāsāṇasakkharādidosanīharaṇavaseneva
tika-s0105t0:398_0: Chaviyā eva saṇhabhāvena acchatā, na saṅghātassāti āha “acchoti tanucchavī”ti. Tato
tika-s0105t0:398_1: ceva visesena pasannoti dassetuṃ “suṭṭhu pasanno”ti vuttaṃ. Paribhogamaṇiratanākārasampatti
tika-s0105t0:398_3: kāḷakādiapaharaṇatthāya ceva suttena āvunatthāya ca vijjhitabbatā vedhanaṃ. Ādisaddena
tika-s0105t0:398_4: tāpasaṇhakaraṇādīnaṃ saṅgaho. Vaṇṇasampattinti āvunitasuttassa vaṇṇasampattiṃ. Kasmāti
tika-s0105t0:398_5: vuttaṃ “tādisa”ntiādi, tādisasseva āvutassa pākaṭabhāvatoti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t0:399_0: Maṇi viya karajakāyo paccavekkhitabbato. Āvutasuttaṃ viya viññāṇaṃ anupavisitvā ṭhitattā.
tika-s0105t0:399_1: Cakkhumā puriso viya vipassanālābhī bhikkhu sammadeva tassa dassanato, tassa purisassa
tika-s0105t0:399_2: maṇino āvibhūtakālo viya tassa bhikkhuno kāyassa āvibhūtakālo tannissayassa pākaṭabhāvato.
tika-s0105t0:399_3: Suttassāvibhūtakālo viya tesaṃ dhammānamāvibhūtakālo tannissitassa pākaṭabhāvatoti
tika-s0105t0:399_4: ayamettha upamāsampādane kāraṇavibhāvanā, “āvutasuttaṃ viya vipassanāñāṇa”nti katthaci
tika-s0105t0:399_5: pāṭho, “idañca viññāṇa”nti vacanato pana “viññāṇa”nti pāṭhova sundarataro, “vipassanāviññāṇa”nti
tika-s0105t0:399_6: vā bhavitabbaṃ. Vipassanāñāṇaṃ abhinīharitvāti vipassanāñāṇābhimukhaṃ cittaṃ nīharitvā.
tika-s0105t0:400_1: visesanaṃ atthavasā liṅgavibhattivacanavipariṇāmoti katvā pacchimapadassāpi visesanabhāvato.
tika-s0105t0:400_3: evāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Evañhi tesaṃ vipassanāviññāṇagatikattā āvutasuttaṃ viya “vipassanāviññāṇa”nti
tika-s0105t0:400_4: heṭṭhā vuttavacanaṃ avirodhitaṃ hoti. Kasmā pana vipassanāviññāṇasseva gahaṇanti?
tika-s0105t0:400_5: “Idañca me viññāṇaṃ ettha sitaṃ ettha paṭibaddha”nti iminā tasseva vacanato. “Ayaṃ
tika-s0105t0:400_6: kho me kāyo”tiādinā hi vipassanāñāṇena vipassitvā “tadeva vipassanāñāṇasampayuttaṃ
tika-s0105t0:400_7: viññāṇaṃ ettha sitaṃ ettha paṭibaddha”nti nissayavisayādivasena manasi karoti, tasmā
tika-s0105t0:400_8: tasseva idha gahaṇaṃ sambhavati, nāññassāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tenāha “vipassanāviññāṇasseva
tika-s0105t0:400_9: vā āvibhūtakālo”ti. Dhammasaṅgahādīsu desitanayena pākaṭabhāvato cettha phassapañcamakānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:400_10: gahaṇaṃ, niravasesapariggahaṇato sabbacittacetasikānaṃ, yathārutaṃ desitavasena padhānabhāvato
tika-s0105t0:400_11: vipassanāviññāṇassāti veditabbaṃ. Kiṃ panete paccavekkhaṇañāṇassa āvibhavanti, udāhu
tika-s0105t0:400_12: puggalassāti? Paccavekkhaṇañāṇasseva, tassa pana āvibhūtattā puggalassāpi āvibhūtā
tika-s0105t0:401_0: Yasmā panidaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ maggañāṇānantaraṃ hoti, tasmā lokiyābhiññānaṃ parato,
tika-s0105t0:401_1: chaṭṭhabhiññāya ca purato vattabbaṃ, atha kasmā sabbābhiññānaṃ puratova vuttanti
tika-s0105t0:401_3: hi iminā yathāvuttaṃ codanālesaṃ dasseti. Tattha “maggañāṇānantara”nti sikhāppattavipassanābhūtaṃ
tika-s0105t0:401_4: gotrabhuñāṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tadeva hi arahattamaggassa, sabbesaṃ vā maggaphalānamanantaraṃ
tika-s0105t0:401_5: hoti, padhānato pana tabbacaneneva sabbassapi vipassanāñāṇassa gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ
tika-s0105t0:401_6: avisesato tassa idha vuttattā. Maggasaddena ca arahattamaggasseva gahaṇaṃ tassevābhiññāpariyāpannattā,
tika-s0105t0:401_7: abhiññāsambandhena ca codanāsambhavato. Lokiyābhiññānaṃ purato vuttaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ
tika-s0105t0:401_8: tāsaṃ nānantaratāya anupakāraṃ, āsavakkhayañāṇasaṅkhātāya pana lokuttarābhiññāya
tika-s0105t0:401_9: purato vuttaṃ tassā anantaratāya upakāraṃ, tasmā idaṃ lokiyābhiññānaṃ parato, chaṭṭhābhiññāya
tika-s0105t0:401_10: ca purato vattabbaṃ. Kasmā pana upakāraṭṭhāne tathā avatvā anupakāraṭṭhāneva bhagavatā
tika-s0105t0:401_11: vuttanti hi codanā sambhavati. “Evaṃ santepī”tiādi parihāradassanaṃ. Tattha evaṃ
tika-s0105t0:401_12: santepīti yadipi ñāṇānupubbiyā maggañāṇassa anantaratāya upakāraṃ hoti, evaṃ satipīti attho.
tika-s0105t0:402_0: Abhiññāvāreti chaḷabhiññāvasena vutte desanāvāre. Etassa antarā vāro natthīti pañcasu
tika-s0105t0:402_1: lokiyābhiññāsu kathitāsu ākaṅkheyyasuttādīsu viya chaṭṭhābhiññāpi avassaṃ kathetabbā
tika-s0105t0:402_2: abhiññālakkhaṇabhāvena tappariyāpannato, na ca vipassanāñāṇaṃ lokiyābhiññānaṃ, chaṭṭhābhiññāya
tika-s0105t0:402_3: ca antarā pavesetvā kathetabbaṃ anabhiññālakkhaṇabhāvena tadapariyāpannato. Iti etassa
tika-s0105t0:402_4: vipassanāñāṇassa tāsamabhiññānaṃ antarā vāro natthi, tasmā tattha avasarābhāvato
tika-s0105t0:402_6: cā”tiādinā atthantaramāha. Tattha ca-saddo samuccayattho, tena na kevalaṃ vipassanāñāṇassa
tika-s0105t0:402_7: idha dassane tadeva kāraṇaṃ, atha kho idampīti imamatthaṃ samuccinātīti ācariyena
tika-s0105t0:402_8: vuttaṃ. Saddavidū pana īdise ṭhāne ca-saddo vā-saddattho, so ca vikappatthoti vadanti,
tika-s0105t0:402_9: tampi yuttameva atthantaradassane payuttattā. Attanā payujjitabbassa hi vijjamānatthasseva
tika-s0105t0:402_10: jotakā upasagganipātā yathā magganidassane sākhābhaṅgā, yathā ca adissamānā jotane
tika-s0105t0:405_0: Akatasammasanassāti hetugabbhapadaṃ. Tathā katasammasanassāti ca. “Dibbena cakkhunā
tika-s0105t0:405_1: bheravampi rūpaṃ passatoti ettha iddhividhañāṇena bheravaṃ rūpaṃ nimminitvā maṃsacakkhunā
tika-s0105t0:405_2: passatotipi vattabbaṃ. Evampi hi abhiññālābhino apariññātavatthukassa bhayaṃ santāso
tika-s0105t0:405_3: uppajjati uccavālikavāsimahānāgattherassa viyā”ti ācariyena vuttaṃ. Yathā cettha,
tika-s0105t0:405_4: evaṃ dibbāya sotadhātuyā bheravaṃ saddaṃ suṇatoti etthāpi iddhividhañāṇena bheravaṃ
tika-s0105t0:405_5: saddaṃ nimminitvā maṃsasotena suṇatopīti vattabbameva. Evampi hi abhiññālābhino apariññātavatthukassa
tika-s0105t0:405_6: bhayaṃ santāso uppajjati uccavālikavāsimahānāgattherassa viya. Thero hi koñcanādasahitaṃ
tika-s0105t0:405_7: sabbasetaṃ hatthināgaṃ māpetvā disvā, sutvā ca sañjātabhayasantāsoti aṭṭhakathāsu
tika-s0105t0:405_8: vutto. Aniccādivasena katasammasanassa dibbāya…pe… bhayaṃ santāso na uppajjatīti
tika-s0105t0:405_9: sambandho. Bhayavinodanahetu nāma vipassanāñāṇena katasammasanatā, tassa, tena vā
tika-s0105t0:405_12: vipassanāsukhaṃ. Pāṭiyekkanti jhānābhiññādīhi asammissaṃ visuṃ bhūtaṃ sandiṭṭhikaṃ
tika-s0105t0:408: Idhāpi vuttaṃ “idampi kho mahārāja sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ…pe… paṇītatarañcā”ti, tasmā pāḷiyā saṃsandanato imameva nayaṃ yuttataranti vadanti. Āditovāti abhiññānamādimhiyeva.
tika-s0105t0:410_1: anekesvatthesu āgato. Idha pana nibbattiattheti dassetuṃ “manena nibbattita”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:410_2: “Abhiññāmanena nibbattita”nti atthoti ācariyenāti vuttaṃ. Visuddhimagge pana “adhiṭṭhānamanena
tika-s0105t0:410_3: nimmitattā manomaya”nti āgataṃ, abhiññāmanena, adhiṭṭhānamanena cāti ubhayathāpi
tika-s0105t0:410_4: nibbattattā ubhayampetaṃ yuttameva. Aṅgaṃ nāma hatthapādāditaṃtaṃsamudāyaṃ, paccaṅgaṃ
tika-s0105t0:410_5: nāma kapparajaṇṇuādi tasmiṃ tasmiṃ samudāye avayavaṃ. “Ahīnindriya”nti ettha paripuṇṇatāyeva
tika-s0105t0:410_6: ahīnatā, na tu appaṇītatā, paripuṇṇabhāvo ca cakkhusotādīnaṃ saṇṭhānavaseneva. Nimmitarūpe
tika-s0105t0:410_7: hi pasādo nāma natthīti dassetuṃ “saṇṭhānavasena avikalindriya”nti vuttaṃ, imināva
tika-s0105t0:410_8: tassa jīvitindriyādīnampi abhāvo vuttoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Saṇṭhānavasenāti ca kamaladalādisadisasaṇṭhānamattavasena,
tika-s0105t0:411_0: Ayamevattho pāḷiyampi vibhāvitoti āha “muñjamhā īsikantiādiupamāttayampi hi…pe… vutta”nti.
tika-s0105t0:411_1: Katthaci pana “muñjamhā īsikantiādi upamāmattaṃ. Yampi hi sadisabhāvadassanatthameva
tika-s0105t0:411_2: vutta”nti pāṭho dissati. Tattha “upamāmatta”nti iminā atthantaradassanaṃ nivatteti,
tika-s0105t0:411_3: “yampi hī”tiādinā pana tassa upamābhāvaṃ samattheti. Niyatānapekkhena ca yaṃ-saddena
tika-s0105t0:411_5: vaṇṇatopi avayavavisesatopi sadisabhāvadassanatthaṃyeva. Kathaṃ sadisabhāvoti vuttaṃ
tika-s0105t0:411_6: “muñjasadisā eva hī”tiādi. Muñjaṃ nāma tiṇaviseso, yena kocchādīni karonti. “Pavāheyyā”ti
tika-s0105t0:411_7: vacanato anto ṭhitā eva īsikā adhippetāti dasseti “anto īsikā hotī”ti iminā. Īsikāti
tika-s0105t0:411_8: ca kaḷīro. Visuddhimaggaṭīkāyaṃ pana “kaṇḍa”nti vuttaṃ. Vaṭṭāya kosiyāti parivaṭṭulāya
tika-s0105t0:411_9: asikosiyā. Patthaṭāyāti paṭṭikāya. Karaḍitabbo bhājetabboti karaṇḍo, peḷā. Karaḍitabbo
tika-s0105t0:411_10: jigucchitabboti karaṇḍo, nimmokaṃ. Idhāpi nimmokamevāti āha “karaṇḍāti idampī”tiādi.
tika-s0105t0:411_11: Vilīvakaraṇḍo nāma peḷā. Kasmā ahikañcukasseva nāmaṃ, na vilīvakaraṇḍakassāti codanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:411_12: sodheti “ahikañcuko hī”tiādinā, sveva ahinā sadiso, tasmā tasseva nāmanti vuttaṃ
tika-s0105t0:411_13: hoti. Visuddhimaggaṭīkāyaṃ pana “karaṇḍāyāti peḷāya, nimmokatoti ca vadantī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:412_0: Yajjevaṃ “seyyathāpi pana mahārāja puriso ahiṃ karaṇḍā uddhareyyā”ti purisassa karaṇḍato
tika-s0105t0:412_1: ahiuddharaṇūpamāya ayamattho virujjheyya. Na hi so hatthena tato uddharituṃ sakkāti
tika-s0105t0:412_3: pākaṭattā taṃdassanamiva jātaṃ. Tenāha “hatthena uddharamāno viya dassito”ti. “Ayañhī”tiādi
tika-s0105t0:412_4: cittena uddharaṇassa hetudassanaṃ. Ahino nāma pañcasu ṭhānesu sajātiṃ nātivattanti
tika-s0105t0:412_5: upapattiyaṃ, cutiyaṃ, vissaṭṭhaniddokkamane, samānajātiyā methunapaṭisevane, jiṇṇatacāpanayaneti
tika-s0105t0:412_6: vuttaṃ “sajātiyaṃ ṭhito”ti. Uragajātiyameva ṭhito pajahati, na nāgiddhiyā aññajātirūpoti
tika-s0105t0:412_7: attho. Idañhi mahiddhike nāge sandhāya vuttaṃ. Sarīraṃ khādayamānaṃ viyāti attanoyeva
tika-s0105t0:412_8: tacaṃ attano sarīraṃ khādayamānaṃ viya. Purāṇatacaṃ jigucchantoti jiṇṇatāya katthaci
tika-s0105t0:412_9: muttaṃ katthaci olambitaṃ jiṇṇatacaṃ jigucchanto. Catūhīti “sajātiyaṃ ṭhito, nissāya,
tika-s0105t0:412_10: thāmena, jigucchanto”ti yathāvuttehi catūhi kāraṇehi. Tatoti kañcukato. Aññenāti
tika-s0105t0:412_11: attato aññena. Cittenāti purisassa citteneva, na hatthena. Seyyathāpi nāma puriso
tika-s0105t0:412_12: ahiṃ passitvā “aho vatāhaṃ imaṃ ahiṃ kañcukato uddhareyya”nti ahiṃ karaṇḍā cittena
tika-s0105t0:412_13: uddhareyya, tassa evamassa “ayaṃ ahi, ayaṃ karaṇḍo, añño ahi, añño karaṇḍo, karaṇḍā
tika-s0105t0:412_14: tveva ahi ubbhato”ti, evameva…pe… so imamhā kāyā aññaṃ kāyaṃ abhinimmināti…pe… ahīnindriyanti
tika-s0105t0:414: 239. Bhājanādivikatikiriyānissayabhūtā suparikammakatamattikādayo viya vikubbanakiriyānissayabhāvato iddhividhañāṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:415_0: 241. Pubbe nīvaraṇappahānavāre viya kantāraggahaṇaṃ akatvā kevalaṃ addhānamaggaggahaṇaṃ
tika-s0105t0:415_1: khemamaggadassanatthaṃ. Kasmā pana khemamaggasseva dassanaṃ, na kantāramaggassa,
tika-s0105t0:415_3: pana khemamaggasseva gahaṇakāraṇadassanaṃ. Vātātapādinivāraṇatthaṃ sīse sāṭakaṃ katvā.
tika-s0105t0:415_4: Tathā tathā pana paripuṇṇavacanaṃ upamāsampattiyā upameyyasampādanatthaṃ, adhippetassa
tika-s0105t0:415_6: ca viññūjātikānaṃ cittārādhanatthanti veditabbaṃ. Evaṃ sabbattha. Sukhaṃ vavatthapetīti
tika-s0105t0:416_1: vuttanti mantvā yuvasaddena visesitabbameva daharasaddassa atthaṃ dassetuṃ “taruṇo”ti
tika-s0105t0:416_2: vuttaṃ. Tathā yuvāpi koci anicchanako, anicchanato ca amaṇḍanajātikoti tato visesanatthaṃ
tika-s0105t0:416_4: atthaṃ dassetuṃ “yobbannena samannāgato”ti vuttaṃ. Pāḷiyañhi yathākkamaṃ padattayassa
tika-s0105t0:416_5: visesitabbavisesakabhāvena vacanato tathā saṃvaṇṇanā katā, itarathā ekakenāpi padena
tika-s0105t0:416_7: vuttameva vivarituṃ “divasassā”tiādimāha. Kaṇikasaddo dosapariyāyo, doso ca nāma
tika-s0105t0:416_9: kāḷā vā kammāsā, ye “sāsapabījikā”tipi vuccanti. Tilappamāṇā bindavo tilakāni. Vaṅgaṃ
tika-s0105t0:416_10: nāma viyaṅgaṃ vipariṇāmitamaṅgaṃ. Yobbannapīḷakādayo mukhadūsipīḷakā, ye “kharapīḷakā”
tika-s0105t0:416_11: tipi vuccanti. Mukhanimittanti mukhacchāyaṃ. Mukhe gato doso mukhadoso. Lakkhaṇavacanamattametaṃ
tika-s0105t0:416_12: mukhe adosassapi pākaṭabhāvassa adhippetattā, yathā vā mukhe doso, evaṃ mukhe adosopi
tika-s0105t0:416_13: mukhadosoti saralopena vutto sāmaññaniddesatopi anekatthassa viññātabbattā, pisaddalopena
tika-s0105t0:416_14: vā ayamattho veditabbo. Avuttopi hi attho sampiṇḍanavasena vutto viya viññāyati,
tika-s0105t0:416_15: mukhadoso ca mukhaadoso ca mukhadosoti ekadesasarūpekasesanayenapettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0105t0:416_16: Evañhi atthassa paripuṇṇatāya “paresaṃ soḷasavidhaṃ cittaṃ pākaṭaṃ hotī”ti vacanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:419: Asamāne sadde tidhā, catudhā ca samānake;
tika-s0105t0:421: “Sarāgaṃ vā citta”ntiādinā pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ soḷasavidhaṃ cittaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:422_0: 245. Pubbenivāsañāṇūpamāyanti pubbenivāsañāṇassa, pubbenivāsañāṇe vā dassitāya upamāya.
tika-s0105t0:422_1: Kasmā pana pāḷiyaṃ gāmattayameva upamāne gahitanti codanaṃ sodhetuṃ “taṃ divasa”ntiādi
tika-s0105t0:422_2: vuttaṃ. Taṃ divasaṃ katakiriyā nāma pākatikasattassāpi yebhuyyena pākaṭā hoti. Tasmā
tika-s0105t0:422_3: taṃ divasaṃ gantuṃ sakkuṇeyyaṃ gāmattayameva bhagavatā gahitaṃ, na taduttarīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0105t0:422_4: Kiñcāpi pāḷiyaṃ taṃdivasaggahaṇaṃ natthi, gāmattayaggahaṇena pana tadaheva katakiriyā
tika-s0105t0:422_5: adhippetāti mantvā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ taṃdivasaggahaṇaṃ katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Taṃdivasagatagāmattayaggahaṇeneva
tika-s0105t0:422_6: ca mahābhinīhārehi aññesampi pubbenivāsañāṇalābhīnaṃ tīsupi bhavesu katakiriyā yebhuyyena
tika-s0105t0:422_7: pākaṭā hotīti dīpitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Etadatthampi hi gāmattayaggahaṇanti. Tīsu bhavesu
tika-s0105t0:422_8: katakiriyāyāti abhisamparāyesu pubbe diṭṭhadhamme pana idāni, pubbe ca katakiccassa.
tika-s0105t0:423_0: 247. Pāḷiyaṃ rathikāya vīthiṃ sañcaranteti aññāya rathikāya aññaṃ rathiṃ sañcaranteti
tika-s0105t0:423_1: attho, tena aparāparaṃ sañcaraṇaṃ dassitanti āha “aparāparaṃ sañcarante”ti, taṃtaṃkiccavasena
tika-s0105t0:423_2: ito cito ca sañcaranteti vuttaṃ hoti, ayamevattho rathivīthisaddānamekatthattā. Siṅghāṭakamhīti
tika-s0105t0:423_3: vīthicatukke. Pāsādo viya bhikkhussa karajakāyo daṭṭhabbo tattha patiṭṭhitassa daṭṭhabbadassanasiddhito.
tika-s0105t0:423_4: Maṃsacakkhumato hi dibbacakkhusamadhigamo. Yathāha “maṃsacakkhussa uppādo, maggo
tika-s0105t0:423_5: dibbassa cakkhuno”ti. Cakkhumā puriso viya ayameva dibbacakkhuṃ patvā ṭhito bhikkhu
tika-s0105t0:423_6: daṭṭhabbassa dassanato. Gehaṃ pavisanto, tato nikkhamanto viya ca mātukucchiṃ paṭisandhivasena
tika-s0105t0:423_7: pavisanto, tato ca vijātivasena nikkhamanto mātukucchiyā gehasadisattā. Tathā hi
tika-s0105t0:423_8: vuttaṃ “mātaraṃ kuṭikaṃ brūsi, bhariyaṃ brūsi kulāvaka”nti. Ayaṃ aṭṭhakathāmuttako
tika-s0105t0:423_9: nayo – gehaṃ pavisanto viya attabhāvaṃ upapajjanavasena okkamanto, gehā nikkhamanto
tika-s0105t0:423_10: viya ca attabhāvato cavanavasena apakkamanto attabhāvassa gehasadisattā. Vuttañhi
tika-s0105t0:424_0: Aparāparaṃ sañcaraṇakasattāti punappunaṃ saṃsāre paribbhamanakasattā. Abbhokāsaṭṭhāneti
tika-s0105t0:424_1: ajjhokāsadesabhūte. Majjheti nagarassa majjhabhūte siṅghāṭake. Tattha tatthāti tasmiṃ
tika-s0105t0:424_2: tasmiṃ bhavekadese. Nibbattasattāti uppajjamānakasattā. Iminā hi tasmiṃ tasmiṃ bhave
tika-s0105t0:424_3: jātasaṃvaddhe satte vadati, “aparāparaṃ sañcaraṇakasattā”ti pana etena tathā aniyamitakālike
tika-s0105t0:424_4: sādhāraṇasatte. Evañhi tesaṃ yathākkamaṃ sañcaraṇakasannisinnakajanopamatā upapannā
tika-s0105t0:424_5: hotīti. Tīsu bhavesu nibbattasattānaṃ āvibhūtakāloti ettha pana vuttappakārānaṃ sabbesampi
tika-s0105t0:425_0: Nanu cāyaṃ dibbacakkhukathā, atha kasmā “tīsu bhavesū”ti catuvokārabhavassāpi saṅgaho
tika-s0105t0:425_1: kato. Na hi so arūpadhammārammaṇoti anuyogaṃ pariharanto “idañcā”tiādimāha. Tattha
tika-s0105t0:425_2: “idanti tīsu bhavesu nibbattasattānanti idaṃ vacana”nti ayamettha ācariyassa mati,
tika-s0105t0:425_3: evaṃ sati aṭṭhakathācariyehi aṭṭhakathāyameva yathāvutto anuyogo pariharitoti. Ayaṃ
tika-s0105t0:425_4: panettha amhākaṃ khanti – nanu cāyaṃ dibbacakkhukathā, atha kasmā “dibbena cakkhunā
tika-s0105t0:425_5: visuddhena atikkantamānusakena satte passati cavamāne upapajjamāne”tiādinā avisesato
tika-s0105t0:425_6: catuvokārabhavūpagassāpi saṅgaho kato. Na hi so arūpadhammārammaṇoti anuyogaṃ pariharanto
tika-s0105t0:425_8: Evañhi sati aṭṭhakathācariyehi pāḷiyameva yathāvutto anuyogo pariharitoti. Yadaggena
tika-s0105t0:425_9: so pāḷiyaṃ pariharito, tadaggena aṭṭhakathāyampi tassā atthavaṇṇanābhāvato. Desanāsukhatthamevāti
tika-s0105t0:425_10: kevalaṃ desanāsukhatthaṃ eva avisesena vuttaṃ, na pana catuvokārabhavūpagānaṃ dibbacakkhussa
tika-s0105t0:425_11: āvibhāvasabbhāvato. “Ṭhapetvā arūpabhava”nti vā “dvīsu bhavesū”ti vā satte passati
tika-s0105t0:425_12: kāmāvacarabhavato, rūpāvacarabhavato ca cavamāneti vā kāmāvacarabhave, rūpāvacarabhave
tika-s0105t0:425_13: ca upapajjamāneti vā vuccamānā hi desanā yathārahaṃ bhedyabhedakādivibhāvanena sukhāsukhāvabodhā
tika-s0105t0:425_14: ca na hoti, avisesena pana evameva vuccamānā sukhāsukhāvabodhā ca. Desetuṃ, avabodhetuñca
tika-s0105t0:427_0: 248. Idha vipassanāpādakaṃ catutthajjhānacittaṃ veditabbaṃ, na lokiyābhiññāsu viya
tika-s0105t0:427_1: abhiññāpādakaṃ. Vipassanāpādakanti ca vipassanāya padaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ, vipassanā ca
tika-s0105t0:427_2: nāmesā tividhā vipassakapuggalabhedena mahābodhisattānaṃ vipassanā, paccekabodhisattānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:427_3: vipassanā, sāvakānaṃ vipassanā cāti. Tattha mahābodhisattānaṃ, paccekabodhisattānañca
tika-s0105t0:427_4: vipassanā cintāmayañāṇasambandhikā sayambhuñāṇabhūtā, sāvakānaṃ pana sutamayañāṇasambandhikā
tika-s0105t0:427_6: aññatarato vuṭṭhāyā”tiādinā anekadhā, arūpamukhavasena catudhātuvavatthāne vuttānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:427_7: tesaṃ tesaṃ dhātupariggahamukhānañca aññataramukhavasena anekadhā ca visuddhimagge
tika-s0105t0:427_8: nānānayato vibhāvitā, mahābodhisattānaṃ pana catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassamukhena pabhedagamanato
tika-s0105t0:427_10: gaṇhāpentaṃ paripākaṃ gacchantaṃ paramagambhīraṃ saṇhasukhumataraṃ anaññasādhāraṇaṃ
tika-s0105t0:427_11: vipassanāñāṇaṃ hoti, yaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu “mahāvajirañāṇa”nti vuccati, yassa ca pavattivibhāgena
tika-s0105t0:427_13: devasikaṃ satthu vaḷañjanasamāpattiyo vuccanti. Svāyaṃ buddhānaṃ vipassanācāro paramatthamañjusāyaṃ
tika-s0105t0:427_14: visuddhimaggavaṇṇanāyaṃ uddesato ācariyena dassito, tato so atthikehi gahetabbo.
tika-s0105t0:428_0: “Āsavānaṃ khayañāṇāyā”ti idaṃ kiriyāpayojanabhūte tadatthe sampadānavacanaṃ, tasmā
tika-s0105t0:428_1: asatipi payojanavācake payojanavaseneva attho veditabboti āha “khayañāṇanibbattanatthāyā”ti.
tika-s0105t0:428_2: Evamīdisesu. Nibbānaṃ, arahattamaggo ca ukkaṭṭhaniddesena idha khayo nāma, tattha
tika-s0105t0:428_3: ñāṇaṃ khayañāṇaṃ, tassa nibbattanasaṅkhāto attho payojanaṃ, tadatthāyāti attho. Khepeti
tika-s0105t0:428_4: pāpadhamme samucchindatīti khayo, maggo. So pana pāpakkhayo āsavakkhayena vinā natthi,
tika-s0105t0:428_5: tasmā “khaye ñāṇa”nti ettha khayaggahaṇena āsavakkhayova vuttoti dasseti “āsavānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:428_6: khayo”ti iminā. Anuppāde ñāṇanti āsavānamanuppādabhūte ariyaphale ñāṇaṃ. Khīyiṃsu
tika-s0105t0:428_7: āsavā etthāti khayo, phalaṃ. Samitapāpatāya samaṇo, samitapāpatā ca nippariyāyato
tika-s0105t0:428_8: arahattaphalenevāti āha “āsavānaṃ khayā samaṇo hotīti ettha phala”nti. Khayāti ca
tika-s0105t0:428_9: khīṇattāti attho. Khīyanti āsavā etthāti khayo, nibbānaṃ. “Āsavakkhayā”ti pana samāsavasena
tika-s0105t0:428_10: dvibhāvaṃ katvā vuttattā “āsavānaṃ khayo”ti padassa atthuddhāre āsavakkhayapadaggahaṇaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:429_1: Arāti dūrā. “Arā siṅghāmi vārija”ntiādīsu viya hi dūratthoyaṃ nipāto. “Ārā”tipi pāṭho.
tika-s0105t0:429_2: Arāsaddo viya ārāsaddopi dūratthe eko nipātoti veditabbo. Tadeva hi padaṃ saddasatthe
tika-s0105t0:429_3: udāhaṭaṃ. Kāmañca dhammapadaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “arahattamaggasaṅkhātā ārā dūraṃ gatova
tika-s0105t0:429_4: hotī”ti vuttaṃ, tathāpi āsavavaḍḍhiyā saṅkhāre vaḍḍhento visaṅkhārato suvidūradūro,
tika-s0105t0:429_5: tasmā “ārā so āsavakkhayā”ti ettha āsavakkhayapadaṃ visaṅkhārādhivacanampi sambhavatīti
tika-s0105t0:429_6: āha “nibbāna”nti. Khayanaṃ khayo, āsavānaṃ khaṇanirodho. Sesaṃ tassa pariyāyavacanaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:429_7: Bhaṅgo āsavānaṃ khayoti vuttoti yojanā. Idha pana nibbānampi maggopi avinābhāvato.
tika-s0105t0:429_8: Na hi nibbānamanārabbha maggeneva āsavānaṃ khayo hotīti.
tika-s0105t0:430_0: Tanninnanti tasmiṃ āsavānaṃ khayañāṇe ninnaṃ. Sesaṃ tasseva vevacanaṃ. Pāḷiyaṃ idaṃ
tika-s0105t0:430_1: dukkhanti dukkhassa ariyasaccassa paricchinditvā, anavasesetvā ca tadā tassa bhikkhuno
tika-s0105t0:430_2: paccakkhato gahitabhāvadassananti dassetuṃ “ettaka”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha hi ettakaṃ
tika-s0105t0:430_3: dukkhanti tassa paricchijja gahitabhāvadassanaṃ. Na ito bhiyyoti anavasesetvā gahitabhāvadassanaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:430_5: pajānanaṃ nāmāti dasseti “sarasalakkhaṇapaṭivedhenā”ti iminā. Rasoti sabhāvo rasitabbo
tika-s0105t0:430_6: jānitabboti katvā, attano raso saraso, so eva lakkhaṇaṃ, tassa asammohato paṭivijjhanenāti
tika-s0105t0:430_7: attho. Asammohato paṭivijjhanañca nāma yathā tasmiṃ ñāṇe pavatte pacchā dukkhasaccassa
tika-s0105t0:430_8: sarūpādiparicchede sammoho na hoti, tathā tassa pavattiyeva. Tena vuttaṃ “yathābhūtaṃ
tika-s0105t0:430_9: pajānātī”ti. “Nibbattika”nti iminā “dukkhaṃ samudeti etasmāti dukkhasamudayo”ti nibbacanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:430_10: dasseti. Tadubhayanti dukkhaṃ, dukkhasamudayo ca. Yaṃ ṭhānaṃ patvāti yaṃ nibbānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:430_11: maggassa ārammaṇapaccayaṭṭhena kāraṇabhūtaṃ āgamma. Ṭhānanti hi kāraṇaṃ vuccati tiṭṭhati
tika-s0105t0:430_12: ettha phalaṃ tadāyattatāyāti katvā. Tadubhayaṃ patvāti ca tadubhayavato puggalassa
tika-s0105t0:430_13: tadubhayassa patti viya vuttā. Puggalasseva hi ārammaṇakaraṇavasena nibbānappatti,
tika-s0105t0:430_14: na tadubhayassa. Apica patvāti pāpuṇanahetu, puggalassa ārammaṇakaraṇavasena samāpajjanatoti
tika-s0105t0:430_15: attho. Asamānakattuke viya hi samānakattukepi tvāpaccayassa hetvatthe pavatti saddasatthesu
tika-s0105t0:430_16: pākaṭā. Appavattīti appavattinimittaṃ “na pavattati tadubhayametenā”ti katvā, appavattiṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:430_17: vā “na pavattati tadubhayametthā”ti katvā, anena ca “dukkhaṃ nirujjhati ettha, etenāti
tika-s0105t0:430_18: vā dukkhanirodho”ti nibbacanaṃ dasseti, dukkhasamudayassa pana gahaṇaṃ taṃnibbattakassa
tika-s0105t0:430_19: nirujjhanato tassāpi nirujjhanadassanatthanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Nibbānapadeyeva ta-saddo
tika-s0105t0:430_20: nivattatīti ayaṃ-saddo puna vutto. Sabbanāmikañhi padaṃ vuttassa vā liṅgassa gāhakaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:430_21: vuccamānassa vā. Tassāti dukkhanirodhassa. Sampāpakanti sacchikaraṇavasena sammadeva
tika-s0105t0:430_22: pāpakaṃ, etena ca “dukkhanirodhaṃ gamayati, gacchati vā etāyāti dukkhanirodhagāminī,
tika-s0105t0:431_0: Kilesavasenāti āsavasaṅkhātakilesavasena. Tadeva āsavapariyāyena dassento puna āha,
tika-s0105t0:431_1: tasmā na ettha punaruttidosoti adhippāyo. Pariyāyadesanābhāvo nāma hi āveṇiko buddhadhammoti
tika-s0105t0:431_2: heṭṭhā vuttovāyamattho. Nanu ca āsavānaṃ dukkhasaccapariyāyova atthi, na sesasaccapariyāyo,
tika-s0105t0:431_3: atha kasmā sarūpato dassitasaccāniyeva kilesavasena pariyāyato puna dassento evamāhāti
tika-s0105t0:431_4: vuttanti? Saccaṃ, taṃsambandhattā pana sesasaccānaṃ taṃsamudayādipariyāyopi labbhatīti
tika-s0105t0:431_5: katvā evaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Dukkhasaccapariyāyabhūtaāsavasambandhāni hi āsavasamudayādīnīti,
tika-s0105t0:431_6: saccāni dassentotipi yojetabbaṃ. “Āsavānaṃ khayañāṇāyā”ti āraddhattā cettha āsavānameva
tika-s0105t0:431_7: gahaṇaṃ, na sesakilesānaṃ tathā anāraddhattāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tathā hi “kāmāsavāpi cittaṃ
tika-s0105t0:431_9: yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī”tiādinā missakamaggova idha kathito lokiyavipassanāya lokuttaramaggassa
tika-s0105t0:431_10: missakattāti vuttaṃ “saha vipassanāya koṭippattaṃ maggaṃ kathesī”ti. “Jānato passato”ti
tika-s0105t0:431_11: iminā tayopi pariññāsacchikiriyābhāvanābhisamayā vuttā catusaccapajānanāya eva catukiccasiddhito,
tika-s0105t0:431_12: pahānābhisamayo pana pārisesato “vimuccatī”ti iminā vuttoti āha “maggakkhaṇaṃ dassetī”ti.
tika-s0105t0:431_13: Cattāri hi kiccāni catusaccapajānanāya eva siddhāni. Yathāha “taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhaṃ
tika-s0105t0:431_14: ariyasaccaṃ pariññātanti me bhikkhave pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādī”tiādi.
tika-s0105t0:431_15: Ayaṃ aṭṭhakathāmuttako nayo – jānato passatoti ca hetuniddeso, “jānanahetu passanahetu
tika-s0105t0:431_16: kāmāsavāpi cittaṃ vimuccatī”tiādinā yojanā. Kāmañcettha jānanapassanakiriyānaṃ, vimuccanakiriyāya
tika-s0105t0:431_17: ca samānakālatā, tathāpi dhammānaṃ samānakālikānampi paccayapaccayuppannatā sahajātādikoṭiyā
tika-s0105t0:432_0: Bhavāsavaggahaṇena cettha bhavarāgassa viya bhavadiṭṭhiyāpi samavarodhoti diṭṭhāsavassāpi
tika-s0105t0:432_1: saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo, adhunā pana “diṭṭhāsavāpi cittaṃ vimuccatī”ti katthaci pāṭho dissati,
tika-s0105t0:432_2: so na porāṇo, pacchā pamādalikhitoti veditabbo. Bhayabheravasuttasaṃvaṇṇanādīsu anekāsupi
tika-s0105t0:432_3: tatheva saṃvaṇṇitattā. Ettha ca kiñcāpi pāḷiyaṃ saccapaṭivedho aniyamitapuggalassa
tika-s0105t0:432_4: aniyamitakālavasena vutto, tathāpi abhisamayakāle tassa paccuppannataṃ upādāya “evaṃ
tika-s0105t0:432_5: jānato evaṃ passato”ti vattamānakālaniddeso kato, so ca kāmaṃ kassaci maggakkhaṇato
tika-s0105t0:432_6: paraṃ yāvajjatanā atītakāliko eva, sabbapaṭhamaṃ panassa atītakālikattaṃ phalakkhaṇena
tika-s0105t0:432_7: veditabbanti āha “vimuttasminti iminā phalakkhaṇa”nti. Paccavekkhaṇañāṇanti phalapaccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ
tika-s0105t0:432_8: tathā ceva vuttattā. Taggahaṇena pana tadavinābhāvato sesāni niravasesāni gahetabbāni,
tika-s0105t0:432_9: ekadesāni vā aparipuṇṇāyapi paccavekkhaṇāya sambhavato. “Khīṇā jātī”tiādīhi padehi
tika-s0105t0:432_10: “nāparaṃ itthattāyā”ti padapariyosānehi. Tassāti paccavekkhaṇañāṇassa. Bhūminti pavattiṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:432_11: Nanu ca “vimuttasmiṃ vimutta”nti vuttaṃ phalameva tassa ārammaṇasaṅkhātā bhūmi, atha
tika-s0105t0:432_12: kathaṃ “khīṇā jātī”tiādīhi tassa bhūmidassananti codanaṃ sodhetuṃ “tena hī”tiādi
tika-s0105t0:432_13: vuttaṃ. Yasmā pana pahīnakilesapaccavekkhaṇena vijjamānassāpi kammassa āyatiṃ appaṭisandhikabhāvato
tika-s0105t0:432_14: “khīṇā jātī”ti pajānāti, yasmā ca maggapaccavekkhaṇādīhi “vusitaṃ brahmacariya”ntiādīni
tika-s0105t0:432_15: pajānāti, tasmā “khīṇā jātī”tiādīhi tassa bhūmidassananti vuttaṃ hoti. “Tena ñāṇenā”ti
tika-s0105t0:432_16: hi yathārutato, avinābhāvato ca gahitena pañcavidhena paccavekkhaṇañāṇenāti attho.
tika-s0105t0:433_0: “Khīṇā jātī”ti ettha sotujanānaṃ suviññāpanatthaṃ parammukhā viya codanaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti
tika-s0105t0:433_1: “katamā panā”tiādinā. Yena panādhippāyena codanā katā, tadadhippāyaṃ pakāsetvā parihāraṃ
tika-s0105t0:433_2: vattukāmo “na tāvassā”tiādimāha. “Na tāva…pe… vijjamānattā”ti vakkhamānameva hi atthaṃ
tika-s0105t0:433_3: manasi katvā ayaṃ codanā samuṭṭhāpitā, tattha na tāvassa atītā jāti khīṇāti assa
tika-s0105t0:433_4: bhikkhuno atītā jāti, na tāva maggabhāvanāya khīṇā. Tattha kāraṇamāha “pubbeva khīṇattā”ti,
tika-s0105t0:433_5: maggabhāvanāya purimatarameva nirujjhanavasena khīṇattāti adhippāyo. Na anāgatā assa
tika-s0105t0:433_6: jāti khīṇā maggabhāvanāyāti yojanā. Tattha kāraṇamāha “anāgate vāyāmābhāvato”ti,
tika-s0105t0:433_7: idañca anāgatabhāvasāmaññameva gahetvā lesena codanādhippāyavibhāvanatthaṃ vadati,
tika-s0105t0:433_8: na anāgatavisesaṃ anāgate maggabhāvanāya khepanapayogābhāvatoti attho. Vijjamāneyeva
tika-s0105t0:433_9: hi payogo sambhavati, na avijjamāneti vuttaṃ hoti. Anāgataviseso panettha adhippeto,
tika-s0105t0:433_10: tassa ca khepane vāyāmopi labbhateva. Tenāha “yā pana maggassā”tiādi. Anāgatavisesoti
tika-s0105t0:433_11: ca abhāvite magge uppajjanāraho anantarajātibhedo vuccati. Na paccuppannā assa jāti
tika-s0105t0:433_12: khīṇā maggabhāvanāyāti yojanā. Tattha kāraṇamāha “vijjamānattā”ti, ekabhavapariyāpannatāya
tika-s0105t0:433_13: vijjamānattāti attho. Tattha tattha bhave paṭhamābhinibbattilakkhaṇā hi jāti. “Yā
tika-s0105t0:433_14: panā”tiādinā pana maggabhāvanāya kilesahetuvināsanamukhena anāgatajātiyā eva khīṇabhāvo
tika-s0105t0:433_16: anavasesato jātiyā khīṇabhāvadassanatthaṃ, pubbapadadvayepettha uttarapadalopo. Ekacatupañcakkhandhappabhedāti
tika-s0105t0:433_17: etthāpi eseva nayo. “Taṃ so”tiādi “kathañca naṃ pajānātī”ti codanāya sodhanāvacanaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:433_18: Tattha tanti yathāvuttaṃ jātiṃ. Soti khīṇāsavo bhikkhu. Paccavekkhitvāti pajānanāya
tika-s0105t0:433_20: tathā pajānanā siddhāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Paccavekkhaṇantaravibhāvanatthameva hi “jānanto
tika-s0105t0:433_21: pajānātī”ti vattamānavacanadvayaṃ vuttaṃ, jānanto hutvā, jānanahetu vā pajānāti nāmāti attho.
tika-s0105t0:434_0: Brahmacariyavāso nāma ukkaṭṭhaniddesato maggabrahmacariyassa nibbattanamevāti āha
tika-s0105t0:434_1: “parivuttha”nti, samantato niravasesena vasitaṃ pariciṇṇanti attho. Kasmā panidaṃ
tika-s0105t0:434_2: so atītakālavasena pajānātīti anuyogenāha “puthujjanakalyāṇakena hi saddhi”ntiādi.
tika-s0105t0:434_3: Puthujjanakalyāṇakopi hi heṭṭhā vuttalakkhaṇo sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno
tika-s0105t0:434_4: nāma dakkhiṇavibhaṅgasuttādīsu tathā eva vuttattā. Vasanti nāmāti vasantā eva nāma
tika-s0105t0:434_5: honti, na vutthavāsā. Tasmāti vutthavāsattā. Nanu ca “so ‘idaṃ dukkha”nti yathābhūtaṃ
tika-s0105t0:434_6: pajānātī”tiādinā pāḷiyaṃ sammādiṭṭhiyeva vuttā, na sammāsaṅkappādayo, atha kasmā
tika-s0105t0:434_8: kiccaṃ niṭṭhāpita”nti aṭṭhaṅgikassa maggassa sādhāraṇato vuttanti? Sammāsaṅkappādīnampi
tika-s0105t0:434_9: catukiccasādhanavasena pavattito. Sammādiṭṭhiyā hi catūsu saccesu pariññādikiccasādhanavasena
tika-s0105t0:434_10: pavattamānāya sammāsaṅkappādīnampi sesānaṃ dukkhasacce pariññābhisamayānuguṇāva pavatti,
tika-s0105t0:434_11: itarasaccesu ca nesaṃ pahānābhisamayādivasena pavatti pākaṭā evāti. Dukkhanirodhamaggesu
tika-s0105t0:434_12: yathākkamaṃ pariññāsacchikiriyābhāvanāpi yāvadeva samudayapahānatthāti katvā tadattheyeva
tika-s0105t0:434_13: tāsaṃ pakkhipanena “kataṃ karaṇīya”nti padassa adhippāyaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “tenā”tiādi
tika-s0105t0:434_14: vuttaṃ. “Dukkhamūlaṃ samucchinna”nti imināpi tadeva pakārantarena vibhāveti.
tika-s0105t0:435_0: Kasmā panettha “kataṃ karaṇīya”nti atītaniddeso katoti āha “puthujjanakalyāṇakādayo”tiādi.
tika-s0105t0:435_1: Ime pakārā itthaṃ, tabbhāvo itthattanti dasseti “itthabhāvāyā”ti iminā, āya-saddo
tika-s0105t0:435_2: ca sampadānatthe, tadatthāyāti attho. Te pana pakārā ariyamaggabyāpārabhūtā pariññādayo
tika-s0105t0:435_3: idhādhippetāti vuttaṃ “evaṃ soḷasakiccabhāvāyā”ti. Te hi maggaṃ paccavekkhato maggānubhāvena
tika-s0105t0:435_4: pākaṭā hutvā upaṭṭhahanti magge paccavekkhite taṃkiccapaccavekkhaṇāyapi sukhena siddhito.
tika-s0105t0:435_5: Evaṃ sādhāraṇato catūsu maggesu paccekaṃ catukiccavasena soḷasakiccabhāvaṃ pakāsetvā
tika-s0105t0:435_6: tesupi kiccesu pahānameva padhānaṃ tadatthattā itaresaṃ pariññādīnanti tadeva visesato
tika-s0105t0:436_0: Apica purimanayena paccavekkhaṇaparamparāya paccavekkhaṇavidhiṃ dassetvā idāni padhānattā
tika-s0105t0:436_1: pahīnakilesapaccavekkhaṇavidhimeva dassetuṃ evaṃ vuttantipi daṭṭhabbaṃ. Dutiyavikappe
tika-s0105t0:436_2: ayaṃ pakāro itthaṃ, tabbhāvo itthattaṃ, āyasaddo cettha sampadānavacanassa kāriyabhūto
tika-s0105t0:436_3: nissakkattheti dasseti “itthabhāvato”ti iminā. “Imasmā evaṃ pakārā”ti pana vadanto
tika-s0105t0:436_4: pakāro nāma pakāravantato atthato bhedo natthi. Yadi hi so bhedo assa, tasseva so
tika-s0105t0:436_5: pakāro na siyā, tasmā itthaṃ-saddo pakāravantavācako, atthato pana abhedepi sati
tika-s0105t0:436_6: avayavāvayavitādinā bhedaparikappanāvasena siyā kiñci bhedamatthaṃ, tasmā itthattasaddo
tika-s0105t0:436_7: pakāravācakoti dasseti. Ayamidha ṭīkāyaṃ, majjhimāgamaṭīkāvinayaṭīkādīsu ca āgatanayo.
tika-s0105t0:437_0: Saddavidū pana pavattinimittānusārena evamicchanti – ayaṃ pakāro assāti itthaṃ, pakāravanto.
tika-s0105t0:437_1: Vicitrā hi taddhitavutti. Tassa bhāvo itthattaṃ, pakāro, imamatthaṃ dassento “itthabhāvato
tika-s0105t0:437_2: imasmā evaṃ pakārā”ti āhāti. Paṭhamavikappepi yathārahaṃ esa nayo. Idāni vattamānakhandhasantānāti
tika-s0105t0:437_3: sarūpakathanaṃ. Aparanti anāgataṃ. “Ime pana pañcakkhandhā pariññātā tiṭṭhantī”ti
tika-s0105t0:437_4: idāni pāṭho, “ime pana carimakattabhāvasaṅkhātā pañcakkhandhā pariññātā tiṭṭhantī”ti
tika-s0105t0:437_5: pana majjhimāgamavinayaṭīkādīsu, idha ca ṭīkāyaṃ ulliṅgitapāṭho. Tattha carimakattabhāvasaṅkhātāti
tika-s0105t0:437_7: ñātā. Tiṭṭhantīti appatiṭṭhā anokāsā tiṭṭhanti. Etena hi tesaṃ khandhānaṃ apariññāmūlābhāvena
tika-s0105t0:437_8: apatiṭṭhābhāvaṃ dasseti. Apariññāmūlikā hi patiṭṭhā, tadabhāvato pana appatiṭṭhābhāvo.
tika-s0105t0:437_9: Yathāha “kabaḷīkāre ce bhikkhave āhāre atthi rāgo, atthi nandī, atthi taṇhā, patiṭṭhitaṃ
tika-s0105t0:437_10: tattha viññāṇaṃ viruḷha”ntiādi. Tadupamaṃ vibhāveti “chinnamūlakā rukkhā viyā”ti
tika-s0105t0:437_11: iminā, yathā chinnamūlakā rukkhā mūlābhāvato appatiṭṭhā anokāsā tiṭṭhanti, evametepi
tika-s0105t0:437_13: Anupādānoti anindhano. Apaṇṇattikabhāvanti yesu khandhesu vijjamānesu tathā tathā
tika-s0105t0:437_14: parikappanāsiddhā paññatti, tadabhāvato tassāpi dharamānakapaññattiyā abhāvena apaññattikabhāvaṃ
tika-s0105t0:437_15: gamissanti. Paṇṇatti paññattīti hi atthato ekaṃ yathā “paññāsa paṇṇāsā”ti. Paññāsa
tika-s0105t0:438_0: 249. Yebhuyyena saṃkhipati saṅkucito bhavatīti saṅkhepo, pabbatamatthakaṃ. Tañhi
tika-s0105t0:438_1: pabbatapādato anukkamena bahulaṃ saṃkhittaṃ saṅkucitaṃ hoti. Tenāha “pabbatamatthake”ti,
tika-s0105t0:438_2: pabbatasikhareti attho. Ayaṃ aṭṭhakathāmuttako nayo – saṅkhipīyati pabbatabhāvena
tika-s0105t0:438_3: gaṇīyatīti saṅkhepo, pabbatapariyāpanno padeso, tasmiṃ pabbatapariyāpanne padeseti
tika-s0105t0:438_4: atthoti. Anāviloti akālusiyo, sā cassa anāvilatā kaddamābhāvena hotīti āha “nikkaddamo”ti.
tika-s0105t0:438_5: Sapati apadāpi samānā gacchatīti sippi, khuddakā sippi sippiyo kā-kārassa ya-kāraṃ
tika-s0105t0:438_6: katvā, yo “muttiko”tipi vuccati. Savati pasavatīti sambuko, yaṃ “jalasutti, saṅkhalikā”ti
tika-s0105t0:438_7: ca voharanti. Samāhāre yebhuyyato napuṃsakapayogoti vuttaṃ “sippiyasambuka”nti. Evamīdisesu.
tika-s0105t0:438_8: Sakkharāti muṭṭhippamāṇā pāsāṇā. Kathalānīti kapālakhaṇḍāni. Samūhavācakassa ghaṭāsaddassa
tika-s0105t0:438_9: itthi liṅgassāpi dissanato “gumba”nti padassatthaṃ dasseti “ghaṭā”ti iminā.
tika-s0105t0:439_1: ettha sakkharakathalaṃ tiṭṭhatiyeva, sippiyasambukamacchagumbāni carantipi tiṭṭhantipi,
tika-s0105t0:439_2: tathāpi sahacaraṇanayena sabbāneva caranti viya evaṃ vuttanti atthaṃ dassento “tiṭṭhantampi
tika-s0105t0:439_3: carantampīti etthā”tiādimāha. Tattha hi “sakkharakathalaṃ tiṭṭhatiyevā”tiādinā yathāsambhavamatthaṃ
tika-s0105t0:439_4: dasseti, “yathā panā”tiādinā pana sahacaraṇanayaṃ. Pana-saddo arucisaṃsūcane, tathāpīti
tika-s0105t0:439_5: attho. Antarantarāti bahūnaṃ gāvīnamantarantarā ṭhitāsu gāvīsu vijjamānāsupi. Gāvoti
tika-s0105t0:439_6: gāviyo. Itarāpīti ṭhitāpi nisinnāpi. Carantīti vuccanti sahacaraṇanayena. Tiṭṭhantamevātiādīsu
tika-s0105t0:439_8: anekantattā ekantato tiṭṭhantameva na kadācipi carantaṃ sakkharakathalaṃ upādāya
tika-s0105t0:439_9: sippiyasambukampi macchagumbampi tiṭṭhantanti vuttaṃ, na tu tesaṃ ṭhānakiriyamupādāya.
tika-s0105t0:439_10: Tesaṃ pana caraṇakiriyamupādāya “carantampī”ti pi-saddalopo hettha daṭṭhabbo. Itarampi
tika-s0105t0:439_11: dvayanti sippiyasambukamacchagumbaṃ padavasena evaṃ vuttaṃ. Itarañca dvayanti sippiyasambukamacchagumbameva.
tika-s0105t0:439_12: Carantanti vuttanti etthāpi tesaṃ ṭhānakiriyamupādāya “tiṭṭhantampī”ti pi-saddalopo,
tika-s0105t0:439_13: evamettha aṭṭhakathācariyehi sahacaraṇanayo dassito, ācariyadhammapālattherena pana
tika-s0105t0:439_14: yathālābhanayopi. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “kiṃ vā imāya sahacariyāya, yathālābhaggahaṇaṃ
tika-s0105t0:439_15: panettha daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sakkharakathalassa hi vasena tiṭṭhantanti, sippisambukassa macchagumbassa
