tika-s0105t0:439_16: ca vasena tiṭṭhantampi carantampīti evaṃ yojanā kātabbā”ti. Alabbhamānassāpi atthassa
tika-s0105t0:439_17: sahayogīvasena desanāmattaṃ pati sahacaraṇanayo, sādhāraṇato desitassāpi atthassa
tika-s0105t0:439_18: sambhavavasena vivecanaṃ pati yathālābhanayoti ubhayathāpi yujjati.
tika-s0105t0:440_0: Evampettha vadanti – aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sakkharakathalaṃ tiṭṭhatiyeva, itarāni carantipi
tika-s0105t0:440_1: tiṭṭhantipī”ti iminā yathālābhanayo dassito yathāsambhavaṃ atthassa vivecitattā,
tika-s0105t0:440_2: “yathā panā”tiādinā pana sahacaraṇanayo alabbhamānassāpi atthassa sahayogīvasena
tika-s0105t0:440_3: desanāmattassa vibhāvitattāti, tadetampi anupavajjameva atthassa yuttattā, aṭṭhakathāyañca
tika-s0105t0:440_4: tathā dassanassāpi sambhavatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Tatthā”tiādi upamāsaṃsandanaṃ. Tīreti
tika-s0105t0:440_5: udakarahadassa tīre. Udakarahado ca nāma katthaci samuddopi vuccati “rahadopi tattha
tika-s0105t0:440_6: gambhīro, samuddo saritodako”tiādīsu. Katthaci jalāsayopi “rahadopi tattha dharaṇī
tika-s0105t0:440_7: nāma, yato meghā pavassanti, vassā yato patāyantī”tiādīsu, idhāpi jalāsayoyeva. So
tika-s0105t0:440_8: hi udakavasena raho cakkhurahādikaṃ dadātīti udakarahado o-kārassa a-kāraṃ katvā.
tika-s0105t0:440_9: Saddavidū pana “udakaṃ haratīti udakarahado niruttinayenā”ti vadanti.
tika-s0105t0:441_1: sampiṇḍanaṃ. Tattha ettāvatāti “puna caparaṃ mahārāja bhikkhu evaṃ samāhite citte…pe…
tika-s0105t0:441_2: ñāṇadassanāya cittaṃ abhinīharatī”tiādinā ettakena, etaparimāṇavantena vā vacanakkamena.
tika-s0105t0:441_3: Vipassanāñāṇanti ñāṇadassananāmena dassitaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ, tassa ca visuṃ gaṇanadassanena
tika-s0105t0:441_4: heṭṭhā catutthajjhānānantaraṃ vattabbatākāraṇesu tīsu nayesu tatiyanayasseva yuttatarabhāvopi
tika-s0105t0:441_5: dīpitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Manomayañāṇassa iddhividhasamavarodhitabhāve visuddhimagge vuttepi
tika-s0105t0:441_6: idha pāḷiyaṃ visuṃ desitattā visuṃ eva gahaṇaṃ, tathā desanā ca pāṭiyekkasandiṭṭhikasāmaññaphalatthāti
tika-s0105t0:441_8: nipphanna”nti vuttaṃ, tabbasena nipphannattā taggahaṇeneva gahitaṃ taṃ ñāṇadvayanti
tika-s0105t0:441_9: vuttaṃ hoti. Dibbacakkhussa hi anāgataṃsañāṇaṃ, yathākammūpagañāṇañcāti dvepi ñāṇāni
tika-s0105t0:441_10: paribhaṇḍāni hontīti. Dibbacakkhuñāṇanti cutūpapātañāṇanāmena dassitaṃ dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:442_0: Sabbesaṃ pana dasannaṃ ñāṇānaṃ ārammaṇavibhāgassa visuddhimagge anāgatattā tatthānāgatañāṇānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:442_1: ārammaṇavibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ “tesa”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tesanti dasannaṃ ñāṇānaṃ. Tatthāti
tika-s0105t0:442_2: tasmiṃ ārammaṇavibhāge, tesu vā dasasu ñāṇesu. Bhūmibhedato parittamahaggataṃ, kālabhedato
tika-s0105t0:442_3: atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ, santānabhedato ajjhattabahiddhā cāti vipassanāñāṇaṃ sattavidhārammaṇaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:442_4: Parittārammaṇāditikattayeneva hi tassa ārammaṇavibhāgo, na maggārammaṇatikena. Nimmitarūpāyatanamattamevāti
tika-s0105t0:442_5: attanā nimmitaṃ rūpārammaṇameva, attanā vā nimmite manomaye kāye vijjamānaṃ rūpāyatanamevātipi
tika-s0105t0:442_6: yujjati. Idañhi tassa ñāṇassa abhinimmiyamāne manomaye kāye rūpāyatanamevārabbha
tika-s0105t0:442_7: pavattanato vuttaṃ, na pana tattha gandhāyatanādīnamabhāvato. Na hi rūpakalāpo gandhāyatanādivirahito
tika-s0105t0:442_9: yathākkamaṃ bhūmikālasantānabhedato tibbidhārammaṇanti attho. Nibbānavasena ekadhammārammaṇampi
tika-s0105t0:442_11: vuttaṃ. Tañhi parittatikavasena appamāṇārammaṇaṃ, ajjhattikavasena bahiddhārammaṇaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:443_0: Uttaritarasaddo, paṇītatarasaddo ca pariyāyoti dasseti “seṭṭhatara”nti iminā. Ratanakūṭaṃ
tika-s0105t0:443_1: viya kūṭāgārassa arahattaṃ kūṭaṃ uttamaṅgabhūtaṃ bhagavato desanāya arahattapariyosānattāti
tika-s0105t0:443_5: viya ratanakūṭena arahattakūṭena niṭṭhāpesi “vimuttasmi”nti iminā, arahattaphalassa desitattāti attho.
tika-s0105t0:445_0: 250. Ettāvatā bhagavatā desitassa sāmaññaphalasuttassa atthavaṇṇanaṃ katvā idāni
tika-s0105t0:445_1: dhammasaṅgāhakehi saṅgītassa “evaṃ vutte”tiādipāṭhassapi atthavaṇṇanaṃ karonto paṭhamaṃ
tika-s0105t0:445_2: sambandhaṃ dassetuṃ “rājā”tiādimāha. Tattha tatthāti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sāmaññaphale,
tika-s0105t0:445_3: suttapadese vā. Karaṇaṃ kāro, sādhu iti kāro tathā, “sādhu bhagavā, sādhu sugatā”tiādinā
tika-s0105t0:445_4: taṃ pavattento. Ādimajjhapariyosānanti desanāya ādiñca majjhañca pariyosānañca. Sakkaccaṃ
tika-s0105t0:445_5: sādaraṃ gāravaṃ sutvā, “cintetvā”ti ettha idaṃ pubbakālakiriyāvacanaṃ. Ime pañhe
tika-s0105t0:445_6: puthū samaṇabrāhmaṇe pucchanto ahaṃ ciraṃ vata amhi, evaṃ pucchantopi ahaṃ thuse
tika-s0105t0:445_7: koṭṭento viya kañci sāraṃ nālatthanti yojanā. Tathā yo…pe… vissajjesi, tassa bhagavato
tika-s0105t0:445_8: guṇasampadā aho vata. Dasabalassa guṇānubhāvaṃ ajānanto ahaṃ vañcito suciraṃ vata
tika-s0105t0:445_9: amhīti. Vañcitoti ca aññāṇena vañcito āvaṭṭito, mohena paṭicchādito amhīti vuttaṃ
tika-s0105t0:445_10: hoti. Tenāha “dasabalassa guṇānubhāvaṃ ajānanto”ti. Sāmaññajotanā hi visese avatiṭṭhati.
tika-s0105t0:445_11: Cintetvā āvikarontoti sambandho. Ullaṅghanasamatthāyapi ubbegapītiyā anullaṅghanampi
tika-s0105t0:445_12: siyāti āha “pañcavidhāya pītiyā phuṭasarīro”ti. Phuṭasarīroti ca phusitasarīroti
tika-s0105t0:445_13: attho, na byāpitasarīroti sabbāya pītiyā abyāpitattā. Tanti attano pasādassa āvikaraṇaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:446_0: Abhikkantāti atikkantā vigatā, vigatabhāvo ca khayo evāti āha “khaye dissatī”ti.
tika-s0105t0:446_1: Tathā hi vuttaṃ “nikkhanto paṭhamo yāmo”ti. Abhikkantataroti ativiya kantataro manoramo,
tika-s0105t0:446_2: tādiso ca sundaro bhaddako nāmāti vuttaṃ “sundare”ti.
tika-s0105t0:447_0: “Ko me”tiādi gāthā vimānavatthumhi. Tattha koti devanāgayakkhagandhabbādīsu katamo.
tika-s0105t0:447_1: Meti mama. Pādānīti pāde, liṅgavipariyāyoyaṃ. Iddhiyāti īdisāya deviddhiyā. Yasasāti
tika-s0105t0:447_2: īdisena parivārena, parijanena ca. Jalanti jalanto vijjotamāno. Abhikkantenāti ativiya
tika-s0105t0:447_3: kantena kamanīyena, abhirūpenāti vuttaṃ hoti. Vaṇṇenāti chavivaṇṇena sarīravaṇṇanibhāya.
tika-s0105t0:447_4: Sabbā obhāsayaṃ disāti sabbā dasapi disā obhāsayanto. Cando viya, sūriyo viya ca
tika-s0105t0:447_5: ekobhāsaṃ ekālokaṃ karonto ko vandatīti sambandho.
tika-s0105t0:448_0: Abhirūpeti atirekarūpe uḷāravaṇṇena sampannarūpe. Abbhānumodaneti abhianumodane abhippamoditabhāve.
tika-s0105t0:448_1: Kimatthiyaṃ “abbhānumodane”ti vacananti āha “tasmā”tiādi. Yuttaṃ tāva hotu abbhānumodane,
tika-s0105t0:448_2: kasmā panāyaṃ dvikkhattuṃ vuttoti codanāya sodhanāmukhena āmeḍitavisayaṃ niddhāreti
tika-s0105t0:448_3: “bhaye kodhe”tiādinā, iminā saddalakkhaṇena hetubhūtena evaṃ vutto, iminā ca iminā
tika-s0105t0:448_4: ca visayenāti vuttaṃ hoti. “Sādhu sādhu bhante”ti āmeḍitavasena atthaṃ dassetvā tassa
tika-s0105t0:448_5: visayaṃ niddhārento evamāhātipi sambandhaṃ vadanti. Tattha “coro coro, sappo sappo”tiādīsu
tika-s0105t0:448_6: bhaye āmeḍitaṃ, “vijjha vijjha, pahara paharā”tiādīsu kodhe, “sādhu sādhū”tiādīsu
tika-s0105t0:448_7: pasaṃsāyaṃ, “gaccha gaccha, lunāhi lunāhī”tiādīsu turite, “āgaccha āgacchā”tiādīsu
tika-s0105t0:448_9: hāse, “kahaṃ ekaputtaka, kahaṃ ekaputtakā”tiādīsu soke, “aho sukhaṃ, aho sukha”ntiādīsu
tika-s0105t0:448_10: pasāde. Casaddo avuttasamuccayattho, tena garahā asammānādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0105t0:448_11: “Pāpo pāpo”tiādīsu hi garahāyaṃ, “abhirūpaka abhirūpakā”tiādīsu asammāne. Evametesu
tika-s0105t0:448_12: navasu, aññesu ca visayesu āmeḍitavacanaṃ budho kareyya, yojeyyāti attho. Āmeḍanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:448_13: punappunamuccāraṇaṃ, āmeḍīyati vā punappunamuccārīyatīti āmeḍitaṃ, ekassevatthassa
tika-s0105t0:448_14: dvattikkhattuṃ vacanaṃ. Meḍisaddo hi ummādane, āpubbo tu dvattikkhattumuccāraṇe vattati
tika-s0105t0:449_0: Evaṃ āmeḍitavasena dvikkhattuṃ vuttabhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni nayidaṃ āmeḍitavaseneva
tika-s0105t0:449_1: dvikkhattuṃ vuttaṃ, atha kho paccekamatthadvayavasenapīti dassento “atha vā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0105t0:449_2: Āmeḍitavasena atthaṃ dassetvā vicchāvasenāpi dassento evamāhātipi vadanti, tadayuttameva
tika-s0105t0:449_3: byāpetabbassa dvikkhattumavuttattā. Byāpetabbassa hi byāpakena guṇakiriyādabbena
tika-s0105t0:449_4: byāpanicchāya dvattikkhattuṃ vacanaṃ vicchā yathā “gāmo gāmo ramaṇīyo”ti. Tattha
tika-s0105t0:449_5: abhikkantanti abhikkamanīyaṃ, tabbhāvo ca atiiṭṭhatāyāti vuttaṃ “atiiṭṭha”ntiādi,
tika-s0105t0:449_7: vacanaṃ apekkhitvā napuṃsakaliṅgena vuttaṃ, taṃ pana bhagavato vacanaṃ dhammadesanāyevāti
tika-s0105t0:449_8: katvā “yadidaṃ bhagavato dhammadesanā”ti āha, yāyaṃ bhagavato dhammadesanā mayā sutā,
tika-s0105t0:449_9: tadidaṃ bhagavato dhammadesanāsaṅkhātaṃ vacanaṃ abhikkantanti attho. Evaṃ paṭiniddesopi
tika-s0105t0:449_10: hi atthato abhedattā yutto eva “yattha ca dinnaṃ mahapphalamāhū”tiādīsu viya. “Abhikkanta”nti
tika-s0105t0:449_11: vuttassa vā atthamattadassanaṃ etaṃ, tasmā atthavasena liṅgavibhattivipariṇāmo veditabbo,
tika-s0105t0:449_12: kāriyavipariṇāmavasena cettha vibhattivipariṇāmatā. Vacananti hettha seso, abhikkantaṃ
tika-s0105t0:449_13: bhagavato vacanaṃ, yāyaṃ bhagavato dhammadesanā mayā sutā, sā abhikkantaṃ abhikkantāti
tika-s0105t0:449_14: attho. Dutiyapadepi “abhikkantanti pasādanaṃ apekkhitvā napuṃsakaliṅgena vutta”ntiādinā
tika-s0105t0:450_0: “Bhagavato vacana”ntiādinā atthadvayasarūpaṃ dasseti. Tattha dosanāsanatoti rāgādikilesadosaviddhaṃsanato.
tika-s0105t0:450_1: Guṇādhigamanatoti sīlādiguṇānaṃ sampādanavasena adhigamāpanato. Ye guṇe desanā adhigameti,
tika-s0105t0:450_2: tesu “guṇādhigamanato”ti vuttesuyeva guṇesu padhānabhūtā guṇā dassetabbāti te padhānabhūte
tika-s0105t0:450_3: guṇe tāva dassetuṃ “saddhājananato paññājananato”ti vuttaṃ. Saddhāpadhānā hi lokiyā
tika-s0105t0:450_4: guṇā, paññāpadhānā lokuttarāti, padhānaniddeso cesa desanāya adhigametabbehi sīlasamādhidukādīhipi
tika-s0105t0:450_11: Avadātaṃ, odātanti ca atthato ekaṃ. Karavīkarutamañjutāya āpātharamaṇīyato. Pubbāparāviruddhasuvisuddhatāya
tika-s0105t0:450_12: vimaddakkhamato. Āpātharamaṇīyatāya eva suyyamānasukhato. Vimaddakkhamatāya, hitajjhāsayappavattitāya
tika-s0105t0:450_13: ca vīmaṃsiyamānahitatoti evamettha attho veditabbo. Ādisaddena pana saṃsāracakkanivattanato,
tika-s0105t0:451_0: Na kevalaṃ padadvayeneva, tato parampi catūhi upamāhīti pi-saddo sampiṇḍanattho.
tika-s0105t0:451_1: “Cakkhumanto rūpāni dakkhantī”ti idaṃ “telapajjotaṃ dhāreyyā”ti catutthaupamāya ākāramattadassanaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:451_2: na pana upamantaradassananti āha “catūhi upamāhī”ti. Adhomukhaṭṭhapitanti kenaci
tika-s0105t0:451_3: adhomukhaṃ ṭhapitaṃ. Heṭṭhāmukhajātanti sabhāveneva heṭṭhāmukhaṃ jātaṃ. Ugghāṭeyyāti
tika-s0105t0:451_5: uttarābhimukho vā gacchā”tiādinā vacanamattaṃ avatvā “esa maggo, evaṃ gacchā”ti hatthe
tika-s0105t0:451_6: gahetvā nissandehaṃ dasseyyāti vuttaṃ hoti. Kāḷapakkhe cātuddasī kāḷapakkhacātuddasī.
tika-s0105t0:451_7: Nirantararukkhagahanena ekagghano vanasaṇḍo ghanavanasaṇḍo. Meghassa paṭalaṃ meghapaṭalaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:451_8: meghacchannatāti vuttaṃ hoti. Nikkujjitaṃ ukkujjeyyāti kassacipi ādheyyassa anādhārabhūtaṃ
tika-s0105t0:451_9: kiñci bhājanaṃ ādhārabhāvāpādanavasena ukkujjeyya upari mukhaṃ ṭhapeyya. Heṭṭhāmukhajātatāya
tika-s0105t0:451_10: vimukhaṃ, adhomukhaṭṭhapitatāya asaddhamme patitanti evaṃ padadvayaṃ nikkujjitapadassa
tika-s0105t0:451_11: yathādassitena atthadvayena yathārahaṃ yojetabbaṃ, na yathāsaṅkhyaṃ. Attano sabhāveneva
tika-s0105t0:451_12: hi esa rājā saddhammavimukho, pāpamittena pana devadattena pitughātādīsu uyyojitattā
tika-s0105t0:452_0: “Kassapassa bhagavato”tiādinā tadā raññā avuttassāpi atthāpattimattadassanaṃ. Kāmañca
tika-s0105t0:452_1: kāmacchandādayopi paṭicchādakā nīvaraṇabhāvato, micchādiṭṭhi pana savisesaṃ paṭicchādikā
tika-s0105t0:452_5: vivarantenā”ti vadanto sabbabuddhānaṃ ekāva anusandhi, ekaṃva sāsananti katvā kassapassa
tika-s0105t0:452_6: bhagavato sāsanampi iminā saddhiṃ ekasāsanaṃ karotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Aṅguttaraṭṭhakathādīsupi
tika-s0105t0:452_7: hi tathā ceva vuttaṃ, evañca katvā micchādiṭṭhigahanapaṭicchannassa sāsanassa vivaraṇavacanaṃ upapannaṃ hotīti.
tika-s0105t0:453_0: Sabbo akusaladhammasaṅkhāto apāyagāmimaggo kummaggo kucchito maggoti katvā. Sammādiṭṭhiādīnaṃ
tika-s0105t0:453_1: ujupaṭipakkhatāya micchādiṭṭhiādayo aṭṭha micchattadhammā micchāmaggo mokkhamaggato
tika-s0105t0:453_2: micchā vitatho maggoti katvā. Teneva hi tadubhayassa paṭipakkhataṃ sandhāya “saggamokkhamaggaṃ
tika-s0105t0:453_3: āvikarontenā”ti vuttaṃ. Sabbo hi kusaladhammo saggamaggo. Sammādiṭṭhiādayo aṭṭha
tika-s0105t0:453_4: sammattadhammā mokkhamaggo. Sappiādisannissayo padīpo na tathā ujjalo, yathā telasannissayoti
tika-s0105t0:453_5: telapajjotaggahaṇaṃ. Dhāreyyāti dhareyya, samāhareyya samādaheyyāti attho. Buddhādiratanarūpānīti
tika-s0105t0:453_6: buddhādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ vaṇṇāyatanāni. Tesaṃ buddhādiratanarūpānaṃ paṭicchādakassa
tika-s0105t0:453_7: mohandhakārassa viddhaṃsakaṃ tathā. Desanāsaṅkhātaṃ pajjotaṃ tathā. Tadubhayaṃ tulyādhikaraṇavasena
tika-s0105t0:454_1: karoti. Pasannacittatā ca imaṃ desanaṃ sutvā evāti atthaṃ ñāpetuṃ “imāya desanāyā”tiādi
tika-s0105t0:454_2: vuttaṃ. Imāya desanāya hetubhūtāya. Pasannākāranti pasannehi sādhujanehi kattabbasakkāraṃ.
tika-s0105t0:454_3: Saraṇanti paṭisaraṇaṃ. Tenāha “parāyaṇa”nti. Parāyaṇatā pana anatthanisedhanena,
tika-s0105t0:454_4: atthasampādanena cāti vuttaṃ “aghassa tātā, hitassa ca vidhātā”ti. Aghassāti nissakke
tika-s0105t0:454_5: sāmivacanaṃ, pāpatoti attho. Dukkhatotipi vadanti keci. Tāyati avassayaṃ karotīti
tika-s0105t0:454_6: tātā. Hitassāti upayogatthe sāmivacanaṃ. Vidahati saṃvidhānaṃ karotīti vidhātā. “Iti
tika-s0105t0:454_7: iminā adhippāyenā”ti vadanto “itisaddo cettha luttaniddiṭṭho, so ca ākārattho”ti
tika-s0105t0:454_8: dasseti. Saraṇanti gamanaṃ. Hitādhippāyena bhajanaṃ, jānanaṃ vā, evañca katvā vinayaṭṭhakathādīsu
tika-s0105t0:454_9: “saraṇanti gacchāmī”ti saheva itisaddena attho vuttoti. Ettha hi nāyaṃ gami-saddo
tika-s0105t0:454_10: nī-saddādayo viya dvikammiko, tasmā yathā “ajaṃ gāmaṃ netī”ti vuccati, evaṃ “bhagavantaṃ
tika-s0105t0:454_11: saraṇaṃ gacchāmī”ti vattuṃ na sakkā, “saraṇanti gacchāmī”ti pana vattabbaṃ, tasmā
tika-s0105t0:454_12: ettha itisaddo luttaniddiṭṭhoti veditabbaṃ, evañca katvā “yo buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchati,
tika-s0105t0:454_13: so buddhaṃ vā gaccheyya saraṇaṃ vā”ti khuddakanikāyaṭṭhakathāya uddhaṭā codanā anavakāsā.
tika-s0105t0:454_14: Na hi gami-saddaṃ duhādinyādigaṇikaṃ karonti akkharacintakāti. Hotu tāva gami-saddassa
tika-s0105t0:454_15: ekakammabhāvo, tathāpi “gacchateva pubbaṃ disaṃ, gacchati pacchimaṃ disa”ntiādīsu
tika-s0105t0:454_16: viya “bhagavantaṃ, saraṇa”nti padadvayassa samānādhikaraṇatā yuttāti? Na, tassa padadvayassa
tika-s0105t0:454_17: samānādhikaraṇabhāvānupapattito. Tassa hi samānādhikaraṇabhāve adhippete paṭihatacittopi
tika-s0105t0:454_18: bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamanto buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gato nāma siyā. Yañhi taṃ “buddho”ti visesitaṃ
tika-s0105t0:454_19: saraṇaṃ, tamevesa gatoti, na cettha anupapattikena atthena attho, tasmā “bhagavanta”nti
tika-s0105t0:454_20: gamanīyatthassa dīpanaṃ, “saraṇa”nti pana gamanākārassāti vuttanayena itilopavaseneva
tika-s0105t0:454_21: attho gahetabboti. Dhammañca saṅghañcāti etthāpi eseva nayo. Honti cettha –
tika-s0105t0:459_0: “Iti iminā adhippāyena bhagavantaṃ gacchāmī”ti pana vadanto aneneva adhippāyena bhajanaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:459_1: jānanaṃ vā saraṇagamanaṃ nāmāti niyameti. Tattha “gacchāmī”tiādīsu purimassa purimassa
tika-s0105t0:459_2: pacchimaṃ pacchimaṃ atthavacanaṃ, “gacchāmī”ti etassa vā anaññasādhāraṇatādassanavasena
tika-s0105t0:459_4: upasaṅkamanaṃ, sevanaṃ santikāvacarabhāvo, payirupāsanaṃ vattapaṭivattakaraṇena upaṭṭhānanti
tika-s0105t0:459_5: evaṃ sabbathāpi anaññasādhāraṇataṃyeva dasseti. Evaṃ “gacchāmī”ti padassa gatiatthaṃ
tika-s0105t0:459_6: dassetvā buddhiatthampi dassetuṃ “evaṃ vā”tiādimāha, tattha evanti “bhagavā me saraṇa”ntiādinā
tika-s0105t0:459_7: adhippāyena. Kasmā pana “gacchāmī”ti padassa “bujjhāmī”ti ayamattho labbhatīti codanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:459_8: sodheti “yesañhī”tiādinā, anena ca niruttinayamantarena sabhāvatova gamudhātussa
tika-s0105t0:459_9: buddhiatthoti dīpeti. Dhātūnanti mūlasaddasaṅkhātānaṃ i, yā, kamu, gamuiccādīnaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:460_0: “Adhigatamagge, sacchikatanirodhe”ti padadvayenāpi phalaṭṭhā eva dassitā, na maggaṭṭhāti
tika-s0105t0:460_1: te dassento “yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāne cā”ti āha. Nanu ca kalyāṇaputhujjanopi
tika-s0105t0:460_2: “yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjatī”ti vuccatīti? Kiñcāpi vuccati, nippariyāyena pana maggaṭṭhā
tika-s0105t0:460_3: eva tathā vattabbā, na itaro niyāmokkamanābhāvato. Tathā hi te eva “apāyesu apatamāne
tika-s0105t0:460_4: dhāretī”ti vuttā. Sammattaniyāmokkamanena hi apāyavinimuttisambhavoti. Evaṃ anekehipi
tika-s0105t0:460_5: vinaya- suttantaṭīkākārehī vuttaṃ, tadetaṃ sammattaniyāmokkamanavasena nippariyāyato
tika-s0105t0:460_6: apāyavinimuttake sandhāya vuttaṃ, tadanupapattivasena pana pariyāyato apāyavinimuttakaṃ
tika-s0105t0:460_9: vuttoti, chattavimāne chattamāṇavako cettha nidassanaṃ. Adhigatamagge, sacchikatanirodhe
tika-s0105t0:460_10: ca yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāne ca puggale apāyesu apatamāne katvā dhāretīti sapāṭhasesayojanā.
tika-s0105t0:460_11: Atītakālikena hi purimapadadvayena phalaṭṭhānameva gahaṇaṃ, vattamānakālikena ca
tika-s0105t0:460_12: pacchimena padena saha kalyāṇaputhujjanena maggaṭṭhānameva. “Apatamāne”ti pana padena
tika-s0105t0:460_13: dhāraṇākāradassanaṃ apatanakaraṇavaseneva dhāretīti, dhāraṇasarūpadassanaṃ vā. Dhāraṇaṃ
tika-s0105t0:460_15: vaṭṭato niyyānameva. “Apāyesū”ti hi dukkhabahulaṭṭhānatāya padhānavasena vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:460_16: vaṭṭadukkhesu pana sabbesupi apatamāne katvā dhāretīti attho veditabbo. Tathā hi
tika-s0105t0:460_17: abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ “sotāpattimaggo cettha apāyabhavato vuṭṭhāti, sakadāgāmimaggo
tika-s0105t0:460_19: sabbabhavehipi vuṭṭhāti evāti vadantī”ti evañca katvā ariyamaggo niyyānikatāya, nibbānañca
tika-s0105t0:460_20: tassa tadatthasiddhihetutāyāti ubhayameva nippariyāyena dhammo nāmāti sarūpato dassetuṃ
tika-s0105t0:460_21: “so atthato ariyamaggo ceva nibbānañcā”ti vuttaṃ. Nibbānañhi ārammaṇaṃ labhitvā ariyamaggassa
tika-s0105t0:460_22: tadatthasiddhi, svāyamattho ca pāḷiyā eva siddhoti āha “vuttañceta”ntiādi. Yāvatāti
tika-s0105t0:460_23: yattakā. Tesanti tattakānaṃ dhammānaṃ. “Aggo akkhāyatī”ti vattabbe o-kārassa a-kāraṃ,
tika-s0105t0:460_24: ma-kārāgamañca katvā “aggamakkhāyatī”ti vuttaṃ. “Akkhāyatī”ti cettha itisaddo ādiattho,
tika-s0105t0:460_25: pakārattho vā, tena “yāvatā bhikkhave dhammā saṅkhatā vā asaṅkhatā vā, virāgo tesaṃ
tika-s0105t0:460_26: aggamakkhāyatī”tiādi suttapadaṃ saṅgaṇhāti, “vitthāro”ti iminā vā tadavasesasaṅgaho.
tika-s0105t0:461_0: Yasmā pana ariyaphalānaṃ “tāya saddhāya avūpasantāyā”tiādi vacanato maggena samucchinnānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:461_2: pariyattiyā pana niyyānadhammasamadhigamahetutāya niyyānānuguṇatāti iminā pariyāyena
tika-s0105t0:461_3: vuttanayena dhammabhāvo labbhati, tasmā tadubhayampi saṅgaṇhanto “na kevalañcā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0105t0:461_4: Svāyamattho ca pāṭhāruḷho evāti dasseti “vuttañheta”ntiādinā. Tattha chattamāṇavakavimāneti
tika-s0105t0:461_5: chatto kira nāma setabyāyaṃ brāhmaṇamāṇavako, so ukkaṭṭhāyaṃ pokkharasātibrāhmaṇassa
tika-s0105t0:461_6: santike sippaṃ uggahetvā “garudakkhiṇaṃ dassāmī”ti ukkaṭṭhābhimukho gacchati, athassa
tika-s0105t0:461_7: bhagavā antarāmagge corantarāyaṃ, tāvatiṃsabhavane nibbattamānañca disvā gāthābandhavasena
tika-s0105t0:461_8: saraṇagamanavidhiṃ desesi, tassa tāvatiṃsabhavanupagassa tiṃsayojanikaṃ vimānaṃ chattamāṇavakavimānaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:461_9: Devalokepi hi tassa manussakāle samaññā yathā “maṇḍūko devaputto, kuvero devarājā”ti,
tika-s0105t0:461_10: idha pana chattamāṇavakavimānaṃ vatthu kāraṇaṃ etassāti katvā uttarapadalopena “na
tika-s0105t0:461_11: tathā tapati nabhe sūriyo, cando ca na bhāsati na phusso, yathā”tiādikā desanā “chattamāṇavakavimāna”nti
tika-s0105t0:461_12: vuccati, tatrāyaṃ gāthā pariyāpannā, tasmā chattamāṇavakavimānavatthudesanāyanti attho veditabbo.
tika-s0105t0:462_0: Kāmarāgo bhavarāgoti evamādibhedo anādikālavibhāvito sabbopi rāgo virajjati pahīyati
tika-s0105t0:462_1: etenāti rāgavirāgo, maggo. Ejāsaṅkhātāya taṇhāya, antonijjhānalakkhaṇassa ca sokassa
tika-s0105t0:462_2: taduppattiyaṃ sabbaso parikkhīṇattā natthi ejā, soko ca etasminti anejaṃ, asokañca,
tika-s0105t0:462_3: phalaṃ. Tadaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “taṇhāvasiṭṭhānaṃ sokanimittānaṃ kilesānaṃ paṭippassambhanato
tika-s0105t0:462_4: asoka”nti vuttaṃ. Dhammamasaṅkhatanti sampajja sambhūya paccayehi appaṭisaṅkhatattā
tika-s0105t0:462_5: asaṅkhataṃ attano sabhāvadhāraṇato paramatthadhammabhūtaṃ nibbānaṃ. Tadaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-s0105t0:462_6: pana “dhammanti sabhāvadhammaṃ. Sabhāvato gahetabbadhammo hesa, yadidaṃ maggaphalanibbānāni,
tika-s0105t0:462_7: na pariyattidhammo viya paññattidhammavasenā”ti vuttaṃ, evaṃ sati dhammasaddo tīsupi
tika-s0105t0:462_8: ṭhānesu yojetabbo. Appaṭikūlasaddena ca tattha nibbānameva gahitaṃ “natthi ettha
tika-s0105t0:462_9: kiñcipi paṭikūla”nti katvā, appaṭikūlanti ca avirodhadīpanato kiñci aviruddhaṃ, iṭṭhaṃ
tika-s0105t0:462_10: paṇītanti vā attho. Paguṇarūpena pavattitattā, pakaṭṭhaguṇavibhāvanato vā paguṇaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:462_11: Yathāha “vihiṃsasaññī paguṇaṃ na bhāsiṃ, dhammaṃ paṇītaṃ manujesu brahme”ti.
tika-s0105t0:463_0: Dhammakkhandhā kathitāti yojanā. Evaṃ idha catūhipi padehi pariyattidhammoyeva gahito,
tika-s0105t0:463_2: sabbadāpi iṭṭhamevāti madhuraṃ, sabbaññutaññāṇasannissayāya paṭibhānasampadāya pavattitattā
tika-s0105t0:463_3: suppavattibhāvato, nipuṇabhāvato ca paguṇaṃ, vibhajitabbassa atthassa khandhādivasena,
tika-s0105t0:463_4: kusalādivasena, uddesādivasena ca suṭṭhu vibhajanato suvibhattanti tīhipi padehi
tika-s0105t0:463_5: pariyattidhammameva vadatī”ti vuttaṃ. Āpāthakāle viya majjanakālepi, kathentassa
tika-s0105t0:463_6: viya suṇantassāpi sammukhībhāvato ubhatopaccakkhatādassanatthaṃ idheva “ima”nti āsannapaccakkhavacanamāha.
tika-s0105t0:463_7: Puna “dhamma”nti idaṃ yathāvuttassa catubbidhassāpi dhammassa sādhāraṇavacanaṃ. Pariyattidhammopi
tika-s0105t0:463_8: hi saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhānamattāyapi yāthāvapaṭipattiyā apāyapatanato dhāreti,
tika-s0105t0:463_9: imassa ca atthassa idameva chattamāṇavakavimānaṃ sādhakanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sādhāraṇabhāvena
tika-s0105t0:463_10: yathāvuttaṃ dhammaṃ paccakkhaṃ katvā dassento puna “ima”nti āha. Yasmā cesā bha-kārattayena
tika-s0105t0:463_11: ca paṭimaṇḍitā dodhakagāthā, tasmā tatiyapāde madhurasadde ma-kāro adhikopi ariyacariyādipadehi
tika-s0105t0:464_0: Diṭṭhisīlasaṅghātenāti “yāyaṃ diṭṭhi ariyā niyyānikā niyyāti takkarassa sammā dukkhakkhayāya,
tika-s0105t0:464_1: tathārūpāya diṭṭhiyā diṭṭhisāmaññagato viharatī”ti evaṃ vuttāya diṭṭhiyā ceva “yāni
tika-s0105t0:464_2: tāni sīlāni akhaṇḍāni acchiddāni asabalāni akammāsāni bhujissāni viññupasatthāni
tika-s0105t0:464_3: aparāmaṭṭhāni samādhisaṃvattanikāni, tathārūpehi sīlehi sīlasāmaññagato viharatī”ti
tika-s0105t0:464_4: evaṃ vuttānaṃ sīlānañca saṃhatabhāvena, diṭṭhisīlasāmaññenāti attho. Saṃhatoti saṅghaṭito,
tika-s0105t0:464_5: sametoti vuttaṃ hoti. Ariyapuggalā hi yattha katthaci dūre ṭhitāpi attano guṇasāmaggiyā
tika-s0105t0:465_0: Yatthāti yasmiṃ saṅghe. Dinnanti pariccattaṃ annādideyyadhammaṃ, gāthābandhattā cettha
tika-s0105t0:465_1: anunāsikalopo. Dodhakagāthā hesā. Mahapphalamāhūti “mahapphala”nti buddhādayo āhu.
tika-s0105t0:465_2: Catūsūti cettha ca-kāro adhikopi vuttanayena anupavajjo. Accantameva kilesāsucito
tika-s0105t0:465_4: catūsu purisayugesu. Catusaccadhammassa, nibbānadhammassa ca paccakkhato dassanena,
tika-s0105t0:465_5: ariyadhammassa paccakkhadassāvitāya vā dhammadasā. Te puggalā maggaṭṭhaphalaṭṭhe
tika-s0105t0:465_6: yugale akatvā visuṃ visuṃ puggalagaṇanena aṭṭha ca honti. Imaṃ saṅghaṃ saraṇatthaṃ
tika-s0105t0:465_7: saraṇāya parāyaṇāya apāyadukkhavaṭṭadukkhaparitāṇāya upehi upagaccha bhaja seva,
tika-s0105t0:465_8: evaṃ vā jānāhi bujjhassūti saha yojanāya attho. Yattha yesu sucīsu catūsu purisayugesu
tika-s0105t0:465_9: dinnaṃ mahapphalamāhu, dhammadasā te puggalā aṭṭha ca, imaṃ saṅghaṃ saraṇatthamupehīti
tika-s0105t0:465_10: vā sambandho. Evampi hi paṭiniddeso yutto eva atthato abhinnattāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Gāthāsukhatthañcettha
tika-s0105t0:465_11: purisapade īkāraṃ, puggalāpade ca rassaṃ katvā niddeso.
tika-s0105t0:466: Ettāvatāti “esāha”ntiādivacanakkamena. Tīṇi vatthūni “saraṇa”nti gamanāni, tikkhattuṃ vā “saraṇa”nti gamanānīti saraṇagamanāni. Paṭivedesīti attano hadayagataṃ vācāya pavedesi.
tika-s0105t0:468_0: Saraṇagamanassa visayappabhedaphalasaṃkilesabhedānaṃ viya, kattu ca vibhāvanā tattha
tika-s0105t0:468_1: kosallāya hoti yevāti saha kattunā taṃ vidhiṃ dassetuṃ “idāni tesu saraṇagamanesu
tika-s0105t0:468_2: kosallatthaṃ…pe… veditabbo”ti vuttaṃ. “Yo ca saraṇaṃ gacchatī”ti iminā hi kattāraṃ
tika-s0105t0:468_3: vibhāveti tena vinā saraṇagamanasseva asambhavato, “saraṇagamana”nti iminā ca saraṇagamanameva,
tika-s0105t0:468_4: “saraṇa”ntiādīhi pana yathākkamaṃ visayādayo. Kasmā panettha vodānaṃ na gahitaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:468_5: nanu vodānavibhāvanāpi tattha kosallāya hotīti? Saccametaṃ, taṃ pana saṃkilesaggahaṇeneva
tika-s0105t0:468_6: atthato vibhāvitaṃ hotīti na gahitaṃ. Yāni hi nesaṃ saṃkilesakāraṇāni aññāṇādīni,
tika-s0105t0:468_7: tesaṃ sabbena sabbaṃ anuppannānaṃ anuppādanena, uppannānañca pahānena vodānaṃ hotīti.
tika-s0105t0:468_9: sarasaddassa vasenetaṃ siddhanti dassento dhātvatthavasena “hiṃsatīti saraṇa”nti
tika-s0105t0:468_10: vatvā taṃ pana hiṃsanaṃ kesaṃ, kathaṃ, kassa vāti codanaṃ sodheti “saraṇagatāna”ntiādinā.
tika-s0105t0:468_11: Kesanti hi saraṇagatānaṃ. Kathanti teneva saraṇagamanena. Kassāti bhayādīnanti yathākkamaṃ
tika-s0105t0:468_13: gamanena kusaladhammena. Bhayanti vaṭṭabhayaṃ. Santāsanti cittutrāsaṃ teneva cetasikadukkhassa
tika-s0105t0:468_15: sabbampi dukkhaṃ “duggatiyaṃ parikilissanaṃ saṃvibādhanaṃ, samupatāpanaṃ vā”ti katvā,
tika-s0105t0:468_16: tayidaṃ sabbaṃ parato phalakathāyaṃ āvi bhavissati. Hiṃsanañcettha vināsanameva,
tika-s0105t0:468_17: na pana sattahiṃsanamivāti dasseti “hanati vināsetī”ti iminā. Etanti saraṇapadaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:468_18: Adhivacananti nāmaṃ, pasiddhavacanaṃ vā, yathābhuccaṃ vā guṇaṃ adhikicca pavattavacanaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:469_0: Evaṃ hiṃsanatthavasena avisesato saraṇasaddatthaṃ dassetvā idāni tadatthavaseneva
tika-s0105t0:469_1: visesato dassetuṃ “atha vā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Ratanattayassa paccekaṃ hiṃsanakāraṇadassanameva
tika-s0105t0:469_2: hi purimanayato imassa visesoti. Tattha hite pavattanenāti “sampannasīlā bhikkhave
tika-s0105t0:469_3: viharathā”tiādinā atthe sattānaṃ niyojanena. Ahitā ca nivattanenāti “pāṇātipātassa
tika-s0105t0:469_4: kho pāpako vipāko, pāpakaṃ abhisamparāya”ntiādinā ādīnavadassanādimukhena anatthato
tika-s0105t0:469_5: ca sattānaṃ nivattanena. Bhayaṃ hiṃsatīti hitāhitesu appavattipavattihetukaṃ byasanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:469_6: appavattikaraṇena vināseti. Bhavakantārā uttāraṇena maggasaṅkhāto dhammo, phalanibbānasaṅkhāto
tika-s0105t0:469_7: pana assāsadānena sattānaṃ bhayaṃ hiṃsatīti yojanā. Kārānanti dānavasena, pūjāvasena
tika-s0105t0:469_8: ca upanītānaṃ sakkārānaṃ. Anupasaggopi hi saddo saupasaggo viya atthavisesavācako
tika-s0105t0:469_9: “appakampi kataṃ kāraṃ, puññaṃ hoti mahapphala”ntiādīsu viya. Anuttaradakkhiṇeyyabhāvato
tika-s0105t0:469_10: vipulaphalapaṭilābhakaraṇena sattānaṃ bhayaṃ hiṃ satīti yojetabbaṃ. Imināpi pariyāyenāti
tika-s0105t0:469_11: ratanattayassa paccekaṃ hiṃsakabhāvakāraṇadassanavasena vibhajitvā vuttena imināpi
tika-s0105t0:469_12: kāraṇena. Yasmā panidaṃ saraṇapadaṃ nāthapadaṃ viya suddhanāmapadattā dhātvatthaṃ
tika-s0105t0:469_13: antonītaṃ katvā saṅketatthampi vadati, tasmā heṭṭhā saraṇaṃ parāyaṇanti attho vuttoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:470_0: Evaṃ saraṇatthaṃ dassetvā idāni saraṇagamanatthaṃ dassento “tappasādā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0105t0:470_1: Tattha “sammāsambuddho bhagavā, svākkhāto dhammo, suppaṭipanno saṅgho”ti evamādinā
tika-s0105t0:470_2: tasmiṃ ratanattaye pasādo tappasādo, tadeva ratanattayaṃ garu etassāti taggaru, tassa
tika-s0105t0:470_3: bhāvo taggarutā, tappasādo ca taggarutā ca tappasādataggarutā, tāhi. Vihatakileso
tika-s0105t0:470_5: tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ etassāti tapparāyaṇo, tassa bhāvo tapparāyaṇatā, sāyeva ākāro tapparāyaṇatākāro,
tika-s0105t0:470_6: tena pavatto tapparāyaṇatākārappavatto. Ettha ca pasādaggahaṇena lokiyaṃ saraṇagamanamāha.
tika-s0105t0:470_7: Tañhi saddhāpadhānaṃ, na ñāṇapadhānaṃ, garutāgahaṇena pana lokuttaraṃ. Ariyā hi ratanattayaṃ
tika-s0105t0:470_8: guṇābhiññatāya pāsāṇacchattaṃ viya garuṃ katvā passanti, tasmā tappasādena tadaṅgappahānavasena
tika-s0105t0:470_9: vihatakileso, taggarutāya ca agāravakaraṇahetūnaṃ samucchedavasenāti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:470_10: Tapparāyaṇatā panettha taggatikatāti tāya catubbidhampi vakkhamānaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:470_11: gahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Avisesena vā pasādagarutā jotitāti pasādaggahaṇena anaveccappasādassa
tika-s0105t0:470_12: lokiyassa, aveccappasādassa ca lokuttarassa gahaṇaṃ, tathā garutāgahaṇena lokiyassa
tika-s0105t0:470_13: garukaraṇassa, lokuttarassa cāti ubhayenapi padena ubhayampi lokiyalokuttarasaraṇagamanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:470_14: yojetabbaṃ. Uppajjati cittametenāti uppādo, sampayuttadhammasamūho, cittañca taṃ
tika-s0105t0:470_15: uppādo cāti cittuppādo. Samāhāradvandepi hi katthaci pulliṅgamicchanti saddavidū,
tika-s0105t0:470_17: “saraṇanti gacchati etenāti katvā”ti vuttaṃ hoti. “Taṃsamaṅgī”tiādi kattuvibhāvanā.
tika-s0105t0:470_18: Tena yathāvuttacittuppādena samaṅgīti taṃsamaṅgī. Tenāha “vuttappakārena cittuppādenā”ti.
tika-s0105t0:470_19: Upetīti bhajati sevati payirupāsati, jānāti vā, bujjhatīti attho.
tika-s0105t0:471_0: Lokuttaraṃ saraṇagamanaṃ kesanti āha “diṭṭhasaccāna”nti, aṭṭhannaṃ ariyapuggalānanti
tika-s0105t0:471_1: attho. Kadā taṃ ijjhatīti āha “maggakkhaṇe”ti, “ijjhatī”ti padena cetassa sambandho.
tika-s0105t0:471_2: Maggakkhaṇe ijjhamāneneva hi catusaccādhigamena phalaṭṭhānampi saraṇagamakatā sijjhati
tika-s0105t0:471_3: lokuttarasaraṇagamanassa bhedābhāvato, tesañca ekasantānattā. Kathaṃ taṃ ijjhatīti
tika-s0105t0:471_5: kiccato ca sakalepi ratanattaye ijjhatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Saraṇagamanupakkilesasamucchedenāti
tika-s0105t0:471_6: cettha pahānābhisamayaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, ārammaṇatoti sacchikiriyābhisamayaṃ. Nibbānārammaṇaṃ
tika-s0105t0:471_7: hutvā ārammaṇato ijjhatīti hi yojetabbaṃ, tvā-saddo ca hetutthavācako yathā “sakko
tika-s0105t0:471_8: hutvā nibbattī”ti. Apica “ārammaṇato”ti vuttamevatthaṃ sarūpato niyameti “nibbānārammaṇaṃ
tika-s0105t0:471_9: hutvā”ti iminā. “Kiccato”ti tadavasesaṃ bhāvanābhisamayaṃ pariññābhisamayañca sandhāya
tika-s0105t0:471_10: vuttaṃ. “Ārammaṇato nibbānārammaṇaṃ hutvā”ti etena vā maggakkhaṇānurūpaṃ ekārammaṇataṃ
tika-s0105t0:471_11: dassetvā “kiccato”ti iminā pahānato avasesaṃ kiccattayaṃ dassitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Maggakkhaṇe,
tika-s0105t0:471_12: nibbānārammaṇaṃ hutvā”ti ca vuttattā atthato maggañāṇasaṅkhāto catusaccādhigamo eva
tika-s0105t0:471_13: lokuttarasaraṇagamananti viññāyati. Tattha hi catusaccādhigamane saraṇagamanupakkilesassa
tika-s0105t0:471_14: pahānābhisamayavasena samucchindanaṃ bhavati, nibbānadhammo pana sacchikiriyābhisamayavasena,
tika-s0105t0:471_15: maggadhammo ca bhāvanābhisamayavasena paṭivijjhiyamānoyeva saraṇagamanatthaṃ sādheti,
tika-s0105t0:471_16: buddhaguṇā pana sāvakagocarabhūtā pariññābhisamayavasena paṭivijjhiyamānā saraṇagamanatthaṃ
tika-s0105t0:471_17: sādhenti, tathā ariyasaṅghaguṇā. Tenāha “sakalepi ratanattaye ijjhatī”ti.
tika-s0105t0:472_2: upapannaṃ hotīti. Ijjhantañca saheva ijjhati, na lokiyaṃ viya paṭipāṭiyā asammohapaṭivedhena
tika-s0105t0:472_3: paṭividdhattāti gahetabbaṃ. Padīpassa viya hi ekakkhaṇeyeva maggassa catukiccasādhananti.
tika-s0105t0:472_4: Ye pana vadanti “saraṇagamanaṃ nibbānārammaṇaṃ hutvā na pavattati, maggassa adhigatattā
tika-s0105t0:472_5: pana adhigatameva taṃ hoti ekaccānaṃ tevijjādīnaṃ lokiyavijjādayo viyā”ti, tesaṃ
tika-s0105t0:472_6: pana vacane lokiyameva saraṇagamanaṃ siyā, na lokuttaraṃ, tañca ayuttameva duvidhassāpi
tika-s0105t0:472_8: buddhādiguṇārammaṇaṃ hutvāti etthāpi vuttanayena attho, saraṇagamanupakkilesavikkhambhanato,
tika-s0105t0:472_9: ārammaṇato ca sakalepi ratanattaye ijjhatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t0:473_1: yathāvuttasaddhāpubbaṅgamā. Sahajātavasena pubbaṅgamatāyeva hi tammūlikatā saddhāvirahitassa
tika-s0105t0:473_2: buddhādīsu sammādassanassa asambhavato. Sammādiṭṭhi nāma buddhasubuddhataṃ, dhammasudhammataṃ
tika-s0105t0:473_4: iminā sammādiṭṭhivirahitāpi saddhā lokiyasaraṇagamananti dasseti, “saddhāmūlikā ca
tika-s0105t0:473_5: sammādiṭṭhī”ti pana etena saddhūpanissayā yathāvuttā paññāti. Lokiyampi hi saraṇagamanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:473_6: duvidhaṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ, ñāṇavippayuttañca. Tattha paṭhamena padena mātādīhi ussāhitadārakādīnaṃ
tika-s0105t0:473_7: viya ñāṇavippayuttaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ gahitaṃ, dutiyena pana ñāṇasampayuttaṃ. Tadubhayameva
tika-s0105t0:473_9: vuccatī”ti āha. Diṭṭhi eva attano paccayehi ujuṃ karīyatīti hi atthena sammādiṭṭhiyā
tika-s0105t0:473_10: diṭṭhijukammabhāvo, diṭṭhi ujuṃ karīyati etenāti atthena pana saddhāyapi. Saddhāsammādiṭṭhiggahaṇena
tika-s0105t0:473_11: cettha tappadhānassāpi cittuppādassa gahaṇaṃ, diṭṭhijukammapadena ca yathāvuttena
tika-s0105t0:473_12: karaṇasādhanena, evañca katvā “tapparāyaṇatākārappavatto cittuppādo”ti heṭṭhā vuttavacanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:473_13: samatthitaṃ hoti, saddhāsammādiṭṭhīnaṃ pana visuṃ gahaṇaṃ taṃsampayuttacittuppādassa
tika-s0105t0:474_0: Tayidanti lokiyaṃ saraṇagamanameva paccāmasati lokuttarassa tathā bhedābhāvato. Tassa
tika-s0105t0:474_1: hi maggakkhaṇeyeva vuttanayena ijjhanato tathāvidhassa samādānassa avijjamānattā
tika-s0105t0:474_2: esa bhedo na sambhavatīti. Attā sanniyyātīyati appīyati pariccajīyati etenāti attasanniyyātanaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:474_3: yathāvuttaṃ saraṇagamanasaṅkhātaṃ diṭṭhijukammaṃ. Taṃ ratanattayaṃ parāyaṇaṃ paṭisaraṇametassāti
tika-s0105t0:474_4: tapparāyaṇo, puggalo, cittuppādo vā, tassa bhāvo tapparāyaṇatā, tadeva diṭṭhijukammaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:474_6: upagacchati etenāti sissabhāvūpagamanaṃ. Saraṇagamanādhippāyeneva paṇipatati etenāti
tika-s0105t0:475_0: Saṃsāradukkhanittharaṇatthaṃ attano attabhāvassa pariccajanaṃ attapariccajanaṃ. Tapparāyaṇatādīsupi
tika-s0105t0:475_1: eseva nayo. Hitopadesakathāpariyāyena dhammassāpi ācariyabhāvo samudācarīyati “phalo
tika-s0105t0:475_2: ambo aphalo ca, te satthāro ubho mamā”tiādīsu viyāti āha “dhammassa antevāsiko”ti.
tika-s0105t0:475_4: sīhagatikavasena adhikāro veditabbo. Evañhi tadaññanivattanaṃ kataṃ hotīti. “Imesañhī”tiādi
tika-s0105t0:476_0: Evaṃ attasanniyyātanādīni ekena pakārena dassetvā idāni aparehipi pakārehi dassetuṃ
tika-s0105t0:476_2: attasanniyyātanatapparāyaṇatādi katameva hoti atthassa abhinnattā yathā taṃ “sikkhāpaccakkhānaabhūtārocanānī”ti
tika-s0105t0:476_3: dasseti. Jīvitapariyantikanti bhāvanapuṃsakavacanaṃ, yāvajīvaṃ gacchāmīti attho.
tika-s0105t0:476_4: Mahākassapo kira sayameva pabbajitavesaṃ gahetvā mahātitthabrāhmaṇagāmato nikkhamitvā
tika-s0105t0:476_5: gacchanto tigāvutamaggaṃ paccuggamanaṃ katvā antarā ca rājagahaṃ, antarā ca nāḷandaṃ
tika-s0105t0:476_6: bahuputtakanigrodharukkhamūle ekakameva nisinnaṃ bhagavantaṃ passitvā “ayaṃ bhagavā
tika-s0105t0:476_7: arahaṃ sammāsambuddho”ti ajānantoyeva “satthārañca vatāhaṃ passeyyaṃ, bhagavantameva
tika-s0105t0:476_8: passeyya”ntiādinā saraṇagamanamakāsi. Tena vuttaṃ “mahākassapassa saraṇagamanaṃ viyā”ti.
tika-s0105t0:476_9: Vitthāro kassapasaṃyuttaṭṭhakathāyaṃ gahetabbo. Tattha satthārañcavatāhaṃ passeyyaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:476_10: bhagavantameva passeyyanti sace ahaṃ satthāraṃ passeyyaṃ, imaṃ bhagavantaṃyeva passeyyaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:476_11: Na hi me ito aññena satthārā bhavituṃ sakkā. Sugatañca vatāhaṃ passeyyaṃ, bhagavantameva
tika-s0105t0:476_12: passeyyanti sace ahaṃ sammāpaṭipattiyā suṭṭhu gatattā sugataṃ nāma passeyyaṃ, imaṃ
tika-s0105t0:476_13: bhagavantaṃyeva passeyyaṃ. Na hi me ito aññena sugatena bhavituṃ sakkā. Sammāsambuddhañca
tika-s0105t0:476_14: vatāhaṃ passeyyaṃ, bhagavantameva passeyyanti sace ahaṃ sammā sāmañca saccāni buddhattā
tika-s0105t0:476_15: sammāsambuddhaṃ nāma passeyyaṃ, imaṃ bhagavantaṃyeva passeyyaṃ, na hi me ito aññena
tika-s0105t0:476_16: sammāsambuddhena bhavituṃ sakkāti ayamettha aṭṭhakathā. Sabbattha ca-saddo, vata-saddo
tika-s0105t0:476_17: ca padapūraṇamattaṃ, ce-saddena vā bhavitabbaṃ “sace”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā. Vata-saddo
tika-s0105t0:477_0: “So aha”ntiādi suttanipāte āḷavakasutte. Tattha kiñcāpi maggeneva tassa saraṇagamanamāgataṃ,
tika-s0105t0:477_1: sotāpannabhāvadassanatthaṃ, pana pasādānurūpadassanatthañca evaṃ vācaṃ bhindatīti
tika-s0105t0:477_2: tadaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Gāmā gāmanti aññasmā devagāmā aññaṃ devagāmaṃ, devatānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:477_3: vā khuddakaṃ, mahantañca gāmantipi attho. Purā puranti etthāpi eseva nayo. Dhammassa
tika-s0105t0:477_4: ca sudhammatanti buddhassa subuddhataṃ, dhammassa sudhammataṃ, saṅghassa suppaṭipannatañca
tika-s0105t0:477_5: abhitthavitvāti saha samuccayena, pāṭhasesena ca attho, sambuddhaṃ namassamāno dhammaghosako
tika-s0105t0:478_0: Āḷavakādīnanti ādi-saddena sātāgirahemavatādīnampi saṅgaho. Nanu ca ete āḷavakādayo
tika-s0105t0:478_1: adhigatamaggattā maggeneva āgatasaraṇagamanā, kasmā tesaṃ tapparāyaṇatāsaraṇagamanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:478_3: ahaṃ vicarissāmi…pe… sudhammataṃ, te mayaṃ vicarissāma, gāmā gāmaṃ nagā nagaṃ…pe…
tika-s0105t0:478_4: sudhammata”nti ca hi etehi tapparāyaṇatākāro pavedito. Tasmā saraṇagamanavisesamanapekkhitvā
tika-s0105t0:478_5: pavedanākāramattaṃ upadisantena evaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Athāti “kathaṃ kho brāhmaṇo
tika-s0105t0:478_6: hotī”tiādinā puṭṭhassa aṭṭhavidhapañhassa “pubbenivāsaṃ yo vedī”tiādinā byākaraṇapariyosānakāle.
tika-s0105t0:478_7: Idañhi majjhimapaṇṇāsake brahmāyusutte paricumbatīti pariphusati. Parisambāhatīti
tika-s0105t0:478_8: parimajjati. Evampi paṇipāto daṭṭhabboti evampi paramanipaccakārena paṇipāto daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0105t0:479_0: So panesāti paṇipāto. Ñāti…pe… vasenāti ettha ñātivasena, bhayavasena, ācariyavasena,
tika-s0105t0:479_1: dakkhiṇeyyavasenāti paccekaṃ yojetabbaṃ dvandaparato suyyamānattā. Tattha ñātivasenāti
tika-s0105t0:479_2: ñātibhāvavasena. Bhāvappadhānaniddeso hi ayaṃ, bhāvalopaniddeso vā tabbhāvasseva
tika-s0105t0:479_3: adhippetattā. Evaṃ sesesupi paṇipātapadena cetesaṃ sambandho tabbasena paṇipātassa
tika-s0105t0:479_6: samatthanaṃ. Idāni “na itarehī”tiādinā vuttameva atthattayaṃ yathākkamaṃ vitthārato
tika-s0105t0:479_8: vā”ti pana mātupakkhato. Vandatīti paṇipātassa upalakkhaṇavacanaṃ. Rājapūjitoti rājūhi,
tika-s0105t0:479_9: rājūnaṃ vā pūjito yathā “gāmapūjito”ti. Pūjāvacanapayoge hi kattari sāmivacanamicchanti
tika-s0105t0:479_10: saddavidū. Bhagavatoti bodhisattabhūtassa, buddhabhūtassa vā bhagavato. Uggahitanti sikkhitasippaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:480_1: cettha bhummatthe upayogavacanaṃ. Kammaṃ payojayeti kasivāṇijjādikammaṃ payojeyya.
tika-s0105t0:480_2: Kulānañhi na sabbakālaṃ ekasadisaṃ vattati, kadāci rājādivasena āpadāpi uppajjati,
tika-s0105t0:480_3: tasmā “āpadāsu uppannāsu bhavissatī”ti evaṃ manasi katvā nidhāpeyyāti āha “āpadāsu
tika-s0105t0:480_4: bhavissatī”ti. Imesu pana catūsu koṭṭhāsesu “ekena bhoge bhuñjeyyā”ti vuttakoṭṭhāsatoyeva
tika-s0105t0:480_5: gahetvā bhikkhūnampi kapaṇaddhikādīnampi dānaṃ dātabbaṃ, pesakāranhāpitakādīnampi
tika-s0105t0:480_6: vetanaṃ dātabbanti ayaṃ bhogapariggahaṇānusāsanī, evarūpaṃ anusāsaniṃ uggahetvāti
tika-s0105t0:480_7: attho. Idañhi diṭṭhadhammikaṃyeva sandhāya vadati, samparāyikaṃ, pana niyyānikaṃ
tika-s0105t0:480_8: vā anusāsaniṃ paccāsisantopi dakkhiṇeyyapaṇipātameva karoti nāmāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Yo
tika-s0105t0:481_0: “Eva”ntiādi pana “seṭṭhavasena ca bhijjatī”ti vuttassa byatirekadassanaṃ. Atthavasā
tika-s0105t0:481_1: liṅgavibhattivipariṇāmoti katvā gahitasaraṇāya upāsikāya vātipi yojetabbaṃ. Evamīdisesu.
tika-s0105t0:481_2: Pabbajitampīti pi-saddo sambhāvanatthoti vuttaṃ “pageva apabbajita”nti. Saraṇagamanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:481_3: na bhijjati seṭṭhavasena avanditattā. Tathāti anukaḍḍhanatthe nipāto “saraṇagamanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:481_4: na bhijjatī”ti. Raṭṭhapūjitattāti raṭṭhe, raṭṭhavāsīnaṃ vā pūjitattā. Tayidaṃ bhayavasena
tika-s0105t0:481_5: vanditabbabhāvasseva samatthanaṃ, na tu abhedassa kāraṇadassanaṃ, tassa pana kāraṇaṃ
tika-s0105t0:481_6: seṭṭhavasena avanditattāti veditabbaṃ. Vuttañhi “seṭṭhavasena ca bhijjatī”ti. Seṭṭhavasenāti
tika-s0105t0:481_7: loke aggadakkhiṇeyyatāya seṭṭhabhāvavasenāti attho. Tenāha “ayaṃ loke aggadakkhiṇeyyoti
tika-s0105t0:481_8: vandatī”ti. Titthiyampi vandato na bhijjati, pageva itaraṃ. Saraṇagamanappabhedoti
tika-s0105t0:481_9: saraṇagamanavibhāgo, tabbibhāgasambandhato cettha sakkā abhedopi sukhena dassetunti
tika-s0105t0:482_0: Ariyamaggo eva lokuttarasaraṇagamananti cattāri sāmaññaphalāni vipākaphalabhāvena
tika-s0105t0:482_1: vuttāni. Sabbadukkhakkhayoti sakalassa vaṭṭadukkhassa anuppādanirodho nibbānaṃ. Ettha
tika-s0105t0:482_2: ca kammasadisaṃ vipākaphalaṃ, tabbiparītaṃ ānisaṃsaphalanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yathā hi
tika-s0105t0:482_3: sālibījādīnaṃ phalāni taṃsadisāni vipakkāni nāma honti, vipākaniruttiñca labhanti,
tika-s0105t0:482_4: na mūlaṅkurapattakkhandhanāḷāni, evaṃ kusalākusalānaṃ phalāni arūpadhammabhāvena,
tika-s0105t0:482_5: sārammaṇabhāvena ca sadisāni vipakkāni nāma honti, vipākaniruttiñca labhanti, na
tika-s0105t0:482_6: tadaññāni kammanibbattānipi kammaasadisāni, tāni pana ānisaṃsāni nāma honti, ānisaṃsaniruttimattañca
tika-s0105t0:483_0: Yo cāti ettha ca-saddo byatireke, yo panāti attho. Tatrāyamadhippāyo – byatirekatthadīpane
tika-s0105t0:483_1: yadi “bahuṃ ve saraṇaṃ yanti, pabbatāni vanāni cā”tiādinā vuttaṃ khemaṃ saraṇaṃ na
tika-s0105t0:483_2: hoti, na uttamaṃ saraṇaṃ, etañca saraṇamāgamma sabbadukkhā na pamuccati, evaṃ sati
tika-s0105t0:483_3: kiṃ nāma vatthu khemaṃ saraṇaṃ hoti, uttamaṃ saraṇaṃ, kiṃ nāma vatthuṃ saraṇamāgamma
tika-s0105t0:484: Yo ca buddhañca dhammañca, saṅghañca saraṇaṃ gato…pe…
tika-s0105t0:485: Etaṃ kho saraṇaṃ khemaṃ, etaṃ saraṇamuttamaṃ;
tika-s0105t0:487_0: Evamīdisesu. Lokiyassa saraṇagamanassa aññatitthiyāvandanādinā kuppanato, calanato
tika-s0105t0:487_1: ca akuppaṃ acalaṃ lokuttarameva saraṇagamanaṃ pakāsetuṃ “cattāri ariyasaccāni, sammappaññāya
tika-s0105t0:487_3: “cattāri ariyasaccānī”ti vuttassa sarūpadassanaṃ. Dukkhassa ca atikkamanti dukkhanirodhaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:487_5: lokuttarasaraṇagamanasaṅkhātaṃ ariyasaccadassanaṃ. Kho-saddo avadhāraṇattho padattayepi yojetabbo.
tika-s0105t0:488_0: Niccato anupagamanādivasenāti “nicca”nti aggahaṇādivasena, itinā niddisitabbehi to-saddamicchanti
tika-s0105t0:488_1: saddavidū. “Vuttañheta”ntiādinā ñāṇavibhaṅgādīsu āgataṃ pāḷiṃ sādhakabhāvena āharati.
tika-s0105t0:488_2: Aṭṭhānanti janakahetupaṭikkhepo. Anavakāsoti paccayahetupaṭikkhepo. Ubhayenāpi kāraṇameva
tika-s0105t0:488_3: paṭikkhipati. Yanti yena kāraṇena. Diṭṭhisampannoti maggadiṭṭhiyā sampanno sotāpanno.
tika-s0105t0:488_4: Kañci saṅkhāranti catubhūmakesu saṅkhatasaṅkhāresu ekampi saṅkhāraṃ. Niccato upagaccheyyāti
tika-s0105t0:488_5: “nicco”ti gaṇheyya. Sukhato upagaccheyyāti “ekantasukhī attā hoti arogo paraṃ maraṇā”ti
tika-s0105t0:488_6: evaṃ attadiṭṭhivasena “sukho”ti gaṇheyya, diṭṭhivippayuttacittena pana ariyasāvako
tika-s0105t0:488_7: pariḷāhavūpasamatthaṃ mattahatthiparittāsito cokkhabrāhmaṇo viya ukkārabhūmiṃ kañci
tika-s0105t0:491_0: Imesu pana tīsupi vāresu ariyasāvakassa catubhūmakavaseneva paricchedo veditabbo,
tika-s0105t0:491_1: tebhūmakavaseneva vā. Yaṃ yañhi puthujjano “niccaṃ sukhaṃ attā”ti gāhaṃ gaṇhāti,
tika-s0105t0:491_2: taṃ taṃ ariyasāvako “aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā”ti gaṇhanto gāhaṃ viniveṭheti.
tika-s0105t0:492_0: “Mātara”ntiādīsu janikā mātā, janako pitā, manussabhūto khīṇāsavo arahāti adhippeto.
tika-s0105t0:492_1: Kiṃ pana ariyasāvako tehi aññampi pāṇaṃ jīvitā voropeyyāti? Etampi aṭṭhānameva. Cakkavattirajjasakajīvitahetupi
tika-s0105t0:492_2: hi so taṃ jīvitā na voropeyya, tathāpi puthujjanabhāvassa mahāsāvajjatādassanatthaṃ
tika-s0105t0:492_3: ariyabhāvassa ca balavatāpakāsanatthaṃ evaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Paduṭṭhacittoti
tika-s0105t0:492_4: vadhakacittena padūsanacitto, padūsitacitto vā. Lohitaṃ uppādeyyāti jīvamānakasarīre
tika-s0105t0:492_5: khuddakamakkhikāya pivanamattampi lohitaṃ uppādeyya. Saṅghaṃ bhindeyyāti samānasaṃvāsakaṃ
tika-s0105t0:492_6: samānasīmāyaṃ ṭhitaṃ saṅghaṃ pañcahi kāraṇehi bhindeyya, vuttañhetaṃ “pañcahupāli
tika-s0105t0:492_7: ākārehi saṅgho bhijjati kammena, uddesena, voharanto, anussāvanena, salākaggāhenā”ti
tika-s0105t0:492_8: aññaṃ satthāranti ito aññaṃ titthakaraṃ “ayaṃ me satthā”ti evaṃ gaṇheyya, netaṃ ṭhānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:492_9: vijjatīti attho. Bhavasampadāti sugatibhavena sampadā, idaṃ vipākaphalaṃ. Bhogasampadāti
tika-s0105t0:492_10: manussabhogadevabhogehi sampadā, idaṃ pana ānisaṃsaphalaṃ. “Vuttañheta”ntiādinā devatāsaṃyuttādipāḷiṃ
tika-s0105t0:493_0: Gatā seti ettha se-iti nipātamattaṃ. Na te gamissanti apāyabhūminti te buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ
tika-s0105t0:493_1: gatā tannimittaṃ apāyaṃ na gamissanti. Mānusanti ca gāthābandhavasena visaññoganiddeso,
tika-s0105t0:493_2: manussesu jātanti attho. Devakāyanti devasaṅghaṃ, devapuraṃ vā “devānaṃ kāyo samūho etthā”ti katvā.
tika-s0105t0:494_0: “Aparampī”tiādinā saḷāyatanavagge moggallānasaṃyutte āgataṃ aññampi phalamāha, aparampi
tika-s0105t0:494_1: phalaṃ mahāmoggallānattherena vuttanti attho. Aññe deveti asaraṇaṅgate deve. Dasahi
tika-s0105t0:494_2: ṭhānehīti dasahi kāraṇehi. “Dibbenā”tiādi tassarūpadassanaṃ. Adhigaṇhantīti abhibhavanti
tika-s0105t0:494_3: atikkamitvā tiṭṭhanti. “Esa nayo”ti iminā “sādhu kho devānaminda dhammasaraṇagamanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:494_4: hotī”ti suttapadaṃ atidisati. Velāmasuttaṃ nāma aṅguttaranikāye navanipāte jātigottarūpabhogasaddhāpaññādīhi
tika-s0105t0:494_5: mariyādavelātikkantehi uḷārehi guṇehi samannāgatattā velāmanāmakassa bodhisattabhūtassa
tika-s0105t0:494_9: hatthisahassānaṃ caturāsītiyā assasahassānaṃ, caturāsītiyā rathasahassānaṃ, caturāsītiyā
tika-s0105t0:494_10: dhenusahassānaṃ, caturāsītiyā kaññāsahassānaṃ, caturāsītiyā pallaṅkasahassānaṃ, caturāsītiyā
tika-s0105t0:494_11: vatthakoṭisahassānaṃ, aparimāṇassa ca khajjabhojjādibhedassa āhārassa pariccajanavasena
tika-s0105t0:494_12: sattamāsādhikāni sattasaṃvaccharāni nirantaraṃ pavattavelāmamahādānato ekassa sotāpannassa
tika-s0105t0:494_13: dinnadānaṃ mahapphalataraṃ, tato sataṃsotāpannānaṃ dinnadānato ekassa sakadāgāmino,
tika-s0105t0:494_14: tato ekassa anāgāmino, tato ekassa arahato, tato ekassa paccekabuddhassa, tato sammāsambuddhassa,
tika-s0105t0:494_15: tato buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa dinnadānaṃ mahapphalataraṃ, tato cātuddisaṃ saṅghaṃ
tika-s0105t0:494_16: uddissa vihārakaraṇaṃ, tato saraṇagamanaṃ mahapphalataranti ayamattho pakāsito. Vuttañhetaṃ –
tika-s0105t0:495_0: “Yaṃ gahapati velāmo brāhmaṇo dānaṃ adāsi mahādānaṃ, yo cekaṃ diṭṭhisampannaṃ bhojeyya,
tika-s0105t0:495_1: idaṃ tato mahapphalataraṃ, yo ca sataṃ diṭṭhisampannānaṃ bhojeyya, yo cekaṃ sakadāgāmiṃ
tika-s0105t0:496_0: Iminā ca ukkaṭṭhaparicchedato lokuttarasseva saraṇagamanassa phalaṃ dassitanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:496_1: Tathā hi velāmasuttaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ “saraṇaṃ gaccheyyāti ettha maggenāgataṃ anivattanasaraṇaṃ
tika-s0105t0:496_2: adhippetaṃ, apare panāhu ‘attānaṃ niyyātetvā dinnattā saraṇagamanaṃ tato mahapphalatara’nti
tika-s0105t0:496_3: vutta”nti kūṭadantasuttaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana vakkhati “yasmā ca saraṇagamanaṃ nāma tiṇṇaṃ
tika-s0105t0:496_4: ratanānaṃ jīvitapariccāgamayaṃ puññakammaṃ saggasampattiṃ deti, tasmā mahapphalatarañca
tika-s0105t0:496_5: mahānisaṃsatarañcāti veditabba”nti iminā pana nayena lokiyassāpi saraṇagamanassa
tika-s0105t0:496_6: phalaṃ idha dassitamevāti gahetabbaṃ. Ācariyadhammapālattherenapi hi ayamevattho
tika-s0105t0:496_7: icchitoti viññāyati idha ceva aññāsu ca majjhimāgamaṭīkādīsu avisesatoyeva vuttattā,
tika-s0105t0:496_8: ācariyasāriputtattherenāpi ayamattho abhimato siyā sāratthadīpaniyaṃ, aṅguttaraṭīkāyañca
tika-s0105t0:496_10: saraṇagamanassa phalaṃ vutta”nti, tadayuttameva tathā avuttattā. “Yasmā…pe… detī”ti
tika-s0105t0:496_11: hi tadubhayasādhāraṇakāraṇavasena tadubhayassāpi phalaṃ tattha vuttanti. Velāmasuttādīnanti
tika-s0105t0:497_0: Aññāṇaṃ nāma vatthuttayassa guṇānamajānanaṃ tattha sammoho. Saṃsayo nāma “buddho
tika-s0105t0:497_1: nu kho, na nu kho”tiādinā vicikicchā. Micchāñāṇaṃ nāma vatthuttayassa guṇānaṃ aguṇabhāvaparikappanena
tika-s0105t0:497_2: viparītaggāho. Ādisaddena anādarāgāravādīnaṃ saṅgaho. Saṃkilissatīti saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ
tika-s0105t0:497_3: malīnaṃ bhavati. Na mahājutikantiādipi saṃkilesapariyāyo eva. Tattha na mahājutikanti
tika-s0105t0:497_4: na mahujjalaṃ, aparisuddhaṃ apariyodātanti attho. Na mahāvipphāranti na mahānubhāvaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:497_5: apaṇītaṃ anuḷāranti attho. Sāvajjoti taṇhādiṭṭhādivasena sadoso. Tadeva phalavasena
tika-s0105t0:497_6: vibhāvetuṃ “aniṭṭhaphalo”ti vuttaṃ, sāvajjattā akantiphalo hotīti attho. Lokiyasaraṇagamanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:497_7: sikkhāsamādānaṃ viya agahitakālaparicchedaṃ jīvitapariyantameva hoti, tasmā tassa
tika-s0105t0:497_8: khandhabhedena bhedo, so ca taṇhādiṭṭhādivirahitattā adosoti āha “anavajjo kālakiriyāya
tika-s0105t0:497_9: hotī”ti. Soti anavajjo saraṇagamanabhedo. Satipi anavajjatte iṭṭhaphalopi na hoti,
tika-s0105t0:497_10: pageva aniṭṭhaphalo avipākattā. Na hi taṃ akusalaṃ hoti, atha kho bhedanamattanti
tika-s0105t0:498_0: Dharasaddassa dvikammikattā “upāsaka”nti idampi kammameva, tañca kho ākāraṭṭhāneti
tika-s0105t0:498_1: atthamattaṃ dassetuṃ “upāsako ayanti evaṃ dhāretū”ti vuttaṃ. Dhāretūti ca upadhāretūti
tika-s0105t0:498_2: attho. Upadhāraṇañcettha jānanamevāti dasseti “jānātū”ti iminā. Upāsakavidhikosallatthanti
tika-s0105t0:498_3: upāsakabhāvavidhānakosallatthaṃ. Ko upāsakoti sarūpapucchā, kiṃ lakkhaṇo upāsako
tika-s0105t0:498_4: nāmāti vuttaṃ hoti. Kasmāti hetupucchā, kena pavattinimittena upāsakasaddo tasmiṃ
tika-s0105t0:498_5: puggale niruḷhoti adhippāyo. Tenāha “kasmā upāsakoti vuccatī”ti. Saddassa hi abhidheyye
tika-s0105t0:498_6: pavattinimittameva tadatthassa tabbhāvakāraṇaṃ. Kimassa sīlanti vatasamādānapucchā,
tika-s0105t0:498_7: kīdisaṃ assa upāsakassa sīlaṃ, kittakena vatasamādānenāyaṃ sīlasampanno nāma hotīti
tika-s0105t0:498_8: attho. Ko ājīvoti kammasamādānapucchā, ko assa sammāājīvo, kena kammasamādānena assa
tika-s0105t0:498_9: ājīvo sambhavatīti pucchati, so pana micchājīvassa parivajjanena hotīti micchājīvopi
tika-s0105t0:498_10: vibhajīyati. Kā vipattīti tadubhayesaṃ vippaṭipattipucchā, kā assa upāsakassa sīlassa,
tika-s0105t0:498_11: ājīvassa ca vipattīti attho. Sāmaññaniddiṭṭhe hi sati anantarasseva vidhi vā paṭisedho
tika-s0105t0:498_12: vāti anantarassa gahaṇaṃ. Kā sampattīti tadubhayesameva sammāpaṭipattipucchā, kā
tika-s0105t0:498_13: assa upāsakassa sīlassa, ājīvassa ca sampattīti vuttanayena attho. Sarūpavacanatthādisaṅkhātena
tika-s0105t0:498_14: pakārena kiratīti pakiṇṇaṃ, tadeva pakiṇṇakaṃ, anekākārena pavattaṃ atthavinicchayanti attho.
tika-s0105t0:499_0: Yo kocīti khattiyabrāhmaṇādīsu yo koci, iminā padena akāraṇamettha jātiādivisesoti
tika-s0105t0:499_1: dasseti, “saraṇagato”ti iminā pana saraṇagamanamevettha pamāṇanti. “Gahaṭṭho”ti ca
tika-s0105t0:499_2: iminā āgārikesveva upāsakasaddo niruḷho, na pabbajjūpagatesūti. Tamatthaṃ mahāvaggasaṃyutte
tika-s0105t0:499_4: Mahānāmāti attano cūḷapituno sukkodanassa puttaṃ mahānāmaṃ nāma sakyarājānaṃ bhagavā
tika-s0105t0:499_5: ālapati. Ettāvatāti ettakena buddhādisaraṇagamanena upāsako nāma hoti, na jātiādīhi
tika-s0105t0:499_6: kāraṇehīti adhippāyo. Kāmañca tapussabhallikānaṃ viya dvevācikaupāsakabhāvopi atthi,
tika-s0105t0:499_7: so pana tadā vatthuttayābhāvato kadāciyeva hotīti sabbadā pavattaṃ tevācikaupāsakabhāvaṃ
tika-s0105t0:499_8: dassetuṃ “saraṇagato”ti vuttaṃ. Tepi hi pacchā tisaraṇagatā eva, na cettha sambhavati
tika-s0105t0:499_9: aññaṃ paṭikkhipitvā ekaṃ vā dve vā saraṇagato upāsako nāmāti imamatthampi ñāpetuṃ
tika-s0105t0:500: Upāsanatoti teneva saraṇagamanena, tattha ca sakkaccakāritāya gāravabahumānādiyogena payirupāsanato, iminā katvatthaṃ dasseti. Tenāha “so hī”tiādi.
tika-s0105t0:501_0: Veramaṇiyoti ettha veraṃ vuccati pāṇātipātādidussīlyaṃ, tassa maṇanato hananato vināsanato
tika-s0105t0:501_1: veramaṇiyo nāma, pañca viratiyo viratipadhānattā tassa sīlassa. Tathā hi udāhaṭe
tika-s0105t0:501_3: sarūpañca dasseti yathā taṃ uyyānapālassa ekeneva udakapatiṭṭhānapayogena ambasecanaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:504: Iti so pītiyā kāyaṃ, sabbaṃ pharati attano”ti.
tika-s0105t0:505: [“Ambo ca siñcato āsi, samaṇo ca nahāpito;
tika-s0105t0:506: Bahuñca puññaṃ pasutaṃ, aho saphalaṃ jīvita”nti. (idha ṭīkāyaṃ mūlapāṭho)]
tika-s0105t0:508_0: Micchāvaṇijjāti ayuttavaṇijjā, na sammāvaṇijjā, asāruppavaṇijjakammānīti attho. Pahāyāti
tika-s0105t0:508_1: akaraṇeneva pajahitvā. Dhammenāti dhammato anapetena, tena micchāvaṇijjakammena ājīvanato
tika-s0105t0:508_2: aññampi adhammikaṃ ājīvanaṃ paṭikkhipati. Samenāti avisamena, tena kāyavisamādiduccaritaṃ
tika-s0105t0:508_3: vajjetvā kāyasamādinā sucaritena ājīvanaṃ dasseti. “Vuttañheta”ntiādinā pañcaṅguttarapāḷimāharitvā
tika-s0105t0:508_4: sādhakaṃ, sarūpañca dasseti. Vāṇijānaṃ ayanti vaṇijjā, yassa kassaci vikkayo, itthiliṅgapadametaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:508_5: Satthavaṇijjāti āvudhabhaṇḍaṃ katvā vā kāretvā vā yathākataṃ paṭilabhitvā vā tassa
tika-s0105t0:508_6: vikkayo. Sattavaṇijjāti manussavikkayo. Maṃsavaṇijjāti sūnakārādayo viya migasūkarādike
tika-s0105t0:508_7: posetvā maṃsaṃ sampādetvā vikkayo. Majjavaṇijjāti yaṃ kiñci majjaṃ yojetvā tassa
tika-s0105t0:508_8: vikkayo. Visavaṇijjāti visaṃ yojetvā, saṅgahetvā vā tassa vikkayo. Tattha satthavaṇijjā
tika-s0105t0:508_9: paroparodhanimittatāya akaraṇīyāti vuttā, sattavaṇijjā abhujissabhāvakaraṇato, maṃsavaṇijjā
tika-s0105t0:509_0: Tassevāti yathāvuttassa pañcaveramaṇilakkhaṇassa sīlassa ceva pañcamicchāvaṇijjādippahānalakkhaṇassa
tika-s0105t0:509_1: ājīvassa ca paṭiniddeso. Vipattīti bhedo, pakopo ca. Evaṃ sīlaājīvavipattivasena
tika-s0105t0:509_2: upāsakassa vipattiṃ dassetvā assaddhiyādivasenapi dassento “apicā”tiādimāha. Yāyāti
tika-s0105t0:509_4: malīnaṭṭhena upāsakamalaṃ. Patikiṭṭhoti lāmakaṭṭhena upāsakanihīno. Sāpissāti sāpi
tika-s0105t0:509_5: assaddhiyādivippaṭipatti assa upāsakassa vipattīti veditabbā. Kā panāyanti vuttaṃ
tika-s0105t0:509_6: “te cā”tiādi. Upāsakacaṇḍālasuttaṃ, upāsakaratanasuttañca pañcaṅguttare. Tattha buddhādīsu,
tika-s0105t0:509_7: kammakammaphalesu ca saddhāvipariyāyo micchāvimokkho assaddhiyaṃ, tena samannāgato
tika-s0105t0:509_9: nāma maṅgalaṃ hotī”ti evaṃ bālajanaparikappitena kotūhalasaṅkhātena diṭṭhasutamutamaṅgalena
tika-s0105t0:509_10: samannāgato kotūhalamaṅgaliko. Maṅgalaṃ paccetīti diṭṭhamaṅgalādibhedaṃ maṅgalameva
tika-s0105t0:509_11: pattiyāyati no kammanti kammassakataṃ no pattiyāyati. Ito ca bahiddhāti ito sabbaññubuddhasāsanato
tika-s0105t0:509_12: bahiddhā bāhirakasamaye. Ca-saddo aṭṭhānapayutto, sabbattha “assaddho”tiādīsu yojetabbo.
tika-s0105t0:509_13: Dakkhiṇeyyaṃ pariyesatīti duppaṭipannaṃ dakkhiṇārahasaññī gavesati. Tatthāti bahiddhā
tika-s0105t0:509_14: bāhirakasamaye. Pubbakāraṃ karotīti paṭhamataraṃ dānamānanādikaṃ kusalakiriyaṃ karoti,
tika-s0105t0:509_15: bāhirakasamaye paṭhamataraṃ kusalakiriyaṃ katvā pacchā sāsane karotīti vuttaṃ hotīti.
tika-s0105t0:509_16: Tatthāti vā tesaṃ bāhirakānaṃ titthiyānantipi vadanti. Ettha ca dakkhiṇeyyapariyesanapubbakāre
tika-s0105t0:510_0: Assāti upāsakassa. Sīlasampadāti yathāvuttena pañcaveramaṇilakkhaṇena sīlena sampadā.
tika-s0105t0:510_1: Ājīvasampadāti pañcamicchāvaṇijjādippahānalakkhaṇena ājīvena sampadā. Evaṃ sīlasampadāājīvasampadāvasena
tika-s0105t0:510_2: upāsakassa sampattiṃ dassetvā saddhādivasenapi dassento “ye cassā”tiādimāha. Ye ca
tika-s0105t0:510_3: pañca dhammā, tepi assa sampattīti yojanā. Dhammehīti guṇehi. Catunnaṃ parisānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:510_5: upāsakova padumaṃ upāsakapadumaṃ. Tathā upāsakapuṇḍarīkaṃ. Sesaṃ vipattiyaṃ vuttavipariyāyena veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:511_0: Nigaṇṭhīnanti nigaṇṭhasamaṇīnaṃ. Ādimhīti paṭhamatthe. Ucchagganti ucchuaggaṃ ucchukoṭi.
tika-s0105t0:511_1: Tathā veḷagganti etthāpi. Koṭiyanti pariyantakoṭiyaṃ, pariyantattheti attho. Ambilagganti
tika-s0105t0:511_2: ambilakoṭṭhāsaṃ. Tathā tittakagganti etthāpi. Vihāraggenāti ovarakakoṭṭhāsena “imasmiṃ
tika-s0105t0:511_3: gabbhe vasantānaṃ idaṃ nāma phalaṃ pāpuṇātī”tiādinā taṃtaṃvasanaṭṭhānakoṭṭhāsenāti
tika-s0105t0:511_4: attho. Pariveṇaggenāti etthāpi eseva nayo. Aggeti ettha upayogavacanassa ekārādeso,
tika-s0105t0:511_5: vacanavipallāso vā, katvā-saddo ca sesoti vuttaṃ “ādiṃ katvā”ti. Bhāvatthe tā-saddoti
tika-s0105t0:511_6: dasseti “ajjabhāva”nti iminā, ajjabhāvo ca nāma tasmiṃ dhammassavanasamaye dharamānakatāpāpuṇakabhāvo.
tika-s0105t0:511_7: Tadā hi taṃ nissayavasena dharamānataṃ nimittaṃ katvā taṃdivasanissitaaruṇuggamanato
tika-s0105t0:511_8: paṭṭhāya yāva puna aruṇuggamanā etthantare ajjasaddo pavattati, tasmā tasmiṃ samaye
tika-s0105t0:511_9: dharamānakatāsaṅkhātaṃ ajjabhāvaṃ ādiṃ katvāti attho daṭṭhabbo. Ajjatanti vā ajjaicceva
tika-s0105t0:511_10: attho tā-saddassa sakatthavuttito yathā “devatā”ti, ayaṃ ācariyānaṃ mati. Evaṃ paṭhamakkharena
tika-s0105t0:511_11: dissamānapāṭhānurūpaṃ atthaṃ dassetvā idāni tatiyakkharena dissamānapāṭhānurūpaṃ
tika-s0105t0:511_12: atthaṃ dassetuṃ “ajjadaggeti vā pāṭho”tiādi vuttaṃ. Āgamamattattā dakāro padasandhikaro.
tika-s0105t0:511_13: Ajjāti hi nepātikamidaṃ padaṃ. Tenāha “ajja agganti attho”ti.
tika-s0105t0:512_0: “Pāṇo”ti idaṃ paramatthato jīvitindriye eva, “pāṇupeta”nti ca karaṇattheneva samāsoti
tika-s0105t0:512_1: ñāpetuṃ “yāva me jīvitaṃ pavattati, tāva upeta”nti āha. Upeti upagacchatīti hi upeto,
tika-s0105t0:512_2: pāṇehi karaṇabhūtehi upeto pāṇupetoti attho ācariyehi abhimato. Iminā ca “pāṇupetanti
tika-s0105t0:512_3: idaṃ padaṃ tassa saraṇagamanassa āpāṇakoṭikatādassana”nti imamatthaṃ vibhāveti. “Pāṇupeta”nti
tika-s0105t0:512_4: hi iminā yāva me pāṇā dharanti, tāva saraṇaṃ upeto, upento ca na vācāmattena, na
tika-s0105t0:512_5: ca ekavāraṃ cittuppādamattena, atha kho pāṇānaṃ pariccajanavasena yāvajīvaṃ upetoti
tika-s0105t0:512_6: āpāṇakoṭikatā dassitā. “Tīhi…pe… gata”nti idaṃ “saraṇaṃ gata”nti etassa atthavacanaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:512_7: “Anaññasatthuka”nti idaṃ pana antogadhāvadhāraṇena, aññatthāpohanena ca nivattetabbatthadassanaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:512_8: Ekacco kappiyakārakasaddassa attho upāsakasaddassa vacanīyopi bhavatīti vuttaṃ “upāsakaṃ
tika-s0105t0:512_9: kappiyakāraka”nti, attasanniyyātanasaraṇagamanaṃ vā sandhāya evaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:512_10: Evaṃ “pāṇupeta”nti iminā nītatthato dassitaṃ tassa saraṇagamanassa āpāṇakoṭikataṃ
tika-s0105t0:512_11: dassetvā evaṃ vadanto panesa rājā “jīvitena saha vatthuttayaṃ paṭipūjento saraṇagamanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:512_12: rakkhāmī”ti adhippāyaṃ vibhāvetīti neyyatthato vibhāvitaṃ tassa rañño adhippāyaṃ
tika-s0105t0:512_13: vibhāvento “ahañhī”tiādimāha. Tattha hi-saddo samatthane, kāraṇatthe vā, tena imāya
tika-s0105t0:512_14: yuttiyā, iminā vā kāraṇena upāsakaṃ maṃ bhagavā dhāretūti ayamattho pakāsito.
tika-s0105t0:513_0: Accayanaṃ sādhumariyādaṃ atikkamma madditvā pavattanaṃ accayo, kāyikādiajjhācārasaṅkhāto
tika-s0105t0:513_1: dosoti āha “aparādho”ti, acceti abhibhavitvā pavattati etenāti vā accayo, kāyikādivītikkamassa
tika-s0105t0:513_2: pavattanako akusaladhammasaṅkhāto doso eva, so ca aparajjhati etenāti aparādhoti
tika-s0105t0:513_3: vuccati. So hi aparajjhantaṃ purisaṃ abhibhavitvā pavattati. Tenāha “atikkamma abhibhavitvā
tika-s0105t0:513_4: pavatto”ti. Dhammanti dasarājadhammaṃ. Vitthāro panetassa mahāhaṃsajātakādīhi vibhāvetabbo.
tika-s0105t0:513_5: Caratīti ācarati karoti. Dhammenevāti dhammato anapeteneva, anapetakusaladhammenevāti
tika-s0105t0:513_6: attho. Tenāha “na pitughātanādinā adhammenā”ti. “Paṭiggaṇhātū”ti etassa adhivāsanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:513_7: sampaṭicchatūti saddato attho, adhippāyato pana atthaṃ dassetuṃ “khamatū”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:514_0: 251. “Yathādhammo ṭhito, tathevā”ti imināpi yathā-saddassa anurūpatthamāha, sādhusamāciṇṇakusaladhammānurūpanti
tika-s0105t0:514_1: attho. Paṭisaddassa anatthakataṃ dasseti “karosī”ti iminā. Paṭikammaṃ karosītipi
tika-s0105t0:514_2: vadanti. Yathādhammaṃ paṭikaraṇaṃ nāma katāparādhassa khamāpanamevāti āha “khamāpesīti
tika-s0105t0:514_3: vuttaṃ hotī”ti. “Paṭiggaṇhāmā”ti etassa adhivāsanaṃ sampaṭicchāmāti atthaṃ dasseti
tika-s0105t0:514_4: “khamāmā”ti iminā. Vuddhi hesāti ettha ha-kāro padasiliṭṭhatāya āgamo, hi-saddo vā
tika-s0105t0:514_5: nipātamattaṃ. Esāti yathādhammaṃ paṭikiriyā, āyatiṃ saṃvarāpajjanā ca. Tenāha “yo
tika-s0105t0:514_6: accayaṃ…pe… āpajjatī”ti. Sadevakena lokena “saraṇa”nti araṇīyato upagantabbato tathāgato
tika-s0105t0:514_7: ariyo nāmāti vuttaṃ “buddhassa bhagavato”ti. Vineti satte etenāti vinayo, sāsanaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:514_8: Vaddhati saggamokkhasampatti etāyāti vuddhi. Katamā pana sā, yā “esā”ti niddiṭṭhā
tika-s0105t0:514_9: vuddhīti codanamapanetuṃ “yo accaya”ntiādi vuttanti sambandhaṃ dasseti “katamā”tiādinā,
tika-s0105t0:514_10: yā ayaṃ saṃvarāpajjanā, sā “esā”ti niddiṭṭhā vuddhi nāmāti attho. “Yathādhammaṃ paṭikarotī”ti
tika-s0105t0:514_11: idaṃ āyatiṃ saṃvarāpajjanāya pubbakiriyādassananti viññāpanatthaṃ “yathādhammaṃ paṭikaritvā
tika-s0105t0:514_12: āyatiṃ saṃvarāpajjanā”ti vuttaṃ. Esā hi ācariyānaṃ pakati, yadidaṃ yena kenaci pakārena
tika-s0105t0:514_13: adhippāyantaraviññāpanaṃ, etapadena pana tassāpi paṭiniddeso sambhavati “yathādhammaṃ
tika-s0105t0:514_14: paṭikarotī” tipi paṭiniddisitabbassa dassanato. Keci pana “yathādhammaṃ paṭikarotī’ti
tika-s0105t0:514_15: idaṃ pubbakiriyāmattasseva dassanaṃ, na paṭiniddisitabbassa. ‘Āyatiñca saṃvaraṃ āpajjatī’ti
tika-s0105t0:514_16: idaṃ pana paṭiniddisitabbassevāti viññāpanatthaṃ evaṃ vutta”nti vadanti, tadayuttameva
tika-s0105t0:514_17: khamāpanassāpi vuddhihetubhāvena ariyūpavāde vuttattā. Itarathā hi khamāpanābhāvepi
tika-s0105t0:514_18: āyatiṃ saṃvarāpajjanāya eva ariyūpavādāpagamanaṃ vuttaṃ siyā, na ca pana vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:515_0: Kasmā pana “yāya”ntiādinā dhammaniddeso dassito, nanu pāḷiyaṃ “yo accaya”ntiādinā
tika-s0105t0:515_1: puggalaniddeso katoti codanaṃ sodhetuṃ “desanaṃ panā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Puggalādhiṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:515_2: karontoti puggalādhiṭṭhānadhammadesanaṃ karonto. Puggalādhiṭṭhānāpi hi puggalādhiṭṭhānadhammadesanā,
tika-s0105t0:515_4: hesā”tiādinā dhammādhiṭṭhānadesanā āraddhā, tathāpi puna puggalādhiṭṭhānaṃ karontena
tika-s0105t0:515_6: cāti. Tadubhayavaseneva hi dhammādhiṭṭhānādibhedena catubbidhā desanā.
tika-s0105t0:516_0: 252. Vacasāyatteti vacasā āyatte. Vācāpaṭibandhatteti vadanti, taṃ “so hī”tiādinā
tika-s0105t0:516_1: viruddhaṃ viya dissati. Vacasāyattheti pana vācāpariyosānattheti attho yutto osānakaraṇatthassa
tika-s0105t0:516_2: sāsaddassa vasena sāyasaddanipphattito yathā “dāyo”ti. Evañhi samatthanavacanampi
tika-s0105t0:516_3: upapannaṃ hoti. Gamanāya kataṃ vācāpariyosānaṃ katvā vuttattā tasmiṃyeva atthe vattatīti.
tika-s0105t0:516_4: Handasaddañhi codanatthe, vacasaggatthe ca icchanti. “Handa dāni bhikkhave āmantayāmī”tiādīsu
tika-s0105t0:516_5: hi codanatthe, “handa dāni apāyāmī”tiādīsu vacasaggatthe, vacasaggo ca nāma vācāvissajjanaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:516_6: tañca vācāpariyosānamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Dukkarakiccavasena bahukiccatāti āha “balavakiccā”ti.
tika-s0105t0:516_7: “Avassaṃ kattabbaṃ kiccaṃ, itaraṃ karaṇīyaṃ. Paṭhamaṃ vā kattabbaṃ kiccaṃ, pacchā
tika-s0105t0:516_8: kattabbaṃ karaṇīyaṃ. Khuddakaṃ vā kiccaṃ, mahantaṃ karaṇīya”ntipi udānaṭṭhakathādīsu
tika-s0105t0:516_9: vuttaṃ. Yaṃ-taṃ-saddānaṃ niccasambandhattā, gamanakālajānanato, aññakiriyāya ca anupayuttattā
tika-s0105t0:516_10: “tassa kālaṃ tvameva jānāsī”ti vuttaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti “tayā ñātaṃ gamanakālaṃ tvameva
tika-s0105t0:516_11: ñatvā gacchāhī”ti. Atha vā yathā kattabbakiccaniyojane “imaṃ jāna, imaṃ dehi, imaṃ
tika-s0105t0:516_12: āharā”ti vuttaṃ, tathā idhāpi tayā ñātaṃ kālaṃ tvameva jānāsi, gamanavasena karohīti
tika-s0105t0:516_13: gamane niyojetīti dassetuṃ “tvameva jānāsī”ti pāṭhaseso vuttoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Tikkhattuṃ
tika-s0105t0:516_14: padakkhiṇaṃ katvā”tiādi yathāsamāciṇṇaṃ pakaraṇādhigatamattaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Tattha
tika-s0105t0:516_15: padakkhiṇanti pakārato kataṃ dakkhiṇaṃ. Tenāha “tikkhattu”nti. Dasanakhasamodhānasamujjalanti
tika-s0105t0:516_16: dvīsu hatthesu jātānaṃ dasannaṃ nakhānaṃ samodhānena ekībhāvena samujjalantaṃ, tena
tika-s0105t0:516_17: dvinnaṃ karatalānaṃ samaṭṭhapanaṃ dasseti. Añjalinti hatthapuṭaṃ. Añjati byattiṃ
tika-s0105t0:516_18: pakāseti etāyāti añjali. Añju-saddañhi byattiyaṃ, alipaccayañca icchanti saddavidū.
tika-s0105t0:516_19: Abhimukhovāti sammukho eva, na bhagavato piṭṭhiṃ dassetvāti attho. Pañcappatiṭṭhitavandanānayo vutto eva.
tika-s0105t0:517_0: 253. Imasmiṃyeva attabhāve vipaccanakānaṃ attano pubbe katakusalamūlānaṃ khaṇanena
tika-s0105t0:517_1: khato, tesameva upahananena upahato, padadvayenapi tassa kammāparādhameva dasseti
tika-s0105t0:517_3: dassetuṃ “bhinnapatiṭṭho jāto”ti vuttaṃ. Patiṭṭhā, mūlanti ca atthato ekaṃ. Patiṭṭhahati
tika-s0105t0:517_4: sammattaniyāmokkamanaṃ etāyāti hi patiṭṭhā, tassa kusalūpanissayasampadā, sā kiriyāparādhena
tika-s0105t0:517_5: bhinnā vināsitā etenāti bhinnapatiṭṭho. Tadeva vitthārento “tathā”tiādimāha. Yathā
tika-s0105t0:517_6: kusalamūlasaṅkhātā attano patiṭṭhānajātā, tathā anena raññā attanāva attā khato khanitoti
tika-s0105t0:517_7: yojanā. Khatoti hi idaṃ idha kammavasena siddhaṃ, pāḷiyaṃ pana kattuvasenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:518_0: “Rāgo rajo na ca pana reṇu vuccatī”tiādi vacanato rāgadosamohāva idha rajo nāmāti
tika-s0105t0:518_2: iminā. Dhammesu cakkhunti catusaccadhammesu pavattaṃ tesaṃ dassanaṭṭhena cakkhuṃ.
tika-s0105t0:518_3: Dhammesūti vā heṭṭhimesu tīsu maggadhammesu. Cakkhunti sotāpattimaggasaṅkhātaṃ ekaṃ
tika-s0105t0:518_4: cakkhuṃ, samudāyekadesavasena ādhāratthasamāsoyaṃ, na tu niddhāraṇatthasamāso. So
tika-s0105t0:518_5: hi sāsanaganthesu, sakkataganthesu ca sabbattha paṭisiddhoti. Dhammamayanti samathavipassanādhammena
tika-s0105t0:518_6: nibbattaṃ, iminā “dhammena nibbattaṃ cakkhu dhammacakkhū”ti atthamāha. Apica dhammamayanti
tika-s0105t0:518_8: cakkhu dhammacakkhū”ti atthamāha. Aññesu ṭhānesūti aññesu suttapadesesu, etena yathāpāṭhaṃ
tika-s0105t0:518_9: tividhatthataṃ dasseti. Idha pana sotāpattimaggassevetaṃ adhivacanaṃ, tasmimpi anadhigate
tika-s0105t0:519_1: vuttaṃ hotī”tiādimāha. Tattha nābhavissāti sace na abhavissatha, evaṃ satīti attho.
tika-s0105t0:519_2: Atīte hi idaṃ kālātipattivacanaṃ, na anāgateti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Esa nayo sotāpattimaggaṃ
tika-s0105t0:519_3: patto abhavissāti etthāpi. Nanu ca maggapāpuṇanavacanaṃ bhavissamānattā anāgatakālikanti?
tika-s0105t0:519_4: Saccaṃ aniyamite, idha pana “idhevāsane nisinno”ti niyamitattā atītakālikamevāti
tika-s0105t0:519_5: veditabbaṃ. Idañhi bhagavā rañño āsanā vuṭṭhāya acirapakkantasseva avocāti. Pāpamittasaṃsaggenāti
tika-s0105t0:519_6: devadattena, devadattaparisāsaṅkhātena ca pāpamittena saṃsaggato. Assāti sotāpattimaggassa.
tika-s0105t0:519_7: “Evaṃ santepī”tiādinā pāṭhānāruḷhaṃ vacanāvasesaṃ dasseti. Tasmāti saraṇaṃ gatattā
tika-s0105t0:519_8: muccissatīti sambandho. “Mama ca sāsanamahantatāyā”ti pāṭho yutto, katthaci pana
tika-s0105t0:519_9: ca-saddo na dissati, tattha so luttaniddiṭṭhoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Na kevalaṃ saraṇaṃ gatattāyeva
tika-s0105t0:519_10: muccissati, atha kho yattha esa pasanno, pasannākārañca karoti, tassa ca tividhassapi
tika-s0105t0:519_11: sāsanassa uttamatāyāti hi saha samuccayena attho adhippetoti.
tika-s0105t0:520_0: “Yathā nāmā”tiādi dukkarakammavipākato sukarena muccanena upamādassanaṃ. Kocīti koci
tika-s0105t0:520_1: puriso. Kassacīti kassaci purisassa, “vadha”nti ettha bhāvayoge kammatthe sāmivacanaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:520_3: vadhakammadaṇḍato mucceyya, daṇḍenāti vā nissakkatthe karaṇavacanaṃ “sumuttā mayaṃ
tika-s0105t0:520_4: tena mahāsamaṇenā”tiādīsu viya, pupphamuṭṭhimattena dhanadaṇḍato, vadhadaṇḍato ca
tika-s0105t0:520_5: mucceyyāti attho. Lohakumbhiyanti lohakumbhinarake. Tattha hi tadanubhavanakānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:520_6: sattānaṃ kammabalena lohamayā mahatī kumbhī nibbattā, tasmā taṃ “lohakumbhī”ti vuccati.
tika-s0105t0:520_7: Uparimatalato adho patanto, heṭṭhimatalato uddhaṃ gacchanto, ubhayathā pana saṭṭhivassasahassāni honti. Vuttañca –
tika-s0105t0:523_0: “Heṭṭhimatalaṃ patvā, uparimatalaṃ pāpuṇitvā muccissatī”ti vadanto imamatthaṃ dīpeti
tika-s0105t0:523_1: – yathā aññe seṭṭhiputtādayo aparāparaṃ adho patantā, uddhaṃ gacchantā ca anekāni
tika-s0105t0:523_2: vassasatasahassāni tattha paccanti, na tathā ayaṃ, ayaṃ pana rājā yathāvuttakāraṇena
tika-s0105t0:523_3: ekavārameva adho patanto, uddhañca gacchanto saṭṭhivassasahassāniyeva paccitvā muccissatīti.
tika-s0105t0:523_4: Ayaṃ pana attho kuto laddhoti anuyogaṃ pariharanto “idampi kira bhagavatā vuttamevā”ti
tika-s0105t0:523_5: āha. Kirasaddo cettha anussavanattho, tena bhagavatā vuttabhāvassa ācariyaparamparato
tika-s0105t0:523_6: suyyamānataṃ, imassa ca atthassa ācariyaparamparābhatabhāvaṃ dīpeti. Atha pāḷiyaṃ
tika-s0105t0:523_7: saṅgītaṃ siyāti codanamapaneti “pāḷiyaṃ pana na āruḷha”nti iminā, pakiṇṇakadesanābhāvena
tika-s0105t0:523_8: pāḷiyamanāruḷhattā pāṭhabhāvena na saṅgītanti adhippāyo. Pakiṇṇakadesanā hi pāḷiyamanāruḷhāti
tika-s0105t0:524_0: Yadi anantare attabhāve narake paccati, evaṃ sati imaṃ desanaṃ sutvā ko rañño ānisaṃso
tika-s0105t0:524_1: laddhoti kassaci āsaṅkā siyāti tadāsaṅkānivattanatthaṃ codanaṃ uddharitvā pariharituṃ
tika-s0105t0:524_3: anekavidhaṃ mahānisaṃsaṃ sarūpato niyametvā dasseti. Ettha hi “ayaṃ…pe… niddaṃ labhatī”ti
tika-s0105t0:524_4: iminā niddālābhaṃ dasseti, tadā kāyikacetasikadukkhāpagatabhāvañca niddālābhasīsena,
tika-s0105t0:524_6: nāhosī”ti iminā sātisayaṃ pothujjanikasaddhāpaṭilābhaṃ dassetīti evamādi diṭṭhadhammiko,
tika-s0105t0:524_7: “anāgate…pe… parinibbāyissatī”ti iminā pana ukkaṃsato samparāyiko dassito, anavasesato
tika-s0105t0:524_8: pana aparāparesu bhavesu aparimāṇoyeva samparāyiko veditabbo.
tika-s0105t0:525_0: Tattha madhurāyāti madhurarasabhūtāya. Ojavantiyāti madhurarasassāpi sārabhūtāya
tika-s0105t0:525_1: ojāya ojavatiyā. Puthujjane bhavā pothujjanikā. Pañca māre visesato jitavāti vijitāvī,
tika-s0105t0:525_2: parūpadesavirahatā cettha visesabhāvo. Paccekaṃ abhisambuddhoti paccekabuddho, anācariyako
tika-s0105t0:525_3: hutvā sāmaññeva sambodhiṃ abhisambuddhoti attho. Tathā hi “paccekabuddhā sayameva
tika-s0105t0:525_4: bujjhanti, na pare bodhenti, attharasameva paṭivijjhanti, na dhammarasaṃ. Na hi te
tika-s0105t0:525_5: lokuttaradhammaṃ paññattiṃ āropetvā desetuṃ sakkonti, mūgena diṭṭhasupino viya, vanacarakena
tika-s0105t0:525_6: nagare sāyitabyañjanaraso viya ca nesaṃ dhammābhisamayo hoti, sabbaṃ iddhisamāpattipaṭisambhidāpabhedaṃ
tika-s0105t0:526_0: Etthāha – yadi rañño kammantarāyābhāve tasmiṃyeva āsane dhammacakkhu uppajjissatha,
tika-s0105t0:526_1: atha kathaṃ anāgate paccekabuddho hutvā parinibbāyissati. Yadi ca anāgate paccekabuddho
tika-s0105t0:526_2: hutvā parinibbāyissati, atha kathaṃ tasmiṃyeva āsane dhammacakkhu uppajjissatha,
tika-s0105t0:526_3: nanu ime sāvakabodhipaccekabodhiupanissayā bhinnanissayā dvinnaṃ bodhīnaṃ asādhāraṇabhāvato.
tika-s0105t0:526_4: Asādhāraṇā hi etā dve yathākkamaṃ pañcaṅgadvayaṅgasampattiyā, abhinīhārasamiddhivasena,
tika-s0105t0:526_5: pāramīsambharaṇakālavasena, abhisambujjhanavasena cāti? Nāyaṃ virodho ito paratoyevassa
tika-s0105t0:526_6: paccekabodhisambhārānaṃ sambharaṇīyattā. Sāvakabodhiyā bujjhanakasattāpi hi asati
tika-s0105t0:526_7: tassā samavāye kālantare paccekabodhiyā bujjhissanti tathābhinīhārassa sambhavatoti.
tika-s0105t0:526_8: Apare pana bhaṇanti – “paccekabodhiyāyevāyaṃ rājā katābhinīhāro. Katābhinīhārāpi
tika-s0105t0:526_9: hi tattha niyatimappattā tassa ñāṇassa paripākaṃ anupagatattā satthu sammukhībhāve
tika-s0105t0:526_10: sāvakabodhiṃ pāpuṇissantīti bhagavā ‘sacāyaṃ bhikkhave rājā’tiādimavoca, mahābodhisattānameva
tika-s0105t0:526_11: ca ānantariyaparimutti hoti, na itaresaṃ bodhisattānaṃ. Tathā hi paccekabodhiyaṃ
tika-s0105t0:526_12: niyato samāno devadatto cirakālasambhūtena lokanāthe āghātena garutarāni ānantariyakammāni
tika-s0105t0:526_13: pasavi, tasmā kammantarāyena ayaṃ idāni asamavetadassanābhisamayo rājā paccekabodhiniyāmena
tika-s0105t0:526_14: anāgate vijitāvī nāma paccekabuddho hutvā parinibbāyissatī”ti daṭṭhabbaṃ, yuttataramettha
tika-s0105t0:527_0: Yathāvuttaṃ pāḷimeva saṃvaṇṇanāya nigamavasena dassento “idamavocā”tiādimāha. Tassattho
tika-s0105t0:527_1: hi heṭṭhā vuttoti. Apica pāḷiyamanāruḷhampi atthaṃ saṅgahetuṃ “idamavocā”tiādinā
tika-s0105t0:528_4: katāya sādhuvilāsiniyā nāma līnatthappakāsaniyā sāmaññaphalasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā.
tika-s0105t0:532_0: 254. Evaṃ sāmaññaphalasuttaṃ saṃvaṇṇetvā idāni ambaṭṭhasuttaṃ saṃvaṇṇento yathānupubbaṃ
tika-s0105t0:532_1: saṃvaṇṇokāsassa pattabhāvaṃ vibhāvetuṃ, sāmaññaphalasuttassānantaraṃ saṅgītassa suttassa
tika-s0105t0:532_2: ambaṭṭhasuttabhāvaṃ pakāsetuṃ “evaṃ me sutaṃ…pe… kosalesūti ambaṭṭhasutta”nti āha.
tika-s0105t0:532_3: Evamīdisesu. Itisaddo cettha ādiattho, padatthavipallāsajotako pana itisaddo luttaniddiṭṭho,
tika-s0105t0:532_4: ādisaddalopo vā esa, upalakkhaṇaniddeso vā. Apubbapadavaṇṇanā nāma heṭṭhā aggahitatāya
tika-s0105t0:532_5: apubbassa padassa atthavibhajanā. “Hitvā punappunāgata-matthaṃ atthaṃ pakāsayissāmī”ti
tika-s0105t0:532_6: hi vuttaṃ, “anupubbapadavaṇṇanā”ti katthaci pāṭho, so ayuttova ṭīkāya anuddhaṭattā,
tika-s0105t0:533_0: “Rājakumārā gottavasena kosalā nāmā”ti ācariyena vuttaṃ. Akkharacintakā pana vadanti
tika-s0105t0:533_1: “kosaṃ lanti gaṇhanti, kusalaṃ vā pucchantīti kosalā”ti. Janapadinoti janapadavanto,
tika-s0105t0:533_2: janapadassa vā issarā. “Kosalā nāma rājakumārā”ti vutteyeva siddhepi “janapadino”ti
tika-s0105t0:533_3: vacanaṃ santesupi aññesu taṃtaṃnāmapaññātesu tattha nivasantesu janapadibhāvato tesameva
tika-s0105t0:533_4: nivasanamupādāya janapadassāyaṃ samaññāti dassanatthaṃ. “Tesaṃ nivāso”ti iminā “kosalānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:533_5: nivāsā kosalā”ti taddhitaṃ dasseti. “Ekopi janapado”ti iminā pana saddatoyevetaṃ
tika-s0105t0:533_6: puthuvacanaṃ, atthato panesa eko evāti vibhāveti. Api-saddo cettha anuggahe, tena
tika-s0105t0:533_7: kāmaṃ ekoyevesa janapado, tathāpi iminā kāraṇena puthuvacanamupapannanti anuggaṇhāti.
tika-s0105t0:533_8: Yadi ekova janapado, kathaṃ tattha bahuvacananti āha “ruḷhisaddenā”tiādi, ruḷhisaddattā
tika-s0105t0:533_9: bahuvacanamupapannanti vuttaṃ hoti. Nissitesu payuttassa puthuvacanassa, puthubhāvassa
tika-s0105t0:533_10: vā nissaye abhiniropanā idha ruḷhi, tena vuttaṃ ācariyena idha ceva aññattha ca majjhimāgamaṭīkādīsu
tika-s0105t0:533_11: “akkharacintakā hi īdisesu ṭhānesu yutte viya īdisaliṅgavacanāni icchanti, ayamettha
tika-s0105t0:533_12: ruḷhi yathā ‘aññatthāpi kurūsu viharati, aṅgesu viharatī’ti cā”ti. Keci pana kosalanāmābhiniropanamicchanti,
tika-s0105t0:533_13: ayuttametaṃ puthuvacanassa appayujjitabbattā. Nāmābhiniropanāya hi ekavacanampi bhavati
tika-s0105t0:533_14: yathā “sīho gāyatī”ti. Tabbisesitepi janapadasadde jātisaddattā ekavacanameva. Tenāha
tika-s0105t0:533_15: “tasmiṃ kosalesu janapade”ti, kosalanāmake tasmiṃ janapadeti attho. Abhūtato hi vohāramattaṃ
tika-s0105t0:533_16: ruḷhi, bhūtatoyeva attho vinicchinitabbo. Yathā hi –
tika-s0105t0:535: Te rajjaṃ kārayissanti, mithilāyaṃ pajāpatī”ti. ādīsu –
tika-s0105t0:536_0: Taṃputtasaṅkhātassa ekatthassa ruḷhivasena “puttā”ti bahuvacanapayogo, tathā idhāpi
tika-s0105t0:536_1: tannivāsasaṅkhātassa ekatthassa ruḷhivasena “kosalesū”ti bahuvacanapayogo hoti. Yathā
tika-s0105t0:536_2: ca “pāṇaṃ na haññe, na ca’dinnamādiye”tiādīsu jātivasena bahvatthānamekavacanapayogo,
tika-s0105t0:536_3: tathā idhāpi jātivasena avayavappabhedena bahvatthassa “janapade”ti ekavacanapayogo
tika-s0105t0:536_4: hoti. Vuttañca ācariyena majjhimāgamaṭīkāyaṃ “tabbisesanepi janapadasadde jātisadde
tika-s0105t0:537_0: Evaṃ ruḷhivasena bahumhi viya vattabbe bahuvacanaṃ dassetvā idāni bahvatthavasena
tika-s0105t0:537_1: bahumpi eva vattabbe bahuvacanaṃ dassento “porāṇā panāhū”tiādimāha. Pana-saddo cettha
tika-s0105t0:537_2: visesatthajotano, tena puthuatthavisayatāya evetaṃ puthuvacanaṃ, na ruḷhivasenāti
tika-s0105t0:537_3: vakkhamānaṃ visesaṃ joteti. So hi padeso tiyojanasataparimāṇatāya bahuppabhedoti,
tika-s0105t0:537_4: imasmiṃ pana naye tesu kosalesu janapadesūti attho veditabbo. Mahāpanādanti mahāpanādajātaka
tika-s0105t0:537_5: surucijātakesu āgataṃ surucino nāma videharañño puttaṃ mahāpanādanāmakaṃ rājakumāraṃ.
tika-s0105t0:537_7: katthaci pana ādisaddopi diṭṭho, so jātakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ na dissati, yadi ca dissati,
tika-s0105t0:537_8: tena naṭalaṅghakādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Sitamattampīti mihitamattampi. Tassa kira
tika-s0105t0:537_9: dibbanāṭakānaṃ anantarabhaveyeva diṭṭhattā manussanāṭakānaṃ naccaṃ amanuññaṃ ahosi.
tika-s0105t0:537_10: Naṅgalānipi chaḍḍetvāti kasikammappahānavasena naṅgalāni pahāya, nidassanamattañcetaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:537_11: Na hi kevalaṃ kassakā eva, atha kho aññepi ubhayaraṭṭhavāsino manussā attano attano
tika-s0105t0:537_12: kiccaṃ pahāya tasmiṃ maṅgalaṭṭhāne sannipatiṃsu. Tadā kira mahāpanādakumārassa pāsādamaṅgalaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:537_13: chattamaṅgalaṃ, āvāhamaṅgalanti tīṇi maṅgalāni ekato akaṃsu, kāsivideharaṭṭhavāsinopi
tika-s0105t0:537_14: tattha sannipatitvā atirekasattavassāni chaṇamanubhaviṃsūti, adhunā pana “naṅgalādīnī”ti
tika-s0105t0:537_15: pāṭho dissati, so na porāṇapāṭho ṭīkāyamanuddhaṭattā.
tika-s0105t0:538_0: Mahājanakāye sannipatiteti keci “pahaṃsanavidhiṃ dassetvā rājakumāraṃ hāsāpessāmā”ti,
tika-s0105t0:538_1: keci “taṃ kīḷanaṃ passissāmā”ti evaṃ mahājanasamūhe sannipatite. Atulambābhiruhanadārucitakapavesanādi
tika-s0105t0:538_2: nānākīḷāyo dassetvā. Sakkapesito kira dibbanāṭako rājaṅgaṇe ākāse ṭhatvā upaḍḍhabhāgaṃ
tika-s0105t0:538_3: nāma dasseti, ekova hattho, eko pādo, ekaṃ akkhi, ekā dāṭhā naccati calati, upaḍḍhaṃ
tika-s0105t0:538_4: phandati, sesaṃ niccalamahosi, taṃ disvā mahāpanādo thokaṃ hasitamakāsi, imamatthaṃ
tika-s0105t0:538_5: sandhāya “so dibbanāṭakaṃ dassetvā hasāpesī”ti vuttaṃ. Suhajjā nāma vissāsikā “suṭṭhu
tika-s0105t0:538_6: hadayametesa”nti katvā. Ādisaddena ñātakaparijanādīnaṃ saṅgaho. Tasmāti tathā vacanato.
tika-s0105t0:538_7: Taṃ kusalanti vacanaṃ upādāyāti ettha “kacci kusalaṃ? Āma kusala”nti vacanapaṭivacanavasena
tika-s0105t0:538_8: pavattakusalavāditāya te manussā ādito “kusalā”ti samaññaṃ labhiṃsu, tesaṃ kusalānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:538_9: issarāti rājakumārā kosalā nāma jātā, tesaṃ nivāsaṭṭhānatāya pana padeso kosalāti
tika-s0105t0:538_10: pubbe vuttanayameva. Tenāha “so padeso kosalāti vuccatī”ti. Evaṃ majjhimāgamaṭīkāyaṃ
tika-s0105t0:538_11: ācariyeneva vuttaṃ. Tatrāyamadhippāyo siyā – “so padeso kosalāti vuccatī”ti saññīsaññā
tika-s0105t0:538_12: yathākkamaṃ ekavacanabahuvacanavasena vuttattā purimanaye viya idhāpi ruḷhivaseneva
tika-s0105t0:538_13: bahuvacanaṃ hoti. Rājakumārānaṃ nāmalābhahetumattañhettha visesoti. Idha pana ācariyena
tika-s0105t0:538_14: evaṃ vuttaṃ so padesoti padesasāmaññato vuttaṃ, vacanavipallāsena vā, te padesāti
tika-s0105t0:538_15: attho. Kosalāti vuccati kusalā eva kosalāti katvā”ti tatrāyamadhippāyo siyā – so
tika-s0105t0:538_16: padesoti jātisaddavasena, vacanavipallāsena vā vuttattā puthuatthavisayatāya eva
tika-s0105t0:538_17: bahuvacanaṃ hoti. Padesassa nāmalābhahetu hettha visesoti. “Kusala”nti hi vacanamupādāya
tika-s0105t0:538_18: ruḷhināmavasena vuttanayena kosalā yathā “yevāpanakaṃ, natumhākavaggo”ti. Apica vacanapaṭivacanavasena
tika-s0105t0:538_19: “kusala”nti vadanti etthāti kosalā. Vicitrā hi taddhitavuttīti. Kusalanti ca ārogyaṃ
tika-s0105t0:538_20: “kacci nu bhoto kusalaṃ, kacci bhoto anāmaya”ntiādīsu viya, kacci tumhākaṃ ārogyaṃ
tika-s0105t0:538_21: hotīti attho, chekaṃ vā “kusalā naccagītassa, sikkhitā cāturitthiyo”tiādīsu viya,
tika-s0105t0:538_22: kacci tesaṃ nāṭakānaṃ chekatā hotīti attho.
tika-s0105t0:539_0: Caraṇaṃ cārikā, caraṇaṃ vā cāro, so eva cārikā, tayidaṃ maggagamanameva idhādhippetaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:539_2: addhānagamanasaṅkhātāya cārikāya caramānoti vuttaṃ hoti, abhedepi vā bhedavohārena
tika-s0105t0:539_3: vuttaṃ yathā “divāvihāraṃ nisīdī”ti, addhānagamanasaṅkhātaṃ cārikaṃ caramāno, caraṇaṃ
tika-s0105t0:539_4: karontoti attho. Sabbatthako hi karabhūdhātūnamatthoti. “Addhānamagga”ntipi katthaci
tika-s0105t0:539_5: pāṭho, so na sundaro. Na hi cārikāsaddo maggavācakoti. Idāni taṃ vibhāgena dassetvā
tika-s0105t0:539_6: idhādhippetaṃ niyamento “cārikā ca nāmesā”tiādimāha. Sāvakānampi ruḷhivasena cārikāya
tika-s0105t0:539_7: sambhavato tato viseseti “bhagavato”ti iminā. Tathā hi majjhimāgamaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ
