tika-s0105t0:539_8: “cārikaṃ caramānoti ettha kiñcāpi ayaṃ cārikā nāma mahājanasaṅgahatthaṃ buddhānaṃyeva
tika-s0105t0:539_9: labbhati, buddhe upādāya pana ruḷhisaddena sāvakānampi vuccati kilañjādīhi katabījanīpi
tika-s0105t0:539_10: tālavaṇṭaṃ viyā”ti. Dūrepīti ettha pi-saddena, api-saddena vā nātidūrepīti sampiṇḍanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:539_12: Sahasā gamananti sīghagamanaṃ. “Mahākassapassa paccuggamanādīsū”ti vuttameva sarūpato
tika-s0105t0:539_13: dasseti “bhagavā hī”tiādinā. Paccuggacchantoti paṭimukhaṃ gacchanto, paccuṭṭhahantoti
tika-s0105t0:539_14: attho. “Tathā”ti iminā “tiṃsayojana”nti padamanukaḍḍhati. Pakkusāti nāma gandhārarājā.
tika-s0105t0:539_15: Mahākappino nāma kukkuṭavatīrājā. Dhaniyo nāma koraṇḍaseṭṭhiputto gopo.
tika-s0105t0:540_0: Evaṃ dhammagarutākittanamukhena mahākassapapaccuggamanādīni ekadesena dassetvā idāni
tika-s0105t0:540_1: vanavāsitissasāmaṇerassa vatthuṃ vitthāretvā cārikaṃ dassetuṃ “ekadivasa”ntiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:540_2: Ko panesa tissasāmaṇero nāma? Sāvatthiyaṃ dhammasenāpatino upaṭṭhākakule jāto mahāpuñño
tika-s0105t0:540_4: pākaṭo khīṇāsavasāmaṇero. Vitthāro dhammapade. Ākāsagāmīhi saddhiṃ ākāseneva gantukāmo
tika-s0105t0:540_5: bhagavā “chaḷabhiññānaṃ ārocehī”ti avoca. Tassāti tissasāmaṇerassa. Tanti bhagavantaṃ
tika-s0105t0:540_6: saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghena cīvaraṃ pārupantaṃ. No thero no oramattako vatāti sambandho,
tika-s0105t0:541_0: Attano pattāsaneti bhikkhūnaṃ āsanapariyante. Tesaṃ gāmikānaṃ dānapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ maṅgalaṃ
tika-s0105t0:541_1: vatvā. Kasmā pana sadevakassa lokassa maggadesakopi samāno bhagavā evamāhāti codanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:541_2: sodhetuṃ “bhagavā kirā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Maggadesakoti nibbānamaggassa, sugatimaggassa vā desako.
tika-s0105t0:542_0: Tāyāti araññasaññāya. Saṅghakammavasena sijjhamānāpi upasampadā satthu āṇāvasena
tika-s0105t0:542_1: sijjhanato “buddhadāyajjaṃ te dassāmī”ti vuttanti vadanti. Apare pana “aparipuṇṇavīsativassasseva
tika-s0105t0:542_2: tassa upasampadaṃ anujānanto satthā ‘buddhadāyajjaṃ te dassāmī’ti avocā”ti vadanti.
tika-s0105t0:542_3: Dhammasenāpatinā upajjhāyena upasampādetvā, tatoyevesa dhammasenāpatino saddhivihārikoti
tika-s0105t0:542_4: aṭṭhakathāsu vutto. Dhammapadaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana dhammasenāpatiāditherānaṃ cattālīsabhikkhusahassaparivārānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:542_5: attano attano parivārehi saddhiṃ paccekaṃ gamanaṃ, bhagavato ca ekakasseva gamanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:542_6: khuddakabhāṇakānaṃ matena vuttaṃ, idha, pana majjhimāgamaṭṭhakathāyañca aññathā gamanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:542_8: cārikā. Yaṃ pana anuggaṇhantassa bhagavato gamanaṃ, ayaṃ aturitacārikā nāmāti sambandho.
tika-s0105t0:543_0: Imaṃ pana cārikanti aturitacārikaṃ. Mahāmaṇḍalanti majjhimadesapariyāpanneneva bāhirimena
tika-s0105t0:543_1: pamāṇena paricchinnattā mahantataraṃ maṇḍalaṃ. Majjhimamaṇḍalanti itaresaṃ ubhinnaṃ
tika-s0105t0:543_2: vemajjhe pavattaṃ maṇḍalaṃ. Antomaṇḍalanti itarehi khuddakaṃ maṇḍalaṃ, itaresaṃ vā
tika-s0105t0:543_3: antogadhattā antimaṃ maṇḍalaṃ, abbhantarimaṃ maṇḍalanti vuttaṃ hoti. Kiṃ panimesaṃ
tika-s0105t0:543_5: gahetabbā tato paraṃ aturitacārikāya agamanato. Taduttari hi turitacārikāya eva tathāgato
tika-s0105t0:543_6: gacchati, na aturitacārikāya. Pavāretvāva cārikācaraṇaṃ buddhāciṇṇanti vuttaṃ “mahāpavāraṇāya
tika-s0105t0:543_8: Samantāti gatagataṭṭhānassa catūsu passesu samantato. Mahājanakāyassa sannipatanato
tika-s0105t0:543_9: purimaṃ purimaṃ āgatā nimantetuṃ labhanti. Tathā sannipatanameva dassetuṃ “itaresū”tiādi
tika-s0105t0:543_10: vuttaṃ. Samathavipassanā taruṇā hontīti ettha samathassa taruṇabhāvo upacārasamādhivasena,
tika-s0105t0:543_11: vipassanāya pana saṅkhāraparicchedañāṇaṃ, kaṅkhāvitaraṇañāṇaṃ, sammasanañāṇaṃ, maggāmaggañāṇanti
tika-s0105t0:543_12: catunnaṃ ñāṇānaṃ vasena veditabbo. Taruṇavipassanāti hi tesaṃ catunnaṃ ñāṇānamadhivacanaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:543_13: Pavāraṇāsaṅgahaṃ datvāti anumatidānavasena datvā. Kattikapuṇṇamāyanti pacchimakattikapuṇṇamiyaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:543_15: paṭhamaṃ pāṭipadadivasaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, etarahi pavattavohāravasena pana pacchimakattikamāsassa
tika-s0105t0:544_0: Aññenapi kāraṇenāti bhikkhūnaṃ samathavipassanātaruṇabhāvato aññenapi majjhimamaṇḍale
tika-s0105t0:544_1: veneyyānaṃ ñāṇaparipākādikāraṇena. Catumāsanti āsaḷhīpuṇṇamiyā pāṭipadato yāva pacchimakattikapuṇṇamī,
tika-s0105t0:544_2: tāva catumāsaṃ. “Samantā yojanasata”ntiādinā vuttanayeneva. Vasanaṃ vassaṃ, vasanakiriyā,
tika-s0105t0:544_3: vutthaṃ vasitaṃ vassamassāti vutthavasso, tassa. Tathāgatena vinetabbattā “bhagavato
tika-s0105t0:544_4: veneyyasattā”ti sāminiddeso vutto, kattuniddeso vā esa. Veneyyasattāti ca caritānurūpaṃ
tika-s0105t0:544_7: nikkhamanato māsaniyamo ettha na katoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tenāha “ekamāsaṃ vā dviticatumāsaṃ
tika-s0105t0:544_8: vā tattheva vasitvā”ti. Tatthevāti vassūpagamanaṭṭhāne eva. “Sattahi vā”tiādi “ekamāsaṃ
tika-s0105t0:544_9: vā”tiādinā yathākkamaṃ yojetabbaṃ – yadi aparampi ekamāsaṃ tattheva vasati, sattahi
tika-s0105t0:544_10: māsehi cārikaṃ pariyosāpeti. Yadi dvimāsaṃ chahi, yadi timāsaṃ pañcahi, yadi catumāsaṃ
tika-s0105t0:544_11: tattheva vasati, catūhi māsehi cārikaṃ pariyosāpetīti. Kasmā pana cārikāgamananti
tika-s0105t0:544_12: āsaṅkānivattanatthaṃ “itī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Atirekaṃ jarādubbalo bāḷhajiṇṇo. Te kadā
tika-s0105t0:544_13: passissanti, na passissanti eva. Lokānukampakāyāti lokānukampakāya eva. Tena vuttaṃ
tika-s0105t0:545_0: Jaṅghavihāravasenāti jaṅghāhi vicaraṇavasena, jaṅghāhi vicaritvā tattha tattha katipāhaṃ
tika-s0105t0:545_2: ekasmiṃyeva ṭhāne nibaddhavāsavasena ussannadhātukassa sarīrassa vicaraṇena phāsubhāvatthāya.
tika-s0105t0:545_4: viya dhammadesanāya abhikaṅkhitabbaaṭṭhuppattikālatthāya, aṭṭhuppattikālassa vā abhikaṅkhanatthāya,
tika-s0105t0:545_5: aṭṭhuppattikāle dhammadesanatthāyāti vuttaṃ hoti. Sikkhāpadapaññāpanatthāyāti surāpānasikkhāpadādi
tika-s0105t0:545_6: paññāpane viya sikkhāpadānaṃ paññāpanatthāya. Bodhanatthāyāti aṅgulimālādayo viya
tika-s0105t0:545_7: bodhaneyyasatte catusaccabodhanatthāya. Mahatāti mahatiyā. Kañci, katipaye vā puggale
tika-s0105t0:545_8: uddissa cārikā nibaddhacārikā. Tadaññā sambahule uddissa gāmanigamanagarapaṭipāṭiyā
tika-s0105t0:545_9: cārikā anibaddhacārikā. Tenāha “tatthā”tiādi. Yaṃ caratīti kiriyāparāmasanaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:546_0: “Esā idha adhippetā”ti vuttameva vitthārato dassetuṃ “tadā kirā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Dasasahassilokadhātuyāti
tika-s0105t0:546_1: jātikkhettabhūtaṃ dasasahassacakkavāḷaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Kasmāti ce? Tattheva bhabbasattānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:546_2: sambhavato. Tattha hi satte bhabbe paripakkindriye passituṃ buddhañāṇaṃ abhinīharitvā
tika-s0105t0:546_3: ṭhito bhagavā ñāṇajālaṃ pattharatīti vuccati, idañca devabrahmānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:546_4: Manussā pana imasmiṃyeva cakkavāḷe, imasmiṃyeva ca saparivāre jambudīpe bodhaneyyā
tika-s0105t0:546_5: honti. Bodhaneyyabandhaveti bodhaneyyasattasaṅkhāte bhagavato bandhave. Gottādisambandhā
tika-s0105t0:546_6: viya hi saccapaṭivedhasambandhā veneyyā bhagavato bandhavā nāmāti. Gocarabhāvūpagamanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:546_7: sandhāya “sabbaññutaññāṇajālassa anto paviṭṭho”ti vuttaṃ. Bhagavā kira mahākaruṇāsamāpattiṃ
tika-s0105t0:546_8: samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhāya “ye sattā bhabbā paripakkañāṇā, te mayhaṃ ñāṇassa upaṭṭhahantū”ti
tika-s0105t0:546_9: cittaṃ adhiṭṭhāya samannāharati, tassa sahasamannāhārā eko vā dve vā sambahulā vā
tika-s0105t0:546_10: tadā vinayūpagā veneyyā ñāṇassa āpāthamāgacchanti, ayamettha buddhānubhāvo. Evamāpāthagatānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:546_11: pana nesaṃ upanissayaṃ pubbacariyaṃ, pubbahetuṃ, sampati vattamānañca paṭipattiṃ
tika-s0105t0:546_12: oloketi. Veneyyasattapariggaṇhanatthañhi samannāhāre kate paṭhamaṃ nesaṃ veneyyabhāvena
tika-s0105t0:546_13: upaṭṭhānaṃ hoti, atha “kiṃ nu kho bhavissatī”ti saraṇagamanādivasena kañci nipphattiṃ
tika-s0105t0:546_14: vīmaṃsamāno pubbūpanissayādīni oloketi. Tenāha “atha bhagavā”tiādi. Soti ambaṭṭho.
tika-s0105t0:546_15: Vādapaṭivādaṃ katvāti “evaṃ nu te ambaṭṭhā”tiādinā mayā vuttavacanassa “ye ca kho
tika-s0105t0:546_16: te bho gotama muṇḍakā samaṇakā”tiādinā paṭivacanaṃ datvā, asabbhivākyanti asappurisavācaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:546_17: tikkhattuṃ ibbhavādanipātanavasena nānappakāraṃ sādhusabhāvāya vācāya vattumayuttaṃ
tika-s0105t0:546_18: vākyaṃ vakkhatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Nibbisevananti vigatatudanaṃ, mānadappavasena apagataparinipphandananti attho.
tika-s0105t0:547_0: Avasaritabbanti upagantabbaṃ. Tassa gāmassa idaṃ nāmamattaṃ, kimettha atthapariyesanāyāti
tika-s0105t0:547_2: upayogavacananti dasseti “tena avasarī”ti iminā. “Yasmiṃ padese”ti pana bhummaniddesānurūpaṃ
tika-s0105t0:547_3: “taṃ vā avasarī”ti vuttaṃ. Tadubhayamevatthaṃ vivarati “tena disābhāgenā”tiādinā.
tika-s0105t0:547_4: Gatoti upagato, agamāsīti attho. Puna gatoti sampatto, sampāpuṇīti attho. “Icchānaṅgale”ti
tika-s0105t0:547_5: idaṃ tadā bhagavato gocaragāmanidassanaṃ, samīpatthe cetaṃ bhummaṃ. “Icchānaṅgalavanasaṇḍe”ti
tika-s0105t0:547_6: idaṃ pana nivāsaṭṭhānadassanaṃ, nippariyāyato adhikaraṇe cetaṃ bhummanti tadubhayampi
tika-s0105t0:547_8: vuttanayena veneyyahitasamapekkhanavaseneva bhagavato vihāradassanaṃ. Tattha dhammarājassa
tika-s0105t0:547_9: bhagavato sabbaso adhammaniggaṇhanaparā eva paṭipatti, sā ca sīlasamādhipaññāvasenāti
tika-s0105t0:547_10: sīlādittayasseva gahaṇaṃ. Sīlakhandhāvāranti cakkavattirañño dāruiṭṭhakādikataṃ khandhāvārasadisaṃ
tika-s0105t0:547_11: sīlasaṅkhātaṃ khandhāvāraṃ bandhitvā viharatīti sambandho. Dārukkhandhādīhi āsamantato
tika-s0105t0:547_12: varanti parikkhipanti etthāti hi khandhāvāro a-kārassa dīghaṃ katvā, rājūnaṃ aciranivāsaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:547_13: Tattha pana bhagavato aciranivasanakiriyāsambandhamattena bhayanivāraṇaṭṭhena taṃsadisatāya
tika-s0105t0:547_14: sīlampi tathā vuccati. Samādhikontanti sammāsamādhisaṅkhātaṃ maṅgalasattiṃ. Sabbaññutaññāṇapadanti
tika-s0105t0:547_16: pāṭho, sabbaññutaññāṇavajiraggasaraṃ aparāparaṃ samparivattamānoti attho. Yathābhirucitena
tika-s0105t0:547_17: vihārenāti sabbavihārasādhāraṇadassanaṃ, dibbavihārādīsu yena yena attanā abhirucitena
tika-s0105t0:549_1: vuccanti. Aṇa-saddo saddeti āha “sajjhāyatī”ti. Lokiyā pana vadanti “brahmuno apaccaṃ
tika-s0105t0:549_2: brāhmaṇo, nāgamo, ṇattaṃ, dīghādī”ti. Kasmā ayameva vacanattho vuttoti āha “idamevā”tiādi.
tika-s0105t0:549_3: Atha kesaṃ itaro vacanatthoti codanamapaneti “ariyā panā”tiādinā. Atha vā yaṃ lokiyā
tika-s0105t0:549_4: vadanti “brahmunā jāto brāhmaṇo”tiādiniruttiṃ, taṃ paṭikkhipituṃ evaṃ vuttaṃ. “Idamevā”ti
tika-s0105t0:549_5: hi avadhāraṇena taṃ paṭikkhipati. “Jātibrāhmaṇāna”nti pana iminā saddantarena dassitesu
tika-s0105t0:549_7: dassento “ariyā panā”tiādimāha. Bahanti pāpe bahi karontīti hi ariyā brāhmaṇā niruttinayena.
tika-s0105t0:549_8: “Tassa kira kāyo setapokkharasadiso”ti idamevassa nāmalābhahetudassanaṃ, sesaṃ pana
tika-s0105t0:549_9: tappasaṅgena yathāvijjamānavisesadassanameva. Tenāha “iti naṃ pokkharasadisattā pokkharasātīti
tika-s0105t0:549_10: sañjānantī”ti. Pokkharena sadiso kāyo yassāti hi pokkharasātī niruttinayena. Sātasaddo
tika-s0105t0:549_11: vā sadisattho, pokkharena sāto sadiso kāyo tathā, so yassāti pokkharasātī. Setapokkharasadisoti
tika-s0105t0:549_13: accuggataṃ rajatamayaṃ indakhīlaṃ. Kāḷamegharājīti kadāci dissamānā kāḷaabbhalekhā.
tika-s0105t0:549_14: Rajatapanāḷikāti rajatamayatumbaṃ. Suvaṭṭitāti vaṭṭabhāvassa yuttaṭṭhāne suṭṭhu vaṭṭulā.
tika-s0105t0:550_0: Idāni aparampi tassa nāmalābhahetuṃ dassento “ayaṃ panā”tiādimāha. Tattha ca “himavantapadese
tika-s0105t0:550_1: mahāsare padumagabbhe nibbattī”ti idamevassa nāmalābhahetudassanaṃ. Sesaṃ pana tappasaṅgena
tika-s0105t0:550_2: tathāpavattākāradassanameva. Tenāha “iti naṃ pokkhare sayitattā pokkharasātīti sañjānantī”ti.
tika-s0105t0:550_3: Pokkhare kamale sayatīti hi pokkharasātī, sātaṃ vā vuccati samasaṇṭhānaṃ, pokkhare
tika-s0105t0:550_4: jātaṃ samasaṇṭhānaṃ tathā, tamassatthītipi pokkharasātī. Yaṃ pana ācariyena vuttaṃ
tika-s0105t0:550_5: “imassa brāhmaṇassa kīdiso pubbayogo, yena naṃ bhagavā anuggaṇhituṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ upagatoti
tika-s0105t0:550_6: āhā”ti, tadetaṃ “ayaṃ panā”tiādivacanaṃ ekadesameva sandhāya vuttaṃ. “So tato manussaloka”ntiādivacanato
tika-s0105t0:550_7: devaloke nibbattīti ettha aparāparaṃ nibbatti eva vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tathārūpena
tika-s0105t0:550_9: nibbattī”ti iminā saṃsedajoyeva hutvā nibbattīti dasseti. Na pupphatīti na vikasati.
tika-s0105t0:550_10: Tenāti tāpasena. Nāḷatoti pupphadaṇḍato. Suvaṇṇacuṇṇehi piñjaraṃ hemavaṇṇo yassāti
tika-s0105t0:550_11: suvaṇṇacuṇṇapiñjaro, taṃ, suvaṇṇacuṇṇehi vikiṇṇabhāvena hemavaṇṇanti attho. Piñjarasaddo
tika-s0105t0:550_12: hi hemavaṇṇapariyāyoti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ. Esa nayo padumareṇupiñjaranti etthāpi.
tika-s0105t0:550_13: Rajatabimbakanti rūpiyamayarūpakaṃ. Paṭijaggāmīti posemi. Pāranti pariyosānaṃ, nipphatti
tika-s0105t0:550_14: vā vuccati nadīsamuddādīnaṃ pariyosānabhūtaṃ pāraṃ viyāti katvā. Paṭisandhipaññāsaṅkhātena
tika-s0105t0:550_15: sabhāvañāṇena paṇḍito. Iti kattabbesu, vedesu vā visāradapaññāsaṅkhātena veyyattiyena
tika-s0105t0:550_16: byatto. Aggabrāhmaṇoti disāpāmokkhabrāhmaṇo. Sippanti vedasippaṃ tasseva pakaraṇādhigatattā.
tika-s0105t0:550_17: Brahmadeyyaṃ adāsīti vakkhamānanayena brahmadeyyaṃ katvā adāsi.
tika-s0105t0:551_0: “Ajjhāvasatī”ti ettha adhi-saddo, ā-saddo ca upasaggamattaṃ, tato “ukkaṭṭha”nti idaṃ
tika-s0105t0:551_1: ajjhāpubbavasayoge bhummatthe upayogavacanaṃ. Adhi-saddo vā issariyattho, ā-saddo
tika-s0105t0:551_2: mariyādattho tato “ukkaṭṭha”nti idaṃ kammappavacanīyayoge bhummatthe upayogavacananti
tika-s0105t0:551_4: nagarassa sāmiko hutvā”ti hi “abhibhavitvā”ti etassatthavivaraṇaṃ, tenetaṃ dīpeti
tika-s0105t0:551_6: tenetaṃ dīpeti “āsaddo mariyādattho, mariyādā ca nāma yāya tattha vasitabbaṃ, sāyeva
tika-s0105t0:551_7: aparādhīnatā”ti. Yāya mariyādāyāti hi yāya aparādhīnatāsaṅkhātāya anaññasādhāraṇāya
tika-s0105t0:551_10: upasaggehi yuttattā upayogavacanamevettha vihita”nti. “Tassa kirā”tiādi pana atthānugatasamaññāparidīpanaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:552_0: Ukkāti daṇḍadīpikā. Aggahesunti “ajja maṅgaladivaso, tasmā sunakkhattaṃ, tatthāpi
tika-s0105t0:552_1: ayaṃ sukhaṇo mā atikkamī”ti rattivibhāyanaṃ anurakkhantā, rattiyaṃ ālokakaraṇatthāya
tika-s0105t0:552_2: ukkā ṭhapetvā ukkāsu jalamānāsu nagarassa vatthuṃ aggahesuṃ, tenetaṃ dīpeti – ukkāsu
tika-s0105t0:552_3: ṭhitāti ukkaṭṭhā. Mūlavibhujādi ākatigaṇapakkhepena, niruttinayena vā ukkāsu vijjotayantīsu
tika-s0105t0:552_4: ṭhitāti ukkaṭṭhā, tathā ukkāsu ṭhitāsu ṭhitā āsītipi ukkaṭṭhāti. Majjhimāgamaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-s0105t0:552_5: pana evaṃ vuttaṃ “tañca nagaraṃ ‘maṅgaladivaso sukhaṇo, sunakkhattaṃ mā atikkamī’ti
tika-s0105t0:552_6: rattimpi ukkāsu ṭhitāsu māpitattā ukkaṭṭhātipi vuccati, daṇḍadīpikāsu jāletvā dhāriyamānāsu
tika-s0105t0:552_7: māpitattāti vuttaṃ hotī”ti, tadapiminā saṃsandati ceva sameti ca nagaravatthupariggahassapi
tika-s0105t0:552_9: upakaraṇasampattiyā, manussasampattiyā ca taṃ nagaraṃ ukkaṭṭhaguṇayogato ukkaṭṭhāti
tika-s0105t0:552_10: nāmaṃ labhatī”ti. Lokiyā pana vadanti “ukkā dhārīyati etassa māpitakāleti ukkaṭṭhā,
tika-s0105t0:552_11: vaṇṇavikāroya”nti, itthiliṅgavasena cāyaṃ samaññā, tenevidha payogo dissati “yathā
tika-s0105t0:552_12: ca bhavaṃ gotamo ukkaṭṭhāya aññāni upāsakakulāni upasaṅkamatī”ti mūlapariyāyasuttādīsu
tika-s0105t0:552_13: ca “ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā ukkaṭṭhāyaṃ viharati subhagavane sālarājamūle”tiādi. Evamettha
tika-s0105t0:552_14: hotu upasaggavasena upayogavacanaṃ, kathaṃ panetaṃ sesapadesu siyāti anuyogenāha
tika-s0105t0:552_15: “tassa anupayogattā sesapadesū”ti. Tattha tassāti upasaggavasena upayogasaññuttassa
tika-s0105t0:553_0: Kiṃ nu khvāyaṃ saddapayogo saddalakkhaṇānugatoti codanamapaneti “tattha…pe… pariyesitabba”nti
tika-s0105t0:553_1: iminā. Tatthāti upasaggavasena, anupayogavasena ca upayogavacananti vutte dubbidhepi
tika-s0105t0:553_2: vidhāne. Lakkhaṇanti gahaṇūpāyañāyabhūtaṃ saddalakkhaṇaṃ, suttaṃ vā. Pariyesitabbanti
tika-s0105t0:553_3: saddasatthesu vijjamānattā ñāṇena gavesitabbaṃ, gahetabbanti vuttaṃ hoti. Etena hi
tika-s0105t0:553_4: saddalakkhaṇānugatovāyaṃ saddapayogoti dasseti, saddavidū ca icchanti “upaanuadhiāiccādipubbavasayoge
tika-s0105t0:553_5: sattamiyatthe upayogavacanaṃ pāpuṇāti, visesitabbapade ca yathāvidhimanupayogo visesanapadānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:553_6: samānādhikaraṇabhūtāna”nti. Tatra yadā adhi-saddo, ā-saddo ca upasaggamattaṃ, tadā
tika-s0105t0:553_7: “tatiyāsattamīnañcā”ti lakkhaṇena ajjhāpubbavasayoge upayogavacanaṃ. Tathā hi vadanti
tika-s0105t0:553_9: ca dutiyā. Kāle pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā, ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā, kañci kālaṃ purejātapaccayena
tika-s0105t0:553_10: paccayo, imaṃ rattiṃ cattāro mahārājāno. Disāyaṃ purimaṃ disaṃ dhataraṭṭho. Upādipubbavasayoge
tika-s0105t0:553_11: gāmaṃ upavasati, gāmaṃ anuvasati, gāmaṃ āvasati, agāraṃ ajjhāvasati, adhipubbasiṭhāvasānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:553_12: payoge pathaviṃ adhisessati, gāmaṃ adhitiṭṭhati, gāmaṃ ajjhāvasati. Tappānacāresu
tika-s0105t0:554_0: Yadā pana adhi-saddo issariyattho, ā-saddo ca mariyādattho, tadā “kammappavacanīyayutte”ti
tika-s0105t0:554_1: lakkhaṇena kammappavacanīyayoge upayogavacanaṃ. Tathā hi vadanti “anuādayo upasaggā,
tika-s0105t0:554_2: dhīādayo nipātā ca kammappavacanīyasaññā honti kiriyāsaṅkhātaṃ kammaṃ pavacanīyaṃ
tika-s0105t0:554_3: yesaṃ te kammappavacanīyā”ti. Sesapadānaṃ pana yathāvidhimanupayoge katarena lakkhaṇena
tika-s0105t0:554_4: upayogavacananti? Yathāvuttalakkhaṇeneva. Yajjevaṃ tesampi ādhārabhāvato nānādhāratā
tika-s0105t0:554_5: siyāti? Na, bahūnampi padānaṃ nagaravasena ekatthabhāvato. Sakatthamattañhi tesaṃ
tika-s0105t0:554_6: nānākaraṇanti. Aññe pana saddavidū evamicchanti “samānādhikaraṇapadānaṃ paccekaṃ
tika-s0105t0:554_7: kiriyāsambandhanena visesitabbapadena samānavacanatā yathā ‘kaṭaṃ karoti, vipulaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:554_8: dassanīya’nti ettha ‘kaṭaṃ karoti, vipulaṃ karoti, dassanīyaṃ karotī’ti paccekaṃ
tika-s0105t0:554_9: kiriyāsambandhanena kammattheyeva dutiyā”ti, tadetaṃ vicāretabbaṃ visesanapadānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:554_10: samānādhikaraṇānaṃ kiriyāsambajjhanābhāvato. Yadā hi kiriyāsambajjhanaṃ, tadā visesanameva na hotīti.
tika-s0105t0:555_0: Ussadatā nāmettha bahulatāti vuttaṃ “bahujana”nti. Taṃ pana bahulataṃ dasseti “ākiṇṇamanussa”ntiādinā.
tika-s0105t0:555_1: Araññādīsu gahetvā posetabbā posāvaniyā, etena tesaṃ dhammabhāvaṃ dasseti. Āvijjhitvāti
tika-s0105t0:555_2: parikkhipitvā. Khaṇitvā katā pokkharaṇī, ābandhitvā kataṃ taḷākaṃ. Acchinnūdakaṭṭhāneyeva
tika-s0105t0:555_3: jalajakusumāni jātānīti vuttaṃ “udakassa niccabharitānevā”ti. Udakassāti ca pūraṇakiriyāyoge
tika-s0105t0:555_4: karaṇatthe sāmivacanaṃ “mahante mahante sāṇipasibbake kārāpetvā hiraññasuvaṇṇassa
tika-s0105t0:555_5: pūrāpetvā”tiādīsu viya. Saha dhaññenāti sadhaññanti nagarasaddāpekkhāya napuṃsakaliṅgena
tika-s0105t0:555_6: vuttaṃ, yathāvākyaṃ vā upayogavacanena. Evaṃ sabbattha. Pubbaṇṇāparaṇṇādibhedaṃ bahudhaññasannicayanti
tika-s0105t0:555_7: ettha ādisaddena tadubhayavinimuttaṃ alābukumbhaṇḍādisūpeyyaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Tenāyamattho
tika-s0105t0:555_8: viññāyati – nayidha dhaññasaddo sāliādidhaññavisesavācako, posane sādhuttamattena
tika-s0105t0:555_9: pana niravasesapubbaṇṇāparaṇṇasūpeyyavācako, virūpekasesavasena vā payuttoti. Ettāvatāti
tika-s0105t0:555_10: yathāvuttapadattayena. Rājalīlāyāti rājūnaṃ vilāsena. Samiddhiyā upabhogaparibhogasampuṇṇabhāvena
tika-s0105t0:556_0: “Rājabhogga”nti vutte “kena dinna”nti avassaṃ pucchitabbato evaṃ vuttanti dasseti
tika-s0105t0:556_1: “kenā”tiādinā. Raññā viya bhuñjitabbanti vā rājabhogganti aṭṭhakathāto aparo nayo.
tika-s0105t0:556_2: Yāva puttanattapanattaparamparā kulasantakabhāvena rājato laddhattā “rañño dāyabhūta”nti
tika-s0105t0:556_3: vuttaṃ. “Dhammadāyādā me bhikkhave bhavathā”tiādīsu viya ca dāyasaddo dāyajjapariyāyoti
tika-s0105t0:556_4: āha “dāyajjanti attho”ti. Kathaṃ dinnattā brahmadeyyaṃ nāmāti codanaṃ pariharati
tika-s0105t0:556_5: “chattaṃ ussāpetvā”tiādinā. Rājanīhārena paribhuñjitabbato hi uddhaṃ paribhogalābhassa
tika-s0105t0:556_6: brahmadeyyatā nāma natthi, idañca tathā dinnameva, tasmā brahmadeyyaṃ nāmāti vuttaṃ
tika-s0105t0:556_9: gahitaṃ tappamukhattāti veditabbaṃ. “Raññā bhuñjitabba”ntveva vutte idhādhippetattho
tika-s0105t0:556_10: na pākaṭoti hutvā-saddaggahaṇaṃ kataṃ. Tañhi so rājakulato asamudāgatopi rājā hutvā
tika-s0105t0:556_11: bhuñjituṃ labhatīti ayamidhādhippeto attho. Dātabbanti dāyaṃ, “rājadāya”nti imināva
tika-s0105t0:556_12: raññā dinnabhāve siddhe “raññā pasenadinā kosalena dinna”nti puna ca vacanaṃ kimatthiyanti
tika-s0105t0:556_13: āha “dāyakarājadīpanattha”ntiādi. Asukena raññā dinnanti dāyakarājassa adīpitattā
tika-s0105t0:556_14: evaṃ vuttanti adhippāyo. Ettha ca paṭhamanaye “rājabhogga”nti pade pucchāsambhavato
tika-s0105t0:556_15: idaṃ vuttaṃ, dutiyanaye pana “rājadāya”nti padeti ayampi viseso daṭṭhabbo. Tattha
tika-s0105t0:556_16: atibahulatāya purato ṭhapanokāsābhāvato passenapi odanasūpabyañjanādi dīyati etassāti
tika-s0105t0:556_17: pasenadi, aluttasamāsavasena. So hi rājā taṇḍuladoṇassa odanampi tadupiyena sūpabyañjanena
tika-s0105t0:556_18: bhuñjati. Tathā hi naṃ bhuttapātarāsakāle satthu santikamāgantvā ito cito ca samparivattantaṃ
tika-s0105t0:561: Imāya gāthāya ovadi. Bhāgineyyañca so sudassanaṃ nāma māṇavaṃ –
tika-s0105t0:566_0: Imaṃ gāthaṃ bhagavato santike uggahāpetvā attano bhuñjantassa osānapiṇḍakāle devasikaṃ
tika-s0105t0:566_1: bhaṇāpeti, so aparena samayena tassā gāthāya atthaṃ sallakkhetvā punappunaṃ osānapiṇḍapariharaṇena
tika-s0105t0:566_2: nāḷikodanamattāya saṇṭhahitvā tanusarīro balavā sukhappatto ahosīti. Udānaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-s0105t0:566_3: pana evaṃ vuttaṃ “paccāmittaṃ parasenaṃ jinātīti pasenadī”ti. Saddavidūpi hi ja-kārassa
tika-s0105t0:566_4: da-kāre idamudāharanti. So hi attano bhāgineyyaṃ ajātasatturājānaṃ, pañcacorasatādīni
tika-s0105t0:566_5: ca avaruddhakāni jinātīti. Kosalaraṭṭhassādhipatibhāvato kosalo, tasmā kosalādhipatinā
tika-s0105t0:566_6: pasenadi nāmakena raññā dinnanti attho veditabbo. Nissaṭṭhapariccattatāsaṅkhātena
tika-s0105t0:566_7: puna aggahetabbabhāveneva dinnattā idha brahmadeyyaṃ nāma, na tu purimanaye viya
tika-s0105t0:566_8: rājasaṅkhepena paribhuñjitabbabhāvena dinnattāti āha “yathā”tiādi. Nissaṭṭhaṃ hutvā,
tika-s0105t0:566_9: nissaṭṭhabhāvena vā pariccattaṃ nissaṭṭhapariccattaṃ, muttacāgavasena cajitanti attho.
tika-s0105t0:567_0: Savanaṃ upalabbhoti dasseti “upalabhī”ti iminā, so cāyamupalabbho savanavaseneva
tika-s0105t0:567_2: jānanameva hi idha savanaṃ teneva “samaṇo khalu bho gotamo”tiādinā vuttassatthassa
tika-s0105t0:567_3: adhigatattā, na pana sotadvāravīthivasena sutamattaṃ tena tadatthassa anadhigatattā.
tika-s0105t0:567_4: Avadhāraṇaphalattā saddapayogassa sabbampi vākyaṃ antogadhāvadhāraṇaṃ. Tasmā tadatthajotakasaddena
tika-s0105t0:567_5: vināpi aññatthāpohanavasena assosi eva, nāssa koci savanantarāyo ahosīti ayamattho
tika-s0105t0:567_6: viññāyatīti āha “padapūraṇamatte nipāto”ti, antogadhāvadhāraṇepi ca sabbasmiṃ vākye
tika-s0105t0:567_7: nītatthato avadhāraṇatthaṃ kho-saddaggahaṇaṃ “evā”ti sāmatthiyā sātisayaṃ etadatthassa
tika-s0105t0:567_8: viññāyamānattāti paṭhamavikappo vutto, nītatthato avadhāraṇena ko attho ekantiko
tika-s0105t0:567_9: kato, avadhārito cāti vuttaṃ “tatthā”tiādi. Atha padapūraṇamattena kho-saddena kiṃ
tika-s0105t0:567_11: ca siliṭṭhatāpayojanamattamevāti attho. “Assosī”ti hidaṃ padaṃ kho-sadde gahite tena
tika-s0105t0:567_12: phullitaṃ maṇḍitaṃ vibhūsitaṃ viya hontaṃ pūritaṃ nāma hoti, tena ca purimapacchimapadāni
tika-s0105t0:567_13: sukhuccāraṇavasena siliṭṭhāni honti, na tasmiṃ aggahite, tasmā padapūraṇamattampi
tika-s0105t0:567_14: padabyañjanasiliṭṭhatāpayojananti vuttaṃ hoti. Mattasaddo cettha visesanivattiattho,
tika-s0105t0:567_15: tenassa anatthantaradīpanatā dassitā, eva-saddena pana padabyañjanasiliṭṭhatāya ekantikatā.
tika-s0105t0:568_1: ettha accantaṃ anavasesato savāsanaṃ samitapāpattāti attho gahetabbo. Evañhi bāhirakavītarāgasekkhāsekkhapāpasamanato
tika-s0105t0:568_2: bhagavato pāpasamanaṃ yathārahaṃ visesitaṃ hoti. Tena vuttaṃ “bhagavā ca anuttarena
tika-s0105t0:568_4: Assāti anena bhikkhunā, bhagavatā vā. Samitāti samāpitā, samabhāvaṃ vā āpādayitā,
tika-s0105t0:568_5: assa vā sampadānabhūtassa santā hontīti attho. Atthānugatā cāyaṃ bhagavati samaññāti
tika-s0105t0:568_6: vuttaṃ “bhagavā cā”tiādi. Tenāti tathā samitapāpattā. Yathābhūtaṃ pavatto yathābhuccaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:568_7: tadeva guṇo, tena adhigataṃ tathā. “Khalū”ti idaṃ nepātikaṃ khalupacchābhattikapade
tika-s0105t0:568_8: viya, na nāmaṃ, anekatthattā ca nipātānaṃ anussavanatthova idhādhippetoti āha “anussavanatthe
tika-s0105t0:568_10: āgataṃ, jātisiddhanti vuttaṃ hoti. Ālapanamattanti piyālapanavacanamattaṃ, na taduttari
tika-s0105t0:568_11: atthaparidīpanaṃ. Piyasamudāhārā hete “bho”ti vā “āvuso”ti vā “devānaṃ piyā”ti vā.
tika-s0105t0:568_12: Dhammapade brāhmaṇavatthupāṭhena, suttanipāte ca vāseṭṭhasuttapadena brāhmaṇajātisamudāgatālapanabhāvaṃ
tika-s0105t0:569_0: Tatrāyamattho – sace rāgādikiñcanehi sakiñcano assa, so āmantanādīsu “bho bho”ti
tika-s0105t0:569_1: vadanto hutvā vicaraṇato bhovādīyeva nāma hoti, na brāhmaṇo. “Akiñcanaṃ anādānaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:569_2: tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇa”nti sesagāthāpadaṃ. Tattha rāgādayo satte kiñcanti maddanti
tika-s0105t0:569_3: palibuddhantīti kiñcanāni. Manussā kira goṇehi khalaṃ maddāpentā “kiñcehi kapila,
tika-s0105t0:569_4: kiñcehi kāḷakā”ti vadanti, tasmā kiñcanasaddo maddanattho veditabbo. Yathāha niddese
tika-s0105t0:569_5: “akiñcananti rāgakiñcanaṃ, dosa, moha, māna, diṭṭhi, kilesakiñcanaṃ, duccaritakiñcanaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:569_6: yassete kiñcanā pahīnā samucchinnā vūpasantā paṭippassaddhā abhabbuppattikā ñāṇagginā
tika-s0105t0:569_7: daḍḍhā, so vuccati akiñcano”ti. Gotamoti gottavasena parikittanaṃ, yaṃ “ādiccagotta”ntipi
tika-s0105t0:569_8: loke vadanti, sakyaputtoti pana jātivasena sākiyoti ca tasseva vevacanaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ pabbajjāsutte –
tika-s0105t0:571: Tamhā kulā pabbajitomhi, na kāme abhipatthaya”nti. ;
tika-s0105t0:572_0: Tathā cāha “gotamoti bhagavantaṃ gottavasena parikittetī”tiādi. Tattha gaṃ tāyatīti
tika-s0105t0:572_1: gottaṃ, “gotamo”ti pavattamānaṃ abhidhānaṃ, buddhiñca ekaṃsikavisayatāya rakkhatīti
tika-s0105t0:572_2: attho. Yathā hi buddhi ārammaṇabhūtena atthena vinā na vattati, evaṃ abhidhānaṃ abhidheyyabhūtena,
tika-s0105t0:572_3: tasmā so gottasaṅkhāto attho tāni rakkhatīti vuccati, go-saddo cettha abhidhāne,
tika-s0105t0:573: “Go goṇe cendriye bhumyaṃ, vacane ceva buddhiyaṃ;
tika-s0105t0:575: Tesu atthesu goṇe thī, pumā ca itare pumā”ti.
tika-s0105t0:576_0: Tattha “gosu duyhamānāsu gato, gopañcamo”tiādīsu gosaddo goṇe vattati. “Gocaro”tiādīsu
tika-s0105t0:576_1: indriye. “Gorakkha”ntiādīsu bhūmiyaṃ. Tathā hi suttanipātaṭṭhakathāya vāseṭṭhasuttasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ
tika-s0105t0:576_2: vuttaṃ “gorakkhanti khettarakkhaṃ, kasikammanti vuttaṃ hoti. Pathavī hi ‘go’ti vuccati,
tika-s0105t0:576_3: tappabhedo ca “khetta”nti. “Gottaṃ nāma dve gottāni hīnañca gottaṃ, ukkaṭṭhañca gotta”ntiādīsu
tika-s0105t0:576_4: vacane, buddhiyañca vattati. “Gogottaṃ gotamaṃ name”ti porāṇakaviracanāya ādicce,
tika-s0105t0:576_5: ādiccabandhuṃ gotamaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ namāmīti hi attho, “uṇhagū”tiādīsu rasmiyaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:576_6: uṇhā gāvo rasmiyo etassāti hi uṇhagu, sūriyo. “Gosītacandana”ntiādīsu pānīye, gosaṅkhātaṃ
tika-s0105t0:576_7: pānīyaṃ viya sītaṃ, tadeva candanaṃ tathā. Tasmiñhi uddhanato uddharitapakkuthitatelasmiṃ
tika-s0105t0:576_8: pakkhitte taṅkhaṇaññeva taṃ telaṃ sītalaṃ hotīti. Etesu pana atthesu goṇe vattamāno
tika-s0105t0:576_9: go-saddo yathārahaṃ itthiliṅgo ceva pulliṅgo ca, sesesu pana pulliṅgoyeva.
tika-s0105t0:577_0: Kiṃ panetaṃ gottaṃ nāmāti? Aññakulaparamparāya asādhāraṇaṃ tassa kulassa ādipurisasamudāgataṃ
tika-s0105t0:577_1: taṃkulapariyāpannasādhāraṇaṃ sāmaññarūpanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sādhāraṇameva hi idaṃ taṃkulapariyāpannānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:577_2: sādhāraṇato ca sāmaññarūpaṃ. Tathā hi taṃkule jātā suddhodanamahārājādayopi “gotamo”
tika-s0105t0:577_3: tveva vuccanti, teneva bhagavā attano pitaraṃ suddhodanamahārājānaṃ “atikkantavarā
tika-s0105t0:577_4: kho gotama tathāgatā”ti avoca, vessavaṇopi mahārājā bhagavantaṃ “vijjācaraṇasampannaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:577_5: buddhaṃ vandāma gotama”nti, āyasmāpi vaṅgīso āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ “sādhu nibbāpanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:577_6: brūhi, anukampāya gotamā”ti. Idha pana bhagavantameva. Tenāha “bhagavantaṃ gottavasena
tika-s0105t0:577_7: parikittetī”ti. Tasmāti yathāvuttamatthattayaṃ paccāmasati. Ettha ca “samaṇo”ti iminā
tika-s0105t0:578_0: Sakyassa suddhodanamahārājassa putto sakyaputto, iminā pana uccākulaparidīpanaṃ uditoditavipulakhattiyakulasambhūtatāparikittanato.
tika-s0105t0:581_1: pārijuññaṃ, parijiratīti vā parijiṇṇo, tassa bhāvo pārijuññaṃ, tena. Ñātipārijuññabhogapārijuññādinā
tika-s0105t0:581_2: kenaci pārijuññena parihāniyā anabhibhūto anajjhotthaṭo hutvā pabbajitoti attho.
tika-s0105t0:581_3: Tadeva pariyāyantarena vibhāvetuṃ “aparikkhīṇaṃyeva taṃ kulaṃ pahāyā”ti vuttaṃ. Aparikkhīṇanti
tika-s0105t0:581_4: hi ñātipārijuññabhogapārijuññādinā kenaci pārijuññena aparikkhayaṃ. Saddhāya pabbajitoti
tika-s0105t0:581_5: saddhāya eva pabbajito. Evañhi “kenacī”tiādinā nivattitavacanaṃ sūpapannaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t0:581_6: Nanu ca “sakyakulā pabbajito”ti idaṃ uccākulā pabbajitabhāvaparidīpanameva siyā tadatthasseva
tika-s0105t0:581_8: Na kho panevaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ mahantaṃ ñātiparivaṭṭaṃ, mahantañca bhogakkhandhaṃ pahāya
tika-s0105t0:581_9: saddhāpabbajitabhāvassa atthato siddhattā. Tathā hi lokanāthassa abhijātiyaṃ tassa
tika-s0105t0:581_10: kulassa na kiñci pārijuññaṃ, atha kho vuḍḍhiyeva, tato tassa samiddhatamabhāvo loke
tika-s0105t0:581_11: pākaṭo paññāto hoti, tasmā “sakyakulā pabbajito”ti ettakeyeva vutte tathā samiddhatamaṃ
tika-s0105t0:581_12: kulaṃ pahāya saddhāpabbajitabhāvo siddhoyevāti, imaṃ parihāraṃ “kenaci pārijuññenā”tiādinā
tika-s0105t0:581_13: vibhāvetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tato paranti “kosalesu cārikaṃ caramāno”tiādivacanaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:584_0: Viya sādhusaddo idha sundaratthoti āha “sundaraṃ kho panā”ti. Khoti avadhāraṇatthe
tika-s0105t0:584_1: nipāto, panāti pakkhantaratthe. Evaṃ sātthakatāviññāpanatthañhi saṃvaṇṇanāyametesaṃ
tika-s0105t0:584_2: gahaṇaṃ. Sundaranti ca bhaddakaṃ, bhaddakatā ca passantānaṃ hitasukhāvahabhāvenāti
tika-s0105t0:584_4: tividhaṃ hitaṃ sukhampi tatheva tividhaṃ sukhaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:585_0: Tathārūpānanti tādisānaṃ, ayaṃ saddato attho. Atthamattaṃ pana dassetuṃ “evarūpāna”nti
tika-s0105t0:585_1: vuttaṃ. Yādisehi ca guṇehi bhagavā samannāgato catuppamāṇikassa lokassa sabbakālampi-accantāya-saddhāya-pasādanīyo
tika-s0105t0:585_2: tesaṃ yathābhūtasabhāvattā, tādisehi guṇehi samannāgatabhāvaṃ sandhāya “tathārūpānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:585_4: parajanassa saddhaṃ paṭilabhantānanti vuttaṃ hoti. Laddhasaddānanti vā paṭiladdhakittisaddānaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:585_5: etena “arahata”nti padassa arahantānanti attho, arahantasamaññāya ca pākaṭabhāvo
tika-s0105t0:585_6: dassito, apica “yathārūpo so bhavaṃ gotamo”ti iminā “tathārūpāna”nti padassa aniyamavasena
tika-s0105t0:585_7: atthaṃ dassetvā sarūpaniyamavasenapi dassetuṃ “yathābhuccaguṇādhigamena loke arahantoti
tika-s0105t0:585_8: laddhasaddhāna”nti vuttaṃ, idampi hi “tathārūpāna”nti padasseva atthadassanaṃ, ayameva
tika-s0105t0:585_9: ca nayo ācariyehi adhippeto idha ṭīkāyaṃ, sāratthadīpaniyañca tatheva vuttattā. “Yathārūpā
tika-s0105t0:585_10: te bhavanto arahanto”ti avatvā “yathārūpo so bhavaṃ gotamo”ti vacanaṃ bhagavatiyeva
tika-s0105t0:585_12: Attani, garūsu ca hi bahuvacanaṃ icchanti saddavidū. “Yathābhucca…pe… arahata”nti
tika-s0105t0:585_13: iminā ca dhammappamāṇānaṃ, lūkhappamāṇānañca sattānaṃ bhagavato pasādāvahataṃ yathārutato
tika-s0105t0:585_14: dasseti arahantabhāvassa tesaññeva yathārahaṃ visayattā, taṃdassanena pana itaresampi
tika-s0105t0:586_0: Pasādasommānīti pasannāni, sītalāni ca, pasādavasena vā sītalāni, anena pasannamanataṃ
tika-s0105t0:586_1: dasseti. “Dassana”nti vuttepi taduttari kattabbatāsambhavato ayaṃ sambhāvanattho
tika-s0105t0:586_2: labbhatīti āha “dassanamattampi sādhu hotī”ti. Itarathā hi “dassanaññeva sādhu, na
tika-s0105t0:586_3: taduttari karaṇa”nti anadhippetattho āpajjati, sambhāvanattho cettha pi-saddo, api-saddo
tika-s0105t0:586_4: vā luttaniddiṭṭho. “Brahmacariyaṃ pakāsetī”ti ettha iti-saddo “abbhuggato”ti iminā
tika-s0105t0:586_5: sambandhamupagato, tasmā ayaṃ “sādhu hotī”ti idha iti-saddo “brāhmaṇo pokkharasātī
tika-s0105t0:586_6: ambaṭṭhaṃ māṇavaṃ āmantesī”ti iminā sambajjhitabbo, “ajjhāsayaṃ katvā”ti ca pāṭhaseso
tika-s0105t0:586_7: tadatthassa viññāyamānattā. Yassa hi attho viññāyati, saddo na payujjati, so “pāṭhaseso”ti
tika-s0105t0:586_8: vuccati, imamatthaṃ vibhāvento āha “dassanamattampi sādhu hotīti evaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ
tika-s0105t0:586_9: katvā”ti. Mūlapaṇṇāsake cūḷasīhanādasuttaṭṭhakathāya āgataṃ kosiyasakuṇavatthu cettha kathetabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:588_1: katvā voharanti yathā taṃ “puriso naro”ti dassetuṃ aggaññasuttapada mudāhaṭaṃ. Tattha
tika-s0105t0:588_2: imeti jhāyakanāmena samaññitā janā. Na jhāyantīti paṇṇakuṭīsu jhānaṃ na appenti na
tika-s0105t0:588_3: nipphādenti, gāmanigamasāmantaṃ osaritvā vedaganthe karontāva acchantīti attho. Taṃ
tika-s0105t0:588_4: panetesaṃ brāhmaṇajhāyakasaṅkhātaṃ paṭhamadutiyanāmaṃ upādāya tatiyameva jātanti
tika-s0105t0:588_5: āha “ajjhāyakātveva tatiyaṃ akkharaṃ upanibbatta”nti, akkharanti ca nirutti samaññā.
tika-s0105t0:588_6: Sā hi tasmiṃyeva niruḷhabhāvena aññattha asañcaraṇato “akkhara”nti vuccati. Mante
tika-s0105t0:588_7: parivattetīti vede sajjhāyati, pariyāpuṇātīti attho. Idha hi adhiāpubbai-saddavasena
tika-s0105t0:588_8: padasandhi, itarattha pana jhe-saddavasena. Mante dhāretīti yathāadhīte mante asammūḷhe
tika-s0105t0:589_1: vuttaṃ. Tattha iccante thomīyante devā etāyāti iru ica-dhātuvasena ca-kārassa ra-kāraṃ
tika-s0105t0:589_2: katvā, itthiliṅgoyaṃ. Yajjante pujjante devā anenāti yaju punnapuṃsakaliṅgavasena.
tika-s0105t0:589_3: Soyanti antaṃ karonti, sāyanti vā tanuṃ karonti pāpamanenāti sāmaṃ so-dhātupakkhe
tika-s0105t0:589_4: o-kārassa ā-kāraṃ katvā. Vidanti dhammaṃ, kammaṃ vā etehīti vedā, te eva mantā “sugatiyopi
tika-s0105t0:589_5: munanti, suyyanti ca etehī”ti katvā. Paharaṇaṃ saṅghaṭṭanaṃ pahataṃ, oṭṭhānaṃ pahataṃ
tika-s0105t0:589_6: tathā, tassa karaṇavasena, oṭṭhāni cāletvā paguṇabhāvakaraṇavasena pāraṃ gato, na
tika-s0105t0:589_7: atthavibhāvanavasenāti vuttaṃ hoti. Pāragūti ca niccasāpekkhatāya kitantasamāso.
tika-s0105t0:590_1: nighaṇṭu nāma rukkhaviseso, tadādikānamatthānanti attho, etena nighaṇṭurukkhapariyāyaṃ
tika-s0105t0:590_2: ādiṃ katvā tappamukhena sesapariyāyānaṃ tattha dassitattā so gantho nighaṇṭu nāma
tika-s0105t0:590_3: yathā taṃ “pārājikakaṇḍo, kusalattiko”ti ayamattho dassito iminā yathārutameva tadatthassa
tika-s0105t0:590_4: adhigatattā. Ācariyā pana evaṃ vadanti “vacanīyavācakabhāvena atthaṃ, saddañca nikhaḍati
tika-s0105t0:590_5: bhindati vibhajja dassetīti nikhaṇḍu, so eva kha-kārassa gha-kāraṃ katvā ‘nighaṇḍū’ti
tika-s0105t0:590_6: vutto”ti, tadetaṃ aṭṭhakathānayato aññanayadassananti gahetabbaṃ. Itarathā hi so
tika-s0105t0:590_7: aṭṭhakathāya virodho siyā, vicāretabbametaṃ. Akkharacintakā pana evamicchanti “tattha
tika-s0105t0:590_8: tatthāgatāni nāmāni nissesato ghaṭenti rāsiṃ karonti etthāti nighaṇṭu niggahitāgamenā”ti.
tika-s0105t0:590_11: tassa ganthassa pavattattā. Ko panesoti? Etarahi nāmaliṅgānusāsanaratanamālābhidhānappadīpikādi.
tika-s0105t0:590_12: Vacībhedādilakkhaṇā kiriyā kappīyati etenāti kiriyākappo, tatheva vividhaṃ kappīyati
tika-s0105t0:590_13: etenāti vikappo, kiriyākappo ca so vikappo cāti kiriyākappavikappo. So hi vaṇṇapadasambandhapadatthādivibhāgato
tika-s0105t0:590_14: bahuvikappoti katvā “kiriyākappavikappo”ti vuccati, so ca ganthavisesoyevāti vuttaṃ
tika-s0105t0:590_16: upakārāvaho ganthoti attho. Ko panesoti? Kabyabandhanavidhividhāyako kabyālaṅkāragītāsubodhālaṅkārādi.
tika-s0105t0:590_17: Idaṃ pana mūlakiriyākappaganthaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. So hi mahāvisayo satasahassagāthāparimāṇo,
tika-s0105t0:590_18: yaṃ “nayacariyādipakaraṇa”ntipi vadanti. Vacanatthato pana kiṭayati gameti ñāpeti
tika-s0105t0:590_19: kiriyādivibhāganti keṭubhaṃ kiṭa-dhātuto abhapaccayavasena, a-kārassa ca ukāro. Atha
tika-s0105t0:590_20: vā kiriyādivibhāgaṃ anavasesapariyādānato kiṭento gamanto obheti pūretīti keṭubhaṃ
tika-s0105t0:590_21: kiṭa-saddūpapadaubhadhātuvasena. Apica kiṭanti gacchanti kavayo bandhesu kosallametenāti
tika-s0105t0:590_23: ca akkharā pabhedīyanti etenāti akkharappabhedo, taṃ pana chasu vedaṅgesu pariyāpannaṃ
tika-s0105t0:590_24: pakaraṇadvayamevāti vuttaṃ “sikkhā ca nirutti cā”ti. Tattha sikkhanti akkharasamayametāyāti
tika-s0105t0:595_0: Idha pana tabbasena anekadhā nibbacanaparidīpakaṃ satthaṃ uttarapadalopena “niruttī”ti
tika-s0105t0:595_1: adhippetaṃ nibbacanavibhāgatopi akkharapabhedabhāvassa ācariyehi vuttattā, tamantarena
tika-s0105t0:595_2: nibbacanavibhāgassa ca byākaraṇaṅgena saṅgahitattā. Byākaraṇaṃ, nirutti ca hi paccekameva vedaṅgaṃ yathāhu –
tika-s0105t0:598_0: Tasmā byākaraṇaṅgena asaṅkarabhūtameva niruttinayena nibbacanamidhādhippetaṃ, na
tika-s0105t0:598_1: chasu byañjanapadesu viya tadubhayasādhāraṇanibbacanaṃ vedaṅgavisayattāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:598_2: Ayaṃ panettha mahāniddesaṭṭhakathāya āgataniruttinayavinicchayo. Tattha hi “nakkhattarājāriva
tika-s0105t0:598_3: tārakāna”nti ettha ra-kārāgamo viya avijjamānassa akkharassa āgamo vaṇṇāgamo nāma.
tika-s0105t0:598_4: Hiṃsanattā “hiṃso”ti vattabbe “sīho”ti parivattanaṃ viya vijjamānānamakkharānaṃ heṭṭhupariyavasena
tika-s0105t0:598_5: parivattanaṃ vaṇṇavipariyāyo nāma. “Navachannakedāni diyyatī”ti ettha a-kārassa e-kārāpajjanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:598_6: viya aññakkharassa aññakkharāpajjanaṃ vaṇṇavikāro nāma. “Jīvanassa mūto jīvanamūto”ti
tika-s0105t0:598_7: vattabbe “jīmūto”ti va-kāra na-kārānaṃ vināso viya vijjamānakkharānaṃ vināso vaṇṇavināso
tika-s0105t0:598_8: nāma. “Pharusāhi vācāhi pakubbamāno, āsajja maṃ tvaṃ vadase kumārā”ti ettha “pakubbamāno”ti
tika-s0105t0:598_9: padassa abhibhavamānoti atthapaṭipādanaṃ viya tattha tattha yathāyogaṃ visesatthapaṭipādanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:599_0: Yathāvuttappabhedānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ ayaṃ catutthoyeva siyā, atha kena saddhiṃ pañcamoti
tika-s0105t0:599_1: āha “āthabbaṇavedaṃ catutthaṃ katvā”ti. Āthabbaṇavedo nāma āthabbaṇavedikehi vihito
tika-s0105t0:599_2: parūpaghātakaro manto, so pana itihāsapañcamabhāvappakāsanatthaṃ gaṇitatāmattena
tika-s0105t0:599_3: gahito, na sarūpavasena, evañca katvā “etesa”nti padassa tesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vedānantveva
tika-s0105t0:599_4: attho gahetabbo. Tañhi “tiṇṇaṃ vedāna”nti etassa visesananti. Itiha asāti evaṃ idha
tika-s0105t0:599_5: loke ahosi “āsā”tipi katthaci pāṭho, soyevattho. Iha ṭhāne iti evaṃ, idaṃ vā kammaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:599_6: vatthuṃ vā āsa icchāhītipi attho. Tassa ganthassa mahāvisayatādīpanatthañcettha vicchāvacanaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:599_7: iminā “itihāsā”ti vacanena paṭisaṃyutto itihāso taddhitavasenāti atthaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0105t0:599_8: Itiha āsa, itiha āsā”ti īdisavacanapaṭisaṃyutto itihāso niruttinayenāti atthadassanantipi
tika-s0105t0:599_9: vadanti. Akkharacintakā pana evamicchanti “itiha-saddo pārampariyopadese ekova nipāto,
tika-s0105t0:599_10: asati vijjatīti aso, itiha aso etasminti itihāso samāsavasenā”ti, tesaṃ mate “itiha
tika-s0105t0:599_11: asā”ti ettha evaṃ pārampariyopadeso asa vijjamāno ahosīti attho. “Purāṇakathāsaṅkhāto”ti
tika-s0105t0:599_12: iminā tassa ganthavisesabhāvamāha, bhāratanāmakānaṃ dvebhātikarājūnaṃ yuddhakathā,
tika-s0105t0:599_14: itihāso nāmāti vuttaṃ hoti. “Tesaṃ itihāsapañcamānaṃ vedāna”nti iminā yathāvākyaṃ
tika-s0105t0:600_0: Pajjati attho etenāti padaṃ, nāmākhyātopasagganipātādivasena anekavibhāgaṃ vibhattiyantapadaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:600_1: Tadapi byākaraṇe āgatamevāti vuttaṃ “tadavasesa”nti, padato avasesaṃ pakatipaccayādisaddalakkhaṇabhūtanti
tika-s0105t0:600_2: attho. Taṃ taṃ saddaṃ, tadatthañca byākaroti byācikkhati etenāti byākaraṇaṃ, visesena
tika-s0105t0:600_3: vā ākarīyante pakatipaccayādayo abhinipphādīyante ettha, anenāti vā byākaraṇaṃ, sādhusaddānamanvākhyāyakaṃ
tika-s0105t0:600_5: vijjamānasatthaṃ. Adhīyatīti ajjhāyati. Vedetīti paresaṃ vāceti. Ca-saddo atthadvayasamuccinanattho,
tika-s0105t0:600_6: vikappanattho vā atthantarassa vikappitattā. Vicitrā hi taddhitavutti. Padakoti byākaraṇesu
tika-s0105t0:600_8: imassatthassa viññāpanatthaṃ padadvayassa ekato atthavacanaṃ. Esā hi ācariyānaṃ pakati,
tika-s0105t0:600_9: yadidaṃ yena kenaci pakārena atthantaraviññāpanaṃ. Ayaṃ aṭṭhakathāto aparo nayo –
tika-s0105t0:600_10: te eva vede padaso kāyatīti padakoti. Tattha padasoti gajjabandhapajjabandhapadena.
tika-s0105t0:600_11: Kāyatīti katheti yathā “jātaka”nti, iminā vedakārakasamatthataṃ dasseti. Evañhi “ajjhāyako”tiādīhi
tika-s0105t0:601_0: Āyatiṃ hitaṃ bālajanasaṅkhāto loko na yatati na īhati anenāti lokāyataṃ. Tañhi ganthaṃ
tika-s0105t0:601_1: nissāya sattā puññakiriyāya cittampi na uppādenti, lokā vā bālajanā āyatanti ussahanti
tika-s0105t0:601_2: vādassādena etthāti lokāyataṃ. Aññamaññaviruddhaṃ, saggamokkhaviruddhaṃ vā tanonti
tika-s0105t0:601_3: etthāti vitaṇḍo ḍa-paccayavasena, na-kārassa ca ṇa-kāraṃ katvā, viruddhena vādadaṇḍena
tika-s0105t0:601_4: tāḷenti vādino etthāti vitaṇḍo taḍi-dhātuvasena, niggahītāgamañca katvā. Adesampi
tika-s0105t0:601_5: yaṃ nissāya vādīnaṃ vādo pavatto, taṃ tesaṃ desatopi upacāravasena vuccati yathā
tika-s0105t0:601_6: “cakkhuṃ loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ, etthesā taṇhā pahīyamānā pahīyati, ettha nirujjhamānā
tika-s0105t0:601_7: nirujjhatī”ti, visesena vā paṇḍitānaṃ manaṃ taḍenti cālenti etenāti vitaṇḍo, taṃ
tika-s0105t0:601_8: vadanti, so vādo vā etesanti vitaṇḍavādā, tesaṃ satthaṃ tathā. Lakkhaṇadīpakasatthaṃ
tika-s0105t0:601_10: Lakkhīyati buddhabhāvādi anenāti lakkhaṇaṃ, nigrodhabimbatādi. Tenāha “yesaṃ vasenā”tiādi.
tika-s0105t0:603: Gāthā cekā mato gantho, gantho bāttiṃsatakkharo”ti.
tika-s0105t0:604_1: ādhāre cetaṃ bhummaṃ yathā “rukkhe sākhā”ti. Soḷasa ca sahassañca soḷasasahassaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:604_2: soḷasādhikasahassagāthāparimāṇāti attho. Evañhi ādhārādheyyavacanaṃ sūpapannaṃ hotīti.
tika-s0105t0:604_3: Padhānavasena buddhānaṃ lakkhaṇadīpanato buddhamantā nāma. Paccekabuddhādīnampi hi
tika-s0105t0:604_4: lakkhaṇaṃ tattha dīpitameva. Tena vuttaṃ “yesaṃ vasenā”tiādi.
tika-s0105t0:605_0: “Anūno paripūrakārī”ti atthamattadassanaṃ, saddato pana adhigatamatthaṃ dassetuṃ
tika-s0105t0:605_1: “avayo na hotī”ti vuttaṃ. Ko panesa avayoti anuyogamapaneti “avayo nāmā”tiādinā.
tika-s0105t0:605_2: Ayamettādhippāyo – yo tāni sandhāretuṃ sakkoti, so “vayo”ti vuccati. Yo pana na sakkoti,
tika-s0105t0:605_3: so avayo nāma. Yo ca avayo na hoti, so “dve paṭisedhā pakatiyatthagamakā”ti ñāyena
tika-s0105t0:605_4: vayo evāti. Vayatīti hi vayo, ādimajjhapariyosānesu katthacipi aparikilamanto avitthāyanto
tika-s0105t0:605_5: te ganthe santāne paṇeti byavaharatīti attho. Ayaṃ pana vinayaṭṭhakathānayo – anavayoti
tika-s0105t0:605_6: anu avayo, sandhivasena u-kāralopo, anu anu avayo anūno, paripuṇṇasippoti attho.
tika-s0105t0:605_7: Vayoti hi hāni “āyavayo”tiādīsu viya, natthi etassa yathāvuttaganthesu vayo ūnatāti
tika-s0105t0:606_1: atthaṃ dassento “ācariyenā”tiādimāha. Assāti ambaṭṭhassa. Pāḷiyaṃ “yamahaṃ jānāmi,
tika-s0105t0:606_2: taṃ tvaṃ jānāsī”ti idaṃ anujānanākāradassanaṃ, “yaṃ tvaṃ jānāsi, tamahaṃ jānāmī”ti
tika-s0105t0:606_3: idaṃ pana paṭijānanākāradassananti dasseti “yaṃ aha”ntiādinā. “Āma ācariyā”ti hi
tika-s0105t0:606_4: yathāgataṃ paṭijānanavacanameva atthavasena vuttaṃ. Yanti tevijjakaṃ pāvacanaṃ. Tassāti
tika-s0105t0:606_5: ācariyassa. Paṭivacanadānameva paṭiññā tathā, tāya sayameva paṭiññātoti attho. “Sake”tiādi
tika-s0105t0:606_7: Sassa attano santakaṃ sakaṃ. Ācariyānaṃ paramparato, paramparabhūtehi vā ācariyehi
tika-s0105t0:606_8: āgataṃ ācariyakaṃ. Tisso vijjā, tāsaṃ samūho tevijjakaṃ, vedattayaṃ. Padhānaṃ vacanaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:607_0: 257. Idāni yenādhippāyena brāhmaṇo pokkharasātī ambaṭṭhaṃ māṇavaṃ āmantetvā “ayaṃ
tika-s0105t0:607_1: tātā”tiādivacanamabrvi, tadadhippāyaṃ vibhāvento “esa kirā”tiādimāha. Tattha uggatassāti
tika-s0105t0:607_2: pubbe pākaṭassa kittimato porāṇajanassa. Bahū janāti pūraṇakassapādayo sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:607_3: Ekaccanti khattiyādijātimantaṃ, lokasammataṃ vā janaṃ. Garūti bhāriyaṃ, attānaṃ tato
tika-s0105t0:607_4: mocetvā apagamanamattampi dukkaraṃ hoti, pageva taduttari karaṇanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t0:608_1: “Taṃ bhavantaṃ, tathā santaṃyevā”ti padesupi tassa anupayogattā tadatthavasenevāti
tika-s0105t0:608_2: dasseti “tassa bhoto”tiādinā. Tenāha “idhāpī”tiādi. Tathā satoyevāti yenākārena arahatādinā
tika-s0105t0:608_3: saddo abbhuggato, tenākārena santassa bhūtassa eva tassa bhavato gotamassa saddo
tika-s0105t0:608_4: yadi vā abbhuggatoti attho. Apica taṃ bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ tathā santaṃyevāti ekassapi
tika-s0105t0:608_5: atthassa dvikkhattuṃ sambandhabhāvena vacanaṃ sāmaññavisiṭṭhatāparikappanena atthavisesaviññāpanatthaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:608_6: tasmā “tassa bhoto gotamassā”ti sāmaññasambandhabhāvena vicchinditvā “tathā satoyevā”ti
tika-s0105t0:608_7: visesasambandhabhāvena yojetabbaṃ. Yadi-saddo cettha saṃsayattho dvinnampi atthānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:608_8: saṃsayitabbattā. Vā-saddo ca vikappanattho tesu ekassa vikappetabbattā. Saddavidū
tika-s0105t0:608_9: pana evaṃ vadanti – “imassa vacanaṃ saccaṃ vā yadi vā musā”tiādīsu viya yadi-saddo
tika-s0105t0:608_10: vā-saddo ca ubhopi vikappatthāyeva. Yadi-saddopi hi “yaṃ yadeva parisaṃ upasaṅkamati
tika-s0105t0:608_11: yadi khattiyaparisaṃ yadi brāhmaṇaparisa”ntiādīsu vā-saddattho dissati. “Appaṃ vassasataṃ
tika-s0105t0:608_12: āyu, idānetarahi vijjatī”tiādīsu viya ca idha samānatthasaddapayogoti. Pāḷiyaṃ “yadi
tika-s0105t0:608_13: vā no tathā”ti idampi “santaṃyeva saddo abbhuggato”ti iminā sambajjhitvā yathāvuttanayeneva
tika-s0105t0:608_14: yojetabbaṃ. Nanu “gotama”nti padeyeva upayogavacanaṃ siyā, na etthāti codanāya “idhāpī”tiādi
tika-s0105t0:608_15: vuttaṃ, tassa anupayogattā, vicchinditvā sambandhavisesabhāvena yojetabbattā vā idhāpi
tika-s0105t0:608_16: itthambhūtākhyānatthavaseneva upayogavacanaṃ nāmāti vuttaṃ hoti. Itthambhūtākhyānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:608_17: attho yassa tathā, abhisaddo, itthambhūtākhyānameva vā attho tathā, soyevattho. Yadaggena
tika-s0105t0:609_0: 258. Bhoti attano ācariyaṃ ālapati. Yathā-saddaṃ sātthakaṃ katvā saha pāṭhasesena
tika-s0105t0:609_1: yojetuṃ “yathā sakkā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Soti bhagavā. Purimanaye ākāratthajotanayathā-saddayogyato
tika-s0105t0:609_2: kathanti pucchāmattaṃ, idha pana tadayogyato “ākārapucchā”ti vuttaṃ. Bāhirakasamaye
tika-s0105t0:609_3: ācariyamhi upajjhāyasamudācāroti āha “atha naṃ upajjhāyo”ti, upajjhāyasaññito ācariyabrāhmaṇoti attho.
tika-s0105t0:610_0: Kāmañca manto, brahmaṃ, kappoti tibbidho vedo, tathāpi aṭṭhakādi vuttaṃ padhānabhūtaṃ
tika-s0105t0:610_1: mūlaṃ manto, tadatthavivaraṇamatthaṃ brahmaṃ, tattha vuttanayena yaññakiriyāvidhānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:610_2: kappoti mantasseva padhānabhāvato, itaresañca tannissayeneva jātattā mantaggahaṇena
tika-s0105t0:610_3: brahmakappānampi gahaṇaṃ siddhamevāti dasseti “tīsu vedesū”ti iminā. Mantoti hi aṭṭhakādīhi
tika-s0105t0:610_4: isīhi vuttamūlavedasseva nāmaṃ, vedoti sabbassa, tasmā “vedesū”ti vutte sabbesampi
tika-s0105t0:610_5: gahaṇaṃ sijjhatīti veditabbaṃ. Lakkhaṇānīti lakkhaṇadīpakāni mantapadāni. Pajjagajjabandhapavesanavasena
tika-s0105t0:610_7: Mahesakkhā sattāti mahāpuññavanto paṇḍitasattā. Jānissanti iti manasi katvā vācentīti
tika-s0105t0:610_8: sambandho. Tenāti tathā vācanato. Pubbeti “tathāgato uppajjissatī”ti vattabbakālato
tika-s0105t0:610_9: pabhuti tathāgatassa dharamānakāle. Ajjhāyitabbavācetabbabhāvena āgacchanti pākaṭā
tika-s0105t0:610_10: bhavanti. Ekagāthādvigāthādivasena anukkamena antaradhāyanti. Na kevalaṃ lakkhaṇamantāyeva,
tika-s0105t0:610_11: atha kho aññepi vedā brāhmaṇānaṃ aññāṇabhāvena anukkamena antaradhāyanti evāti ācariyena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:611_0: Buddhabhāvapatthanā paṇidhi, pāramīsambharaṇaṃ samādānaṃ, kammassakatādipaññā ñāṇaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:611_2: vuttaṃ. Evañca sati karuṇā ādi yesaṃ saddhāsīlādīnaṃ te karuṇādayo, te eva guṇā karuṇādiguṇā,
tika-s0105t0:611_3: paṇidhi ca samādānañca ñāṇañca karuṇādiguṇā ca, tehi mahanto paṇidhisamādānañāṇakaruṇādiguṇamahantoti
tika-s0105t0:611_4: nibbacanaṃ kātabbaṃ. Evañhi dvandatoparattā mahantasaddo paccekaṃ yojīyatīti. Apica
tika-s0105t0:611_5: paṇidhi ca samādānañca ñāṇañca karuṇā ca, tamādi yesaṃ te tathā, teyeva guṇā, tehi
tika-s0105t0:611_6: mahantoti nibbacanenapi attho sūpapanno hoti, paṇidhimahantatādi cassa buddhavaṃsa
tika-s0105t0:611_8: jātigottakulapadesādivasena mahantassa purisassā”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha “khattiyo, brāhmaṇo”ti
tika-s0105t0:611_9: evamādi jāti. “Koṇḍañño, gotamo”ti evamādi gottaṃ. “Poṇikā, cikkhallikā, sākiyā,
tika-s0105t0:611_10: koliyā”ti evamādi kulapadeso, tadetaṃ sabbampi idha ādisaddena saṅgahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:611_11: Evañhi sati “dveyeva gatiyo bhavantī”ti ubhinnaṃ sādhāraṇavacanaṃ samatthitaṃ hotīti.
tika-s0105t0:612_0: Niṭṭhāti nipphattiyo siddhiyo. Nanvāyaṃ gati-saddo anekattho, kasmā niṭṭhāyameva
tika-s0105t0:612_1: vuttoti āha“kāmañcāya”ntiādi. Bhavabhedeti nirayādibhavavisese. So hi sucaritaduccaritakammena
tika-s0105t0:612_2: sattehi upapajjanavasena gantabbāti gati. Gacchati pavattati etthāti gati, nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:612_3: Gamati yathāsabhāvaṃ jānātīti gati. Paññā, gamanaṃ byāpanaṃ gati, vissaṭabhāvo, so
tika-s0105t0:612_4: pana ito ca etto ca byāpetvā ṭhitatāva. Gamanaṃ nipphattanaṃ gati, niṭṭhā, ajjhāsayapaṭisaraṇatthāpi
tika-s0105t0:612_5: nidassananayena gahitā. Tathā hesa “imesaṃ kho ahaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sīlavantānaṃ kalyāṇadhammānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:612_6: neva jānāmi āgatiṃ vā gatiṃ vā”ti ettha ajjhāsaye vattati, “nibbānaṃ arahato gatī”ti
tika-s0105t0:612_7: ettha paṭisaraṇe, parāyaṇe apassayeti attho. Gacchati yathāruci pavattatīti gati,
tika-s0105t0:612_8: ajjhāsayo. Gacchati avacarati, avacaraṇavasena vā pavattati etthāti gati, paṭisaraṇaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:612_9: Sabbasaṅkhatavisaññuttassa hi arahato nibbānameva paṭisaraṇaṃ, idha pana niṭṭhāyaṃ
tika-s0105t0:613_0: Nanu dvinnaṃ nipphattīnaṃ nimittabhūtāni lakkhaṇāni visadisāneva, atha kasmā “yehi
tika-s0105t0:613_1: samannāgatassā”tiādinā tesaṃ sadisabhāvo vuttoti codanālesaṃ dassetvā sodhento “tattha
tika-s0105t0:613_2: kiñcāpī”tiādimāha. Samānepi nigrodhabimbatādilakkhaṇabhāve attheva koci nesaṃ visesoti
tika-s0105t0:613_3: dassetuṃ “na teheva buddho hotī”ti vuttaṃ. “Yathā hi buddhānaṃ lakkhaṇāni suvisadāni,
tika-s0105t0:613_4: suparibyattāni, paripuṇṇāni ca honti, na evaṃ cakkavattīna”nti ayaṃ pana viseso ācariyadhammapālattherena
tika-s0105t0:613_5: pakāsito. Jāyanti bhinnesupi atthesu abhinnadhīsaddā etāyāti jāti, lakkhaṇabhāvamattaṃ. Vuttañhi –
tika-s0105t0:616_0: Tasmā lakkhaṇatāmattena samānabhāvato visadisānipi tāniyeva cakkavattinipphattinimittabhūtāni
tika-s0105t0:616_1: lakkhaṇāni sadisāni viya katvā tāni buddhanipphattinimittabhūtāni lakkhaṇāni nāmāti
tika-s0105t0:616_2: idaṃ vacanaṃ vuccatīti attho. Adhiāpubbavasayoge bhummatthe upayogavacananti āha
tika-s0105t0:616_3: “agāre vasatī”ti catūhi acchariyadhammehīti abhirūpatā, dīghāyukatā, appābādhatā,
tika-s0105t0:616_4: brāhmaṇagahapatikānaṃ piyamanāpatāti imehi catūhi acchariyasabhāvabhūtāhi iddhīhi. Yathāha –
tika-s0105t0:617: “Rājā ānanda, mahāsudassano catūhi iddhīhi samannāgato ahosi. Katamāhi catūhi iddhīhi? Idhānanda, rājā mahāsudassano abhirūpo ahosi dassanīyo pāsādiko”tiādi.
tika-s0105t0:618_0: Cetiyajātake āgatanayaṃ gahetvāpi evaṃ vadanti “sarīrato candanagandho vāyati, ayaṃ
tika-s0105t0:618_1: ekā iddhi. Mukhato uppalagandho vāyati, ayaṃ dutiyā. Cattāro devaputtā catūsu disāsu
tika-s0105t0:618_2: sabbakālaṃ khaggahatthā ārakkhaṃ gaṇhanti, ayaṃ tatiyā. Ākāsena vicarati, ayaṃ catutthī”ti.
tika-s0105t0:618_3: Anāgatavaṃsasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ pana “abhirūpabhāvo ekā iddhi, samavepākiniyā gahaṇiyā
tika-s0105t0:618_4: samannāgatabhāvo dutiyā, yāvatāyukampi sakalalokassa dassanātittikabhāvo tatiyā,
tika-s0105t0:618_5: ākāsacāribhāvo catutthī”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha samavepākiniyā gahaṇiyā samannāgatabhāvoti
tika-s0105t0:618_6: samavipācaniyā kammajatejodhātuyā sampannatā. Yassa hi bhuttamattova āhāro jīrati,
tika-s0105t0:618_7: yassa vā pana puṭabhattaṃ viya tatheva tiṭṭhati, ubhopete na samavepākiniyā samannāgatā.
tika-s0105t0:618_8: Yassa pana puna bhattakāle bhattacchando uppajjateva, ayaṃ samavepākiniyā samannāgato
tika-s0105t0:618_9: nāma, tathārūpatāti attho. Saṅgahavatthūhīti dānaṃ, piyavacanaṃ, atthacariyā, samānattatāti
tika-s0105t0:620: Samānattatā ca dhammesu, tattha tattha yathārahaṃ;
tika-s0105t0:621: Ete kho saṅgahā loke, rathassāṇīva yāyato.
tika-s0105t0:622: Ete ca saṅgahā nāssu, na mātā puttakāraṇā;
tika-s0105t0:623: Labhetha mānaṃ pūjaṃ vā, pitā vā puttakāraṇā.
tika-s0105t0:624: Yasmā ca saṅgahā ete, samapekkhanti paṇḍitā;
tika-s0105t0:625: Tasmā mahattaṃ papponti, pāsaṃsā ca bhavanti te”ti. ;
tika-s0105t0:626_0: Rañjanatoti pītisomanassavasena rañjanato, na rāgavasena, pītisomanassānaṃ jananatoti
tika-s0105t0:626_1: vuttaṃ hoti. Catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi rañjanaṭṭhena rājāti pana sabbesaṃ rājūnaṃ samaññā
tika-s0105t0:626_2: tathā akarontānampi vilīvabījanādīsu tālavaṇṭavohāro viya ruḷhivasena pavattito,
tika-s0105t0:627_0: Saddasāmatthiyato anekadhā cakkavattīsaddassa vacanatthaṃ dassento padhānabhūtaṃ
tika-s0105t0:627_1: vacanatthaṃ paṭhamaṃ dassetuṃ “cakkaratana”ntiādimāha. Idameva hi padhānaṃ cakkaratanassa
tika-s0105t0:627_2: pavattanamantarena cakkavattibhāvānāpattito. Tathā hi aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ “kittāvatā
tika-s0105t0:627_3: cakkavattī hotīti? Ekaṅguladvaṅgulamattampi cakkaratane ākāsaṃ abbhuggantvā pavatte”ti.
tika-s0105t0:627_4: Yasmā pana rājā cakkavattī ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā vāmahatthena hatthisoṇḍasadisapanāḷiṃ
tika-s0105t0:627_5: suvaṇṇabhiṅkāraṃ ukkhipitvā dakkhiṇahatthena cakkaratanaṃ udakena abbhukkiritvā “pavattatu
tika-s0105t0:627_6: bhavaṃ cakkaratanaṃ, abhivijinātu bhavaṃ cakkaratana”nti vacanena cakkaratanaṃ vehāsaṃ
tika-s0105t0:627_7: abbhuggantvā pavattesi, tasmā tādisaṃ pavattāpanaṃ sandhāya “cakkaratanaṃ vattetī”ti
tika-s0105t0:627_8: vuttaṃ. Yathāha “atha kho ānanda rājā mahāsudassano uṭṭhāyāsanā…pe… cakkaratanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:627_9: abbhukkiri ‘pavattatu bhavaṃ cakkaratana’nti”ādi. Na kevalañca cakkasaddo cakkarataneyeva
tika-s0105t0:627_10: vattati atha kho sampatticakkādīsupi, tasmā taṃtadatthavācakasaddasāmatthiyatopi
tika-s0105t0:631_0: Vuttehi patirūpadesavāsādisampatticakkehi. Vattatīti pavattati sampajjati, uparūpari
tika-s0105t0:631_1: kusaladhammaṃ vā paṭipajjati. Tehīti sampatticakkehi. Paranti sattanikāyaṃ, yathā
tika-s0105t0:631_2: sayaṃsaddo suddhakattutthassa jotako, tathā paraṃsaddopi hetukattutthassāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:631_3: Vattetīti pavatteti sampādeti, uparūpari kusaladhammaṃ vā paṭipajjāpeti. Yathāha –
tika-s0105t0:632_0: “Rājā mahāsudassano evamāha ‘pāṇo na hantabbo, adinnaṃ na ādātabbaṃ, kāmesu micchā
tika-s0105t0:632_1: na caritabbā, musā na bhaṇitabbā, majjaṃ na pātabbaṃ, yathābhuttañca bhuñjathā’ti.
tika-s0105t0:632_2: Ye kho panānanda puratthimāya disāya paṭirājāno, te rañño mahāsudassanassa anuyantā ahesu”ntiādi.
tika-s0105t0:633: Iriyāpathacakkānanti iriyāpathabhūtānaṃ cakkānaṃ. Iriyāpathopi hi “cakka”nti vuccati “catucakkaṃ navadvāra”ntiādīsu. Yathāha –
tika-s0105t0:637: Vattoti pavattanaṃ uppajjanaṃ, imināva iriyāpathacakkaṃ vatteti parahitāya uppādetīti nibbacanampi dasseti atthato samānattā. Tathā cāha –
tika-s0105t0:638_0: “Atha kho taṃ ānanda cakkaratanaṃ puratthimaṃ disaṃ pavatti, anvadeva rājā mahāsudassano
tika-s0105t0:638_1: saddhiṃ caturaṅginiyā senāya. Yasmiṃ kho panānanda, padese cakkaratanaṃ patiṭṭhāsi,
tika-s0105t0:638_2: tattha rājā mahāsudassano vāsaṃ upagacchi saddhiṃ caturaṅginiyā senāyā”tiādi.
tika-s0105t0:639: Ayaṃ aṭṭhakathāto aparo nayo – appaṭihataṃ āṇāsaṅkhātaṃ cakkaṃ vattetīti cakkavattī. Tathā hi vuttaṃ –
tika-s0105t0:640_0: “Pañcahi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato rājā cakkavattī dhammeneva cakkaṃ vatteti,
tika-s0105t0:640_1: taṃ hoti cakkaṃ appaṭivattiyaṃ kenaci manussabhūtena paccatthikena pāṇinā. Katamehi
tika-s0105t0:640_2: pañcahi? Idha bhikkhave rājā cakkavattī atthaññū ca hoti, dhammaññū ca mattaññū,
tika-s0105t0:640_3: ca kālaññū ca parisaññū ca. Imehi kho…pe… pāṇinā”tiādi.
tika-s0105t0:641_0: Khattiyamaṇḍalādisaññitaṃ cakkaṃ samūhaṃ attano vase vatteti anuvattetītipi cakkavattī.
tika-s0105t0:641_1: Vuttañhi “ye kho panānanda puratthimāya disāya paṭirājāno, te rañño mahāsudassanassa
tika-s0105t0:641_2: anuyantā ahesu”ntiādi. Cakkalakkhaṇaṃ vattati etassātipi cakkavattī. Tenāha “imassa
tika-s0105t0:641_3: deva kumārassa heṭṭhā pādatalesu cakkāni jātāni sahassārāni sanemikāni sanābhikāni
tika-s0105t0:641_4: sabbākāraparipūrānī”tiādi. Cakkaṃ mahantaṃ kāyabalaṃ vattati etassātipi cakkavattī.
tika-s0105t0:641_5: Vuttañhetaṃ “ayañhi deva kumāro sattussado…pe… ayañhi deva kumāro sīhapubbaddhakāyo”tiādi.
tika-s0105t0:641_6: Tena hissa lakkhaṇena mahabbalabhāvo viññāyati. Cakkaṃ dasavidhaṃ, dvādasavidhaṃ
tika-s0105t0:641_7: vā vattadhammaṃ vattati paṭipajjatīti cakkavattī. Tena vuttaṃ “na hi te tāta dibbaṃ
tika-s0105t0:641_8: cakkaratanaṃ pettikaṃ dāyajjaṃ, iṅgha tvaṃ tāta ariye cakkavattivatte vattāhī”tiādi.
tika-s0105t0:641_9: Cakkaṃ mahantaṃ dānaṃ vatteti pavattetītipi cakkavattī. Vuttañca –
tika-s0105t0:642_0: “Paṭṭhapesi kho ānanda rājā mahāsudassano tāsaṃ pokkharaṇīnaṃ tīre evarūpaṃ dānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:642_1: annaṃ annatthikassa, pānaṃ pānatthikassa, vatthaṃ vatthatthikassa, yānaṃ yānatthikassa,
tika-s0105t0:642_2: sayanaṃ sayanatthikassa, itthiṃ itthitthikassa, hiraññaṃ hiraññatthikassa, suvaṇṇaṃ
tika-s0105t0:643_0: Rājāti sāmaññaṃ tadaññasādhāraṇato. Cakkavattīti visesaṃ anaññasādhāraṇato. Dhammasaddo
tika-s0105t0:643_1: ñāye, samo eva ca ñāyo nāmāti āha “ñāyena samenā”ti. Vattati uppajjati, paṭipajjatīti
tika-s0105t0:643_2: vā attho. “Idaṃ nāma caratī”ti avuttepi sāmaññajotanāya visese avaṭṭhānato, visesatthinā
tika-s0105t0:643_3: ca visesassa payujjitabbattā “sadatthaparatthe”ti yojīyati. Padesaggahaṇe hi asati
tika-s0105t0:643_4: gahetabbassa nippadesatā viññāyati yathā “dikkhito na dadātī”ti. Yasmā cakkavattirājā
tika-s0105t0:643_5: dhammeneva rajjamadhigacchati, na adhammena parūpaghātādinā. Tasmā vuttaṃ “dhammena
tika-s0105t0:643_6: rajjaṃ labhitvā”tiādi, dhammenāti ca ñāyena, kusaladhammena vā. Rañño bhāvo rajjaṃ, issariyaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:644_0: Paresaṃ hitopāyabhūtaṃ dhammaṃ karoti, caratīti vā dhammiko. Attano hitopāyabhūtassa
tika-s0105t0:644_1: dhammassa kārako, carako vā rājāti dhammarājāti imaṃ savisesaṃ atthaṃ dasseti “parahitadhammakaraṇena
tika-s0105t0:644_2: vā”tiādinā. Ayaṃ pana mahāpadānaṭṭhakathānayo – dasavidhe kusaladhamme, agatirahite
tika-s0105t0:644_3: vā rājadhamme niyuttoti dhammiko; teneva dhammena lokaṃ rañjetīti dhammarājā. Pariyāyavacanameva
tika-s0105t0:644_4: hi idaṃ padadvayanti. Ācariyena pana evaṃ vuttaṃ “cakkavattivattasaṅkhātaṃ dhammaṃ
tika-s0105t0:644_5: carati, cakkavattivattasaṅkhāto vā dhammo etassa, etasmiṃ vā atthīti dhammiko, dhammato
tika-s0105t0:644_6: anapetattā dhammo ca so rañjanaṭṭhena rājā cāti dhammarājā”ti. “Rājā hoti cakkavattī”ti
tika-s0105t0:644_8: Cattāro samuddā antā pariyosānā etissāti cāturantā, pathavī. Sā hi catūsu disāsu
tika-s0105t0:644_10: antāyā”ti, sā pana avayavabhūtehi catubbidhehi dīpehi vibhūsitā ekalokadhātupariyāpannā
tika-s0105t0:646: Sabbeva dāsā mandhātu, ye ca pāṇā pathavissitā”ti.
tika-s0105t0:647_1: paccekaṃ pañcasataparittadīpānampi mahādīpeyeva saṅgahaṇatthaṃ saddātirittena atthātirittassa
tika-s0105t0:647_2: viññāyamānattā, koṭṭhāsavācakena vā vidhasaddena samānabhāgānaṃ gahitattāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:647_3: Kopādipaccatthiketi ettha ādisaddena kāmamohamānamadādike saṅgaṇhāti. Vijetīti taṃkālāpekkhāya
tika-s0105t0:647_4: vattamānavacanaṃ, vijitavāti attho. Saddavidū hi atīte tāvīsaddamicchanti. “Sabbarājāno
tika-s0105t0:647_5: vijetī”ti vadanto kāmaṃ cakkavattino kenaci yuddhaṃ nāma natthi, yuddhena pana sādhetabbassa
tika-s0105t0:648_0: Thāvarassa dhuvassa bhāvo thāvariyaṃ, yathā janapade thāvariyaṃ patto, taṃ dassetuṃ
tika-s0105t0:648_1: “na sakkā kenacī”tiādi vuttaṃ, iminā kenaci akampiyaṭṭhena janapade thāvariyappattoti
tika-s0105t0:648_2: tappurisasamāsaṃ dasseti, itarena ca daḷhabhattibhāvato janapado thāvariyappatto
tika-s0105t0:648_3: etasminti aññapadatthasamāsaṃ. Tamhīti asmiṃ rājini. Yathā janapado tasmiṃ thāvariyaṃ
tika-s0105t0:648_4: patto, tadāvikaronto “anuyutto”tiādimāha. Tattha anuyuttoti niccapayutto. Sakammaniratoti
tika-s0105t0:648_5: cakkavattino rajjakamme sadā pavatto. Acalo asampavedhīti pariyāyavacanametaṃ, corānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:648_6: vā vilopanamattena acalo, dāmarikattena asampavedhī. Corehi vā acalo, paṭirājūhi
tika-s0105t0:648_7: asampavedhī. Anatimudubhāvena vā acalo, anaticaṇḍabhāvena asampavedhī. Tathā hi aticaṇḍassa
tika-s0105t0:648_8: rañño balikhaṇḍādīhi lokaṃ pīḷayato manussā majjhimajanapadaṃ chaḍḍetvā pabbatasamuddatīrādīni
tika-s0105t0:648_9: nissāya paccante vāsaṃ kappenti, atimudukassa ca rañño corasāhasikajanavilopapīḷitā
tika-s0105t0:648_10: manussā paccantaṃ pahāya janapadamajjhe vāsaṃ kappenti, iti evarūpe rājini janapado
tika-s0105t0:648_11: thāvarabhāvaṃ na pāpuṇāti. Etasmiṃ pana tadubhayavirahite suvaṇṇatulā viya samabhāvappatte
tika-s0105t0:648_12: rājini rajjaṃ kārayamāne janapado pāsāṇapiṭṭhiyaṃ ṭhapetvā ayopaṭṭena parikkhitto
tika-s0105t0:649_0: Seyyathidanti ekova nipāto, “so katamo, taṃ katamaṃ, sā katamā”tiādinā yathārahaṃ
tika-s0105t0:649_1: liṅgavibhattivacanavasena payojiyamānova hoti, idha tāni katamānīti payuttoti āha
tika-s0105t0:649_2: “tassa cetānī”tiādi. Cacati cakkavattino yathāruci ākāsādigamanāya paribbhamatīti
tika-s0105t0:649_3: cakkaṃ. Cakkaratanañhi antosamuṭṭhitavāyodhātuvasena rañño cakkavattissa vacanasamanantarameva
tika-s0105t0:649_4: pavattati, na candasūriyavimānādi viya bahisamuṭṭhitavāyodhātuvasenāti vimānaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-s0105t0:649_5: vuttaṃ. Ratijananaṭṭhenāti pītisomanassuppādanaṭṭhena. Tañhi passantassa, suṇantassa
tika-s0105t0:649_6: ca anappakaṃ pītisomanassaṃ uppajjati acchariyadhammattā. Vacanatthato pana rameti
tika-s0105t0:649_7: ratiṃ karotīti ratanaṃ, ramanaṃ vā rataṃ, taṃ netīti ratanaṃ, rataṃ vā janetīti ratanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:650_0: Cittīkatabhāvādināpi cakkassa ratanaṭṭho veditabbo, so pana ratijananaṭṭheneva ekasaṅgahatāya
tika-s0105t0:650_1: visuṃ na gahito. Kasmā ekasaṅgahoti ce? Cittīkatādibhāvassapi ratinimittattā. Atha
tika-s0105t0:650_2: vā ganthabyāsaṃ pariharitukāmena cittīkatādibhāvo na gahitoti veditabbaṃ. Aññāsu
tika-s0105t0:654_0: “Cakkaratanassa ca nibbattakālato paṭṭhāya aññaṃ devaṭṭhānaṃ nāma na hoti, sabbepi
tika-s0105t0:654_1: gandhapupphādīhi tasseva pūjañca abhivādanādīni ca karontīti cittīkataṭṭhena ratanaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:654_2: Cakkaratanassa ca ettakaṃ nāma dhanaṃ agghatīti aggho natthi, iti mahagghaṭṭhenapi
tika-s0105t0:654_3: ratanaṃ. Cakkaratanañca aññehi loke vijjamānaratanehi asadisanti atulaṭṭhena ratanaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:654_4: Yasmā pana yasmiṃ kappe buddhā uppajjanti, tasmiṃyeva cakkavattino uppajjanti, buddhā
tika-s0105t0:654_5: ca kadāci karahaci uppajjanti, tasmā dullabhadassanaṭṭhenapi ratanaṃ. Tadetaṃ jātirūpakulaissariyādīhi
tika-s0105t0:654_6: anomassa uḷārasattasseva uppajjati, na aññassāti anomasattaparibhogaṭṭhenapi ratanaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:655_0: Tatrāyaṃ taṭṭīkāya, aññattha ca vuttanayena atthavibhāvanā – idañhi “cittīkata”ntiādivacanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:655_1: nibbacanatthavasena vuttaṃ na hoti, atha kinti ce? Loke “ratana”nti sammatassa vatthuno
tika-s0105t0:655_2: garukātabbabhāvena vuttaṃ. Sarūpato panetaṃ lokiyamahājanena sammataṃ hiraññasuvaṇṇādikaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:655_4: buddhādisaraṇattayañca daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Aho manohara”nti citte kattabbatāya cittīkataṃ,
tika-s0105t0:655_5: svāyaṃ cittīkāro tassa pūjanīyatāyāti katvā pūjanīyanti atthaṃ vadanti. Keci pana
tika-s0105t0:655_6: “vicitrakataṭṭhena cittīkata”nti bhaṇanti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ idha cittasaddassa hadayavācakattā
tika-s0105t0:655_7: “cittīkatvā suṇātha me”ti āhaccabhāsitapāḷiyaṃ viya. Tathā cāhu “yathārahamivaṇṇāgamo
tika-s0105t0:655_8: bhūkaresū”ti. “Passa cittīkataṃ rūpaṃ, maṇinā kuṇḍalena cā”tiādīsu pana pubbe avicitraṃ
tika-s0105t0:655_9: idāni vicitraṃ katanti cittīkatanti attho gahetabbo tattha cittasaddassa vicitravācakattā.
tika-s0105t0:655_10: Mahantaṃ vipulaṃ aparimitaṃ agghatīti mahagghaṃ. Natthi etassa tulā upamā, tulaṃ
tika-s0105t0:655_11: vā sadisanti atulaṃ. Kadācideva uppajjanato dukkhena laddhabbadassanattā dullabhadassanaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:656_0: Idāni nesaṃ cittīkatādiatthānaṃ savisesaṃ cakkaratane labbhamānataṃ dassetvā itaresupi
tika-s0105t0:656_1: te atidisituṃ “yathā ca cakkaratana”ntiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha aññaṃ devaṭṭhānaṃ nāma
tika-s0105t0:656_2: na hoti rañño anaññasādhāraṇissariyādisampattipaṭilābhahetuto, aññesaṃ sattānaṃ yathicchitatthapaṭilābhahetuto
tika-s0105t0:656_3: ca. Aggho natthi ativiya uḷārasamujjalaratanattā, acchariyabbhutadhammatāya ca. Yadaggena
tika-s0105t0:656_4: ca mahagghaṃ, tadaggena atulaṃ. Sattānaṃ pāpajigucchanena vigatakāḷako puññapasutatāya
tika-s0105t0:656_5: maṇḍabhūto yādiso kālo buddhuppādāraho, tādise eva cakkavattīnampi sambhavoti āha
tika-s0105t0:656_6: “yasmā panā”tiādi. Kadāci karahacīti pariyāyavacanaṃ, “kadācī”ti vā yathāvuttakālaṃ
tika-s0105t0:659_0: Upamāvasena cetaṃ vuttaṃ. Upamopameyyānañca na accantameva sadisatā, tasmā yathā
tika-s0105t0:659_1: buddhā kadāci karahaci uppajjanti, na tathā cakkavattino, cakkavattino pana anekadāpi
tika-s0105t0:659_2: buddhuppādakappe uppajjantīti attho gahetabbo. Evaṃ santepi cakkavattivattapūraṇassa
tika-s0105t0:659_3: dukkarabhāvato dullabhuppādoyevāti iminā dullabhuppādatāsāmaññena tesaṃ dullabhadassanatā
tika-s0105t0:659_4: vuttāti veditabbaṃ. Kāmaṃ cakkaratanānubhāvena samijjhamāno guṇo cakkavattiparivārajanasādhāraṇo,
tika-s0105t0:659_5: tathāpi cakkavattī eva naṃ sāmibhāvena visavitāya paribhuñjatīti vattabbataṃ arahati
tika-s0105t0:659_7: channampi vā atthānaṃ sesaratanesupi labbhanato “evaṃ sesānipī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:660_0: Imehi pana ratanehi rājā cakkavattī kimatthaṃ paccanubhoti, nanu vināpi tesu kenaci
tika-s0105t0:660_1: raññā cakkavattinā bhavitabbanti codanāya tassa tehi hathārahamatthapaccanubhavanadassanena
tika-s0105t0:660_2: kenacipi avinābhāvitaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “imesu panā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Ajitaṃ puratthimādidisāya
tika-s0105t0:660_4: anuvicarati hatthiratanaṃ, assaratanañca abhiruhitvā tesaṃ ānubhāvena antopātarāsaṃyeva
tika-s0105t0:660_5: samuddapariyantaṃ pathaviṃ anupariyāyitvā rājadhāniyā eva paccāgamanato. Pariṇāyakaratanena
tika-s0105t0:660_6: vijitamanurakkhati tattha tattha kattabbakiccasaṃvidahanato. Avasesehi maṇiratanaitthiratanagahapatiratanehi
tika-s0105t0:660_7: upabhuñjanena pavattaṃ upabhogasukhaṃ anubhavati yathārahaṃ tehi tathānubhavanasiddhito.
tika-s0105t0:660_8: So hi maṇiratanena yojanappamāṇe padese andhakāraṃ vidhametvā ālokadassanādinā sukhamanubhavati,
tika-s0105t0:661: Idāni sattiyā, sattiphalena ca yathāvuttamatthaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “paṭhamenā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tividhā hi sattiyo “sakkonti samatthenti rājāno etāyā”ti katvā. Yathāhu –
tika-s0105t0:663: Pabhāvo daṇḍajo tejo, patāpo tu ca kosajo.
tika-s0105t0:664: Manto ca mantanaṃ so tu, catukkaṇṇo dvigocaro;
tika-s0105t0:666_0: Tattha vīriyabalaṃ ussāhasatti. Paṭhamena cassa cakkaratanena tadanuyogo paripuṇṇo
tika-s0105t0:666_1: hoti. Kasmāti ce? Tena ussāhasattiyā pavattetabbassa appaṭihatāṇācakkabhāvassa siddhito.
tika-s0105t0:666_2: Paññābalaṃ mantasatti. Pacchimena cassa pariṇāyakaratanena tadanuyogo. Kasmāti ce?
tika-s0105t0:666_3: Tassa sabbarājakiccesu kusalabhāvena mantasattiyā viya avirajjhanapayogattā. Damanena,
tika-s0105t0:666_4: dhanena ca pabhuttaṃ pabhūsatti. Hatthiassagahapatiratanehi cassa tadanuyogo paripuṇṇo
tika-s0105t0:666_5: hoti. Kasmāti ce? Hatthiassaratanānaṃ mahānubhāvatāya, gahapatiratanato paṭiladdhakosasampattiyā
tika-s0105t0:666_6: ca pabhāvasattiyā viya pabhāvasamiddhisiddhito. Itthimaṇiratanehi tividhasattiyogaphalaṃ
tika-s0105t0:666_7: paripuṇṇaṃ hotīti sambandho, yathāvuttāhi tividhāhi sattīhi payujjanato yaṃ phalaṃ
tika-s0105t0:666_8: laddhabbaṃ. Taṃ sabbaṃ tehi paripuṇṇaṃ hotīti attho. Kasmāti ce? Teheva upabhogasukhassa sijjhanato.
tika-s0105t0:667_1: Bhogasukhanti samīpe katvā paribhogavasena pavattasukhaṃ. Sesehīti tadavasesehi cakkādipañcaratanehi.
tika-s0105t0:667_2: Apaccatthikatāvasena pavattasukhaṃ issariyasukhaṃ. Idāni tesaṃ sampannahetuvasenapi
tika-s0105t0:667_10: mahāvagge dutiye bojjhaṅgasaṃyutte. Ratanasuttassāti tattha pañcamavagge saṅgītassa
tika-s0105t0:667_11: dutiyassa ratanasuttassa. Upadeso nāma savisesaṃ sattannaṃ ratanānaṃ vicāraṇavasena pavatto nayo.
tika-s0105t0:668_0: Saraṇato paṭipakkhavidhamanato sūrā sattivanto, nibbhayāvahāti attho. Tenāha “abhīrukajātikā”ti.
tika-s0105t0:668_1: Asure vijinitvā ṭhitattā sakko devānamindo dhīro nāma, tassa senaṅgabhāvato devaputto
tika-s0105t0:668_2: “aṅga”nti vuccati, dhīrassa aṅgaṃ, tassa rūpamiva rūpaṃ yesaṃ te dhīraṅgarūpā, tena
tika-s0105t0:668_3: vuttaṃ “devaputtasadisakāyā”ti. Eketi sārasamāsanāmakā ācariyā, tadakkhamanto āha
tika-s0105t0:668_4: “ayaṃ panetthā”tiādi. Sabhāvoti sabhāvabhūto attho. Uttamasūrāti uttamayodhā. Sūrasaddo
tika-s0105t0:668_5: hi idha yodhattho. Evañhi purimanayato imassa visesatā hoti, “uttamattho sūrasaddo”tipi
tika-s0105t0:668_6: vadanti, “uttamā sūrā vuccantī”tipi hi pāṭho dissati. Vīrānanti vīriyavantānaṃ. Aṅganti
tika-s0105t0:668_7: kāraṇaṃ “aṅgīyati ñāyati phalametenā”ti katvā. Yena vīriyena “dhīrā”ti vuccanti,
tika-s0105t0:668_8: tadeva dhīraṅgaṃ nāmāti āha “vīriyanti vuttaṃ hotī”ti. Rūpanti sarīraṃ. Tena vuttaṃ
tika-s0105t0:668_9: “vīriyamayasarīrā viyā”ti. Vīriyameva vīriyamayaṃ yathā “dānamaya”nti, tasmā vīriyasaṅkhātasarīrā
tika-s0105t0:668_10: viyāti attho. Vīriyaṃ pana na ekantarūpanti viya-saddaggahaṇaṃ kataṃ. Apica dhīraṅgena
tika-s0105t0:668_11: nibbattaṃ dhīraṅganti atthaṃ dassetuṃ “vīriyamayasarīrā viyā”ti vuttaṃ, evampi vīriyato
tika-s0105t0:668_12: rūpaṃ na ekantaṃ nibbattanti viya-saddena dasseti. Atha vā rūpaṃ sarīrabhūtaṃ dhīraṅgaṃ
tika-s0105t0:668_13: vīriyametesanti yojetabbaṃ, tathāpi vīriyaṃ nāma kiñci saviggahaṃ na hotīti dīpeti
tika-s0105t0:668_14: “vīriyamayasarīrā viyā”ti iminā, idhāpi mayasaddo sakattheyeva daṭṭhabbo, tasmā saviggahavīriyasadisāti
tika-s0105t0:668_15: attho. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – saviggahaṃ ce vīriyaṃ nāma siyā, te cassa puttā taṃsadisāyeva
tika-s0105t0:668_16: bhaveyyunti ayameva cattho ācariyena anumato. Mahāpadānaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana evaṃ vuttaṃ
tika-s0105t0:668_17: “dhīraṅgaṃ rūpametesanti dhīraṅgarūpā, vīriyajātikā vīriyasabhāvā vīriyamayā akilāsuno
tika-s0105t0:668_18: ahesuṃ, divasampi yujjhantā na kilamantīti vuttaṃ hotī”ti, tadetaṃ rūpasaddassa sabhāvatthataṃ
tika-s0105t0:668_19: sandhāya vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Idha ceva aññattha katthaci “dhitaṅgarūpā”ti pāṭho
tika-s0105t0:668_20: dissati. Vīriyatthopi hi dhitisaddo hoti “saccaṃ dhammo dhiti cāgo, diṭṭhaṃ so ativattatī”tiādīsu
tika-s0105t0:668_21: dhitisaddo viya. Katthaci pana “vīraṅga”nti pāṭhova diṭṭho. Yathā ruccati, tathā gahetabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:669_0: Nanu ca rañño cakkavattissa paṭisenā nāma natthi, ya’massa puttā pamaddeyyuṃ, atha
tika-s0105t0:669_2: hotu vā, mā vā, “sace pana bhaveyyā”ti parikappanāmattena tesaṃ evamānubhāvataṃ dassetuṃ
tika-s0105t0:669_3: tathā vuttanti adhippāyo, “parasenappamaddanā”ti vuttepi parasenaṃ pamaddituṃ samatthāti
tika-s0105t0:669_4: attho gahetabbo pakaraṇatopi atthantarassa viññāyamānattā, yathā “sikkhamānena bhikkhave
tika-s0105t0:669_5: bhikkhunā aññātabbaṃ paripucchitabbaṃ paripañhitabba”nti etassa padabhājanīye “sikkhitukāmenā”ti
tika-s0105t0:669_6: atthaggahaṇanti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “taṃ parimaddituṃ samatthā”ti vuttaṃ. Na hi te
tika-s0105t0:669_7: parasenaṃ pamaddantā tiṭṭhanti, atha kho pamaddanasamatthā eva honti. Evamaññatrapi
tika-s0105t0:669_8: yathārahaṃ. Parasenaṃ pamaddanāya samatthentīti parasenappamaddanāti atthaṃ dassetītipi vadanti.
tika-s0105t0:670_0: Pubbe katūpacitassa etarahi vipaccamānakassa puññadhammassa cirataraṃ vipaccituṃ
tika-s0105t0:670_2: “dhammenā”ti padassa “pāṇo na hantabbotiādinā pañcasīladhammenā”ti atthamāha. Ayañhi
tika-s0105t0:670_3: attho “ye kho panānanda puratthimāya disāya paṭirājāno, te rājānaṃ mahāsudassanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:670_4: upasaṅkamitvā evamāhaṃsu ‘ehi kho mahārāja, svāgataṃ te mahārāja, sakaṃ te mahārāja,
tika-s0105t0:670_5: anusāsa mahārājā’ti. Rājā mahāsudassano evamāha ‘pāṇo na hantabbo, adinnaṃ na ādātabbaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:670_6: kāmesu micchā na caritabbā, musā na bhaṇitabbā, majjaṃ na pātabbaṃ, yathābhuttañca
tika-s0105t0:670_7: bhuñjathā’ti. Ye kho panānanda puratthimāya disāya paṭirājāno, te rañño mahāsudassanassa
tika-s0105t0:670_8: anuyantā ahesu”ntiādinā āgataṃ rañño ovādadhammaṃ sandhāya vutto. Evañhi “adaṇḍena
tika-s0105t0:670_9: asatthenā”ti idampi visesanavacanaṃ susamatthitaṃ hoti. Aññāsupi suttanipātaṭṭhakathādīsu ayamevattho vutto.
tika-s0105t0:671_0: Mahāpadānaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “adaṇḍenāti ye katāparādhe satte satampi sahassampi gaṇhanti,
tika-s0105t0:671_1: te dhanadaṇḍena rajjaṃ kārenti nāma, ye chejjabhejjaṃ anusāsanti, te satthadaṇḍena.
tika-s0105t0:671_2: Ayaṃ pana duvidhampi daṇḍaṃ pahāya adaṇḍena ajjhāvasati. Asatthenāti ye ekatodhārādinā
tika-s0105t0:671_3: satthena paraṃ vihesanti, te satthena rajjaṃ kārenti nāma. Ayaṃ pana satthena khuddakamakkhikāyapi
tika-s0105t0:671_4: pivanamattaṃ lohitaṃ kassaci anuppādetvā dhammeneva, ‘ehi kho mahārājā’ti evaṃ paṭirājūhi
tika-s0105t0:671_5: sampaṭicchitāgamano vuttappakāraṃ pathaviṃ abhivijinitvā ajjhāvasati abhibhavitvā
tika-s0105t0:671_6: sāmī hutvā vasatīti attho”ti vuttaṃ, tadetaṃ “dhammenā”ti padassa “pubbe katūpacitena
tika-s0105t0:671_7: etarahi vipaccamānakena yena kenaci puññadhammenā”ti atthaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Teneva
tika-s0105t0:671_8: hi “dhammena paṭirājūhi sampaṭicchitāgamano vuttappakāraṃ pathaviṃ abhivijinitvā
tika-s0105t0:671_9: ajjhāvasatī”ti. Ācariyenapi vuttaṃ dhammenāti katūpacitena attano puññadhammena.
tika-s0105t0:671_10: Tena hi sañcoditā pathaviyaṃ sabbarājāno paccuggantvā “svāgataṃ te mahārājā”tiādīni
tika-s0105t0:671_11: vatvā attano rajjaṃ rañño cakkavattissa niyyātenti. Tena vuttaṃ “so imaṃ pathaviṃ
tika-s0105t0:671_12: sāgarapariyantaṃ adaṇḍena asatthena dhammena abhivijiya ajjhāvasatī”ti, tenapi yathāvuttamevatthaṃ
tika-s0105t0:671_13: dasseti, tasmā ubhayathāpi ettha attho yutto evāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Cakkavattivattapūraṇādipayogasampattimantarena
tika-s0105t0:671_14: hi pubbe katūpacitakammeneva evamajjhāvasanaṃ na sambhavati, tathā pubbe katūpacitakammamantarena
tika-s0105t0:672_0: Evaṃ ekaṃ nipphattiṃ kathetvā dutiyaṃ nipphattiṃ kathetuṃ yadetaṃ “sace kho panā”tiādivacanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:672_1: vuttaṃ, tattha anuttānamatthaṃ dassento “arahaṃ…pe… vivaṭṭacchadoti etthā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0105t0:672_2: Yasmā rāgādayo satta pāpadhammā loke uppajjanti, uppajjamānā ca te sattasantānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:672_3: chādetvā pariyonandhitvā kusalappavattiṃ nivārenti, tasmā te idha chadasaddena vuttāti
tika-s0105t0:672_4: dasseti “rāgadosā”tiādinā. Duccaritanti micchādiṭṭhito aññena manoduccaritena saha
tika-s0105t0:672_5: tīṇi duccaritāni, micchādiṭṭhi pana visesena sattānaṃ chadanato, paramasāvajjattā
tika-s0105t0:672_6: ca visuṃ gahitā. Vuttañca “sabbe te imeheva dvāsaṭṭhiyā vatthūhi antojālīkatā, ettha
tika-s0105t0:672_7: sitāva ummujjamānā ummujjantī”tiādi. Tathā muyhanaṭṭhena moho, aviditakaraṇaṭṭhena
tika-s0105t0:672_8: avijjāti pavattiākārabhedena aññāṇameva dvidhā vuttaṃ. Tathā hissa dvidhāpi chadanattho
tika-s0105t0:672_9: kathito “andhatamaṃ tadā hoti, yaṃ moho sahate nara”nti, “avijjāya nivuto loko, vevicchā
tika-s0105t0:672_10: pamādā nappakāsatī”ti ca. Evaṃ rāgadosādīnampi chadanattho vattabbo. Mahāpadānaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-s0105t0:672_11: pana rāgadosamohamānadiṭṭhikilesataṇhāvasena satta pāpadhammā gahitā. Tatra rañjanaṭṭhena
tika-s0105t0:672_12: rāgo, taṇhāyanaṭṭhena taṇhāti pavattiākārabhedena lobho eva dvidhā vutto. Tathā hissa
tika-s0105t0:672_13: dvidhāpi chadanattho ekantikova. Yathāha “andhatamaṃ tadā hoti, yaṃ rāgo sahate nara”nti,
tika-s0105t0:672_14: “kāmandhā jālasañchannā, taṇhāchadanachāditā”ti ca, kilesaggahaṇena ca vuttāvasiṭṭhā
tika-s0105t0:673_0: Sattahi paṭicchanneti hetugabbhavacanaṃ, sattahi pāpadhammehi paṭicchannattā kilesavasena
tika-s0105t0:673_1: andhakāre loketi attho. Taṃ chadananti sattapāpadhammasaṅkhātaṃ chadanaṃ. Vivaṭṭetvāti
tika-s0105t0:673_2: vivaṭṭaṃ katvā vigametvā. Tadeva pariyāyantarena vuttaṃ “samantato sañjātāloko hutvā”ti.
tika-s0105t0:673_3: Kilesachadanavigamo eva hi āloko, etena vivaṭṭayitabbo vigametabboti vivaṭṭo, chādeti
tika-s0105t0:673_4: paṭicchādetīti chado, vivaṭṭo chado anenāti vivaṭṭacchadā, vivaṭṭacchado vāti atthaṃ
tika-s0105t0:673_5: dasseti. Ayañhi vivaṭṭacchadasaddo daḷhadhammapaccakkhadhammasaddādayo viya pulliṅgavasena
tika-s0105t0:673_6: ākāranto, okāranto ca hoti. Tathā hi mahāpadānaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ “rāgadosamohamānadiṭṭhikilesataṇhāsaṅkhātaṃ
tika-s0105t0:673_7: chadanaṃ āvaraṇaṃ vivaṭaṃ viddhaṃsitaṃ vivaṭakaṃ etenāti vivaṭacchado, ‘vivaṭṭacchadā’tipi
tika-s0105t0:673_8: pāṭho, ayamevattho”ti, tassā līnatthappakāsaniyampi vuttaṃ “vivaṭṭacchadāti okārassa
tika-s0105t0:673_9: ākāraṃ katvā niddeso”ti. Saddavidū pana “ādhanvāditoti lakkhaṇena samāsantagatehi
tika-s0105t0:673_10: dhanusaddādīhi kvaci āpaccayo”ti vatvā “kaṇḍivadhanvā, paccakkhadhammā, vivaṭṭacchadā”ti payogamudāharanti.
tika-s0105t0:674_0: Kasmā padattayametaṃ vuttanti anuyogaṃ hetālaṅkāranayena pariharanto “tatthā”tiādimāha,
tika-s0105t0:674_1: tatthāti ca tīsu padesūti attho. Pūjāvisesaṃ paṭiggaṇhituṃ arahatīti arahanti atthena
tika-s0105t0:674_2: pūjārahatā vuttā. Yasmā sammāsambuddho, tasmā pūjārahatāti tassā pūjārahatāya hetu
tika-s0105t0:674_4: vuttā. Kammādivasena tividhaṃ vaṭṭañca rāgādivasena sattavidho chado ca vaṭṭacchadā,
tika-s0105t0:674_5: vaṭṭacchadehi vigato, vigatā vā vaṭṭacchadā yassāti vivaṭṭacchado, vivaṭṭacchadā
tika-s0105t0:674_6: vā, dvandapubbago pana vi-saddo ubhayattha yojetabboti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “vivaṭṭo
tika-s0105t0:674_7: ca vicchado cā”ti vuttaṃ. Evampi vadanti “vivaṭṭo ca so vicchado cāti vivaṭṭacchado,
tika-s0105t0:674_8: uttarapade pubbapadalopoti atthaṃ dassetī”ti. “Arahaṃ vaṭṭābhāvenā”ti idaṃ kilesehi
tika-s0105t0:674_9: ārakattā, kilesārīnaṃ saṃsāracakkassārānañca hatattā, pāpakaraṇe ca rahābhāvāti atthaṃ
tika-s0105t0:674_10: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Idañhi phalena hetānumānadassanaṃ – yathā taṃ dhūmena aggissa, udakoghena
tika-s0105t0:674_11: upari vuṭṭhiyā, etena ca atthena arahabhāvo hetu, vaṭṭābhāvo phalanti ayaṃ ācariyamati.
tika-s0105t0:674_12: “Paccayādīnaṃ, pūjāvisesassa ca arahattā”ti pana hetunā phalānumānadassanampi siyā
tika-s0105t0:674_13: yathā taṃ agginā dhūmassa, upari vuṭṭhiyā udakoghassa. “Sammāsambuddho chadanābhāvenā”ti
tika-s0105t0:674_15: Arahattamaggena hi vicchadatā, sabbaññutaññāṇena sammāsambuddhabhāvo. “Vivaṭṭo ca
tika-s0105t0:674_16: vicchado cā”ti idaṃ hetudvayaṃ. Kāmañca ācariyamatiyā phalena hetuanumānadassane
tika-s0105t0:674_17: vivaṭṭatā phalameva hoti, hetuanumānadassanassa, pana tathāñāṇassa ca hetubhāvato
tika-s0105t0:675_0: Evaṃ padattayavacane hetālaṅkāranayena payojanaṃ dassetvā idāni catuvesārajjavasenapi
tika-s0105t0:675_2: tathāgatassa vesārajjāni, yehi vesārajjehi samannāgato tathāgato āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭijānāti,
tika-s0105t0:675_3: parisāsu sīhanādaṃ nadati, brahmacakkaṃ pavattetī”tiādinā bhagavatā vuttakkamena
tika-s0105t0:675_4: dutiyabhūtena “khīṇāsavassa te paṭijānato ‘ime āsavā aparikkhīṇā’ti, tatra vata maṃ
tika-s0105t0:675_5: samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā devo vā māro vā brahmā vā koci vā lokasmiṃ saha dhammena paṭicodessatīti
tika-s0105t0:675_6: nimittametaṃ bhikkhave na samanupassāmi, etamahaṃ bhikkhave nimittaṃ asamanupassanto
tika-s0105t0:675_7: khemappatto abhayappatto vesārajjappatto viharāmī”ti paridīpitena vesārajjena. Purimasiddhīti
tika-s0105t0:675_8: purimassa “araha”nti padassa atthasiddhi arahattasiddhi, dutiyavesārajjassa tadatthabhāvato
tika-s0105t0:675_9: tena vesārajjena tadatthasiddhīti vuttaṃ hoti. “Khīṇāsavassa te paṭijānato ‘ime āsavā
tika-s0105t0:675_10: aparikkhīṇā’ ti”ādinā vuttameva hi dutiyavesārajjaṃ “kilesehi ārakattā”tiādinā vutto
tika-s0105t0:675_11: “araha”nti padassa atthoti. Tato ca viññāyati “yathā dutiyena vesārajjena purimasiddhi,
tika-s0105t0:675_12: evaṃ purimenapi atthena dutiyavesārajjasiddhī”ti. Evañca katvā iminā nayena catuvesārajjavasena
tika-s0105t0:675_13: padattayavacane payojanadassanaṃ upapannaṃ hoti. Itarathā hi kiñcipayojanābhāvato
