tika-s0105t0:995_0: 359. Evaṃ kūṭadantasuttaṃ saṃvaṇṇetvā idāni mahālisuttaṃ saṃvaṇṇento yathānupubbaṃ
tika-s0105t0:995_1: saṃvaṇṇanokāsassa pattabhāvaṃ vibhāvetuṃ, kūṭadantasuttassānantaraṃ saṅgītassa suttassa
tika-s0105t0:995_2: mahālisuttabhāvaṃ vā pakāsetuṃ “evaṃ me sutaṃ…pe… vesāliyanti mahālisutta”nti āha.
tika-s0105t0:995_3: Punappunaṃ visālabhāvūpagamanatoti etthāyaṃ saṅkhepo – bārāṇasirañño kira aggamahesiyā
tika-s0105t0:995_4: maṃsapesigabbhena dve dārakā nibbattā dhītā ca putto ca, tesaṃ aññamaññaṃ vivāhena
tika-s0105t0:995_5: soḷasakkhattuṃ puttadhītuvasena dve dve dārakā vijātā. Tato tesaṃ dārakānaṃ yathākkamaṃ
tika-s0105t0:995_7: appahonakatāya nagaraṃ tikkhattuṃ gāvutantarena gāvutantarena parikkhipiṃsu, evaṃ
tika-s0105t0:995_9: jātaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ “punappunaṃ visālabhāvūpagamanato vesālīti laddhanāmake nagare”ti.
tika-s0105t0:995_10: Vitthārakathā cettha mahāsīhanādasuttavaṇṇanāya, ratanasuttavaṇṇanāya ca gahetabbā.
tika-s0105t0:995_11: Bahinagareti nagarato bahi, na ambapālivanaṃ viya antonagarasmiṃ. Sayaṃjātanti sayameva
tika-s0105t0:995_12: jātaṃ aropimaṃ. Mahantabhāvenāti rukkhagacchānaṃ, ṭhitokāsassa ca mahantabhāvena.
tika-s0105t0:995_13: Tenevāha “himavantena saddhiṃ ekābaddhaṃ hutvā”ti. Yaṃ pana venayikānaṃ matena vinayaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ –
tika-s0105t0:996_0: “Tattha mahāvanaṃ nāma sayaṃjātaṃ aropimaṃ saparicchedaṃ mahantaṃ vanaṃ. Kapilavatthusāmantā
tika-s0105t0:996_1: pana mahāvanaṃ himavantena saha ekābaddhaṃ aparicchedaṃ hutvā mahāsamuddaṃ āhacca
tika-s0105t0:997_1: tatheva vuttaṃ. Idha pana dīghabhāṇakānaṃ matena evaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yadi ca
tika-s0105t0:997_2: “ahutvā”ti katthaci pāṭho dissati, evaṃ sati sabbesampi samānavādo siyāti. Kūṭāgārasālāsaṅkhepenāti
tika-s0105t0:997_4: pāsādoyeva “kūṭāgārasālā”ti vutto, tabbohārena pana sakalopi saṅghārāmoti vuttaṃ
tika-s0105t0:998: “Kūṭāgārasālā pana mahāvanaṃ nissāya kate ārāme kūṭāgāraṃ antokatvā haṃsavaṭṭakacchadanena katā sabbākārasampannā buddhassa bhagavato gandhakuṭi veditabbā”ti.
tika-s0105t0:999_0: Kosalesu jātā, bhavā, te vā nivāso etesanti kosalakā. Evaṃ māgadhakā. Janapadavācino
tika-s0105t0:999_1: hi pāyato pulliṅgaputhuvacanā. Yassa akaraṇe puggalo mahājāniyo hoti, taṃ karaṇaṃ
tika-s0105t0:999_2: arahatīti karaṇīyanti vuccati. Tenāha “avassaṃ kattabbakammenā”ti. Akātumpi vaṭṭati
tika-s0105t0:999_3: asati samavāye, tasmā samavāye sati kattabbato taṃ kiccanti vuccatīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0105t0:1000_0: 360. Yā buddhānaṃ uppajjanārahā nānattasaññā, tāsaṃ vasena “nānārammaṇacārato”ti
tika-s0105t0:1000_1: vuttaṃ, nānārammaṇappavattitoti attho. Sambhavantasseva hi paṭisedho, na asambhavantassa.
tika-s0105t0:1000_2: Paṭikkammāti nivattetvā tathā cittaṃ anuppādetvā. Sallīnoti jhānasamāpattiyā ekattārammaṇaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1000_3: allīno. Nilīnoti tasseva vevacanaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ “ekībhāva”ntiādi. Saparivārattā anekopi
tika-s0105t0:1000_4: tadā eko viya bhavatīti ekībhāvo, taṃ ekībhāvaṃ. Yenāyasmā nāgito, taṃ sandhāya “tasmā ṭhānā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1002_0: 361. Addhoṭṭhatāyāti upaḍḍhoṭṭhatāya. Tassa kira uttaroṭṭhassa appakatāya tiriyaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1002_1: phāletvā addhamapanītaṃ viya khāyati cattāro dante, dve ca dāṭhā na chādeti, tena
tika-s0105t0:1002_2: naṃ “oṭṭhaddho”ti voharati. Keci pana “adho-saddena pāṭhaṃ parikappetvā heṭṭhā oṭṭhassa
tika-s0105t0:1002_3: olambakatāya “oṭṭhādho”ti atthaṃ vadanti, tadayuttameva tathā pāṭhassa adissanato,
tika-s0105t0:1002_4: ācariyena ca avaṇṇitattā. Ayaṃ kira uposathiko dāyako dānapati saddho pasanno buddhamāmako
tika-s0105t0:1002_6: āgatanayena “nīlapītādi…pe… tāvatiṃsaparisasappaṭibhāgāyā”ti vuttaṃ. Ayaṃ pana vesālī
tika-s0105t0:1002_7: bhagavato kāle iddhā ceva vepullappattā ca ahosi. Tattha hi rājūnameva satta sahassāni,
tika-s0105t0:1002_8: satta satāni, satta ca rājāno ahesuṃ, tathā yuvarājasenāpatibhaṇḍāgārikapabhutīnampi,
tika-s0105t0:1002_10: ca. Tena vuttaṃ “mahatiyā licchaviparisāyā”ti. Tassa pana kulassa ādibhūtānaṃ yathāvuttānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1002_11: maṃsapesiyā nibbattadārakānaṃ tāpasena pāyitaṃ yaṃ khīraṃ udaraṃ pavisati, sabbaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1002_12: taṃ maṇibhājanagataṃ viya dissati, carimakabhave bodhisatte kucchigate bodhisattamātu
tika-s0105t0:1002_13: viya udaracchaviyā ativippasannatāya te nicchavī ahesuṃ. Apare panāhu “sibbetvā ṭhapitā
tika-s0105t0:1002_14: viya nesaṃ aññamaññaṃ līnā chavi ahosī”ti. Evaṃ te nicchavitāya vā līnacchavitāya
tika-s0105t0:1002_15: vā licchavīti paññāyiṃsu, niruttinayena cettha padasiddhi, tabbaṃse uppannā sabbepi
tika-s0105t0:1002_16: licchavayo nāma jātā. Tenāha “licchaviparisāyā”ti, licchavirājūnaṃ, licchavivaṃsabhūtāya
tika-s0105t0:1002_17: vā parisāyāti attho. Mahantaṃ yasaṃ lāti gaṇhātīti mahāli yathā “bhaddālī”ti. Mūlanāmanti
tika-s0105t0:1003_0: 362. Sāsane yuttapayuttoti bhāvanamanuyutto. Sabbattha sīhasamānavuttinopi bhagavato
tika-s0105t0:1003_1: parisāya mahatte sati tadajjhāsayānurūpaṃ pavattiyamānāya dhammadesanāya viseso hotīti
tika-s0105t0:1004_0: “Vissāsiko”ti vatvā tamassa vissāsikabhāvaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “ayañhī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Thūlasarīroti
tika-s0105t0:1004_1: vaṭharasarīro. Therassa khīṇāsavabhāvato “ālasiyabhāvo appahīno”ti na vattabbo, vāsanālesaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1004_2: pana upādāya “īsakaṃ appahīno viya hotī”ti vuttaṃ. Na hi sāvakānaṃ buddhānamiva savāsanā
tika-s0105t0:1004_3: kilesā pahīyanti. Yathāvuttaṃ pāsādameva sandhāya “kūṭāgāramahāgehā”ti vuttaṃ. Pācīnamukhāti pācīnapamukhā.
tika-s0105t0:1005_1: āha “atha kho”tiādi. Gandhakuṭito nikkhamanavelāyañhi chabbaṇṇā buddharasmiyo āveḷāveḷā
tika-s0105t0:1005_2: yamalā yamalā hutvā savisesaṃ pabhassarā vinicchariṃsu. Tāhi “bhagavā nikkhamatī”ti
tika-s0105t0:1006_0: 364. “Ajjā”ti vuttadivasato atītamanantaraṃ hiyyodivasaṃ purimaṃ nāma, tathā “hiyyo”ti
tika-s0105t0:1006_1: vuttadivasato paraṃ purimataraṃ atisayena purimattā. Iti imesu dvīsu divasesu vavatthito
tika-s0105t0:1006_2: yathākkamaṃ purimapurimatarabhāvo. Evaṃ santepi yadettha “purimatara”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:1006_3: tato pabhuti yaṃ yaṃ oraṃ, taṃ taṃ purimaṃ. Yaṃ yaṃ paraṃ, taṃ taṃ purimataranti
tika-s0105t0:1006_4: dassento “tato paṭṭhāyā”tiādimāha. Orapārabhāvassa viya, hi disāvidisābhāvassa viya
tika-s0105t0:1006_5: ca purimapurimatarabhāvassa apekkhāsiddhi. Mūladivasatotiādidivasato. Aggeti upayogatthe
tika-s0105t0:1006_6: bhummavacanaṃ, upayogavacanassa vā e-kārādesoti dasseti “agga”nti iminā, paṭhamanti
tika-s0105t0:1006_7: attho. Taṃ panettha parā atītā koṭiyevāti āha “parakoṭiṃ katvā”ti. Yaṃ-saddo paricchede
tika-s0105t0:1006_8: nipāto, tappayogena cāyaṃ “viharāmī”ti vattamānapayogo, attho pana atītavasena veditabboti
tika-s0105t0:1006_9: dassetuṃ “yāva vihāsi”nti vuttaṃ. Tassāti divasassa. Paṭhamavikappe “viharāmī”ti
tika-s0105t0:1006_10: imassa “yadagge”ti iminā ujukaṃ tāva sambandhitvā pacchā “naciraṃ tīṇi vassānī”ti
tika-s0105t0:1006_11: pamāṇavacanaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Dutiyavikappe pana “naciraṃ tīṇi vassānī”ti imehipi kuṭilaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1006_12: sambandho kattabbo. Naciranti cetaṃ bhāvanapuṃsakaṃ, accantasaññogaṃ vā. Tañhi pamāṇato
tika-s0105t0:1006_13: visesetuṃ “tīṇi vassānī”ti vadati. Tenāha “naciraṃ vihāsiṃ tīṇiyeva vassānī”ti.
tika-s0105t0:1007_0: Ayanti sunakkhatto. Piyajātikānīti iṭṭhasabhāvāni. Sātajātikānīti madhurasabhāvāni.
tika-s0105t0:1007_1: Madhurasadisatāya hi “madhura”nti manoramaṃ vuccati. Ārammaṇaṃ karontena kāmena upasaṃhitānīti
tika-s0105t0:1007_3: assādena saññuttāni, kāmasaṅkhātassa vā assādassa yogyānīti attho. Sarīrasaṇṭhāneti
tika-s0105t0:1007_4: sarīrabimbe, ādhāre cetaṃ bhummaṃ. Tasmā saddenāti taṃ nissāya tato uppannena saddenāti
tika-s0105t0:1007_5: attho. Apica vinā pāṭhasesaṃ bhavitabbapadeneva sambandhitabbaṃ. Madhurenāti iṭṭhena
tika-s0105t0:1008_0: Ettāvatāti dibbasotañāṇaparikammassa akathanamattena. “Attanā ñātampi na katheti,
tika-s0105t0:1008_1: kiṃ imassa sāsane adhiṭṭhānenā”ti kujjhanto bhagavati āghātaṃ bandhitvā, saha kujjhaneneva
tika-s0105t0:1008_2: cesa jhānābhiññā parihāyi. Cintesīti “kasmā nu kho so mayhaṃ taṃ parikammaṃ na kathesī”ti
tika-s0105t0:1008_3: parivicārento ayoniso ummujjanavasena cintesi. Anukkamenāti pāthikasutte, mahāsīhanādasutte
tika-s0105t0:1008_4: ca āgatanayena taṃ taṃ ayuttameva cintento, bhāsanto, karonto ca anukkamena bhagavati
tika-s0105t0:1008_5: baddhāghātatāya sāsane patiṭṭhaṃ alabhanto gihibhāvaṃ patvā tamatthaṃ katheti.
tika-s0105t0:1010_0: 366-371. Ekaṃsāyāti tadatthe catutthīvacanaṃ, ekaṃsatthanti attho. Aṃsasaddo cettha
tika-s0105t0:1010_1: koṭṭhāsapariyāyo, so ca adhikārato dibbarūpadassanadibbasaddasavanavasena veditabboti
tika-s0105t0:1010_2: āha “ekakoṭṭhāsāyā”tiādi. Vā-saddo cettha vikappane ekaṃsassevādhippetattā. Anudisāyāti
tika-s0105t0:1010_4: dibbasaddasavanatthañca. Bhāvitoti yathā dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ, dibbasotañāṇañca samadhigataṃ
tika-s0105t0:1010_5: hoti, evaṃ bhāvito. Tayidaṃ visuṃ visuṃ parikammakaraṇena ijjhantīsu vattabbaṃ natthi,
tika-s0105t0:1010_6: ekajjhaṃ ijjhantīsupi kameneva kiccasiddhi bhavati ekajjhaṃ kiccasiddhiyā asambhavato.
tika-s0105t0:1010_7: Pāḷiyampi hi “dibbānañca rūpānaṃ dassanāya, dibbānañca saddānaṃ savanāyā”ti idaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1010_9: “Ekaṃsabhāvito samādhi hetū”ti iminā sunakkhatto dibbacakkhuñāṇāya eva parikammassa
tika-s0105t0:1011_0: 372. Dibbacakkhuñāṇato dibbasotañāṇameva seṭṭhanti maññamāno mahāli etamatthaṃ pucchatīti
tika-s0105t0:1011_1: āha “idaṃ dibbasotena…pe… maññe”ti. Apaṇṇakanti avirajjhanakaṃ, anavajjaṃ vā. Samādhiyeva
tika-s0105t0:1011_2: bhāvetabbaṭṭhena samādhibhāvanā. “Dibbasotañāṇaṃ seṭṭha”nti maññamānena ca tena dibbacakkhuñāṇampi
tika-s0105t0:1011_3: dibbasoteneva saha gahetvā “etāsaṃ nūna bhante”tiādinā puthuvacanena pucchitanti
tika-s0105t0:1011_4: dassetuṃ “ubhayaṃsabhāvitānaṃ samādhīna”nti vuttaṃ. Bāhirā etā samādhibhāvanā aniyyānikattā.
tika-s0105t0:1011_5: Tā hi ito bāhirakānampi ijjhanti. Na ajjhattikā bhagavatā sāmukkaṃsikabhāvena appaveditattā.
tika-s0105t0:1011_6: Na hi te saccāni viya sāmukkaṃsikā. Yadatthanti yesaṃ atthāya, abhedepi bhedavacanametaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:1011_7: yassa vā visesanabhūtassa atthāya. Teti ariyaphaladhamme. “Ta”ntipi adhunā pāṭho.
tika-s0105t0:1011_8: Te hi sacchikātabbā, “atthi kho mahāli aññeva dhammā…pe… yesaṃ sacchikiriyāhetu bhikkhū
tika-s0105t0:1011_9: mayi brahmacariyaṃ carantī”ti sacchikātabbadhammā ca idha vuttā.
tika-s0105t0:1013_0: 373. Saṃyojentīti bandhenti. Tasmāti yasmā vaṭṭadukkhabhaye saṃyojanato tattha satte
tika-s0105t0:1013_1: saṃyojenti nāma, tasmā. Katthaci “vaṭṭadukkhamaye rathe”ti pāṭho, na porāṇo tathā
tika-s0105t0:1013_2: ācariyena avaṇṇitattā. Maggasotaṃ āpanno, na pasādādisotaṃ. “Sototi bhikkhave ariyamaggassetaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1013_3: adhivacana”nti hi vuttaṃ. Āpannoti ca ādito pattoti attho ā-upasaggassa ādikammani
tika-s0105t0:1013_4: pavattanato, idaṃ pana phalaṭṭhavasena vadati. Atītakālavacanañhetaṃ, maggakkhaṇe
tika-s0105t0:1013_5: pana maggasotaṃ āpajjati nāma. Tenevāha dakkhiṇavibhaṅge “sotāpanne dānaṃ deti, sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya
tika-s0105t0:1013_6: paṭipanne dānaṃ detī”ti apatanadhammoti anupapajjanasabhāvo. Dhammaniyāmenāti uparimaggadhammaniyāmena.
tika-s0105t0:1013_7: Heṭṭhimantena sattamabhavato upari anupapajjanadhammatāya vā niyatoti aṭṭhakathāmuttakanayo.
tika-s0105t0:1013_8: Paraṃ ayanaṃ parāgati assa atthīti attho. Anenāti puna tatiyasamāsavacanaṃ, vā-saddo
tika-s0105t0:1014_0: Tanuttaṃ nāma pavattiyā mandatā, viraḷatā cāti vuttaṃ “tanuttā”tiādi. Karahacīti
tika-s0105t0:1014_1: nipātamattaṃ, pariyāyavacanaṃ vā. “Orena ce māso seso gimhānanti vassikasāṭikacīvaraṃ
tika-s0105t0:1014_2: pariyeseyyā”tiādīsu viya ora-saddo na atirekatthoti āha “heṭṭhābhāgiyāna”nti, heṭṭhābhāgassa
tika-s0105t0:1014_3: kāmabhavassa paccayabhāvena hitānanti attho. “Suddhāvāsabhūmiya”nti tesaṃ upapattiṭṭhānadassanaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1014_6: vimutti, cittameva vimutti cetovimuttīti vuttaṃ “cittavisuddhi”ntiādi. Cittasīsena
tika-s0105t0:1014_7: cettha samādhi gahito “sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sapañño, cittaṃ paññañca bhāvaya”ntiādīsu
tika-s0105t0:1014_8: viya. Paññāvimuttinti etthāpi eseva nayo. Tenāha “arahattaphalapaññāva paññāvimuttī”ti.
tika-s0105t0:1014_9: Sāmanti attanāva, aparappaccayenāti attho. “Abhijānitvā”ti iminā tvādipaccayakāriyassa
tika-s0105t0:1014_10: ya-kārassa lopo dassito. “Abhiññāyā”ti iminā pana nā-vacanakāriyassāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1014_11: Sacchīti paccakkhatthe nepātikaṃ. Paccakkhakaraṇaṃ nāma anussavākāraparivitakkādike
tika-s0105t0:1016_0: 374-5. Uppatitvāti ākāsamaggena ḍetvā. Paṭipajjati ariyāsāvako nibbānaṃ, ariyaphalañca
tika-s0105t0:1016_1: etāyāti paṭipadā, sā ca tassa pubbabhāgo evāti ariyamaggo pubbabhāgapaṭipadānāmena
tika-s0105t0:1016_2: idha vutto. Ātatavitatādivasena pañcaṅgikaṃ. Disāvidisāniviṭṭhapadesena aṭṭhaṅgiko.
tika-s0105t0:1016_3: Aṭṭhaṅgato mutto añño koci aṭṭhaṅgiko nāma maggo natthīti āha “aṭṭhaṅgamattoyevā”tiādinā.
tika-s0105t0:1016_4: Na hi avayavavinimutto samudāyo nāma koci atthīti. Tasmā “aṭṭha aṅgāni assāti aññapadatthasamāsaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1016_5: akatvā ‘aṭṭha aṅgāni aṭṭhaṅgāni, tāni assa santīti aṭṭhaṅgiko’ti samāsagabbhataddhitavasena
tika-s0105t0:1016_6: padasiddhi kātabbā”ti ācariyena vuttaṃ, adhippāyo cettha cintetabbo. Aññapadatthasamāse
tika-s0105t0:1016_7: hi kate na sakkā aṭṭhaṅgaaṭṭhaṅgikānaṃ bhedo aññamaññaṃ vipariyāyaṃ katvāpi niyametuṃ
tika-s0105t0:1016_8: byāse ubhayapadatthaparabhāvena saheva saṅkhyāparicchedena atthāpattito. Samāsagabbhe
tika-s0105t0:1016_9: pana taddhite kate sakkā eva tesaṃ bhedo aññamaññaṃ vipariyāyaṃ katvā niyametuṃ samāse
tika-s0105t0:1016_11: hi samāsoti. Dhammadāyādasuttantaṭīkāyaṃ pana ācariyeneva evaṃ vuttaṃ “yasmā maggaṅgasamudāye
tika-s0105t0:1016_12: maggavohāro hoti, samudāyo ca samudāyīhi samannāgato, tasmā attano avayavabhūtāni
tika-s0105t0:1016_13: aṭṭha aṅgāni etassa santīti aṭṭhaṅgiko”ti. Paṭhamanaye cettha aṅginā aṅgassa aṭṭhaṅgikabhāvo
tika-s0105t0:1016_14: vutto, dutiyanaye pana aṅgena aṅginoti ayametesaṃ viseso.
tika-s0105t0:1017_0: Idāni aṭṭhaṅgikamagge lakkhaṇato, kiccakhaṇārammaṇabhedakamato ca vinicchayaṃ dassento
tika-s0105t0:1017_2: paccakkhameva dassanasabhāvā. Sammā abhiniropanalakkhaṇoti nibbānārammaṇe cittassa
tika-s0105t0:1017_4: jane saṅgaṇhātīti tabbipakkhato viratisabhāvā sammāvācā bhedakaramicchāvācappahānena
tika-s0105t0:1017_5: jane, sampayuttadhamme ca pariggaṇhanakiccavatī hoti, evaṃ aviparītaṃ pariggahaṇasabhāvā.
tika-s0105t0:1017_6: Sammā samuṭṭhāpanalakkhaṇoti yathā cīvarakammādiko kammanto ekaṃ kātabbaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti,
tika-s0105t0:1017_7: taṃtaṃkiriyānipphādako vā cetanāsaṅkhāto kammanto hatthapādacalanādikaṃ kiriyaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti,
tika-s0105t0:1017_9: hoti, sampayutte ca samuṭṭhāpento eva pavattatīti aviparītaṃ samuṭṭhāpanasabhāvo.
tika-s0105t0:1017_10: Sammā vodāpanalakkhaṇoti kāyavācānaṃ, khandhasantānassa ca saṃkilesabhūtamicchājīvappahānena
tika-s0105t0:1017_11: aviparītaṃ vodāpanasabhāvo. Sammā paggahalakkhaṇoti sasampayuttadhammassa cittassa
tika-s0105t0:1017_12: saṃkilesapakkhe patitumadatvā aviparītaṃ paggahaṇasabhāvo. Sammā upaṭṭhānalakkhaṇāti
tika-s0105t0:1017_13: tādibhāvalakkhaṇena aviparītaṃ tattha upaṭṭhānasabhāvo. Sammā samādhānalakkhaṇoti
tika-s0105t0:1018_0: Sahajekaṭṭhatāya diṭṭhekaṭṭhā avijjādayo micchādiṭṭhito aññe attano paccanīkakilesā
tika-s0105t0:1018_1: nāma. Passatīti pakāseti kiccapaṭivedhena paṭivijjhati. Tenāha “tappaṭi…pe… asammohato”ti.
tika-s0105t0:1018_2: Idañhi tassā passanākāradassanaṃ. Teneva hi sammādiṭṭhisaṅkhātena aṅgena tattha paccavekkhaṇā
tika-s0105t0:1018_3: pavattati. Purimāni dve kiccāni sabbesameva sādhāraṇānīti āha “sammāsaṅkappādayopī”tiādi.
tika-s0105t0:1019_1: nānakkhaṇā. Aniccādilakkhaṇavisayattā nānārammaṇā. Maggassa ekacittakkhaṇikattā ekakkhaṇā.
tika-s0105t0:1019_2: Nibbānārammaṇattā ekārammaṇā. Kiccatoti pubbabhāge dukkhādiñāṇehi kattabbena idha
tika-s0105t0:1019_3: sātisayaṃ nibbattena kiccena, imasseva vā ñāṇassa dukkhādippakāsanakiccena. Cattāri
tika-s0105t0:1019_4: nāmāni labhati catūsu saccesu kātabbakicca nibbattito.Tīṇi nāmāni labhati kāmasaṅkappādippahānanibbattito.
tika-s0105t0:1019_5: Sikkhāpadavibhaṅge “viraticetanā, sabbe sampayuttadhammā ca sikkhāpadānī”ti vuccanti.
tika-s0105t0:1019_6: Tattha pana padhānānaṃ viraticetanānaṃ vasena “viratiyopi honti cetanāyopī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:1019_7: musāvādādīhi viramaṇakāle vā viratiyo, subhāsitādivācābhāsanādikāle cetanāyo hontīti
tika-s0105t0:1019_8: yojetabbā. Cetanānaṃ amaggaṅgattā “maggakkhaṇe pana viratiyovā”ti āha. Ekasseva ñāṇassa
tika-s0105t0:1019_9: dukkhādiñāṇatā viya, ekāyeva viratiyā musāvādādiviratibhāvo viya ca ekāya eva cetanāya
tika-s0105t0:1019_11: ca evaṃ vuttantipi daṭṭhabbaṃ. Iminā cetāsaṃ duvidhataṃ, abhedatañca dasseti. Sammappadhānasatipaṭṭhānavasenāti
tika-s0105t0:1020_0: Yadipi samādhiupakārakānaṃ abhiniropanā numajjanasampiyāyanu pabrūhanasantānaṃ vitakkavicārapītisukhopekkhānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1020_1: vasena catūhi jhānehi sammāsamādhi vibhatto, tathāpi vāyāmo viya anuppannākusalānuppādanādicatuvāyāmakiccaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:1020_2: sati viya ca asubhāsukhāniccānattabhūtesu kāyādīsu subhādisaññāpahānacatusatikiccaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1020_3: ekova samādhi catukkajjhānasamādhikiccaṃ na sādheti. Tasmā pubbabhāgepi paṭhamajjhānasamādhi
tika-s0105t0:1020_4: paṭhamajjhānasamādhi eva. Tathā maggakkhaṇepi pubbabhāgepi dutiyajjhānasamādhi dutiyajjhānasamādhi
tika-s0105t0:1020_5: eva. Tathā maggakkhaṇepi pubbabhāgepi tatiyajjhānasamādhi tatiyajjhānasamādhi eva.
tika-s0105t0:1020_6: Tathā maggakkhaṇepi pubbabhāgepi catutthajjhānasamādhi catutthajjhānasamādhi eva.
tika-s0105t0:1021_0: Tasmāti paññāpajjotattā avijjāndhakāraṃ vidhamitvā paññāsatthattā kilesacore ghātentoti
tika-s0105t0:1021_1: yathārahaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Yasmā pana anādimati saṃsāre iminā yoginā kadācipi asamugghāṭitapubbo
tika-s0105t0:1021_2: kilesagaṇo, tassa samugghāṭako ca ariyamaggo. Ayañcettha sammādiṭṭhi pariññābhisamayādivasena
tika-s0105t0:1021_3: pavattiyā pubbaṅgamā hoti bahūpakārā, tasmā. Tadeva bahūpakārataṃ kāraṇabhāvena dassetuṃ
tika-s0105t0:1022_0: Tassāti sammādiṭṭhiyā. “Bahūpakāro”ti vatvā taṃ bahūpakārataṃ upamāya vibhāvento
tika-s0105t0:1022_1: “yathā hī”tiādimāha. Ayaṃ tambakaṃsādimayattā kūṭo. Taṃpariharaṇato mahāsāratāya
tika-s0105t0:1022_2: cheko. Evanti yathā heraññikassa cakkhunā disvā kahāpaṇavibhāgajānane kiriyāsādhakatamabhāvena
tika-s0105t0:1022_3: karaṇantaraṃ bahukāraṃ yadidaṃ hattho, evaṃ yogino paññāya oloketvā dhammavibhāgajānane
tika-s0105t0:1022_4: pubbacārībhāvena dhammantaraṃ bahukāraṃ yadidaṃ vitakko vitakketvāva paññāya tadavabodhato.
tika-s0105t0:1022_5: Tasmā sammāsaṅkappo sammādiṭṭhiyā bahukāroti adhippāyo. Dutiyaupamāyaṃ evanti yathā
tika-s0105t0:1022_6: tacchako parena parivattetvā parivattetvā dinnaṃ dabbasambhāraṃ vāsiyā tacchetvā
tika-s0105t0:1022_7: gehādikaraṇakamme upaneti, evaṃ yogī vitakkena lakkhaṇādito vitakketvā dinnadhamme
tika-s0105t0:1022_8: yāthāvato paricchinditvā pariññābhisamayādikamme upanetīti yojanā. Vacībhedassa upakārako
tika-s0105t0:1022_10: āha “svāya”ntiādi. “Yathāhā”tiādinā dhammadinnāya bhikkhuniyā visākhassa nāma gahapatino
tika-s0105t0:1022_11: vuttaṃ cūḷavedallasuttapadaṃ sādhakabhāvena dasseti. Bhindatīti nicchāreti.
tika-s0105t0:1023_0: Vacībhedaniyāmikā vācā kāyikakiriyāniyāmakassa kammantassa upakārikāti tadatthaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1023_1: lokato pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ “yasmā panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Ubhayaṃ sucaritanti kāyasucaritaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:1023_3: saddhiṃ sammāājīvaṃ aṭṭhamaṃ katvā vuttaṃ ādibrahmacariyakasīlaṃ. Yañhi sandhāya
tika-s0105t0:1023_4: vuttaṃ “pubbeva kho panassa kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ ājīvo suparisuddho hotī”ti. Tadubhayānantaranti
tika-s0105t0:1023_6: anantaraṃ. Suttapamattenāti appossukkaṃ suttena, pamattena ca. Idaṃ vīriyanti catubbidhaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1023_8: upakārakā. Tabbidhurā dhammā anupakārakā. Gatiyoti nipphattiyo, kiccādisabhāve vā.
tika-s0105t0:1025_0: 376-7. Kasmā āraddhanti anusandhikāraṇaṃ pucchitvā taṃ vissajjetuṃ “ayaṃ kirā”tiādi
tika-s0105t0:1025_1: vuttaṃ tena ajjhāsayānusandhivasenāyaṃ upari desanā pavattāti dasseti. Tenāti tathāladdhikattā.
tika-s0105t0:1025_2: Assāti licchavirañño. Desanāyanti saṇhasukhumāya suññatapaṭisaññuttāya yathādesitadesanāya.
tika-s0105t0:1025_3: Nādhimuccatīti na saddahati na pasīdati. Tantidhammaṃ nāma kathentoti yesaṃ atthāya
tika-s0105t0:1025_4: dhammo kathīyati, tattha tesaṃ asatipi maggapaṭivedhe kevalaṃ sāsane paveṇībhūtaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:1025_5: pariyattibhūtaṃ vā tantidhammaṃ katvā kathento, tena tadā tesaṃ maggapaṭivedhābhāvaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1025_7: satthuno. Assāti paṭhamajjhānādisamadhigamena samāhitacittassa kulaputtassa etaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1025_8: “taṃ jīva”ntiādinā ucchedādigahaṇaṃ api nu yuttanti pucchati, laddhiyā pana jhānādhigamamattena
tika-s0105t0:1025_9: na tāva vivecitattā “yuttamasseta”nti tehi vutte jhānalābhinopetaṃ gahaṇaṃ ayuttamevāti
tika-s0105t0:1025_10: taṃ ucchedavādaṃ, sassatavādaṃ vā “ahaṃ kho…pe… na vadāmī”tiādinā paṭikkhipitvāti
tika-s0105t0:1025_11: sādhippāyattho. Etanti paṭhamajjhānādikaṃ. Evanti yathāvuttanayena. Atha ca panāti
tika-s0105t0:1025_12: evaṃ jānanato, passanato ca. Kāmaṃ vipassakādidassanampi pāḷiyaṃ kataṃ, arahattakūṭena
tika-s0105t0:1025_13: pana desanā niṭṭhāpitāti dassetuṃ “uttari khīṇāsavaṃ dassetvā”ti vuttaṃ. Te hi dve
tika-s0105t0:1025_14: pabbajitā vipassakato paṭṭhāya “na kallaṃ tassetaṃ vacanāyā”ti avocuṃ. Imassāti khīṇāsavassa.
tika-s0105t0:1025_15: Kiñcāpi “attamanā ahesu”nti pāḷiyaṃ na vuttaṃ, “na kalla”ntiādinā pana vissajjanāvacaneneva
tika-s0105t0:1025_16: tesaṃ attamanatā veditabbāti āha “te mamā”tiādi. Tattha yasmā khīṇāsavo vigatasammoho
tika-s0105t0:1025_17: tiṇṇavicikiccho, tasmā tassa tathā vattumayuttanti uppannanicchayatāya taṃ mama vacanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1025_18: sutvā attamanā ahesunti attho. Sopi kho licchavi rājā te viya tathāsañjātanicchayattā
tika-s0105t0:1025_19: attamano ahosi. Tenāha “evaṃ vutte sopi attamano ahosī”ti. Yaṃ panettha atthato avibhattaṃ, taṃ suviññeyyameva.
tika-s0105t0:1026_1: suvimalavipulapaññāveyyattiyajananāya sādhuvilāsiniyā nāma līnatthapakāsaniyā mahālisuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthapakāsanā.
tika-s0105t0:1030_0: 378. Evaṃ mahālisuttaṃ saṃvaṇṇetvā idāni jāliyasuttaṃ saṃvaṇṇento yathānupubbaṃ saṃvaṇṇanokāsassa
tika-s0105t0:1030_1: pattabhāvaṃ vibhāvetuṃ, mahālisuttassānantaraṃ saṅgītassa suttassa jāliyasuttabhāvaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1030_2: vā pakāsetuṃ “evaṃ me sutaṃ…pe… kosambiyanti jāliyasutta”nti āha. “Ghositenā”tiādinā
tika-s0105t0:1030_3: majjhelopasamāsaṃ dasseti, ghositassa ārāmotipi vattabbaṃ. Evampi hi “anāthapiṇḍikassa
tika-s0105t0:1030_4: ārāme”tiādīsu viya dāyakakittanaṃ hoti, evaṃ pana kittento āyasmā ānando aññepi tassa
tika-s0105t0:1030_5: diṭṭhānugatiāpajjane niyojetīti aññattha vuttaṃ. Tattha koyaṃ ghositaseṭṭhi nāma,
tika-s0105t0:1030_6: kathañcānena ārāmo kārito, kathaṃ pana tattha bhagavā vihāsīti pucchāya sabbaṃ taṃ
tika-s0105t0:1030_7: vissajjanaṃ samudāgamato paṭṭhāya saṅkhepatova dassento “pubbe kirā”tiādimāha. Allakapparaṭṭhanti
tika-s0105t0:1030_8: bahūsu potthakesu dissati, katthaci pana “addilaraṭṭha”nti ca “damiḷaraṭṭha”nti ca
tika-s0105t0:1030_9: likhitaṃ. Tatoti allakapparaṭṭhato. “Puttaṃ…pe… agamāsī”ti idampi “tassetaṃ kamma”nti
tika-s0105t0:1030_10: ñāpetuṃ vuttaṃ. Tadāti tesaṃ gāmaṃ paviṭṭhadivase. Balavapāyāsanti garutaraṃ bahupāyāsaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1030_11: Jīrāpetunti samavepākiniyā gahaṇiyā pakkāpetuṃ. Asannihiteti gehato bahi aññaṃ gate.
tika-s0105t0:1030_12: Bhussatīti nadati, “bhubhu”iti sunakhasaddaṃ karotīti attho. Idampissa ekaṃ kammaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1030_13: Paccekabuddhe pana cīvarakammatthāya aññaṃ ṭhānaṃ gate sunakhassa hadayaṃ phālitaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1030_14: Tiracchānā nāmete ujujātikā honti akuṭilā, manussā pana aññaṃ hadayena cinteti, aññaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1030_15: mukhena kathenti. Tenevāha “gahanañhetaṃ bhante yadidaṃ manussā, uttānakañhetaṃ bhante yadidaṃ pasavo”ti.
tika-s0105t0:1031_0: Iti so tāya paccekabuddhe sinehavasena ujudiṭṭhitāya akuṭilatāya kālaṅkatvā tāvatiṃsabhavane
tika-s0105t0:1031_1: nibbatto. Taṃ sandhāyāha “so…pe… nibbattī”ti. Tassa pana kaṇṇamūle kathentassa saddo
tika-s0105t0:1031_2: soḷasayojanaṭṭhānaṃ pharati, pakatikathāsaddo pana sakalaṃ dasayojanasahassaṃ devanagaraṃ,
tika-s0105t0:1031_3: evaṃ saraghosasampattiyā “ghosakadevaputto” tveva nāmaṃ ahosi. Ayamassa paccekabuddhe
tika-s0105t0:1031_4: sinehena bhukkaraṇassa nissando. Cavitvāti āhārakkhayena cavitvā. Devalokato hi devaputtā
tika-s0105t0:1031_5: āyukkhayena, puññakkhayena, āhārakkhayena, kopenāti catūhi kāraṇehi cavanti. Imassa
tika-s0105t0:1031_6: pana kāmaguṇe paribhuñjato muṭṭhassatissa āhārakkhayena cavanaṃ hoti. So kosambiyaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1031_7: nagarasobhiniyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. Nagarasobhiniyo kira dhītaraṃ paṭijagganti,
tika-s0105t0:1031_8: na puttaṃ. Dhītaro hi tāsaṃ paveṇiṃ ghaṭayanti, tasmā sāpi taṃ saṅkārakūṭe chaḍḍāpeti.
tika-s0105t0:1031_9: Ayamassa pubbe puttachaḍḍanakammassa nissando. Pāpakammañhi nāmetaṃ “appaka”nti nāvamaññitabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1031_10: Tameko manusso kākasunakhaparivāritaṃ disvā “putto me laddho”ti gehaṃ nesi, tassa
tika-s0105t0:1031_11: pana hatthato kosambakaseṭṭhi kahāpaṇasahassaṃ datvā aggahesi, tamatthaṃ sandhāya
tika-s0105t0:1031_12: “kosambiyaṃ ekassa kulassa ghare nibbattī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Sattakkhattuṃ ghātāpanatthaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1031_14: dhītāya. Veyyattiyenāti paññāveyyattiyena. Sā hi tassa pitarā pesitaṃ mārāpanapaṇṇaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1031_15: phāletvā vivāhapaṇṇaṃ bandhitvā jīvitalābhaṃ karoti. Tāyeva sarasampattiyā ghositaseṭṭhi nāma jāto.
tika-s0105t0:1032_1: pīnanatthaṃ. Tasitāti pipāsitā. Kilantāti parissantakāyā. Vaṭarukkhanti mahānigrodharukkhaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1032_2: Te kira taṃ patvā tassa mūle nisīdiṃsu. Atha jeṭṭhakatāpaso nigrodharukkhassa sobhāsampattiṃ
tika-s0105t0:1032_3: passitvā “mahānubhāvo maññe ettha adhivutthā devatā. Sādhu vatāyaṃ devatā isigaṇassa
tika-s0105t0:1032_4: pānīyādidānena addhānaparissamaṃ vinodeyyā”ti cintesi. Devatāpi tathā cintitaṃ utvā
tika-s0105t0:1032_6: pana tathā cintanaṃ avisesato sabbattha āropetvā “saṅgahaṃ paccāsisantā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1032_7: “Hatthaṃ pasāretvā”ti iminā hatthappasāraṇamattena tassā yathicchitanipphattiṃ dasseti.
tika-s0105t0:1032_8: Devatā āhāti sā attano puññassa parittakattā lajjāya kathetuṃ avisahantīpi punappunaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1032_9: nippīḷiyamānā evamāha. Soti anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati. Bhatakānanti bhatiyā veyyāvaccaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1032_11: Tadā uposathikattā kammaṃ akarontānampi kammakaraṇadivase dātabbabhattavetanameva,
tika-s0105t0:1032_12: na tato ūnanti attho. Dhammapadaṭṭhakathāyaṃ khuddakabhāṇakānaṃ matena “sāyamāsatthāya
tika-s0105t0:1032_13: āgato”ti vuttaṃ, idha pana dīghabhāṇakānaṃ matena “majjhanhike pātarāsatthāya āgato”ti.
tika-s0105t0:1032_14: Kañcīti kañcipi bhatakaṃ, kiñcipi bhatakakammanti vā sambandho. Majjhanhikakālattā
tika-s0105t0:1032_16: taṃ voharantīti dasseti. Dhammapadaṭṭhakathāyaṃ rattibhāgena upaḍḍhūposatho vutto,
tika-s0105t0:1032_17: idha pana majjhanhikato paṭṭhāya divasabhāgeneva, tadavasesadivasarattibhāgena vā.
tika-s0105t0:1032_18: Asamepi hi bhāge upaḍḍhasaddo pavattati. Tadahevāti aruṇuggamanakālaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1033_0: “Ghosopi kho dullabho lokasmiṃ yadidaṃ buddho”ti sañjātapītipāmojjo. Tadahevāti kosambiṃ
tika-s0105t0:1033_1: pattadivasato dutiyadivaseyeva. Turitātthāti turitā attha, sīghayāyino bhavathāti
tika-s0105t0:1033_2: attho. Ehibhikkhupabbajjaṃ sandhāya “pabbajitvā”ti vuttaṃ. Arahattanti catupaṭisambhidāsamalaṅkataṃ
tika-s0105t0:1033_3: arahantabhāvaṃ. Tepi seṭṭhino sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya aḍḍhamāsamattaṃ dānāni datvā
tika-s0105t0:1033_4: paccāgamma tayo vihāre kāresuṃ. Bhagavā pana devasikaṃ ekekasmiṃ vihāre vasati. Yassa
tika-s0105t0:1033_5: ca vihāre vuttho, tasseva ghare piṇḍāya carati, tadā pana ghositassa vihāre viharati.
tika-s0105t0:1034_0: Bāhirasamayamattena upajjhāyo, na sāsane viya upajjhāyalakkhaṇena. Upecca parassa
tika-s0105t0:1034_1: vācāya ārambhanaṃ bādhanaṃ upārambho, dosadassanavasena ghaṭṭananti attho. Tenāha
tika-s0105t0:1034_2: “vādaṃ āropetukāmā hutvā”ti. Vadanti nindāvasena kathenti etenāti hi vādo, doso,
tika-s0105t0:1034_3: tamāropetukāmā upari patiṭṭhapetukāmā hutvāti attho. Kathamāropetukāmāti āha “iti
tika-s0105t0:1034_4: kirā”tiādi. Taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīranti yaṃ vatthu jīvasaññitaṃ, tadeva sarīrasaññitaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1034_5: Idañhi “rūpaṃ attato samanupassatī”ti vuttavādaṃ gahetvā vadanti. Rūpañca attānañca
tika-s0105t0:1034_6: advayaṃ ekībhāvaṃ katvā samanupassanavasena, “satto”ti vā bāhirakaparikappitaṃ attānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1034_7: sandhāya vadanti. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “idheva satto bhijjatī”ti. Assāti samaṇassa gotamassa.
tika-s0105t0:1034_8: Bhijjatīti nirudayavināsavasena vinassati. Tena jīvitasarīrānaṃ anaññattānujānanato,
tika-s0105t0:1034_9: sarīrassa ca bhedadassanato. Na hettha yathā diṭṭhabhedavatā sarīrato anaññattā adiṭṭhopi
tika-s0105t0:1034_10: jīvassa bhedo vutto, evaṃ adiṭṭhabhedavatā jīvato anaññattā sarīrassāpi abhedoti
tika-s0105t0:1034_11: sakkā vattuṃ tassa bhedassa paccakkhasiddhattā, bhūtupādāyarūpavinimuttassa ca sarīrassa
tika-s0105t0:1035_0: Aññaṃ jīvaṃ aññaṃ sarīranti aññadeva vatthu jīvasaññitaṃ, aññaṃ sarīrasaññitaṃ. Idañhi
tika-s0105t0:1035_2: diṭṭhattā, attani ca tadabhāvato “attā nicco”ti ayamattho āpanno vāti iminā adhippāyenāha
tika-s0105t0:1036_1: pañho ṭhapanīyo. Na hesa atthanissito, na dhammanissito, nādibrahmacariyako, na nibbidādiatthāya
tika-s0105t0:1036_2: saṃvattati. Poṭṭhapādasuttañcettha nidassanaṃ. Taṃ tattha rājanimīlanaṃ katvā “tena
tika-s0105t0:1036_3: hāvusosuṇāthā”tiādinā satthā nesaṃ upari dhammadesanamārabhīti āha “atha bhagavā”tiādi.
tika-s0105t0:1036_4: Sassatucchedadiṭṭhiyo dve antā. Ariyamaggo majjhimā paṭipadā. Tassāyeva paṭipadāyāti
tika-s0105t0:1037_0: Saddhāpabbajitassāti saddhāya pabbajitassa “evamahaṃ ito vaṭṭadukkhato nissarissāmī”ti
tika-s0105t0:1037_1: pabbajjamupagatassa, tadanurūpañca sīlaṃ pūretvā paṭhamajjhānena samāhitacittassa.
tika-s0105t0:1037_2: Etanti kilesavaṭṭaparivuddhidīpanaṃ “taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīra”ntiādikaṃ diṭṭhisaṃkilesanissitavacanaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1037_3: Nibbicikiccho na hotīti dhammesu tiṇṇavicikiccho na hoti, tattha tattha āsappanaparisappanavasena pavattatīti attho.
tika-s0105t0:1038_0: Etamevaṃ jānāmīti yena so bhikkhu paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati, etaṃ sasampayuttaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1038_1: dhammaṃ “mahaggatacitta”nti evaṃ jānāmi. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “mahaggatacittametanti saññaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1038_2: ṭhapesi”nti. No ca evaṃ vadāmīti yathā diṭṭhigatikā taṃ dhammajātaṃ sanissayaṃ abhedato
tika-s0105t0:1038_3: gaṇhantā “taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīra”nti, tadubhayaṃ vā bhedato gaṇhantā “aññaṃ jīvaṃ añña
tika-s0105t0:1038_4: sarīra”nti attano micchāgāhaṃ pavedenti, evamahaṃ na vadāmi tassa dhammassa supariññātattā.
tika-s0105t0:1038_5: Tenāha “atha kho”tiādi. Bāhirakā yebhuyyena kasiṇajjhānāni eva nibbattentīti vuttaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1038_6: “kasiṇaparikammaṃ bhāventassā”ti. Yasmā bhāvanānubhāvena jhānādhigamo, bhāvanā ca
tika-s0105t0:1038_7: pathavīkasiṇādisañjānanamukhena hotīti katvā saññāsīsena niddisīyati, tasmā “saññābalena
tika-s0105t0:1038_8: uppanna”nti āha. Tena vuttaṃ “pathavīkasiṇameko sañjānātī”tiādi. Yasmā pana bhagavatā
tika-s0105t0:1038_9: tattha tattha vāre “atha ca panāhaṃ na vadāmī”ti vuttaṃ, tasmā bhagavato vacanamupadesaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1038_10: katvā na vattabbaṃ kiretaṃ kevalinā uttamapurisenāti adhippāyena “na kallaṃ tasseta”nti
tika-s0105t0:1038_11: āhaṃsu, na sayaṃ paṭibhānenāti dassetuṃ “maññamānā vadantī”ti vuttaṃ. Sesaṃ anantarasutte
tika-s0105t0:1039_1: suvimalavipulapaññāveyyattiyajananāya sādhuvilāsiniyā nāma līnatthapakāsaniyā jāliyasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthapakāsanā.
tika-s0105t0:1043_0: 381. Evaṃ jāliyasuttaṃ saṃvaṇṇetvā idāni mahāsīhanādasuttaṃ saṃvaṇṇento yathānupubbaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1043_1: saṃvaṇṇanokāsassa pattabhāvaṃ vibhāvetuṃ, jāliyasuttassānantaraṃ saṅgītassa suttassa
tika-s0105t0:1043_2: mahāsīhanādasuttabhāvaṃ vā pakāsetuṃ “evaṃ me sutaṃ…pe… uruññāyaṃ viharatīti mahāsīhanādasutta”nti
tika-s0105t0:1043_3: āha. Etadeva nāmanti yasmiṃ raṭṭhe taṃ nagaraṃ, tassa raṭṭhassapi yasmiṃ nagare bhagavā
tika-s0105t0:1043_4: vihāsi, tassa nagarassapi “uruññā”tveva nāmaṃ, tasmā uruññāyanti uruññānāmajanapade
tika-s0105t0:1043_5: uruññānāmanagareti āvuttiādinayena attho veditabbo. Iminā imamatthaṃ dasseti – na
tika-s0105t0:1043_6: sabbattha niyatapulliṅgaputhuvacanāva janapadavācī saddā, katthaci aniyatapulliṅgaputhuvacanāpi
tika-s0105t0:1043_7: yathā “āḷaviyaṃ viharatī”ti keci janapadamevatthaṃ vadanti, taṃ apanetuṃ “bhagavā
tika-s0105t0:1043_8: hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Ramaṇīyoti manoharabhūmibhāgatāya, chāyūdakasampattiyā, janavivittatāya
tika-s0105t0:1043_9: ca manoramo. Migānaṃ abhayaṃ deti etthāti migadāyo. Tenāha “so”tiādi. Celaṃ vatthaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:1043_10: taṃ natthi assāti aceloti vuttaṃ “naggaparibbājako”ti. Nāmanti gottanāmaṃ. Tapanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1043_11: santapanaṃ kāyassa khedanaṃ tapo, so etassa atthīti tapassī. Yasmā tathābhūto tapaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1043_12: nissito, tapo ca taṃ nissito hoti, tasmā “tapanissitaka”nti āha. Muttācārādīti ettha
tika-s0105t0:1043_13: ādisaddena parato pāḷiya māgatā hatthāpalekhanādayo saṅgahitā. Lūkhaṃ pharusaṃ sādhusammatācāravirahato
tika-s0105t0:1043_14: apasādanīyaṃ ājīvati vattatīti lūkhājīvīti aṭṭhakathāmuttakanayo. Uppaṇḍetīti uhasanavasena
tika-s0105t0:1043_15: paribhāsati. Upavadatīti avaññāpubbakaṃ apavadati. Tena vuttaṃ “hīḷeti vambhetī”ti.
tika-s0105t0:1043_16: “Hetumhi ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā”tiādīsu viya dhammasaddo hetupariyāyoti āha “kāraṇassa
tika-s0105t0:1043_18: payutto hi saddapayogo. Soyeva ca saddattho parehi vuccamāno anukāraṇaṃ tadanurūpaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1043_19: tassadisaṃ vā tato pacchā vā vuttakāraṇabhāvato. Parehīti yesaṃ tumhehi idaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:1043_20: tehi parehi. Vuttakāraṇenāti yathā tehi vuttaṃ, tathā ce tumhehi na vuttaṃ, evaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1043_21: sati tehi vuttakāraṇena sakāraṇo hutvā tumhākaṃ vādo vā tato paraṃ tassa anuvādo
tika-s0105t0:1043_22: vā koci appamattakopi viññūhi garahitabbaṃ kāraṇaṃ ṭhānaṃ nāgaccheyya, kimevaṃ nāgacchatīti
tika-s0105t0:1043_23: yojanā. “Idaṃ vuttaṃ hotī”tiādinā tadevatthaṃ saṅkhepato dasseti.
tika-s0105t0:1044_0: 382. Idāni yaṃ vibhajjavādaṃ sandhāya bhagavatā “na mete vuttavādino”ti saṅkhepena
tika-s0105t0:1044_1: vatvā taṃ vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “idhāhaṃ kassapā”tiādi vuttaṃ, taṃ vibhāgena dassento
tika-s0105t0:1044_3: “attakilamathānuyogo dukkho anariyo anatthasaṃhito”tiādinā. Garahati, sātthakaṃ pana
tika-s0105t0:1044_4: upasamasaṃvattanikaṃ kāyakilamathaṃ “āraññiko hoti, paṃsukūliko hotī”tiādinā vaṇṇeti.
tika-s0105t0:1044_5: Appapuññatāyāti apuññatāya. Appasaddo cettha “dvattichadanassa pariyāyaṃ appaharite
tika-s0105t0:1044_6: ṭhitena adhiṭṭhātabba”ntiādīsu viya abhāvattho. Micchādiṭṭhibhāvato kammaphalaṃ paṭikkhipantena
tika-s0105t0:1044_7: “natthi dinna”ntiādinā micchādiṭṭhiṃ purakkhatvā jīvitavuttihetu tathā tathā duccaritapūraṇaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1045_0: Bhiyyosomattāyāti mattato atirekaṃ. “Bhiyyoso”ti hi idaṃ bhiyyosaddena samānatthaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1045_1: nepātikaṃ. Anesanavasenāti kohaññe ṭhatvā asantaguṇasambhāvanicchāya yathā tathā
tika-s0105t0:1045_2: tapaṃ katvā anesitabbamesanāvasena micchājīvenāti attho. Yathāvuttanayena jīvitavuttihetu
tika-s0105t0:1045_3: tīṇi duccaritāni pūretvā. Ime dveti “appapuñño, puññavā”ti ca vutte duccaritakārino dve puggale.
tika-s0105t0:1046: Dutiyanaye ime dveti “appapuñño, puññavā”ti ca vutte sucaritakārino dve puggale.
tika-s0105t0:1047_0: Paṭhamadutiyanayesu vuttanayeneva tatiyacatutthanayesupi yathākkamaṃ attho veditabbo.
tika-s0105t0:1047_1: Paṭhamatatiyanayesu cettha ahetukaakiriyavādino. Dutiyacatutthanayesu pana kammakiriyavādinoti
tika-s0105t0:1047_2: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Appadukkhavihārīti appakaṃ dukkhena vihārī. Bāhirakācārayuttoti sāsanācārato
tika-s0105t0:1047_3: bāhirakena titthiyācārena yutto. Attānaṃ sukhetvāti adhammikena anesanāya laddhapaccayanimittena
tika-s0105t0:1047_4: sukhena attānaṃ sukhetvā sukhaṃ katvā, “sukhe ṭhapetvā”ti adhunā pāṭho.
tika-s0105t0:1048_0: “Na dāni mayā sadiso atthī”tiādinā taṇhāmānadiṭṭhisaṅkhātānaṃ tissannaṃ maññanānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1048_1: vasena duccaritapūraṇamāha. Lābhasakkāraṃ vā uppādento tīṇi duccaritāni puretvāti
tika-s0105t0:1048_2: sambandho. Micchādiṭṭhivasenāti “natthi kāmesu doso”ti evaṃ pavattamicchādiṭṭhivasena.
tika-s0105t0:1048_4: “Aparo”ti etthāpi hi “tāpaso vā channaparibbājako vā”ti adhikāro. Daharāyāti taruṇāya.
tika-s0105t0:1048_5: Mudukāyāti sukhumālāya. Lomasāyāti tanutambalomatāya appalomavatiyā. Lomaṃ etissā
tika-s0105t0:1048_6: atthīti lomasā. Liṅgattayepi hi sa-paccayena padasiddhimicchanti saddavidū. Kāmesūti
tika-s0105t0:1048_7: vatthukāmesu. Pātabbatanti paribhuñjitabbaṃ. Paribhogattho hettha pā-saddo, tabbasaddo
tika-s0105t0:1048_8: ca bhāvasādhano. Tā-saddo pana sakatthe yathā “devatā”ti, pātabbatanti vā paribhuñjanakataṃ,
tika-s0105t0:1048_9: kattusādhano cettha tabbasaddo yathā uparipaṇṇāsake pañcattayasutte “ye hi keci bhikkhave
tika-s0105t0:1048_10: samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā diṭṭhasutamutaviññātabbasaṅkhāramattena etassa āyatanassa upasampadaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1048_11: paññapentī”ti tathā hi tadaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ “vijānātīti viññātabbaṃ, diṭṭhasutamutaviññātamattena
tika-s0105t0:1048_12: pañcadvārikasaññāpavattimattenāti ayañhi ettha attho”ti, taṭṭīkāyañca “yathā niyyantīti
tika-s0105t0:1048_13: niyyānikāti bahulaṃ vacanato kattusādhano niyyānikasaddo, evaṃ idha viññātabbasaddoti
tika-s0105t0:1048_14: āha ‘vijānātīti viññātabba’nti,” tā-saddo pana bhāve. Assādiyamānapakkhe ṭhito kilesakāmopi
tika-s0105t0:1048_15: vatthukāmapariyāpannoyeva, tasmā tesu yathāruci paribhuñjantoti attho.
tika-s0105t0:1049_0: Idanti nayacatukkavasena vuttaṃ atthappabhedavibhajanaṃ. “Titthiyavasena āgataṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1049_1: tathā vibhattattā”ti ācariyena vuttaṃ, tathāyeva pana pāḷiyampi vibhattanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1050_0: Kathaṃ labbhatīti āha “ekacco hī”tiādi. Yasmā na labhati, tasmā anesanaṃ katvātiādinā
tika-s0105t0:1050_1: yojetabbaṃ. Arahattaṃ vā attani asantaṃ “atthi me”ti yathārutaṃ paṭijānitvā. Sāmantajappanapaccayapaṭisevanairiyāpathasannissitasaṅkhātāni
tika-s0105t0:1051: Tādisovāti dhutaṅga samādānavasena lūkhājīvī eva. Anesanavasenāti nidassanamattaṃ. “Arahattapaṭijānanenā”tiādipi hi vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1052: Dullabhasukho bhavissāmi duggatīsu upapattiyāti adhippāyo. Asakkontoti ettha antasaddo bhāvalakkhaṇe, asakkuṇamāne satīti attho.
tika-s0105t0:1053_0: 383. Asukaṭṭhānatoti asukabhavato. Āgatāti upapattivasena idhāgatā. Idāni gantabbaṭṭhānañcāti
tika-s0105t0:1053_1: upapattivaseneva āyatiṃ gamitabbabhavañca. Tatoti atītabhavato. Puna upapattinti
tika-s0105t0:1053_2: āyatiṃ anantarabhave puna upapattiṃ, tato anantarabhavepi puna upapattinti punappunaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1053_3: nibbattiṃ. Kena kāraṇena garahissāmīti ettha yathābhūtamajānanto icchādosavasena
tika-s0105t0:1053_4: yaṃ kiñci garaheyya, na tathā cāhaṃ, ahaṃ pana yathābhūtaṃ jānanto sabbampetaṃ kena
tika-s0105t0:1053_5: kāraṇena garahissāmi, sabbassapetassa tapassa garahāya kāraṇaṃ natthīti imamadhippāyaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1053_7: dhotaṃ, tathā adhotañca, upameyyapakkhe pana pasaṃsitabbaguṇatāya dhotaṃ parisuddhaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:1053_8: tathā adhotañcāti attho. Tamatthanti garahitabbassa ceva garahaṇaṃ, pasaṃsitabbassa ca pasaṃsanaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1054_0: 384. Diṭṭhadhammikassa, samparāyikassa ca atthassa sādhanavasena pavattiyā garukattā
tika-s0105t0:1054_1: na koci na sādhūti vadati. Pañcavidhaṃ veranti pāṇātipātādipañcavidhaveraṃ. Tañhi
tika-s0105t0:1054_2: pañcavidhassa sīlassa paṭipakkhabhāvato, sattānaṃ verahetutāya ca “vera”nti vuccati,
tika-s0105t0:1054_3: tato eva ca taṃ na koci “sādhū”ti vadati tathā diṭṭhadhammikādiatthānamasādhanato,
tika-s0105t0:1054_4: sattānaṃ sādhubhāvassa dūsanato ca. Na nirundhitabbanti rūpaggahaṇe na nivāretabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1054_5: Dassanīyadassanattho hi cakkhupaṭilābhoti tesamadhippāyo. Ayameva nayo sotādīsupi.
tika-s0105t0:1054_6: Yadaggena tesaṃ pañcadvāre asaṃvaro sādhu, tadaggena tattha saṃvaro na sādhūti adhippāyo
tika-s0105t0:1055_0: Ayamettha aṭṭhakathāto aparo nayo – yaṃ te ekaccaṃ vadanti “sādhū”ti te “eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā”ti
tika-s0105t0:1055_1: vuttā titthiyā yaṃ attakilamathānuyogādiṃ “sādhū”ti vadanti, taṃ mayaṃ na “sādhū”ti
tika-s0105t0:1055_2: vadāma. Yaṃ te…pe… “na sādhū”ti yaṃ pana te anavajjapaccayaparibhogaṃ, sunivatthasupārutādisammāpaṭipattiñca
tika-s0105t0:1056_0: Iti yaṃ paravādamūlakaṃ catukkaṃ dassitaṃ, tadeva puna sakavādamūlakaṃ catukkaṃ katvā
tika-s0105t0:1056_1: dassitanti viññāpetuṃ “eva”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Yañhi kiñci kenaci samānaṃ, tenapi taṃ
tika-s0105t0:1056_2: samānameva. Yañca kiñci kenaci asamānaṃ, tenapi taṃ asamānamevāti āha “samānāsamānata”nti.
tika-s0105t0:1056_3: Ettha ca samānatanti samānatāmattaṃ. Anavasesato hi pahātabbadhammānaṃ pahānaṃ, upasampādetabbadhammānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1056_4: upasampādanañca sakavādeva dissati, na paravāde. Tena vuttaṃ “tyāhaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
tika-s0105t0:1056_5: evaṃ vadāmī”tiādi. Sakavādaparavādānurūpaṃ vuttanayena pañcasīlādivaseneva attho veditabbo.
tika-s0105t0:1058_0: 385. Antamiti āṇattiyaṃ pañcamīattanopadaṃ. Laddhiṃ pucchantoti “kiṃ samaṇo gotamo
tika-s0105t0:1058_1: saṃkilesadhamme anavasesaṃ pahāya vattati, udāhu pare gaṇācariyā, ettha tāva attano
tika-s0105t0:1058_2: laddhiṃ vadehī”ti evaṃ paṭiññātaṃ siddhantaṃ pucchanto. Kāraṇaṃ pucchantoti “samaṇova
tika-s0105t0:1058_3: gotamo saṃkilesadhamme anavasesaṃ pahāya vattatī”ti vutte “kāraṇenapi etamatthaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1058_4: gāhayā”ti evaṃ hetuṃ pucchanto. Ubhayaṃ pucchantoti “idaṃ nāmettha kāraṇa”nti kāraṇaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1058_5: vatvā paṭiññāte atthe sādhiyamāne anvayato, byatirekato ca kāraṇaṃ samatthetuṃ sadisāsadisappabhedaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1058_7: yathāpaṭiññāte atthe sādhite sammadeva anu pacchā bhāsanto nigamentopi samanubhāsati
tika-s0105t0:1058_9: Dutiyapadepīti “saṅghena vā saṅgha”nti padepi. Vacanasesaṃ, upasaṃharaṇākārañca sandhāya
tika-s0105t0:1059_0: Tamatthanti taṃ pahātabbadhammānaṃ anavasesaṃ pahāya vattanasaṅkhātaṃ, samādātabbadhammānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1059_1: anavasesaṃ samādāya vattanasaṅkhātañca atthaṃ. Yojetvāti akusalādipadehi yojetvā.
tika-s0105t0:1059_2: Akosallasambhūtādiatthena akusalā ceva tatoyeva akusalāti ca saṅkhātā, saṅkhātasaddo
tika-s0105t0:1059_3: cettha ñātattho, koṭṭhāsattho ca yujjatīti āha “ñātā, koṭṭhāsaṃ vā katvā ṭhapitā”ti,
tika-s0105t0:1059_4: purimena cettha padena ekantākusale vadati, pacchimena taṃ sahagate, tappaṭipakkhiye
tika-s0105t0:1059_5: ca. Evañhi koṭṭhāsakaraṇena ṭhapanaṃ upapannaṃ hoti. Akusalapakkhikabhāvena hi vavatthāpanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1059_6: koṭṭhāsakaraṇaṃ. Avajjasaddo dosattho gārayhapariyāyattā, a-saddassa ca tabbhāvavuttitoti
tika-s0105t0:1059_7: āha “sadosā”ti. Ariyā nāma niddosā. Ime pana akusalā kathañcipi niddosā na hontīti
tika-s0105t0:1060_0: 386-392. “Ya”nti etaṃ kāraṇe paccattavacananti dasseti “yenā”ti iminā. Yaṃ vā panāti
tika-s0105t0:1060_1: asambhāvanāvacanametaṃ, yaṃ vā pana kiñcīti attho. Pahāya vattantīti ca atthavasā
tika-s0105t0:1060_2: puthuvacanavipariṇāmoti vuttaṃ “yaṃ vā taṃ vā appamattakaṃ pahāya vattantī”ti. Gaṇācariyā
tika-s0105t0:1060_3: cettha pūraṇamakkhaliādayo. Satthupabhavattā saṅghassa saṅghasampattiyāpi satthusampatti
tika-s0105t0:1060_4: vibhāvīyatīti āha “saṅgha…pe… siddhito”ti, sā pana pasaṃsā pasādahetukāti pasādamukhena
tika-s0105t0:1060_5: taṃ dassetuṃ “pasīdamānāpī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha sampiṇḍanatthena pi-saddena appasīdamānāpi
tika-s0105t0:1060_6: evameva na pasīdantīti sampiṇḍeti. Yathā hi anvayato satthusampattiyā sāvakesu, sāvakasampattiyā
tika-s0105t0:1060_7: ca satthari pasādo samuccīyati, evaṃ byatirekato satthuvipattiyā sāvakesu, sāvakavipattiyā
tika-s0105t0:1060_8: ca satthariappasādoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Tathā hī”tiādi tabbivaraṇaṃ. Sarīrasampattinti
tika-s0105t0:1060_9: rūpasampattiṃ, rūpakāyapāripūrinti attho. Rūpappamāṇe satte sandhāya idaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:1060_10: “dhammadesanaṃ vā sutvā”ti idantu ghosappamāṇe, dhammappamāṇe ca, “bhikkhūnaṃ panācāragocara”ntiādiṃ
tika-s0105t0:1060_11: pana dhammappamāṇe, lūkhappamāṇe ca. Ācāragocarādīhi dhammo, sammāpaṭipattiyā lūkho
tika-s0105t0:1060_12: ca hoti. Tasmā “bhavanti vattāro”ti paṭhamapade rūpappamāṇā, ghosappamāṇā, dhammappamāṇā
tika-s0105t0:1060_13: ca, dutiyapade dhammappamāṇāva yojetabbā. Kīvarūpoti kittakajātiko. Yā saṅghassa
tika-s0105t0:1060_14: pasaṃsāti ānetvā sambandho, ayameva vā pāṭho.
tika-s0105t0:1061_0: Tattha yā buddhānaṃ, buddhasāvakānameva ca pāsaṃsatā, aññesañca tadabhāvo jotito,
tika-s0105t0:1061_2: Tattha setughātaviratiyā ariyamaggasampayuttattā “sabbena sabbaṃ natthī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1061_4: yathālābhaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Vipassanāmattavasenāti ca “anicca”nti vā “dukkha”nti vā vividhaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1061_6: āropetvā saṅkhārānaṃ sammasanavasena. Nāmarūpaparicchedo, hi anattānupassanā ca bāhirakānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1061_7: natthi. Itarāni samucchedapaṭippassaddhinissaraṇappahānāni tīṇi sabbena sabbaṃ natthi
tika-s0105t0:1061_8: maggaphalanibbānattā. Lokiyapañcasīlato añño sabbopi sīlasaṃvaro, “khamo hoti sītassa
tika-s0105t0:1061_9: uṇhassā”tiādinā vutto suparisuddho khantisaṃvaro, “paññāyete pidhiyyare”tiādinā vutto
tika-s0105t0:1061_10: kilesānaṃ samucchedako maggañāṇasaṅkhāto ñāṇasaṃvaro, manacchaṭṭhānaṃ indriyānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1061_11: pidahanavasena pavatto suparisuddho indriyasaṃvaro, “anuppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1061_12: dhammānaṃ anuppādāyā”tiādinā vutto sammappadhānasaṅkhāto vīriyasaṃvaroti imaṃ saṃvarapañcakaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1062_0: “Pañca kho panime pātimokkhuddesā”tiādinā yathāvuttasīlasseva puna gahaṇaṃ sāsane
tika-s0105t0:1062_1: sīlassa bahubhāvaṃ dassetvā tadekadese eva paresaṃ avaṭṭhānadassanatthaṃ. “Uposathuddesā”ti
tika-s0105t0:1062_2: adhunā pāṭho. Paññāyatīti patiṭṭhitabhāvena pākaṭo hoti, tasmā mayā hi…pe… natthīti
tika-s0105t0:1062_3: yojetabbaṃ. Sīhanādanti seṭṭhanādaṃ, abhītanādaṃ kenaci appaṭivattiyavādaṃ. Yaṃ pana vadanti –
tika-s0105t0:1067_0: 393. “Ayaṃ pana yathāvutto mama vādo aviparītova, tassevaṃ aviparītabhāvo imaṃ maggaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1067_1: paṭipajjitvā aparappaccayato jānitabbo”ti evaṃ aviparītabhāvāvabodhanatthaṃ. Pāḷiyaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1067_2: “atthi kassapā”tiādīsu ayaṃ yojanā – yaṃ maggaṃ paṭipanno sāmaṃyeva attapaccakkhato
tika-s0105t0:1067_3: evaṃ ñassati dakkhati “samaṇo gotamo vadanto yuttapattakāle tathabhāvato bhūtaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:1067_4: ekaṃsena hitāvahabhāvato atthaṃ, dhammato anapetattā dhammaṃ, vinayayogato, paresañca
tika-s0105t0:1067_5: vinayanato vinayaṃ vadatī”ti, so mayā sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedito sakalavaṭṭadukkhanissaraṇabhūto
tika-s0105t0:1067_6: atthi kassapa maggo, tassa ca adhigamūpāyabhūtā pubbabhāgapaṭipadāti, tena “samaṇo
tika-s0105t0:1067_7: gotamo ime dhamme anavasesaṃ pahāya vattatī”tiādi nayappavatto vādo kenaci asampakampito
tika-s0105t0:1067_8: yathābhūta sīhanādoti dasseti. Dakkhatīti cettha ssati-saddena padasiddhi “yatra
tika-s0105t0:1067_9: hi nāma sāvako evarūpaṃ ñassati vā dakkhati vā sakkhiṃ karissatī”tiādīsu viya.
tika-s0105t0:1068_0: “Evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya passatī”tiādi suttapadesu viya ca maggañca paṭipadañca
tika-s0105t0:1068_1: ekato katvā dassento. “Ayamevā”ti sāvadhāraṇavacanaṃ maggassa puthubhāvapaṭikkhepatthaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:1073: Tarissanti ye ca taranti ogha”nti. ca –
tika-s0105t0:1074: Sabbesu ceva suttapadesesu, abhidhammapadesesu ca ekovāyaṃ maggo pākaṭoti.
tika-s0105t0:1076_0: 394. Tapoyeva upakkamitabbato, ārabhitabbato tapopakkamāti āha “tapārambhā”ti, ārambhanañcettha
tika-s0105t0:1076_1: tapakaraṇamevāti dasseti “tapokammānī”ti iminā. Samaṇakammasaṅkhātāti samaṇehi kattabbakammasaññitā.
tika-s0105t0:1076_2: Brāhmaṇakammasaṅkhātāti etthāpi eseva nayo. Niccoloti nissaṭṭhacolo sabbena sabbaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1076_3: paṭikkhittacolo. Celaṃ, coloti ca pariyāyavacanaṃ. Koci chinnabhinnapaṭapilotikadharopi
tika-s0105t0:1076_4: dasantayuttassa vatthassa abhāvato “niccolo”ti vattabbataṃ labheyyāti taṃ nivattetuṃ
tika-s0105t0:1076_5: “naggo”ti vuttaṃ, naggiyavatasamādānena sabbathā naggoti attho. Lokiyakulaputtācāravirahitatāva
tika-s0105t0:1076_7: idañca nidassanamattaṃ vamitvā mukhavikkhālanādiācārassapi tena vissaṭṭhattā. Apalikhatīti
tika-s0105t0:1076_8: udakena adhovanato apalihati. So kira daṇḍakaṃ “satto”ti paññapeti, tasmā taṃ paṭipadaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1076_9: pūrento evaṃ karotīti vuttaṃ “uccāraṃ vā”tiādi. Tattha apalikhatīti apakasati.
tika-s0105t0:1077_0: “Ehi bhadanto”ti vutte upagamanasaṅkhāto vidhi ehibhaddanto, taṃ caratīti ehibhaddantiko,
tika-s0105t0:1077_1: ruḷhisaddena cettha taddhitasiddhi yathā “ehipassiko”ti, tappaṭikkhepena naehibhaddantiko,
tika-s0105t0:1077_2: tadevatthaṃ dasseti “bhikkhāgahaṇattha”ntiādinā. Na etīti na āgacchati. Evaṃ natiṭṭhabhaddantikoti
tika-s0105t0:1077_3: etthāpi. Samaṇena nāma sayaṃvacanakareneva bhavitabbaṃ, na paravacanakarenāti adhippāyena
tika-s0105t0:1077_4: tadubhayampi…pe… na karoti. Puretaranti taṃ ṭhānaṃ attanā upagamanato paṭhamataraṃ,
tika-s0105t0:1077_5: taṃ kira so “bhikkhunā nāma yādicchakī eva bhikkhā gahetabbā”ti adhippāyena na gaṇhāti.
tika-s0105t0:1077_6: Uddissakataṃ pana “mama nimittabhāvena bahū khuddakā pāṇā saṅghāṭamāpāditā”ti adhippāyena
tika-s0105t0:1077_7: nādhivāseti. Nimantanampi “evaṃ tesaṃ vacanaṃ kataṃ bhavissatī”ti adhippāyena na
tika-s0105t0:1077_8: sādiyati. Kumbhīti pakkabhikkhāpakkhittakumbho. Ukkhalīti bhikkhāpacanakumbho. Pacchīti
tika-s0105t0:1077_9: bhikkhāpakkhittapiṭakaṃ. Tatopīti kumbhīkaḷopitopi. Kumbhīādīsupi so sattasaññīti
tika-s0105t0:1077_10: āha “kumbhīkaḷopiyo”tiādi. “Ayaṃ ma”ntiādīsupi eseva nayo. Antaranti ubhinnamantarāḷaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1078_0: Kabaḷantarāyoti ālopassa antarāyo. Etthāpi so sattasaññī. Purisantaragatāyāti purisasamīpagatāya.
tika-s0105t0:1078_1: Ratiantarāyoti kāmaratiyā antarāyo. Gāmasabhāgādivasena saṅgamma kittenti etissāti
tika-s0105t0:1078_2: saṃkitti. Tathā saṃhaṭataṇḍulādisañcayo tena katabhattamidhādhippetanti vuttaṃ “saṃkittetvā
tika-s0105t0:1078_3: katabhattesū”ti. Majjhimanikāye mahāsīhanādasuttantaṭīkāyaṃ pana ācariyeneva evaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1078_4: vuttaṃ “saṃkittayanti etāyāti saṃkitti, gāmavāsīhi samudāyavasena kiriyamānakiriyā,
tika-s0105t0:1078_5: ettha pana bhattasaṃkitti adhippetāti āha ‘saṃkittetvā katabhattesū’ti”. Idaṃ pana
tika-s0105t0:1078_6: tassa ukkaṭṭhapaṭipadāti dasseti “ukkaṭṭho”tiādinā. Yathā cettha, evaṃ “naehibhaddantiko”tiādīsupi
tika-s0105t0:1078_7: ukkaṭṭhapaṭipadādassanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Sāsaddo sunakhapariyāyo. Tassāti sunakhassa.
tika-s0105t0:1078_8: Tatthāti tasmiṃ ṭhāne. Samūhasamūhacārinīti saṅghasaṅghacārinī. Manussāti veyyāvaccakaramanussā.
tika-s0105t0:1079_2: majjalakkhaṇappattāya surāya pānameva. Merayampettha saṅgahitaṃ lakkhaṇahārena, ekasesanayena
tika-s0105t0:1079_3: vā. Sabbesupīti sāvajjānavajjesupi kañjikasurādīsu. Ekāgārameva bhikkhācariyāya upagacchatīti
tika-s0105t0:1079_4: ekāgāriko. Nivattatīti paccāgacchati, sati bhikkhālābhe taduttari na gacchatīti vuttaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1079_5: hoti. Ekālopeneva vattatīti ekālopiko. Dīyati etāyāti datti, dvattiālopamattaggāhi
tika-s0105t0:1079_7: samābhisaṅkhatatāya vā uttamabhikkhaṃ. Abhuñjanavasena eko ho etassāti ekāhiko, āhāro,
tika-s0105t0:1079_8: taṃ āhāraṃ āhāretīti attho. So pana atthato ekadivasalaṅghakoti vuttaṃ “ekadivasantarika”nti.
tika-s0105t0:1079_9: Esa nayo “dvāhika”ntiādīsupi. Apica ekāhaṃ abhuñjitvā ekāhaṃ bhuñjanaṃ, ekāhavāro
tika-s0105t0:1079_10: vā ekāhikaṃ. Dvīhaṃ abhuñjitvā dvīhaṃ bhuñjanaṃ, dvīhavāro vā dvāhikaṃ. Sesadvayepi
tika-s0105t0:1079_11: ayaṃ nayo. Ukkaṭṭho hi pariyāyabhattabhojaniko dvīhaṃ abhuñjitvā ekāhameva bhuñjati.
tika-s0105t0:1079_12: Evaṃ sesadvayepi. Majjhimāgamaṭīkāyaṃ pana “ekāhaṃ antarabhūtaṃ etassa atthīti ekāhikaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1079_13: Sesapadesupi esa nayo”ti vuttaṃ. “Therā bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo ovadanti pariyāyenā”tiādīsu
tika-s0105t0:1079_14: viya vārattho pariyāya saddo. Ekāhavārenāti ekāhikavārena. “Ekāhika”ntiādinā vuttavidhimeva
tika-s0105t0:1079_15: paṭipāṭiyā pavattabhāvena dassetuṃ pāḷiyaṃ “iti evarūpa”ntiādi vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1080_0: 395. Sāmāko nāma godhumo. Sayaṃjātā vīhijātīti aropimavīhijāti. Yadeva “vīhī”ti vadanti.
tika-s0105t0:1080_1: Likhitvāti kasitvā. Silesopīti kaṇikārādirukkhaniyyāsopi. Kuṇḍakanti tanutaraṃ taṇḍulasakalaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:1080_2: taṇḍulakhaṇḍakanti attho. Odanena kataṃ kañjiyaṃ odanakañjiyaṃ. “Vāsitakena piññākena
tika-s0105t0:1080_3: nahāyeyyā”tiādīsu viya piññāka saddo tilapiṭṭhapariyāyo. Yathāha “piññākaṃ nāma tilapiṭṭhaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1080_4: vuccatī”ti. “Taruṇakadalikkhandhameva piññāka”nti keci, na gahetabbametaṃ katthacipi tathā avacanato.
tika-s0105t0:1081_0: 396. Saṇehi saṇavākehi nibbattitāni sāṇāni, aññehi missakāni sāṇāni eva masāṇāni
tika-s0105t0:1081_1: niruttinayena, na chacīvarapariyāpannāni bhaṅgāni. Keci pana “masāṇāni nāma coḷavisesānīti
tika-s0105t0:1081_2: parikappetvā massakacoḷānī”ti paṭhanti, tadayuttameva porāṇehi tathā avuttattā. Erakatiṇādīnīti
tika-s0105t0:1081_3: ettha ādisaddena akkamakacikadalivākādīnaṃ saṅgaho, erakādīhi katāni hi chavāni lāmakāni
tika-s0105t0:1081_4: dussānīti vattabbataṃ labhanti. Chavasaddo hettha hīnavācako, purimavikappe pana
tika-s0105t0:1081_5: matasarīravācako. Chaḍḍitanantakānīti chaḍḍitapilotikāni. Ajinassedanti ajinaṃ, pakatiajinamigacammaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:1081_6: tadeva majjhe phālitakañce, ajinassa khipaṃ phālitamupaḍḍhanti ajinakkhipaṃ. “Sakhurakantipi
tika-s0105t0:1081_7: vadantī”ti papañcasūdaniyaṃ vuttaṃ, dvinnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vā samuditañce, ajinakkhipanti
tika-s0105t0:1081_8: tesamadhippāyo. Vinayasaṃvaṇṇanāsu pana “ajinameva abhedato ajinakkhipa”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1081_9: Kanditvāti ujjavujjavena kanditvā. “Ganthetvā”tipi pāṭho, vaṭṭetvā bandhitvāti attho.
tika-s0105t0:1081_10: Evañhi phalakacīre nidassanaṃ upapannaṃ hoti. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttanti ajitavādassa
tika-s0105t0:1081_11: paṭikiṭṭhatarabhāve upamādassanatthaṃ yadeva kesakambalaṃ sandhāya aṅguttarāgame vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1082_0: Tantāvutānīti tantaṃ pasāretvā vītāni. Paṭikiṭṭhoti hīno. Kasmāti vuttaṃ “kesakambalo”tiādi.
tika-s0105t0:1082_1: Pāḷiyaṃ ubbhaṭṭhako”ti etassa “uddhaṃ ṭhitako”ti attho majjhimāgamaṭṭhakathāyaṃ mahāsīhanādasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1082_2: vutto. Ubbhasaddo hi upariatthe nepātiko yathā “ubbhajāṇumaṇḍala”nti. Anekaparimāṇā,
tika-s0105t0:1083_0: Micchāvāyāmavaseneva ukkuṭikavatānuyogoti āha “ukkuṭikavīriyaṃ anuyutto”ti. Na kevalaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1083_1: nisinnoyeva ukkuṭiko, atha kho gacchantopi…pe… gacchati. Ayakaṇṭaketi ayomayakaṇṭake.
tika-s0105t0:1083_2: Pakatikaṇṭaketi salākakaṇṭake. Uccabhūmiyaṃ thaṇḍilasaddoti vuttaṃ “ucce bhūmiṭṭhāne”ti.
tika-s0105t0:1083_3: Ayaṃ aṭṭhakathāto aparo nayo – thaṇḍilanti samāpakatibhūmi vuccati “patthaṇḍile pāturahosī”tiādīsu
tika-s0105t0:1083_4: viya. Amarakosepi hi nighaṇṭusatthe vuttaṃ “vedī parikkhatā bhūmi, same thaṇḍilaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1083_5: cāture”ti (sattarasamavagge 18 gāthāyaṃ) tasmā thaṇḍile anantarahitāya pakatibhūmiyaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1083_6: seyyampi kappetīti attho. Yaṃ sandhāya tattheva nighaṇṭusatthe vuttaṃ “yo thaṇḍile
tika-s0105t0:1083_7: vata vasā, sete thaṇḍilasāyi so”ti (sattarasamavagge 44 gāthāyaṃ) rajo eva jallaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1083_8: malīnaṃ rajojallaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ “sarīra”ntiādi. Laddhaṃ āsananti nisīdituṃ yathāladdhamāsanaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1083_9: Akopetvāti aññattha anupagantvā. Tathā cāha “tattheva nisīdanasīlo”ti. Evaṃ nisīdanto
tika-s0105t0:1083_10: hi taṃ akopento nāma hoti. Catūsu mahāvikaṭesu gūthamevidhādhippetanti vuttaṃ “gūthaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1083_11: vuccatī”ti. Tañhi āsayavasena virūpaṃ kaṭattā “vikaṭa”nti vuccati. Sāyaṃ tatiyanti
tika-s0105t0:1083_12: sāyanhasamayasaṅkhātaṃ tatiyasamayaṃ. Assāti udakorohanānuyogassa. Pātopadamiva sāyaṃpadaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1084_0: Ettha ca “acelako hotī”tiādīni yāva “thusodakaṃ pivatī”ti etāni vatapadāni ekavārāni,
tika-s0105t0:1084_1: “ekāgāriko vā hotī”tiādīni pana nānāvārāni, nānākālikāni vā. Tathā “sākabhakkho vā
tika-s0105t0:1084_2: hotī”tiādīni, “sāṇānipi dhāreti, masāṇānipi dhāretī”tiādīni ca. Tathā hettha vā-saddaggahaṇaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:1084_3: pi-saddaggahaṇañca kataṃ. Pi-saddopi idha vikappattho eva daṭṭhabbo. Purimesu pana
tika-s0105t0:1084_4: vatapadesu tadubhayampi na kataṃ, evañca katvā “acelako hotī”ti vatvā “sāṇānipi dhāretī”tiādivacanassa,
tika-s0105t0:1084_6: ca avirodho siddho hoti. Atha vā kimettha avirodhacintāya. Ummattakapacchisadiso
tika-s0105t0:1084_7: hi titthiyavādo. Apica “acelako hotī”ti ārabhitvā tappasaṅgena sabbampi aññamaññavirodhameva
tika-s0105t0:1084_8: attakilamathānuyogaṃ dassentena tena acelakassapena “sāṇānipi dhāretī”tiādi vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1086_0: 397. Sīlasampadādīhīti sīlasampadā, samādhisampadā, paññāsampadāti imāhi lokuttarāhi
tika-s0105t0:1086_1: sampadāhi. Vināti virahitattā, vinā vā tāhi na kadācipi sāmaññaṃ vā brahmaññaṃ vā
tika-s0105t0:1086_2: sambhavati, tasmā tesaṃ tapopakkamānaṃ niratthakataṃ dassentoti sapāṭhasesayojanā.
tika-s0105t0:1086_3: Dosaveravirahitanti dosasaṅkhātaverato virahitaṃ. Idañhi dosassa mettāya ujupaṭipakkhato
tika-s0105t0:1086_4: vuttaṃ. Yaṃ pana ācariyena vuttaṃ “dosaggahaṇena vā sabbepi jhānapaṭipakkhā saṃkilesadhammā
tika-s0105t0:1086_5: gahitā. Veraggahaṇena paccatthikabhūtā sattā. Yadaggena hi dosarahitaṃ, tadaggena
tika-s0105t0:1086_6: verarahita”nti, tadetaṃ pāḷiyaṃ verasaddasseva vijjamānattā, aṭṭhakathāyañca tadatthameva
tika-s0105t0:1087_0: 398. Ettakamattanti naggacariyādimattaṃ. Pākaṭabhāvena kāyati atthaṃ gametīti pakati,
tika-s0105t0:1087_1: lokasiddhavādo. Tenāha “pakatikathā esā”ti. “Mattā sukhapariccāgā”tiādīsu viya mattāsaddo
tika-s0105t0:1087_2: appattaṃ antonītaṃ katvā pamāṇavācakoti āha “iminā”tiādi. Tena pana pamāṇena pahātabbo
tika-s0105t0:1087_3: eva paṭipattikkamo pakaraṇappatto. Iminā “tapopakkamenā”ti saddantarena vā adhigatoti
tika-s0105t0:1087_4: dasseti “paṭipattikkamenā”ti iminā. Tatoti tasmā sāmaññabrahmaññassa appamattakeneva
tika-s0105t0:1088_0: 399. Aññathāti yadi acelakabhāvādinā sāmaññaṃ vā brahmaññaṃ vā abhavissa, evaṃ sati
tika-s0105t0:1088_1: suvijānova samaṇo, suvijāno brāhmaṇo. Yasmā pana tumhe ito aññathāva sāmaññaṃ, aññathā
tika-s0105t0:1088_2: brahmaññaṃ vadatha, tasmā dujjānova samaṇo dujjāno brāhmaṇoti attho. Tenāha “idaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1088_3: sandhāyāhā”ti. Taṃ pakativādaṃ paṭikkhipitvāti yaṃ pubbe pākatikaṃ sāmaññaṃ, brahmaññañca
tika-s0105t0:1088_4: hadaye ṭhapetvā tena acelakassapena “dukkaraṃ sudukkara”nti vuttaṃ, bhagavatā ca
tika-s0105t0:1088_5: tameva sandhāya “pakati kho esā”tiādi bhāsitaṃ, tameva idha pākatikasāmaññabrahmaññavisayaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1088_6: kathaṃ paṭisaṃharitvā. Sabhāvatova paramatthato eva samaṇassa, brāhmaṇassa ca dujjānabhāvaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1088_7: āvikaronto punapi “pakati kho”tiādimāha. Tatrāpīti samaṇabrāhmaṇavādepi. Padasambandhanti
tika-s0105t0:1090_0: 400-1. Paṇḍitoti hetusampattisiddhena paṇḍiccena samannāgato. Kathaṃ uggahesīti paripakkañāṇattā
tika-s0105t0:1090_1: ghaṭe padīpena viya abbhantare samujjalantena paññāveyyattiyena tattha tattha bhagavatā
tika-s0105t0:1090_2: desitamatthaṃ pariggaṇhanto taṃ desanaṃ upadhāresi. Yasmā uggahesi, tasmā…pe… viditvāti
tika-s0105t0:1090_3: sambandho. Tassa cāti yo acelako hoti, yāva udakorohanānuyogamanuyutto viharati,
tika-s0105t0:1090_4: tassa ca. Tassa ceti vā padacchedo, abhāvitā asacchikatā hoti ceti yojanā. Tā sampattiyo
tika-s0105t0:1090_5: pucchāmi, yāhi samaṇo ca brāhmaṇo ca hotīti adhippāyo. Sīlasampadādivijānanatthanti
tika-s0105t0:1090_6: sīlasampadādivijānanahetu. “Kasmā pucchatī”ti hi vuttaṃ. Atha-saddo cettha kāraṇe.
tika-s0105t0:1090_7: Evamīdisesu. Sīlasampadāyāti ettha itisaddo ādiattho, upalakkhaṇaniddeso vāyaṃ, tena
tika-s0105t0:1090_9: aññā”ti. Imehi ca asekkhasīlādikkhandhattayaṃ saṅgahitanti vuttaṃ “arahattaphalamevā”ti.
tika-s0105t0:1090_10: Tattha kāraṇaṃ dasseti “arahattaphalapariyosāna”ntiādinā. Idañhi kākolokanamiva ubhayāpekkhavacanaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1092_1: Mahāsīhanādanti mahantaṃ buddhasīhanādaṃ. Ativiya accantavisuddhatāya paramavisuddhaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1092_2: “Paramanti ukkaṭṭhaṃ. Tenāha ‘uttama’nti” ācariyena vuttaṃ, ukkaṭṭhapariyāyo ca paramasaddo
tika-s0105t0:1092_3: atthīti tassādhippāyo. Sīlamevāti lokiyasīlamattattā sīlasāmaññameva. Yathā anaññasādhāraṇaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1092_5: anaññasādhāraṇameva tadanucchavikabhāvena pavattattā. Evañhi “nāhaṃ tatthā”ti pāḷivacanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1092_6: upapannaṃ hoti. “Yāvatā kassapa ariyaṃ paramaṃ sīla”nti idaṃ “sīlassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsantī”ti
tika-s0105t0:1092_7: ettha ākāradassanaṃ. “Yadidaṃ adhisīla”nti idaṃ pana “tatthā”ti padadvaye aniyamavacanaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1092_8: “Yadidaṃ adhisīla”nti ca lokiyalokuttaravasena duvidhampi buddhasīlaṃ ekajjhaṃ katvā
tika-s0105t0:1092_9: vuttaṃ, tasmā ta-saddenapi ubhayasseva parāmasananti dassetuṃ “tattha sīlepi paramasīlepī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0105t0:1092_10: Samasamanti samena visesanabhūtena sīlena samanti atthaṃ viññāpetuṃ “mama sīlasamena
tika-s0105t0:1092_11: sīlena mayā sama”nti vuttaṃ. Tasmiṃ sīleti duvidhepi sīle. Iti imanti evaṃ imaṃ sīlavisayaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1093_0: Tapatīti kilese santappati, vidhamatīti attho. “Tadevā”ti iminā tulyādhikaraṇasamāsamāha.
tika-s0105t0:1093_1: Jigucchatīti hīḷeti lāmakato ṭhapeti. Ārakā kilesehīti katvā niddosattā ariyā. Ārambhavatthuvasenāti
tika-s0105t0:1093_4: adhikāravasena sambandho. Sabbukkaṭṭhabhāvato paramā nāma. Yathā yuvino bhāvo yobbanaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:1093_5: evaṃ jigucchino bhāvo jegucchaṃ. Yadidaṃ adhijegucchanti sīle viya lokiyalokuttaravasena
tika-s0105t0:1093_6: duvidhampi buddhajegucchaṃ. Tatthāti jegucchepi adhijegucchepi. Kammassakatāpaññāti
tika-s0105t0:1093_7: “atthi dinnaṃ, atthi yiṭṭha”ntiādi nayappavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ. Yathāha vibhaṅge –
tika-s0105t0:1094_0: “Tattha kataraṃ kammassakatāñāṇaṃ, atthi dinnaṃ, atthi yiṭṭhaṃ, atthi hutaṃ, atthi
tika-s0105t0:1094_1: sukaṭadukkaṭānaṃ kammānaṃ phalaṃ vipāko…pe… ṭhapetvā saccānulomikaṃ ñāṇaṃ sabbāpi
tika-s0105t0:1095_0: Sabbampi hi akusalaṃ attano vā hotu, parassa vā, na sakaṃ nāma. Kasmā? Atthabhañjanato,
tika-s0105t0:1095_1: anatthajananato ca. Tathā sabbampi kusalaṃ sakaṃ nāma. Kasmā? Anatthabhañjanato,
tika-s0105t0:1095_2: atthajananato ca. Evaṃ kammassakabhāve pavattā paññā kammassakatāpaññā nāma. Vipassanāpaññāti
tika-s0105t0:1095_3: maggasaccassa, paramatthasaccassa ca anulomanato saccānulomikasaññitā vipassanāpaññā,
tika-s0105t0:1095_4: lokiyamattato paññāva. Itthiliṅgassa napuṃsakaliṅgavipariyāyo idha liṅgavipallāso.
tika-s0105t0:1095_5: Yāyaṃ adhipaññāti sīle viya lokiyalokuttaravasena duvidhāpi buddhapaññā. Tatthāti
tika-s0105t0:1095_6: paññāyapi adhipaññāyapi. Yathārahaṃ parittamahaggatabhāvato vimuttiyeva nāma. Maggaphalavasena
tika-s0105t0:1095_11: pana nibbānameva. Yā ayaṃ adhivimuttīti sīle vuttanayena duvidhāpi adhivimutti. Tatthāti
tika-s0105t0:1096_0: 403. Yaṃ kiñci janavivittaṭṭhānaṃ suññāgāramidhādhippetaṃ. Tattha nadantena vinā
tika-s0105t0:1096_1: añño jano natthīti dassetuṃ “ekakovā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Aṭṭhasu parisāsūti khattiyaparisā,
tika-s0105t0:1097_2: kutocipi asantassanabhāvā nibbhayabhāvāti attho. “Vesārajja”nti hi catūsu ṭhānesu
tika-s0105t0:1097_3: sārajjābhāvaṃ paccavekkhantassa uppannasomanassamayañāṇassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Aññehi pana
tika-s0105t0:1097_4: asādhāraṇataṃ dassetuṃ “tathāgatassa tathāgatavesārajjānī”ti vuttaṃ. “Yathā vā pubbabuddhānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1097_5: vesārajjāni puññussayasampattiyā āgatāni, tathā āgatavesārajjānī”ti vā dutiyassa
tika-s0105t0:1097_6: tathāgatasaddassa tulyādhikaraṇattā evaṃ vuttaṃ. Ayaṃ aṭṭhakathānayo. Neruttikā pana
tika-s0105t0:1097_7: vadanti “samāse siddhe sāmaññattā, saññāsaddattā ca tathā vutta”nti. Āsabhaṃ ṭhānanti
tika-s0105t0:1097_8: seṭṭhaṭṭhānaṃ uttamaṭṭhānaṃ. Sabbaññutaṃ paṭijānanavasena abhimukhaṃ gacchanti, aṭṭhaparisaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1097_9: upasaṅkamantīti vā āsabhā, buddhā, tesaṃ ṭhānantipi attho.
tika-s0105t0:1098_0: Apica tayo puṅgavā – gavasatajeṭṭhako usabho, gavasahassajeṭṭhako vasabho. Vajasatajeṭṭhako
tika-s0105t0:1098_1: vā usabho, vajasahassajeṭṭhako vasabho. Ekagāmakhette vā jeṭṭho usabho, dvīsu gāmakhettesu
tika-s0105t0:1098_2: jeṭṭho vasabho, sabbagavaseṭṭho sabbattha jeṭṭho sabbaparissayasaho seto pāsādiko
tika-s0105t0:1098_3: mahābhāravaho asanisatasaddehipi akampanīyo nisabhoti. Nisabhova idha “usabho”ti
tika-s0105t0:1098_4: adhippeto. Idampi hi tassa pariyāyavacanaṃ. Usabhassa idanti āsabhaṃ, idaṃ pana āsabhaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1098_5: viyāti āsabhaṃ. Yatheva hi nisabhasaṅkhāto usabho usabhabalena samannāgato catūhi
tika-s0105t0:1098_6: pādehi pathaviṃ uppīḷetvā acalaṭṭhānena tiṭṭhati, evaṃ tathāgatopi dasatathāgatabalena
tika-s0105t0:1098_7: samannāgato catūhi vesārajjapādehi aṭṭhaparisāpathaviṃ uppīḷetvā sadevake loke kenaci
tika-s0105t0:1098_8: paccatthikena paccāmittena akampiyo acalaṭṭhānena tiṭṭhati. Evaṃ tiṭṭhamānova taṃ
tika-s0105t0:1098_9: āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭivijānāti upagacchati na paccakkhāti attani āropeti. Tena vuttaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1099_0: Sīhanādaṃ nadatīti “seṭṭhanādaṃ abhītanādaṃ nadatī”ti vuttovāyamattho. Atha vā sīhanādasadisaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1099_1: nādaṃ nadati. Ayamattho khandhavaggasaṃyutte āgatena sīhanādasuttena dīpetabbo. Yathā
tika-s0105t0:1099_2: vā sīho migarājā parissayānaṃ sahanato, goṇamahiṃ samattavāraṇādīnaṃ hananato ca
tika-s0105t0:1099_3: “sīho”ti vuccati, evaṃ tathāgato munirājā lokadhammānaṃ sahanato, parappavādānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1099_4: hananato ca “sīho”ti vuccati. Evaṃ vuttassa sīhassa nādaṃ nadati. Tattha yathā migasīho
tika-s0105t0:1099_5: sīhabalena samannāgato sabbattha visārado vigatalomahaṃso sīhanādaṃ nadati, evaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1099_6: tathāgatasīho dasatathāgatabalena samannāgato aṭṭhasu parisāsu visārado vigatalomahaṃso
tika-s0105t0:1099_7: “iti rūpa”ntiādinā nayena nānāvidhadesanāvilāsasampannaṃ sīhanādaṃ nadati. Tena vuttaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1100_0: Pañhaṃ abhisaṅkharitvāti ñātumicchitaṃ atthaṃ attano ñāṇabalānurūpaṃ abhisaṅkharitvā.
tika-s0105t0:1100_2: atthadhammānurūpañca vissajjanato cittaṃ paritosetiyeva. Assāti samaṇassa gotamassa.
tika-s0105t0:1100_3: Sotabbaṃ maññantīti aṭṭhakkhaṇavajjitena navamena khaṇena labbhamānattā “yaṃ no satthā
tika-s0105t0:1100_4: sāsati, taṃ mayaṃ sossāmā”ti ādarabhāvajātā mahanteneva ussāhena sotabbaṃ sampaṭicchitabbaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1100_5: maññati. Kallacittā muducittāti pasādābhivuddhiyā vigatupakkilesatāya kallacittā
tika-s0105t0:1100_6: muducittā honti. Muddhappasannāti tucchappasannā niratthakappasannā. Pasannākāro
tika-s0105t0:1100_7: nāma pasannehi kātabbasakkāro, so duvidho dhammāmisapūjāvasena, tattha āmisapūjaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1100_9: iminā dassitā. Tathābhāvāyāti yathābhāvāya yassa vaṭṭadukkhanissaraṇassa atthāya
tika-s0105t0:1100_11: vuttaṃ. Dhammānudhammapaṭipatti hi vaṭṭadukkhanissaraṇapariyosānā, sā ca dhammānudhammapaṭipatti
tika-s0105t0:1100_12: yāya anupubbiyā paṭipajjitabbā, paṭipajjantānañca sati ajjhattikaṅgasamavāye ekaṃsikā
tika-s0105t0:1100_13: tassā pāripūrīti taṃ anupubbiṃ dassento “keci saraṇesū”tiādimāha. Yathā pūrentā pūretuṃ
tika-s0105t0:1100_14: sakkoti nāma, tathā pūraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “sabbākārena pana pūrentī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1101_0: Imasmiṃ panokāseti “paṭipannā ca ārādhentī”ti sīhanādakiccapāripūriṭṭhapane pāḷipadese.
tika-s0105t0:1101_1: Samodhānetabbāti saṅkalayitabbā. Ekaccaṃ…pe… passāmīti bhagavato eko sīhanādo asādhāraṇo
tika-s0105t0:1101_2: aññehi appaṭivattiyo seṭṭhanādo abhītanādoti katvā. Esa nayo sesesupi. Aparaṃ tapassinti
tika-s0105t0:1101_3: adhikāro. Purimānaṃ dasannanti “ekaccaṃ tapassiṃ niraye nibbattaṃ passāmī”ti vuttasīhanādato
tika-s0105t0:1101_4: paṭṭhāya yāva “vimuttiyā mayhaṃ sadiso natthī”ti vuttasīhanādā purimakānaṃ dasannaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1101_5: sīhanādānaṃ, niddhāraṇe cetaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. Tenāha “ekekassā”ti. “Parisāsu ca nadatī”ti
tika-s0105t0:1101_6: ādayo “paṭipannā ca maṃ ārādhentī”ti pariyosānā dasa dasa sīhanādā parivārā. “Ekaccaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1101_7: tapassiṃ niraye nibbattaṃ passāmī”ti hi sīhanādaṃ nadanto bhagavā parisāsu nadati
tika-s0105t0:1101_8: visārado hutvā nadati, tattha ca pañhaṃ pucchanti, pañhaṃ vissajjeti, vissajjanena
tika-s0105t0:1101_9: parassa cittaṃ ārādheti, sutvā sotabbaṃ maññanti, sutvā ca bhagavato pasīdanti, pasannā
tika-s0105t0:1101_10: ca pasannākāraṃ karonti, yaṃ paṭipattiṃ deseti, tathattāya paṭipajjanti, paṭipannā
tika-s0105t0:1101_11: ca maṃ ārādhentīti evaṃ parivāretvā atthayojanā sambhavati. Ayameva nayo sesesupi navasu.
tika-s0105t0:1102_0: “Eva”ntiādinā yathāvuttānaṃ sīhanādānaṃ saṅkalayitvā dassanaṃ. Te dasāti “parisāsu
tika-s0105t0:1102_1: ca nadatī”ti ādayo dasa sīhanādā. Purimānaṃ dasannanti yathāvuttānaṃ mūlabhūtānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1102_2: purimakānaṃ dasasīhanādānaṃ. Parivāravasenāti mūliṃ katvā paccekaṃ parivāravasena
tika-s0105t0:1102_3: yojiyamānā sataṃ sīhanādā. Purimā ca dasāti mūlamūliyo katvā parivāravasena ayojiyamānā
tika-s0105t0:1102_4: purimakā ca dasāti evaṃ dasādhikaṃ sīhanādasataṃ hoti. Aññasmiṃ pana sutteti majjhimāgamacūḷasīhanādasuttādimhi
tika-s0105t0:1102_5: tenāti saṅkhyāmahattena. Mahāsīhanādattā idaṃ suttaṃ “mahāsīhanāda”nti vuccati, na
tika-s0105t0:1104_0: 404. Paṭisedhetvāti tathā bhāvābhāvadassanena paṭikkhipitvā. Yaṃ bhagavā pāthikavagge
tika-s0105t0:1104_2: dassento saparisassa nigrodhaparibbājakassa purato sīhanādaṃ nadati, taṃ dassetuṃ
tika-s0105t0:1104_3: “idānī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Naditapubbanti udumbarikasutte āgatanayena pubbe nigrodhaparibbājakassa
tika-s0105t0:1104_4: naditaṃ. Tapabrahmacārīti uttamatapacārī, tapena vā vīriyena brahmacārī. Idanti “rājagahe…pe…
tika-s0105t0:1104_5: pañhaṃ apucchī”ti pāḷiyaṃ āgatavacanaṃ. Ācariyena pana yathāvuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāvacanameva
tika-s0105t0:1104_6: paccāmaṭṭhaṃ. Ettha ca kāmaṃ yadā nigrodho pañhamapucchi, bhagavā cassa vissajjesi,
tika-s0105t0:1104_7: na tadā bhagavā gijjhakūṭe pabbate viharati, rājagahasamīpeyeva udumbarikāya deviyā
tika-s0105t0:1104_8: uyyāne viharati tattheva tathā pucchitattā, vissajjitattā ca, tathāpi gijjhakūṭe
tika-s0105t0:1104_9: pabbate bhagavato vihāro na tāva vicchinno, tasmā pāḷiyaṃ “tatra ma”ntiādivacanaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:1104_10: aṭṭhakathāyañca “tatra rājagahe gijjhakūṭe pabbate viharantaṃ ma”ntiādivacanaṃ vuttanti
tika-s0105t0:1104_11: imamatthampi “yaṃ taṃ bhagavā”tiādinā viññāpetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Gijjhakūṭe pabbate”ti
tika-s0105t0:1104_12: idaṃ tattha katavihāraṃ sandhāya vuttanti dasseti “gijjhakūṭe mahāvihāre”ti iminā.
tika-s0105t0:1104_13: Udumbarikāyāti tannāmikāya. Uyyāneti tattha kataparibbājakārāmaṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-s0105t0:1104_14: Nigrodho nāma channaparibbājako. Sandhāno nāma pañcaupāsakasataparivāro anāgāmiupāsako.
tika-s0105t0:1104_15: Kathāsallāpanti “yagghe gahapati jāneyyāsi, kena samaṇo gotamo saddhiṃ sallapatī”tiādinā
tika-s0105t0:1104_16: sallāpakathaṃ. Paranti atisayatthe nipāto. Viyāti padapūraṇamatte yathā taṃ “ativiyā”ti.
tika-s0105t0:1104_17: Andhabālanti paññācakkhunā andhaṃ bālajanaṃ. Yogeti naye, dukkhanissaraṇūpāyeti attho.
tika-s0105t0:1105_0: 405. Anenāti bhagavatā. Khandhaketi mahāvagge pabbajjakhandhake yaṃ parivāsaṃ parivasatīti
tika-s0105t0:1105_2: vuttaṃ. Paṭhamaṃ pabbajjaṃ gahetvāva parivasatīti āha “sāmaṇerabhūmiyaṃ ṭhito”ti.
tika-s0105t0:1105_3: Tanti dvīhi ākārehi vuttaṃ parivāsaṃ. Pabbajjanti “ākaṅkhati pabbajjaṃ, ākaṅkhati
tika-s0105t0:1105_4: upasampada”nti ettha vuttaṃ pabbajjaggahaṇaṃ. “Uttaridirattatirattaṃ sahaseyyaṃ kappeyyā”ti
tika-s0105t0:1105_5: ettha dirattaggahaṇaṃ viya vacanasiliṭṭhatāvaseneva vuttaṃ. Yasmā pana sāmaṇerabhūmiyaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1105_6: ṭhiteneva parivasitabbaṃ, na gihibhūtena, tasmā aparivasitvāyeva pabbajjaṃ labhati.
tika-s0105t0:1105_8: sabrahmacārīnaṃ kiṃ karaṇīyesu dakkhānalasāditā, uddesaparipucchādīsu tibbacchandatā,
tika-s0105t0:1105_9: yassa titthāyatanato idhāgato, tassa avaṇṇabhaṇane attamanatā, buddhādīnaṃ avaṇṇabhaṇane
tika-s0105t0:1105_10: anattamanatā, yassa titthāyatanato idhāgato, tassa vaṇṇabhaṇane anattamanatā, buddhādīnaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1105_11: vaṇṇabhaṇane attamanatāti imesaṃ sattavattānaṃ saṅgaho veditabbo. Pūrentena parivasitabbanti
tika-s0105t0:1105_12: yadā parivasati, tadā pūramānena parivasitabbaṃ. Aṭṭhavattapūraṇenāti yathāvuttānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1105_13: aṭṭhannaṃ vattānaṃ pūraṇena. Etthāti parivāse, upasampadāya vā. Ghaṃsitvā koṭṭetvāti
tika-s0105t0:1105_14: ajjhāsayavīmaṃsanavasena suvaṇṇaṃ viya ghaṃsitvā koṭṭetvā. Pabbajjāyāti nidassanamattaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1106_0: “Gaṇamajjhe nisīditvāti upasampadākammassa gaṇappahonakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ majjhe saṅghatthero
tika-s0105t0:1106_1: viya tassa anuggahatthaṃ nisīditvā”ti ācariyena vuttaṃ, idāni pana bahūsupi potthakesu
tika-s0105t0:1106_2: “taṃ nisīdāpetvā”ti kāritavasena pāṭho dissati. Aciramupasampannassa assāti acirūpasampanno,
tika-s0105t0:1106_3: atthamattaṃ pana dassetuṃ “upasampanno hutvā naciramevā”ti āha. Kāyacittavivekāva
tika-s0105t0:1106_4: idhādhippetā upadhivivekatthaṃ paṭipajjanādhikārattāti vuttaṃ “kāyena ceva cittena
tika-s0105t0:1106_5: cā”ti. Vūpakaṭṭhoti vivitto. Tādisassa sīlavisodhane appamādo avuttasiddhoti kammaṭṭhāne
tika-s0105t0:1106_6: appamādameva dasseti. Pesitacittoti nibbānaṃ pati pesitacitto, tanninno tappoṇo tappabbhāroti
tika-s0105t0:1106_7: vuttaṃ hoti, evaṃbhūto ca tathā anapekkhatāya vissajjitakāyo nāmāti adhippāyamāvikātuṃ
tika-s0105t0:1106_8: “vissaṭṭhaattabhāvo”ti vuttaṃ. Attāti cettha cittaṃ vuccati rūpakāyassa avisayattā.
tika-s0105t0:1106_9: Yassāti arahattaphalassa. Jātikulaputtāpi ācārasampannā eva arahattādhigamāya pabbajjāpekkhā
tika-s0105t0:1106_10: hontīti tepi jātikulaputte teheva ācārakulaputtehi ekasaṅgahe karonto “ācārakulaputtā”ti
tika-s0105t0:1106_11: āha. Iminā hi ācārasampannā jātikulaputtāpi saṅgahitā honti. Ācārasampannānamevādhippetabhāvo
tika-s0105t0:1106_12: ca “sammadevā”ti saddantarena viññāyati. “Otiṇṇomhi jātiyā”tiādinā nayena hi saṃvegapubbikaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1106_13: yathānusiṭṭhaṃ pabbajjaṃ sandhāya “sammadevā”ti vuttaṃ. Tenāha “hetunāva kāraṇenevā”ti.
tika-s0105t0:1106_14: Tattha hetunāti nayena upāyena. Kāraṇenevāti tabbivaraṇavacanaṃ. Tanti arahattaphalaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1106_15: Tadeva hi “anuttaraṃ brahmacariyapariyosāna”nti vattumarahati aññesaṃ tathā abhāvato.
tika-s0105t0:1106_17: “Yassatthāya…pe… pabbajjantī”ti pubbe vuttassa tassa arahattaphalassa atthāya kulaputtā
tika-s0105t0:1106_18: pabbajanti, tasmā arahattaphalamidhādhippetanti viññāyatīti adhippāyo. Natthi paro
tika-s0105t0:1106_19: jano tathā sacchikaraṇe paccayo yassāti aparappaccayo, taṃ. Upa-saddo viya saṃ-saddopi
tika-s0105t0:1106_20: dhātusaddānuvattakoti vuttaṃ “pāpuṇitvā”ti, patvā adhigantvāti attho. Upa-saddo vā
tika-s0105t0:1106_21: dhātusaddānuvattako, saṃ-saddo pana dhātuvisesakoti āha “sampādetvā”ti, asekkhā sīlasamādhipaññāyo
tika-s0105t0:1107_1: iminā eva hi arahattanikūṭena desanā pariyosāpitā, taṃ pana nigametuṃ “aññataro…pe…
tika-s0105t0:1107_2: ahosī”ti dhammasaṅgāhakehi vuttaṃ. Ekatova idha aññataro, na pana nāmagottādīhi apākaṭato.
tika-s0105t0:1107_3: Arahantānanti ubbāhane cetaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. Tathā ubbāhitattā ca tesamabbhantaroti
tika-s0105t0:1107_4: attho āpannoti adhippāyaṃ dassento “bhagavato”tiādimāha. Keci pana evaṃ vadanti –
tika-s0105t0:1107_5: arahantānanti cetaṃ sambandheyeva sāmivacanaṃ, ato cettha saha pāṭhasesena adhippāyamatthaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1107_6: dassetuṃ “bhagavato”tiādi vuttanti. Yaṃ panettha atthato na vibhattaṃ, taṃ suviññeyyameva.
tika-s0105t0:1108_1: suvimalavipulapaññāveyyattiyajananāya sādhuvilāsiniyā nāma līnatthappakāsaniyā mahāsīhanādasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthapakāsanā.
tika-s0105t0:1112_0: 406. Evaṃ mahāsīhanādasuttaṃ saṃvaṇṇetvā idāni poṭṭhapādasuttaṃ saṃvaṇṇento yathānupubbaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1112_2: suttassa poṭṭhapādasuttabhāvaṃ vā pakāsetuṃ “evaṃ me sutaṃ…pe… sāvatthiyanti poṭṭhapādasutta”nti
tika-s0105t0:1112_3: āha. “Sāvatthiya”nti idaṃ samīpatthe bhummanti dassetuṃ “sāvatthiṃ upanissāyā”ti
tika-s0105t0:1112_4: vuttaṃ, cīvarādipaccayapaṭibaddhatāya upanissayaṃ katvāti attho. Jeto nāma rājakumāro,
tika-s0105t0:1112_5: tena ropitattā saṃvaḍḍhitattā paripālitattā jetassa vanaṃ upavananti atthamāha “jetassa
tika-s0105t0:1112_6: kumārassa vane”ti. Sudatto nāma gahapati anāthānaṃ piṇḍassa dāyakattā anāthapiṇḍiko.
tika-s0105t0:1112_7: Tena jetassa hatthato aṭṭhārasahiraññakoṭisantharaṇena taṃ kiṇitvā aṭṭhārasahiraññakoṭīheva
tika-s0105t0:1112_8: senāsanaṃ kārāpetvā aṭṭhārasahiraññakoṭīheva vihāramahaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā evaṃ catupaññāsahiraññakoṭipariccāgena
tika-s0105t0:1112_9: so ārāmo buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa niyyātito. Tenāha “anāthapiṇḍikena gahapatinā
tika-s0105t0:1112_10: ārāmo kārito”ti. Pupphaphalapallavādiguṇasampattiyā, pāṇino nivāsaphāsutādinā vā
tika-s0105t0:1112_11: visesena pabbajitā tato tato āgamma ramanti anukkaṇṭhitā hutvā nivasanti etthāti
tika-s0105t0:1112_12: ārāmo. Atha vā yathāvuttaguṇasampattiyā tattha tattha gatepi attano abbhantare ānetvā rametīti ārāmo.
tika-s0105t0:1113_0: Phoṭo yassa pādesu jātoti poṭṭhapādo. Phoṭo poṭṭhoti hi pariyāyo. Paribbājako duvidho
tika-s0105t0:1113_1: channaparibbājako, acchannaparibbājako ca. Tattha acchannaparibbājakopi acelako ājīvakoti
tika-s0105t0:1113_2: duvidho. Tesu acelako sabbena sabbaṃ naggo, ājīvako pana upari ekameva vatthaṃ upakacchakantare
tika-s0105t0:1113_3: pavesetvā pariharati, heṭṭhā naggo. Ayaṃ pana duvidhopesa na hotīti vuttaṃ “channaparibbājako”ti,
tika-s0105t0:1113_5: mahāvibhavatāya mahāsārataṃ patto brāhmaṇo. Gaṇācariyoti sāpekkhatāya samāso. Samayanti
tika-s0105t0:1113_6: sāmaññaniddeso, ekasesaniddeso vā, taṃ taṃ samayanti attho. Pavadantīti pakārato
tika-s0105t0:1113_7: vadanti, attanā attanā uggahitaniyāmena yathā tathā samayaṃ vadantīti attho. Tārukkhoti
tika-s0105t0:1113_8: tassa nāmaṃ. Pabhuti saddena todeyyajāṇusoṇīsoṇadaṇḍakūṭadantādike saṅgaṇhāti, ādisaddena
tika-s0105t0:1113_9: pana channaparibbājakādike. Tinduko nāma kāḷakkhandharukkho. Cīranti panti. Tindukā
tika-s0105t0:1113_10: cīraṃ ettha santīti tindukacīro. Tathā ekā sālā etthāti ekasālako. Bhūtapubbagatiyā
tika-s0105t0:1113_11: tamatthaṃ vitthārato dassento “yasmā”tiādimāha. Iti katvāti iminā kāraṇena. “Tasmi”ntiādinā
tika-s0105t0:1114_0: Anekākārānavasesañeyyatthavibhāgato, aparāparuppattito ca bhagavato ñāṇaṃ loke patthaṭamiva
tika-s0105t0:1114_1: hotīti vuttaṃ “sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ pattharitvā”ti, yato tassa ñāṇajālatā vuccati. Veneyyānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1114_2: tadantogadhabhāvo heṭṭhā vuttova. Veneyyasattapariggaṇhanatthaṃ samannāhāre kate
tika-s0105t0:1114_3: paṭhamaṃ nesaṃ veneyyabhāveneva upaṭṭhānaṃ hoti, atha saraṇagamanādivasena kiccanipphatti
tika-s0105t0:1114_4: vīmaṃsīyatīti āha “kinnu kho bhavissatīti upaparikkhanto”ti. Nirodhanti saññānirodhaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1114_5: Nirodhā vuṭṭhānanti tato nirodhato vuṭṭhānaṃ saññuppattiṃ. Sabbabuddhānaṃ ñāṇena
tika-s0105t0:1114_6: saṃsanditvāti yathā te nirodhaṃ, nirodhato vuṭṭhānañca byākariṃsu, byākarissanti
tika-s0105t0:1114_7: ca, tathā byākaraṇavasena saṃsanditvā. Katipāhaccayenāti dvīhatīhaccayena. Pāḷiyameva
tika-s0105t0:1114_8: hi imamatthaṃ vakkhati. Saraṇaṃ gamissatīti “saraṇa”miti gamissati. “Hatthisāriputtoti
tika-s0105t0:1114_9: hatthisārino putto”ti ācariyena vuttaṃ. Adhunā pana “citto hatthisāriputto” tveva
tika-s0105t0:1114_10: pāṭho dissati, citto nāma hatthācariyassa puttoti attho.
tika-s0105t0:1115_0: Surattadupaṭṭanti rajanena sammā rattaṃ diguṇaṃ antaravāsakaṃ parivattanavasena nivāsetvā.
tika-s0105t0:1115_1: “Yugandharapabbataṃ parikkhipitvā”ti idaṃ parikappavacanaṃ “tādiso atthi ce, taṃ
tika-s0105t0:1115_3: Paṭhamena cettha saṇṭhānasampattiṃ dasseti, dutiyena vaṇṇasampattiṃ. Ekaṃsavaragatanti
tika-s0105t0:1115_4: vāmaṃsavarappavattaṃ. Tathā hi suttanipātaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vaṅgīsasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1115_5: “ekaṃsanti ca vāmaṃsaṃ pārupitvā ṭhitassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Yato yathā vāmaṃsaṃ pārupitvā
tika-s0105t0:1115_6: ṭhitaṃ hoti, tathā cīvaraṃ katvāti evamassattho veditabbo”ti [su. ni. aṭṭha. nigrodhakappasutta
tika-s0105t0:1115_7: (vaṅgīsasutta) vaṇṇanā] tattha etanti “ekaṃsaṃ cīvaraṃ katvā”ti vacanaṃ. Yatoti yathāvuttavacanassa
tika-s0105t0:1115_8: pārupitvā ṭhitasseva adhivacanattā evamassa attho veditabboti sambandho. Paccagghanti
tika-s0105t0:1115_9: ekaṃ katvā anadhiṭṭhitakāle pāṭekkaṃ mahagghaṃ, paccagghaṃ vā abhinavaṃ, abbhuṇhe
tika-s0105t0:1115_10: taṅkhaṇe nibbattanti attho. Purimañcettha atthavikappaṃ keci na icchati. Tathā hi
tika-s0105t0:1115_11: ācariyeneva udānaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ “paccaggheti abhinave, paccekaṃ mahagghatāya
tika-s0105t0:1115_12: paccaggheti keci, taṃ na sundaraṃ. Na hi buddhā bhagavanto mahagghaṃ paṭiggaṇhanti,
tika-s0105t0:1115_13: paribhuñjanti cā”ti, idhāpi tena pacchimoyeva atthavikappo gahito. Abhinavatāya “paccaggha”nti
tika-s0105t0:1115_14: ca idaṃ ādito tathā laddhavohārena, anaññaparibhogatāya ca vuttaṃ, tathā vā satthu
