tika-s0105t0:1115_15: adhiṭṭhānena taṃ pattaṃ sabbakālaṃ “paccaggha”ntveva vuccati. Selamayapattanti muggavaṇṇasilāmayaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1115_16: catumahārājadattiyaṃ pattaṃ. Ayameva hi bhagavatā niccaparibhutto patto samacittasuttavaṇṇanādīsupi tathā vuttattā.
tika-s0105t0:1116_0: 407. Attano rucivasena ajjhāsayavasena, na parehi ussāhitoti adhippāyo. “Atippagabhāvameva
tika-s0105t0:1116_1: disvā”ti ca idaṃ bhūtakathanaṃ na tāva bhikkhācaraṇavelā sampattāti dassanatthaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1116_2: Bhagavā hi tadā kālasseva vihārato nikkhanto “vāsanābhāgiyāya dhammadesanāya poṭṭhapādaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1116_3: anuggaṇhissāmī”ti. Pāḷiyaṃ atippago khoti ettha “pago”ti idaṃ kaccāyanamatena pa-iccupasaggato
tika-s0105t0:1116_4: o-kāraga-kārāgamane siddhaṃ. Pa-saddoyeva pātoatthaṃ vadati. Aññesaṃ pana saddavidūnaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1116_5: matena pātopadamiva nepātikaṃ. Teneva tattha tattha aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ “atippago
tika-s0105t0:1116_6: khoti ativiya pāto”ti. Apica paṭhamaṃ gacchati divasabhāvena pavattatīti pagoti nibbacanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1116_7: iminā dassitaṃ. Duvidho khalusaddo viya hi pagoti saddo nāmanipātopasaggavasena tividho.
tika-s0105t0:1116_8: Evañhi idha “atippagabhāvameva disvā”ti vacanaṃ upapannaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t0:1117_0: Yaṃnūnāti esa nipāto aññattha saṃsayaparidīpano, idha pana saṃsayapatirūpakaparidīpanova.
tika-s0105t0:1117_1: Kasmā “saṃsayaparidīpane”ti vuttaṃ, nanu buddhānaṃ saṃsayo natthīti āha “buddhānañcā”tiādi.
tika-s0105t0:1117_2: Saṃsayo nāma natthi bodhimūle eva tassa samugghāṭitattā. Parivitakkapubbabhāgoti
tika-s0105t0:1117_3: adhippetakiccassa pubbabhāge pavattaparivitakko. Esāti “karissāma, na karissāmā”tiādiko
tika-s0105t0:1117_4: esa cittācāro sabbabuddhānaṃ labbhati sambhavati vicāraṇavaseneva pavattanato, na
tika-s0105t0:1117_5: pana saṃsayavasena. Tenāhāti yenesa sabbabuddhānaṃ labbhati, tena bhagavā evamāhāti
tika-s0105t0:1117_6: imameva pāḷiṃ imassa atthassa sādhakaṃ karoti. Ayaṃ aṭṭhakathāto aparo nayo – yaṃnūnāti
tika-s0105t0:1117_7: parikappane nipāto. “Upasaṅkameyya”nti kiriyāpadena vuccamānoyeva hi attho anena
tika-s0105t0:1117_8: jotīyati. Tasmā ahaṃ yaṃnūna yadi pana upasaṅkameyyaṃ sādhu vatāti yojanā. “Yadi
tika-s0105t0:1117_9: panā”ti idampi tena samānatthanti vuttaṃ “yadi panāhanti attho”ti.
tika-s0105t0:1118_0: 408. Assāti paribbājakaparisāya. Uddhaṃgamanavasenāti unnatabahulatāya uggantvā uggantvā
tika-s0105t0:1118_1: pavattanavasena. Disāsu patthaṭavasenāti vipulabhāvena bhūtaparamparāya sabbadisāsu
tika-s0105t0:1118_2: pattharaṇavasena. Ettha ca pāḷiyaṃ yathā unnatapāyo saddo unnādo, evaṃ vipulabhāvena
tika-s0105t0:1118_3: uparūpari pavattopi unnādoyevāti tadubhayaṃ ekajjhaṃ katvā “unnādiniyā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:1118_4: puna tadubhayameva vibhāgaṃ katvā “uccāsaddamahāsaddāyā”ti. Ato pāḷinayānurūpameva
tika-s0105t0:1118_5: atthaṃ vivaratīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Idāni paribbājakaparisāya uccāsaddamahāsaddatākāraṇaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:1118_6: tassa ca pavattiākāraṃ dassento “tesañhī”tiādimāha. Bālātapeti abhinavuggatasūriyātape.
tika-s0105t0:1118_7: Kāmassādo nāma kāmaguṇassādo. Bhavassādo nāma kāmarāgādisahagato bhavesu assādo.
tika-s0105t0:1119: Sūriyuggamane khajjopanamiva nippabhataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “khajjopanakūpamā jātā”ti. Lābhasakkāropi no parihīnoti attho bāverujātakena dīpetabbo. Parisadosoti parisāya pavattadoso.
tika-s0105t0:1120_0: 409. Saṇṭhapesīti saññamanavasena sammadeva ṭhapesi. Saṇṭhapanañcettha tiracchānakathāya
tika-s0105t0:1120_1: aññamaññasmiṃ agāravassa cajāpanavasena ācārasikkhāpanaṃ, yathāvuttadosassa nigūhanañca
tika-s0105t0:1120_2: hotīti āha “sikkhāpesī”tiādi. Nanti parisaṃ. Appasaddanti nissaddaṃ uccāsaddamahāsaddābhāvaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1120_4: patthayanahetu. Mānante hi lakkhaṇe, hetumhi ca icchanti saddavidū. Idāni tamatthaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1120_5: vitthāretuṃ “paribbājakā kirā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Aparaddhanti aparajjhitaṃ. Nappamajjantīti
tika-s0105t0:1120_6: pamādaṃ na āpajjanti, na agāravaṃ karontīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t0:1121_0: 410. No āgate ānandoti amhākaṃ bhagavati āgate ānando pīti hoti. “Cirassaṃ kho bhante
tika-s0105t0:1121_1: bhagavā imaṃ pariyāyamakāsī”ti vacanaṃ pubbepi tattha āgatapubbattā vuttavacanamiva
tika-s0105t0:1121_2: hotīti codanaṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā pariharanto “kasmā āhā”tiādimāha. Piyasamudācārāti piyālāpā.
tika-s0105t0:1121_3: Tasmāti tathā piyasamudācārassa pavattanato. Na kevalaṃ ayameva, atha kho aññepi
tika-s0105t0:1121_4: pabbajitā yebhuyyena bhagavato apacitiṃ karontevāti tadaññesampi bāhullakammena tadatthaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1121_6: paṭṭhāya asambhinnakhattiyakulatāyāti attho. Tathā hi soṇadaṇḍena vuttaṃ “samaṇo
tika-s0105t0:1121_7: khalu bho gotamo uccākulā pabbajito asambhinnakhattiyakulā”ti, tena sāsane appasannānampi
tika-s0105t0:1121_8: kulagāravena bhagavati apacitiṃ dasseti. Etasmiṃ antare kā nāma kathāti yathāvuttaparicchedabbhantare
tika-s0105t0:1121_9: kīdisā nāma kathā. Vippakatāti āraddhā hutvā apariyositā. “Kā kathā vippakatā”ti
tika-s0105t0:1121_10: pana vadanto atthato tassā pariyosāpanaṃ paṭijānāti nāma. Kā kathāti ca avisesacodanā,
tika-s0105t0:1121_11: tasmā yassā tassā sabbassāpi kathāya pariyosāpanaṃ paṭiññātaṃ hoti, tañca paṭijānanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1121_12: padesaññuno avisaṃyanti āha “yāva…pe… sabbaññupavāraṇaṃ pavāresī”ti. Esāti paribbājakaparisāya
tika-s0105t0:1123_1: atthāvahaṃ hitāvahaṃ kāraṇaṃ. Yatthāti aññatarissaṃ sālāyaṃ. Nānātitthasaṅkhātāsu
tika-s0105t0:1123_2: laddhīsu niyuttāti nānātitthiyāṇiyasaddena. Ṇikasaddena vā ka-kārassa ya-kāraṃ katvā
tika-s0105t0:1123_3: yathā “antiyo”ti. “Ayaṃ kiṃ vadati ayaṃ kiṃ vadatī”ti kutūhalaṃ kolāhalamettha atthīti
tika-s0105t0:1123_4: kotūhalā, sā eva sālā kotūhalasālāti āha “kotūhaluppattiṭṭhānato”ti. Upasaggamattaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1123_5: dhātvatthānuvattanato. Saññāsīsenāyaṃ desanā, tasmā saññāsahagatā sabbepi dhammā
tika-s0105t0:1123_6: gayhanti, tattha pana cittaṃ padhānanti vuttaṃ “cittanirodhe”ti. Pahānavasena pana
tika-s0105t0:1123_7: accantanirodhassa tehi anadhippetattā, avisayattā ca “khaṇikanirodhe”ti āha. Kāmaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1123_8: sopi tesaṃ avisayova, atthato pana nirodhakathā vuccamānā tattheva tiṭṭhati, tasmā
tika-s0105t0:1123_9: atthāpattimattaṃ pati tathā vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Tassāti abhisaññānirodhakathāya.
tika-s0105t0:1123_11: viya paccakkhato dasseti, sāvake ca edise saṃvarasamādāne patiṭṭhāpetī’ti thutighoso
tika-s0105t0:1123_12: yāva bhavaggā pattharatīti. Ācariyena vuttaṃ. Idāni pana “sakalajambudīpe bhagavato
tika-s0105t0:1123_13: kathākittighoso pattharatī”ti pāṭho dissati. Paṭibhāgakiriyanti paḷāsavasena paṭibhāgabhūtaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1123_14: payogaṃ. Bhavantarasamayanti tatra tatra vuṭṭhānasamayaṃ abhūtaparikappitaṃ kiñci
tika-s0105t0:1123_15: ussāriyavatthuṃ attano samayaṃ katvā kathenti. Kiñcideva sikkhāpadanti “ekamūlakena
tika-s0105t0:1123_16: bhavitabbaṃ, ettakaṃ velaṃ ekasmiṃyeva ṭhāne nisīditabba”nti evamādikaṃ kiñcideva
tika-s0105t0:1123_17: kāraṇaṃ sikkhākoṭṭhāsaṃ katvā paññapenti. Nirodhakathanti nirodhasamāpattikathaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1124_0: Tesūti kotūhalasālāyaṃ sannipatitesu nānātitthiyasamaṇabrāhmaṇesu. Ekacceti eke.
tika-s0105t0:1124_1: Purimoti “ahetū appaccayā purisassa saññā uppajjantipi nirujjhantipī”tiādinā vuttavādī.
tika-s0105t0:1124_2: Etthāti catūsu vādīsu. Yvāyaṃ idha uppajjatīti sambandho. Samāpattinti asaññībhavāvahaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1124_4: pañcamajjhānasamāpattiṃ vā. Nirodheti heṭṭhā vuttanayena saññānirodhe. Hetuṃ apassantoti
tika-s0105t0:1124_5: yena hetunā asaññībhave saññāya nirodho sabbaso anuppādo, yena ca tato cutassa idha
tika-s0105t0:1124_6: pañcavokārabhave saññāya uppādo, tadubhayampi hetuṃ avisayatāya apassanto.
tika-s0105t0:1125_0: Dutiyoti “saññā hi bho purisassa attā”tiādinā vuttavādī. Nanti paṭhamavādiṃ. Nisedhetvāti
tika-s0105t0:1125_1: “na kho pana metaṃ bho evaṃ bhavissatī”ti evaṃ paṭikkhipitvā. Migasiṅgatāpasassāti
tika-s0105t0:1125_2: evaṃnāmakatāpasassa. Tassa kira matthake migasiṅgākārena dve cūḷā uṭṭhahiṃsu, “isisiṅgo”tipi
tika-s0105t0:1125_3: tassa nāmaṃ. Asaññakabhāvanti muñchāpattiyā kiriyāmayasaññāvasena vigatasaññibhāvaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1125_4: Vakkhati hi “visaññī hutvā”ti. Cattālīsanipāte āgatanayena migasiṅgatāpasavatthuṃ
tika-s0105t0:1125_5: saṅkhepato dassetuṃ “migasiṅgatāpaso kirā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Vikkhambhanavasena kilesānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1125_6: santāpanato attantapo. Dukkaratapatāya ghoratapo tibbatapo. Nibbisevanabhāvāpādanena
tika-s0105t0:1125_8: sandhāyāha. Tañhi tathārūpapaccayā kadāci uṇhaṃ, kadāci thaddhaṃ, kadāci calitaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1125_9: hoti. “Sakka…pe… patthetī”ti ayoniso cintetvā pesesi. Bhaggoti bhañjitakusalajjhāsayo,
tika-s0105t0:1125_10: adhunā pana “laggo”ti pāṭhaṃ likhanti. Tena dibbaphassenāti hatthaggahaṇamattadibbaphassena.
tika-s0105t0:1125_11: Tanti tathā saññāpaṭilābhaṃ. Evamāhāti evaṃ “saññā hi bho purisassa attā”tiādinā
tika-s0105t0:1125_12: ākārena saññānirodhamāha. Imināva nayena ito paresupi dvīsu ṭhānesu pāḷimāharitvā yojanā veditabbā.
tika-s0105t0:1126_0: Tatiyoti “santi hi bho samaṇabrāhmaṇā”tiādinā vuttavādī. Āthabbaṇapayoganti āthabbaṇavedavihitaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1126_1: āthabbaṇikānaṃ visaññibhāvāpādanappayogaṃ. Upakaḍḍhanaṃ āharaṇaṃ. Apakaḍḍhanaṃ apaharaṇaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1126_2: Āthabbaṇaṃ payojetvāti āthabbaṇavede āgataṃ aggijuhanapubbakaṃ mantapadaṃ payojetvā
tika-s0105t0:1126_3: sīsacchinnatādidassanena saññānirodhamāha. Tassāti yassa sīsacchinnatādi dassitaṃ, tassa.
tika-s0105t0:1127_0: Catutthoti “santi hi bho devatā mahiddhikā”tiādinā vuttavādī. Yakkhadāsīnanti devadāsīnaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:1127_1: yā “yogavatiyo”tipi vuccanti, yoginiyotipi pākaṭā. Madaniddanti surāmadanimittakaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1127_2: supanaṃ. Devatūpahāranti naccanagāyanādinā devatānaṃ pūjaṃ. Surāpātinti pātipuṇṇaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1127_3: suraṃ. Divāti atidivā, ussūreti attho. Tanti tathā supitvā vuṭṭhahanaṃ. Suttakāle
tika-s0105t0:1127_4: devatānaṃ saññāpakaḍḍhanavasena nirodhaṃ samāpannā, pabuddhakāle saññupakaḍḍhanavasena
tika-s0105t0:1128_0: Eḷamūgakathā viyāti imesaṃ paṇḍitamānīnaṃ kathā andhabālakathāsadisī. Cattāro nirodheti
tika-s0105t0:1128_1: aññamaññavidhure cattāropi nirodhe. Ekena bhavitabbanti ekasabhāveneva bhavitabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1128_2: Na bahunāti na ca aññamaññaviruddhena bahuvidhena nānāsabhāvena bhavitabbaṃ. Tenāpi
tika-s0105t0:1128_3: ekenāti ekasabhāvabhūtena tenāpi nirodhena. Aññenevāti tehi vuttākārato aññākāreneva
tika-s0105t0:1128_4: bhavitabbaṃ. Soti ekasabhāvabhūto nirodho. Aññatra sabbaññunāti sabbaññubuddhaṃ ṭhapetvā.
tika-s0105t0:1128_5: Idhāti kotūhalasālāyaṃ. Ayaṃ nirodho ayaṃ nirodhoti dvikkhattuṃ byāpanicchāvacanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1128_6: satthā attano desanāvilāsena anekākāravokāraṃ nirodhaṃ vibhāvessatīti dassanatthaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1128_7: kataṃ. Aho nūnāti ettha ahoti acchariye nipāto, nūnāti anussaraṇe. Tasmā aho nūna
tika-s0105t0:1128_8: bhagavāti anaññasādhāraṇadesanattā bhagavā nirodhampi aho acchariyaṃ katvā ārādheyya
tika-s0105t0:1128_9: maññeti adhippāyo. Aho nūna sugatoti etthāpi eseva nayo. Acchariyavibhāvanato eva
tika-s0105t0:1128_10: cettha dvikkhattuṃ āmeḍitavacanaṃ. Acchariyatthopi hesa ahosaddo anussaraṇamukheneva
tika-s0105t0:1128_11: poṭṭhapādena gahito. Tasmā vuttaṃ “anussaraṇatthe nipātadvaya”nti. Tenāti anussaraṇatthamukhena
tika-s0105t0:1128_12: pavattanato. “Aho…pe… sugato”ti vacanena etadahosīti yojanā. “Yaṃtaṃsaddā niccasambandhā”ti
tika-s0105t0:1128_13: sādhippāyaṃ yojanaṃ dassetuṃ “yo etesa”ntiādimāha. Kāladesapuggalādivibhāgena bahubhedattā
tika-s0105t0:1128_14: imesaṃ nirodhadhammānanti bahutte sāmivacanaṃ, kusalasaddayoge cetaṃ bhummatthe daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1128_15: Kusalo nipuṇo chekoti pariyāyavacanametaṃ. Aho nūna katheyyāti acchariyaṃ katvā katheyya
tika-s0105t0:1128_16: maññe. So sugatoti sambandho. Ciṇṇavasitāyāti nirodhasamāpattiyaṃ ciṇṇavasībhāvattā.
tika-s0105t0:1130_0: 412. Gharamajjheyeva pakkhalitāti yathā gharato bahi gantukāmā purisā maggaṃ anotaritvā
tika-s0105t0:1130_1: gharavivare samatale vivaṭaṅgaṇe eva pakkhalanaṃ pattā, evaṃsampadamidanti attho.
tika-s0105t0:1130_2: Asādhāraṇo hetu, sādhāraṇo paccayoti evamādivibhāgo aññatra vutto, idha pana tena
tika-s0105t0:1130_3: vibhāgena payojanaṃ natthi saññāya akāraṇabhāvapaṭikkhepaparattā codanāyāti vuttaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1130_4: “kāraṇasseva nāma”nti. Yaṃ pana pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ “sahetū hi poṭṭhapāda sappaccayā purisassa
tika-s0105t0:1130_5: saññā uppajjantipi nirujjhantipī”ti, tattha sahetū sappaccayā uppajjanti, uppannā
tika-s0105t0:1130_6: pana nirujjhantiyeva, na tiṭṭhantīti dassanatthaṃ “nirujjhantipī”ti vacanaṃ, na tu
tika-s0105t0:1130_7: nirodhassa sahetusapaccayatādassanatthaṃ. Uppādoyeva hi sahetuko, na nirodho. Yadi
tika-s0105t0:1130_8: hi nirodhopi sahetuko siyā, tassapi puna nirodhena bhavitabbaṃ aṅkurādīnaṃ puna aṅkurādinā
tika-s0105t0:1130_9: viya, na ca tassa puna nirodho atthi, tasmā vuttanayeneva pāḷiyā attho veditabbo.
tika-s0105t0:1130_10: Ayañca nayo khaṇanirodhavasena vutto. Yo pana yathāparicchinnakālavasena sabbaso
tika-s0105t0:1130_11: anuppādanirodho, so “sahetuko”ti veditabbo tathārūpāya paṭipattiyā vinā abhāvato.
tika-s0105t0:1130_12: Tenāha bhagavā “sikkhā ekā saññā uppajjati, sikkhā ekā saññā nirujjhatī”ti tato eva
tika-s0105t0:1130_13: ca aṭṭhakathāyampi vuttaṃ “saññāya sahetukaṃ uppādanirodhaṃ dīpetu”nti. Etañhi pāḷivacanaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:1130_14: aṭṭhakathāvacanañca anuppādanirodhaṃ sandhāya vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sikkhāti hetvatthe
tika-s0105t0:1130_15: paccattavacanaṃ, ya-kāralopo vā “saṅkhyāpi tamhā vanapattā pakkamitabba”ntiādīsu
tika-s0105t0:1130_16: viya. Hetubhāvo cassā upari āvi bhavissati. Ekasaddo ca aññapariyāyo, na saṅkhyāvācī
tika-s0105t0:1130_17: “ittheke sato sattassā”tiādīsu viyāti āha “sikkhāya ekaccā saññā jāyantī”ti. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo.
tika-s0105t0:1131_2: “bhagavā avocā”ti pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ. Saññāya…pe… dīpetuṃ tā dassentoti yojetabbaṃ. Tatthāti
tika-s0105t0:1131_3: tassaṃ upari vakkhamānāya desanāya. Tatiyāti adhipaññāsikkhā āgatāti sambandho. “Ayaṃ…pe…
tika-s0105t0:1131_4: desitoti ettha sammādiṭṭhisammāsaṅkappavasena āgatā. Kasmāti ce? Pariyāpannattā,
tika-s0105t0:1131_5: sabhāvato, upakārato ca yathārahaṃ paññākkhandhe avarodhattā saṅgahitattāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0105t0:1131_6: Tathā hi cūḷavedallasutte vuttaṃ “yā cāvuso visākha sammādiṭṭhi, yo ca sammāsaṅkappo,
tika-s0105t0:1131_7: ime dhammā paññākkhandhe saṅgahitā”ti kāmañcettha vuttanayena tissopi sikkhā āgatā,
tika-s0105t0:1131_8: tathāpi adhicittasikkhāya eva abhisaññānirodho dassito. Itarā pana tassā sambhārabhāvena
tika-s0105t0:1132_0: Pañcakāmaguṇikarāgoti pañca kāmakoṭṭhāse ārabbha uppajjanakarāgo. Asamuppannakāmacāroti
tika-s0105t0:1132_1: vattamānuppannatāvasena nasamuppanno yo koci kāmacāro, yā kāci lobhuppatti. Adhunā
tika-s0105t0:1132_2: pana “asamuppannakāmarāgo”ti pāṭho, so ayuttova atthato viruddhattā. Kāmarāgo cettha
tika-s0105t0:1132_3: visayavasena niyamitattā kāmaguṇārammaṇova lobho daṭṭhabbo, kāmacāro pana jhānanikantibhavarāgādippabhedo
tika-s0105t0:1132_4: sabbopi lobhacāro. Kāmanaṭṭhena, kāmesu pavattanaṭṭhena ca kāmacāro. Sabbepi hi tebhūmakadhammā
tika-s0105t0:1132_5: kāmanīyaṭṭhena kāmā. Yasmā ubhayesampi sahacaraṇañāyena kāmasaññābhāvo hoti, tasmā
tika-s0105t0:1132_8: vā idhādhippetabhāvadassanaṃ. Kāmaṃ pañcakāmaguṇikarāgopi asamuppanno eva anāgāmimaggena
tika-s0105t0:1132_9: samugghāṭīyati, tasmiṃ pana samugghāṭitepi na sabbo rāgo samugghāṭaṃ gacchati tassa
tika-s0105t0:1132_10: aggamaggena samugghāṭitattā. Tasmā pañcakāmaguṇikarāgaggahaṇena itarassa sabbassa
tika-s0105t0:1132_11: gahaṇaṃ na hotīti ubhayatthasādhāraṇena pariyāyena ubhayameva saṅgahetvā pāḷiyaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1132_12: kāmasaññāggahaṇaṃ kataṃ, ato tadubhayaṃ sarūpato, visesato ca dassetvā sabbasaṅgāhikabhāvato
tika-s0105t0:1132_13: “asamuppannakāmacāro pana imasmiṃ ṭhāne vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ. Tasmāti asamuppannakāmacārasseva
tika-s0105t0:1132_14: idha vaṭṭanato ayamattho veditabboti yojanā. Tassāti paṭhamajjhānasamaṅgino puggalassa.
tika-s0105t0:1132_15: Sadisattāti kāmasaññādibhāvena samānattā, etena pāḷiyaṃ “purimā”ti idaṃ sadisakappanāvasena
tika-s0105t0:1132_16: vuttanti dasseti. Anāgatā hi idha “nirujjhatī”ti vuttā anuppādassa adhippetattā.
tika-s0105t0:1133_0: Vivekajapītisukhasaṅkhātāti vivekajapītisukhehi saha akkhātā, na vivekajapītisukhānīti
tika-s0105t0:1133_1: akkhātā. Taṃsampayuttā hi saññāyeva idhādhippetā, na vivekajapītisukhāni. Atha vā
tika-s0105t0:1133_2: vivekajapītisukhakoṭṭhāsikāti attho. Saṅkhātasaddo hettha koṭṭhāsattho “adinnaṃ theyyasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1133_4: nipuṇatāya sukhumā. Bhūtatāya saccā. Tadevatthaṃ dasseti “bhūtā”ti iminā. Sukhumabhāvena,
tika-s0105t0:1133_5: paramatthabhāvena ca aviparītasabhāvāti attho. Evaṃ byāsavasena yathāpāṭhamatthaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1133_6: dassetvā samāsavasenapi yathāpāṭhameva dassento “atha vā”tiādimāha. Samāsabyāsavasena
tika-s0105t0:1133_7: hi dvidhā pāṭho dissati. “Kāmacchandādioḷārikaṅgappahānavasenā”ti iminā sampayuttadhammānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1133_9: dasseti. Bhūtatāyāti sukhumabhāvena, paramatthabhāvena ca aviparītatāya, vijjamānatāya
tika-s0105t0:1133_10: vā. Vivekajehīti nīvaraṇavivekato jātehi. Idāni jhānasamaṅgīvasena vuttassa dutiyapadassa
tika-s0105t0:1133_11: atthaṃ dassetuṃ “sā assā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Sabbatthāti sabbavāresu.
tika-s0105t0:1134_0: Samāpajjanādhiṭṭhānaṃ viya vuṭṭhānampijhāne pariyāpannaṃ hoti yathā taṃ dhammānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1134_1: bhaṅgakkhaṇo dhammesu, āvajjanapaccavekkhaṇāni pana na jhānapariyāpannāni, tasmā
tika-s0105t0:1134_3: ca sikkhatī”ti vuttaṃ. Tanti paṭhamajjhānaṃ. Tena…pe… jhānenāti idampi “sikkhā”ti
tika-s0105t0:1134_4: etassa saṃvaṇṇanāpadaṃ. Tenāti ca hetumhi karaṇavacanaṃ, paṭhamajjhānena hetunāti
tika-s0105t0:1134_5: attho. Hetubhāvo cettha jhānassa vivekajapītisukhasukhumasaccasaññāya uppattiyā sahajātādipaccayabhāvo.
tika-s0105t0:1134_6: Kāmasaññāya pana nirodhassa upanissayapaccayabhāvova. So ca kho suttantapariyāyena.
tika-s0105t0:1134_7: Tathā ceva heṭṭhā saṃvaṇṇitaṃ “tathārūpāya paṭipattiyā vinā abhāvato”ti etenupāyenāti
tika-s0105t0:1134_8: yvāyaṃ paṭhamajjhānatappaṭipakkhasaññāvasena “sikkhā ekā saññā uppajjati, sikkhā
tika-s0105t0:1134_9: ekā saññā nirujjhatī”ti ettha nayo vutto, etena nayena. Sabbatthāti sabbavāresu.
tika-s0105t0:1135_0: 414. Idāni ākiñcaññāyatanaparamāya eva saññāya dassane kāraṇaṃ vibhāvento “yasmā
tika-s0105t0:1135_1: panā”tiādimāha. Yasmā idañca…pe… uddhaṭanti sambandho. Kesaṃ panidaṃ aṅgato sammasananti
tika-s0105t0:1135_3: lakkhaṇavacanaṃ. Anupadadhammavipassanañhi karonto samāpattiṃ patvā aṅgatova sammasanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1135_4: karoti, na ca saññā samāpattiyā kiñci aṅgaṃ hoti. Atha ca panetaṃ vuttaṃ “idañca
tika-s0105t0:1135_5: saññā saññāti evaṃ aṅgato sammasanaṃ uddhaṭa”nti, tasmā lakkhaṇavacanametaṃ. Aṅgatoti
tika-s0105t0:1135_6: vā avayavatoti attho, anupadadhammatoti vuttaṃ hoti. Kalāpatoti samūhato. Yasmā panettha
tika-s0105t0:1135_7: samāpattivasena taṃtaṃsaññānaṃ uppādanirodhe vuccamāne aṅgavasena so vutto hoti,
tika-s0105t0:1135_8: tasmā “idañcā”tiādinā aṅgatova sammasanaṃ dassetīti veditabbaṃ. Tasmāti saññāvaseneva
tika-s0105t0:1135_9: aṅgato sammasanassa uddhaṭattā. Tadevāti ākiñcaññāyatanameva, na nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1136_0: “Yo”ti vattabbe “yato”ti vuttanti āha “yo nāmā”ti yathā “ādimhī”ti vattabbe “ādito”ti
tika-s0105t0:1136_1: vuccati atthe pariggayhamāne yathāyuttavibhattiyāva to-saddassa labbhanato. Nāma-saddo
tika-s0105t0:1136_2: cettha kho-saddo viya vācāsiliṭṭhatāmattaṃ. Sassedanti sakaṃ, attanā adhigatajhānaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:1136_3: tasmiṃ saññā sakasaññā, sā etassatthīti sakasaññīti vuttaṃ “attano paṭhamajjhānasaññāya
tika-s0105t0:1136_4: saññavā”ti. Īkāro cettha upari vuccamānanirodhapādakatāya sātisayāya jhānasaññāya
tika-s0105t0:1136_5: atthibhāvajotako daṭṭhabbo. Tenevāha “anupubbena saññaggaṃ phusatī”tiādi. Tasmā tattha
tika-s0105t0:1136_6: tattha sakasaññitāggahaṇena tasmiṃ tasmiṃ jhāne sabbaso suciṇṇavasībhāvo dīpitoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1137_0: Lokiyānanti niddhāraṇe sāmivacanaṃ, sāmiatthe eva vā. Yadaggena hi taṃ tesu seṭṭhaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:1137_1: tadaggena tesampi seṭṭhanti. Vibhattāvadhiatthe vā sāmivacanaṃ. Ettha pana “lokiyāna”nti
tika-s0105t0:1137_2: visesanaṃ lokuttarasamāpattīhi tassa aseṭṭhabhāvato kataṃ. Sesaṃ “kiccakārakasamāpattīna”nti
tika-s0105t0:1137_3: pana visesanaṃ akiccakārakasamāpattito tassa aseṭṭhabhāvatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Akiccakārakatā
tika-s0105t0:1137_4: cassā “yatheva hi tattha saññā, evaṃ phassādayopī”ti, “yadaggena hi tattha dhammā
tika-s0105t0:1137_6: tadaggena heṭṭhimasamāpattidhammā viya paṭukiccakaraṇasamatthāpi na hontī”ti ca aṭṭhakathāsu
tika-s0105t0:1137_7: paṭusaññākiccābhāvavacanato viññāyati. Svāyamattho paramatthamañjūsāya nāma visuddhimaggaṭīkāya
tika-s0105t0:1137_8: āruppakathāyaṃ ācariyena savisesaṃ vutto, tasmā tattha vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Keci
tika-s0105t0:1137_9: pana “yathā heṭṭhimā heṭṭhimā samāpattiyo uparimānaṃ uparimānaṃ samāpattīnaṃ adhiṭṭhānakiccaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1137_10: sādhenti, na evaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpatti kassacipi adhiṭṭhānaṃ sādheti,
tika-s0105t0:1137_11: tasmā sā akiccakārikā itarā kiccakārikā”ti vadanti, tadayuttaṃ tassāpi vipassanācittaparidamanādīnaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1137_12: adhiṭṭhānakiccasādhanato, tasmā purimoyeva attho yutto. Kasmā cetaṃ tesamagganti
tika-s0105t0:1138_0: Pakappetīti saṃvidahati. Jhānaṃ samāpajjanto hi jhānasukhaṃ attani saṃvidahati nāma.
tika-s0105t0:1138_1: Abhisaṅkharotīti āyūhati sampiṇḍeti. Sampiṇḍanattho hi samudāyattho. Yasmā pana nikantivasena
tika-s0105t0:1138_2: cetanākiccassa matthakappatti, tasmā phalūpacārena kāraṇaṃ dassento “nikantiṃ…pe…
tika-s0105t0:1138_3: nāmā”ti vuttaṃ. Imā ākiñcaññāyatanasaññāti idāni labbhamānā ākiñcaññāyatanasaññā.
tika-s0105t0:1138_5: ākiñcaññāyatanasaññāhi aññā. Oḷārikāti tato thūlatarā. Kā pana tāti āha “bhavaṅgasaññā”ti.
tika-s0105t0:1138_6: Ākiñcaññāyatanato vuṭṭhāya eva hi uparijhānatthāya cetanābhisaṅkharaṇāni bhaveyyuṃ,
tika-s0105t0:1138_7: evañca ākiñcaññāyatanasaññā nirujjheyyuṃ, vuṭṭhānañca bhavaṅgavasena hoti, tato parampi
tika-s0105t0:1138_8: yāva uparijhānasamāpajjanaṃ, tāva antarantarā bhavaṅgasaññā uppajjeyyuṃ, tā ca ākiñcaññāyatanasaññāhi
tika-s0105t0:1139_0: Cetentovāti nevasaññānāsaññāyatanajjhānaṃ ekaṃ dve cittavārepi samāpajjanavasena
tika-s0105t0:1139_1: pakappento eva. Na cetetīti tathā heṭṭhimajhānesu viya vā pubbābhogābhāvato na pakappeti
tika-s0105t0:1139_2: nāma. Pubbābhogavasena hi jhānaṃ pakappento idha “cetetī”ti vutto. Abhisaṅkharontovāti
tika-s0105t0:1139_3: tattha appahīnanikantikatāvasena āyūhanto eva. Nābhisaṅkharotīti tathā heṭṭhimajhānesu
tika-s0105t0:1139_4: viya vā pubbābhogābhāvato nāyūhati nāma. “Ahametaṃ jhānaṃ nibbattemi upasampādemi
tika-s0105t0:1139_5: samāpajjāmī”ti hi evaṃ abhisaṅkharaṇaṃ tattha sālayasseva hoti, na anālayassa, tasmā
tika-s0105t0:1139_7: evā”ti vutto. Yasmā panassa tathā heṭṭhimajhānesu viya vā tattha pubbābhogo natthi,
tika-s0105t0:1139_8: tasmā “na abhisaṅkharotī”ti vuttaṃ. “Imassa bhikkhuno”tiādi vuttassevatthassa vivaraṇaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1139_9: Tattha yasmā imassa…pe… atthi, tasmā “na ceteti, nābhisaṅkharotī”ti ca vuttanti adhippāyo.
tika-s0105t0:1139_10: Ābhogasamannāhāroti ābhogasaṅkhāto, ābhogavasena vā cittassa ārammaṇābhimukhaṃ, ārammaṇassa
tika-s0105t0:1139_11: vā cittābhimukhaṃ anvāhāro. “Svāyamattho”tiādinā tadevatthaṃ upamāya paṭipādeti.
tika-s0105t0:1140_0: Gantvā ādāya āgatanti sambandho. Pacchābhāgeti āsanasālāya pacchimadisāyaṃ ṭhitassa
tika-s0105t0:1140_1: pitugharassa pacchābhāge. Tatoti puttagharato. Laddhagharamevāti yatonena bhikkhā
tika-s0105t0:1140_2: laddhā, tameva gharaṃ puttagehameva. Āsanasālā viya ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpatti tato
tika-s0105t0:1140_4: Pitugehaṃ viya nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpatti amanasikātabbato, majjhe ṭhitattā
tika-s0105t0:1140_5: ca. Puttagehaṃ viya nirodhasamāpatti manasikātabbato, pariyante ṭhitattā ca. Pitugharaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1140_6: amanasikaritvāti pavisitvā samatikkantampi pitugharaṃ amanasikaritvā. Puttagharasseva
tika-s0105t0:1140_7: ācikkhaṇaṃ viya ekaṃ dve cittavāre samāpajjitabbampi nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ amanasikaritvā
tika-s0105t0:1140_8: parato nirodhasamāpattatthāya eva manasikāro daṭṭhabbo. Evaṃ amanasikārasāmaññena,
tika-s0105t0:1140_9: manasikārasāmaññena ca upamopameyyatā vuttā ācikkhaṇenapi manasikārasseva jotanato.
tika-s0105t0:1140_10: Na hi manasikārena vinā ācikkhaṇaṃ sambhavati.
tika-s0105t0:1141_0: Tā jhānasaññāti ekaṃ dve cittavāre pavattā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanajhānasaññā. Nirodhasamāpattiyañhi
tika-s0105t0:1141_1: yathārahaṃ catutthāruppakusalakiriyajavanaṃ dvikkhattumeva javati, na taduttari.
tika-s0105t0:1141_2: Nirujjhantīti sarasavaseneva nirujjhanti, pubbābhisaṅkhārabalena pana upari anuppādo.
tika-s0105t0:1141_3: Yathā ca jhānasaññānaṃ, evaṃ itarasaññānampīti āha “aññā cā”tiādi. Nuppajjanti yathāparicchinnakālanti
tika-s0105t0:1141_4: adhippāyo. So evaṃ paṭipanno bhikkhūti yathāvutte saññagge ṭhitabhāvena paṭipanno
tika-s0105t0:1141_5: bhikkhu, so ca kho anāgāmī vā arahā vā dvīhi phalehi samannāgamo, tiṇṇaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1141_6: paṭippassaddhi, soḷasavidhā ñāṇacariyā, navavidhā samādhicariyāti imesaṃ vasena nirodhapaṭipādanapaṭipattiṃ
tika-s0105t0:1141_7: paṭipannoti attho. Anupubbanirodhavasena cittacetasikānaṃ appavattiyeva saññāvedanāsīsena
tika-s0105t0:1141_8: “saññāvedayitanirodha”nti vuttā. Phusatīti ettha phusanaṃ nāma vindanaṃ paṭiladdhīti
tika-s0105t0:1141_9: dasseti “vindati paṭilabhatī”ti iminā. Atthato pana vuttanayena yathāparicchinnakālaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1142_0: Niratthakatāya upasaggamattaṃ, tasmā saññā icceva attho. Nirodhapadena anantarikaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1142_1: katvā samāpattipade vattabbe tesaṃ dvinnamantare sampajānapadaṃ ṭhapitanti āha “nirodhapadena
tika-s0105t0:1142_2: antarikaṃ katvā vutta”nti. Tena vuttaṃ “anu…pe… attho”ti, tena ayuttasamāsoyaṃ yathārutapāṭhoti
tika-s0105t0:1142_3: dasseti. Tatrāpīti tasmiṃ yathāpadamanupubbiṭhapanepi ayaṃ visesatthoti yojanā. Sampajānantassāti
tika-s0105t0:1142_4: taṃ taṃ samāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tattha tattha saṅkhārānaṃ sammasanavasena
tika-s0105t0:1142_5: pajānantassa puggalassa. Anteti yathāvuttāya nirodhapaṭipādanapaṭipattiyā pariyosāne.
tika-s0105t0:1142_7: bhikkhuno ādito paṭṭhāya sabbapāṭihārikapaññāya saddhiṃ atthasādhikā paññā kiccato
tika-s0105t0:1142_8: dassitā hoti. Tenāha “paṇḍitassa bhikkhuno”ti. Vacanasesāpekkhā’ napekkhatā dvinnaṃ vikappānaṃ viseso.
tika-s0105t0:1143_2: evamādinā sabbappakārena. Tatthāti visuddhimagge kathitatovāti kathitaṭṭhānato eva,
tika-s0105t0:1143_3: tevīsatimaparicchedatoti attho, na idha taṃ vadāma punaruttibhāvato, ganthagarukabhāvato cāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0105t0:1144_0: Pāḷiyaṃ evaṃ kho ahanti ettha ākārattho evaṃ-saddo uggahitākāradassananti katvā.
tika-s0105t0:1144_1: Evaṃ poṭṭhapādāti ettha pana sampaṭicchanattho tatheva anujānananti katvā. Tenāha
tika-s0105t0:1145_0: 415. Saññā aggā etthāti saññaggaṃ, ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ. Avasesasamāpattīsupi saññaggaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1145_1: atthīti ettha pana saññaggabhāvo “saññagga”nti vutto, saññāyeva agganti tulyādhikaraṇasamāso
tika-s0105t0:1145_2: vā. “Puthū”ti ayaṃ liṅgavipallāso, nikāralopo vāti vuttaṃ “bahūnī”ti. “Yathā”ti iminā
tika-s0105t0:1145_3: karaṇappakārasaṅkhāto pakāraviseso gahito, na pakārasāmaññanti dasseti “pathavīkasiṇādīsū”tiādinā.
tika-s0105t0:1145_4: “Idaṃ vuttaṃ hotī”tiādi tabbivaraṇaṃ. Jhānānaṃ tāva yutto karaṇabhāvo saññānirodhaphusanassa
tika-s0105t0:1145_5: sādhakatamabhāvato, kasiṇānaṃ pana kathanti? Tesampi so yutto eva. Yadaggena hi jhānānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1145_6: nirodhaphusanassa sādhakatamabhāvo, tadaggena kasiṇānampi tadavinābhāvato. Anekakaraṇāpi
tika-s0105t0:1145_7: ca kiriyā hotiyeva yathā “aññena maggena yānena dīpikāya gacchatī”ti.
tika-s0105t0:1146_0: Ekavāranti sakiṃ. Purimasaññānirodhanti kāmasaññānirodhaṃ, na pana nirodhasamāpattisaññitaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1146_1: saññānirodhaṃ. Ekaṃ saññagganti ekaṃ saññābhūtaṃ aggaṃ, eko saññaggabhāvo vā heṭṭhimāya
tika-s0105t0:1146_2: saññāya ukkaṭṭhabhāvato. Saññā ca sā aggañcāti hi saññaggaṃ, na saññāsu agganti.
tika-s0105t0:1146_3: Yathā pana saññā aggo etthāti saññaggaṃ, ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ, evaṃ sesajhānampi. Yena
tika-s0105t0:1146_4: ca nimittena jhānaṃ “saññagga”nti vuttaṃ, tadeva saññāsaṅkhātaṃ nimittaṃ bhāvalopena,
tika-s0105t0:1146_5: bhāvappadhānena vā idhādhippetaṃ. Dve vāreti dvikkhattuṃ. Satasahassaṃ saññaggānīti
tika-s0105t0:1146_6: migapadavaḷañjananiddeso. Sesakasiṇesūti kasiṇānameva gahaṇaṃ nirodhakathāya adhikatattā,
tika-s0105t0:1146_7: tato eva cettha jhānaggahaṇenapi kasiṇajjhānāni eva gahitānīti veditabbaṃ. Yathā
tika-s0105t0:1146_8: “pathavīkasiṇena karaṇabhūtenā”ti tadārammaṇikaṃ jhānaṃ anāmasitvā vuttaṃ, evaṃ “paṭhamajjhānena
tika-s0105t0:1146_9: karaṇabhūtenā”ti tadārammaṇaṃ anāmasitvā vadati. “Itī”tiādinā tadevatthaṃ saṅgahetvā
tika-s0105t0:1146_10: nigamanaṃ karoti. Sabbampīti ekavāraṃ samāpannajjhānasaññampi. Saṅgahetvāti sañjānanalakkhaṇena
tika-s0105t0:1146_11: taṃsabhāvānativattanato saṅgahaṃ katvā, samāpajjanavasena, sañjānanalakkhaṇena ca
tika-s0105t0:1146_12: ekatāti vuttaṃ hoti. Aparāparanti punappunaṃ. Bahūni saññaggāni honti.
tika-s0105t0:1147_0: 416. Paṭhamanaye jhānapadaṭṭhānaṃ vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhentassa puggalassa vasena saññāñāṇāni
tika-s0105t0:1147_1: dassitāni. Dutiyanaye pana yasmā vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā maggena ghaṭentassa maggañāṇaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1147_2: uppajjati, tasmā vipassanāmaggavasena saññāñāṇāni dassitāni. Tatiyanaye ca yasmā
tika-s0105t0:1147_3: paṭhamanayo oḷāriko, dutiyanayopi missakoti tadubhayaṃ asambhāvetvā accantasukhumagambhīraṃ
tika-s0105t0:1147_4: nibbattitalokuttarameva dassetuṃ maggaphalavasena saññāñāṇāni dassitāni. Tayopete
tika-s0105t0:1148_0: “Ayaṃ panettha sāro”ti vibhāvetuṃ tipiṭakamahāsivattheravādo ābhato. Tathā hi “arahattaphalasaññāya
tika-s0105t0:1148_1: uppādā”tiādinā theravādānukūlameva upari attho saṃvaṇṇitoti. Ime bhikkhūti purimavādino
tika-s0105t0:1148_2: bhikkhū. Tadā dīghanikāyatantiṃ parivattante imaṃ ṭhānaṃ patvā yathāvuttapaṭipāṭiyā
tika-s0105t0:1148_3: tayo naye kathente bhikkhū sandhāya evaṃ thero vadati. Nirodhaṃ pucchitvā tasmiṃ
tika-s0105t0:1148_4: kathite tadanantaraṃ saññāñāṇuppattiṃ pucchanto atthato nirodhā vuṭṭhānaṃ pucchati
tika-s0105t0:1148_5: nāma. Nirodhato ca vuṭṭhānaṃ arahattaphaluppattiyā vā siyā, anāgāmiphaluppattiyā
tika-s0105t0:1148_6: vā, tattha saññā padhānā, tadanantarañca paccavekkhaṇañāṇanti tadubhayaṃ niddhārento
tika-s0105t0:1149_0: Yathā maggavīthiyaṃ maggaphalañāṇesu uppannesu niyamato maggaphalapaccavekkhaṇañāṇāni
tika-s0105t0:1149_1: honti, evaṃ phalasamāpattivīthiyaṃ phalapaccavekkhaṇañāṇanti vuttaṃ “pacchā paccavekkhaṇañāṇa”nti.
tika-s0105t0:1149_3: idappaccayo ma-kārassa da-kāraṃ katvā. Da-kārenapi pakatipadamicchanti keci saddavidū.
tika-s0105t0:1149_4: So pana theravāde na phalasamādhisaññā evāti āha “phalasamādhisaññāpaccayā”ti, arahattaphalasamādhisahagatasaññāpaccayāti
tika-s0105t0:1149_5: attho. Kirāti anussaraṇatthe nipāto. Yathādhigatadhammānussaraṇapakkhiyā hi paccavekkhaṇā.
tika-s0105t0:1149_6: Samādhisīsena cettha sabbaṃ arahattaphalaṃ gahitaṃ sahacaraṇañāyena, tasmiṃ asati
tika-s0105t0:1149_7: paccavekkhaṇāya asambhavoti pāḷiyaṃ “idappaccayā”ti vuttaṃ. Evamidha dīghabhāṇakānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1149_9: pana evaṃ vuttaṃ “sā pana na sabbesaṃ paripuṇṇā hoti. Eko hi pahīnakilesameva paccavekkhati,
tika-s0105t0:1149_10: eko avasiṭṭhakilesameva, eko maggameva, eko phalameva, eko nibbānameva. Imāsu pana
tika-s0105t0:1149_11: pañcasu paccavekkhaṇāsu ekaṃ vā dve vā no laddhuṃ na vaṭṭantī”ti, tadetaṃ majjhimabhāṇakānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1151: Hīne kilese sese ca, paccavekkhati vā na vā”ti. (abhidhammatthasaṅgahaṭṭhakathāyaṃ kammaṭṭhānasaṅgahavibhāge visuddhibhede);
tika-s0105t0:1153_0: 417. “Gāmasūkaro”ti iminā vanasūkaramapaneti. Evañhi upamāvacanaṃ sūpapannaṃ hotīti.
tika-s0105t0:1153_2: viya, sukhumabhāvena anuvilittaṃ viya, tilakkhaṇabbhāhatatāya kuṇḍalādyālaṅkāravibhūsitaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1153_3: viya ca hoti. Tadanupavisato ñāṇassa, tathābhāvā taṃsamaṅgino ca puggalassa tathābhāvāpatti,
tika-s0105t0:1153_5: ārāpitopī”ti. Tatthāti tissaṃ nirodhakathāyaṃ. Mandabuddhitāya sukhaṃ na vindanto
tika-s0105t0:1153_6: alabhanto, ajānanto vā. Malavidūsitatāya gūthaṭṭhānasadisaṃ. Attano laddhinti attadiṭṭhiṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1153_7: Anumatiṃ gahetvāti anuññaṃ gahetvā “ediso me attā”ti anujānāpetvā, attano laddhiyaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1154_0: Pāḷiyaṃ kaṃ panāti oḷāriko, manomayo, arūpīti tiṇṇaṃ attavādānaṃ vasena tividhesu
tika-s0105t0:1154_1: attānesu kataraṃ attānaṃ paccesīti attho. “Desanāya sukusalo”ti iminā “avassaṃ me
tika-s0105t0:1154_2: bhagavā laddhiṃ viddhaṃsessatī”ti tassa manasikāraṃ dasseti. Pariharantoti viddhaṃsanato
tika-s0105t0:1154_3: apanento, arūpī attāti attano laddhiṃ nigūhantoti adhippāyo. Pāḷiyaṃ “oḷārikaṃ kho”tiādimhi
tika-s0105t0:1154_4: paribbājakavacane ayamadhippāyo – yasmā catusantatirūpappabandhaṃ ekattavasena gahetvā
tika-s0105t0:1154_5: rūpībhāvato “oḷāriko attā”ti pacceti attavādī, annapānopaṭṭhānatañcassa parikappetvā
tika-s0105t0:1154_6: “sassato”ti maññati, rūpībhāvato eva ca saññāya aññattaṃ ñāyāgatameva, yaṃ vedavādino
tika-s0105t0:1154_7: “annamayo, pānamayo”ti ca dvidhā voharanti, tasmā paribbājako taṃ attavādimataṃ attānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1155_0: “Oḷāriko ca hi te poṭṭhapāda attā abhavissā”tiādimhi bhagavato vacane cāyamadhippāyo
tika-s0105t0:1155_1: – yadi attā rūpī bhaveyya, evaṃ sati rūpaṃ attā siyā, na ca saññī saññāya arūpabhāvato,
tika-s0105t0:1155_2: rūpadhammānañca asañjānanasabhāvattā. Rūpī ca samāno yadi tava matena nicco, saññā
tika-s0105t0:1155_3: ca aparāparaṃ pavattanato tattha tattha bhijjatīti bhedasabbhāvato aniccā, evampi
tika-s0105t0:1155_4: “aññā saññā, añño attā”ti saññāya abhāvato acetanova attā hoti, tasmā esa attā na
tika-s0105t0:1155_5: kammassa kārako, na ca phalassa upabhuñjanakoti āpannamevāti imaṃ dosaṃ dassento
tika-s0105t0:1155_6: bhagavā “oḷāriko cā”tiādimāhāti. Tatthāti “rūpī attā”ti vāde. Paccāgacchatoti sesakiriyāpekkhāya
tika-s0105t0:1155_7: kammattheyeva upayogavacanaṃ, paccāgacchatoti ca paccāgacchantassa, jānantassa, paṭicca
tika-s0105t0:1155_8: vādena pavattassāti vā attho. “Aññā ca saññā uppajjati, aññā ca saññā nirujjhantī”ti
tika-s0105t0:1155_9: kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu uppādapubbako nirodho, na ca uppannaṃ anirujjhanakaṃ nāma atthīti
tika-s0105t0:1155_10: codanaṃ sodhetuṃ “catunnaṃ khandhāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Satipi nesaṃ ekālambaṇavatthukabhāve
tika-s0105t0:1156_0: 418-420. Pāḷiyaṃ manomayanti jhānamanaso vasena manomayaṃ. Yo hi bāhirapaccayanirapekkho,
tika-s0105t0:1156_1: so manasāva nibbattoti manomayo. Rūpaloke nibbattasarīraṃ sandhāya vadati. Yaṃ vedavādino
tika-s0105t0:1156_2: “ānandamayo, viññāṇamayo”ti ca dvidhā voharanti. Tatrāpīti “manomayo attā”ti vādepi.
tika-s0105t0:1156_3: Dose dinneti “aññāva saññā bhavissatī”tiādinā dose dinne attano laddhiṃyeva vadanto
tika-s0105t0:1156_4: “arūpiṃ kho”tiādimāhāti sambandho. Idhāpi purimavāde vuttanayena “yadi attā manomayo
tika-s0105t0:1156_5: sabbaṅgapaccaṅgī ahīnindriyo bhaveyya, evaṃ sati rūpaṃ attā siyā, na ca saññī saññāya
tika-s0105t0:1156_6: arūpabhāvato”tiādi sabbaṃ dosadassanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Tamatthañhi dassento bhagavā “manomayo
tika-s0105t0:1156_7: ca hi te poṭṭhapādā”tiādimavoca. Kasmā panāyaṃ paribbājako paṭhamaṃ oḷārikaṃ attānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1156_8: paṭijānitvā taṃ laddhiṃ vissajjetvā puna manomayaṃ attānaṃ paṭijānāti? Tampi vissajjitvā
tika-s0105t0:1156_9: puna arūpiṃ attānaṃ paṭijānātīti? Kāmañcettha kāraṇaṃ “tato so arūpī attāti evaṃladdhiko
tika-s0105t0:1156_10: samānopi…pe… ādimāhā”ti heṭṭhā vuttameva, tathāpi ime titthiyā nāma anavaṭṭhitacittā
tika-s0105t0:1156_11: thusarāsimhi nikhātakhāṇuko viya cañcalāti kāraṇantarampi dassetuṃ “yathā nāmā”tiādi
tika-s0105t0:1156_12: vuttaṃ. Saññā nappatiṭṭhātīti ārammaṇe sañjānanavasena saññā na patiṭṭhāti, ārammaṇe
tika-s0105t0:1156_13: saññaṃ na karotīti vuttaṃ hoti. Saññāpatiṭṭhānakāleti etthāpi ayaṃ nayo.
tika-s0105t0:1157_0: Tatrāpīti “arūpī attā”ti vādepi. Saññāyāti pakatisaññāya, evaṃ bhadantadhammapālattherena
tika-s0105t0:1157_1: vuttaṃ. Aññasmiṃ titthāyatane uppādanirodhanti hi sambandho. Tena vedikānaṃ matena
tika-s0105t0:1157_2: nānakkhaṇe uppannāya nānārammaṇāya saññāya uppādanirodhamicchatīti dasseti. Keci
tika-s0105t0:1157_3: pana “ācariyasaññāyā”ti paṭhanti, tadayuttaṃ atthassa viruddhattā, therena ca anuddhaṭattā.
tika-s0105t0:1157_4: Aparāparaṃ pavattāya saññāya uppādavayadassanato uppādanirodhaṃ icchati. Tathāpi
tika-s0105t0:1157_5: “saññā saññā”ti pavattasamaññaṃ “attā”ti gahetvā tassa avicchedaṃ parikappento sassataṃ
tika-s0105t0:1157_6: maññati. Tenāha “attānaṃ pana sassataṃ maññatī”ti. Tasmāti aparāparaṃ pavattasaññāya
tika-s0105t0:1157_7: nāmamattena sassataṃ maññanato. Saññāya uppādanirodhamatte aṭṭhatvā taduttari sassataggāhassa
tika-s0105t0:1157_8: gahaṇato dosaṃ dassetīti adhippāyo. Tathevāti yathā “rūpī attā, manomayo attā”ti
tika-s0105t0:1157_9: ca vādadvaye attano asaññatā, evañcassa “acetanatā”tiādidosappasaṅgo dunnivāro, tatheva
tika-s0105t0:1157_10: imasmiṃ vādepīti attho. Micchādassanenāti attadiṭṭhisaṅkhātena micchābhinivesena.
tika-s0105t0:1157_12: hoti. Yena santatighanena, samūhaghanena ca vañcito bālo pabandhavasena pavattamānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1157_13: dhammasamūhaṃ micchāgāhavasena “attā”ti ca “nicco”ti ca abhinivissa voharati, taṃ
tika-s0105t0:1157_14: ekattasaññitaṃ santatighanaṃ, samūhaghanañca vinibhujja yāthāvato jānanaṃ ghanavinibbhogo,
tika-s0105t0:1157_15: so ca sabbena sabbaṃ titthiyānaṃ natthi. Tasmā ayampi paribbājako tādisassa ñāṇaparipākassa
tika-s0105t0:1157_16: abhāvato vuccamānampi nānattaṃ nāññāsīti āha “taṃ nānattaṃ ajānanto”ti. Saññā nāmāyaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1157_17: nānārammaṇā nānākkhaṇe uppajjati, veti cāti vedikānaṃ mataṃ. Saññāya uppādanirodhaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1157_18: passantopi saññāmayaṃ saññābhūtaṃ attānaṃ parikappetvā yathāvuttaghanavinibbhogābhāvato
tika-s0105t0:1157_19: niccameva katvā diṭṭhimaññanāya maññati. Tathābhūtassa ca tassa saṇhasukhumaparamagambhīradhammatā
tika-s0105t0:1157_20: na ñāyatevāti idaṃ kāraṇaṃ passantena bhagavatā “dujjānaṃ kho”tiādi vuttanti dassento
tika-s0105t0:1158_0: Diṭṭhiādīsu “evameta”nti dassanaṃ abhinivisanaṃ diṭṭhi. Tassā eva pubbabhāgabhūtaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1158_1: “evameta”nti nijjhānavasena khamanaṃ khanti. Tathā rocanaṃ ruci. “Aññathāyevā”tiādi
tika-s0105t0:1158_2: tesaṃ diṭṭhiādīnaṃ vibhajja dassanaṃ. Tattha aññathāyevāti yathā ariyavinaye antadvayaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1158_3: anupagamma majjhimapaṭipadāvasena dassanaṃ hoti, tato aññathāyeva. Aññadevāti yaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1158_4: paramatthato vijjati khandhāyatanādi, tassa cāpi aniccatādi, tato aññadeva paramatthato
tika-s0105t0:1158_5: avijjamānaṃ attasassatādikaṃ tayā khamate ceva ruccate cāti attho. Ābhuso yuñjanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1158_7: Ācariyassa bhāvo ācariyakaṃ, yathā tathā ovādānusāsanaṃ, tadassatthīti ācariyako
tika-s0105t0:1158_8: yathā “saddho”ti āha “aññatthā”tiādi. Aññasmiṃ titthāyatane tava ācariyabhāvo atthīti
tika-s0105t0:1158_9: yojanā. “Tenā”tiādi saha yojanāya yathāvākyaṃ dassanaṃ. “Ayaṃ paramattho, ayaṃ sammutī”ti
tika-s0105t0:1158_10: imassa vibhāgassa dubbibhāgattā dujjānaṃ etaṃ nānattaṃ. “Yajjetaṃ dujjānaṃ tāva tiṭṭhatu,
tika-s0105t0:1158_11: aññaṃ panatthaṃ bhagavantaṃ pucchāmī”ti cintetvā tathā paṭipannataṃ dassetuṃ “atha
tika-s0105t0:1158_12: paribbājako”tiādi vuttaṃ. Añño vā saññātoti saññāsabhāvato aññasabhāvo vā attā hotūti
tika-s0105t0:1158_13: attho. Adhunā pana “aññā vā saññā”ti pāṭho dissati. Assāti attano.
tika-s0105t0:1159_0: Lokīyati dissati, patiṭṭhahati vā ettha puññapāpaṃ, tabbipāko cāti loko, attā. So
tika-s0105t0:1159_1: hissa kārako, vedako cāti icchito. Diṭṭhigatanti “sassato attā ca loko cā”tiādi nayapavattaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1159_2: diṭṭhigataṃ. Na hesa diṭṭhābhiniveso diṭṭhadhammikādiatthanissito tadasaṃvattanato.
tika-s0105t0:1159_3: Yo hi taṃ saṃvattanako, so “taṃ nissito”ti vattabbataṃ labheyya yathā taṃ puññañāṇasambhāro.
tika-s0105t0:1159_4: Eteneva nayena na dhammanissitatāpi saṃvaṇṇetabbā. Brahmacariyassa ādi ādibrahmacariyaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:1159_5: tadeva ādibrahmacariyakaṃ yathā “vinayo eva venayiko”ti. Tenāha “sikkhattayasaṅkhātassā”tiādi.
tika-s0105t0:1159_6: Sabbampi vākyaṃ antogadhāvadhāraṇaṃ tassa avadhāraṇaphalattāti vuttaṃ “ādimatta”nti.
tika-s0105t0:1159_7: Tadidha adhisīlasikkhāva. Sā hi sikkhattayasaṅgahite sāsanabrahmacariye ādibhūtā,
tika-s0105t0:1159_8: na aññattha viya ājīvaṭṭhamakādi ādibrahmacariyakanti dasseti “adhisīlasikkhāmatta”nti
tika-s0105t0:1159_11: abhijānanāyāti abhiññāpaññāvasena jānanāya. Taṃ pana vaṭṭassa paccakkhakaraṇameva
tika-s0105t0:1159_14: tassa vaṭṭasambandhanato ca. Tathā abhiññāsambodhanibbānāsaṃvattanañca daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1160_0: Kāmaṃ taṇhāpi dukkhasabhāvā eva, tassā pana samudayabhāvena visuṃ gahitattā “taṇhaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1160_1: ṭhapetvā”ti vuttaṃ. Pabhāvanatoti uppādanato. Dukkhaṃ pabhāventīpi taṇhā avijjādipaccayantarasahitā
tika-s0105t0:1160_2: eva pabhāveti, na kevalāti āha “sappaccayā”ti. Appavattīti appavattinimittaṃ. Na
tika-s0105t0:1160_3: pavattanti ettha dukkhasamudayā, etasmiṃ vā adhigateti hi appavatti. Dukkhanirodhaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1160_4: nibbānaṃ gacchati, tadatthañca sā paṭipajjitabbāti dukkhanirodhagāminipaṭipadā. Maggapātubhāvoti
tika-s0105t0:1160_5: maggasamuppādo. Phalasacchikiriyāti phalassādhigamavasena paccakkhakaraṇaṃ. Taṃ ākāranti
tika-s0105t0:1160_6: taṃ tuṇhībhāvasaṅkhātaṃ gamanaliṅga ārocento viya, na pana abhimukhaṃ āroceti.
tika-s0105t0:1161_0: 421. Samantato niggaṇhanavasena todanaṃ vijjhanaṃ sannitodakaṃ. Manogaṇādīnaṃ visesanassa
tika-s0105t0:1161_2: Atha vā “vācāyā”ti idaṃ “sannitodakenā”ti ettha karaṇavacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Vacanapatodakenā”ti
tika-s0105t0:1161_3: hi vacanena patodakenāti attho, “vācāyā”ti vā sambandhe sāmivacanaṃ. Vācāya sannitodanakiriyāya
tika-s0105t0:1161_4: sajjhabbharitamakaṃsūti yojetabbaṃ. “Sajjhabbharita”nti etassa “saṃ adhi abhi aribha”nti
tika-s0105t0:1161_5: padacchedo, samantato bhusaṃ aritanti attho, satamattehi tuttakehi viya vividhehi
tika-s0105t0:1161_6: paribbājakavācātodanehi tudiṃ sūti vuttaṃ hoti. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “upari vijjhiṃsū”ti.
tika-s0105t0:1161_7: Sabhāvato vijjamānanti paramatthasabhāvato upalabbhamānaṃ, na pakatiādi viya anupalabbhamānaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1161_8: Tacchanti saccaṃ. Tathanti aviparītaṃ. Atthato vevacanameva taṃ padattayaṃ. Navalokuttaradhammesūti
tika-s0105t0:1161_9: visaye bhummaṃ, te dhamme visayaṃ katvā. Ṭhitasabhāvanti avaṭṭhitasabhāvaṃ, taduppādakanti
tika-s0105t0:1161_11: pana “lokuttaradhammaniyāmata”nti pāṭho, so na porāṇo ācariyena anuddhaṭattā. Kasmā
tika-s0105t0:1161_12: panesā paṭipadā dhammaṭṭhitatā dhammaniyāmatāti āha “buddhānañhī”tiādi. Sāti paṭipadā.
tika-s0105t0:1163_0: 422. Hatthiṃ sāreti dametīti hatthisārī, hatthācariyo. Sukhumesu atthantaresūti khandhāyatanādīsu
tika-s0105t0:1163_1: sukhumañāṇagocaresu dhammesu. Abhidhammiko kiresa. Kusaloti pubbepi buddhasāsane
tika-s0105t0:1163_2: kataparicayatāya cheko. Tādise citteti gihibhāvacitte. Itaro pana taṃ sutvāva na
tika-s0105t0:1163_3: vibbhami, pabbajjāyameva abhiramīti adhippāyo. Gihibhāve ānisaṃsakathāya kathitattāti
tika-s0105t0:1163_4: ettha sīlavantassa bhikkhuno tathā kathanena vibbhamane niyojitattā idāni sayampi
tika-s0105t0:1163_5: sīlavā eva hutvā cha vāre vibbhamīti adhippāyo gahetabbo. Kammasarikkhakena hi kammaphalena
tika-s0105t0:1163_6: bhavitabbaṃ. Kathentānanti anādare sāmivacanaṃ. Mahāsāvakassa kathiteti mahāsāvakabhūtena
tika-s0105t0:1163_7: mahākoṭṭhikattherena apasādanavasena kathite, kathananimittaṃ patiṭṭhaṃ laddhuṃ asakkontoti
tika-s0105t0:1163_8: attho. “Vibbhamitvā gihī jāto”ti idaṃ sattamavāramiva vuttaṃ. Dhammapadaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1163_9: pana kudālapaṇḍitajātake ca chakkhattumeva vibbhamanavāro vutto. Gihisahāyakoti gihikāle
tika-s0105t0:1163_10: sahāyako. Apasakkantopi nāmāti api nāma apasakkanto, gārayhavacanametaṃ. Pabbajituṃ
tika-s0105t0:1164_1: abhāvena. Yādisena cakkhunā so “cakkhumā”ti vutto, taṃ dassetuṃ “subhāsitā”tiādi
tika-s0105t0:1164_2: vuttaṃ. Ayaṃ aṭṭhakathāto aparo nayo – ekaṃsikāti ekantikā, nibbānavahabhāvena nicchitāti
tika-s0105t0:1164_3: vuttaṃ hoti. Paññattāti vavatthapitā. Na ekaṃsikāti na ekantikā nibbānāvahabhāvena
tika-s0105t0:1164_4: nicchitā vaṭṭantogadhabhāvatoti adhippāyo. Ayamattho hi “kasmā cete poṭṭhapāda mayā
tika-s0105t0:1164_5: ekaṃsikā dhammā desitā paññattā, ete poṭṭhapāda atthasaṃhitā…pe… nibbānāya saṃvattantī”tiādisuttapadehi
tika-s0105t0:1166_1: vissajjitaṃ. Phale hi siddhe hetupi siddho hotīti, ayaṃ ācariyamati apare pana “edisesu
tika-s0105t0:1166_2: atthasaddo kāraṇe vattati, hetvatthe ca paccattavacanaṃ, tasmā aniyyānikabhāvadassananti
tika-s0105t0:1166_4: Vaṭṭadukkhapariyosānaṃ gacchati etāyāti niṭṭhāti hi vimutti vuttā “goṭṭhā paṭṭhitagāvo”ti
tika-s0105t0:1166_5: mahāsīhanādasuttapade viya ṭhā-saddassa gatiatthe pavattanato. Niṭṭhāmaggo ca idha
tika-s0105t0:1166_6: uttarapadalopena “niṭṭhā”ti adhippeto. Tasseva hi niyyānikatā, aniyyānikatā ca vuccati,
tika-s0105t0:1166_7: na niṭṭhāya. Niyyātīti niyyānikā ya-kārassa ka-kāraṃ katvā. Anīyasaddo hi bahulaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1166_8: kattutthābhidhāyako, na niyyānikā aniyyānikā, tassā bhāvo tathā. Niyyānaṃ vā niggamanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1166_9: nissaraṇaṃ, vaṭṭadukkhassa vūpasamoti attho, niyyānameva niyyānikaṃ, na niyyānikaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1166_10: aniyyānikaṃ, so eva bhāvo sabhāvo aniyyānikabhāvo, tassa dassanatthanti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1167_0: “Sabbe hī”tiādi tadatthavivaraṇaṃ. Amataṃ nibbānaṃ niṭṭhamiti paññapeti yathāti sambandho.
tika-s0105t0:1167_2: gahetvā tathā paññapenti. Lokathūpikā nāma brahmabhūmi vuccati lokassa thūpikasadisatāparikappanena.
tika-s0105t0:1167_3: Keci pana “nevasaññānāsaññāyatanabhūmiṃ lokathūpikā”ti vadanti, tadayuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu
tika-s0105t0:1167_4: tathā avacanato. Ādisaddena cettha “añño puriso, aññā pakatī”ti pakatipurisantarāvabodho
tika-s0105t0:1167_5: mokkho, buddhiādiguṇavinimuttassa attano asakattani avaṭṭhānaṃ mokkho, kāyavipattikati
tika-s0105t0:1167_6: jātibandhānaṃ apavajjanavasena appavatto mokkho, parena purisena palokatā mokkho,
tika-s0105t0:1167_7: taṃsamīpatā mokkho, taṃsamāyogo mokkhoti evamādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Tasmiṃ tasmiñhi
tika-s0105t0:1167_8: samaye niṭṭhaṃ apaññapento nāma natthi. Brāhmaṇānaṃ paṭhamajjhānabrahmaloko niṭṭhā.
tika-s0105t0:1167_9: Tattha hi nesaṃ niccābhiniveso yathā taṃ bakassa brahmuno, vekhanasāditāpasānaṃ ābhassarā,
tika-s0105t0:1167_11: Imasmiṃ pana sāsane arahattaṃ niṭṭhā, sabbepi cete diṭṭhivasena brahmalokādīni arahattamaññanāya
tika-s0105t0:1167_12: “nibbānaṃ nibbāna”nti vacanasāmaññamattaṃ gahetvā tathā paññapenti, na pana paramatthato
tika-s0105t0:1167_13: nesaṃsamaye nibbānapaññāpanassa labbhanatoti āha “sā ca na niyyānikā”tiādi. Yathāpaññattāti
tika-s0105t0:1167_14: yena yena pakārena paññattā, paññattappakārā hutvāti attho. Na niyyātīti “yenākārena
tika-s0105t0:1167_15: niṭṭhā pāpuṇīyatī”ti tehi paveditā, tenākārena tassā apattabbatāya na niyyāti. Paṇḍitehi
tika-s0105t0:1167_16: paṭikkhittāti “nāyaṃ niṭṭhā paṭipadā vaṭṭassa anatikkamanato”ti buddhādīhi paṇḍitehi
tika-s0105t0:1167_17: paṭikkhittā. Nivattatīti paṭikkhepakāraṇavacanaṃ, yasmā tehi paññattā niṭṭhā paṭipadā
tika-s0105t0:1167_18: na niyyāti na gacchati, aññadatthu taṃsamaṅginaṃ puggalaṃ saṃsāre eva paribbhamāpentī
tika-s0105t0:1167_19: nivattati, tasmā paṇḍitehi paṭikkhittāti attho. Tanti aniyyānikabhāvaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1168_0: Jānaṃ, passanti ca puthuvacanavipariyāyoti āha “jānantā passantā”ti. Gacchantādisaddānañhi
tika-s0105t0:1168_1: “yā pana bhikkhunī jānaṃ sabhikkhukaṃ ārāmaṃ anāpucchā paviseyyā”tiādīsu liṅgavasena
tika-s0105t0:1168_2: vipariyāyo, jānantīti attho. “Yācaṃ adadamappiyo”tiādīsu vibhattivasena, yācantassāti
tika-s0105t0:1168_3: attho. Idha pana puthuvacanavasenāti veditabbaṃ. Padhānaṃ jānanaṃ nāma paccakkhato
tika-s0105t0:1168_4: jānanaṃ tassa jeṭṭhabhāvato, dassanamappadhānaṃ tassa saṃsayānubandhattāti ayaṃ kamo
tika-s0105t0:1168_5: vutto “jānaṃ passa”nti. Tenettha jānanena dassanaṃ viseseti. Evañhi diṭṭhapubbāni
tika-s0105t0:1168_6: kho tasmiṃ loke manussānaṃ sarīrasaṇṭhānādīnīti ekato adhippāyadassanaṃ sūpapannaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1168_7: hoti. Ayañhetthādhippāyo “kiṃ tumhākaṃ ekantasukhe loke paccakkhato ñāṇadassanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1168_8: atthī”ti. Jānanti vā tassa lokassa anumānavisayataṃ vuccati, passanti paccakkhato
tika-s0105t0:1168_9: visayataṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti “api tumhākaṃ loko paccakkhato ñāto, udāhu anumānato”ti.
tika-s0105t0:1169_0: Yasmā pana loke paccakkhabhūto attho indriyagocarabhāvena pākaṭo, tasmā pākaṭena
tika-s0105t0:1169_1: atthena adhippāyaṃ dassetuṃ “diṭṭhapubbānī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Diṭṭhapadena vā dassanaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:1169_2: tadanugatañca jānanaṃ gahetvā tadubhayeneva atthena adhippāyaṃ vibhāvetuṃ evaṃ vuttantipi
tika-s0105t0:1169_3: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Diṭṭhapubbānīti hi dassanena, tadanugatena ca ñāṇena gahitapubbānīti
tika-s0105t0:1169_4: attho. Evañca katvā “sarīrasaṇṭhānādīnī”ti samariyādavacanaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti. “Appāṭihīrakata”nti
tika-s0105t0:1169_5: ayaṃ anunāsikalopaniddesoti āha “appāṭihīrakaṃ ta”nti. Taṃ vacanaṃ appāṭihīrakaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1169_6: sampajjatīti sambandho. Appāṭihīrapade anunāsikalopo, “kata”nti ca ekaṃ padanti keci,
tika-s0105t0:1169_7: tadayuttaṃ samāsasambhavato, anunāsikalopassa ca avattabbattā. Evamettha vaṇṇayanti
tika-s0105t0:1169_8: – paṭipakkhaharaṇato paṭihāriyaṃ, tadeva pāṭihāriyaṃ. Attanā uttaravirahitavacanaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1169_9: Pāṭihāriyamevettha “pāṭihīraka”nti vuttaṃ parehi vuccamānauttarehi sauttarattā, na
tika-s0105t0:1169_10: pāṭihīrakanti appāṭihīrakaṃ. Virahattho cettha a-saddo. Tenāha “paṭiharaṇavirahita”nti.
tika-s0105t0:1169_11: Sauttarañhi vacanaṃ tena uttaravacanena paṭiharīyati viparivattīyati, tasmā uttaravacanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1169_12: paṭiharaṇaṃ nāma, tato virahitanti attho. Tasmā eva niyyānassa paṭiharaṇamaggassa
tika-s0105t0:1170_0: 426. Vilāso itthilīḷā, yo “siṅgārabhāvajā kiriyā”tipi vuccati. Ākappo kesabandhavatthaggahaṇādiākāraviseso,
tika-s0105t0:1170_1: vesasaṃvidhānaṃ vā. Ādisaddena hāvādīnaṃ saṅgaho. Hāvāti hi cāturiyaṃ vuccati.
tika-s0105t0:1172_0: 428. Āhito ahaṃmāno etthāti attā, attabhāvoti āha “attabhāvapaṭilābho”ti. Kathaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1172_2: oḷārikattā. Rūpabhavaṃ dasseti jhānamanena nibbattaṃ hutvā rūpībhāvena upalabbhanato.
tika-s0105t0:1172_3: Arūpabhavaṃ dasseti arūpībhāvena upalabbhanato. Saṃkilesikā dhammā nāma dvādasa akusalacittuppādā
tika-s0105t0:1172_4: tadabhāve kassaci saṃkilesassa asambhavato. Vodāniyā dhammā nāma samathavipassanā
tika-s0105t0:1173_0: 429. Paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ asamucchede sati na kadācipi anavajjadhammānaṃ vā pāripūrī,
tika-s0105t0:1173_1: vepullaṃ vā sambhavati, samucchede pana sati sambhavatīti maggaphalapaññānameva gahaṇaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1173_2: daṭṭhabbaṃ, tā hi sakiṃ paripuṇṇāpi aparihīnadhammattā paripuṇṇā eva bhavanti. Taruṇapītīti
tika-s0105t0:1173_3: uppannamattā aladdhāsevanā dubbalapīti. Balavatuṭṭhīti punappunaṃ uppattiyā laddhāsevanā
tika-s0105t0:1173_4: uparivisesādhigamassa paccayabhūtā thiratarā pīti. Idāni saṅkhepato piṇḍatthaṃ dassento
tika-s0105t0:1173_5: “kiṃ vutta”ntiādimāha. Tattha yaṃ vihāraṃ sayaṃ…pe… viharissatīti avocumhāti sambandho.
tika-s0105t0:1173_6: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yaṃ vihāraṃ “saṃkilesikavodāniyadhammānaṃ pahānābhivuddhiniṭṭhaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1173_7: paññāya pāripūrivepullabhūtaṃ imasmiṃyeva attabhāve aparappaccayena ñāṇena paccakkhato
tika-s0105t0:1173_8: sampādetvā viharissatī”ti kathayimhāti. Tatthāti tasmiṃ vihāre. Tassāti ovādakarassa
tika-s0105t0:1173_9: bhikkhuno. Evaṃ viharatoti vuttappakārena viharaṇahetu, viharantassa vā. Tannimittaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1173_10: pāmojjaṃ, pamodappabhavā pīti, tappaccayabhūtaṃ passaddhidvayaṃ, tathā sūpaṭṭhitā
tika-s0105t0:1173_11: sati, ukkaṃsagatatāya uttamañāṇaṃ. Sukho ca vihāro bhavissatīti yojanā. Kāyacittapassaddhī
tika-s0105t0:1173_12: hi “passaddhī”ti vuttā, ayameva vā pāṭho. “Nāmakāyapassaddhī”tipi paṭhanti, tadayuttameva
tika-s0105t0:1173_13: passaddhidvayassa avinābhāvato. Kasmā panesa sukho vihāroti āha “sabbavihāresū”tiādi,
tika-s0105t0:1173_14: sabbesupi iriyāpathavihārādīsu santapaṇītatāya imasseva sukhattā “sukho vihāro”ti
tika-s0105t0:1173_15: vattabbataṃ arahatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Kathaṃ sukhoti vuttaṃ “upasanto paramamadhuro”ti.
tika-s0105t0:1174_0: Paṭhamajjhāne paṭiladdhamatte hīnabhāvato pīti dubbalā pāmojjapakkhikā, subhāvite
tika-s0105t0:1174_1: pana tasmiṃ paguṇe sā paṇītā balavabhāvato paripuṇṇakiccā pītīti vuttaṃ “paṭhamajjhāne
tika-s0105t0:1174_2: pāmojjādayo chapi dhammā labbhantī”ti. Pāmojjaṃ nivattatīti dubbalapītisaṅkhātaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1174_3: pāmojjaṃ chasu dhammesu nivattati hāyati. Vitakkavicārakkhobhavirahitena hi catukkanayavibhatte
tika-s0105t0:1174_4: dutiyajjhāne sabbadā pīti balavatī eva hoti, na paṭhamajjhāne viya kadāci dubbalāti
tika-s0105t0:1174_5: evaṃ vuttaṃ. Pīti nivattati tappahāneneva tatiyajjhānassa labbhanato. “Sukho vihāro”ti
tika-s0105t0:1174_6: iminā samādhi gahitoti āha “tathā catutthe”ti. Ye pana “sukho vihāro’ti etena sukhaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1174_7: gahita”nti vadanti, tesaṃ matena santavuttitāya upekkhāpi catutthajjhāne “sukha”micceva
tika-s0105t0:1174_8: bhāsitāti katvā tathā vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Imasmiṃyeva dīghanikāye āgataṃ anekadhā
tika-s0105t0:1174_9: desanānayamuddharitvā idha desitanayaṃ niyametuṃ “imesū”tiādi vuttaṃ. Suddha…pe…
tika-s0105t0:1174_10: kathitanti uparimaggaṃ akathetvā kevalaṃ vipassanāpādakameva jhānaṃ kathitaṃ. Catūhi…pe…
tika-s0105t0:1174_11: kathitāti vipassanāpādakabhāvena jhānāni kathetvā tato paraṃ vipassanāpubbakā cattāropi
tika-s0105t0:1174_12: maggā kathitā. Catutthajjhānikaphalasamāpatti kathitāti paṭhamajjhānikādikā phalasamāpattiyo
tika-s0105t0:1174_13: akathetvā catutthajjhānikā eva phalasamāpatti kathitā. Pītivevacanameva katvāti dvinnaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1174_14: pītīnaṃ ekasmiṃ cittuppāde anuppajjanato pāmojjaṃ pītivevacanameva katvā, tadubhayaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1174_15: abhedato katvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Pītisukhānaṃ apariccattattā, “sukho vihāro”ti ca sātisayassa
tika-s0105t0:1174_16: sukhavihārassa gahitattā “dutiyajjhānikaphalasamāpatti nāma kathitā”ti vuttaṃ. Kāmaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1174_17: paṭhamajjhānepi pītisukhāni labbhanti, tāni pana vitakkavicāraparikkhobhena na tattha
tika-s0105t0:1174_18: santapaṇītāni, idha ca santapaṇītāneva adhippetāni, tasmā dutiyajjhānikā eva phalasamāpatti
tika-s0105t0:1175_0: 432-437. Vibhāvanatthoti pakāsanattho sarūpato nirūpanattho “na samaṇo gotamo brāhmaṇe
tika-s0105t0:1175_1: jiṇṇe …pe… abhivādeti vā paccuṭṭheti vā āsanena vā nimantetī”tiādīsu viya. Tenāha
tika-s0105t0:1175_2: “ayaṃ so”tiādi. “Ayaṃ attapaṭilābho so evā”ti evaṃ sarūpato vibhāvetvā pakāsetvā.
tika-s0105t0:1175_3: Ayanti hi bhagavatā pubbe vuttaṃ attapaṭilābhaṃ āsannapaccakkhabhāvena paccāmasati,
tika-s0105t0:1175_4: soti pana parehi pucchiyamānaṃ parammukhabhāvena. Na naṃ evaṃ vadāmāti ettha nanti
tika-s0105t0:1175_5: oḷārikamattapaṭilābhaṃ. Sappāṭihīrakatanti ettha pubbe vuttanayena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0105t0:1175_6: Parehi coditavacanapaṭihārakaṃ sauttaravacanaṃ sappāṭihīrakanti hi ayameva viseso.
tika-s0105t0:1175_7: Tucchoti musā abhūto. Soti manomayo, arūpo vā attapaṭilābho. Svevāti so eva oḷāriko
tika-s0105t0:1175_8: attapaṭilābho. Tasmiṃ samaye sacco hotīti tasmiṃ paccuppannasamaye vijjamāno hoti.
tika-s0105t0:1175_9: Attapaṭilābhotveva niyyātesīti attapaṭilābhasaddena tathā eva pariyosāpesi, na pana
tika-s0105t0:1175_10: naṃ “attapaṭilābho”ti saṅkhyaṃ gacchatīti paññattiṃ sarūpato nīharitvā dassesīti
tika-s0105t0:1175_11: adhippāyo. Rūpādayo cettha dhammāti rūpavedanādayo eva ettha loke sabhāvadhammā.
tika-s0105t0:1176_0: 438. Evañca pana vatvāti rūpādike upādāya paññattimattametaṃ attapaṭilābhoti imamatthaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1176_1: “yasmiṃ citta samaye”tiādinā vatvā. Paṭipucchitvāti yathā pare puccheyyuṃ, tathā
tika-s0105t0:1176_2: kālavibhāgato paṭipadāni pucchitvā. Vinayanatthanti yathāpucchitassa atthassa ñāpanavasena
tika-s0105t0:1176_3: vinayanatthāya. Ye te atītā dhammāti atītasamaye atītattapaṭilābhassa upādānabhūtā
tika-s0105t0:1176_4: rūpādayo dhammā. Te etarahi natthi niruddhattā. Tato eva “ahesu”nti saṅkhyaṃ gatā.
tika-s0105t0:1176_5: Tasmāti upādānassa atītasmiṃyeva samaye labbhanato. Sopīti tadupādāno me attapaṭilābhopi.
tika-s0105t0:1176_6: Tasmiṃyeva samayeti atīte eva samaye. Sacco ahosīti bhūto vijjamāno viya ahosi. Anāgatapaccuppannānanti
tika-s0105t0:1176_7: anāgatānañcevapaccuppannānañca rūpādidhammānaṃ upādānabhūtānaṃ. Tadā abhāvāti tasmiṃ
tika-s0105t0:1176_8: atītasamaye abhāvā avijjamānattā. Tadupādānabhūto anāgato, paccuppanno ca attapaṭilābho
tika-s0105t0:1176_9: tasmiṃ atīta samaye mogho tuccho musā natthīti attho. Atthatoti paññattiatthato.
tika-s0105t0:1176_10: Nāmamattamevāti samaññāmattameva. Paramatthato anupalabbhamānattā attapaṭilābhaṃ paṭijānāti.
tika-s0105t0:1177_0: “Eseva nayo”ti iminā ye te anāgatā dhammā, te etarahi natthi, “bhavissantī”ti pana
tika-s0105t0:1177_1: saṅkhyaṃ gatā, tasmā sopi me attapaṭilābho tasmiṃyeva samaye sacco bhavissati. Atītapaccuppannānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1177_2: pana dhammānaṃ tadā abhāvā tasmiṃ samaye “mogho atīto, mogho paccuppanno”ti evaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1177_3: atthato nāmamattameva attapaṭilābhaṃ paṭijānāti. Ye ime paccuppannā dhammā, te etarahi
tika-s0105t0:1177_4: “atthī”ti saṅkhyaṃ gatā, tasmā yvāyaṃ me attapaṭilābho, so idāni sacco hoti. Atītānāgatānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1177_5: pana dhammānaṃ adhunā abhāvā etarahi “mogho atīto, mogho anāgato”ti evaṃ atthato
tika-s0105t0:1178_0: 439-443. Saṃsanditunti samānetuṃ. Gavāti gāvito. Tatthāti khīrādīsu pañcagorasesu.
tika-s0105t0:1178_1: Yasmiṃ samaye khīraṃ hotīti yasmiṃ kāle bhūtupādāyasaññitaṃ upādānavisesaṃ upādāya
tika-s0105t0:1178_2: khīrapaññatti hoti. Na tasmiṃ…pe… gacchati khīrapaññattiupādānassa bhūtupādāyarūpassa
tika-s0105t0:1178_3: dadhiādipaññattiyā anupādānato. Paṭiniyatavatthukā hi etā lokasamaññā. Tenāha “ye
tika-s0105t0:1178_4: dhamme upādāyā”tiādi. Saṅkhāyati kathīyati etāyāti saṅkhā. Attaṃ nīharitvā uccanti
tika-s0105t0:1178_5: vadanti etāyāti nirutti. Taṃ tadatthaṃ namanti sattā etenāti nāmaṃ, tathā voharanti
tika-s0105t0:1178_6: etenāti vohāro, paññattiyeva. “Yasmiṃ samaye”tiādinā khīre vuttanayaṃ dadhiādīsupi
tika-s0105t0:1179_0: Samanujānanamattakānīti “idaṃ khīraṃ, idaṃ dadhī”tiādinā tādisesu bhūtupādāyarūpavisesesu
tika-s0105t0:1179_1: loke paramparāgataṃ paññattiṃ appaṭikkhipitvā samanujānanaṃ viya paccayavisesavisiṭṭhaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1179_3: ca “arūpo attapaṭilābho”ti ca tathā tathā samanujānanamattakāni, na ca tabbinimutto
tika-s0105t0:1179_4: upādānato añño koci paramatthato atthīti vuttaṃ hoti. Niruttimattakānīti saddaniruttiyā
tika-s0105t0:1182_0: Vacanapathamattakānīti tasseva vevacanaṃ. Niruttiyeva hi aññesampi diṭṭhānugatimāpajjantānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1182_1: kāraṇaṭṭhena vacanapatho. Vohāramattakānīti tathā tathā vohāramattakāni. Nāmapaṇṇattimattakānīti
tika-s0105t0:1182_3: vā “satto”ti vā “poso”ti vā sabbametaṃ vohāramattakaṃ. Kasmāti ce, paramatthato anupalabbhanatoti
tika-s0105t0:1183_0: Yajjevaṃ kasmā cesā buddhehipi vuccatīti codanaṃ sodhento “buddhānaṃ panā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0105t0:1183_1: Sammutiyā vohārassa kathanaṃ sammutikathā. Paramatthassa sabhāvadhammassa kathanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1183_3: vuttā. Paramatthadhammoyeva hi “anicco, dukkho”ti ca vuccati, na sammutidhammo.
tika-s0105t0:1185: Nibbānañceva paññatti, anattā iti nicchayā” ti. –
tika-s0105t0:1186_0: Vacanato panesa “anattā”ti vuccati, khandhādipaññatti pana tajjāpaññatti viya paramatthasannissayā,
tika-s0105t0:1186_1: āsannatarā ca, puggalapaññattiādayo viya na dūre, tasmā khandhādikathāpi “paramatthakathā”ti
tika-s0105t0:1186_2: vuttā, khandhādisīsena vā tadupādānasabhāvadhammā eva gahitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Nanu ca
tika-s0105t0:1186_3: sabhāvadhammāpi sammutimukheneva desanamārohanti, na paramatthamukhena, tasmā sabbāpi
tika-s0105t0:1186_4: desanā sammutikathāva siyāti? Nayidamevaṃ kathetabbadhammavibhāgena kathāvibhāgassa
tika-s0105t0:1186_5: adhippetattā, na ca saddo kenaci pavattinimittena vinā atthaṃ pakāsetīti.
tika-s0105t0:1187_0: Kasmā cevaṃ dubbidhā buddhānaṃ kathā pavattatīti anuyogaṃ kāraṇavibhāvanena pariharituṃ
tika-s0105t0:1187_1: “tattha yo”tiādi vuttaṃ. Atthaṃ vijānituṃ catusaccaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ vaṭṭato niyyātuṃ
tika-s0105t0:1187_2: arahattasaṅkhātaṃ jayaggāhaṃ gahetuṃ sakkoti. Yasmā paramatthakathāya eva saccasampaṭivedho,
tika-s0105t0:1187_3: ariyasaccakathā ca sikhāppattā desanā, tasmā vineyyapuggalavasena ādito sammutikathaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1187_4: kathentopi bhagavā parato paramatthakathaṃyeva kathetīti āha “tassā”tiādi. “Āditova
tika-s0105t0:1187_5: sammutikathaṃ kathetī”ti hi vadanto parato paramatthakathampi kathetīti dīpeti, itarattha
tika-s0105t0:1187_7: pariyāyantaraṃ vibhāveti. Bodhetvāti veneyyajjhāsayānurūpaṃ tathā tathā desetabbamatthaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1187_8: jānāpetvā, iminā pana imamatthaṃ dasseti – katthaci sammutikathāpubbikā paramatthakathā
tika-s0105t0:1187_9: hoti puggalajjhāsayavasena, katthaci paramatthakathāpubbikā sammutikathā, iti vineyyadammakusalassa
tika-s0105t0:1187_10: satthu veneyyajjhāsayavasena tathā tathā desanā pavattatīti. Sabbattha pana bhagavā
tika-s0105t0:1187_11: dhammataṃ avijahanto eva sammutimanuvattati, sammutiṃ apariccajantoyeva dhammataṃ
tika-s0105t0:1187_12: vibhāveti, naṃ tattha abhinivesātidhāvanāni. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā “janapadaniruttiṃ
tika-s0105t0:1188_0: Paṭhamaṃ sammutikathākathanaṃ pana veneyyavasena yebhuyyena buddhānamāciṇṇanti taṃ
tika-s0105t0:1188_1: kāraṇena saddhiṃ dassento “pakatiyā panā”tiādimāha. Lūkhākārāti veneyyānamanabhisambujjhanavasena
tika-s0105t0:1188_2: lūkhasadisā. Nanu ca sammuti nāma paramatthato avijjamānattā abhūtā, taṃ kathaṃ buddhā
tika-s0105t0:1188_3: kathentīti vuttaṃ “sammutikathaṃ kathentāpī”tiādi. Saccamevāti tathameva. Sabhāvamevāti
tika-s0105t0:1188_4: sammutibhāvena taṃsabhāvameva. Tenāha “amusāvā”ti. Paramatthassa pana saccādibhāve
tika-s0105t0:1189_0: Ko panimesaṃ sammutiparamatthadhammānaṃ visesoti? Yasmiṃ bhinne, buddhiyā vā avayavavinibbhoge
tika-s0105t0:1189_1: kate na taṃsaññā, so ghaṭapaṭādippabhedo sammuti, tabbipariyāyato paramattho. Na
tika-s0105t0:1189_2: hi kakkhaḷaphusanādisabhāve ayaṃ nayo labbhati. Evaṃ santepi vuttanayena sammuti
tika-s0105t0:1189_3: ca saccasabhāvā evāti āha “duve saccāni akkhāsī”tiādi. Tattha duve saccāni akkhāsīti
tika-s0105t0:1189_4: nānādesabhāsākusalo tiṇṇaṃ vedānamatthasaṃvaṇṇanako ācariyo viya nānāvidhasammutiparamatthakusalo
tika-s0105t0:1189_5: bhagavā veneyyajjhāsayānurūpaṃ duveyeva saccāni akkhāsīti attho. Taṃ sarūpato, parimāṇato
tika-s0105t0:1189_6: ca dasseti “sammutiṃ paramatthañca, tatiyaṃ nūpalabbhatī”ti iminā. Vadataṃ varoti
tika-s0105t0:1189_7: sabbesaṃ vadantānaṃ varo. Lokasaṅketamattasiddhā sammuti. Paramo uttamo aviparīto
tika-s0105t0:1190_0: Idāni nesaṃ saccasabhāvaṃ saha kāraṇena dassetuṃ “saṅketavacana”nti gāthā vuttā.
tika-s0105t0:1190_1: Yasmā lokasammutikāraṇaṃ, tasmā saṅketavacanaṃ saccaṃ, yasmā ca dhammānaṃ bhūtalakkhaṇaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:1190_2: tasmā paramatthavacanaṃ saccanti yojanā. Lokasammutikāraṇanti hi saṅketavacanassa
tika-s0105t0:1190_3: saccabhāve kāraṇadassanaṃ, lokasiddhā sammuti saṅketavacanassa avisaṃvādanatāya kāraṇanti
tika-s0105t0:1190_4: attho, visaṃvādanābhāvato saṅketavacanaṃ saccanti vuttaṃ hoti. Dhammānaṃ bhūtalakkhaṇanti
tika-s0105t0:1190_5: ca paramatthavacanassa saccabhāve kāraṇadassanaṃ. Sabhāvadhammānaṃ yo bhūto aviparīto
tika-s0105t0:1190_6: sabhāvo, tassa lakkhaṇaṃ aṅganaṃ ñāpananti attho, yāthāvato avisaṃvādanavasena pavattanato
tika-s0105t0:1190_7: paramatthavacanaṃ saccanti adhippāyo. Anaṅgaṇasuttaṭīkāyaṃ pana ācariyeneva nissakkavacanena
tika-s0105t0:1190_9: sabhāvadhammānaṃ. Bhūtakāraṇāti yathābhūtasabhāvaṃ nissāya pavattanato”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1194_0: Ayampi guṇaparidīpanī gāthā dissati. Tattha tasmāti saccassa duvidhattā, saṅketavacanassa
tika-s0105t0:1194_1: vā saccabhāvato. Sammutiṃ voharantassāti “puggalo satto”tiādinā lokasamaññaṃ kathentassa
tika-s0105t0:1194_2: musāvādo nāma na jāyatīti attho. Apica “aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi bhagavā puggala kathaṃ katheti
tika-s0105t0:1194_5: appahānatthañcā”tiādinā tattha tattha vuttakāraṇampi āharitvā idha vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1195_0: Yadi tathāgato paramatthasaccaṃ sammadeva abhisambujjhitvā ṭhitopi lokasamaññābhūtaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1195_1: sammutisaccaṃ gahetvāva vadati, evañcettha ko lokiyamahājanehi visesoti vuttaṃ “yāhī”tiādi,
tika-s0105t0:1195_2: ayaṃ pāḷiyaṃ sambandho. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – lokiyamahājano appahīnaparāmāsattā “etaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1195_3: mamā”tiādinā parāmasanto voharati. Tathāgato pana sabbaso pahīnaparāmāsattā aparāmasantova
tika-s0105t0:1195_4: yasmā lokasamaññāhi vinā lokiyo attho lokena dubbiññeyyo, tasmā tāhi taṃ voharati.
tika-s0105t0:1195_5: Tathā voharanto ca attano desanāvilāsena veneyyasatte paramatthasacce patiṭṭhāpetīti.
tika-s0105t0:1195_6: Desanaṃ vinivaṭṭetvāti heṭṭhā vuttāya diṭṭhābhinivesapaṭisaññuttāya vaṭṭakathāya
tika-s0105t0:1195_7: vinivattetvā vivecetvā. Arahattanikūṭena niṭṭhāpesīti “aparāmasa”nti iminā padena
tika-s0105t0:1195_9: Yaṃ panettha atthato na vibhattaṃ, taṃ suviññeyyameva.
tika-s0105t0:1196_1: suvimalavipulapaññāveyyattiyajananāya sādhuvilāsiniyā nāma līnatthapakāsaniyā poṭṭhapādasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthapakāsanā.
tika-s0105t0:1200_0: 444. Evaṃ poṭṭhapādasuttaṃ saṃvaṇṇetvā idāni subhasuttaṃ saṃvaṇṇento yathānupubbaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1200_1: saṃvaṇṇanokāsassa pattabhāvaṃ vibhāvetuṃ, poṭṭhapādasuttassānantaraṃ saṅgītassa suttassa
tika-s0105t0:1200_2: subhasuttabhāvaṃ vā pakāsetuṃ “evaṃ me sutaṃ…pe… sāvatthiyanti subhasutta”nti āha.
tika-s0105t0:1200_3: Anunāsikalopena “acira parinibbute”ti vuttanti dasseti “aciraṃ parinibbute”ti iminā
tika-s0105t0:1200_4: yathā poṭṭhapādasutte “appāṭihīraka taṃ bhāsitaṃ sampajjatī”ti, aciraṃ parinibbutassa
tika-s0105t0:1200_5: assāti vā aciraparinibbuto yathā “acirapakkanto, māsajāto”ti. Atthamattaṃ pana dassetuṃ
tika-s0105t0:1200_6: evaṃ vuttaṃ. Aciraparinibbuteti ca satthu parinibbutabhāvassa cirakālatāpaṭikkhepena
tika-s0105t0:1200_7: āsannatāmattaṃ dassitaṃ, kālaparicchedo pana na dassitoti taṃ dassento “parinibbānato”tiādimāha.
tika-s0105t0:1200_8: Visākhapuṇṇamito uddhaṃ yāva jeṭṭhapuṇṇamī, tāva kālaṃ sandhāya “māsamatte”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1200_9: Mattasaddena pana tassa kālassa kiñci asampuṇṇataṃ joteti. Tudisaññito gāmo nivāso
tika-s0105t0:1200_10: etassāti todeyyo. Taṃ panesa yasmā soṇadaṇḍo viya campaṃ, kūṭadanto viya ca khāṇumataṃ
tika-s0105t0:1200_11: ajjhāvasati, tasmā vuttaṃ “tassa adhipatittā”ti, issarabhāvatoti attho. Ayampi hi
tika-s0105t0:1200_12: rañño pasenadikosalassa purohitabrāhmaṇo. Puttampi āhāti subhaṃ māṇavampi ovadanto āha.
tika-s0105t0:1201_1: sañcayaṃ disvāti sambandho. Madhūnanti makkhikamadhūnaṃ. Samāhāranti makarandasannicayaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1201_2: Paṇḍito gharamāvaseti yasmā appatarappatarepi gayhamāne bhogā khīyanti, appatarappatarepi
tika-s0105t0:1201_3: ca sañciyamāne vaḍḍhanti, tasmā yathāvuttamupamattayaṃ paññāya disvā viññujātiko
tika-s0105t0:1201_4: kiñcipi vayamakatvā āyameva uppādento gharevase gharāvāsamanutiṭṭheyyāti lobhādesitapaṭipattiṃ upadisati.
tika-s0105t0:1202_0: Adānameva sikkhāpetvā sikkhāpanahetu lobhābhibhūtatāya tasmiṃyeva ghare sunakho hutvā
tika-s0105t0:1202_1: nibbatti. Lobhavasikassa hi duggati pāṭikaṅkhā, “janavasabho nāma yakkho hutvā nibbattī”ti
tika-s0105t0:1202_2: ettha vuttanayena attho veditabbo. Pubbaparicayena ativiya piyāyati. Vuttañhi “pubbeva
tika-s0105t0:1202_3: sannivāsenā”tiādi. Nikkhanteti kenacideva karaṇīyena bahi niggate. Subhaṃ māṇavaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1202_4: anuggaṇhitukāmo ekakova bhagavā piṇḍāya pāvisi. Bhukkāranti “bhu bhū”ti sunakhasaddakaraṇaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1202_5: “Bho bho”ti brāhmaṇasamudācārena paribhavitvā paribhavanahetu. “Bhovādi nāma so hoti,
tika-s0105t0:1202_6: sace hoti sakiñcano”ti hi vuttaṃ. Nanu ca heṭṭhā “adānameva sikkhāpetvā sunakho hutvā
tika-s0105t0:1202_7: nibbatto”ti āha, kasmā panettha “pubbepi maṃ ‘bho bho’ti paribhavitvā sunakho jāto”ti
tika-s0105t0:1202_8: vadatīti? Tathā nibbattiyā tadubhayasādhāraṇaphalattā. Ānisaṃsaphalañhi sādhāraṇakammenapi
tika-s0105t0:1202_9: jātaṃ, na vipākaphalaṃ viya ekakammenevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Avīciṃ gamissasi katokāsassa
tika-s0105t0:1202_10: kammassa paṭibāhitumasakkuṇeyyabhāvato. “Jānāti maṃ samaṇo gotamo”ti vippaṭisārī
tika-s0105t0:1203_0: Taṃ pavattinti bhagavatā yathāvuttakāraṇaṃ. Brāhmaṇacārittassa aparihāpitataṃ sandhāya,
tika-s0105t0:1203_1: tathā pitaraṃ ukkaṃsento “brahmaloke nibbatto”ti āha. Mukhāruḷhanti sayaṃpaṭibhānavasena
tika-s0105t0:1203_2: mukhamāruḷhaṃ. Taṃ pavattiṃ pucchīti “sutametaṃ bho gotama mayhaṃ pitā sunakho hutvā
tika-s0105t0:1203_3: nibbatto”ti tumhehi vuttaṃ, “kimidaṃ saccaṃ vā asaccaṃ vā”ti pucchi. Tatheva vatvāti
tika-s0105t0:1203_4: yathā pubbe sunakhassa vuttaṃ, tatheva vatvā. Avisaṃvādanatthanti saccāpanatthaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:1203_5: “todeyyabrāhmaṇo sunakho hutvā nibbatto”ti vacanassa avisaṃvādanena attano avisaṃvādibhāvadassanatthanti
tika-s0105t0:1203_6: vuttaṃ hoti. Appodakanti appakena udakena sampāditaṃ. Madhupāyāsanti sādurasaṃ, madhuyojitaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1203_7: vā pāyāsaṃ. Tathā akāsi, yathā bhagavatā vuttaṃ. “Sabbaṃ dassesīti buddhānubhāvena
tika-s0105t0:1203_8: so sunakho taṃ sabbaṃ netvā dassesi, na jātissaratāya. Bhagavantaṃ disvā bhukkaraṇaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1203_9: pana purimajātisiddhavāsanāvasenā”ti evaṃ ācariyena vuttaṃ. Uparipaṇṇāsake pana cūḷakammavibhaṅgasuttaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1203_10: “sunakho ‘ñātomhi iminā’ti roditvā ‘huṃ hu’nti karonto dhananidhānaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā
tika-s0105t0:1203_11: pādena pathaviṃ khaṇitvā saññaṃ adāsī”ti jātissarākāramāha, vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1204_0: “Bhavapaṭicchannaṃ nāma evarūpaṃ sunakhapaṭisandhiantaraṃ pākaṭaṃ samaṇassa gotamassa,
tika-s0105t0:1204_1: addhā esa sabbaññū”ti bhagavati pasannacitto. Aṅgavijjāpāṭhako kiresa. Tenassa etadahosi
tika-s0105t0:1204_2: “imaṃ dhammapaṇṇākāraṃ katvā samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ pañhaṃ pucchissāmī”ti, tato so cuddasa
tika-s0105t0:1204_3: pañhe abhisaṅkharitvā bhagavantaṃ pucchi. Tena vuttaṃ “cuddasa pañhe pucchitvā”ti.
tika-s0105t0:1204_4: Tattha cuddasa pañheti “dissanti hi bho gotama manussā appāyukā, dissanti dīghāyukā.
tika-s0105t0:1204_5: Dissanti bavhābādhā, appābādhā. Dubbaṇṇā, vaṇṇavanto. Appesakkhā, mahesakkhā. Appabhogā,
tika-s0105t0:1204_6: mahābhogā. Nīcakulīnā, uccākulīnā. Dissanti duppaññā, dissanti paññavanto. Ko nu
tika-s0105t0:1204_7: kho bho gotama hetu ko paccayo, yena manussānaṃyeva sataṃ manussabhūtānaṃ dissanti
tika-s0105t0:1204_8: hīnapaṇītatā”ti ime cūḷakammavibhaṅgasutte āgate cuddasa pañhe. “Kammassakā māṇava
tika-s0105t0:1204_9: sattā kammadāyādā”tiādinā saṅkhepato, vitthārato ca vissajjanapariyosāne bhagavantaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1204_10: saraṇaṃ gato. Aṅgasubhatāya “subho” tissa nāmaṃ. Māṇavoti pana mahallakakālepi taruṇavohārena
tika-s0105t0:1204_11: naṃ voharati. Attano bhogagāmatoti tudigāmato āgantvā taṅkhaṇikaṃ vasati. Teneva
tika-s0105t0:1205_0: 445. “Ekā ca me kaṅkhā atthī”ti iminā upari pucchiyamānassa pañhassa pageva tena
tika-s0105t0:1205_2: viya ka-saddassa khuddakatthe pavattanato. Visabhāgavedanāti dukkhavedanā. Sā hi
tika-s0105t0:1205_4: ca kāyaṃ gāḷhā hutvā bādhanato pīḷanato “ābādho”ti ca vuccati. Kīdisā pana sāti āha
tika-s0105t0:1205_5: “yā ekadese”tiādi. Ekadese uppajjitvāti sarīrekadese uṭṭhahitvāpi aparivattibhāvakaraṇato
tika-s0105t0:1205_6: ayapaṭṭena ābandhitvā viya gaṇhāti, iminā balavarogo ābādho nāmāti dasseti. Kicchajīvitakaroti
tika-s0105t0:1205_7: asukhajīvitāvaho, iminā dubbalo appamattako rogo ātaṅko nāmāti dasseti. Uṭṭhānanti
tika-s0105t0:1205_8: sayananisajjādito uṭṭhahanaṃ, tena yathā tathā aparāparaṃ sarīrassa parivattanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1205_9: vadati. Garukanti bhāriyaṃ akiccasiddhikaṃ. Gilānasseva kāye balaṃ na hotīti sambandho.
tika-s0105t0:1205_10: Lahuṭṭhānena cettha gelaññābhāvo pucchito. Heṭṭhā catūhi padehi aphāsuvihārābhāvaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1205_11: pucchitvāpi idāni puna phāsuvihārabhāvaṃ pucchati, tena saviseso ettha phāsuvihāro
tika-s0105t0:1205_12: pucchitoti viññāyati. Asatipi hi atisayatthajotane sadde atthāpattito atisayattho
tika-s0105t0:1205_13: labbhateva yathā “abhirūpassa kaññā dātabbā”ti. Tenāha “gamanaṭṭhānā”tiādi. Purimaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1205_14: āṇāpanavacanaṃ, idaṃ pana pucchitabbākāradassananti ayamimesaṃ visesoti dasseti “athassā”tiādinā.
tika-s0105t0:1206_0: 447. Kālo nāma upasaṅkamanassa yuttapattakālo, samayo nāma tasseva paccayasāmaggī,
tika-s0105t0:1206_1: atthato panesa tajjaṃ sarīrabalañceva tappaccayaparissayābhāvo ca. Upādānaṃ nāma
tika-s0105t0:1206_2: ñāṇena tesaṃ gahaṇaṃ sallakkhaṇanti āha “paññāyā”tiādi. “Sve gamanakālo bhavissatī”ti
tika-s0105t0:1206_3: iminā kālaṃ, “kāye”tiādinā samayañca sarūpato dasseti. Pharissatīti pharaṇavasena ṭhassati.
tika-s0105t0:1207_0: 448. Cetiyaraṭṭheti cetiraṭṭhe. Ya-kārena hi padaṃ vaḍḍhetvā evaṃ vuttaṃ. “Cetiraṭṭhato
tika-s0105t0:1207_1: aññaṃ visuṃyevekaṃ raṭṭha”ntipi vadanti. “Yasmā maraṇaṃ nāma tādisānaṃ dasabalānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1207_2: rogavaseneva hoti, tasmā yena rogena taṃ jātaṃ, tassa sarūpapucchā, kāraṇapucchā,
tika-s0105t0:1207_3: maraṇahetukacittasantāpapucchā, tassa ca santāpassa sabbalokasādhāraṇatā, tathā maraṇassa
tika-s0105t0:1207_4: ca appaṭikaraṇatā”ti evamādinā maraṇapaṭisaññuttaṃ sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ kathesīti
tika-s0105t0:1207_5: dassetuṃ “bho ānandā”tiādi vuttaṃ. “Ko nāmā”tiādinā hi rogaṃ pucchati, “kiṃ bhagavā
tika-s0105t0:1207_6: paribhuñjī”ti iminā kāraṇaṃ, “apicā”tiādinā cittasantāpaṃ, “satthā nāmā”tiādinā tassa
tika-s0105t0:1207_7: sabbalokasādhāraṇataṃ, “ekā dānī”tiādinā maraṇassa appaṭikaraṇataṃ dassetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1207_8: Mahājānīti mahāhāni. Yatrāti yena kāraṇena parinibbuto, tena ko dāni añño maraṇā
tika-s0105t0:1207_9: muccissatītiādinā yojetabbaṃ. Idānīti ca attano manasikāraṃ pati vohāramattena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1207_10: Lajjissatīti lajjā viya bhavissati, vijjissatīti attho. Pītabhesajjānurūpaṃ āhārabhojanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1208_0: Hutvāti pāṭhaseso santikāvacarabhāvassa visesanato. Māro pāpimā viya na randhagavesī,
tika-s0105t0:1208_1: uttaramāṇavo viya ca na vīmaṃsanādhippāyo, api tu khalu upaṭṭhāko hutvā santikāvacaroti
tika-s0105t0:1208_2: hi viseseti. Na randhagavesīti na chiddagavesī. Yesu dhammesūti vimokkhupāyesu niyyānikadhammesu.
tika-s0105t0:1209_0: 449. Atthato payuttatāya saddapayogassa saddapabandhalakkhaṇāni tīṇi piṭakāni tadatthabhūtehi
tika-s0105t0:1209_1: sīlādīhi tīhi dhammakkhandhehi saṅgayhantīti vuttaṃ “tīṇi piṭakāni tīhi khandhehi
tika-s0105t0:1209_2: saṅgahetvā”ti. Saṅkhittena kathitanti “tiṇṇaṃ kho māṇava khandhāna”nti evaṃ gaṇanato,
tika-s0105t0:1209_3: sāmaññato ca saṅkhepeneva kathitaṃ. “Katamesaṃ tiṇṇa”nti ayaṃ adiṭṭhajotanāpucchāyeva,
tika-s0105t0:1209_4: na kathetukamyatāpucchā. Māṇavasseva hi ayaṃ pucchā, na therassāti āha “māṇavo”tiādi.
tika-s0105t0:1209_5: Aññattha pana īdisesu ṭhānesu kathetukamyatāpucchāyeva dissati, na adiṭṭhajotanāpucchā.
tika-s0105t0:1209_6: Idha pana aṭṭhakathāyaṃ evaṃ vuttaṃ, tadetaṃ aṭṭhakathāpamāṇato paccetabbaṃ. Tadā
tika-s0105t0:1209_7: pavattamānañhi paccakkhaṃ katvā aṭṭhakathampi saṅgahamāropiṃsu. Kathetukamyatāpucchābhāve
tika-s0105t0:1211_0: 450-453. Sīlakkhandhassāti ettha padatthavipallāsakārī itisaddo lutto, atthaniddeso
tika-s0105t0:1211_1: viya saddaniddeso vā, yathāruto ca itisaddo ādyattho, pakārattho vā, tena “ariyassa
tika-s0105t0:1211_2: samādhikkhandhassa…pe… patiṭṭhapesī”ti ayaṃ pāṭho gahitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1211_3: “tesu dassitesū”ti, tesu tīsu khandhesu uddesavasena dassitesūti attho. Bhagavatā
tika-s0105t0:1211_4: vuttanayenevāti sāmaññaphalādīsu desitanayeneva, tena imassa suttassa buddhabhāsitabhāvaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1211_5: dassetīti veditabbaṃ. Sāsane na sīlameva sāroti ariyamaggasāre bhagavato sāsane yathādassitaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1211_6: sīlaṃ sāro eva na hoti sāravato mahato rukkhassa papaṭikaṭṭhānikattā. Aṭṭhānapayutto
tika-s0105t0:1211_7: hi evasaddo yathāṭhāne na yojetabbo. Yajjevaṃ kasmā tamidha gahitanti āha “kevala”ntiādi.
tika-s0105t0:1211_9: tesamasambhavato. Vuttañhi “sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sapañño”tiādi atha vā sāsane na
tika-s0105t0:1211_10: sīlameva sāroti kāmañcettha sāsane maggaphalasīlasaṅkhātaṃ lokuttarasīlampi sārameva,
tika-s0105t0:1211_11: tathāpi na sīlakkhandho eva sāro hoti, atha kho samādhikkhandhopi paññākkhandhopi
tika-s0105t0:1211_12: sāro evāti evampettha yathāpayuttena evasaddena attho veditabbo, purimoyeva panattho
tika-s0105t0:1211_13: yuttataro. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “ito uttarī”tiādi. Aññampi kattabbanti sesakhandhadvayaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1213_0: 454. Kasmā panettha thero samādhikkhandhaṃ puṭṭhopi indriyasaṃvarādike vissajjesi,
tika-s0105t0:1213_1: nanu evaṃ sante aññaṃ puṭṭho aññaṃ byākaronto ambaṃ puṭṭho labujaṃ byākaronto viya
tika-s0105t0:1213_2: hotīti īdisī codanā idha anokāsāti dassento “kathañca…pe… ārabhī”ti āha, tenettha
tika-s0105t0:1213_4: dasseti. Ye te indriyasaṃvarādayoti sambandho. Rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānadesanānantaraṃ
tika-s0105t0:1213_5: abhiññādesanāya avasaroti katvā rūpajjhānāneva āgatāni, na arūpajjhānāni. Rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānapādikā
tika-s0105t0:1213_6: hi saparibhaṇḍā chapi abhiññāyo. Yasmā pana lokiyābhiññāyo ijjhamānā aṭṭhasu samāpattīsu
tika-s0105t0:1213_7: cuddasavidhena cittaparidamanena vinā na ijjhanti, tasmā abhiññāsu desiyamānāsu arūpajjhānānipi
tika-s0105t0:1213_8: desitāneva honti nānantarikabhāvato. Tenāha “ānetvā pana dīpetabbānī”ti, vuttanayena
tika-s0105t0:1213_9: desitāneva katvā saṃvaṇṇakehi pakāsetabbānīti attho. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “catutthajjhānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1213_10: upasampajja viharatī”ti imināva arūpajjhānampi saṅgahitanti dassetuṃ “catutthajjhānena
tika-s0105t0:1213_11: hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Catutthajjhānameva hi rūpavirāgabhāvanāvasena pavattaṃ “arūpajjhāna”nti vuccati.
tika-s0105t0:1214_0: 471-480. Na cittekaggatāmattakenevāti ettha heṭṭhā vuttanayānusārena ṭhānāṭhānapayuttassa
tika-s0105t0:1214_2: cittekaggatā…pe… atthī”ti vuttaṃ. Ariyo samādhikkhandhoti ettha hi ariyasaddo suddhamattapariyāyova,
tika-s0105t0:1214_3: na lokuttarapariyāyo. Yathā cettha, tathā ariyo sīlakkhandhoti etthāpi. Itoti paññākkhandhato,
tika-s0105t0:1214_4: so ca ukkaṭṭhato arahattaphalapariyāpanno evāti āha “arahattapariyosāna”ntiādi. Lokiyābhiññāpaṭisambhidāhi
tika-s0105t0:1214_5: vināpi hi arahatte adhigate “nattheva uttarikaraṇīya”nti sakkā vattuṃ yadatthaṃ bhagavati
tika-s0105t0:1214_6: brahmacariyaṃ vussati, tassa siddhattā. Idha pana lokiyābhiññāyopi āgatāyeva. Sesamettha suviññeyyaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1215_1: suvimalavipulapaññāveyyattiyajananāya sādhuvilāsiniyā nāma līnatthapakāsaniyā subhasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthapakāsanā.
tika-s0105t0:1219_0: 481. Evaṃ subhasuttaṃ saṃvaṇṇetvā idāni kevaṭṭasuttaṃ saṃvaṇṇento yathānupubbaṃ saṃvaṇṇanokāsassa
tika-s0105t0:1219_1: pattabhāvaṃ vibhāvetuṃ, subhasuttassānantaraṃ saṅgītassa suttassa kevaṭṭasuttabhāvaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1219_2: vā pakāsetuṃ “evaṃ me sutaṃ…pe… nāḷandāyanti kevaṭṭasutta”nti āha. Pāvārikassāti
tika-s0105t0:1219_3: evaṃnāmakassa seṭṭhino. Ambavaneti ambarukkhabahule upavane. Taṃ kira so seṭṭhi bhagavato
tika-s0105t0:1219_5: sampādetvā pākāraparikkhittaṃ dvārakoṭṭhakasampannaṃ katvā buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa
tika-s0105t0:1219_7: tidaṃ nāmamattaṃ. “Kevaṭṭehi saṃrakkhitattā, tesaṃ vā santike sambuddhattā”ti keci.
tika-s0105t0:1219_8: Gahapatiputtassāti ettha kāmañcesa tadā gahapatiṭṭhāne ṭhito, pitu panassa acirakālakatatāya
tika-s0105t0:1219_10: mahāsāro gahapatīti attho, ra-kārassa pana la-kāraṃ katvā “mahāsālo”ti vuttaṃ yathā
tika-s0105t0:1219_12: tatoyeva ratanattayappasanno. Kammakammaphalasaddhāya vā saddho, ratanattayappasādabahulatāya
tika-s0105t0:1219_13: pasanno. Saddhādhikattāyevāti tathācintāya hetuvacanaṃ, saddhādhiko hi ummādappatto viya hoti.
tika-s0105t0:1220_0: Samiddhāti sammadeva iddhā, vibhavasampattiyā vepullappattā sampuṇṇā, ākiṇṇā bahū
tika-s0105t0:1220_1: manussā etthāti atthaṃ sandhāya “aṃsakūṭenā”tiādi vuttaṃ. “Ehi tvaṃ bhikkhu anvaddhamāsaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:1220_2: anumāsaṃ, anusaṃvaccharaṃ vā manussānaṃ pasādāya iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ karohī”ti ekassa
tika-s0105t0:1220_3: bhikkhuno āṇāpanameva samādisanaṃ, taṃ pana tasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhapanaṃ nāmāti āha “ṭhānantare
tika-s0105t0:1220_4: ṭhapetū”ti. Uttarimanussānanti pakatimanussehi uttaritarānaṃ uttamapurisānaṃ buddhādīnaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1220_6: attho, niddhāraṇe cetaṃ nissakkavacanaṃ. Tato hi iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ niddhāreti. Evaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1220_7: uttarisaddaṃ manussasaddena ekapadaṃ katvā idāni pāṭihāriyasaddena sambajjhitabbaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1220_8: visumeva padaṃ karonto “dasakusalasaṅkhātato vā”tiādimāha. Manussadhammatoti pakatimanussadhammato.
