tika-s0105t0:1220_11: gihīnaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ dassetabbaṃ. Yo dasseyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti
tika-s0105t0:1221_0: 482. Guṇasampattito acāvanaṃ sandhāya etaṃ vuttanti dasseti “na guṇavināsanenā”ti
tika-s0105t0:1221_1: iminā. Tenāha “sīlabheda”ntiādi. Visahanto nāma natthīti nivāritaṭṭhāne ussahanto
tika-s0105t0:1221_2: nāma natthi. Evampi iminā kāraṇantarenāyaṃ ussahantoti dassetuṃ “ayaṃ panā”tiādi
tika-s0105t0:1221_3: vuttaṃ. Yasmā vissāsiko, tasmā vissāsaṃ vaḍḍhetvāti yojanā. Vaḍḍhetvāti ca brūhetvā,
tika-s0105t0:1223_0: 483-4. Ādīnavanti dosaṃ. Kathaṃ tena katā, kattha vā uppannāti āha “tattha kirā”tiādi.
tika-s0105t0:1223_1: Ekenāti gandhārena nāma isināva. Evañhi pubbenāparaṃ saṃsandatīti. Gandhārī nāmesā
tika-s0105t0:1223_2: vijjā cūḷagandhārī, mahāgandhārīti duvidhā hoti. Tattha cūḷagandhārī nāma tivassato
tika-s0105t0:1223_3: oraṃ matasattānaṃ upapannaṭṭhānajānanā vijjā. Vaṅgīsavatthu cettha sādhakaṃ. Mahāgandhārī
tika-s0105t0:1223_4: nāma tassa ceva jānanā, taduttari ca iddhividhañāṇakammassa sādhikā vijjā. Yebhuyyena
tika-s0105t0:1223_5: hesā iddhividhañāṇakiccaṃ sādheti. Tassā kira vijjāya sādhako puggalo tādise dese,
tika-s0105t0:1223_6: kāle ca mantaṃ parijappetvā bahudhāpi attānaṃ dasseti, hatthiādīnipi dasseti, adassanīyopi
tika-s0105t0:1223_7: hoti, aggithambhampi karoti, jalathambhampi karoti, ākāsepi attānaṃ dasseti, sabbaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1223_8: indajālasadisaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Aṭṭoti dukkhito bādhito. Tenāha “pīḷito”ti.
tika-s0105t0:1225_0: 485. Kāmaṃ “cetasika”nti idaṃ ye cetasi niyuttā cittena sampayuttā, tesaṃ sādhāraṇavacanaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:1225_1: sādhāraṇe pana gahite cittaviseso dassito nāma hoti. Sāmaññajotanā ca visese avatiṭṭhati,
tika-s0105t0:1225_3: āha. Somanassaggahaṇena cettha tadekaṭṭhā rāgādayo, saddhādayo ca dhammā dassitā
tika-s0105t0:1225_4: honti, domanassaggahaṇena dosādayo. Vitakkavicārā pana sarūpeneva dassitā. Pi-saddassa
tika-s0105t0:1225_5: vattabbasampiṇḍanattho suviññeyyoti āha “evaṃ tava mano”ti, iminā pakārena tava mano
tika-s0105t0:1225_6: pavattoti attho. Kena pakārenāti vuttaṃ “somanassito vā”tiādi. “Evampi te mano”ti
tika-s0105t0:1225_7: idaṃ somanassitatādimattadassanaṃ, na pana yena somanassito vā domanassito vā, taṃ
tika-s0105t0:1225_8: dassananti taṃ cittaṃ dassetuṃ pāḷiyaṃ “itipi te citta”nti vuttaṃ. Itisaddo cettha
tika-s0105t0:1225_9: nidassanattho “atthīti kho kaccāna ayameko anto”tiādīsu viya. Tenāha “idañcidañca
tika-s0105t0:1225_10: attha”nti. Pi-saddo idhāpi vuttasampiṇḍanattho. Parassa cintaṃ manati jānāti etāyāti
tika-s0105t0:1225_11: cintāmaṇi na-kārassa ṇa-kāraṃ katvā, sā eva pubbapadamantarena maṇikā. Cintā nāma
tika-s0105t0:1225_12: na cittena vinā bhavatīti āha “paresaṃ cittaṃ jānātī”ti. “Tassā kira vijjāya sādhako
tika-s0105t0:1225_13: puggalo tādise dese, kāle ca mantaṃ parijappitvā yassa cittaṃ jānitukāmo, tassa diṭṭhasutādivisesasañjānanamukhena
tika-s0105t0:1225_14: cittācāraṃ anuminanto kathetī”ti keci. “Vācaṃ niccharāpetvā tattha akkharasallakkhaṇavasena
tika-s0105t0:1225_15: kathetī”ti apare. Sā pana vijjā padakusalajātakena dīpetabbā.
tika-s0105t0:1227_0: 486. Pavattentāti pavattanakā hutvā, pavattanavasena vitakkethāti vuttaṃ hoti. Evanti
tika-s0105t0:1227_1: hi yathānusiṭṭhāya anusāsaniyā vidhivasena, paṭisedhavasena ca pavattiākāraparāmasanaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:1227_2: sā ca anusāsanī sammāvitakkānaṃ, micchāvitakkānañca pavattiākāradassanavasena tattha
tika-s0105t0:1227_3: ānisaṃsassa, ādīnavassa ca vibhāvanatthaṃ pavattati. Aniccasaññameva, na niccasaññaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1227_4: Paṭiyogīnivattanatthañhi eva-kāraggahaṇaṃ. Idhāpi evaṃ-saddassa attho, payojanañca
tika-s0105t0:1227_5: vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Idaṃ-gahaṇepi eseva nayo. Pañcakāmaguṇikarāganti nidassanamattaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1227_6: tadaññarāgassa ceva dosādīnañca pahānassa icchitattā, tappahānassa ca tadaññarāgādikhepanassa
tika-s0105t0:1227_9: tadaññesaṃ anavajjadhammānaṃ nānantarikabhāvato. Iddhividhaṃ iddhipāṭihāriyanti dasseti
tika-s0105t0:1227_10: iddhiyeva pāṭihāriyanti katvā. Sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo.
tika-s0105t0:1228_1: vadanti, bhagavato pana paṭipakkhā rāgādayo na santi ye haritabbā. Puthujjanānampi
tika-s0105t0:1228_2: vigatupakkilese aṭṭhaṅgaguṇasamannāgate citte hatapaṭipakkhe iddhividhaṃ pavattati,
tika-s0105t0:1228_3: tasmā tattha pavattavohārena ca na sakkā idha “pāṭihāriya”nti vattuṃ. Sace pana mahākāruṇikassa
tika-s0105t0:1228_4: bhagavato veneyyagatā ca kilesā paṭipakkhā, tesaṃ haraṇato “pāṭihāriya”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:1228_5: evaṃ sati yuttametaṃ. Atha vā bhagavato ceva sāsanassa ca paṭipakkhā titthiyā, tesaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1228_6: haraṇato pāṭihāriyaṃ. Te hi diṭṭhiharaṇavasena, diṭṭhippakāsane asamatthabhāvena
tika-s0105t0:1228_7: ca iddhiādesanānusāsanīhi haritā apanītā hontīti. “Paṭī”ti vā ayaṃ saddo “pacchā”ti
tika-s0105t0:1228_8: etassa atthaṃ bodheti “tasmiṃ paṭipaviṭṭhamhi, añño āgañchi brāhmaṇo”ti pārāyanasuttapade
tika-s0105t0:1228_9: viya, tasmā samāhite citte vigatupakkilese ca katakiccena pacchā haritabbaṃ pavattetabbanti
tika-s0105t0:1228_10: paṭihāriyaṃ, attano vā upakkilesesu catutthajjhānamaggehi haritesu pacchā haraṇaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1228_11: paṭihāriyaṃ, iddhiādesanānusāsaniyo ca vigatupakkilesena katakiccena ca sattahitatthaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1228_12: puna pavattetabbā, haritesu ca attano upakkilesesu parasattānaṃ upakkilesaharaṇāni
tika-s0105t0:1228_13: hontīti paṭihāriyāni nāma bhavanti, paṭihāriyameva pāṭihāriyaṃ. Paṭihāriye vā iddhiādesanānusāsanisamudāye
tika-s0105t0:1228_14: bhavaṃ ekekaṃ “pāṭihāriya”nti vuccati. Paṭihāriyaṃ vā catutthajjhānaṃ, maggo ca paṭipakkhaharaṇato,
tika-s0105t0:1228_15: tattha jātaṃ, tasmiṃ vā nimittabhūte, tato vā āgatanti pāṭihāriyaṃ, iddhiādesanānusāsanīhi
tika-s0105t0:1228_16: vā parasantāne pasādādīnaṃ paṭipakkhassa kilesassa haraṇato vuttanayena pāṭihāriyaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1229_0: Iddhipāṭihāriyenāti sahādiyoge karaṇavacanaṃ, tena saddhiṃ āciṇṇanti attho. Itaratthāpi
tika-s0105t0:1229_1: esa nayo. Dhammasenāpatissa āciṇṇanti yojetabbaṃ. Tamatthaṃ khandhakavatthunā sādhento
tika-s0105t0:1229_3: piṭṭhipāsāṇo atthi, yattha bhikkhusahassassapi okāso hoti, tasmiṃ piṭṭhipāsāṇe. “Cittācāraṃ
tika-s0105t0:1229_4: ñatvā”ti iminā ādesanāpāṭihāriyaṃ dasseti, “dhammaṃ desesī”ti iminā anusāsanīpāṭihāriyaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:1229_5: “vikubbanaṃ dassetvā”ti iminā iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ. Mahānāgāti mahākhīṇāsavā arahanto.
tika-s0105t0:1229_6: “Nāgo”ti hi arahato adhivacanaṃ natthi āgu pāpametassāti katvā. Yathāha sabhiyasutte –
tika-s0105t0:1234_0: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ panettha “dhammasenāpatissa dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pañcasatā bhikkhū sotāpattiphale
tika-s0105t0:1234_1: patiṭṭhahiṃsu. Mahāmoggallānassa dhammadesanaṃ sutvā arahattaphale”ti vuttaṃ. Saṅghabhedakakkhandhakapāḷiyaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1234_2: pana “atha kho tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ āyasmatā sāriputtena ādesanāpāṭihāriyānusāsaniyā,
tika-s0105t0:1234_3: āyasmatā ca mahāmoggallānena iddhipāṭihāriyānusāsaniyā ovadiyamānānaṃ anusāsiyamānānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1234_4: virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādi ‘yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamma’nti”
tika-s0105t0:1234_5: ubhinnampi therānaṃ dhammadesanāya tesaṃ dhammacakkhupaṭilābhova dassito, tayidaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1234_7: Saṅgāhakabhāsitā hi ayaṃ pāḷi, aṭṭhakathā ca teheva saṅgahamāropitā, apica pāḷiyaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1234_8: uparimaggaphalampi saṅgahetvā “dhammacakkhuṃ udapādī”ti vuttaṃ yathā taṃ brahmāyusutte,
tika-s0105t0:1235_0: “Anusāsanīpāṭihāriyaṃ pana buddhānaṃ satataṃ dhammadesanā”ti sātisayatāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1235_1: Saupārambhāni yathāvuttena patirūpakena upārambhitabbato. Sadosāni parāropitadosasamucchindanassa
tika-s0105t0:1235_2: anupāyabhāvato. Sadosattā eva addhānaṃ na tiṭṭhanti cirakālaṭṭhāyīni na honti. Addhānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1235_3: atiṭṭhanato na niyyantīti phalena hetuno anumānaṃ. Aniyyānikatāya hi tāni anaddhaniyāni.
tika-s0105t0:1235_4: Anusāsanīpāṭihāriyaṃ anupārambhaṃ visuddhippabhavato, visuddhinissayato ca. Tatoyeva
tika-s0105t0:1235_5: niddosaṃ. Na hi tattha pubbāparavirodhādidosasambhavo atthi. Niddosattā eva addhānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1235_6: tiṭṭhati parappavādavātehi, kilesavātehi ca anupahantabbato. Addhānaṃ tiṭṭhanato
tika-s0105t0:1235_7: niyyātīti idhāpi phalena hetuno anumānaṃ. Niyyānikatāya hi taṃ addhaniyaṃ. Tasmāti
tika-s0105t0:1235_8: yathāvuttakāraṇato, tena ca upārambhādiṃ, anupārambhādiñcāti ubhayaṃ yathākkamaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1237_0: 487. Aniyyānikabhāvadassanatthanti yasmā mahābhūtapariyesako bhikkhu purimesu dvīsu
tika-s0105t0:1237_1: pāṭihāriyesu vasippatto sukusalopi samāno mahābhūtānaṃ aparisesanirodhasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1237_2: nibbānaṃ nāvabujjhi, tasmā tadubhayāni niyyānāvahattābhāvato aniyyānikānīti tesaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1238_0: Evaṃ etissā desanāya mukhyapayojanaṃ dassetvā idāni anusaṅgikapayojanaṃ dassetuṃ
tika-s0105t0:1238_1: “apicā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Niyyānameva hi etissā desanāya mukhyapayojanaṃ tassa tadatthabhāvato.
tika-s0105t0:1238_2: Buddhānaṃ pana mahantabhāvo anusaṅgikapayojanaṃ atthāpattiyāva gantabbato. Kīdiso
tika-s0105t0:1238_3: nāmesa bhikkhūti āha “yo mahābhūte”tiādi. Pariyesantoti apariyesaṃ nirujjhanavasena
tika-s0105t0:1238_4: mahābhūte gavesanto, tesaṃ anavasesanirodhaṃ vīmaṃsantoti vuttaṃ hoti. Vicaritvāti
tika-s0105t0:1238_5: dhammatāya codiyamāno paricaritvā. Dhammatāsiddhaṃ kiretaṃ, yadidaṃ tassa bhikkhuno
tika-s0105t0:1238_6: tathā vicaraṇaṃ yathā abhijātiyaṃ mahāpathavikampādi. Vissajjokāsanti vissajjaṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:1238_7: “vissajjakara”ntipi pāṭho, vissajjakanti attho. Tasmāti buddhameva pucchitvā nikkaṅkhattā,
tika-s0105t0:1238_8: tasseva vissajjituṃ samatthatāyāti vuttaṃ hoti. Mahantabhāvappakāsanatthanti sadevake
tika-s0105t0:1238_9: loke anaññasādhāraṇassa buddhānaṃ mahantabhāvassa mahānubhāvatāya dīpanatthaṃ. Idañca
tika-s0105t0:1238_10: kāraṇanti “sabbesampi buddhānaṃ sāsane ediso eko bhikkhu tadānubhāvappakāsako hotī”ti imampi kāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1239_0: Katthāti nimitte bhummaṃ, kasmiṃ ṭhāne kāraṇabhūteti atthaṃ dassetuṃ “kiṃ āgammā”ti
tika-s0105t0:1239_1: vuttaṃ, kiṃ ārammaṇaṃ paccayabhūtaṃ adhigantvā adhigamanahetūti attho. Tenāha “kiṃ
tika-s0105t0:1239_2: pattassā”ti. Kimārammaṇaṃ pattassa puggalassa nirujjhantīti sambandho, hetugabbhavisesanametaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1239_3: Teti mahābhūtā. Appavattivasenāti puna anuppajjanavasena. Sabbākārenāti vacanatthalakkhaṇarasapaccupaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhāna-samuṭṭhānakalāpacuṇṇanānattekattavinibbhogā-
tika-s0105t0:1240_0: 488. Dibbanti ettha pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samaṅgībhūtā hutvā vicaranti, kīḷanti, jotenti
tika-s0105t0:1240_1: cāti devā, devalokā. Te yanti upagacchanti etenāti devayāniyo yathā “niyyānikā”ti
tika-s0105t0:1240_2: ettha anīyasaddo katvatthe, tathā idha karaṇattheti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “tena
tika-s0105t0:1240_3: hesā”tiādi. Vasaṃ vattentoti ettha vasavattanaṃ nāma yathicchitaṭṭhānagamanaṃ. Tanti
tika-s0105t0:1240_4: iddhividhañāṇaṃ. Cattāro mahārājāno etesaṃ issarāti cātumahārājikā. Kasmā panesa
tika-s0105t0:1240_5: samīpe ṭhitaṃ sadevakalokapajjotaṃ bhagavantaṃ apucchitvā dūre deve upasaṅkamīti
tika-s0105t0:1240_6: codanamapaneti “samīpe ṭhita”ntiādinā. “Ye devā maggaphalalābhino, tepi tamatthaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1240_7: ekadesena jāneyyuṃ, buddhavisayo panāyaṃ pañho pucchito”ti cintetvā “na jānāmā”ti
tika-s0105t0:1240_8: āhaṃsu. Tenāha “buddhavisaye”tiādi. Na labbhāti na sakkā, ajjhottharaṇaṃ nāmettha
tika-s0105t0:1240_9: pucchāya nibbādhananti vuttaṃ “punappunaṃ pucchatī”ti. “Hatthato mocessāmā”ti vohāravasena
tika-s0105t0:1240_10: vuttaṃ, handa naṃ dūramapanessāmāti vuttaṃ hoti. Abhikkantatarāti ettha abhisaddo
tika-s0105t0:1240_12: ca amhe abhibhuyya paresaṃ kāmanīyatarāti attho. Paṇītatarāti uḷāratarā. Tena vuttaṃ “uttamatarā”ti.
tika-s0105t0:1241: 491-493. Sahassakkho pana sakko abhisametāvī āgataphalo viññātasāsano, so kasmā taṃ bhikkhuṃ upāyena niyyojesīti anuyogamapaneti “ayaṃ pana viseso”tiādinā.
tika-s0105t0:1242_0: Khajjopanakanti rattiṃ jalantaṃ khuddakakimiṃ. Dhamanto viyāti mukhavātaṃ dento viya.
tika-s0105t0:1242_1: Atthi cevāti ediso mahābhūtapariyesako puggalo nāma vijjamāno eva bhaveyya, mayā
tika-s0105t0:1242_2: apesitoyeva pacchā jānissatīti adhippāyo. Tatoti tathā cintanato paraṃ. Iddhividhañāṇasseva
tika-s0105t0:1242_3: adhippetattā devayāniyasadisova. “Devayāniyamaggoti vā…pe… abhiññāñāṇanti vā sabbametaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1242_4: iddhividhañāṇasseva nāma”nti idaṃ pāḷiyaṃ, aṭṭhakathāsu ca tattha tattha āgataruḷhināmavasena
tika-s0105t0:1242_5: vuttaṃ. Sabbāsupi hi abhiññāsu devayāniyamaggādiekacittakkhaṇikaappanādināmaṃ yathārahaṃ sambhavati.
tika-s0105t0:1243_0: 494. Āgamanapubbabhāge nimittanti brahmuno āgamanassa pubbabhāge uppajjanakanimittaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1243_1: Udayato pubbabhāgeti ānetvā sambandho. Imeti brahmakāyikā. Veyyākaraṇenāti byākaraṇena.
tika-s0105t0:1243_2: Anāraddhacittoti anārādhitacitto atuṭṭhacitto. Vādanti dosaṃ. Vikkhepanti vācāya vividhā khepanaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1244: 495. Kuhakattāti vuttanayena abhūtato aññesaṃ vimhāpetukāmattā. “Guhakattā”ti paṭhitvā guyhitukāmattāti atthampi vadanti keci.
tika-s0105t0:1246_0: 497. Padesenāti ekadesena, upādinnakena sattasantānapariyāpannenāti attho. Anupādinnakepīti
tika-s0105t0:1246_1: anindriyabaddhepi. Nippadesatoti anavasesato. Tasmāti tathā pucchitattā, pucchāya
tika-s0105t0:1246_2: ayuttabhāvatoti adhippāyo. Pucchāmūḷhassāti pucchitumajānanato pucchāya sammūḷhassa.
tika-s0105t0:1246_3: Vitathapañho hi “pucchāmūḷho”ti vuccati yathā “maggamūḷho”ti. Pucchāya dosaṃ dassetvāti
tika-s0105t0:1246_4: tena katapucchāya pucchitākāre dosaṃ vibhāvetvā. Pucchāvissajjananti tathā sikkhāpitāya
tika-s0105t0:1246_5: avitathapucchāya vissajjanaṃ. Yasmā vissajjanaṃ nāma pucchānurūpaṃ, pucchāsabhāgena
tika-s0105t0:1246_6: vissajjetabbato, na ca tathāgatā virajjhitvā katapucchānurūpaṃ virajjhitvāva vissajjenti,
tika-s0105t0:1246_7: atthasabhāgatāya ca vissajjanassa pucchakā tadatthaṃ anavabujjhantā sammuyhanti,
tika-s0105t0:1246_8: tasmā pucchaṃ sikkhāpetvā avitathapucchāya vissajjanaṃ buddhānamāciṇṇanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1247_0: 498. Na patiṭṭhātīti paccayaṃ katvā na patiṭṭhahati. “Katthā”ti idaṃ nimitte bhummanti
tika-s0105t0:1247_1: āha “kiṃ āgammā”ti. Appatiṭṭhāti appaccayā, sabbena sabbaṃ samucchinnakāraṇāti attho.
tika-s0105t0:1247_2: Upādinnaṃyevāti indriyabaddhameva. Yasmā ekadisābhimukhaṃ santānavasena bahudhā saṇṭhite
tika-s0105t0:1247_3: rūpappabandhe dīghasaññā, tamupādāya tato appakaṃ saṇṭhite rassasaññā, tadubhayañca
tika-s0105t0:1247_4: visesato rūpaggahaṇamukhena gayhati, tasmā “saṇṭhānavasenā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Appaparimāṇe
tika-s0105t0:1247_5: rūpasaṅghāte aṇusaññā, tadupādāya tato mahati thūlasaññā, idampi dvayaṃ visesato
tika-s0105t0:1247_7: upādārūpaṃ vutta”nti etthāpi vaṇṇamattameva kathitanti imamatthaṃ samuccinātī”ti
tika-s0105t0:1247_8: vadanti. Vaṇṇasaddo hettha rūpāyatanapariyāyova. Subhanti sundaraṃ, iṭṭhanti attho.
tika-s0105t0:1247_9: Asubhanti asundaraṃ, aniṭṭhanti attho. Tenāha “iṭṭhāniṭṭhārammaṇaṃ panevaṃ kathita”nti.
tika-s0105t0:1247_10: Dīghaṃ rassaṃ aṇuṃ thūlaṃ subhāsubhanti tīsupi ṭhānesu rūpāyatanamukhena upādārūpasseva
tika-s0105t0:1247_11: gahaṇaṃ bhūtarūpānaṃ visuṃ gahitattāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Kattha āpo ca pathavī, tejo vāyo
tika-s0105t0:1247_12: na gādhatī”ti hi bhūtarūpāni visuṃ gayhanti. Nāmanti vedanādikkhandhacatukkaṃ. Tañhi
tika-s0105t0:1247_13: ārammaṇābhimukhaṃ namanato, nāmakaraṇato ca “nāma”nti vuccati. Heṭṭhā “dīghaṃ rassa”ntiādinā
tika-s0105t0:1247_14: vuttameva idha ruppanaṭṭhena rūpasaññāya gahitanti dasseti “dīghādibheda”nti iminā.
tika-s0105t0:1247_15: Ādisaddena āpādīnañca saṅgaho. Yasmā vā dīghādisamaññā na rūpāyatanavatthukāva, atha
tika-s0105t0:1247_16: kho bhūtarūpavatthukāpi. Tathā hi saṇṭhānaṃ phusanamukhenapi gayhati, tasmā dīgharassādiggahaṇena
tika-s0105t0:1247_17: bhūtarūpampi gayhatevāti imamatthaṃ viññāpetuṃ “dīghādibhedaṃ rūpa” micceva vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1247_18: Kiṃ āgammāti kiṃ adhigantvā kissa adhigamanahetu. “Uparujjhatī”ti idaṃ anuppādanirodhaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1247_19: sandhāya vuttaṃ, na khaṇanirodhanti āha “asesametaṃ nappavattatī”ti.
tika-s0105t0:1248_0: 499. Tatra veyyākaraṇaṃ bhavatīti anusandhivacanamattaṃ cuṇṇiyapāṭhaṃ vatvā veyyākaraṇavacanabhūtaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1248_1: viññāṇantiādiṃ silokamāhāti adhippāyo. Viññātabbanti visiṭṭhena ñāṇena ñātabbaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:1248_2: sabbañāṇuttamena ariyamaggañāṇena paccakkhato jānitabbanti attho. Tenāha “nibbānassetaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1248_3: nāma”nti. Nidassīyateti nidassanaṃ, cakkhuviññeyyaṃ, na nidassanaṃ anidassanaṃ, acakkhuviññeyyanti
tika-s0105t0:1248_4: atthaṃ vadanti. Nidassanaṃ vā upamā, tadetassa natthīti anidassanaṃ. Na hi nibbānassa
tika-s0105t0:1248_5: niccassa ekabhūtassa accantapaṇītasabhāvassa sadisaṃ nidassanaṃ kutoci labbhatīti.
tika-s0105t0:1248_6: Yaṃ ahutvā sambhoti, hutvā paṭiveti, taṃ saṅkhataṃ udayavayantehi saantaṃ, asaṅkhatassa
tika-s0105t0:1248_7: pana nibbānassa niccassa te ubhopi antā na santi, tato eva navabhāvāpagamasaṅkhātā
tika-s0105t0:1248_8: jaratāpi tassa natthīti vuttaṃ “uppādanto vā”tiādi. Tattha uppādantoti uppādāvatthā.
tika-s0105t0:1248_9: Vayantoti bhaṅgāvatthā. Ṭhitassa aññathattantoti jaratā vuttā. Avasesaggahaṇena ṭhitāvatthā
tika-s0105t0:1248_10: anuññātā hoti. Titthassāti pānatitthassa. Tattha nibbacanaṃ dasseti “tañhī”tiādinā.
tika-s0105t0:1248_11: Papantīti pakārena pivanti. Tathā hi ācariyena vuttaṃ “papanti etthāti papanti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1248_12: Ettha hi papanti pānatittha”nti niruttinayena, yathārutalakkhaṇena vā pa-kārassa
tika-s0105t0:1248_13: bha-kāro kato. Sabbatoti sabbakammaṭṭhānamukhato. Tenāha “aṭṭhatiṃsāya kammaṭṭhānesu
tika-s0105t0:1248_14: yena yena mukhenā”ti. Ayaṃ aṭṭhakathāto aparo nayo – pakārena bhāsanaṃ jotanaṃ pabhā,
tika-s0105t0:1248_15: sabbato pabhā assāti sabbatopabhaṃ, kenaci anupakkiliṭṭhatāya samantato pabhassaraṃ
tika-s0105t0:1248_16: visuddhanti attho. Ettha nibbāneti nimitte bhummaṃ dasseti “idaṃ nibbānaṃ āgammā”ti
tika-s0105t0:1248_17: iminā. Yena nibbānamadhigataṃ, taṃ santatipariyāpannānaṃyeva idha anuppādanirodho
tika-s0105t0:1249_0: Tatthāti yadetaṃ “viññāṇassa nirodhenā”ti padaṃ vuttaṃ, tasmiṃ. Viññāṇaṃ uddharati
tika-s0105t0:1249_1: tassa vibhajjitabbattā. Carimakaviññāṇanti arahato cuticittasaṅkhātaṃ parinibbānacittaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1249_3: nibbāne etaṃ nāmarūpaṃ anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā nirujjhati. Tenāha “vijjhāta…pe…
tika-s0105t0:1249_4: bhāvaṃ yātī”ti. Vijjhātadīpasikhā viyāti nibbutadīpasikhā viya. “Abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassāpī”tiādinā
tika-s0105t0:1249_6: uparujjhanassa adhippetattā. Tena vuttaṃ “anuppādavasena uparujjhatī”ti. Sotāpattimaggañāṇenāti
tika-s0105t0:1249_7: kattari, karaṇe vā karaṇavacanaṃ, nirodhenāti pana hetumhi. Etthāti nibbāne. Sesaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1250_1: suvimalavipulapaññāveyyattiyajananāya sādhuvilāsiniyā nāma līnatthapakāsaniyā kevaṭṭasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthapakāsanā.
tika-s0105t0:1254_0: 501. Evaṃ kevaṭṭasuttaṃ saṃvaṇṇetvā idāni lohiccasuttaṃ saṃvaṇṇento yathānupubbaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1254_1: saṃvaṇṇanokāsassa pattabhāvaṃ vibhāvetuṃ, kevaṭṭasuttassānantaraṃ saṅgītassa suttassa
tika-s0105t0:1254_2: lohiccasuttabhāvaṃ vā pakāsetuṃ “evaṃ me sutaṃ…pe… kosalesūti lohiccasutta”nti āha.
tika-s0105t0:1254_3: Sālavatikāti kāraṇamantarena itthiliṅgavasena tassa gāmassa nāmaṃ. Gāmaṇikābhāvenāti
tika-s0105t0:1254_4: keci. Vatiyāti kaṇṭakasākhādivatiyā. Lohito nāma tassa kule pubbapuriso, tabbaṃsavasena
tika-s0105t0:1254_5: lohitassa apaccaṃ lohiccoti brāhmaṇassa gottato āgatanāmaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1255_0: 502. “Kiñhi paro parassa karissatī”ti parānukampā virahitattā lāmakaṃ. Na tu ucchedasassatānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1255_1: aññatarassāti āha “na panā”tiādi. Diṭṭhigatanti hi laddhimattaṃ adhippetaṃ, aññathā
tika-s0105t0:1255_2: ucchedasassataggāhavinimutto koci diṭṭhiggāho nāma natthīti tesamaññataraṃ siyā.
tika-s0105t0:1255_3: “Uppannaṃ hotī”ti idaṃ manasi, vacasi ca uppannatāsādhāraṇavacananti dasseti “na
tika-s0105t0:1255_4: kevalañcā”tiādinā. So kira…pe… bhāsatiyevāti ca tassā laddhiyā loke pākaṭabhāvaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1255_5: vadati. Yasmā pana attato añño paro hoti, tasmā yathā anusāsakato anusāsitabbo paro,
tika-s0105t0:1255_6: evaṃ anusāsitabbatopi anusāsakoti dassetuṃ “paro”tiādi vuttaṃ. Kiṃ-saddāpekkhāya
tika-s0105t0:1255_7: cettha “karissatī”ti anāgatakālavacanaṃ, anāgatepi vā tena tassa kātabbaṃ natthīti
tika-s0105t0:1255_8: dassanatthaṃ. Kusalaṃ dhammanti anavajjadhammaṃ nikkilesadhammaṃ, vimokkhadhammanti
tika-s0105t0:1255_9: attho. “Paresaṃ dhammaṃ kathessāmī”ti tehi attānaṃ parivārāpetvā vicaraṇaṃ kimatthiyaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:1255_10: āsayavuddhassapi anurodhena vinā taṃ na hoti, tasmā attanā…pe… vihātabbanti vadati.
tika-s0105t0:1256_1: Soti lohiccabrāhmaṇo. Bhāroti bhagavato parisabāhullattā, attano ca bahukiccakaraṇīyattā garu dukkaraṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1257_0: 508. Kathāphāsukatthanti kathāsukhatthaṃ, sukhena kathaṃ kathetuñceva sotuñcāti attho.
tika-s0105t0:1257_1: Ayaṃ upāsakoti rosikanhāpitaṃ āha. Appeva nāma siyāti ettha pītivasena āmeḍitaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1257_2: Tathā hi taṃ “buddhagajjita”nti vuccati. Bhagavā hi īdisesu ṭhānesu visesato pītisomanassajāto
tika-s0105t0:1257_3: hoti, tasmā pītivasena paṭhamaṃ gajjati, dutiyampi anugajjati. Kiṃ visesaṃ gajjanamanugajjananti
tika-s0105t0:1257_4: vuttaṃ “aya”ntiādi. Ādo bhāsanaṃ allāpo, saññoge pare rasso. Taduttari saha bhāsanaṃ sallāpo.
tika-s0105t0:1259_0: 509. Samudayasañjātīti āyuppādoti āha “bhoguppādo”ti. Tatoti sālavatikāya. Lābhantarāyakaroti
tika-s0105t0:1259_1: dhanadhaññalābhassa antarāyakaro. Anupubbo kapi-saddo ākaṅkhanatthoti dasseti “icchatī”ti
tika-s0105t0:1259_2: iminā. Ayaṃ aṭṭhakathāto aparo nayo – sātisayena hitena anukampako anuggaṇhanako
tika-s0105t0:1259_3: hitānukampīti. Sampajjatīti āsevanalābhena nippajjati, balavatī hoti avaggahāti attho.
tika-s0105t0:1260_0: 510-511. Dutiyaṃ upapattinti “nanu rājā pasenadikosalo”tiādinā vuttaṃ dutiyaṃ upapattiṃ
tika-s0105t0:1260_1: ṭhānaṃ yuttiṃ. Kāraṇañhi bhagavā upamāmukhena dasseti, imāya ca upapattiyā tumhe
tika-s0105t0:1260_2: ceva aññe cāti lohiccampi antokatvā saṃvejanaṃ kataṃ hoti. Ye ca ime kulaputtā dibbā
tika-s0105t0:1260_3: gabbhā paripācentīti yojanā. Upanissayasampattiyā, ñāṇaparipākassa vā abhāvena asakkontā.
tika-s0105t0:1260_4: Kammapadena atulyādhikaraṇattā paripācenti kiriyāya vibhattivipallāsena upayogatthe
tika-s0105t0:1260_5: paccattavacanaṃ. Ye pana “paripaccantī”ti kammarūpena paṭhanti, tesaṃ mate vibhattivipallāsena
tika-s0105t0:1260_6: payojanaṃ natthi kammakattubhāvato, attho panassa dutiyavikappe vuttanayena dānādipuññaviseso
tika-s0105t0:1260_7: veditabbo. Ahitānukampāditā ca tassa taṃsamaṅgīsattavasena hoti. Divi bhavāti dibbā.
tika-s0105t0:1260_8: Gabbhenti paripaccanavasena attani pabandhentīti gabbhā, devalokā. “Channaṃ devalokāna”nti
tika-s0105t0:1260_9: nidassanavacanametaṃ. Brahmalokassāpi hi dibbagabbhabhāvo labbhateva dibbavihārahetukattā.
tika-s0105t0:1260_10: Evañca katvā “bhāvanaṃ bhāvayamānā”ti idampi vacanaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti. “Devalokagāminiṃ
tika-s0105t0:1260_11: paṭipadaṃ pūrayamānā”ti vatvā taṃ paṭipadaṃ sarūpato dassetuṃ “dānaṃ dadamānā”tiādi
tika-s0105t0:1260_12: vuttaṃ. Bhavanti ettha yathāruci sukhasamappitāti bhavā, vimānāni. Devabhāvāvahattā
tika-s0105t0:1260_13: dibbā. Vuttanayeneva gabbhā. Dānādayo devalokasaṃvattanika puññavisesā. Dibbā bhavāti
tika-s0105t0:1260_14: idha devalokapariyāpannā upapattibhavā adhippetā. Tadāvaho hi kammabhavo pubbe gahitoti
tika-s0105t0:1262_0: 513. Aniyāmitenevāti aniyamiteneva, “tvaṃ evaṃ diṭṭhiko, evaṃ sattānaṃ anatthassa
tika-s0105t0:1262_1: kārako”ti evaṃ anuddesikeneva. Sabbalokapatthaṭāya laddhiyā samuppajjanato yāva bhavaggā
tika-s0105t0:1262_2: uggataṃ. Mānanti “ahametaṃ jānāmi, ahametaṃ passāmī”ti evaṃ pavattaṃ paṇḍitamānaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1262_3: Bhinditvāti vidhametvā, jahāpetvāti attho. Tayo satthāreti asampāditaattahito anovādakarasāvako
tika-s0105t0:1262_4: ca asampāditaattahito ovādakarasāvako ca sampāditaattahito anovādakarasāvako ceti
tika-s0105t0:1262_5: ime tayo satthāre. Catuttho pana sammāsambuddho na codanāraho, tasmā “taṃ tena pucchito
tika-s0105t0:1262_6: eva kathessāmī”ti codanāraheva tayo satthāre paṭhamaṃ dasseti, pacchā catutthaṃ satthāraṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1262_7: Kāmañcettha catuttho satthā eko adutiyo anaññasādhāraṇo, tathāpi so yesaṃ uttarimanussadhammānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1262_8: vasena “dhammamayo kāyo”ti vuccati, tesaṃ samudāyabhūtopi te guṇāvayave satthuṭṭhāniye
tika-s0105t0:1262_9: katvā dassento bhagavā “ayampi kho lohicca satthā”ti abhāsi.
tika-s0105t0:1263_0: Aññāti ya-kāralopaniddeso “sayaṃ abhiññā”tiādīsu viya, tadatthe cetaṃ sampadānavacananti
tika-s0105t0:1263_1: dasseti “aññāyā”tiādinā. Sāvakattaṃ paṭijānitvā ṭhitattā ekadesenassa sāsanaṃ karontīti
tika-s0105t0:1263_2: āha “nirantaraṃ tassa sāsanaṃ akatvā”ti. Ukkamitvā ukkamitvāti kadāci tathā karaṇaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:1263_3: kadāci tathā akaraṇañca sandhāya vicchāvacanaṃ, yadicchitaṃ karontīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0105t0:1263_4: Paṭikkamantiyāti anabhiratiyā agāravena apagacchantiyā. Tena vuttaṃ “anicchantiyā”tiādi.
tika-s0105t0:1263_5: Ekāyāti adutiyāya itthiyā, sampayoganti methunadhammasamāyogaṃ. Eko iccheyyāti adutiyo
tika-s0105t0:1263_6: puriso sampayogaṃ iccheyyāti ānetvā sambandho. Osakkanādimukhena itthipurisasambandhanidassanaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1263_7: gehassitāgehassitaapekkhavasena tassa satthuno sāvakesu paṭipattidassanatthaṃ. Ativirattabhāvato
tika-s0105t0:1263_8: daṭṭhumpi anicchamānaṃ parammukhiṃ ṭhitaṃ itthiṃ. Lobhenāti parivāraṃ nissāya uppajjanakalābhasakkāralobhena.
tika-s0105t0:1263_9: Īdisoti evaṃsabhāvo satthā. Yenāti lobhadhammena. Tattha sampādehīti tasmiṃ paṭipattidhamme
tika-s0105t0:1263_10: patiṭṭhitaṃ katvā sampādehi. Kāyavaṅkādivigamena ujuṃ karohi.
tika-s0105t0:1265_0: 515. Evaṃ codanaṃ arahatīti vuttanayena sāvakesu appossukkabhāvāpādane niyojanavasena
tika-s0105t0:1265_1: codanaṃ arahati, na paṭhamo viya “evarūpo tava lobhadhammo”tiādinā, na ca dutiyo
tika-s0105t0:1265_2: viya “attānameva tāva tattha sampādehī”tiādinā. Kasmā? Sampāditaattahitatāya tatiyassa.
tika-s0105t0:1267_0: 516. Na codanārahoti ettha yasmā codanārahatā nāma satthuvippaṭipattiyā vā sāvakavippaṭipattiyā
tika-s0105t0:1267_1: vā ubhayavippaṭipattiyā vā hoti, tayidaṃ sabbampi imasmiṃ satthari natthi, tasmā
tika-s0105t0:1267_2: na codanārahoti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “ayañhī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Assavāti paṭissavā.
tika-s0105t0:1268_0: 517. Mayā gahitāya diṭṭhiyāti sabbaso anavajje anupavajje sammāpaṭipanne, paresañca
tika-s0105t0:1268_1: sammadeva sammāpaṭipattiṃ dassente satthari abhūtadosāropanavasena micchāgahitāya
tika-s0105t0:1268_2: nirayagāminiyā pāpadiṭṭhiyā. Narakapapātanti narakasaṅkhātaṃ mahāpapātaṃ. Papatanti
tika-s0105t0:1268_3: etthāti hi papāto. Dhammadesanāhatthenāti dhammadesanāsaṅkhātena hatthena. Saggamaggathaleti
tika-s0105t0:1269_1: suvimalavipulapaññāveyyattiyajananāya sādhuvilāsiniyā nāma līnatthapakāsaniyā lohiccasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthapakāsanā.
tika-s0105t0:1272_0: 518. Evaṃ lohiccasuttaṃ saṃvaṇṇetvā idāni tevijjasuttaṃ saṃvaṇṇento yathānupubbaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1272_1: saṃvaṇṇanokāsassa pattabhāvaṃ vibhāvetuṃ, lohiccasuttassānantaraṃ saṅgītassa suttassa
tika-s0105t0:1272_2: tevijjasuttabhāvaṃ vā pakāsetuṃ “evaṃ me sutaṃ…pe… kosalesūti tevijjasutta”nti āha.
tika-s0105t0:1272_3: Nāmanti nāmamattaṃ. Disāvācīsaddato payujjamāno enasaddo aduratthe icchito, tappayogena
tika-s0105t0:1272_4: ca pañcamiyatthe sāmivacanaṃ, tasmā “uttarenā”ti padena adūratthajotanaṃ, pañcamiyatthe
tika-s0105t0:1272_5: ca sāmivacanaṃ dassetuṃ “manasākaṭato avidūre uttarapasse”ti vuttaṃ. “Disāvācīsaddato
tika-s0105t0:1272_6: pañcamīvacanassa adūratthajotanato adūratthaṃ dassetuṃ enasaddena evaṃ vutta”nti
tika-s0105t0:1272_7: keci, sattamiyatthe cetaṃ tatiyāvacanaṃ “pubbena gāmaṃ ramaṇīya”ntiādīsu viya. “Akkharacintakā
tika-s0105t0:1272_8: pana ena-saddayoge avadhivācini pade upayogavacanaṃ icchanti, attho pana sāmivaseneva
tika-s0105t0:1272_9: icchito, tasmā idha sāmivacanavaseneva vutta”nti ayaṃ ācariyamati. Taruṇaambarukkhasaṇḍeti
tika-s0105t0:1273_1: Tattha tatthāti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ dese, kule vā. Te nivāsaṭṭhānena visesento “tatthā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0105t0:1273_3: bahūnaṃ pavesanaṃ nivāretvā”ti. Nadītīreti aciravatiyā nadiyā tīre.
tika-s0105t0:1275_0: 520. Jaṅghacāranti caṅkamena, ito cito ca vicaraṇaṃ. So hi jaṅghāsu kilamathavinodanatthaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1275_1: caraṇato “jaṅghavihāro, jaṅghacāro”ti ca vutto. Tenāha pāḷiyaṃ “anucaṅkamantānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1275_2: anuvicarantāna”nti. Cuṇṇamattikādi nhānīyasambhāro. Tena vuttanti ubhosupi anucaṅkamanānuvicaraṇānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1275_3: labbhanato evaṃ vuttaṃ. Maggo cettha brahmalokagamanūpāyapaṭipadābhūto ujumaggo.
tika-s0105t0:1275_4: Icchitaṭṭhānaṃ ujukaṃ maggati upagacchati etenāti hi maggo, tadañño amaggo, a-saddo
tika-s0105t0:1275_5: vā vuddhiattho daṭṭhabbo. Tathā hi “katamaṃ nu kho”tiādinā maggameva dasseti. Paṭipadanti
tika-s0105t0:1276_0: Añjasāyanoti ujumaggassa vevacanaṃ pariyāyadvayassa atirekatthadīpanato yathā “padaṭṭhāna”nti.
tika-s0105t0:1276_1: Dutiyavikappe añjasasaddo ujukapariyāyo. Niyyātīti niyyāniyo, so eva niyyānikoti
tika-s0105t0:1276_2: dasseti “niyyāyanto”ti iminā. Niyyāniko niyyātīti ca ekantaniyyānaṃ vuttaṃ, gacchanto
tika-s0105t0:1276_3: hutvā gacchatīti attho. Kasmā maggo “niyyātī”ti vutto, nanvesa gamane abyāpāroti?
tika-s0105t0:1276_4: Saccaṃ. Yasmā panassa niyyātu-puggalavasena niyyānabhāvo labbhati, tasmā niyyāyantapuggalassa
tika-s0105t0:1276_5: yoniso paṭipajjanavasena niyyāyanto maggo “niyyātī”ti vutto. Karotīti attano santāne
tika-s0105t0:1276_6: uppādeti. Tathā uppādentoyeva hi taṃ paṭipajjati nāma. Saha byeti vattatīti sahabyo,
tika-s0105t0:1276_7: sahavattanako, tassa bhāvo sahabyatāti vuttaṃ “sahabhāvāyā”ti. Sahabhāvoti ca salokatā,
tika-s0105t0:1276_8: samīpatā vā veditabbā. Tathā cāha “ekaṭṭhāne pātubhāvāyā”ti. Sakamevāti attano ācariyena
tika-s0105t0:1276_9: pokkharasātinā kathitameva. Thometvāti “ayameva ujumaggo ayamañjasāyano”tiādinā pasaṃsitvā.
tika-s0105t0:1276_10: Tathā paggaṇhitvā. Bhāradvājopi sakameva attano ācariyena tārukkhena kathitameva
tika-s0105t0:1276_11: ācariyavādaṃ thometvā paggaṇhitvā vicaratīti yojanā. Tena vuttanti yathā tathā vā
tika-s0105t0:1277_0: 521-522. Aniyyānikāvāti appāṭihārikāva, aññamaññassa vāde dosaṃ dassetvā aviparītatthadassanatthaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1277_1: uttararahitā evāti attho. Tulanti mānapatthatulaṃ. Aññamaññavādassa āditova viruddhaggahaṇaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1277_2: viggaho, sveva vivadanavasena aparāparaṃ uppanno vivādoti āha “pubbuppattiko”tiādi.
tika-s0105t0:1277_3: Duvidhopi esoti viggaho, vivādoti dvidhā vuttopi eso virodho. Nānāācariyānaṃ vādatoti
tika-s0105t0:1277_4: nānārucikānaṃ ācariyānaṃ vādabhāvato. Nānāvādo nānāvidho vādoti katvā, adhunā pana
tika-s0105t0:1278_0: 523. Ekassāpīti tumhesu dvīsu ekassāpi. Ekasminti sakavādaparavādesu ekasmimpi. Saṃsayo
tika-s0105t0:1278_1: natthīti “maggo nu kho, na maggo”ti vicikicchā natthi, añjasānañjasābhāve pana saṃsayo.
tika-s0105t0:1278_2: Tena vuttaṃ “esa kirā”tiādi evaṃ satīti yadi sabbattha maggasaññino, evaṃ sati “kismiṃ
tika-s0105t0:1278_3: vo viggaho”ti bhagavā pucchati. Itisaddena cettha ādyatthena vivādo, nānāvādo ca saṅgahito.
tika-s0105t0:1279_0: 524. “Icchitaṭṭhānaṃ ujukaṃ maggati upagacchati etenāti maggo, ujumaggo. Tadañño
tika-s0105t0:1279_1: amaggo, a-saddo vā vuddhiattho daṭṭhabbo”ti heṭṭhā vuttovāyamattho. Anujumaggeti
tika-s0105t0:1279_2: etthāpi a-saddo vuddhiattho ca yujjati. Tameva vatthunti sabbesampi brāhmaṇānaṃ maggassa
tika-s0105t0:1279_3: maggabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ, sakamaggassa ujumaggabhāvasaṅkhātañca vatthuṃ. Sabbe teti sabbe
tika-s0105t0:1279_4: te nānāācariyehi vuttamaggā, ye pāḷiyaṃ “addhariyā brāhmaṇā”tiādinā vuttā. Ayamettha
tika-s0105t0:1279_5: pāḷiattho – addharo nāma yaññaviseso, tadupayogibhāvato addhariyāni vuccanti yajūni,
tika-s0105t0:1279_6: tāni sajjhāyantīti addhariyā, yajuvedino. Tittirinā nāma isinā katā mantāti tittirā,
tika-s0105t0:1279_7: te sajjhāyantīti tittiriyā, yajuvedino eva. Yajuvedasākhā hesā, yadidaṃ tittiranti.
tika-s0105t0:1279_8: Chando vuccati visesato sāmavedo, taṃ sarena kāyantīti chandokā, sāmavedino. “Chandogā”tipi
tika-s0105t0:1279_9: tatiyakkharena paṭhanti, so evattho. Bahavo iriyo thomanā etthāti bavhāri, iruvedo,
tika-s0105t0:1280_0: Bahūnīti etthāyaṃ upamāsaṃsandanā – yathā te nānāmaggā ekaṃsato tassa gāmassa vā
tika-s0105t0:1280_1: nigamassa vā pavesāya honti, evaṃ brāhmaṇehi paññāpiyamānāpi nānāmaggā ekaṃsato brahmalokūpagamanāya
tika-s0105t0:1281_0: 525. Paṭijānitvā pacchā niggayhamānā avajānantīti pubbe niddosataṃ sallakkhamānā
tika-s0105t0:1281_1: paṭijānitvā pacchā sadosabhāvena niggayhamānā “netaṃ mama vacana”nti avajānanti,
tika-s0105t0:1282_0: 527-529. Te tevijjāti tevijjakā te brāhmaṇā. Evasaddena ñāpito attho idha natthīti
tika-s0105t0:1282_1: va-kāro gahito, so ca anatthakovāti dasseti “āgamasandhimatta”nti iminā, vaṇṇāgamena
tika-s0105t0:1282_2: padantarasandhimattaṃ katanti attho. Andhapaveṇīti andhapanti. “Paṇṇāsasaṭṭhi andhā”ti
tika-s0105t0:1282_3: idaṃ tassā andhapaveṇiyā mahato gacchagumbassa anuparigamanayogyatādassanaṃ. Evañhi
tika-s0105t0:1282_4: te “suciraṃ velaṃ mayaṃ maggaṃ gacchāmā”ti saññino honti. Andhānaṃ paramparasaṃsattavacanena
tika-s0105t0:1282_6: “eko kirā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Anuparigantvāti kañci kālaṃ anukkamena samantato gantvā.
tika-s0105t0:1282_7: Kacchanti kacchabandhadussakaṇṇaṃ. “Kacchaṃ bandhantī”tiādīsu viya hi kacchasaddo
tika-s0105t0:1282_8: nibbasanavisesapariyāyo. Apica kacchanti upakacchakaṭṭhānaṃ. “Sambādho nāma ubho
tika-s0105t0:1282_9: upakacchakā muttakaraṇa”ntiādīsu viya hi kāyekadesavācako kacchasaddo. Cakkhumāti
tika-s0105t0:1282_10: yaṭṭhigāhakaṃ vadati. “Purimo”tiādi yathāvuttakkamena veditabbo. Nāmakaññevāti atthābhāvato
tika-s0105t0:1282_11: nāmamattameva, taṃ pana bhāsitaṃ tehi sārasaññitampi nāmamattatāya asārabhāvato nihīnamevāti
tika-s0105t0:1283_0: 530. Yoti brahmaloko. Yatoti bhummatthe nissakkavacanaṃ. Sāmaññajotanāya visese avatiṭṭhanato
tika-s0105t0:1283_2: Āyācantīti uggamanaṃ patthenti. Kasmā? Lokassa bahukārabhāvato. Tathā thomanādīsu.
tika-s0105t0:1283_3: Sommoti sītalo. Ayaṃ kira brāhmaṇānaṃ laddhi “pubbebrāhmaṇānamāyācanāya candimasūriyā’gantvā
tika-s0105t0:1284_0: 532. Idha pana kiṃ vattabbanti imasmiṃ pana appaccakkhabhūtassa brahmuno sahabyatāya
tika-s0105t0:1284_1: maggadesane tevijjānaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ kiṃ vattabbaṃ atthi, ye paccakkhabhūtānampi candimasūriyānaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1284_2: sahabyatāya maggaṃ desetuṃ na sakkontīti adhippāyo. “Yatthā”ti iminā “idhā”ti vuttamevatthaṃ paccāmasati.
tika-s0105t0:1286_0: 542. Samabharitāti sampuṇṇā. Tato eva kākapeyyā. Pārāti pārimatīra, ālapanametanti
tika-s0105t0:1286_1: dassetuṃ “ambho”ti vuttaṃ. Apāranti orimatīraṃ. Ehīti āgacchāhi. Vatāti ekaṃsena.
tika-s0105t0:1286_2: Atha gamissasi, evaṃ sati ehīti yojanā. “Atthime”tiādi avhānakāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1287_1: pañcasīlādiviparītā pañcaverādayo. Indanti indanāmakaṃ devaputtaṃ, sakkaṃ vā. “Aciravatiyā
tika-s0105t0:1287_2: tīre nisinno”ti iminā yassā tīre nisinno, tadeva upamaṃ katvā āharati dhammarājā
tika-s0105t0:1287_3: dhammadhātuyā suppaṭividdhattāti dasseti. “Punapī”ti vatvā “aparampī”ti vacanaṃ itarāyapi
tika-s0105t0:1288_1: cittassa ābandhanabhāvena. Kāmañcāyaṃ guṇasaddo atthantaresupi diṭṭhapayogo, tesaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1288_2: panettha asambhavato pārisesañāyena bandhanaṭṭhoyeva yuttoti dassetuṃ ayamatthuddhāro
tika-s0105t0:1288_3: āraddho. Ahatānanti adhotānaṃ abhinavānaṃ. Etthāti khandhakapāḷipade paṭalaṭṭhoti
tika-s0105t0:1288_4: paṭalasaddassa, paṭalasaṅkhāto vā attho. Guṇaṭṭhoti guṇasaddassa attho nāma. Esa
tika-s0105t0:1288_5: nayo sesesupi. Accentīti atikkamma pavattanti. Etthāti somanassajātakapāḷipade. Dakkhiṇāti
tika-s0105t0:1288_6: tiracchānagate dānacetanā. Etthāti dakkhiṇavibhaṅgasuttapade mālāguṇeti mālādāme.
tika-s0105t0:1291_0: Esevāti bandhanaṭṭho eva. Na hi rūpādīnaṃ kāmetabbabhāve vuccamāne paṭalaṭṭho yujjati
tika-s0105t0:1291_1: tathā kāmetabbatāya anadhippetattā. Rāsaṭṭhādīsupi eseva nayo. Pārisesato pana bandhanaṭṭhova
tika-s0105t0:1291_2: yujjati. Yadaggena hi nesaṃ kāmetabbatā, tadaggena bandhanabhāvoti.
tika-s0105t0:1292: Koṭṭhāsaṭṭhopi cettha yujjateva cakkhuviññeyyādikoṭṭhāsabhāvena nesaṃ kāmetabbato. Koṭṭhāse ca guṇasaddo dissati “diguṇaṃ vaḍḍhetabba”ntiādīsu viya.
tika-s0105t0:1295: Ādīsu pana sampadāṭṭho guṇasaddo, sopi idha na yujjatīti anuddhaṭo.
tika-s0105t0:1296_1: “etenupāyenā”ti atidisati. Gavesitāpi “iṭṭhā”ti vuccanti, te idha nādhippetāti dassetuṃ
tika-s0105t0:1296_2: “pariyiṭṭhā vā hontu mā vā”ti vuttaṃ. Icchitā eva hi idha iṭṭhā, tenāha “iṭṭhārammaṇabhūtā”ti,
tika-s0105t0:1296_3: sukhārammaṇabhūtāti attho. Kāmanīyāti kāmetabbā. Iṭṭhabhāvena manaṃ appayanti vaḍḍhentīti
tika-s0105t0:1296_4: manāpā. Piyajātikāti piyasabhāvā. Ārammaṇaṃ katvāti attānamārammaṇaṃ katvā. Kammabhūte
tika-s0105t0:1296_5: ārammaṇe sati rāgo uppajjatīti taṃ kāraṇabhāvena nidassento “rāguppattikāraṇabhūtā”ti āha.
tika-s0105t0:1297_0: Gedhenāti lobhena. Abhibhūtā hutvā pañca kāmaguṇe paribhuñjantīti yojanā. Mucchākāranti
tika-s0105t0:1297_1: mohanākāraṃ. Adhiosannāti adhigayha ajjhosāya avasannā. Tena vuttaṃ “ogāḷhā”ti. Sānanti
tika-s0105t0:1297_2: avasānaṃ. Pariniṭṭhānappattāti gilitvā pariniṭṭhāpanavasena pariniṭṭhānaṃ uyyātā.
tika-s0105t0:1297_3: Ādīnavanti kāmaparibhoge sampati, āyatiñca dosaṃ apassantā. Ghāsacchādanādisambhoganimittasaṃkilesato
tika-s0105t0:1297_4: nissaranti apagacchanti etenāti nissaraṇaṃ, yoniso paccavekkhitvā tesaṃ paribhogapaññā.
tika-s0105t0:1298_0: 548-9. Āvarantīti kusaladhammuppattiṃ ādito vārenti. Nivārentīti niravasesato vārayanti.
tika-s0105t0:1298_1: Onandhantīti ogāhantā viya chādenti. Pariyonandhantīti sabbaso chādenti. Āvaraṇādīnaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1298_2: vasenāti yathāvuttānaṃ āvaraṇādiatthānaṃ vasena. Te hi āsevanabalavatāya purimapurimehi
tika-s0105t0:1300_0: 550. Itthipariggahe sati purisassa pañcakāmaguṇapariggaho paripuṇṇo eva hotīti vuttaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1300_3: brāhmaṇānaṃ kā brahmunā saṃsandanā, brahmā pana sabbena sabbaṃ apariggahoti. Veracittena
tika-s0105t0:1300_4: avero, kuto etassa verapayogoti adhippāyo. Cittagelaññasaṅkhātenāti cittuppādagelaññasaññitena,
tika-s0105t0:1300_5: iminā tassa rūpakāyagelaññabhāvo vutto hoti. Byāpajjhenāti dukkhena. Uddhaccakukkuccādīhīti
tika-s0105t0:1300_6: ettha ādisaddena tadekaṭṭhā saṃkilesadhammā saṅgayhanti. Atoyevettha “uddhaccakukkuccābhāvato”ti
tika-s0105t0:1300_8: sati na kadāci cittaṃ purisassa vase vattati, pahīnāya pana tāya siyā cittassa purisavase
tika-s0105t0:1300_9: vattananti āha “vicikicchāyā”tiādi. Cittagatikāti cittavasikā. Tena vuttaṃ “cittassa
tika-s0105t0:1300_10: vase vattantī”ti. Na tādisoti brāhmaṇā viya na cittavasiko hoti, atha kho vasībhūtajhānābhiññatāya
tika-s0105t0:1301_0: 552. Brahmalokamaggeti brahmalokagāmimagge paṭipajjitabbe, paññāpetabbe vā, taṃ paññapentāti
tika-s0105t0:1301_1: adhippāyo. Upagantvāti micchāpaṭipattiyā upasaṅkamitvā, paṭijānitvā vā. Samatalanti
tika-s0105t0:1301_2: saññāyāti matthake ekaṅgulaṃ vā upaḍḍhaṅgulaṃ vā sukkhatāya samatalanti saññāya.
tika-s0105t0:1301_3: Paṅkaṃ otiṇṇā viyāti anekaporisaṃ mahāpaṅkaṃ otiṇṇā viya. Anuppavisantīti apāyamaggaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1301_4: brahmalokamaggasaññāya ogāhanti. Tato eva saṃsīditvā visādaṃ pāpuṇanti. Evanti “samatala”ntiādinā
tika-s0105t0:1301_5: vuttanayena. Saṃsīditvāti nimujjitvā. Marīcikāyāti migataṇhikāya kattubhūtāya. Vañcetvāti
tika-s0105t0:1301_6: nadīsadisaṃ pakāsanena vañcetvā. Vāyamānāti vāyamamānā, ayameva vā pāṭho. Sukkhataraṇaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1301_7: maññe tarantīti sukkhanadītaraṇaṃ taranti maññe. Abhinnepi bhedavacanametaṃ. Tasmāti
tika-s0105t0:1301_8: yasmā tevijjā amaggameva “maggo”ti upagantvā saṃsīdanti, tasmā. Yathā teti te “samatala”nti
tika-s0105t0:1301_9: saññāya paṅkaṃ otiṇṇā sattā hatthapādādīnaṃ saṃbhañjanaṃ paribhañjanaṃ pāpuṇanti
tika-s0105t0:1301_10: yathā. Idheva cāti imasmiñca attabhāve. Sukhaṃ vā sātaṃ vā na labhantīti jhānasukhaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1301_11: vā vipassanāsātaṃ vā na labhanti, kuto maggasukhaṃ vā nibbānasātaṃ vāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0105t0:1301_12: Maggadīpakanti “maggadīpaka” micceva tehi abhimataṃ. Tevijjakanti tevijjatthañāpakaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1301_13: Pāvacananti pakaṭṭhavacanasammataṃ pāṭhaṃ. Tevijjānaṃ brāhmaṇānanti sambandhe sāmivacanaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1301_14: Iriṇanti araññāniyā idaṃ adhivacananti āha “agāmakaṃ mahārañña”nti. Anupabhogarukkhehīti
tika-s0105t0:1301_15: migaruruādīnampi anupabhogārahehi kiṃ pakkādivisarukkhehi. Yatthāti yasmiṃ vane.
tika-s0105t0:1301_16: Parivattitumpi na sakkā honti mahākaṇṭakagacchagahanatāya. Ñātīnaṃ byasanaṃ vināso
tika-s0105t0:1301_17: ñātibyasanaṃ. Evaṃ bhogasīlabyasanesupi. Rogo eva byasati vibādhatīti rogabyasanaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1302_0: 554. Nanu jātasaddeneva ayamattho siddhoti codanamapaneti “yo hī”tiādinā. Jāto hutvā
tika-s0105t0:1302_1: saṃvaḍḍhito jātasaṃvaḍḍhoti ācariyena vuttaṃ, jāto ca so saṃvaḍḍho cāti jātasaṃvaḍḍhoti
tika-s0105t0:1302_2: pana yujjati visesanaparanipātattā. Na sabbaso paccakkhā honti paricayābhāvato. Ciranikkhantoti
tika-s0105t0:1302_3: nikkhanto hutvā cirakālo. Ciraṃ nikkhantassa assāti hi ciranikkhanto. “Jātasaṃvaḍḍho”ti
tika-s0105t0:1302_5: puna visesetīti vuttaṃ hoti. Dandhāyitattanti vissajjane mandattaṃ saṇikavutti, taṃ
tika-s0105t0:1302_6: pana saṃsayavasena cirāyanaṃ nāma hotīti āha “kaṅkhāvasena cirāyitatta”nti. Vitthāyitattanti
tika-s0105t0:1302_7: sārajjitattaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana vitthāyitattaṃ nāma thambhitattanti adhippāyena
tika-s0105t0:1302_9: Nanvetampi antarāyapaṭihataṃ siyāti āsaṅkaṃ pariharati “tassa hī”tiādinā. Mārāvaṭṭanādivasenāti
tika-s0105t0:1302_10: ettha cakkhumohamucchākālādi saṅgayhati. Na sakkā tassa kenaci antarāyo kātuṃ catūsu
tika-s0105t0:1303_0: 555. Uiccupasaggayoge lumpasaddo, lupisaddo vā uddharaṇattho hotīti vuttaṃ “uddharatū”ti.
tika-s0105t0:1303_1: Upasaggavisesena hi dhātusaddā atthavisesavuttino honti yathā “ādāna”nti. Pajāsaddo
tika-s0105t0:1305_0: 556-7. “Apubbanti iminā saṃvaṇṇetabbatākāraṇaṃ dīpeti. Yassa atisayena balaṃ atthi,
tika-s0105t0:1305_1: so balavāti vuttaṃ “balasampanno”ti. Saṅkhaṃ dhametīti saṅkhadhamako, saṅkhaṃ dhamayitvā
tika-s0105t0:1305_3: Balavato pana saṅkhasaddoti sambandho. Appanāva vaṭṭati paṭipakkhato sammadeva cetaso
tika-s0105t0:1306_0: Pamāṇakataṃ kammaṃ nāma kāmāvacaraṃ vuccati pamāṇakarānaṃ saṃkilesadhammānaṃ avikkhambhanato.
tika-s0105t0:1306_1: Tathā hi taṃ brahmavihārapubbabhāgabhūtaṃ pamāṇaṃ atikkamitvā odissakānodissakadisāpharaṇavasena
tika-s0105t0:1306_2: vaḍḍhetuṃ na sakkā. Vuttavipariyāyato pana rūpārūpāvacaraṃ appamāṇakataṃ kammaṃ nāma.
tika-s0105t0:1306_3: Tenāha “tañhī”tiādi. Tattha arūpāvacare odissakānodissakavasena pharaṇaṃ na labbhati,
tika-s0105t0:1306_4: tathā disāpharaṇañca. Keci pana “taṃ āgamanavasena labbhatī”ti vadanti, tadayuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t0:1306_5: Na hi brahmavihāranissando āruppaṃ, atha kho kasiṇanissando, tasmā yaṃ subhāvitaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1306_6: vasībhāvaṃ pāpitaṃ āruppaṃ, taṃ appamāṇakatanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Yaṃ vā sātisayaṃ brahmavihārabhāvanāya
tika-s0105t0:1306_7: abhisaṅkhatena santānena nibbattitaṃ, yañca brahmavihārasamāpattito vuṭṭhāya samāpannaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1306_8: arūpāvacarajjhānaṃ, taṃ iminā pariyāyena pharaṇapamāṇavasena appamāṇakata”nti apare.
tika-s0105t0:1307_0: Rūpāvacarārūpāvacarakammeti rūpāvacarakamme ca arūpāvacarakamme ca sati. Na ohīyati
tika-s0105t0:1307_1: na tiṭṭhatīti katūpacitampi kāmāvacarakammaṃ yathādhigate mahaggatajjhāne aparihīne
tika-s0105t0:1307_2: taṃ abhibhavitvā paṭibāhitvā sayaṃ ohīyakaṃ hutvā paṭisandhiṃ dātuṃ samatthabhāve
tika-s0105t0:1307_3: na tiṭṭhati. “Na avasissatī”ti etassa hi atthavacanaṃ “na ohīyatī”ti, tadetaṃ “na
tika-s0105t0:1307_4: avatiṭṭhatī”ti etassa visesavacanaṃ, pariyāyavacanaṃ vā. Tenāha “kiṃ vuttaṃ hotī”tiādi.
tika-s0105t0:1307_5: Laggitunti āvarituṃ nisedhetuṃ. Ṭhātunti paṭibalaṃ hutvā patiṭṭhātuṃ. Pharitvāti
tika-s0105t0:1307_6: paṭipharitvā. Pariyādiyitvāti tassa sāmatthiyaṃ khepetvā. Okāsaṃ gahetvāti vipākadānokāsaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1307_7: gahetvā, iminā “laggituṃ vā ṭhātuṃ vā”ti vacanameva vitthāretīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Atha
tika-s0105t0:1307_8: kho”tiādi atthāpattidassanaṃ. Kammassa pariyādiyanaṃ nāma tassa vipākuppādanaṃ nisedhetvā
tika-s0105t0:1307_9: attano vipākuppādanamevāti āha “tassā”tiādi. Tassāti kāmāvacarakammassa vipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā.
tika-s0105t0:1307_10: Sayamevāti rūpārūpāvacarakammameva. Brahmasahabyataṃ upaneti asati tādisānaṃ cetopaṇidhiviseseti
tika-s0105t0:1307_11: adhippāyo. Tissabrahmādīnaṃ viya hi mahāpuññānaṃ cetopaṇidhivisesena mahaggatakammaṃ
tika-s0105t0:1308_0: Atha mahaggatassa garukakammassa vipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā parittaṃ lahukakammaṃ kathamattano
tika-s0105t0:1308_1: vipākassa okāsaṃ karotīti? Tīsupi kira vinayagaṇṭhipadesu evaṃ vuttaṃ “nikantibaleneva
tika-s0105t0:1308_2: jhānaṃ parihāyati, tato parihīnajhānattā parittakammaṃ laddhokāsa”nti. Keci pana
tika-s0105t0:1308_3: vadanti “anīvaraṇāvatthāya nikantiyā jhānassa parihāni vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbā”ti. Idamettha
tika-s0105t0:1308_5: “ijjhati bhikkhave sīlavato cetopaṇidhi visuddhattā sīlassā”ti vacanato kāmabhave
tika-s0105t0:1308_6: cetopaṇidhi mahaggatakammassa vipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā parittakammuno vipākokāsaṃ karotīti.
tika-s0105t0:1308_7: Evaṃ mettādivihārīti vuttanayena appanāpattānaṃ mettādīnaṃ brahmavihārānaṃ vasena vihārī.
tika-s0105t0:1309_1: Majjhimapaṇṇāsake saṅgītanti ajjhāharitvā sambandho. Punappunaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ daḷhataraṃ,
tika-s0105t0:1309_2: mahapphalatarañca, tasmā dutiyampi saraṇagamanaṃ katanti veditabbaṃ. Katipāhaccayenāti
tika-s0105t0:1309_3: dvīhatīhaccayena. Pabbajitvāti sāmaṇerapabbajjaṃ gahetvā. Aggaññasuttampi amuṃyeva
tika-s0105t0:1309_4: vāseṭṭhamārabbha kathesi, nāññanti ñāpetuṃ “aggaññasutte”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha āgatanayena
tika-s0105t0:1309_5: upasampadañceva arahattañca alatthuṃ paṭilabhiṃsūti attho. Yamettha atthato na vibhattaṃ,
tika-s0105t0:1310_4: katāya sādhuvilāsiniyā nāma līnatthapakāsaniyā tevijjasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthapakāsanā.
tika-s0105t0:1313: Byañjanañceva attho ca, vinicchayo ca sabbathā;
tika-s0105t0:1314: Sādhakena vinā vutto, natthi cettha yato tato.
tika-s0105t0:1351: Yaṃ nissāya visodhesi, sāsanaṃ esa bhūpati;
tika-s0105t0:1354: Tisate dvisahasse ca, sampatte sā suniṭṭhitā.
tika-s0105t0:1356: Imañca saṅkharontena, yaṃ puññaṃ pasutaṃ mayā.
tika-s0105t0:1359: Sadā rakkhantu rājāno, dhammeneva pajaṃ imaṃ;
tika-s0105t0:1361: Ime ca pāṇino sabbe, sabbadā nirupaddavā;
